[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/ye he lot+sa la ta pra b+hA ba la ha rI dzA t+bad+d+hu ta shre Na yaHsa twat+sA ha b+hu baHswa b+hA ba bi ma la dz+nyA na pra kA shA sha yA/_/a dz+nyA le khya li piM b+hi d+hA tr-i nr-i pa taHsaM sak+ta karmA ba liM tsi tran+te pi na laM g+ha yan+ti
[\[1b.2\]]@##/_/gang zhig bde blag tu bskrun mthu yi dba' rlabs rmad du byung ba'i 'phreng ba skye/_/snying stobs spro ba'i sa dang rang bzhin dri med ye shes gsal ba'i bsam pa can/_/de dag gis kyang sgrub byed rgyal po'i bka' yi spring yig las kyi 'phreng chags pa/_/bkra ba dag ni 'god
[\[1b.3\]]ku Ti lAM be la mi bAM b+ho d+ha yaH/_/shrA bas+t+yA pre ri tA tad+ba dur+b+r-it+taM stIr+thi kAM ga nAH/_/kIr+t+ti b+haM go d+ya tA shA stuHsa de hA na ra ke pa ta na/_/ta taHpu N+ya na dI saM g+ha pa
[\[1b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ngogs 'gram gya gyu chu bo'i gter gyis bzhin/_/de bzhin mnyan yod du ni 'phyar rnams kyis/_/bskul bar gyur pa'i mu stegs bud med dag_/ston pa'i grags pa gzhom par brtson gyur pa/_/lus dang bcas pa dmyal bar ltung bar gyur/_/de nas dag byed klung gi tshogs/_/
[\[1b.5\]]ri k+Ship+tA ma lAM b+ha saM/_/sa ra s+ya na ba tastA khye rat+na so sA na sany+tsa ye/_/he mAb+dza buny+dza kIny+dzalka piny+dza rI kr-i ta ShaT+pa de/_/pad+mA sa nas+tho b+ha ga bAn b+hik+Shu b+hiHpa ri ba ri taH/_/sar+b+ba dz+nyaHkar+m+ma tan+t+ra
[\[1b.6\]]yongs su 'phen byed dri med chu/_/rdzing bu gdung med ces bya ba/_/rin cen tshogs kyi them skas can/_/gser gyi pad tshogs ge sar gyis/_/rkang drug ser por byed pa yi/_/pad+ma'i khrir gnas bcom ldan 'das/_/dge slong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/_/thams cad mkhyen pa las
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]s+ya daR+sha yan+ta bi laM g+h+ya tAM/_/swa kar+m+ma p+lu ti bai tsi t+yaM bak+tuM sa mu pa tsa kra me/_/kar+m+mA khyA na k+Sha Ne ta smin b+ha ga bAn+b+hak+ta bat+sa laH_/shA ri pu tra sa mA hwA ne maung+ga l+yA ya na mA
[\[2a.2\]]kyi rgyud/_/'gom bya min par ston mdzad cing /_/rang las spyod pa rnam par bkra/_/gsung bar yang dag brtson par gyur/_/las ni 'chad pa'i gnas skabs der/_/bcom ldan gus la mnyes gshin pas/_/shA ri'i bu ni 'bod pa dag_/mau gal bu la rab tu
[\[2a.3\]]di shatra/_/shU ts+yA sU tre Na saM g+hA TI kur+b+bA NaM ra tsa nA tsi tAM/_/sa shA ri pu tre mA sA d+ya gr-i d+h+ra kU TA tsa lA shra me/_/aM gu rI sany+tsa ko nai ba pU tsI kar+m+ma pra b+hA ba bAn/_/bi lam+ba b+hI t+ya kr-i twA s+ya ta ma b+hA Sha ta sa twa raH/_/e
[\[2a.4\]]bskos/_/bya rgod phung po'i ri gnas la/_/khab dang skud pas sbyar ma ni/_/bkra shis rdzogs par byed pa yin/_/shA ri'i bu can de yis phyin/_/sor mo rangs byas 'drub pa yis/_/las kyi mthu nyid ma yin pa/_/bya ba 'gor bas 'jigs pa yis/_/myur dang bcas pa de la smras/_/tshur
[\[2a.5\]]h+ye hi tUr+N+NaM b+ha ga bAn sa ra s+ya na ba tap+ta kai/_/kar+m+mo pa de shaM b+hik+ShU NAM sar+b+ba dz+nyaHkar+t+ta mu t+ya taH/_/kar+m+ma bya gra yA k+Shi pra bi lam+ba m+bi da d+hA si tse ta/_/tan+ma har+d+h+ya na yA ma twAM bi pu la pa sh+ya me ba lam/_/
[\[2a.6\]]shog tshur shog mgyogs par ro/_/bcom ldan kun mkhyen rdzing bu ni/_/gdung ba med par dge slong la/_/las ni nye bar ston par brtson/_/las la chags nas myur min zhing /_/thogs par gal te khyod bsgrubs na/_/rdzu 'phrul chen pos khyod blang bya/_/bdag gi stobs yang blta bar byos/_/
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]i ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA sha ri pu tra sta ma bra taM/_/a dza na na ya me tA bat+ta to dzA nA mi te pa lam/_/i t+yuk+t+wa gr-i d+h+ra kU TA dri shi kha re sa ban d+ha tata/_/maung+ga l+yA ya ne na kr-iSh+Ta tsa tasmin+gi ri ra kam+pata/_/gi ri pA ta b+ha
[\[2b.2\]]zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/shA ri'i bu yis de la smras/_/re zhig bdag gi thu ba long /_/de nas khyod stobs bdag gis shes/_/zhes smras bya rgod phung po yi/_/ri yi rtse la de yis btags/_/mau gal bu yis blangs pa yi/_/tshe na ri ni 'gul bar gyur/_/shA ri'i bu yis lhun po la/_/ri
[\[2b.3\]]yAt+me rau shA ri pu tro ba ban+d+ha tata/_/te na kriSh+Ta ta to s+ya smi bi tsa tsA la su rA la yaH/_/shAstu rA sa na he mAs+dza nA le ma Ni ma ye ta taH/_/shA ri pu tre Na bad+d+han+ta ta pa ra s+yA shAkya tA ya yau/_/r-id+d+hi kra me Na maung+ga l+yAH
[\[2b.4\]]ni lhung bar 'jigs nas btags/_/de nas de yis blangs pa'i tshe/_/lha yi gnas kyang rnam par g.yos/_/de nas ston pa'i gdan gser gyi/_/pad rtsa nor bu'i rang bzhin la/_/shA ri'i bu yis de bzhin btags/_/pha rol nus med nyid du gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul rim pas mau gal bu/_/
[\[2b.5\]]shA ri pu tre Na naM rdzi taH/_/tasmin+bUr+b+ba ta raM prAp+te ya yau b+ha ga ba ton+ta kaM/_/ta yor+m+ma har+d+d+hi bi k+Sho b+hAn+nA gau nan+do pa nan+da kau/_/pA tA lA dur+thi tau b+hI t+ya b+ha ga ban+taM pra Ni sa tuH/_/dza yi naHshA ri pu tra s+ya prab+hA
[\[2b.6\]]shA ri'i bu yis pham byas pa/_/shin tu snga bar des phyin tshe/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song /_/de dag rdzu 'phrul ches bskyod pas/_/klu ni dga' bo nye dga' dag_/sa 'og nas ni rab 'thon te/_/'jigs nas bcom ldan la phyag btsal/_/shA ri'i bu ni rgyal ba'i mthu/_/de nas dge
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ba ma tha b+hik+Shu b+hiH/_/priSh+To ba b+ha She b+ha ga bAn prAg+b+r-it+taM dz+nyA na lo tsa na/_/a b+hUtAM shAM kha li khaM tau bA rA Na s+yA mri Shi pu rAH/_/bAR+Sha baR+Sha bi bA de na saM g+haR+Sho b+hUt+ta yormi thaH/_/ka dA tsi da tha shaM khaM na pad+b+h+yAM
[\[3a.2\]]slong rnams kyis dris/_/ye shes spyan ldan bcom ldan gyis/_/sngon byung dag ni rab gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sIr sngon byung ba/_/drang srong dung dang bris pa'o/_/de dag char dang char med ni/_/'gal brjod phan tshun 'gran par gyur/_/de nas nam zhig dung khros pa'i/_/rkang
[\[3a.3\]]dza Taspr-iSh+TaHkrU d+hA/_/li khi taHbrA ha tAM mUr+d+d+ha b+he da sUR+Yo da yestu te/_/shaM kho ba dan+mad+ba tsa sA no de Sh+ya ti di bA ka raH/_/i t+yuk+te na su tsi raM sAn+b+ha kA ra ma b+hUdz+dza ga ta/_/kalbiM ta ma li khi te na s+ya kr-i pa yA
[\[3a.4\]]pas ral pa la reg pa/_/bris pas der smras nyi shar tshe/_/khyod kyi mgo bo bye gyur cig_/dung gis smras pa bdag tshig gis/_/nyin byed 'char bar ma gyur cig_/des 'di brjod tshe mdzes pa yi/_/'gro ba mun pa dang bcas gyur/_/bris pas de la brtse ba yis/_/sa yi rang bzhin
[\[3a.5\]]mrin+ma yaM shi raH/_/sUr+Yo da ye tha sa ha sA sha ta d+hA ba su d+hA ya yau/_/dzan+mAn+t+rare sa shAM kho d+ya maung+ga l+yA ya na tAM ga taH/_/li khi taHshA ri pu tro yaM tad+bi dze tA ta dA s+ya b+huta/_/sar+b+ba dz+nye ne ti ka thi te pr-i tAM te prAk+ta ne ta yoH/_/tata kar+m+ma taMn+t+ra
[\[3a.6\]]mgo bo byas/_/nyi ma shar tshe 'phral la ni/_/nor 'dzin dum bu brgyar gyur to/_/skye ba gzhan la dung de ring /_/mau gal gyi bu nyid gyur/_/bris pa shA ri'i bu 'di ste/_/de las de'i tshe'ang rgyal bar gyur/_/de dag gi ni sngon byung mtha'/_/'di ni kun mkhyen gyis gsungs tshe/_/las kyi rgyud ni bkra
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]bai tsi t+yaM sa prats+tshurmu na yaHpu naH/_/b+ha ga ban kar+m+ma NAM ke ShA mad+b+hu to yaM pha long+ga maH/_/ta ba dz+nyA na ma ya s+yA pi ye na saM spr-i sha te ba suH/_/pA dAM guSh+ThaHke taHkasmA tata ba sA ShA Na d+hA ra yA/_/bid+d+ha kha di ra shU ts+yA yaM
[\[3b.2\]]ba de/_/slar yang thub pa rnams kyis dris/_/bcom ldan las ni gang dag gis/_/'bras bu rmad byung 'byung ba 'di/_/ye shes rang bzhin khyod kyi yang /_/lus la gang gis reg par gyur/_/rdo ba'i zer mas khyod zhabs kyi/_/mthe bong snad pa ci yis snad/_/seng ldeng thur mas zhabs
[\[3b.3\]]sa bra Nash+tsa ra Nash+tsa kiM/_/shU n+ya pA traHki ma prA s+ya b+hik+ShA ma d+yA ga to b+ha bAn/_/mi th+yA k+Ship+to pi pun+daR+YA kiM pra brA dzi ka yA ta yA/_/bany+tsa mA na di kA kiM te sA ba bA dA b+ha bAn+m+r-i ShA/_/b+huk+tAHkiM ko Ta ra ya ba bai ran+t+ye Shu twa
[\[3b.4\]]phug nas/_/rma dang bcas pa 'di ni ci/_/bsod snyoms ma thob lhung bzed ni/_/stong par ding khyod la smad ci/_/mdzes ma rab byung de yis ni/_/rdzun gyis khyod la smad pa ci/_/mi bden smad dang bcas gyur pas/_/khyod la slu bar byed pa ci/_/bai ra na t+ya ru khyod kyis sngon/_/ko Ta ra yi nas
[\[3b.5\]]yA pu rA/_/baR+ShA NaM ShaD+b+ha ga ba taHki ma b+hU DuSh+ka ra kr-i yA/_/pra skan+d+hi byA d+hi nA spr-iSh+TaHkasmA ts+tsa b+ha ba to ba puH/_/shi ror+t+ti r-i b+ha bat+kiM te ta smi na shAkya ku la k+Sha ye/_/bA yu nA pr-iSh+Tha khe do b+hU tra kasmA d+d-i bya ta nosta ta/_/
[\[3b.6\]]gsol ci/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug ni/_/dka' ba spyad par gyur pa ci/_/khyod kyi lus la rab gnon gyi/_/nad kyis ci yi slad du reg_/shAkya'i rigs ni 'jig pa'i tshe/_/khyod kyi dbu ni bsnyung gyur ci/_/ci slad khyod kyi lus mchog la/_/rlung gis sku rgyab bsnyung bar gyur/_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]i ti tair+b+ha ga bAn+p+r-iSh+TastA na b+hA Sha ta sa smi taH/_/shru ya tA ma na pa ts+tshin+na bai tsi t+r+yaM kar+m+ma san+ta tiH/_/gats+tshan+ti ga taHpash+tsata pu rA tiSh+Tan+ti tiSh+Tha taH/_/satra b+h+r-i t+yA i ba san+nad+d+hAHkar+m+ma
[\[4a.2\]]de dag rnams kyis 'di dris tshe/_/bcom ldan 'dzum bcas der gsungs pa/_/nyon cig rgyun chad med par ni/_/rnam par bkri ba las kyi rgyun/_/lus can las kyi 'ching ba ni/_/chas zhugs g.yog po dam pa bzhin/_/'gro na phyi nas 'gro bar byed/_/sdod na
[\[4a.3\]]ban+d+hAHsha rI ri NAM/_/gA han+te ga ta nA ni dik+Shu bi tsa raM t+yu l+laM g+ha aM t+yam+bu d+hI nI ro han+ti gi rI shwa rA na b+hi sa raM t+yA kra mya sha krA la yaM/_/pA tA laM pra bi shaM t+ya lo ka bi Sha yaM kar+m+mA Ni kA lor+m+mi bta nAs+t+ye
[\[4a.4\]]sngon du sdod par byed/_/nags rnams dag tu 'jug cing phyogs su rnam par rgyu la chu gter 'god par byed/_/ri yi dbang phyug la 'dzeg brgya byin gnas ni kun tu mnan nas mngon par 'jug_/sa 'og snang ba min pa'i yul du rab 'jug las rnams dus kyi rba rlabs bzhin/_/'di
[\[4a.5\]]ShA ma ni shaM dza nA nu sha ra Ne mArgA ba ro d+haHkwa tsita/_/dir+g+hA kar+m+ma la tA na bai ba sha ta taM byAstA bu rA NaiHpha leHsAsh+tsaR+YA sa ha tsA ri NI ta nu b+h+r-i tA ta trA s+ya laM nish+tsa lA/_/yA kr-iSh+TA pa ri beSh+Ti tA bi g+ha Ti
[\[4a.6\]]dag rtag tu skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lam ni gang na'ang 'gog pa med/_/las kyi 'khri shing ring po gsar pa nyid la rtag tu 'bras bu rnying pas khyab/_/ngo mtshar dang bcas lus can lhan cig spyod cing de la'ang nges par g.yo ba med/_/gang zhig dge ba rnams kyis bkug dang
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]tA prot+sA Ti tA lo TaM tA nir+g+h+r-iSh+TA ka na shaHkr-i tA pi ku sha lairnai ba pra yA tik+Sha yaM/_/kAn+taHkA ye ba ha ti ma li naM do Sha bin+duM ya i na duHkrU rA kA raHki ra Na dza Ti laM yan+ma NiM kr-iSh+Na sar+b+baH/_/nA nA
[\[4b.2\]]yongs su dkris dang rnam par gsal ba dang /_/rab bcad gcus dang nges par brdar dang phye mar byas kyang zad pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig zla ba mdzes pa'i lus la skyon gyi thig le nag po dang /_/gang zhig ma rungs rnam pa'i sbrul nag nor bu 'od zer ral can 'dzin/_/sna tshogs
[\[4b.3\]]rU paiHsha ba la tsa ri taM de hi naM daR+sha yan+tI se yaM tsi tra kra ma pa ri Na tA kar+m+ma nirmA Na re khA/_/a b+hUd+g+r-i ha pa rtiHbUr+b+ba karba Te khe ba TA b+hi d+haH/_/a pra me yad+d+ha not+pan+tirba hu pu tra ka la tra bAn/_/a bi b+hak+ta
[\[4b.4\]]gzugs kyis bkra ba'i spyod pa lus can rnams la ston byed pa/_/'di ni bkra ba'i rim pas yongs smin las kyi sprul pa'i ri mo yin/_/gzhal du med pa'i nor skyed cing /_/bu mang chung ma dang ldan pa'i/_/khyim bdag kha ba Ta zhes pa/_/kar pa Tar ni sngon byung gyur/_/de yis mdza'
[\[4b.5\]]d+ha na sta s+ya b+h+rA tA dwai mA tI kaHshi shuH/_/mug+d+ha nA mA gr-i he ta s+thau bAt+sa l+yAt+te na pA li taH/_/ka dA tsit+taM gr-i ha pa tiM kA li kA nA ma bal+Ya b+hA/_/u bA tsa ku Ti lA swai ra gr-i ha tsin+ta ka thAn+ta re/_/mar+Ya pu tra twa yAM ge he
[\[4b.6\]]bas bskyangs pa yi/_/byis pa mug d+ha zhes bya ba/_/nor ma bgos pa'i spun zla ni/_/ma mi gcig pa de khyim gnas/_/nam zhig khyim bdag de la ni/_/khyim bsam gtam gyi bar skabs su/_/chung ma nag mo zhes bya ba/_/gya gyu can gyis dal bus smras/_/rje yi sras po rmongs pa las/_/
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]sha ra le nA pra mA di na/_/mo hA da so da rau b+hA tA bi Sha br-i k+Sho bi bar+d+d+hi taH/_/a ko si pa hu su tra s+yA bya yi na sta ba nir+b+ya yaH/_/a bi b+hag+ta d+ha nA dar+d+ha n+ya ye nai Sha ha ri Sh+ya ti/_/a s+ya byA d+ho
[\[5a.2\]]bag med drang por khyod kyi ni/_/khyim du ma mi gcig pas spun/_/dug gi ljon pa rnam par bskyed/_/'god bral gcig pu 'di yis kyang /_/'god ldan bu mang khyod kyi ni/_/bgos pa min pa'i nor dag las/_/khyed ni tshul gyis len par 'gyur/_/nad bzhin 'phel
[\[5a.3\]]ra be d+ha s+ya ba d+ha e bA d+ya mau Sha d+haM/_/ben+d+hu ts+tshe dA dra pi nr-i NAM d+ha nets+tshe do hi duHsa haH/_/gaM b+hI rA ya bya yA raM b+ha saM sA ro tsi ta dzan+ma nAM/_/bi sin+na pA to ma ha tAM dwi sen+d+ra pa ta no pa maH/_/i ti
[\[5a.4\]]ba 'di la ni/_/gsad pa kho na sman gyi mchog_/gnyen ni gcod pa dag las kyang /_/mi rnams nor gcod bzod par dka'/_/zab mo'i 'du 'god rtsom pa yis/_/'khor bar skye ba 'os gyur pa/_/chen po rgud pa lhung gyur na/_/gnyis 'thung dbang po 'gyel ba bzhin/_/zhes pa de
[\[5a.5\]]ta s+yAHba tsaHshru twA krU ra mut+kam+pi hA sha yaH/_/sA ta mu bA tsa pra Na yAta sne ha pA sha ba shI kr-i taH/_/hi ta muk+taM twa yA tA bta kiM twi ta da ti pA ta kaM_/sa ha dza taHts+tshen+na t+yaM ga ba hi raM ga d+ha nAp+ta ye/_/na yuk+ta
[\[5a.6\]]yi gdug pa'i tshig_/thos nas bsam pa rab 'dar zhing /_/mdza' ba'i zhags pas dbang byas de/_/de la gtsugs pas rab smras pa/_/re zhig khyod kyis phan pa brjod/_/'on kyang 'di ni shin tu sdig_/phyi rol yan lag nor thob slad/_/lhan skyes yan lag su zhig gcod/_/nor
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bar+tha sak+tA nA mar+thAr+the pA pa tsin+ta naM/_/k+Sha Ne nA yAn+ti bit+ta ni rak+Shi tA n+ya pi saM k+Sha yaM/_/mu huHkar+m+mor+m+mi saM raM b+ha saM b+ha bad+k+Sho b+ha bi b+h+ra mAH/_/gats+tsha r+t+yaHke na bar+Y+yan+te shai la ku
[\[5b.2\]]la chags rnams nor don du/_/sdig pa bsam pa rigs ma yin/_/nor rnams bsrung bar gyur mod kyang /_/skad cig gis ni brlag par 'gyur/_/yang yang las rlabs rtsom pa yis/_/rab skyed 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul can/_/dpal rnams ri gzar chu bo bzhin/_/bgrod pa
[\[5b.3\]]l+yA i ba shri yaH/_/tasmAn+na me su b+h+rU b+h+rA tr-i tro he pra bar+t+ta te ma naH/_/bit+ta b+h+raM she sti me br-it+ti r+b+r-it+ta b+h+raM she tu kA ga tiH/_/i ti ta s+ya bru bA Na s+ya nA nA yuk+ti ni daR+sha naiH/_/sha naiHsA ni de b+he pa t+yuHpA ta
[\[5b.4\]]dag ni su yis bzlog_/de slad smin legs bdag gi yid/_/spun zla gsod la yongs mi 'jug_/nor nyams bdag ni 'tsho ba yod/_/spyod tshul nyams na 'gro ba gang /_/zhes smras bdag po de yis yid/_/sna tshogs rigs pa nyer bstan nas/_/dal gyis sdig pa dag la ni/_/de yid mngon
[\[5b.5\]]kA b+hi mu kham+ma naH/_bar+d+hi tAn+ba hu b+haHsne haiHsa ha dzan+mUr+d+d+ha dzA ni ba/_/ts+tshitwA ha ran+ti sa hasA k+Shu ra d+ha rA kha rAHs+t+ri yaH/_/ba krA pa raM krU ra ta rA kre yA su pra bar+t+ta nA yai ba dr-iD+hA b+hi yo ga_/sA bA ni bA
[\[5b.6\]]par phyogs par byas/_/mdza' snum mang pos bskyed pa yis/_/lhan skyes spyi bor skyes pa bzhin/_/bud med spu gri'i so rnon gyis/_/'phral la bcad nas 'dor bar byed/_/rmongs pas bcom pa'i blo dang bud med ni/_/'khyog cing gzhan la rab gdug bya min la/_/'jug pa'i slad du
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]tA ya b+ha ba t+ya sh+yai mo hA ha tA naM yu ba tir+m+ma tish+tsa/_/ban+g+hu mi tra bi rak+tA naM swa su kha k+Shi ba tse ta sAM/_/shrI yu tA nA ma ba nA taHs+t+rI dzi nA nAM ma tiHku taH/_/a tha b+h+rA tar mA hU ya nI twA
[\[6a.2\]]brtan pa sngon sbyor zhing /_/sdig pa nges par lhung bar byed pa nyid/_/gnyen dang grogs la chags bral zhing /_/sems ni rab bdes myos gyur pa/_/dpal ldan rnams la dud pa bzhin/_/bud med rgyal la blo gros gang /_/de nas de yis spun zla ni/_/me tog btu
[\[6a.3\]]puSh+pots+tsa yA ya saH/_/n+ya ba d+hI da shru tA kran+da ma sma nA bi dza ne ba ne/_/a ha me ba tat+pA paM b+huk+t+wa pUr+b+be Shu dzan+ma su/_/ba hA mya d+yA pi she ShAM sha maM guSh+Tha k+Sha ta lak+Sha NaM/_/sAr+tha bA hor+tha dat+ta khyAHpUr+N+Na pra ba ha NaHpu rA/_/
[\[6a.4\]]slad la drangs nas/_/mi med nags su rdo ba yis/_/cho nge thos pa med par bsad/_/de nyid nga yin sdig pa de/_/skye ba snga ma rnams spyad nas/_/mthe bong snad pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/da lta'ang lhag ma'i cha shas 'dzin/_/ded dpon don byin zhes bya ba/_/gzings ni gang bar gyur pa sngon/_/
[\[6a.5\]]sa ba na s+yA nu ku l+ye na rat+na dwI pAt+sA mA ya yau/_/dwi tI ya sAr+tha ba ho tha naSh+TAr+tha staM sa mA shrI taH/_/dwe ShAt+p+ra ba ha Ne ts+tshi tra prats+tshan+na kar+t+tu mud+Ya yau/_/a tha driSh+To\u0f85r+tha dat+te na bAR+Ya ma naHpu naHpu naH/_/pA pa
[\[6a.6\]]rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis/_/rin chen gling nas yang dag 'ongs/_/de nas ded dpon gnyis pa ni/_/don nyams de la brten gyur pa/_/sdang bas gzings la sbas pa yi/_/'ug pa bya bar rab tu brtsams/_/ci ste don byin gyis mthong nas/_/yang dang yang du zlog gyur kyang /_/sdang bas
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]pra yat+nAd+d+we ShAn+d+haHk+Sha NaM na bi ra rA ma saH/_/ta taHsAr+tha pa tiHko sAt+tAM mAsh+tsaR+Ya bi mo hi taH/_/tI bra shak+ti pra hA re Na tsa kA ra ga ta dzI bi taM/_/a haM sa tat+pa d+hAt+pA pa pha laM b+huk+t+wA n+ya dzan+ma su/_/ba hA mya d+yA pi
[\[6b.2\]]long de sdig pa yi/_/'bad las skad cig log ma gyur/_/de nas don mthun bdag khros nas/_/khro ldan rnam par rmongs pa de/_/mi bzad shak+ti rab bsnun nas/_/srog dang bral ba nyid du byas/_/de nyid nga yin de bsad las/_/sdig 'bras skye ba gzhan spyad nas/_/lhag ma'i cha shas
[\[6b.3\]]she ShAM shaM tsa ra Ne kha di ra bra NaM/_/pra t+ya ka bud+d+haHpiN+DA ya pA tra pA Ni da yAr+d+ra d+hIH/_/bi be sha kA shi na ga rI mu pA riSh+TA b+hi d+haHpu rA/_/sa pUr+N+Na pA tra mA lo kya ta s+ya bi dwe Sha du Shi taH/_/mu d+hA tsa pa la ko nA
[\[6b.4\]]da lta yang /_/rkang par seng ldeng rma 'dzin no/_/lag na lhung bzed brtse ba yis/_/brlan pa'i blo ldan rab sangs rgyas/_/u pa riSh+Ta zhes pa sngon/_/ka shi'i grong du bslang slad zhugs/_/de yi lhung bzed yongs khengs pa/_/mthong nas sdang bas sun phyung ba/_/'bras med g.yo ldan zhes pa
[\[6b.5\]]ma pA Ni na pA ta pad+b+hu bi/_/a haM sa pA pan+tad+b+ha k+tats+tsha dot+tha ba hu dzan+ma su/_/b+huk+t+wA pi pha la she She Na pra yA tAHshu n+ya pa tra tAM/_/ba shiSh+T+wA khyaHpu rAr+ha twaM prAp+ta tsit+ta pra sA da bAnra/_/u bA pa pra mA rA me bi hA re pau
[\[6b.6\]]yis/_/lag pa yis ni sa la pho/_/de nga zas bcad las 'khrungs pa'i/_/sdig de skye ba mang por ni/_/spyad kyang 'bras bu lhag ma yis/_/lhung bzed stong pa nyid du gyur/_/ba shiSh+Tha zhes bya bar sngon/_/dgra bcom nyid thob sems rab dang /_/rab zhi'i dga' tshal grong pa yis/_/byas pa'i
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]ra kalbi te/_/b+h+ra tA pra bri dzi ta ta s+ya b+ha ra d+h+wa dza pa do di taH/_/bi lo kya dza na sAt+kA raM ya yau bi dwe ShAg+ni tap+ta tAM/_/gu Ni nAm+mA na ma lokya pra yat+nan+tad+bi nA sha ne/_/dza naHka ro te na twAt+ma gu Na d+hA
[\[7a.2\]]gtsug lag khang na gnas/_/de yi spun zla rab byung ni/_/b+ha ra d+h+wa dza skye bo yis/_/bkur sti rtag rgyas de mthong nas/_/sdang ba'i me yis gdungs par gyur/_/yon tan can rnams bkur mthong nas/_/de nyams slad du skye bo rnams/_/rab tu 'bad byed bdag nyid ni/_/yon tan
[\[7a.3\]]na sa mu d+ya me/_/ma hAr+hA bas+t+ra yu ga laM b+h+rA tre b+hak+ti dza nAr+b+pi taM/_/tasmai ba shiSh+ThaHpra da dau prI t+yA sa ra la mA na saH/_/ta dA dA ya gu Na dwe ShI na bai rA bi ra rA ma saH/_/no pa kA rerne tsa prI t+ya ni dza yA ti durdza naH/_/
[\[7a.4\]]gzung phyir brtson ma yin/_/chen po la 'os gos zung zhig_/skye bo gus pas phul ba ni/_/drang po'i sems ldan ba shiSh+Tha/_/mdza' bas spun zla de la byin/_/de blangs yon tan la sdang de/_/khon dang bral ba nyid ma gyur/_/phan pa rnams dang mdza' bas kyang /_/ngan pa rang gi mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[7a.5\]]a kAn+te sa sa mA hU ya bi hA ra pa ri tsA ri kAM/_/da twA s+yai bas+t+ra yu ga la dza gA da kr-i ta sat+k+r-i tiH/_/i daM twa yA bas+t+ra yu gaM pa ri d+hA ya su ma d+h+ya me/_/ba shiSh+The nAr+b+bi ta mi ti prash+ne bA ts+yaHsha nai rdza naH/_/i ti swI kr-i t+ya te
[\[7a.6\]]de yis gtsug lag khang skyong ma/_/dben par yang dag bos nas ni/_/gos ni zung dag de la byin/_/bkur sti byas nas rab smras pa/_/gos zung 'di ni skyed bzang ma/_/khyod kyis gyon la skye bo dag_/'dri na ba shiSh+Tha yis ni/_/byin zhes dal gyis smra bar bya/_/de skad des brjod de yis
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]nok+tA ba dA diSh+TaM tsa kA ra sA/_/ye nA b+ha bad+ba shiSh+Tha s+ya dza no bi sla ba maM ki taH/_/shI la bai ka l+ya bA de na so tha bau rai ra pU dzi taH/_/du raM ya yau ma hA to hi sat+kA ra b+h+raM sha b+hI ra baH/_/so ha mAr+YA sa bA de na b+ha ra d+h+wA
[\[7b.2\]]kyang /_/khas blangs de yis bstan pa byas/_/gang gis ba shiSh+Tha la ni/_/skye bo slong bar dgos par gyur/_/tshul khrims ma tshang brjod pas des/_/de nas grong pas ma mchod de/_/ring du song gyur chen po rnams/_/bkur sti nyams pas 'jigs pa nyid/_/b+hA ra d+h+wa dza de bdag ste/_/'phags la smad
[\[7b.3\]]dzo n+ya jan+ma su/_/b+huk+t+wA s+ya pu N+yaM tats+tshe ShAt+pun+da d+ya mr-i ShA rdi taH/_/brah+ma Ne neR+Sh+ya yA pUr+b+baM bA rA NA s+yAM ma yA mu neH/_/dur+b+ba de na ha tA kIr+t+tiHpany+tsA b+hi dz+nya s+ya d+hI ma taH/_/bA ra NA s+yA ma b+hut+pUr+b+ba b+ha drA nA ma bA
[\[7b.4\]]pas skye gzhan la/_/bsod nams min spyad de lhag las/_/mdzes mas ding yang rdzun gyis smad/_/bdag sngon bram ze'i phrag dog gis/_/bA rA Na sIr thub pa ni/_/blo ldan mngon shes lnga pa yis/_/grags pa phrag dog dag gis bcom/_/me tog gzhu can grags pa yi/_/ba dan ltar
[\[7b.5\]]rAM ga na/_/bai sh+yA ya shaHpa tA ke ba kAn+tA ku su ma d+ha n+wa naH/_/tAM ka dA tsin+m+r-i NA la khyo bi TaHku Ti la beSh+Ti taH/_/dr-iSh+T+wA ta s+yai da dau rA tri b+ho gA yaM shu ka b+hu Sha NaM/_/ta tasta ra la rA gA yAHsan+d+h+ya yaHsaM ga
[\[7b.6\]]mdzes smad 'tshong ma/_/bzang mo zhes bya bud med mchog_/bA rA Na sIr sngon byung gyur/_/g.yo ldan gya gyu'i bsam pa can/_/pad rtsa zhes pas nam zhig de/_/mthong nas mtshan mo spyad pa'i slad/_/gos dang rgyan dag de la byin/_/de nas g.yo ba'i chags pa can/_/mtshams la 'grogs
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]mon+mu khe/_/ga ga nAM ga Na par+Yan+te lam+ba mA ne di bA ka re/_/ga twA swa b+ha ba naM b+ha drA puSh+paM shu ka bi b+hU Sha NaiH/_/lA ba N+ya b+ha rA Na tsakre pu na tuk+taM pra sA d+ha naM/_/a lak+ta ke pA da ta
[\[8a.2\]]par mngon phyogs pa'i/_/nyin mor byed pa nam mkha' yi/_/khyams kyi mthar ni babs pa'i tshe/_/bzang mo rang gi khyim song nas/_/me tog gos dang rgyan rnams kyis/_/mdzes pa nyid kyi rgyan la ni/_/slar yang zlos pa'i rgyan dag byas/_/smug rtsi rkang pa'i mthil la rab
[\[8a.3\]]lA ba sak+te kaN+ThA ba lam+bi n+ya pi hA ra hA khye/_/kAr+YAr+thi ni das+sa Na saM mu khI sA ca kA ra bai sh+yA tsa ri taM ya thAr+thaM/_/kaN+The n+ya da n+yad+ba da ne nyan+ya doSh+The ba b+hA ra ta n+wI hr-i da ye ta thA n+ya ta/_/sA b+hU Sha NaM lo
[\[8a.4\]]chags shing /_/do shal mchog ni mgrin par dpyangs nas kyang /_/bya ba don gnyer me long la phyogs te/_/smad 'tshong spyod pa'i don bzhin de yis byas/_/mgrin pa la gzhan bzhin gzhan mchu la gzhan/_/de bzhin gzugs can ma des snying la gzhan/_/rnam bkra rang gi bya ba
[\[8a.5\]]b+ha na me ba puM sAM mur+t+taM swa kar+t+ta bya mi bA ti tsi traM/_/ka li ta ta ru Na rA gAt+sAM ga rA gA ba b+hau pA ti mi ra sha ba la san+d+h+ya bol+la sad+d+hu pa d+hu maiH/_/ma na si dza dza ya kir+t+tIM mur+t+ti mA d+yA mi ben+do ra la ka
[\[8a.6\]]gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/skyes bu chags byed nyid kyis rgyan rnams bzung /_/yid skyes rgyal ba'i grags pa zla ba'i gzugs ni dang po bzhin/_/lan bu thig le'i ri mo sa 'jo sgeg ldan par rab spras shing /_/rab 'phro bdug pa'i du bas rab rib thun mtshams bzhin bkra ba/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ti la ka le khAM lI la yA sU tra yan+tI_/ta taHpra bi sh+ya twa ri tA dA sI ma kA ri kA b+hi d+hA/_/ta mu tse k+Sha Na saM gAr+thI ba hi rA ste yu bA na baH/_/kAR+ShA pa NA nAM tr-i Na bad+bi tIr+Ya sha ta pany+tsa kaM/_/bra bi sh+ye ba
[\[8b.2\]]chags pa dar byas yan lag dang bcas chags pa de rab mdzes/_/de nas g.yog mo chu srin ma/_/zhes pa myur bar rab zhugs te/_/der smras skad cig 'grogs 'dod pa'i/_/gzhon nu gsar pa phyi na sdod/_/kAR+ShA pa Ni brgya phrag lnga/_/rtswa bzhin du ni ster bar byed/_/'di ni khyod kyi gter
[\[8b.3\]]bi nir+YA te so yan+ni d+hi ra sa taH/_/pra b+hU ta dra bi Na s+yA gI bya gra twA da tsi ras+thi tiH/_/ts+tshan+na kA maHk+Sha mI kA mI su b+ha ge la b+h+ya te ku taH/_/i ti ta s+yeHba tsa shru twA b+ha drA pro bA tsa sa smi tA/_/k+Sha NaM do lA ya mA ne
[\[8b.4\]]zhing 'ongs/_/nang zhugs nyid ni phyi rol thong /_/rab mang nor ldan gtong phod can/_/brel bas yun ring mi sdod pa/_/'dod bsgribs 'dod ldan bzod pa can/_/skal ba bzang mo ga la thob/_/ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/yon dang chags pa'i bar du ni/_/skad cig 'phyang mo yug pa bzhin/_/
[\[8b.5\]]ba ma d+h+ye dAk+Shi N+ya lo b+ha yaH/_/ka thaM ra th+yAM ga ne bA ha ma n+ya smA dA tu be ta nA/_/gats+tsha mi prar+thi tA n+ya s+ya tad+k+Sha not+tA na pA Ni taM/_/pra dzA nA mi ba sar+b+ba s+ya swA d+hI nA nA ma pi k+Sha NaM/_/pUr+b+ba me bA br-i tA ye na sa swA mI
[\[8b.6\]]bzang mos 'dzum bcas rab smras pa/_/gzhan las gla ni blang ba dag_/lam srang dag gi bud med bzhin/_/de dus don gnyer gzhan la ni/_/lag bzed nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/_/skye rgu rnams bzhin thams cad kyi/_/dbang du gyur kyang skad cig ni/_/gang gis sngon nyid 'thams pa de/_/smad 'tshong
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]be sha yo Shi tAM/_/e kai be yaM mr-i NA le na kr-I tA rA triHki mu ts+ye te/_/pa raHpra taHsa mA yA tu na ba raM b+hAHsa dA ba yaM/_/i t+yuk+ta b+ha drA yA k+Shu drA ma d+hu lub+d+he ba sA sa ra/_/sak+tA na ba na bA swA de
[\[9a.2\]]bud med rnams kyis bdag_/mtshan mo gcig pu 'di nyid ni/_/pad rtsas nyos la ci zhig brjod/_/gzhan gyis snga dro 'ong du chug_/bdag cag rtag tu gsar pa rtsom/_/bzang mos 'di brjod chung ngu des/_/mchog tu sbrang rtsi la chags bzhin/_/gsar pa gsar pa'i ror chags
[\[9a.3\]]ku pi tA tA ma b+ha Sha ta/_/na ga taHpra ta rA gan+tA pra taHsaM t+ya dz+ya te ya di/_/b+hA gyair+b+ha ba ti bai sh+yA nAM ba ni dzAM tsa ba hu kra yaH/_/i taHkiM tsi di taHkiM tsits+tsi n+wa n+tI nAM di bA ni shaM/_/bai sh+yA nAM pau du Sho lA b+haHku su
[\[9a.4\]]shing /_/khros pas de la rab smras pa/_/gal te 'ong ba btang gyur na/_/song ba nang par 'ong mi 'gyur/_/smad 'tshong rnams dang tshong pa la/_/skal bas nyo ba mang bar 'gyur/_/'di nas cung zad 'di nas dang /_/cung zad nyin mtshan du gsog pa/_/smad 'tshong rnams kyi skyes bu yis/_/rnyed
[\[9a.5\]]mA ba tsa yo pa maH/_/na d+har+m+ma ya na kA mA ya d+ha nA yai na pra sA d+h+ya te/_/bai sh+yA yA tsa ka bi d+yai ba ba hu pra Na yi nI sa dA/_/nA yA t+ya shu tsi dAM bai sh+yA pra ta ma s+yA na lu bye te/_/b+ha dza te ba hu saM ge na pra t+yu tA
[\[9a.6\]]pa'i me tog 'thu ba bzhin/_/smad 'tshong ma la rtag tu mdza'/_/slong ba rnams kyi rig pa bzhin/_/chos kyi slad min 'dod slad min/_/nor nyid slad du rgyas par byed/_/mang dang 'grogs pas smad 'tshong ma/_/mi gtsang ba nyid mi 'gyur zhing /_/'di yi brtul zhugs mi nyams te/_/slar
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]b+h+yar+tha nI ya tAM/_/nir+YAt+ya n+ye bi shan+t+ye n+ye pra tIk+Sh+yan+te pa hi pa re/_/ya s+yAHpa sho b+h+ya te be sh+yA sa b+hA b+hU mi pa te ri ba/_/daur+b+hA gyaM pa N+ya kA mi n+yA kiM ma n+yan+nA s+t+ya to d+hi kaM/_/tu le bak+ShI Na ba Ni dzaHshU n+yA sI
[\[9b.2\]]la don du gnyer byar 'gyur/_/gzhan dag phyir 'thon gzhan na 'jug_/gzhan dag phyi nas rab lta ba'i/_/smad 'tshong gang de mdzes pa ste/_/sa yi bdag po'i mdun sa bzhin/_/tshong pa dbul po'i srang bzhin du/_/stong par khyim na gang 'dug pa/_/smad 'tshong rnams la 'di las ni/_/lhag
[\[9b.3\]]da ti yad+g+r-i he/_/a b+hA gyai r+g+rA ha kA b+hA be ga Ni kA sU n+yA shA yi nI/_/mi th+yA bar+N+Na ya ti pra taHkA mu kair+b+ba b+hany+dza nA/_/sa d+yAHkra ya pa ri t+yA gA du ra bat+ti pra tI k+Sha yA/_/mA lA i bA shu shu Sh+yan+ti bai sh+yAHpa
[\[9b.4\]]ba skal ngan gzhan pa ci/_/skal ngan gyis ni 'dzin byed med/_/'phyon ma stong par nyal ba ni/_/snga dro 'dod ldan rnams kyi skra/_/rdzun gyi 'khrug par grub par byed/_/'phral la nyo ba yongs btang nas/_/ring na gnas la bsgugs pa na/_/zong 'grems sa ru smad 'tshong ma/_/'phreng ba bzhin du
[\[9b.5\]]N+ya pra sA ra ke/_/e Sha kau tu kA mA trAr+thI kAr+Ya bya gro ba hu pra daH/_/pra bi sh+yai ba bi nir+YA ti kA k+Sha ta gri h+ya tAn+d+ha naM/_/shru twe tat+sA hi taM b+ha drA ta thai ti pra t+ya sa d+ya ta/_/lo b+haHswa b+hA ba bai sh+yA na mau tsi t+yaM dza na rany+dza naM/_/
[\[9b.6\]]myur du bskam/_/'di ni dge mtshan tsam don gnyer/_/bya bas brel zhing mang du ster/_/nang zhugs nyid na phyi rol 'gro/_/ci nyams nor ni blang bar mdzod/_/phan pa 'di thos bzang mo des/_/de bzhin zhes te kha yis blangs/_/smad 'tshong rang bzhin chags pa ste/_/rig pa skye bo chags byed nyid/_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]k+Sha mya tAM k+Sha Na mA trai ba nA haM sadz+dza pra sA d+ha nA/_/bi pr-i k+Sha ti mr-i NA lA ya dA sI san+de sha bA di nIM/_/k+Sha NaM pun+da ra kA khye na ba hu dA ne na kA mi nA/_/sA pad+mi ni ga dze ne ba b+hu k+tA byA lo la tAM ya
[\[10a.2\]]skad cig nyid ni der bzod mdzod/_/bdag gis chas dang rgyan ma tshar/_/zhes pa'i 'phrin ni skyel ba la/_/pad rtsa la ni g.yog mo btang /_/'dod ldan mdzes pa zhes bya ba/_/mang po sbyin pas skad cig ni/_/glang pos pad+ma can bzhin de/_/spyad pas 'khrugs pa nyid gyur
[\[10a.3\]]yau/_/ta tasta smin ga te dan+ta ts+tshe dots+tshiSh+Ta ra dats+tsha dA/_/nirda yA li gaM nai ste na nI tA nair+m+mA l+ya tA k+Sha NA ta/_/bi sa sar+dz+dzi mr-i NA lA ya pu na rat+ta pra sA d+ha nA/_/sA sa khIM gUD+ha pi dwe ShaM tUr+N+Na mA ga mya tA mi ti/_/dz+nyA twA mr-i NA lastad+b+r-it+taM
[\[10a.4\]]to/_/de nas de ni song ba dang /_/mchu ni sos bcad lhag ma dang /_/de yis brtse med 'byung ba yis/_/skad cig gis ni rnying nyid thob/_/slar yang rgyan ni rab bzung na/_/pad+mo'i rtsa la myur bar ni/_/byon zhe sdang ba sbas pa yis/_/grogs mo de ni rnam par springs/_/de yis smras pa'i phra
[\[10a.5\]]pai shU n+yAd+ka thi taM ta yA/_/i hai bA yA tu b+ha dre ti gU D+ha ko paHsa ma b+h+ya d+hA ta/_/ta taHsA prAp+ta san+de shA sau ra b+hA kr-iSh+Ta ShaT+pa dA/_/mr-i NA la dzuSh+Ta mu d+yA nai pra ya yo phul+la pA da paM/_/tAM dr-iSh+T+wai ba sa mA yA ta
[\[10a.6\]]ma las/_/de yi spyod tshul pad rtsas shes/_/'di nyid du ni bzang mo dag_/shog ces khro ba sbas pas smras/_/de nas 'phrin thos dri bzang gis/_/rkang drug pa ni 'gugs ma der/_/pad rtsas bsten pa'i skyed mos tshal/_/rkang 'thung me tog rgyas par song /_/de ni 'ong ba mthong gyur nas/_/
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]rA ge dwe Sha bi Shot+ka Ta/_/saM sA ra i ba pA kA raHsa bi kA ro ba b+hU ba saH/_/so tsin+ta yats+tsa pa la yA ma dar+tha mu pa kalpi taM/_/kr-i ta ma n+yo pa b+ho ge na lo b+ha lup+taM pra sA d+ha naM/_/na khol+le khairba kr-iHku Ti
[\[10b.2\]]chags sdang dug ni mi bzad pa/_/'khor ba rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/_/de ni rnam 'gyur ldan par gyur/_/de yi bsam pa g.yo ba yis/_/bdag don gnyer bar btags pa yi/_/rgyan rnams chags las gzhan dang ni/_/nye bar spyad pas nyams par byas/_/kye ma rang spyod gya gyu'i tshogs
[\[10b.3\]]la tsa ri taM han+ta li khi ti ba han+tI pra t+ya graM ni dza mi ba sa ma graM sta na ta Te/_/bi Tots+tshiSh+Ta kliSh+T+wA d+ha ra da la ru tsiHk+ShA ma pa da nA b+hu dzaM gI sar+b+baM gaM bi Sha ma bi Sha me Sha di sha ti me/_/k+Sha NaM bi tsin+t+ye
[\[10b.4\]]pa bzhin du nu ma'i ngos dag la/_/sen mo 'khyog por rab btab rnams kyis ri mo gsar pa 'dzin byed cing /_/mchu 'dab mdzes pa g.yon can lhag mas nyams shing bzhin ni zad gyur pa/_/lag 'gro ma 'dis bdag gi yan lag kun la mi bzad dug rnams spro/_/skad cig de bsams
[\[10b.5\]]ti pr-i thu pra ko pa kr-i shA nu d+hU mong+ga ma bi b+h+ra me Na/_/b+h+rU borbi kA re Na sa kA la bak+t+raHpro bA tsa tAM sA g+ha sa sin+ni rud+d+hAM/_/k+Sha Ne na bai sh+yA ba hu saM ga tA yA gr-ih+nA ti sa pa ra bit+ta mA da do/_/ma dar+tha me bA hi ta e Sha the shaH
[\[10b.6\]]che bar rab khros pa'i/_/me yis rab bskyed du ba'i rnam 'phrul ni/_/smin ma'i rnam 'gyur dus kyi bzhin ldan des/_/skrag pa rgyas pa de la rab smras pa/_/mang dang skad cig la 'grogs smad 'tshong gang /_/de ni dang po gzhan nor ci la 'dzin/_/bdag don nyid du byas pa'i chas 'di dag_/
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]kr-i tas+t+wa mA swe da ka NA ba shai ShaH/_/i ti bru dzA Na su ta noHpra kam+pa bi lo la kAM byA sta ra lam+ba ne na/_/pra sA da bA lA ma bA lA ma bad+d+h+yaM rak+She ti dai n+ya di ba yA ts+ya mA naH/_/la tA
[\[11a.2\]]khyod kyis rdul gyi thigs pa'i lhag mar byas/_/zhes smras gzugs bzang mo yi 'og pag ni/_/g.yo zhing bskyod pa'i gsal ba'i sgra dag gis/_/drin mdzod bu mo gzhon nu gsad pa'i 'os/_/srungs zhes dman pas slong bar byed pa bzhin/_/bung ba'i
[\[11a.3\]]b+hi la s+yA ku la b+h+r-iM ga mA lA bi rA bi shI b+hirda ya yai ba dU rata/_/nirbAr+Ya mA Na ta na na b+hiHsa man+ta taHpal+la ba pA Ni kam+paiH/_/g+ho rAM ha ti byA g+h+rA i ba g+h+r-i No sau tA pA ba san+naM ga la tAM ku
[\[11a.4\]]'phreng ba sgra sgrogs gtibs pa yi/_/'khri shing rnams kyang bzhin ni rab btud pas/_/lag pa'i yal 'dab kun tu g.yob byed cing /_/brtse bas ring nas zlog par byed pa bzhin/_/'jigs rung bsnun pa'i stag bzhin brtse med des/_/yan lag 'khri shing skrag nyams ri
[\[11a.5\]]rad+gI/_/ha twA NaM sha shasta ra lA ya tA k+ShIM rak+tAk+ta shas+t+raHpra ya yau dza be na/_/te ShA ma yaM ki mi bAsti ye ShAM kr-i d+hAn+d+h+ya tud+d+hA ni bi lo tsa nA ni/_/da yA da ri drA Ni ma nAM sa ni t+yaM nair+g+h+r-i N+ya g+ho rA Ni tsa
[\[11a.6\]]dgas ni/_/g.yo yang mig can bsad nas mgyogs pa yis/_/gtum po mtshon cha khrag sbags rab tu song /_/gang zhig khro ba'i long bas mig bkag pa/_/de dag rnams la bya min ci zhig yod/_/rtag tu yid ni brtse bas dbul ba yis/_/spyod tshul brtse med 'jigs
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]beSh+Ta tA ni/_/pA be na b+ha drA bi dza ne ha te ti ko lA ha le ta tri kr-i te tha dA s+yA/_/dza nA b+hi sA re su ru berbi pi sha pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha sa kA na nAn+taM/_/d+h+r-i twA ta da gre ru d+hi rAr+d+ra shas+t+raM ta smin pra biSh+Ta dza na
[\[11b.2\]]rung rnams la yang /_/dben par bzang mo sdig can gyis bsad ces/_/de nas der ni 'bangs mos sgra bsgrags shing /_/skye bo 'dus tshe nyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi/_/nags mthar de ni rang dga' dag tu zhugs/_/de mdun khrag gis sbags pa'i mtshon bzhag nas/_/skye bo'i tshogs
[\[11b.3\]]tAM ta rA laM/_/pau rai ba pA po pi gr-i hI ta tsih+naiHpra t+ye ka bud+d+haHsa ha sA gr-i hI taH/_/nI te tha tasmin+n+r-i pa shA sa ne na krU rA pa rA d+ho tsi ta ba d+h+ya b+hU miM/_/dzA tA nu tA paHpra sha b+haM mr-i NA laHpA pa ma mai tat+k+r-i ta mi
[\[11b.4\]]kyi nang du de bros tshe/_/rtag 'dzin grong pas sdig pa med mod kyang /_/rang sangs rgyas ni 'phral la gzung bar gyur/_/ma rungs gnod byed la 'os gsod pa'i sar/_/de nas rgyal po'i bka' yis de khyer tshe/_/pad+ma'i rtsa lag 'phral la 'gyod pa skyes/_/sdig pa 'di ni bdag gis byas
[\[11b.5\]]d+yu bA tsa/_/muk+te ta tastad+ba tsa sA bi tsAr+Ya pra t+ye ka bud+d+he pra Ni sa t+ya rA dz+nyA/_/ra sa dz+nya taM duHsa ha shA sa na s+ya nI tau mr-i NA laHku kr-i to tsi ta s+ya/_/a haM sa pA paM ba hu dzan+ma lak+Shair+b+hu g+t+wA ta du graM na ra kAn+ta re Shu/_/
[\[11b.6\]]zhes smras/_/de nas de yi tshig gis rang sangs rgyas/_/dpyad nas rgyal pos phyag 'tshal btang ba'i tshe/_/ngan byed la 'os bzod pa dka' ba'i bka'/_/nyams myong 'di ni pad+ma'i rtsa bas thob/_/de nga drag po'i sdig des skye ba mang /_/'bum gyis dmyal ba'i nang du yongs spyad nas/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]a d+ya pi tang+kar+m+ma pha lA ba she ShAn+mi th+yai ba tIr+th+yA ta na yA b+hi yuk+taH/_/ban+d+hu ma t+yAM pu ri pu rA bi sa sh+yI b+ha ga bAny+dzi naH/_/b+ho gai ra b+h+ya r+ts+tsi taHpau re ste s+thau bik+Shu ga Ner+b+r-i taH/_/pU dz+yA mA
[\[12a.2\]]de yi las 'dras lhag ma da lta yang /_/mu stegs bu mo'i rdzun gyis mngon par sbyar/_/grong khyer gnyen ldan dag na sngon/_/bcom ldan rgyal ba rnam par gzigs/_/grong pa'i longs spyod kyis mchod cing /_/dge slong tshogs kyis bskor te gnas/_/bram ze ma tha
[\[12a.3\]]naM ta mA lo kya brAh+ma No ma Tha rA b+hi d+haH/_/u bA tsa sau rAn+bi shi khA b+ho ga yo gyA na b+hik+Sha baH/_/pU rA NaiHko Ta ra ya bair+b+ho dz+ya me ShAM bi d+hI ya tAM/_/na muN+Da kA nAM pi ka TaM di byA hA rAr+ha mA na naM/_/i ti bA kyAt+pa bi pro haM
[\[12a.4\]]ra zhes pa/_/mchod dang ldan pa de mthong nas/_/grong pa la smras dge slong ni/_/mgo reg longs spyod 'os pa min/_/ko Ta ra yi nas rdul gyis/_/'di dag gi ni kha zas bsgrubs/_/mgo reg 'gyur bag ldan pa'i kha/_/mchog gi kha zas 'os pa min/_/bram ze de dag tshig de las/_/
[\[12a.5\]]tat+pA paM ba hu dzan+ma su/_/b+hu k+t+wA d+yA ko Ta ra ya bA hA raHshe She Na kar+m+ma NaH/_/ya dA ha ma b+ha baM pUr+b+ba mut+ta ro nA ma mA Na baH/_/pra ku la s+yA pa bA de na ma yAp+ta ma shu b+haM ta dA/_/ShaD+baR+ShA N+ya mu nA te na kar+m+ma NA duSh+ka ram+ma yA/_/
[\[12a.6\]]skye ba mang por de yi sdig_/spyad cing da lta las lhag gis/_/ko Ta ra yi nas kyi zas/_/gang tshe bdag sngon bram ze yi/_/khye'u ud ta ra zhes gyur/_/de'i tshe bdag gi rigs mchog la/_/smad pa yis ni mi dge thob/_/las de da lta lo drug tu/_/dka' ba spyad pa bdag gis bsgrubs/_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]tsa ri tAM rak+Sha NA d+bo d+herna prA p+taM twa d+hi kaM ta taH/_/pu rA b+ha bang+g+r-i ha pa tir+d+ha na bAn+nA ma kar+b+ba Te/_/shrI mAn+nA ma su tasta s+ya ba b+hu bA swas+tha bi kra haH/_/bai d+ya stik+tA mu kho nA ma taM ba hu dra bi na sha yA/_/swA s+th+yan+ni nA
[\[12b.2\]]de las lhag pa byang chub kyis/_/bsrungs pa yis ni thob ma gyur/_/khyim bdag nor ldan zhes bya ba/_/kar pa Tar ni sngon byung ste/_/dpal ldan zhes bya de yi bu/_/lus ni rnal gnas min par gyur/_/de ni sman pa kha ba'i bzhin/_/zhes pa nor mang re ba yis/_/rnal gnas byas kyang
[\[12b.3\]]ya tat+pi trA dat+taM yAsme na kiny+tsa na/_/kA le nA tu ra tAM yA taHswA s+thaM te na pu naHpu naH/_/sa tI tastat+pi tuHkiny+tsa t+p+rAp+taM nad+bAr+t+ti b+hA Shi taMH/_/a maR+Sha dz+wa ra san+tap+ta s+t+r-iSh+NA ta ra li taHswa pa na/_/so tsin+t+ra yad+b+hi
[\[12b.4\]]de yi phas/_/de la ci yang byin ma gyur/_/dus kyis gzir ba nyid gyur te/_/yang yang de yis bos par byas/_/de yis pha las cung zad kyang /_/khas blang smras pa thob ma gyur/_/sman pa khro ba'i rims kyis gdungs/_/srid pas g.yo ba'i shugs rings can/_/nad pa yis kyang
[\[12b.5\]]Shag+duHkhA dA tu re NA pi laM g+hi taH/_/a ho ba tA haM d+hUrte na bA hi taHsa ra lA sha ya/_/ki ka ro mya d+hu nA ha stAM ga to me ni d+hi rA tu raH/_/ka Tu kau Sha d+hi bad+bai d+yaHpur+b+ba mAr+t+ta s+ya sam+ma tAH/_/ki tsit+pi tA
[\[12b.6\]]'gongs pa des/_/sdug bsngal las ni rab bsams pa/_/kye ma bsam pa drang po dag_/g.yo dang ldan pa bdag gis bslus/_/bdag gi lag nas nad pa yis/_/gter 'das da ni ci zhig bya/_/tsha ba'i sman bzhin sman pa ni/_/nad pa rnams kyis sngon du bskur/_/gdung ba bsos
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]tu raHpash+tsata smr-i to bi mu kha kU na naH/_/sid+d+hAr+tha s+ye ba d+ha na ba nut+tIr+N+Na s+ye ba nA bi kaH/_/niHshe Sha byA d+hi muk+ta s+ya bai d+yaHka s+yo ba yu dz+ya te/_/sa pA da pa ta nai rma nai rA tu re rA rA d+he ta pa raM/_/sash+tsAt+saM
[\[13a.2\]]par gyur pa'i phyir/_/dran yang kha ni rmugs 'byin byed/_/don grub la ni nor ldan dang /_/sgrol zin dag la gru pa bzhin/_/ma lus nad las grol gyur pa/_/su la sman pa nye bar mkho/_/mchod dang zhabs la gtugs byas pas/_/nad pas sman pa rab bsten te/_/phyi nas
[\[13a.3\]]kir+t+ti ta nAm+ni swa s+thi s+thU t+k+r-i ya te b+hi Sha ka/_/ban+d+hAl+lu b+ha s+ya ha ri Na sh+tsau ro rA dz+nyA shwa nirga taH/_/pu N+yaiHswas+tha sh+tsa bai t+ya s+ya pu na pa ta ti go tsa re/_/i ti tsin+ta ya ta sta s+ya sa ta taM pa ri shu Sh+ya taH/_/sa bai
[\[13a.4\]]ming ni bsgrags pa na/_/bsos pa rnams kyis thud kyis 'debs/_/rngon pa rgyal po sman pa yis/_/'ching las ri dgas chom rkun dang /_/nad bsos song ba bsod nams kyis/_/phyi nas spyod yul dag tu lhung /_/de ltar rab tu sems byed cing /_/de ni rtag tu yongs su gdungs/_/sman pa
[\[13a.5\]]d+ya mi ba sA ko saM pu nar+b+yA d+haM ma bAp+ta bAn/_/prats+tshan+na man+yusta s+yA tha bai d+yaHsa n+yo bi na sha naM/_/da dau bi rud+d+ha yo gA dan+t+ra sA ta na mau Sha d+haM/_/ta s+yAn+t+rA Ni bi shIr+Yan+ta tad+ha t+tA pa th+ya pa yi naH/_/kiM na kur+b+ban+ti lo
[\[13a.6\]]bzhin du khro ldan na/_/slar yang de yis thob par gyur/_/de nas khro ba bsgribs pa yi/_/sman pas 'gal ba'i sbyor ba las/_/rgyu ma 'chad par byed pa'i sman/_/'phral la nyams byed de la byin/_/des byin gnod pa 'thungs pa las/_/de yi rgyu ma dum bur gyur/_/sdig pa'i g.yang la lhung
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]b+hAn+d+haHsA ta kaM swa b+h+ra pA ti na/_/bai d+yau ha me ba tat+pA baM b+huk+t+wa dzan+ma sha tA taiH/_/a d+yA pi kar+m+ma she She Na praskan+di bya d+hi le sha bAn/_/pu rA mat+s+yo ma hA kA yA bA kr-iSh+Tau mat+s+ya dzI bi b+hiH/_/dza haR+Sha ts+tshi d+ya mA nAM gau dr-iSh+T+wA kai
[\[13b.2\]]ba yi/_/chags pas long rnams ci mi byed/_/sman pa nga nyid de yi sdig_/skye ba khri phrag brgyar spyad nas/_/las kyi lhag mas da lta yang /_/rab gnon nad kyi cha shas bsten/_/nya yis 'tsho ba rnams kyis sngon/_/nya ni lus chen gnyis dag bzung /_/lus ni gcod pa mthong gyur nas/_/nya
[\[13b.3\]]bar+t+ta dA ra kaH/_/so haM tat+pa ri toSh+Tu p+taM bA paM b+huk+t+wA n+ya dzan+ma b+hiH/_/tasmin+pi nA she shAkyA nAM k+Sha NaM spr-iSh+TaHshi ro ru dzA/_/pu rA dza na pa do mal+laHprI ti mal+laM ba lA b+hi d+haM/_/ni pA d+ya yud+d+he byA dze na pr-iSh+Tha ma s+ya dwi d+hA
[\[13b.4\]]ba'i bu yis dga' bar byas/_/de bdag de la yongs tshim thob/_/sdig pa skye ba gzhan spyad nas/_/shAkya nyams pa de yi tshe/_/skad cig mgo la nad kyis reg_/sngon tshe ljongs kyi gyad gyur te/_/mdza' bo stobs zhes bya ba'i gyad/_/g.yul gyi zol gyis gshags byas te/_/de yi rgyab ni
[\[13b.5\]]ka ro ta/_/so haM tat+pA ta kaM b+hu k+t+wa bi pu laM ba hu dza n+ya su/_/a d+yA pi bA ta shU le na pr-iSh+Tha kr-i ta pa da k+Sha NaM/_/i ti saM b+hud+d+ha bo d+herme ni r+d+r-iSh+Ta s+ya bi pi gra he/_/kar+m+ma saM kA ba she ShA kA ni se tr-iHkle sha bi sru
[\[13b.6\]]rnam gnyis byas/_/de nga de yi sdig chen ni/_/skye ba mang por spyad byas nas/_/rlung gi nad kyis da lta yang /_/rgyab tu skad cig gnas par byas/_/de ltar byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/nges bstan bdag gi lus la yang /_/nyon mongs thigs pa las 'dam gyi/_/lhag ma'i cha shas nges par
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ShaH/_/dzan+mot+pa pe Shu di d+ha ne Shu ba san+ni bad+d+ha mA le ba kar+m+ma sha ra NiHsha ba lA sha rI re/_/puM sA mi yaM pra Na yi Ne su kha duHkha sIm+ni b+huk+t+wodz+dzi tA pi bi da d+ha t+ya ba sA na she ShaM/_/i ti
[\[14a.2\]]lhung /_/skye bar spro dang 'chi ba'i tshe yang skyes bu lus rnams la/_/bkra ba'i las kyi lam ni 'phreng ba bzhin du rnam btags pa/_/rab tu chags pa 'di ni bde dang sdug bsngal mtshams dag la/_/spyad cing btang bar gyur kyang lhag ma'i lhag ma rnam par 'dzin/_/de skad
[\[14a.3\]]shru twA b+ha ga ba tA ka thi tAM sar+b+ba b+hik+Sha baH/_/me ni re kar+m+ma ban+d+hA nA ma na ti kra ma nI yA tA ma/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM da sha kar+m+ma p+lu t+ya ba dA naM pany+tsA shaH
[\[14a.4\]]bcom ldan kyis bshad pa/_/dge slong kun gyis thos gyur nas/_/las kyi 'ching ba rnams dag ni/_/'da' bar bya min nyid du nges/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las las bcu spyad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i
[\[14a.5\]]pal+la baH//_//Arta trA Na d+hi yA da yA pra Na yi nAM pra Na pra bA hot+sa be sha s+t+yai stik+Sh+Na ta raiHk+Sha tA ni pu la kA la kA ra lI lA dzu ShaM/_/lo la k+Shi shra ba Not+pa lA ha ti tu laM ye ShAM la ban+te ta nau
[\[14a.6\]]yal 'dab ste lnga bcu pa'o//_//gdung skyob blo yi brtse bas mnyes gshin rnams kyi srog ni 'gro bar spro ba'i tshe/_/spu long rgyan gyis rol pa bsten cing shin tu rno ba'i mtshon gyis bcad pa ni/_/gang gi lus la g.yo ba'i mig can rna ba'i ut+pal gyis bsnun mtshungs pa thob/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]te ShI kair+b+ba tsa nai ru dA ra tsa ri tAM bA ts+yo tsi tai ru ts+ya tA ma/_/gu h+ya kai bar+t+ta da ra dau bi nI ya b+ha ga bAn+pu rA/_/de shA dan+tar+hi tastasmA ta dza gA ma n+yat+ta so ba naM/_/ta tra se bA sa mA yA tasta s+ya de baHsha tsI pa
[\[14b.2\]]de dag spyod pa rgya che brjod byar 'os pa'i tshig ni gang gis brjod par bya/_/sngon ni gsang ba'i kai bar ta/_/da ra da btul bcom ldan 'das/_/yul de nas ni mi snang bar/_/dka' thub nags tshal gzhan du gshegs/_/de yi g.yog la 'ongs pa'i lha/_/bde sogs bdag po dag gis
[\[14b.3\]]tiH/_/sma ta tsan+d+ro da yaM bak+t+re triSh+T+wA pa prats+tsha kA ra NaM/_/ta mu bA tsa ba nAn+te smin pUr+b+ba br-it+ta smr-i tam+ma yA/_/sma ra NA nu b+ha bA de tatra smi ta sme na twa kA ra NaM/_/i t+yuk+t+wA b+ha ga bAn+pur+b+ba br-it+taM bak+t+raM pra tsakra
[\[14b.4\]]der/_/bzhin la 'dzum pa'i zla ba dag_/shar ba mthong nas rgyu mtshan dris/_/de la bka' stsal nags kyi mtha'/_/'dir ni bdag gi sngon byung dran/_/dran pa nyams su myong ba las/_/bdag 'dzum 'di ni rgyu med min/_/zhes pa brjod nas bcom ldan gyis/_/sngon byung gsung bar rtsom
[\[14b.5\]]me/_/na ga d+yA mut+pa lA ba t+yAM dA na shI la da yA n+wi tA/_/khyA tA ruk+ma ba tI nA ma sau ra mu khyAM ga nA b+ha ba ta/_/sA ka dI tsit+k+Shu d+hArtA pra pU tAM durga tAM ga naM/_/yA tu d+hA nI mi ba sa sh+yata ba lA kaM b+hok+tu
[\[14b.6\]]pa mdzad/_/grong khyer ut+pal ldan par ni/_/grong khyer gtso bo'i bud med dag_/sbyin dang tshul khrims brtse ba can/_/gser ldan ma zhes grags pa byung /_/nam zhig de yis dbul po yi/_/bud med btsas shing ltogs pas gzir/_/srin mo bzhin du bu tsha dag_/za bar 'dod pa mthong
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]mut+pu kaM/_/tAM dr-iSh+T+wA ka ru NA krAn+tA sA k+Sha NaM sa ma tsi ta yatra/_/a ho swa de ha sne he na ma tiHpA be pra bar+t+ta te/_/a s+ya b+ho dza na mA har+t+tu bra dzA mi swa gr-i haM ya di/_/ta di yaM Shut+pa ri k+Shu ma b+ha k+Sh+ya ya t+ye ba dA ra
[\[15a.2\]]bar gyur/_/de mthong snying rje rgyas gyur pa/_/de yis skad cig yang dag bsams/_/kye ma rang lus la chags pas/_/blo ni sdig la rab tu 'jug_/'di yi zas ni len du bdag_/gal te rang gi khyim song na/_/bkres pas yongs su nyen pa 'dis/_/bu ni nges par za bar
[\[15a.3\]]kaM/_/a tha bA shi shu mA dA ya ya di gats+tsha mi man+di raM/_/ta de ShA kr-i sha tAM yA tA sa d+yas+t+ya dza ti dzI bi taM/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya da yA yA ta smin+nu b+ha ya saM sha ye/_/dza gat+saM tA ra NA ye b+ha pra Ni d+hA naM bi d+hA ya sA/_/ts+tshi twA
[\[15a.4\]]'gyur/_/yang na bdag gis bu khyer nas/_/gal te khyim du phyin pa na/_/'di ni bkres pa nyid gyur te/_/'phral la 'tsho ba gtong bar 'gyur/_/de ltar gnyis ka the tshom dang /_/ldan pa de la brtse bas bsams/_/'gro ba bsgral ba'i slad nyid du/_/de yis smon lam btab byas te/_/de yis gtad
[\[15a.5\]]ta yo pa nI te na shi na sha s+t+re Na ni sh+tsa lA/_/ni dzaM sta na yu gaM ta s+ye da dau dzi bi ta d+hA ra NaM/_/trai lo kya spri shi sA sh+tsar+Ye ta s+ya ya sha si bi shru te/_/bi pra rU pe Na sha kre Na ta taHpr-iSh+TA sa me t+ya sA/_/a bi te sta na dA ne na ma no pi
[\[15a.6\]]pa'i mtshon rnon gyis/_/g.yo ba med par bcad nas ni/_/de la rang gi nu ma zung /_/'tsho ba yi ni zung la byin/_/de nas de grags ngo mtshar can/_/'jig rten gsum reg grags pa'i tshe/_/brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs kyis ni/_/mngon du phyogs te de la dris/_/khyod ni nu ma byin pa yis/_/yid la rnam
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]kr-i ti mA ya yau/_/i ti pr-iSh+TA pa tI sa t+ya bA di nI taM dza gA da sA/_/ya di me nA b+ha bat+ka sh+tsita bi kA rAM sha sta nAr+pa Ne/_/te na sa t+ye na sa ha sA stI twaM tA ban+ni bar+t+ta tAM/_/i t+yuk+tA mA tre s+t+rI rU pa sA t+yAk+tA pa t+ya sA li nI/_/sar+b+be
[\[15b.2\]]'gyur ma byung ngam/_/zhes dris de la dag pa dang /_/bden smras ldan pa des smras pa/_/nu ma byin la rnam 'gyur cha/_/gal te bdag la 'ga' ma gyur/_/bden pa de yis re zhig 'phral/_/bud med nyid ni ldog gyur cig_/de brjod tsam la bde ldan ma/_/de yi bud med gzugs btang nas/_/mtshan nyid
[\[15b.3\]]la k+Sha Na sam+pan+naM pu ru Sha twaM sa mA ya yau/_/na gar+YA mut+pa lA ba t+yA masmin+na ba sa re nr-i baH/_/ut+pA lA khyaHsa mAp+tA yur+b+yA d+hi yo gAd+b+ya pa d+ya ta/_/la k+Sha Na dz+nye ra thA b+h+ye t+ya pra ba rai r+b+r-id+d+ha man+t+ri b+hiH/_/sa d+yaH
[\[15b.4\]]thams cad phun tshogs pa'i/_/skyes pa nyid du yang dag gyur/_/grong khyer ut+pal ldan par ni/_/mi bdag ut+pal zhes bya ba/_/gnas skabs der ni tshe rdzogs shing /_/nad kyi sbyor bas lhung bar gyur/_/de nas rab mchog rgan dang blon/_/mtshan nyid shes rnams mngon phyogs te/_/'phral la
[\[15b.5\]]prAp+taHpuM s+t+wo sau rug+ma pA na b+h+ya Shi ts+ya ta/_/sa rA dz+yAM rA dzA mA na shrIHkr-i twA d+har+m+ma d+hA na sh+tsi rAM/_/ta nuM ta t+yA dza kA le na s+thA yi no na hi de hi naH/_/ta trai ba shreSh+Thi naHsu nuHso b+hUt+sa twa ba rA b+hi d+haH/_/ni r+b+yA dzo rdzi
[\[15b.6\]]skyes bu nyid thob pa/_/gser ldan de ni mngon dbang bskur/_/chos ldan mdzes pa'i dpal de yis/_/rgyal srid dag ni yun ring byas/_/dus kyis lus ni btang gyur te/_/lus can dag ni brtan pa med/_/de nyid du tshe tshong dpon bu/_/snying stobs mchog ces bya bar gyur/_/zol med bsgrub
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ta dA ne Shu dzan+mA b+h+yaste Shu sA da raH/_/sar+b+ba b+hU tAr+t+ti tsit+tA su sa sa dA n+ya ta mA na saH/_/duHsa ham+pak+Shi NA me ba k+Shud+duHkhe sa ma tsit+ta ya ta/_/sa sh+ma shA na ba naM ga twA k+Shu re Nol+li khya
[\[16a.2\]]pa'i sbyin pa ni/_/skye ba goms la gus bcas pa'o/_/'byung po kun gzir bsam pa la/_/rtag tu de yis yid bkod de/_/bzod dka' 'dab chags rnams nyid kyi/_/bkres pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag bsams/_/de nas dur khrod nags su do/_/song nas spu gris
[\[16a.3\]]bi gra haM/_/ut+tA na shA yI pra da dau ta nuM kra byA da pa k+Shi NaH/_/Ur+dz+h+wairga ti bi haM ga\u0f85s+ya dak+Shi NaM na ya naM sha naiH/_/ut+pA T+yot+pA T+ya tuN+De na brot+sa sardza pu naHpu naH/_/d+heR+Ye ni sh+tsa la sar+b+bAM gaHsa dr-iSh+T+wA
[\[16a.4\]]lus bkas te/_/gan kyal nyal nas sha za ba'i/_/'dab chags rnams la rab tu byin/_/rim gyis de yi mig g.yas ni/_/mthon por 'gro ba'i mkhar bgrod kyis/_/mchu yis phyung zhing rab phyung nas/_/yang dang yang du rab tu btang /_/brtan zhing yan lag kun mi g.yo/_/de yis ya
[\[16a.5\]]pi smi taM kha gaM_/u bA tsa b+hu k+TA niHshaM kaM nai ba twAM d+hA ra yA mya haM/_/niHsA ra bi ra saHkA yaHsA pA yo\u0f85yaM k+Sha Na k+Sha yI/_/pa ro pa kA ra le she na yA ti saM sA ra pA ra tAM/_/kle da s+yan+di ni nin+di te pra ti pa daM shwA
[\[16a.6\]]mtshan bya mthong nas/_/smras ba dogs med nyid du zo/_/nga yis khyod ni yongs mi 'dzin/_/ro bral snying po med pa'i lus/_/gnod bcas skad cig 'jig pa 'di/_/gzhan la phan pa'i cha shas kyis/_/'khor ba'i snying po nyid du gyur/_/mi rnams lus ni mi gtsang zag cing so so'i gnas su smad
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]sak+Sha Na san+di ni sne haHko\u0f85ya ma pA ya d+hAm+ni ma la ne mi th+yA sha rI re nr-i NAMH/_/e kai ba spr-iha NI ya tA s+ya ya di dam pu N+yaiHkwa tsit+ka s+ya tsi ta kiny+tsa da bI k+Sh+ya ka dA tsi dAr+t+ti sha ma na trA NA ya san+na h+ya ti/_/i ti ta s+ya
[\[16b.2\]]gyur dri ma can/_/gnod pa'i gnas su gyur cing dbugs dus g.yo la log par chags pa 'di ni ci/_/gang zhig bsod nams rnams kyi 'ga' zhig dab tu 'ga' la 'ga' tshe 'ga' mthong nas/_/gdung ba zhi byed skyob la zhugs gyur 'di nyid gcig pu 'di yi dga' bya nyid/_/ces pa smra ba de
[\[16b.3\]]bru bA Na s+ya k+ShuD+k+ShA maiHpak+Shi b+hiHk+Sha NA ta/_/b+ha k+Sh+ya mA Na s+ya bi k+Shi s+ya nI taHkA yo da s+thi she Sha tAM/_/ma hA shA la s+ya kA le na brAh+ma Na ta s+ya pu tra tAM/_/yA taHsa t+ya pra to nA ma ba b+hU ba dza na sam+ma ta/_/a bAstA khi la bi d+ya s+ya ka
[\[16b.4\]]yi lus/_/bkres pas nyen pa'i bya rnams kyis/_/za zhing 'phangs pa'i skad cig la/_/rus pa'i lhag ma nyid du gyur/_/dus kyis de ni bram ze dag_/sA la chen po'i bur skyes te/_/bden pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya ba/_/skye bo dag gis bkur bar gyur/_/rig pa ma lus thob gyur cing /_/snying
[\[16b.5\]]ru NA sak+ta tse ta saH/_/ta s+ya shAn+ti ra ta s+yA b+hUd+bi bA ha bi mu kham+ma naH/_/ku le dzan+ma gu Na bAstirbi be kA laM kr-i ta ma tiH/_/sar+b+ba b+hU ta da yA mai trI lak+Sha NaM pu N+ya kar+m+ma NI/_/bai rA gyA b+hi ra ti ga twA
[\[16b.6\]]rje dag la chags pa'i sems/_/zhi bar dga' ba de yi yid/_/khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur/_/rigs su skyes shing yon tan thob/_/blo gros dben pas rab brgyan cing /_/'byung po kun la brtse zhing byams/_/bsod nams las kyi mtshan nyid yin/_/gzhon nu de nyid chags bral
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]sa yu bai ba ta po ba naM/_/dat+ta bra to ma haR+Shi b+h+yAM b+he dze bi shrAn+ti mA shra me/_/ta taHkA le na si tap+ta bi ma la dz+nyA na lo tsa naH/_/A san+na pra sa bAM byA g+h+rIM sa dr-iSh+TA sa ma tsin+ta yata/_/
[\[17a.2\]]gyis/_/dga' zhing dka' thub nags song ste/_/drang srong gnyis kyis brtul zhugs byin/_/bsti gnas su ni ngal gso bsten/_/de nas dus kyi ye shes spyan/_/dri med shin tu rno ba yis/_/stag mo btsa' la nye ba dag_/mthong nas de yis yang dag bsams/_/
[\[17a.3\]]pra sa bo\u0f85s+yAHk+Shu d+hAr+t+ta yA sap+tA ha na b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_/spri hA tsot+sat+s+ya te tI brA ni dza po ta ka b+hak+Sha Ne/_/i ti saM tsi t+ya tad+duHkhaM mu ni b+h+yAM bi be d+ya saH/_/tsa kA ra tat+p+ra ti kA re kA ru N+ye na ma no ra thaM/_/ta taH
[\[17a.4\]]bkres pa yis ni gzir ba 'di/_/zhag bdun dag na btsa' bar 'gyur/_/rang gi bu ni za ba la/_/skom pa drag po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bsams de yis sdug bsngal ni/_/thub pa dag la bshad nas des/_/snying rje de ni phyir bcos pa'i/_/yid la re ba byas par gyur/_/de nas
[\[17a.5\]]pra ya te sap+tA he byA g+h+rI gar+b+ha b+ha rA la sA/_/ba hU pa bA sa san+tap+tA kr-its+tsh+re Na pU ta po ta kAn/_/ni dza sho Ni ta gan+d+he na dzA ta tI pra ta ra spr-i hI/_/sa t+ya bra tasta mA lo kya da yAr+d+raHsa ma tsin+ta yatra/_/i
[\[17a.6\]]zhag bdun 'das pa'i tshe/_/stag mo mngal gyi khur gyis dub/_/zas chag mang pos gdungs gyur pa/_/dka' las chen pos bu tsha btsas/_/rang gi khrag gi dri yis ni/_/sred pa drag po rab skyes pa/_/de mthong bden pa'i brtul zhugs ni/_/snying rjes brlan pas yang dag bsams/_/sdug
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]daM ba rA kI k+Shud+duHkhA du d+ya tA po ta b+ha k+Sha Ne/_/a ho ba tA s+yAHswAr+the na pu tra sne ho\u0f85pi bi smr-i taH/_/sar+b+baHswa duHkha san+tap+taHpa ra san+t+wa pa shi laH/_/bi she ShAr+t+taHpa ra s+yAr+t+tau bi ra lo dzA ya te dza
[\[17b.2\]]ma 'di ni bkres pu yis/_/sdug bsngal dag las bu zar brtson/_/kye ma 'di ni rang don gyis/_/bu la chags pa'ang brjed par gyur/_/rang sdug bsngal bas thams cad gdung /_/bzhin gyi yongs su gdung bas bsil/_/skye bo 'ga' zhig gzhan gdung la/_/khyad par du ni gdung ba
[\[17b.3\]]naH/_/da twA sha rI raM rak+Sh+ya mi byA g+h+rI me tAM pa shA ba kA+e/_/na pa he duHkha me te ShAM sar+YAn+tAM prA Na saM sha ye/_/pa ra prA Na trA Ne tr-i Na ka pa la yA t+yak+ta ba pu ShAM ya shaHkA yaHs+thA yI b+ha ba ti pr-i thu
[\[17b.4\]]skye/_/bu dang bcas pa'i stag mo 'di/_/lus byin nas ni bdag gis bsrungs/_/srog la the tshom yongs rdzogs pa/_/'di dag sdug bsngal yongs mi bzod/_/gzhan srog skyob la lus ni rtswa bzhin brtags pa gtong ba rnams dag gi/_/rgya che bsod nams rgyas pa'i rang
[\[17b.5\]]pu N+yo da ya ma yaH/_/pra shak+tA pA yo\u0f85yaM pra sa ra da ni lA lo la na li nI da lot+saM ga t+yaM gadz+dza la la ba su hr-idz+dzI bi ta ka NaH/_/d+h+yA twe ti n+ya sa tad+b+yA g+h+r+yAHsa pu raHka ru NA ni d+hiH/_/
[\[17b.6\]]bzhin grags pa'i lus ni brtan par 'gyur/_/gnod pa rab chags srog gi thigs pa 'di ni rab g.yo rlung dag gis/_/g.yo ba'i pad ldan 'dab ma'i khong gnas g.yo ba'i chu thigs dag gi grogs/_/'di bsams snying rje'i gter de yis/_/'byed pa'i thur mas mgrin pa la/_/
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]sa la duk+taM ga le kr-i twa k+Sha ta be d+ha sha lA ka ya/_/A san+nA trA Na sa ra saM na hi nA ma ma hAt+ma nAM/_/sa ha te pa ra san+hA pa ka ru Na ko ma laM ma naH/_/rak+tA b+hi lA Sha ni shi
[\[18a.2\]]khrag zags rma ni gtod byas nas/_/stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel bar gyur/_/nges par bdag nyid che rnams kyis/_/yid ni snying rjes mnyen pa dag_/nye bar bskyabs la chags bcas pas/_/gzhan gyi yongs gdung bzod ma yin/_/de nas g.yo med de yis snying ga
[\[18a.3\]]tA ni pa pA ta ta s+ya byA g+h+rI ta taHpra ta ta bak+Sha pi nish+tsa la s+ya/_/Ash+tsar+Ya mAr+Ya tsa ri ta s+ya dza gat+pu dzA ta haR+Sha smi tai ri ba na khA shu b+hi rul+li khan+tAM/_/me trI ba s+kha li tA k+Sha me Na ku kr-i tAM pra dz+nye
[\[18a.4\]]rab tu rgyas pa la/_/stag mo khrag la mngon par 'dod pa rnon pos rab tu mchongs/_/dga' dang 'dzum skyes sen mo'i 'od zer dag gis 'gro ba la/_/'phags pa'i spyod pa'i ngo mtshar rab tu 'bri bar byed pa bzhin/_/byams pas 'khrul bzhin bzod pas nyes byas bzhin dang shes rab
[\[18a.5\]]ba tsin+ti tsa yata duHkhan+duHsa ha bi sla ba d+h+r-i ti ri ba kle shaM ta pa shrI ri ba/_/ta s+ya byA g+h+ra ba d+hU ni pA ta bi Sha ma krU rA b+hi g+hA tolba ni se he mUr+t+ti ra tsany+tsa le ba da ya yA sA satwa
[\[18a.6\]]kyis ni bsam tshogs bzhin/_/sdug bsngal bzod dka'i bslad pa brtan pas bzhin dang nyon mongs dka' thub dpal gyis bzhin/_/brtse bas de yi lus ni snying stobs sa gzhi g.yo ba med pa de nyid kyis/_/stag gi chung mas btab cing mi bzad drag por mngon 'joms
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]b+hU mir+b+ha raM/_/byA g+h+rI na khA ba li bi lA sa bi lu pya sA nA tsak+SheHs+thi lI k+Sha Na ma lak+Sha ta bi k+Sha tA s+yaH/_/re mAny+tsa tsar+ts+tsi ta ta naustu hi mAM shu shu b+h+ra sa twa pra kA sha ki ra NAM ku ra pU ri
[\[18b.2\]]gsal ba'i khur dag bzod/_/stag mo'i sder mo 'phreng ba'i rol pas rnam par bcom gyur pa/_/de yi snying ga'i gzhi ni rnam par nyams pa skad cig mtshon/_/lus ni spu long gis byugs bsil zer can ltar dkar ba yis/_/snying stobs rab gsal 'od zer myu gus khengs par gyur pa
[\[18b.3\]]te ba/_/ta s+yA mi Sha ha ra Na sho Ni ta pA na mat+tAM byA g+h+riM sa haR+Sha ma ba lo kya ya tash+tsa kA ra/_/dir+g+hA pra pA sa sA ma yA ku li tA mu hUr+t+ta kaN+ThA ba lam+ba na d+h+r-i tiM ni dza dzI ba br-it+tiH/_/tr-iSh+NA pra dak+Shi Na bi lA sa
[\[18b.4\]]bzhin/_/sha dag za zhing khrag 'thung myos par gyur pa'i stag mo ni/_/dga' dang bcas pa mthong nas 'gro ba de yi rang gi srog_/'tsho ba dag ni ring du 'gro ba'i dus su bral gyur pa/_/yud tsam zhig na mgrin pa nyid la brten te brtan par byas/_/sred pa'i rjes mthun rtse dga'i 'od dang 'gro
[\[18b.5\]]ga tA ga te na ladz+dza ba shA di ba b+h+r-i shaM bi na tA na ne ba/_/ta s+yaHka ro da pi bi bA ha pa rAd+mu kha s+ya pA Ni gra ha pra Na yi nI hr-i da yot+sa ba sA/_/mait+t+ri pa bi tra ma bi kA ra mu dA ra satwAM sau dza n+ya
[\[18b.6\]]ba dag gis ni/_/ngo tsha'i dbang las bzhin ni mchog tu rnam par dud pa bzhin/_/khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur kyang de yi lag pa dang /_/de yis bzung nas mdza' zhing gcugs ltar snying ni dga' bar byas/_/byams pas dag cing rnam 'gyur med pa rgya che'i snying stobs dang /_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pu N+ya ta Ti nI b+hu ba ne Shu kIr+t+tiH/_/b+ha byAt+ma nAM b+ha ba ti b+huta hi ta swa b+hA ba swa d+hI na dI na ka ru Na b+ha ra NaM tsa tse taH/_/tat+ta s+ya satwa ma tu laM tsa tu ram+pu rA
[\[19a.2\]]lugs bzang bsod nams chu bo 'jig rten rnams su grags pa dang /_/'byung por phan pa'i rang bzhin dman la snying rjes brgyan pa'i sems/_/rang dbang nyid du gyur pa legs ldan bdag nyid rnams kyi yin/_/stag mo'i sder mo'i rtse mos bshig pa de yi snying
[\[19a.3\]]shi bai lA bi lA sa ra sa nA ba su d+hA pu ran+d+hAM/_/byA g+h+rI na khA gra da li ta s+ya bi lo kya sa d+yaHprA Na k+Sha ya k+Sha Na b+hi ye ba tsi raMny+tsa kam+pe/_/sa t+ya bra taHsa ka ru NA ni ra to\u0f85ha me ba smr-i twA swa br-it+ta mi
[\[19a.4\]]stobs dag_/mtshungs pa med pa de mthong 'phral la nor 'dzin bu mo ni/_/rba rlabs rol pa dang ldan chu gter bzhi yi ske rags can/_/srog ni zhig pa'i dus na 'jigs pa bzhin du ring zhig 'dar/_/bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying rje rab dga' de ni nga nyid do/_/da lta 'dir ni rang gi spyod
[\[19a.5\]]ha saM pra ti dzA ta hA saM/_/shru twe ti pUr+b+ba tsa ri taM ka thi taM dzi ne na sha kraHsa bisma ya ma naHsti mi tA na no b+hUtra/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra pi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM rug+ma ba tA ba dA na
[\[19a.6\]]tshul dran nas bzhad gad skyes/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa 'di ni thos gyur nas/_/ya mtshan yid ldan brgya byin de ni bzhin ras g.yo med gyur/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]me ka pany+tsA shaHpal+la waH//_//ar+thi nAm+ba na ga to\u0f85si balka lI yaHka ro t+ya bi ra taM kr-i tAr+tha tAM/_/kairna tsA ru tsa ri ta sa tsar+ts+ya te ta s+ya tsin+ta na ta rosh+tsa mad+b+hu tiH/_/bi ha ran+ta ma
[\[19b.2\]]ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//gang zhig nags song shing shun ldan gyur kyang /_/slong rnams rgyun du don byas nyid du byed/_/spyod tshul mdzes ldan de dang tsan dan gyi/_/ngo mtshar dag ni su yis bsam mi bya/_/de ni dka' thub nags
[\[19b.3\]]thA n+yasmin b+ha ga ban+tan+ta po ba ne/_/sa prats+tsha sasmi taM sha kro bismi taHsmi ta kA ra NaM/_/pr-iSh+TaHpra Na yi na te na sar+b+ba dz+nyasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/asmin+de she sa ha sra k+Sha pur+b+ba br-it+taM smr-i taM ma yA/_/ma d+hU da
[\[19b.4\]]gzhan na/_/bcom ldan bzhugs shing 'dzum ldan la/_/brgya byin ya mtshan ldan pa yis/_/'dzum pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan dris/_/de yis gus pas dris pa'i tshe/_/de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa/_/mig stong ldan pa gnas 'dir ni/_/sngon byung ba dag bdag gis dran/_/ma d+hU da ka
[\[19b.5\]]kA khye na ga re pu rA su ra pa ro ba me/_/a dI na pu N+ya nA ma b+hU ta b+hU pa tir+b+hU Sha NaM b+hu paH/_/ka ru Na mu di to pe k+Sha mai trI sa sak+ta tse ta saH/_/u pA seR+Sh+yA ba tI ba shrIr+Ya s+yAr+thi dza na be shA su/_/ka dA
[\[19b.6\]]zhes pa yi/_/grong khyer lha grong lta bur sngon/_/bsod nams mi dman zhes bya ba'i/_/sa bdag sa yi rgyun du gyur/_/snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang /_/byams pa sems la yang dag chags/_/phrag dog can bzhin gang gi dpal/_/slong ba'i skye bo khang par gnas/_/nam zhig de
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]tsits+tsa ri taM ta s+ya shru twA dza ga ti bi shru ta/_/ta mA ya yau bra h+ma dat+tak+Sh+mA pa tirbi dzi gI Sha yA/_/ta taHka ri g+ha D+hA ban+d+hai rAn+d+hI kr-i ta di gan+ta raH/_/tsa kA ra na ga rA ban+d+ha ma nu ban+d+hA ya ta s+ya
[\[20a.2\]]yi spyod pa ni/_/'gro la grags pa thos gyur nas/_/sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin/_/rgyal bar 'dod pa de can 'ongs/_/de nas glang po'i tshogs gtams pas/_/phyogs mtshams dag ni mun par byas/_/de ni rjes su bcing ba'i slad/_/de yi grong khyer bcings par
[\[20a.3\]]sAH/_/sa tA nu kam+bI nr-i pa tirna sha tru k+Sha ya mits+tsha ti/_/d+h+yA two ta nir+Ya yur+Yod+d+hu ma nuk+t+wai bA s+ya man+t+ri NaH/_/bar+t+ta mA ne ra Ne tasmin ga dza pA dzi ra tha k+Sha ye/_/a dI na pu N+yaHka ru N+ya pi pig+na sa ma tsin+ta
[\[20a.4\]]byas/_/snying stobs brtse ldan mi yi bdag_/dgra ni brlag par mi bzhed do/_/zhes bsams de yi blon po ni/_/ma brjod g.yul la phyi rol 'thon/_/glang po rta dang shing rta rnams/_/rlag byed g.yul ni rgyas pa der/_/bsod nams mi dman snying rje yis/_/sdug bsngal gyur pa yang dag
[\[20a.5\]]yata/_/bi Sha maHk+Sha tra d+har+m+mA ya ma d+har+m+ma sha ta sasmi taH/_/yasmin prA Ni ba d+ha krauR+Yab+d+har+m+ma i t+ya b+hi d+hI ya te/_/d+hig+d+har+m+ma ru d+hi rA dig+d+hi k+Sha tri yA NAM ma lI ma yaM/_/kr-i te ya s+ya pra yat+no ya tadz+dzi bi ta ma
[\[20a.6\]]bsams/_/mi zad rgyal rigs chos 'di ni/_/chos min brgya phrag dag dang ldan/_/ma rungs srog chags gsod pa ni/_/gang du chos zhes ma nor brjod/_/khrag gis bsgos shing dri ma can/_/rgyal rigs rnams kyi chos 'di smad/_/gang gi ched du rab 'bad pa'i/_/'tsho ba de yang
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]shA shwa taM/_/sA pA ya s+ya bya pa na pa ra Nau shIr+Ya mA Na s+ya ni t+yaM duHkhots+tsh+we paiHpra ti ha ta d+h+r-i teHsmar+Ya mA Na s+ya pash+tsA ta/_/so yaM sa h+yaHsu kha la ba d+hi yA kle sha sA ka s+ya puM sAM b+ho ga s+yar+the ba ta ba ta pa ra prA Na hiM
[\[20b.2\]]rtag pa min/_/bde nyung blo yis bzod bya 'di ni skyes bu rnams kyi nyon mongs smin/_/gnod pa dang bcas gdung ba'i lam du rtag tu nyes pa nyid gyur cing /_/phyi nas dran pas sdug bsngal shugs rings dag gis brtan pa 'joms byed pa/_/longs spyod don du kyi hud kyi hud gzhan srog
[\[20b.3\]]sA pra yat+naH/_/tasmA di daM pa ri t+ya dz+ya hiM sA chos min mang ba'i rgyal srid ces sogs tshig rkang gnyis kyi skad dod chad pa 'dar los bcug pa slar rgya dpe rnyed na zhus dag byed/_pA pa ni ki ta na/_/a d+harma bA hu rA dz+ye yaM ta pa swis+tha na ga mya na/_/rA dz+nyA ma dz+nyA na mU D+hA nAm+ba d+ha ban+d+ha na sha tArdzi tAM/_/kA laHka pa la ya t+ye ba
[\[20b.4\]]'tshe la rab tu 'bad/_/de slad 'tshe dang sdig pa'i gnas/_/chos min mang ba'i rgyal srid 'di/_/yongs su btang la bdag nyid ni/_/dka' thub nags su 'gro bar bya/_/rgyal po mi shes rmongs rnams kyis/_/gsod dang 'ching ba brgyas bsgrubs pa'i/_/sdig pa mi bzad dpal 'byor ni/_/
[\[20b.5\]]lak+Sh+mI ma k+Shi Ni kilbi ShAM/_/a tsin+t+yaHsaM sA re ba hu la ta ra mo hA ha ta d+hi yaM s+thi rai rA shA ban+d+hairbi Sha ya su kha dzA laM ka la ya tAM/_/a kA le kalpAn+taM pra ti pu ru Sha me Sha pra ti di shan+ba lI kA laHpuM sAM ki la
[\[20b.6\]]dus kyis khams su byed pa nyid/_/'khor bar dus min dag tu bsam yas dus ni stobs dang ldan pa 'dis/_/skyes bu so so dag la bskal pa'i mtha' ni so sor ster byed cing /_/shin tu che ba'i rmongs pas blo bcom re ba'i 'ching ba brtan po yis/_/yul gyi bde ba'i tshogs la
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]bi la si taM saM ka la ya ti/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya nr-i pa tir+hiM sA sa pa rAM mu khaH/_/daN+Da balka la mA dA ya ya yau ni shita po ba naM/_/ta tastad+ga ma naM shru twA+e lo ke prats+t+sA d+ya man+t+ri
[\[21a.2\]]sems byed skyes bu rnams kyi rtse dga' 'joms/_/zhes pa bsams nas mi bdag ni/_/'tshe ba'i nyon mongs las phyir phyogs/_/dbyug pa shing shun bzung nas ni/_/mtshan mo dka' thub nags su song /_/de nas blon po g.yul zhugs pas/_/de ni song ba thos gyur
[\[21a.3\]]NaH/_/yu d+h+ya mA na ma do da gra ri puM gardzan+ta mU tsi re/_/ga he na mat+ta mA taM ga ma kr-i thA ga la gardzi taM/_/g+ha na shab+da kr-i tA k+ShAn+ti ni ba sa t+ya tra ke sha rAM/_/i ti bru bA NAHsa ma re d+hI rA yu yu d+hi re pa raM/_/te
[\[21a.4\]]nas/_/'jig rten la bsgribs dgra bo ni/_/sgra sgrogs rgyags pas 'char la smras/_/nags su glang chen myos pa dag_/drag po'i sgra ni ma sgrogs shig_/'dir ni seng ge sprin gyi sgra/_/bzod pa min pa rnam par gnas/_/zhes smra brtan pa de dag gis/_/rje la bya dga' stug po dang /_/go
[\[21a.5\]]g+ha na swA mi san+mA na san+nA ha ts+tshan+na bi gra hAH/_/a trAn+te ra ko sha le Shu brAh+ma NaHka pi lA b+hi d+haH/_/hi ra N+ya bar+m+ma NA rA dz+nyA d+ha na daN+De na pI DI teH/_/ban+d+ha nA gA ra bi nasta sa map+ta su ta ban+d+ha baH/_/dat+tA she
[\[21a.6\]]chas lus ni rab g.yogs te/_/g.yul du g.yul ni rab tu bskrad/_/skabs der ko sa la dag tu/_/bram ze ser skya zhes bya ba/_/rgyal po dbyig gi go cha yis/_/nor gyi chad pas gzir bar gyur/_/ma lus nor byin dbul ba las/_/mang po byin par mi bzod pa/_/bu dang gnyen
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]Sha d+ha no b+hU rI dA ri t+r+yad+dA tu ma k+Sha maH/_/a tsin+ta yet+p+ra tI kA raM ban+d+hu ban+d+ha na duHkhi taH/_/pA sa sak+ta sa khi ri paHshA ra ga i ba nish+tsa laH/_/pi tA mA tA swa sA b+h+rA tA du hi tA ta na yash+tsa me/_/rud+d+hAH
[\[21b.2\]]rnams mtha' dag ni/_/btson khang nang du rnam par bkod/_/gnyen tshan bcings pas sdug bsngal bas/_/bcos pa'i thabs ni rab bsams te/_/grogs po rgya la zin pa yi/_/ri dgas bzhin du g.yo ba med/_/bdag gi pha ma sring mo dang /_/spun zla bu mo bu dag kyang /_/btson ra
[\[21b.3\]]kA rA gr-i he muk+tiM nA yAn+ti dra bi NaM bi nA/_/lo b+haHpra bar+t+ta te ya tra d+har+m+ma dwe She Na b+hU pa teH/_/ta s+yA ru kle sha de sha s+ya pa ri t+yA ge na dzI bya te/_/a tha bA ka tha mur+p+raSh+TuM de shaHkrits+tsh+we pi sha kya te/_/dzi tu
[\[21b.4\]]dag tu bcings gyur pa/_/nor med na ni grol mi 'gyur/_/sa bdag chos la sdang ba yis/_/gang la chags pa rab tu 'jug_/nyon mongs dag gis brlan pa yi/_/yul de rab tu btang bas 'tsho/_/yang na gnyen gyi 'ching thag gis/_/skye bo rtag tu bcings rnams kyis/_/sdug
[\[21b.5\]]g+hiHpa ta tA bad+d+hair+b+ban+d+hu ban+d+ha na radz+dzu b+hiH/_/dra bi No pArdza naM tasmA dasmin+kA+esha mi ye hi taM/_/nAsti tad+b+ya sa naM lo ke tIr+Ya te na d+ha ne na yata/_/prar+th+ya mA nAHpa lA yan+te swa ya mA yAM t+ya nar+thi tAH/_/bai sh+ya i ba
[\[21b.6\]]par gyur kyang yul dag ni/_/rab tu gtang bar ji ltar nus/_/de slad nyon mongs nad 'di la/_/nor ni nye bar bsgrubs pa phan/_/nor gyis thar min gdung ba gang /_/de ni 'jig rten dag na med/_/nor gyi phun tshogs gya gyu ni/_/smad 'tshong ma bzhin rnam 'gyur can/_/don du gnyer na bgrod
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]bi kA ri N+yaHku ti lA d+ha na sam+pa daH/_/bi ra sA dzIr+N+Na bal+lI ba dIr+g+hA sho ShA nu ban+d+hI nI/_/kwa tsit+ka dA tsiD+k+r-its+tsh+we Na se bA pha la ti nai ba bA/_/ladz+dza ra dzaHpa ri tsi tA yAts+tshA sadz+dza na brdzi tA/_/
[\[22a.2\]]par byed/_/don du ma gnyer rang nyid 'ongs/_/ro bral 'khri shing rnying pa bzhin/_/ring brkam rjes su 'ching ldan pa'i/_/'gar ni 'ga' tshe tshogs can gyis/_/g.yog la 'bras bu med pa nyid/_/slong ba dam pa'i skye bos spangs/_/ngo tsha'i rdul gyis yongs su rgyas/_/
[\[22a.3\]]a ba mA na sha tots+tshISh+TA sa pha lA s+ya pha la ya te/_/bu raHsad+kA rAM shaHpra tha ma sa ma yo sA ga ma ra sAt+ta to mA nal+lA nir+d+ra bi Na ka Na yAts+nyA pa ri tsa yAtra/_/bi mr-iSh+yAn+tab+h+r-iSh+NA ta ra li ta ma tirmArga Na ga NaH
[\[22a.4\]]sman pa rgya yi lhag ma ni/_/'bras bur bcas kyang 'bras med nyid/_/dang po dus su nye bar 'ongs pa'i ro las sngon du bsnyen bkur bya/_/de nas nor gyi cha bslangs yongs su 'dris las bkur ba rnam par nyams/_/sred pas blo gros g.yo ldan slong ba'i tshogs rnams nang du rnam
[\[22a.5\]]k+Sha NA dA shA ban+d+haM bi pu la ya ti saM ko tsa ya ti tsa/_/lo b+ha swa b+hA be lo kesminra ke gr-ih+na ti d+ha nairgu NAn/_/sar+b+bo pA ya bi hI na s+yA ta tasman+nAs+t+ye ba me ga tiH/_/kiM ka ro mi kwa gats+tshA mits+tshA yAr+thI
[\[22a.6\]]bsams shing /_/skad cig la ni re ba'i 'ching ba yangs par byed cing dog par byed/_/chags pa'i rang bzhin 'jig rten 'dir/_/nor gyi yon tan su zhig 'dzin/_/de slad thabs kun dman gyur pa/_/bdag ni 'gro ba med pa nyid/_/ci zhig bya zhig gang du 'gro/_/grib ma don gnyer
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]bat+sa the na/_/nA sA da ya ti bi shrIn+taM ni ra lam+bo ma no ra thaH/_/a t+yan+ta saM ku la ta re dza na kA na ni smin na prA s+ya te bi pa di ko pi sa sA d+hu br-ik+ShaH/_/yaHsaM ta tAr+thi dza na sar+b+ba pha lAr+b+ba Ne pi no kam+sa te na tsa
[\[22b.2\]]lam bzang bzhin/_/rton med yid la re ba yis/_/ngal gso thob par ma gyur to/_/skye bo'i nags tshal mchog tu shin tu stug por gyur pa 'dir/_/gang zhig rgyun du skye bo slong la 'bras bu kun ster yang /_/rnam yang 'dar bar mi 'gyur dud pa nyid kyang mi gtong ba/_/rgud pa dam
[\[22b.3\]]dza hA ti na tiM ka dA tsita/_/a dI na pu N+yaHsar+b+bar+thi kalpa br-ik+ShaHk+ShitI shwa raH/_/shru ye te satwa dug+d+hAb+d+hi rA san+nAr+thi ha raHpa raM/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sa nr-i paM pra tas+the draSh+Tu mud+su kaH/_/A shA
[\[22b.4\]]pa'i ljon shing de ni gang yang rnyed ma gyur/_/bsod nams mi dman sa yi dbang /_/slong ba kun gyi dpag bsam shing /_/phongs pa'i gdung ba mchog tu 'phrog_/snying stobs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho thos/_/de ltar yang dag bsams nas de/_/re ba bcas pa bstan pa yis/_/lam nas
[\[22b.5\]]ban+d+ho pa deSh+Te na sa tha haR+Sha pu raHpa raH/_/ta taHsa sha na kaiHprA s+ya pu ro pAn+ta ta so ba naM/_/da daR+shA d+h+wa pa ri shrAn+taHsaM bI taM balka lor+n+r-i paM/_/na ra nA tho pi taM dr-iSh+T+wA k+Shut+pi pA shA mA
[\[22b.6\]]dga' bas sna drangs te/_/mi bdag blta bar 'dod pas chas/_/de nas de yis dal bu yis/_/grong mtha' dka' thub nags su phyin/_/mi bdag shing los yongs dkris pa/_/lam gyis yongs su dub pas mthong /_/bkres skom ngal bas gzir ba de/_/mi bdag gis
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]tu raM/_/sa br-its+tshA ka ru Na sin+d+hurdU drA ga ma nA kA ra NaM/_/sa tasmai ni dza br-it+tan+ta muSha NA ni shwA sa sU tsi taM/_/ni be d+ya ban+d+hu saM ro d+ha duHkhAr+t+ta pu na ra bra bIta/_/A yA to haM
[\[23a.2\]]kyang mthong gyur nas/_/snying rje'i rgya mtshos ring po nas/_/'ong ba yi ni rgyu mtshan dris/_/de la de yis rang gi spyod/_/shugs rings tsha bas gsal byas pa/_/bshad nas gnyen rnams bcings pa yi/_/sdug bsngal gyis gzir slar yang bshad/_/gnyen ni bcings
[\[23a.3\]]ha ri N+yAr+thI ban+d+hu ban+d+ha na muk+ta ye/_/A br-i na pu N+yaM nr-i pa tiM driSh+Tu mar+thi su ra dru maM/_/lo ka nA thaHsa me shrI mAn ka ru NA pur+N+Na mA na saH/_/sad+yaHsan+daR+sha ne nai saM kalpaM pU ra yi Sh+ya ti/_/am+lA
[\[23a.4\]]pa dgrol ba'i slad/_/mi bdag slong ba lha yi shing /_/bsod nams mi dman blta ba la/_/gser don gnyer ba bdag 'ongs so/_/thugs ni snying rje rdzogs gyur pa/_/dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po de/_/mthong ba nyid kyis 'phral la ni/_/bdag gi brnag pa rdzogs par gyur/_/nyon
[\[23a.5\]]naM kle sha saM tA bai ra ba mA nai ra dU Shi ta/_/a par+Yu Shi ta kA lany+tsaM pha laM sU te ma hA dza naH/_/da ra d+r+ya tI bra ti mi rA sa ha rak+p+ra dzA nAM kIr+t+ti pra kA sha be b+ha baiHpa ri pU ri tA shAH/_/a
[\[23a.6\]]mongs gdung bas nyams mi byed/_/smad la yis ni sun mi 'byin/_/dus ni rnying pa ma yin par/_/skye bo chen po 'bras bu bskyed/_/skye rgu rnams kyi dbul ba'i rab rib mi bzad 'phrog byed cing /_/grags pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pas phyogs rnams yongs su 'gengs/_/dri med
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]b+h+yul+la sad+bi ma la mA na sa haR+Sha ban+d+hu stA saM ha ri Sh+ya ti sa me ba su d+hA su d+hAM shuH/_/shru twe ti te na kA thi tAM bya d+hi taHpri thi bI pa ti/_/saM krAn+ta nish+p+ra ti ka ra saM tA paHsa ma tsin+ta yata/_/a
[\[23b.2\]]yid ni mngon par rengs byed dga' ba dag gi gnyen/_/sa yi bdud rtsi'i zer des bdag gi gdung ba 'phrog par 'gyur/_/zhes pa de yis bshad thos nas/_/sa yi bdag po gzir bar gyur/_/bcos thabs med pa'i gdung ba dag_/'phos pa yis ni yang dag bsams/_/kye ma
[\[23b.3\]]ho\u0f85nu t+yak+ta rA dz+ya\u0f85ha ma kA le smi n+d+ri dzan+ma nA/_/tsin+ta taHk+Shut+pa rI te na shuSh+kA br-ik+Sha i bA d+h+wa ni/_/dU rA d+h+wa shra ma bai pha l+ya san+ta pa pra da mar+thi nAM/_/saM mo ha dza na naM d+hid+mAM mr-i ga tr-iSh+NA dza lo pa
[\[23b.4\]]bdag gis rgyal srid btang /_/dus min 'dir ni gnyis skyes kyis/_/bsams te bkres pas nyen pa las/_/lam gyi shing ni skam po bzhin/_/slong ba rnams la lam ring gis/_/ngal ba 'bras med gdung ba ster/_/ri dgas sred skyed chu lta bu/_/rmongs pa skyed byed bdag smad
[\[23b.5\]]maM/_/mu khAsh+ma pA tA tu l+ye na mUr ts+tshi tA nA mi bAr+thi nAM/_/A shA b+haM ge na ku ru tAM pra yA t+ya d+h+wa pa ri shra maH/_/a haM sa rA dzA san+t+ya k+ta rA dz+yaHkA na na shri taH/_/i ti shru twai pa bi pro yaM sa d+yas+t+ya dza ti dzI
[\[23b.6\]]do/_/kha la rdo bsnun mtshungs pa yis/_/brgyal bar gyur bzhin don gnyer rnams/_/re ba nyams pas lam du ni/_/yongs ngal lci ba nyid du gyur/_/rgyal po de ni bdag yin te/_/rgyal srid btang nas nags tshal bsten/_/zhes pa thos nas bram ze 'di/_/'phral la srog ni gtong bar
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]bi taM/_/rA dzad+hA nI mi to ga twA mA ma pra s+ya bi tsin+ti taM/_/kiM ka ri Sh+ya ti san+tA pA da yaM b+hag+na ma no ra thaH/_/dzI ba t+ye kaHki la sa ku sha li kle sha kA le na rA NAM sh+lA g+h+yash+tsit+ta s+phu ra ti sa ha sA yaH
[\[24a.2\]]'gyur/_/'di nas rgyal po'i gnas phyin te/_/bsam pa dag ni ma thob na/_/yid la re ba nyams pa 'di/_/gdung bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur/_/slong rnams phyir zlog bzhin legs tsha ba'i shugs rings dag gis gdung byed cing /_/kun tu rtogs pas lus dman
[\[24a.3\]]pa ri trA Na ban+d+huH/_/pra t+yA khyA nAn+ma li na ba da nastap+ta bi shwA sa shu Sh+yata saM kalpAlpI kr-i ta na ta ta nuR+YA ti yAsmAn+na tsAr+thI/_/d+hig+dzan+ma k+ShA ra si n+b+hoHpa thi ka dza na phr-i thuts+tsh+wA sa ni rdag+d+ha
[\[24a.4\]]chung ngur byas shing gang las mi 'gro ba/_/nyon mongs dus su mi rnams sems la 'phral la rab tu gsal ba gang /_/dge ldan yongs su skyob gnyen bsngags 'os gcig pu de nyid 'tsho ba yin/_/rang nyid rab bsrungs gdung ba'i nyams myong shes shing ri byi'i lto ba'i phug tu
[\[24a.5\]]br-id+d+he stA pa yo\u0f85r+thi bra dzA nA ha ra ti ra bi Sha maM tI bra tr-iSh+NA sa mut+thAH/_/dz+nyA tA swA do pya gas+t+yo da ra ku ha ra lu Thadz+dza Tha rag+ni pra tA pa byA pA ra byA s+ya ma na kwa tha na pa ri tsi ta swa
[\[24a.6\]]blugs byas te/_/smin byed me yis rab tu gdung ba'i byed pas khyab cing 'tshed pa'i bya ba yongs su 'dris gyur kyang /_/slong ba'i tshogs kyi sred pa drag pos bskyed pa'i mi bzad gdung ba 'phrog pa min pa gang /_/skye bo 'gon po'i shugs rings che ba bskol zhing 'phel bar
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]pra mA tha bya thA nAM/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya nr-i pa ti\u0f85kr-i tA ti th+yaHpha l+laM bu nA/_/ta mu bA tsA pri yA khya na b+hI ta b+hI ta i bAk+Sha Na/_/bra h+man+na dI na pu N+yo\u0f85haM rA dza sha tru ba d+ho d+ya me/_/hiM sA bi rak+taH
[\[24b.2\]]'gyur byed rgya mtsho'i skye ba smad/_/de ltar skad cig bsams byas nas/_/chu dang 'bras bu mgron byas te/_/mi snyan smra bas 'jigs 'jigs bzhin/_/mi yi bdag pos de la smras/_/bsod nams mi dman rgyal po dang /_/bram ze dgra gsod sbyor ba'i tshe/_/'tshe las chags bral
[\[24b.3\]]saM t+ya dz+ya rA dz+yaM bi dza na mA shri taH/_/hiM sA pha la ma hI pA la b+ho gaM b+h+rU b+haM ga b+haM gu raM/_/pra t+ya gra ru d+hi rA dig+d+haM kra byA da i ba g+huny+dza te/_/kiM ka rum+pa pa da s+tho ha ma kA le twa mu sA ga taH/_/yan+tu
[\[24b.4\]]rgyal srid ni/_/yongs su btang nas dben pa bsten/_/sa skyong longs spyod 'tshe ba'i 'bras/_/smin 'khyog lta bur mi brtan pa/_/gsar pa'i khrag gis sbags pa ni/_/srin po bzhin du longs spyod byed/_/gnas min 'dug des ci zhig bya/_/khyod ni dus min nye bar 'ongs/_/cung
[\[24b.5\]]sha kyaM ma yA ki tsin+ta da yaM tri ta mu ts+yaM tAM/_/i ti rA dza ba tsa shru twa badzre Ne ba sa mA ha taH/_/ban+d+hu mok+Sha Na ni rA s+ya tu sa ba pA ta ma hI ta le/_/muts+tshi taM pa ti taM b+hU mau taM dr-iSh+TA pa shru lo tsa naH/_/pri yA
[\[24b.6\]]zad bdag gis nus pa gang /_/de ni bsdams pa med par brjod/_/ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/_/rdo rjes yang dag bcom pa bzhin/_/gnyen thar re ba bral ba las/_/de ni sa la 'gyel bar gyur/_/brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel ba de/_/mthong nas mig ni mchi mar bcas/_/snyan pa'i
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]b+hirbAg+b+hi rA shwA s+ya rA dzA pu na ra tsin+ta ya/_/a ho nu man+da pu N+yo haM yasmin+nA shA la tAM ku raH/_/ma ru mArgo pa me ya taHsa ha pAsho Sha mar+thi naH/_/ar+thAr+thI pra tha maM bi tsin+d+ya
[\[25a.2\]]tshig gis dbugs phyung nas/_/rgyal pos slar yang rab bsams pa/_/kye ma bdag ni bsod nams dman/_/mya ngan lam dang mtshungs pa 'dir/_/slong ba'i re ba'i 'khri shing gi_/myu gu 'phral la bskams par gyur/_/nor don gnyer ba blun po'i 'dod pas dang po
[\[25a.3\]]sa pha lA ma s+thA na yAts+nyA k+Sha NA dA shA nI li ka yA b+hi li khya ni khi laM sha khA sa ha sraiHsu khaM/_/a prA s+yA mra mi bA tha shuSh+ka kha di rAnra mU D+hets+tshi yA bAMts+tsha taM sa d+yash+tshin+na ma no ra thaHpr-i thu ta rA raM b+hak+Sha yaM muts+tsha ti/_/asmai
[\[25a.4\]]gnas min slong ba 'bras bcas bsams/_/re ba'i myu gus 'dod pa'i bde ba ma lus yal ga stong gi mngon par bris/_/de nas a mra thob par ma gyur seng ldeng skam pos bzhin du skad cig la/_/shin tu che ba'i rtsom pa nyams shing re thag chad pas 'phral la brgyal bar gyur/_/bslangs
[\[25a.5\]]ya dI pra yats+tsha mi yA tsi tA bAsta malpa kaM_/ti t+kaM te na ka ro t+ye Sha b+hi k+Shi twA bi bu b+huk+Shi taH/_/ta smin+ne ba gr-i he dza ran+t+r-i tsa Na ka Tats+tshan+ne ya di s+thI ya te tsul+lI pup+ta bi DA la bA la sa da yastA e ba ya d+yaM ga
[\[25a.6\]]nas rnyed pa chung ngu zhig_/gal te 'di la bdag gis byin/_/bsod snyoms bslangs kyang ltogs gyur pa/_/de la des kyang ci zhig byed/_/gal te rtswa chag rnying pa dag gis thog phub khyim ni de nyid du gnas shing /_/gang yang bud med byi la'i phrug gu thab du nyal la rtse ldan de dag
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]nAH/_/pA da b+h+yA ma ba ga mya te ya di pu na ste nai bA se bA pu nA tat+ko nA ma gu NaHk+Sha NaM k+Shi ti b+hu dzA dr-iSh+Te na pr-iSh+Te na bA/_/i ti d+yA twAM d+ha rA d+hi shaHkr-i ba ba su d+ha yA d+hi yA/_/tad+bAMts+tsha sid+d+hi san+nad+d+ha pra ti bo d+h+ya ta ma
[\[25b.2\]]gis/_/gal te rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro zhing slar yang de ni bsten bya de lta na/_/de ni nges par sa bdag skad cig mthong dang mgu ba la yang yon tan tsi/_/blo gros brtse ba'i nor 'dzin gyis/_/de ltar bsams nas sa 'dzin dbang /_/de 'dod bsgrub par chas gyur pas/_/rab sad byas te
[\[25b.3\]]b+h+ya d+hata/_/ut+tiSh+Tha bi pra saM prastu s+t+wata sa mI hi ta sid+d+ha ye/_/a bi lam+ba pha lA bAsti tu pA ya pa ra mo ma yA/_/ts+tshi twA ma ma shi rastA batra bra h+ma dat+tA ya b+hU b+hu dze/_/ga twA pra yats+tsha tat+p+r-i t+yA pa te bit+taM pra dA
[\[25b.4\]]de la smras/_/longs shig bram ze khyod kyi ni/_/'dod pa bsgrub slad mi thogs par/_/'bras bu thob pa'i thabs kyi mchog_/bdag gis yang dag rnyed par gyur/_/re zhig bdag gi mgo bcad nas/_/song ste sa bdag tshangs byin la/_/byin na de ni dga' ba yis/_/khyod la nor dag ster bar
[\[25b.5\]]s+ya ti/_/ta s+yAr+the tsan+da na ta b+hoHshru twe tad+ba tsa na dwi dzaH/_/u pa tsa tap+ta pU ts+ye ba bid+d+haHkar+N+Na pra biSh+Ta yA/_/ta ba trai lo kya sA ra s+ya dza gat+pu N+yAp+ta dzan+ma naH/_/shas+t+raM kaN+The sha The nAsman+da pA pe na ya t+ya ha na/_/
[\[25b.6\]]'gyur/_/slong ba'i tsan+dan ljon pa de'i/_/tshig de thos nas gnyis skyes ni/_/rna bar rab zhugs gdung ba yis/_/khab kyis phug bzhin rab smras pa/_/srid gsum snying po skye ba ni/_/'gro ba'i bsod nams kyis thob pa/_/khyod kyi mgrin pa 'di la mtshon/_/brlang po sdig can su zhig bsnun/_/
[\[26a\]]
