[\[26a.1\]]lo b+ha lo b+ha ma tiHko nu tsin+ta ye da hi taM ta pa/_/aM gA ra kA ra NaM kraur+YaHsa ha kA re ka ro ti ka_/i ti bru bA NaM nr-i pa tir+b+rAh+ma NaM prat+yu bA tsa taM/_/dzI ban+taM na yad+d+hA bA ta s+ya mA man+ti kaM ri poH/_/ya h+ne
[\[26a.2\]]chags pas blo gros nyams pa su/_/khyod la mi phan sems par byed/_/sa ha kA ra sol ba yi/_/rgyu ru ma rungs su zhig byed/_/ces smra bram ze de la ni/_/mi yi bdag pos lan smras pa/_/'tsho yang bdag ni bcings pa yis/_/dgra bo de yi drung du khyer/_/rgyal pos
[\[26a.3\]]nA l+yAr+thi to radz+nyA sa taM bad+d+h+wA ma hI pa teH/_/ni nA ya brah+ma dat+ta s+ya pa mI paM sha tru shaM ki naH/_/te nA nI taM ta mA dA ya brah+ma dat+taHk+Shi tI shwa raM/_/d+ha na d+ha ne sha tu l+yosmai bAMts+tshi tA b+h+ya d+hi kaM da dau/_/satwA sh+tsar+Ya
[\[26a.4\]]'bad pas don gnyer bas/_/sa bdag dgra yi dogs pa can/_/tshangs byin dag gi drung du ni/_/de yis de ni bcings nas khyer/_/de yis khyer nas 'ongs pa yi/_/sa dbang de blangs tshangs pas byin/_/nor dbang mtshungs pas de la nor/_/'dod pa bas kyang mngon lhag byin/_/bsod nams
[\[26a.5\]]ma dI na pu N+ya nr-i pa te rA kar+N+N+ya bi pro dI taM t+yak+t+wA bai ra bi kA ra duHsa ha ta raM kraur+YA b+hi b+hA naM bi ShaM/_/d+h+r-i twA mau li mi bon+na te ni dza pa de tAM brah+ma dat+taHswa yaM tsa kre tats+tsha ra NAM pu dza pra Ni
[\[26a.6\]]mi dman mi bdag gi ni snying stobs ngo mtshar bram zes bshad thos nas/_/khon kyi rnam 'gyur shin tu bzod dka' ma rungs nyid du mngon brjod dug btang ste/_/rang gnas shin tu mtho bar de ni mgo bzhin bzhag nas tshangs byin rang nyid kyis/_/de yi zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]yi nI muSh+NI Sha mA laM k+Sha NAta/_/tasmin+ga te ni dza pu raM bi na ya pra pan+ne saM prA pya rA dz+ya pa ri hI na ma dI na pu N+yaH/_/d+har+m+me Na kIrti d+ha ba lAM bu d+hi phe na mA li bel+lad+du kU la la li taM pr-i thi bIM sha
[\[26b.2\]]gtsug tor 'phreng bas skad cig mdza' bar byas/_/de ni dul ba rab thob rang gi grong khyer song ba'i tshe/_/yongs btang rgyal srid yang dag thob nas bsod nams mi dman pas/_/grags pa ltar dkar dbu ba'i 'phreng ba g.yo ldan chu gter gyi/_/du gu la yis rnam mdzes sa gzhi chos
[\[26b.3\]]shA sa/_/yo b+hUd+bi b+hur+b+ha ba na sA ra ma di na pu N+yaHso haM smr-i taM tsa ri ta ma tra ma yA d+ya ta s+ya/_/kA le na ya tra ba hu saM g+ha pa dA b+hi rA ma b+hU mir+b+ha bi Sh+ya ti nr-i NAM b+ha ba muk+ti he tuH/_/
[\[26b.4\]]kyis bskyangs par gyur/_/khyab bdag bsod nams mi dman du gyur gang de nga nyid de/_/gang du dus kyis dge 'dun mang po'i zhabs kyis mngon dga'i sa/_/mi rnams dag gi srid pa grol ba'i rgyu ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/'dir deng de yi spyod tshul srid pa'i snying po bdag gis dran/_/
[\[26b.5\]]satA dz+wa laM b+ha ga ba tash+tsa ri taM ni sa mya pUr+b+ba ba dA na ka thi no da ti bisma ye na/_/haR+Sha spr-i shaHki ma pi nA ka pa terba b+hU ba ro mA tsa pa tra ra tsa nA ru tsi raM sha ri raM/_/i ti k+She
[\[26b.6\]]sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa gsung mdzad bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/_/spyod tshul sems dpa' rab 'bar thos nas ya mtshan rgyas pa yis/_/dga' bas reg par gyur pa mtho ris bdag po'i lus la ni/_/spu long 'dab ma mdzes pas spras pa ci yang byung bar gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]men+d+ra pi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hI satwa ba dA na kalpa la tA yA ma dI na pu N+yA ba dA na drA pany+tsA shaHpal+la waH//_//suk+tiHkaN+Tha bi bar+t+ta nA gu ru na tiM mau lau shru tra shro
[\[27a.2\]]dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bsod nams mi dman pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//legs bshad mgrin par rnam gnas bla ma la 'dud mgo dang
[\[27a.3\]]tra yoHsa t+yaM ni t+ya ma nA ma yaM tsa ba da ne bid+bat+p+ri yaM b+hU Sha NaM/_/rat+no dA ra su b+hA ra hA ra ra tsa nA tsi tre Na d+hat+te ta raM san+to ShaM sa bi she Sha be Sha ba ni ta be she na she Sho dza naH/_/sha kra NA n+ya
[\[27a.4\]]rna bar thos pa dang /_/zhal ni rtag tu skyon med bden pa dang ldan mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba'i rgyan/_/rin chen yid 'ong rab gsal do shal bkod pa bkra ba'i khyad par dang bcas pa/_/chas ldan bud med chas kyis skye bo lhag ma rnams ni mchog tu tshim pa skyed/_/gzhan du bcom
[\[27a.5\]]tra b+ha ga bAn sa smi taHsmi ta kA ra NaM/_/pr-iSh+Tasta dA sha ya dz+nye na sar+b+ba dz+nyaHpu na ra bra bIta/_/su b+hA Shi ta ga be ShI ti bA rA Na s+yA ma b+hUn+n+r-i paH/_/ya s+ya dzA t+yu dz+wA+e la kIr+t+ti mA le ba bi ba b+hau shri yaH/_/
[\[27a.6\]]ldan 'dzum ldan pa/_/brgya byin bsam pa shes pa yis/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu ni dris pa na/_/thams cad mkhyen pas yang gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sIr mi yi bdag_/legs bshad 'tshol ba zhes pa byung /_/gang gi grags pa dri med rigs/_/dpal gyi 'phreng ba bzhin du mdzes/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]su br-it+te gu Na si yuk+te hr-i di sak+te bi be kI nAM/_/a b+hUd b+hu Sha Na a bAr+thI yaHsUk+te na tu mauk+ti ke/_/ni t+ya mar+thi Shu muk+tA pi ko sha shrIr+Ya s+ya nish+tsa lA/_/kIr+t+ti gu NA ni bad+d+hA pi dU rAd rU
[\[27b.2\]]yon tan skud ldan legs spyod zlum/_/dben ldan rnams kyi snying la chags/_/mu tig ma yin legs bshad kyi/_/rgyan nyid gang zhig don gnyer gyur/_/gang gi mdzod dpal slong rnams la/_/rtag tu btang yang g.yo ba med/_/grags pa yon tan la btags kyang /_/ring
[\[27b.3\]]ra ta raM ga tAH/_/sa rA dzA haM sa pa rai br-i taHka bi ba raiHsa dA/_/bid+bat+sa b+hA ka ma li nI b+ho ga sau b+hA gya na b+hUta/_/u pa de sha pra brit+ta s+ya sa gu NAsta s+ya sUk+ta yaH/_/dza na s+ya mo
[\[27b.4\]]las shin tu ring bar 'gro/_/rgyal po'i ngang pa'i snyan ngag mkhan/_/nyams ldan mchog gis rtag bskor te/_/mkhas pa'i mdun sa pad ldan la/_/longs spyod skal bzang ldan par gyur/_/nye bar bstan la rab zhugs pa/_/de yi legs bshad yon tan can/_/mar me'i rtse mo lta bu
[\[27b.5\]]ha ti mi ra dza hrurdI pa shi khA i ba/_/sa ka dA tsit+sa b+hA sI naHsu b+hA Shi ta ka thAM ta re/_/su ma tiHsu ma ti nA ma pra d+hA nA mA t+ya ma pra bIta/_/sA d+hu shap+da pa dA rU D+hairgu NA laM ka rA shA li b+hiH/_/sa b+hA b+ha
[\[27b.6\]]yis/_/skye bo rmongs pa'i rab rib phrogs/_/nam zhig mdun sar blo bzang de/_/'dug pas legs bshad gtam gyi ni/_/mjug tu blo bzang zhes pa yi/_/blon po'i gtso la rab smras pa/_/legs pa'i sgra dang tshig la zhon/_/yon tan rgyan dang yang dag ldan/_/khyed rnams dag
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]bid+b+har+b+ha t+ye ShA b+ha ra tI ba su b+hA Shi taiH/_/a s+yats+tsiSh+T+wa ni sat+pA ka ra sa ban+ti na bA ni tsa/_/su b+hA Shi tA ni b+ha ba tA ku su mA nI ba ka ni tsita/_/sUk+tI nAM pra ti b+hA nAny+tsa many+dza rI NAM tsa dzr-im+b+ha
[\[28a.2\]]gi lags bshad kyis/_/mdun sa 'di ni bkang bzhin mdzes/_/legs par smin zhing ro dang ldan/_/legs par bshad pa gsar pa ni/_/me tog lta bu 'ga' zhig ni/_/khyod kyis rnyed par gyur tam ci/_/legs bshad rnams dang mthun rnams dang /_/dog pa rnams
[\[28a.3\]]taM/_/na ba me ba ma no hA ri nA rI NA mi ba yau ba naM/_/sa ra sa ma pi bi hA ya byA yA taM puSh+pa sAr+thaM pa ri tsi ta pa ri hA rI dU ra dU rA nu pA ri/_/b+h+ra ma ti sa ta ta sak+tA swA da man+dA ra
[\[28a.4\]]kyang rgyas pa ni/_/gsar pa kho na yid 'phrog ste/_/bud med rnams kyi lang tsho bzhin/_/ro dang ldan yang rnam par yangs pa'i me tog don mthun yongs btang nas/_/yongs 'dris yongs su 'dor zhing ring nas ring du rjes su rgyu byed pa/_/gsar pa gsar pa'i sbrang rtsi la chags rkang drug
[\[28a.5\]]rat+nA na na ba na ba ma d+hu lu b+haHShaD+pa daHkA na ne Shu/_/a smin+sa da pi yad+kiM tsi ta sUk+ta rat+naM bi tsar+ya te/_/tat+pa rIk+Sha sa mut+tIr+N+NaM sar+b+ba tra yA t+yA nar+g+ha tI/_/pAN+Di t+ye na bi nA bi nA shi ta b+hi
[\[28a.6\]]pa ni nags rnams su/_/rtag tu nyams su myong gyur rin chen man+da ra las 'khyam par byed/_/mdun sa 'dir ni cung zad gang /_/legs bshad rin chen rnam dpyad de/_/yongs su brtag pas thar pa de/_/kun tu rin thang med par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa nyid ni med na blo gros rnam nyams mi
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]yaM byar+thaM nr-i NAM dzI bi taM bAN+Di t+yaM shu ka bA Tha saN+Tha ma sa molbA saM ka bi twAM bi nA/_/kA bya tsA ru ta raM bi nA sa hr-i da yaista twAn+ta rA lo tsa nA shu n+yaM nirdza na kU ba dI pa ka la nA man+taHsa ma lam+ba te/_/tasmA dasmin+na
[\[28b.2\]]rnams 'tsho ba don yod min/_/mtshungs med rgyas pa'i snyan ngag med na mkhas pa nyid ni ne tso'i klog dang mtshungs/_/snying ldan rnams kyis nang gi de nyid dpyod pa med na rab mdzes snyan ngag ni/_/stong pa nyid de dben sa'i khron pa'i mar me bzhin du bsten par 'gyur/_/de yi slad du gnas
[\[28b.3\]]ba sa re nu tA naM kiny+tsi du ts+ya tAM/_/tsai dra sa ka ru t+ya s+yeHsUk+ta s+yA ba sa raHsu hr-i tra/_/tsa mat+kA ro bA tsA dza ya ti dzi dzA tI pa ri ma laHk+Sha NaM tsit+ta twaM dz+nyAHpra gu Na ma ba d+hA naM bi da d+ha ti/_/u da
[\[28b.4\]]skabs 'dir/_/khu byug sgra yis bye zla bzhin/_/legs bshad go skabs grogs po yis/_/gsar ba cung zad brjod par mdzod/_/gal te skad cig de nyid shes pas mchog tu yid rton sgrub byed na/_/tshig rnams kyis ni dza ti'i dri bzang ngo mtshar ba dag skyed par byed/_/ji srid skye
[\[28b.5\]]grA sA ma grI ta da pi bi pha lai Shaspu ri ta kr-ita na yA bat+pA The na swa dza na i ba lab+d+ho na ba sa raH/_/i t+yuk+taM na ra nA the na hri da ya spaR+shi d+hI ma tAM/_/ba tsa shru twA ma hA mA t+yaHpra t+ya b+hA Sha ta b+hU pa tiM/_/rA dzan+na
[\[28b.6\]]bo legs bshad brjod la go skabs med pa mtho ba min/_/de lta na yang mchog gi tshogs la lhag par bstar byas 'di 'bras bral/_/de skad mi mgon gyis brjod pa/_/blo ldan snying la reg pa'i tshig_/thos nas blon po chen po yis/_/sa yi bdag la lan gsol pa/_/rgyal po
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]b+hi na ba sh+lo kasta be ba b+hu ba na tra ye/_/gI ya te bi bud+hA d+hI shaHki ma N+yaiHsUk+ta bista raiH/_/twa yi bi d+yA bi no desmin+na dA n+ya ba ra pA da re/_/bi d+yA d+ha ra pu raM sar+b+ba dzA
[\[29a.2\]]khyod kyi tshigs bcad nyid/_/mngon par gsar pa srid gsum na/_/sgrogs na mkhas pa'i dbang phyug dag_/legs bshad rgyas pa gzhan gyis ci/_/gus ldan gtong phod mchog gyur khyod/_/rig pa dag la dgyes pa 'dir/_/sa yi mthil 'di thams cad ni/_/
[\[29a.3\]]ta me tan+ma hI ta laM/_/ka lA ka ma li nI kan+te mi tre gu Na ba tAM twa yi/_/u di te yA ti pA lo kaHsan+mAr+g+ge NA khi lo dza naH/_/sA sA ka lA sa sa bi lA sa bi she Sha be gaste te gu Na sa sa dza nash+tsa ra
[\[29a.4\]]rig pa 'dzin pa'i grong khyer gyur/_/khyod ni yon tan ldan pa'i grogs/_/sgyu rtsal pad+mo ldan pas mdzes/_/shar tshe skye bo mtha' dag ni/_/snang bcas legs pa'i lam nas 'gro/_/gang dang gang la rgyal po rjes su chags par skad cig ni/_/gus pa'i cha shas byas pa'i sgyu rtsal dag
[\[29a.5\]]taM tsa tat+tata/_/lo ke pri ya twa ma d+hi ro ha ti ya tra ya tra rA dzA ka ro ti pa ra paHk+Sha Na mA da rAM shaM/_/b+hU pA le bi du Shi spr-i sha t+ya ti sha yaM bi d+yA bi la pot+sa baM pU re saM ga ra raM ga saM ga ma ru tsi gr-ih+nA ti bI ra bra taM/_/mU d+he mu h+ya ti tsany+tsa
[\[29a.6\]]ni de de dang /_/rtse dga'i chas kyi bye brag de de yon tan de de dang /_/skye bo spyod tshul de de 'jig rten dga' ba nyid du 'gyur/_/sa skyong mkhas na rig pa'i rtse dga'i spro la mchog tu reg par gyur/_/dpa' na g.yul gyi rol pa dang 'grogs brtul zhugs brtul zhugs 'dzin par 'gyur/_/blun na rmongs shing
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]le bi tsa la ti krU re nr-i shaM pA ya te yad+Yad+b+hU mi pa tiHka ro ti ku ru te tat+tat+sa map+to dza naH/_/sA ra saHsA d+hu puSh+pA NAM bi kA sha ku su mA ka raH/_/pra dzA pu N+yair+b+ha ba t+ye ba swa yaM baM dwan+ma hi pa tiH/_/dza naHsu
[\[29b.2\]]g.yo na rnam par g.yo la gdug na ma rungs spyod/_/gang gang sa bdag byed pa de de mtha' dag skye bo byed par 'gyur/_/me tog 'byung gnas legs pa yi/_/me tog rgyas byed nyams dang ldan/_/sa bdag rang nyid mkhas pa ni/_/skye rgu'i bsod nams nyid kyis 'byung /_/skye bo legs byed
[\[29b.3\]]br-it+tir+m+ma ti mA na mA t+yAHba t+yA b+hi b+hA Shi nr-i pa tir+m+ma nI ShI/_/e tA ni kAl s+ya shu b+ho da ya s+ya pra t+yak+Sha lak+Sh+ya Ni su lak+Sha NA ni/_/yan+n+r-i t+yan+ti pa de pa de ma ti ma tAM kAr+YAr+tha ta twa d+hi yo yat+kar+N+NA b+ha ra NI b+ha ban+ti bi b+ha be
[\[29b.4\]]blo ldan blon po dang /_/mi bdag mkhas shing bden par smra byed pa/_/'di dag rnams ni dge ba dar ba'i dus/_/mngon sum du mtshon mtshan nyid bzang po yin/_/gang gis gnas dang gnas su dgos don nyid la blo ldan blo ni gar byed cing /_/gang zhig 'byor tshe legs ldan bdag
[\[29b.5\]]b+ha byat+ma nAM suk+ta yaH/_/yat+sA ra su ta e Sha kIr+N+Na ma hi mA mu drA da ri dro ni d+hirbi d+ya nAM nr-i pa tiHswa yaM ba ra bi d+hau sau yami kA hot+sa baH/_/rA dza ma ne na ma ha tA rA dza mA ne gu Ne sa
[\[29b.6\]]nyid rnams kyis legs bshad rna ba'i rgyan du gyur/_/gang 'di mi bdag bdag nyid che rgyas rgya yis dbul ba'i dbyangs can dag gi gter/_/'di ni rang nyid dam pa'i cho ga dag la rig pa'i khyim thab spro dga' yin/_/rgyal po'i bkur ba chen po yis/_/dam pa'i yon tan mdzes
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]tAM/_/lu b+ha kAHsuk+ti bai tsi tre lub+d+ha kaHkA na ne Sh+wa pi/_/lub+d+haHkrU ra kaM nA ma pra t+yan+tisti ba ne tsa raH/_/sa dA na ba na baM tasmAta sUk+ta rat+na ma bA s+ya te/_/dr-i pyad+h+wi pA ri Na kha rA g+hA
[\[30a.2\]]pa na/_/nags su rngon pa rnams kyang ni/_/nus pa rnam par bkra la chags/_/rngon pa gdug pa can zhes pa/_/nags rgyu mtha' 'khob dag na gnas/_/de las rtag tu legs bshad kyi/_/rin chen gsar pa gsar pa thob/_/dregs ldan gnyis 'thung dgra gter ni/_/
[\[30a.3\]]ta b+hin+na b+ha mok+ti keH/_/ba ta taM ka gi bA r+the b+h+yaHsa gr-ih+NA ti su b+hA Shi taM/_/shru twe t+ya mA t+ya s+ya ba tsaHk+Shi tI shaHsa taM sa mut+p+r-i dz+ya bi pr-i dz+ya sa t+yan/_/an+taHpu raM gup+ta mu pe t+ya rU paM tsa kA ra sa mA n+ya dza
[\[30a.4\]]bsnun bral glang po'i mu tig gis/_/snyan ngag mkhan gyi don mthun las/_/rtag tu de yis legs bshad blangs/_/zhes pa blon po'i tshig thos sa bdag gis/_/mdun sa pa bkye mdun sa rab btang nas/_/sbas pa'i gzugs kyis pho brang 'khor song ste/_/thun mong skye bo'i rjes su
[\[30a.5\]]nA nu rU pIM/_/pa raspa raM shu pra ti bad+d+ha tA raM bi spA ra tA rA ni ka rA b+hi rA maM/_/hA raM pa mA da ya su b+hA Shi tAr+thits+tsha yA dwi tI yaHsa ya yau ba nAn+taM/_/sa ta tra bA lA ni la kIr+Na puSh+pai br-ik+ShaiHkr-i tA ti th+ya
[\[30a.6\]]mthun par byas/_/skar tshogs rgyas pa lta bur mngon dga' zhing /_/phan tshun 'od zer rab tu gsal byed pa'i/_/do shal bzung nas legs bshad don gnyer de/_/grib ma gnyis pa dang bcas nags mthar song /_/de ni nges par dud pa'i shing rnams kyis/_/me tog rlung gzhon
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]i bA ba na mraiH/_/a nI Sh+ya yat+nata mr-i ga yA pra sak+taM gi resta be lub+d+ha ka mA sa sA da/_/tsA me na bA maM ka ri NAM su khA nAM bai bad+h+ya dIk+ShA ra si kaM mr-i gi NAM/_/ba kra kra ma krU ra ta raM ka re Na tsA paM swa tsit+to pa
[\[30b.2\]]gyis bkram mgron byas bzhin/_/de yis 'bad pas btsal bas rngon pa ni/_/rngon la rab chags ri yi ngos su rnyed/_/glang po rnams kyis bde ba'i mi mthun phyogs/_/ri dgas rnams la yug sas 'debs byed mkhas/_/'khyog po'i rim pa bzhin du ma rungs gzhu/_/rang sems lta
[\[30b.3\]]ma mud+d+ha hastaM/_/ba d+hai ka da k+She Na ba dak+Shi Ne na na nau ka sAM ni t+ya ma dak+Shi Na na/_/haste na bi n+yasta sa map+ta hasti bar+g+hApa brga bi shi khaM da d+hA naM/_/mA yu ra pak+Shai ra ni nA ba he mA ta raM gai tA
[\[30b.4\]]bu lag pa g.yon pas 'dzin/_/rtag tu nags na gnas pa'i mi mthun phyogs/_/gsod pa gcig pu la mkhas lag g.yas kyis/_/lag ldan sde rnams mtha' dag byang grol la/_/rnam par 'god pa'i mda' ni rab tu 'dzin/_/rtse mo rlung gis dal gyis bskyod pa yi/_/rma bya'i sgro yi
[\[30b.5\]]grairbi hi tot+ta ri yaM/_/ne trair+m+r-i gI NAM pa ti dzI ba rak+ShAM saM trA sa lo lai ri ba ya ts+ya mA naM/_/sa taM gi rA pU dz+ya mi bA b+hi pU dz+ya gu ruHpra dzA nAM gu ru bat+p+ra Na mya/_/u bA tsA sho NA d+ha ra kAn+ti b+hin+nAM dan+ta d+yu tiM
[\[30b.6\]]stod g.yogs bsgrubs gyur pa/_/skrag pa g.yo ba ri dgas rnams kyi mig_/bdag po 'tsho ba bsrung bar gsol 'debs bzhin/_/des de tshig gis mngon mchod mchod bya bzhin/_/skye rgu'i bla mas phyag 'tshal bla ma bzhin/_/mchu mdzes dmar bas phye ba so yi 'od/_/yal 'dab
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]pal+la bi tAM da d+hA naH/_/ma yA shru taHsA d+hu su b+hA Shi tA nAM ta bA ni shaM saM gra ha Ne pra yat+naH/_/mAr+g+go pa de shA ya dza na s+ya dIp+taHra yats+tsha kiM tsin+na ba sUk+ta rat+naM/_/a yany+tsa te dat+p+ra
[\[31a.2\]]lta bu 'dzin cing rab smras pa/_/khyod ni rtag tu legs pa'i legs bshad rnams/_/bsdu la rab tu 'bad pa bdag gis thos/_/skye bo'i lam bstan slad du legs bshad kyi/_/rin chen sgron ma gsar pa cung zad stsol/_/rang gzugs rol pas
[\[31a.3\]]ti pa N+ya rU paHswa rU pa lI lA da li tan+du dar+p+paH/_/hA raHpra hA ra sti mi rot+ka rA NAM lak+Sh+mi bi lA se smi ta ka li kA raH/_/uk+t+we ti hA raM ka ra pU ri tA sha ma daR+sha yad+d+hU mi b+hu raM do
[\[31a.4\]]zla ba'i dregs 'joms shing /_/dpal gyi 'jo sgeg 'dzum pa'i rtse dga' bskyed/_/mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa'i do shal 'di/_/khyod kyi de yi 'dod pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/zhes brjed do shal 'od kyis phyogs khengs pa/_/sa yi 'byer 'jig dag gis de la
[\[31a.5\]]rasmai/_/taM lub+d+ha kaHswap+na ma no ra the na duSh+p+ra sa mA lokya sha naiHpra da d+ho/_/da twA y+Ya d+hI mA ni ma pra de yaM pash+tsA da yaM tA sa mu pe ti nU naM/_/asmin+na tI te pa ra lo ka b+hU miM hA raHka thaM me ni dza ta mu
[\[31a.6\]]brten/_/rmi lam re ba rnams la rnyed dka' de/_/rngon pas mthong nas dal gyis rab bsams pa/_/klog cing bdag la sbyin bya byin nas kyang /_/phyi nas 'di ni nges par gdung bar 'gyur/_/'di ni 'jig rten pha rol sar 'das nas/_/do shal ji ltar bdag rang nyid du
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]pai ti/_/k+Sha NaM bi tsin+t+ye ti sa taM ba b+hA She da dA mi pa d+ho sa ma ye ne sUk+ti/_/shr-iM gAd+gi shA ra s+ya ya di swa de haM saM prAp+ta sUk+taHk+ShaM ba si pra sa h+ya/_/krau yo tsit+taM lub+d+ha ka bA kya me ta da tsin+ta ya tab+hU mi pa tirni
[\[31b.2\]]'gyur/_/skad cig 'di bsams de la des smras pa/_/dge ba dam tshig gis ni legs bshad sbyin/_/gal te ri 'di'i rtse la rang gi lus/_/legs bshad thob pa'i 'phral la mchong na'o/_/gdug pa'i sems ldan rngon pa'i tshig de dag_/thos nas sa yi bdag
[\[31b.3\]]sha mya/_/a ho nu saM skA ra ba to s+ya kA maM ni Shid+d+ha kAr+YA tsa ra NA bi yo gaH/_/dU re gu NA ro d+ha bi shru tA nAM pra t+yak+Sha saM la k+Shi ta duSh+Tha tA nAM/_/b+h+ya ba t+ya tu l+yaHku Ti lA sha yA nAM ma n+yaHpra bA dag+d+ha ri
[\[31b.4\]]pos rab bsams pa/_/kye ma nges par 'du byed ldan pa 'di/_/dgag pa'i bya spyod dag la mngon par sbyor/_/ring du yon tan bskrun par grags gyur cing /_/mngon du ngan pa'i spyod pa mtshon gyur pa/_/bsam pa gya gyu rnams kyi grags pa gzhan/_/de bzhin spyod tshul
[\[31b.5\]]taM ta thA n+yata/_/kwa k+Shu tra tai ShA ku ba nAn+ta bA saHkwa sa twa hiM sA kwa gu NA bi yo gaH/_/kwa sUk+ta tsa tsA kwa niSh+k+r-i pa twaM ma ho bi mo ha ha ta ma s+ya br-it+taM/_/grA ya t+ya sak+taM ma d+hu raM pu rastAd+ba n+yaHbra taiH
[\[31b.6\]]gzhan de mtshungs ma yin/_/ngan pa 'di ci nags mthar gnas pa ci/_/sems can 'tshe ci yon tan mngon sbyor ci/_/legs bshad brjod ci brtse ba med nyid ci/_/kye ma 'di yi spyod tshul rmongs pas bcom/_/rgyun du mdun nas snyan pa'i glu len cing /_/nags
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]shAn+ta i bA ba b+hA ti/_/lub+d+ha s+ya lub+d+ha s+ya ki mu ts+ya te bA prA NA pa ha ri gu NA saM gra her+Ya/_/bi d+yA bi she She pi kr-i ta pra yat+naHkha lo b+ha ba t+ye ba kha re swa b+hA baH/_/byA lAHpha NA rat+na ru tsi
[\[32a.2\]]kyi brtul zhugs rnams kyi zhi bzhin mdzes/_/sred ldan rngon ba'i yon tan bsdu ba ni/_/srog ni 'phrog byed ci zhig brjod pa'am/_/rig pa'i khyad par dag la 'bad byas kyang /_/mi bsrun nges par brlang po'i rang bzhin nyid/_/gdengs ka'i rin chen mdzes
[\[32a.3\]]raM da d+hA nAHkrU rat+na maHkro d+ha ma yaM ba han+ti/_/shAs+t+ro pa de shaiHpa raM mr-i dz+ya mA naHpra san+na tAM ya ti na nA mAH/_/kar+pU ra pU raiHpa ri pU ri to pi nodz+dz+ya ta sa kyaM la shu naHswa gan+d+hAM/_/tsi raM
[\[32a.4\]]'dzin sprul rnams ni/_/gdug pa'i mun pa khro ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin/_/bstan bcos man ngag rnams kyis dag byas kyang /_/nges par blo ngan rab dang nyid mi 'gyur/_/ga pur tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos gyur kyang /_/mi bzad sgog pa rang gi dri mi gtong /_/yun
[\[32a.5\]]bi tsAr+Ye ti sa sad+gu NAr+thI na po pa de shaHshra ba NA b+hi lA ShAta/_/pra yats+tsha suk+taM k+Shi ti b+h+r-it+ta TA grA ta t+yak+Sh+ya mi pash+tsat+ta nu mi t+yu bA tsa/_/shru twA ba tsaHsa t+ya d+ha na s+ya ta s+ya hA raM sa mA dA ya ru tsAM bi
[\[32a.6\]]ring 'di spyad yon tan don gnyer des/_/gsar pa'i nyer bstan nyan par mngon 'dod las/_/legs bshad stsol cig sa 'dzin ngos rtse las/_/phyi nas lus 'di dor bar bya zhes smras/_/bden pa'i nor ldan de yi tshig thos nas/_/do shal 'od kyis gtsug lag
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ha raM/_/pra gr-i h+ya tA mi t+ya bi d+hA ya suk+Sh+maM pra tsak+t+ra me yuk+ta shak+taH/_/pA paM sA yaM swa su kha sha ra Ne na spr-i shet+tI bra tA paM shI lAts+tshA laM ku sha la pa da naM pu N+ye pad+maM b+he dzeta/_/
[\[32b.2\]]khang blangs te/_/gzung bar mdzod ces brjod nas phra mor ni/_/rigs pa min la chags pas brjod par brtsams/_/rang bde 'am lam gyi rtag tu gdung byed sdig dang nyon mongs reg mi bya/_/tshul khrims kyis kyang dge ba'i gnas kyi bsod nams tshogs la mchog tu bsten/_/
[\[32b.3\]]tsit+ta tsai tats+tsa pa la bi Sha yA swA da saM bA da nuts+baM kur+YAt+pI ta spr-i ha ma b+hi ma tA nan+ta saM to Sha tr-ib+taM/_/i daM su ga ta shA sa naM pra sha ma rA dz+ya siM hA sa naM nr-i NAMbya sa na bA ra NaM ku sha la
[\[32b.4\]]g.yo ba'i yul gyi nyams myong dag la lhag par chags pa'i sems 'di ni/_/chags dang bral zhing mngon 'dod mtha' yas chog shes dag gis tshim par bya/_/'di ni bde gshegs bstan pa dag dang rab zhi rgyal srid seng ge'i khri/_/mi rnams dag gi gdung ba
[\[32b.5\]]d+har+m+ma sa d+ha ra NaM/_/ma no b+ha ba bi sar+dz+dza naM b+ha ba bi kA ra san+tar+dz+dza naM ma no mu ku ra mardza naM su kr-i ta sany+tsa yo pArdza naM/_/saM brA s+ye ti su b+hA Shi taM mr-i ga ri posta twA nu pA rI nr-i paHsUk+tAr+thA
[\[32b.6\]]skyob byed dge ba'i chos ni thun mong nyid/_/yid phyung rnam par sel bar byed pa'i rnam 'gyur dag ni kun tu 'joms/_/yid kyi me long dag byed legs byas tshogs ni nye bar sgrub pa yin/_/legs bshad 'di ni mi bdag de nyid rjes su 'brang bas ri dgas dgra las
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]hr-i da ye ni d+hA bi ma la naM taM tsAt+ma saM she pi naM/_/A ru h+yA dri shi raHsa mun+na ta ta raM de haM sa mut+p+r-iSh+Ta bA niSh+Ta sa t+ya ma tAM tsa pu N+ya ma na saM ne dam pa push+tsaMny+tsa laM/_/saM tA
[\[33a.2\]]rnyed/_/legs don dri med bdag nyid dag byed de yang snying la rnam bkod nas/_/shin tu mtho ba'i ri yi rtse mor 'dzegs nas lus ni rab tu btang bar gyur/_/bsod nams yid ldan rnams ni shin tu bden pa 'dod kyi g.yo ba'i lus 'di min/_/'gro rnams
[\[33a.3\]]ra NA ya dza ga tAM pra Ni d+hA na man+tar+d+h+r-i twA sa shai la shi kha rAn+ni pa pA ta yA bta/_/tA bta gi ris+thi ti dzu bo bi dza yA b+hi d+he na yak+She Na rak+Shi ta ta nuHk+Shi ti mA sa sA da/_/tadwIr+Ya bisma ya ba sho di ba
[\[33a.4\]]yang dag bsgral slad smon lam dag ni nang nyid du/_/bzung nas de ni ri yi rtse las ji srid lhung gyur pa/_/de srid ri yi gnas bsten rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i/_/gnod sbyin gyis bsrungs lus ni sa la rab tu phyin par gyur/_/de yis brtson 'grus ya mtshan dbang gis
[\[33a.5\]]g+hur+N+Na mA ne lo ke tra ye ku su ma baR+Shi Ni tsAM ta rI k+She/_/saM pU dz+ya mA na tsa ri tas+t+ri da sha bra dze na rA dzA dza gA ma sha na kairni dza ra dza d+hA nIM/_/ta tro pa de sha bi Sha ye Na
[\[33a.6\]]bzhin du 'jig rten gsum/_/'dar bar gyur cing bar snang las kyang me tog char babs tshe/_/gnas skabs gsum pa'i tshogs kyis spyod tshul yang dag mchod gyur pa'i/_/rgyal po dal gyis rang gi rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song /_/de nas de ni phan par rab zhugs sa
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]su b+hA Shi te na te nA ni shaM dza na ma she Sha ma tha k+Shi tI shaH/_/tsakre b+ha bA b+hi b+ha ba shar+m+ma ni d+har+m+ma ni t+ye sat+kar+m+ma Ni pra Ni hi tAM hi ta saM pra br-it+taH/_/a trAn+ta re bi pa Ni bar+t+ma ni lub+d+ha ke sau hA ra s+ya bi
[\[33b.2\]]yi dbang po yis/_/nye bar bstan pa'i yul can legs par bshad pa de yis ni/_/rtag tu skye bo ma lus srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa/_/chos kyi bde ba rtag pa dam pa'i las la 'god pa bsgrubs/_/gnas skabs 'dir ni tshong 'dus dag gi lam du rngon pa 'di/_/do
[\[33b.3\]]kra ya d+hi yA pa ri bar+t+ta mA naH/_/tsau ro ya mi t+ya sa ma sA ha pa kam+pa mA naHk+Sh+mA pr-i ta sa tAM na ga ra rak+Shi dza ne na nI tAH/_/dU rA de ba s+phu Ta ta ra ka rA sak+ta bi s+phA ra hA ra prA NA g+hA tai rbi hi
[\[33b.4\]]shal btsong ba'i blo yis yongs su rgyu bar byed pa na/_/'di ni chom rkun pa zhes mtshungs med bab col 'dar ldan pa/_/sa bdag mdun sar grong khyer srung ba'i skye bos khyer bar gyur/_/ring po nyid nas do shal 'od zer rab gsal rnam 'phro chags gyur pa/_/srog ni
[\[33b.5\]]ta sa ma yaM taM pa ri dz+nyA ya rA dzA/_/A tsAr+Yo yaM sha ma sa gu Na byak+ta sUk+to pa deSh+Ta pU dzAr+d+ho bA bi ti kr-i ta na ti mA na yi twA t+ya dzat+tam/_/i t+yA sIt+su b+hA Shi tA khya nr-i pa tiH
[\[33b.6\]]'joms pa'i dam tshig bsgrubs pa de ni rgyal pos shes gyur nas/_/'di ni bdag gi slob dpon zhi ba'i yon tan gsal ba'i legs bshad ston/_/mchod 'os 'di zhes btud byas mchod pa byas nas de ni btang bar gyur/_/de ltar mi bdag legs bshad ces bya
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]sa t+ya bra taHsa twa bAn samyak+bo d+hi ni d+ha na lab+d+ha ma hi mA kA le na so ham+pu nAH/_/shru twai tat+ka thi taM ni dzaM b+ha ga ba tA brat+taM su rA NAM pa ti b+he dze haR+Sha bi bud+d+ha lo tsa na ba naH
[\[34a.2\]]bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying stobs ldan par gyur/_/de nyid dus kyis slar yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub gter thob bdag nyid nga yin no/_/rang gi spyod tshul bcom ldan gyis bshad de dag thos nas lha rnams bdag po ni/_/dga' bas spyan gyi nags tshal
[\[34a.3\]]pad+mA ka ra s+ya shri yaM/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM su b+hA Shi ta ga be Sh+ya ba dA naM tri pany+tsa shaHpal+la waH//_//
[\[34a.4\]]rnam par rgyas pa pad+mo'i 'byung gnas dpal bsten gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las legs bshad 'tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//
[\[34a.5\]]sh+lA g+h+yaHsha shAM ki ru tsi raHpr-i thu kIr+t+ti b+hA dzAM shaM khaHshi khA ma Ni ra khin+na pa to pa kA raH/_/yaHsA d+hu shap+da ba sa tirga ta dzI bi to pi lo ka s+ya maM ga la ni d+hiHku sha laM ta no ti/_/b+ha ga ban+puSh+pi
[\[34a.6\]]rgya cher grags pa bsten pa'i bsngags 'os ri bong can ltar mdzes/_/gtsug gi nor bu gzhan gyi don la skyo ba med pa'i dung /_/gang gi srog ni song bar gyur kyang legs pa'i sgra yis gnas/_/bkra shis gter gyis 'jig rten dag gi dge ba rgyas par byed/_/me tog can ma
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]lA nA ma bi nI yak+Sha Na dA tsa rimra/_/bi dza hA ra ha ri brA ta niHshaM ka ha ri Na ba ne/_/ta trA nu yA yi na pr-i Sh+TaHpu naHshakre Na sa smi taH/_/sa pUr+b+ba tsa ri taM smr-i twA smi ta kA ra Na ma b+h+ya d+hAtra/_/
[\[34b.2\]]zhes pa yi/_/mtshan rgyu btul nas bcom ldan 'das/_/ri dgas 'phrog byed brtul zhugs ni/_/dogs med ldan pa'i tshal na bzhugs/_/der ni rjes song brgya byin gyis/_/slar yang 'dzum ldan dag la dris/_/de yi mngon spyod dran gyur nas/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rab tu gsungs/_/
[\[34b.3\]]dwA sap+ta ti sa ha shrAb+da dir+g+hA yu Shi dza ne pu rA/_/a b+hUt+ma hen+d+ra ba t+yA khyA dzi ta swargot+pa bA pu rI/_/ma hen+d+ra se na i t+yAsIt+ta s+ya ba su ma tI pa tiH/_/yash+tsa kre kIr+t+ti kar+pu ra ba t+yA bi ti mi ra di shaH/_/ri pu dar+p+pa
[\[34b.4\]]lo ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/_/skye bo tshe ring gyur tshe sngon/_/grong khyer dbang chen ldan zhes pa/_/mtho ris dga' ba thul bar gyur/_/der ni nor gyi blo gros bdag_/dbang chen sde zhes bya ba byung /_/gang gi grags pa ga pur gyi/_/sdong bus phyogs ni mun bral byas/_/gang zhig sman
[\[34b.5\]]dz+wa ra ha raHkraMts+tsh+ra hr-id+du d+da shA dzu ShAM/_/bya d+hat+t+r-iSh+NA sa ha swas+thA yaHsad+d+her+Ya i ba pra dzAH/_/ta s+yA b+hU ta pu N+ya saM b+hA ra i ba sA kA raM ga taH/_/pu traHsa two Sha d+ho nA ma sarba satwa hi to d+ya
[\[34b.6\]]pa dam pa bzhin/_/dgra yi grags pa'i rims bcom zhing /_/skabs ngan bsten pa'i nad phrogs te/_/skye rgu sred bral rnal gnas bsgrubs/_/bsod nams tshogs ni rnam bcas nyid/_/gyur pa bzhin du de yi bu/_/sems can kun la phan brtson pa/_/sems can sman
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]taH/_/sa b+ha dra kalbi ka bo d+hi satwaHsa twa bi b+hU Shi taH/_/sa ka ru NA mu di to pe k+Sha mai tri NAM bal+la b+ho b+ha bta/_/pu ra grA ma ba nAn+ta b+h+yo dig+d+wipe b+h+yash+tsa sar+b+ba taH/_/
[\[35a.2\]]zhes bya bar gyur/_/de ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas brgyan/_/snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang /_/byams pa rnams kyi grogs su gyur/_/grong dang grong khyer nags mtha' dang /_/phyogs dang gling rnams thams cad nas/_/
[\[35a.3\]]ro gi no pe b+h+ye t+ya sa ta ti tat+s+paR+shA t+s+wAs+thA mA ya yuH/_/sa ko s+ye sminy+dza na ba ne su dza nash+tsan+da nA ya te/_/pa ro pa kA ra ma ta nun+ta nur+Ya s+ya ta no t+ya laM/_/sa dIr+g+ha byA d+hi dag+d+hA nAM bi da d+he sa ha sa su
[\[35a.4\]]nad pa 'ongs rnams rtag tu ni/_/de yis reg pas bsos par gyur/_/skye bo'i nags 'dir dam pa de/_/tsan+dan bzhin du ci yang spyod/_/gang gi lus kyi gzhan phan 'di/_/mi chung rab tu rgyas par byed/_/chen po'i nad kyis gdungs pa rnams/_/de yis 'phral la bde bar
[\[35a.5\]]khaM/_/durdza nA yA sa tap+tA nAM mi ba sA d+hu sa mA ga maH/_/ro ge spaR+she na sha rI re mA na se dra bi Ne na tsa/_/kr-i te te nAr+thi nAM dik+Shu nAr+t+to b+hUn+na tsa yA tsa kaH/_/ta taHkA la bi lA
[\[35a.6\]]bsgrubs/_/ngan pa'i nyon mongs gdung ba rnams/_/dam pa dag dang 'grogs pas bzhin/_/don gnyer rnams kyi lus kyi nad/_/reg pa dang ni sems kyi yang /_/nor gyi phrogs pas phyogs rnams su/_/nad pa med cing slong med gyur/_/de nas dus kyi rtse dga' ni/_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]se na sar+b+bA sh+tsar+Ya pa ha ri NA/_/sa ya yau ni d+ha naM shrI mAn dza na puN+ya pa rik+Sha yAta/_/su d+hAM shurne trA NAM ka ti pa ya di nA swA d+ya ma hi mA k+Sha Nas+thA yAM bar+g+gaHsu ra b+hi gu Na sargaHsu ma na sAM/_/
[\[35b.2\]]ngo mtshar thams cad 'phrog byed pas/_/skye bo'i bsod nams yongs zad las/_/dpal ldan de ni mtho ris song /_/bdud rtsi'i zer ni nyin 'ga' mig rnams dag gi myang bya'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/yon tan dri bzang spro ba'i me tog rnams ni skad cig gnas pa'i tshogs/_/
[\[35b.3\]]a kA le kA le ts+tsh+ra pr-i ya ta ra sa mu ts+tshe da tsa ru rA bi d+hat+te ka s+ye ShA ki ma pi na ma naHsha l+ya ka la nAM/_/yeta pe sha laM bi pu la pu N+ya pa Nai ra bAp+taM sar+b+bAr+t+ti b+hai Sha dza ma yat+na su kha k+Sha Ne na/_/
[\[35b.4\]]dus min dus ni 'dod pas mchog tu dga' ba shin tu gcod la mkhas/_/ci yang 'di ni su yi yid la zug rngu lta bur bsgrub ma yin/_/gang zhig yid 'ong bsod nams yangs pa'i zong gis rnyed gyur pa/_/gdung ba kun gyi sman dang 'bad med bde ba skad cig gis/_/
[\[35b.5\]]tat+tad+pi lo kya ki la kA la ka lA ba lI d+ha mUd+hAHspr-i shan+ti na bi be ka la baM ka dA tsi tra/_/a tha tasmin ya shaHshe She t+yak+t+wA dwi ra hod+b+ha baM/_/duHkhaM swa duHkhaM me bA dau b+he dze ro ga ma yAdz+dza naH/_/lak+Sha
[\[35b.6\]]nges par dus kyi cha yis 'joms pa de de mthong gyur nas/_/blun po rnams ni dben pa'i cha la nam yang mi reg go/_/de nas de grags lhag ma'i tshe/_/dang po de bral las skyes pa'i/_/sdug bsngal btang nas nad rang bzhin/_/skye bo rang gi sdug bsngal bsten/_/de nas
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]No dz+nyaiHku mA ra s+ya sha rI raM man+t+ri b+hista taH/_/n+yastaM hi tA ya lo kA nAM ba no pAn+ta su rak+Shi ta/_/tasmin+buski rA Ni ra mya de sha phul+la la tA ku le/_/a par+Yu Shi ta me bA sIt+tA s+ya pu N+yo pa me
[\[36a.2\]]gzhon nu dag gi lus/_/mtshan nyid shes pa'i blon po yis/_/nags kyi mtha' ru rab bsrungs te/_/skye bo rnams la phan slad bkod/_/me tog 'khri shing gis rgyas pa/_/rdzing bu dga' ba'i gnas der ni/_/bsod nams bzhin du de yi lus/_/rnying pa med pa nyid du
[\[36a.3\]]ba suH/_/A sha ga tA di gan+t+re b+h+yaHsarba ro gi ga NAHpu naH/_/ta s+ya saM spaR+sha mA tre Na sa ha sA swas+tha tAM ya yuH/_/taHspr-iSh+Ta mA ru ta bI g+haT+Ti ta pad+ma ShaN+Da hiN+Da ra maN+Da na dza lA su sa ro dza nI Shu/_/
[\[36a.4\]]gnas/_/re bas phyogs mtha' las 'ong ba/_/nad pa'i tshogs kun slar yang ni/_/de yis yang dag reg tsam gyis/_/'phral la bsos pa nyid du gyur/_/de yis reg pa'i rlung gi rnam bskyod pad+ma'i tshogs rnams dang /_/chu la rgyu bas brgyan pas mtsho skyes can gyi chu la ni/_/
[\[36a.5\]]snA tA bi muk+ta sa ka lA ma ya nir+b+ya pA pAHpI tA mr-i tA i ba ba b+hUHsa ha se ba mar+t+YAH/_/satwau Sha d+ha ku mA ro yaHso ha me ba ta dA b+ha baM/_/ya s+ya saM kIr+t+ta na nai ba yA s+yan+ti byA d+ha yak+Sha ya/_/sma ri
[\[36a.6\]]khrus byas mtha' dag nad las rnam grol skyon dang bral gyur cing /_/'phral la nyid du mi rnams bdud rtsi 'thungs bzhin rab tu mdzes/_/gang gi ming ni bsgrags nyid kyis/_/nad rnams zad pa nyid 'gyur ba/_/gang zhig gzhon nu sems can sman/_/der ni nga nyid de tshe gyur/_/dran
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]Sh+ya tosmr-i ti sud+d+hAM ma mai tAM yaHka thA ma pi/_/a d+hi byA d+hi ma ya duHkhaM ta s+ya shAn+ti mu pe Sh+ya ti/_/a sho ko nA ma de shesmin kA le not+pat+s+ya te nr-i paH/_/tsai t+yaM hi tA ya lo ka s+ya yaHpra tiSh+ThA pa yiSh+ya ti/_/i
[\[36b.2\]]ba'i bdud rtsi dag gi gtam/_/'di dag su zhig dran na yang /_/de yi nad gdung rang bzhin gyi/_/sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_/dus kyis yul 'dir mi yi bdag_/gang zhig 'jig rten la phan slad/_/mchod rten rab gnas byed 'gyur ba'i/_/mya ngan med ces bya ba 'byung /_/'chi
[\[36b.3\]]ti su ga to di ta me ka d+hi yA shru twai bA ma ra rA dzaH/_/haR+Sha bi lA sa bi kA shi ta ba da na ru tsA bi ra rA dza/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM sa twau Sha d+ho
[\[36b.4\]]med rgyal po'i blo gcig gis/_/bde gshegs kyis bshad 'di thos nas/_/dga' ba'i rol pa rnam rgyas pa'i/_/bzhin gyi 'od kyis rnam par mdzes/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sems
[\[36b.5\]]nA mA ba dA naM tsa tuHpany+tsa shaHpal+la waH//_//tsin+ta ma NiHki la bi tsi ti ta bstu dA tA kalpa dru mash+tsa pa ri kalpi ta me ba pU te/_/ta s+ya stu tau sa mu tsi tA ni pa rA
[\[36b.6\]]can sman zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//yid bzhin nor bu nges par rnam bsams dngos po ster byed cing /_/dpag bsam shing yang yongs su brtags pa kho na skyed par byed/_/lus ni rab sbyin dam tshig dag la rang nyid
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ni kA ni de ha pra dA na sa ma ye swa ya mu d+ya to yaH/_/g+hA TA pa g+hA Ta ko shastA bi ni yon+ma da gu h+ya kau/_/ke shi nI kA na nA dan+yad+ba na man+tar+hi to ya yau/_/prAg+b+r-it+ta sma ra Na sme ra ba da
[\[37a.2\]]brtson pa gang /_/de dag bstod la yang dag 'os pa'i tshig ni gang zhig yin/_/g+hA Ta a ba g+hA Ta ka_/smyo byed gsang ba pa btul nas/_/skra can nags las mi snang bar/_/ston pa nags tshal gzhan du gshegs/_/der ni sngon byung dran gyur nas/_/bzhin
[\[37a.3\]]naHsmi ta kA ra NaM/_/sa ta tra sr-iSh+TaHshakre Na pra Na yat+pu na ra bri bIta/_/a b+hUt+par+b+ba ti nA ma ba sa tiHsar+b+ba sam+pa dAM/_/na ga rI ga ga nA lag ma Ni harmyAM shu ha si nI/_/A pit+sarba da dasta
[\[37a.4\]]'dzum mdzad la 'dzum pa'i rgyu/_/brgya byin gyis ni gus pas dris/_/de yis slar yang rab gsungs pa/_/grong khyer thams cad ldan pa zhes/_/nor bu'i ba gam nam mkha' la/_/reg pa'i 'od zer rgod pa can/_/phun tshogs kun gyi gnas su gyur/_/der ni rgyal po'i zla ba dag_/
[\[37a.5\]]s+yA rA dz+yen+du ra ma lad+Yu tiH/_/ya s+ya tri b+hu ba nadz+yot+s+na ba b+hau kIr+t+tirdi bI ni shaM/_/sho b+hA dzu ShaHsu kr-i ta sA ra da shAM bi she Shairlab+d+has+thi tirbi na ya bar+t+ma ni b+ha tramUr+t+tiH/_/ya s+ya ya yau bi
[\[37a.6\]]dri med 'od ldan kun ster byung /_/gang gi grags pa zla 'od kyis/_/srid gsum nyin dang mtshan mor mdzes/_/mdzes ldan legs byas snying po'i gnas skabs dag gi khyab par gyis/_/'dul ba'i lam du gnas pa thob cing gzugs bzang ldan gyur pa/_/gang gi legs smra dul
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]dza ya maN+Da na diN+Di ma twaM dA ne na kuny+dza ra pa te ri ba sA d+hu bA deH/_/sa ka dA tsin+p+ra dzA kAr+Ya daR+sha nA nu gra hon+mu khaH/_/b+he dze bA h+yAM ga nas+thA na b+hu baM b+hU mi sha ta kra duH/_/sa ta trA nan+ta sA man+ta mau li rat+ne
[\[37b.2\]]ba'i rgyan ldan sgrog pa'i rnga nyid du/_/sbyin pa gyur te glang po'i bdag po dag gi bzhin du'o/_/nam zhig sa yi brgya byin de/_/skye rgu'i bya ba lta byed cing /_/rjes su gzung la mngon phyogs pas/_/phyi rol khyams gnas sa gzhi bsten/_/der ni mtha' yas rgyal phran gyi/_/mgo bo'i
[\[37b.3\]]Shu bim+bi taH/_/shu shrA ba pr-i thi bi kAr+Ya ma saM khyai ri ba bi gra haiH/_/tsan+d+ra kAn+ta ma ye ta s+ya saM krAn+tAHpra Na tAHpu raH/_/pA dA sI thi pu nash+tsin+ta tA paM ta d+ya dzu rar+thi na/_/a trAn+ta re sa dra sta sa
[\[37b.4\]]rin chen la snang des/_/lus ni grangs med dag gi bzhin/_/sa yi bya ba thos par gyur/_/de yi rkang stegs zla shel gyi/_/rang bzhin la ni 'phos gyur cing /_/mdun du rab btud slong ba rnams/_/slar yang bsam pa'i gdung ba btang /_/skabs der phug ron rab skrag cing /_/
[\[37b.5\]]bak+Sha k+Sha ya i bA ga tiH/_/pA ra ba taHk+Shi ti pa te rU ru mU la ma shi shri ya ta/_/ta kA ta ra ta ro tra b+hA ta ne traM saM ko tsi tAM ga kaM/_/dr-iSh+TA da yA b+hi d+he yo b+hU ta sa ha sA pr-i thi bI pa tiH/_/sA mut+pul+la ka ma lA lI ka ma
[\[37b.6\]]'dab gshog zad pa bzhin du ni/_/'gro ba med pas sa bdag gis/_/byin pa'i rtsa ba rab tu bsten/_/rab skrag mig ni 'khrul byed cing /_/yan lag kun tu 'khums pa de/_/mthong nas sa yi bdag po ni/_/'phral la brtse ba'i dbang du gyur/_/'di yi 'jigs pa gang las shes/_/rab
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]li nI i bA ga tiH/_/ku to s+ya b+ha ya mi t+ya shA dr-I shI k+Shi praM bya lo ka yata/_/tasmin+na ba sa re satwa dzi dz+nyA su pA ka shA sa naH/_/ma ya yA lub+d+ha kA kA raHsa ma b+h+ye d+ya bra tI nr-i paM/_/de ba
[\[38a.2\]]rgyas pad+ma'i 'phreng ldan gyis/_/pad+mo can ltar 'od gsal ba'i/_/spyan gyis myur du phyogs rnams bltas/_/skabs der smin pa gsod byed ni/_/snying stobs brtag par 'dod pa yi/_/sgyu mas rngon pa'i rnam par ni/_/'ongs nas mi bdag la smras pa/_/lha gcig
[\[38a.3\]]muny+tsa bi tsA trAp+taM b+ha k+Sh+yaM ma ma bi haM ga maM/_/i yaM naHsa ha dzA br-it+ti ra na br-it+ta ra yA tsa nA/_/ni sarga sid+d+ha me tad+me b+ho dza naM dza ga tI pa te/_/t+ya dza to dzI bi taM nasti pra NA h+ya sha na d+hA ra NAH/_/k+Sha Ne
[\[38a.4\]]yun ring na rnyed pa'i/_/bdag gi bza' ba bya de thong /_/'di ni ma bslangs mi zlog pa'i/_/bdag cag lhan skyes 'tsho ba yin/_/'gro ba'i bdag po bdag gi zas/_/rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa 'di/_/med na 'tsho ba gtong bar 'gyur/_/gang phyer zas ni srog gi zungs/_/dus 'dir
[\[38a.5\]]tasmin+na shats+tshe dAn+ma yi sa t+yak+tA dzI bi te/_/bi nat+k+ShA ti bi lub+tA shA sa pu tA me ku D+ruM bi nI/_/a ka saM k+Sha Ne nai ba yaHka ro ti ba hu rak+Sha yaM/_/sa d+har+m+mo ya tra d+harmAt+ta ta d+harma staM tra kI tr-i shaH/_/ma
[\[38a.6\]]zas ni chad pa las/_/bdag gi 'tsho ba btang gyur na/_/bdag gi khyim thab bu dang bcas/_/re ba chad pas rnams nyams 'gyur/_/chos ldan gang gis gcig nyid ni/_/bsrungs pas gang du mang po dag_/chos las nyams par gyur na bye/_/de la chos ni ci zhig 'dra/_/phug
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]yi pA rA ba t+yAprI t+yA na dwe Sha kartu mar+ha si/_/na hi kA ra Na rA ge Na pra bar+t+tan+te b+ha bdwe d+hAH/_/ya thai bA yaM ta thai bA haM ko bi she kha sta bA ba yauH/_/sarba b+hU ta sa maHsan+taHkr-i sAn+nai ka tra kur+b+ba te/_/i t+yuk+te te
[\[38b.2\]]ron la ni byams pa yis/_/bdag la zhe sdang bya mi 'os/_/gang phyir khyod nyid lta bu ni/_/sgyu ldan chags pas 'jug pa min/_/ji ltar 'di nyid de bzhin bdag_/khyed la nged gnyis bye brag ci/_/dam pa 'byung po kun la snyoms/_/gcig la brtse ba byed pa min/_/des 'di smras tshe mi
[\[38b.3\]]na nr-i pa tirlI naM ka ka na rA bI NA/_/ne b+ha ta bya mi tI bA ha kha gaM prats+tsha d+ya pA Ni nA/_/sa ta taHsnig+d+ha dzI mU ta g+ho Sha gam+b+hI ra ya mi ba/_/u bA tsa sar+b+ba satwAr+t+ti pa ri trA Na kr-i ta k+Sha NaH/_/ma kr-i
[\[38b.4\]]bdag gi_/lag pa gdub bu'i sgra ldan pas/_/'jigs par mi bya zhes smra bzhin/_/bya ni phyag gis rab bsgribs te/_/de nas sems can gzir ba kun/_/yongs bskyab dus ni byas pa yi/_/char sprin 'jam pa'i sgra dbyangs ltar/_/zab pa'i tshig gis rab smras pa/_/skad
[\[38b.5\]]thaHk+Sha Na tr-i s+t+yar+thI bi Sha maM prA Ni bai sha ma/_/tu mya bya thA bi kA ro yaM prA Na sne haHsha rI ri NAM/_/pa ra srA NA pa ha re Na yA br-it+tiHpa ri kal+p+ya te/_/ni br-it+tiH shre ya sAM ma hi pA pa tA paM pra
[\[38b.6\]]cig tshim pa don gnyer bas/_/mi bzad srog chags gsod ma byed/_/lus can srog la chags pa yi/_/gdung ba'i rnam 'gyur mtshungs pa nyid/_/gzhan gyi srog ni phrogs pa yis/_/gang zhig yongs su 'tsho byed pa/_/de yi dge legs ldog 'gyur te/_/gang phyir sdig pa'i
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]yats+tsha te/_/a d+hu nai wA pa rits+tshin+ne ni dzets+tsha sam+ma tA da raM/_/gr-i h+ya tA ma sha naM yad+Yan+ma dar+tha mu pa kalpi taM/_/shru twe ti rA dza ba tsa naM pa ri m+la nA na nAHshwa pa na/_/ba ro pa d+ho ga bi
[\[39a.2\]]gdung ba ster/_/da lta nyid du ma chad par/_/rang 'dod yang dag bzhed cing gus/_/bdag gi don du zas gang gang /_/nye bar bsgrubs pa blang bar mdzod/_/ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/_/yongs su bzhin log shugs rings can/_/longs spyod mchog la
[\[39a.3\]]ma nAHpra t+ya b+hA Sha ta lub+d+ha kaH/_/na pa yaM rA dza b+ho gA nAM ra sA dz+nyA ba na bA si naH/_/na hi sha s+yA sha na nAm+bA sA mo dan+te mo da kai mr-i gAH/_/a lab+d+hA niSh+pa traM ma ru pa ri tsi tAM kaN+Ta ka la tAM ba
[\[39a.4\]]yid byung ba'i/_/rngon pas lan ni rab smras pa/_/bdag cag nags na gnas rnams kyis/_/rgyal po'i longs spyod ro mi shes/_/'bru zas nyams su ma myong ba'i/_/ri dgas la dus dga' ma yin/_/tsher ma'i 'khri shing 'dab med mya ngan dag la yongs 'dris ma thob nas/_/
[\[39a.5\]]ne snig+d+ha sh+yA me ki ma pi ka ra b+haHshu Sh+ya ti shu tsA/_/na kA kaHsat+pA kaM ka ba la ya ti tsU taM bi Sha mi ba swa b+hA bA nAM b+he dA du tsi ta mi ha sar+b+ba s+ya su kha daM/_/rA dzAr+ha b+ho gaM b+hug+d+wa d+ya prA tar+b+hok+t+wA smi kiM pu naH/_/tad+b+hak+taM
[\[39a.6\]]nags tshal ljang zhing snum par rnga mo mya ngan dag gis ci yang skam/_/tsU ta rab smin dug bzhin bya rog gis ni za bar mi byed de/_/rang bzhin dag gi dbye bas 'os pa 'dir ni kun la bde ba ster/_/rgyal la 'os zas ding zos nas/_/nang par slar yang bdag ci za/_/gang zhig nyin
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]su kha mA d+han+te ya da n+ya d+yu na durla b+haM/_/ra so dA rA ha re na hi pa ri tsi tash+nA ti bi ra san+na tiSh+Tha t+ye kA kI ba hu pa ri dza nA raM b+ha pa ti taM/_/ra thA ru D+haHpad+b+h+ya ma ma na sa ma ye sho tsa ti ta rA ma bAp+tAr+tha b+h+raM shaH
[\[39b.2\]]gzhan rnyed dka' min/_/de dag zos na bde ba skyed/_/rgya che ro ldan kha zas yongs 'dris ro dang bral ba zad mi byed/_/'khor gyi rtsom pa mang por lhung rnams gcig pu nyid du gnas mi byed/_/shing rta zhon pa rkang pas 'gro ba'i dus na shin tu mya ngan byed/_/don thob nyams na mi bzad
[\[39b.3\]]ka Sha ti bi Sha ma kle sha pa ru ShaH/_/de ba twad+d+r-iSh+TA dr-iSh+TA nAM sa ta taM nai ba dur+l+la b+haM/_/rA dzAr+ha b+ho dza naM kiM tu dzan+ma pUr+b+baM na me pri yaM/_/mr-i ga yA b+hi ha taM mAn+sA masmA kaM dzI bi tA ya te/_/
[\[39b.4\]]nyon mongs rtsub mor shin tu gdung bar byed/_/lha gcig rgyal po la 'os zas/_/khyod kyi spyan gyis gzigs rnams la/_/rtag tu rnyed dka' min mod kyang /_/skye bar sngon med bdag mi dga'/_/rngon pas mngon par bsad pa'i sha_/bdag cag rnams kyi srog ltar spyod/_/
[\[39b.5\]]tat+s+wa de ha sa mut+k+r-it+taM kha gaM dwi gu Na mar+b+ba tAM/_/tsit+tA ba ShaN+NaHshru twai tad+ba tsa naM sa ha sA nr-i paH/_/pra haR+Sha t+phul+la na ya nAM b+ho ru hasta ma b+hU Sha taH/_/kha ga s+ya ta ba tsa prA NA rak+ShA yai tu l+ya saM sha yai/_/
[\[39b.6\]]des na rang lus rab chod la/_/bya yi nyis 'gyur sbyin par mdzod/_/mi bdag bsam pa 'khrugs pa yis/_/tshig de thos nas 'phral la ni/_/dga' bas spyan gyi chu skyes dag_/rab tu rgyas pas de la smras/_/bya dang khyod kyi srog dag ni/_/bsrung slad mtshungs pa'i the tshom la/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]ma mo pa diSh+TAHspaSh+To ya mu pA yaHsu d+hi yA twa yA/_/u b+ha ya prA Na san+de ha do lA ro ha Na bi hwa laM/_/twa yai ba d+h+r-i ti mA nI taM ba ya s+ye ne ba me ma naH/_/twa d+h+r-iSh+Ti pA sha bad+d+ho yaM
[\[40a.2\]]blo bzang khyod kyi thabs 'di ni/_/gsal bar bdag la nye bar bstan/_/gnyis ka'i srog la the tshom gyis/_/khyogs la zhon pas 'khrugs gyur pa/_/bdag gi yid ni grogs kyis bzhin/_/khyod nyid kyis ni brtan par byas/_/khyod kyi mig zhags kyis bcings
[\[40a.3\]]bi ha gaHpra ti mu ts+ya tAM/_/man+ma saiHkr-i ya tAM tA batra saM pra ti prA Na d+hA ra NaM/_/rA dz+nyA sa t+ya pra ti dz+nye na ka ru N+ya di d+yu dI ri tiH/_/a mA d+yA mu mu hur+b+bid+d+hA bi Sha dig+d+hiHsha rai ri ba/_/na dA nA ba sa
[\[40a.4\]]pa'i/_/bya 'di rab tu gtang bar mdzod/_/da lta nyid du bdag gis shis/_/re zhig srog gi gzungs thag mdzod/_/rgyal po dam bcas bden pa yis/_/snying rje las ni 'di brjod tshe/_/dug ldan mda' yis phug pa bzhin/_/blon po rnams ni rmongs par gyur/_/sbyin pa'i skabs su
[\[40a.5\]]re bA ts+ye sa ci bair+m+me hi tA hi tA hi taM/_/i t+ya b+hUt+sa ma yasta s+ya sha rI ra t+yA ga nish+tsa yaH/_/a tha bra bIn+na ra pa ti stasmai bit+taM pra yats+tsha taH/_/tu l+yamA ro pa ya ti me mAM sa mud+k+r-it+t+ya yasta noH/_/hi ra N+ya baR+Shi Na rA dz+nyA
[\[40a.6\]]phan mi phan/_/grogs kyis bdag la brjod mi bya/_/zhes pa de yi dam tshig gis/_/lus ni gtong bar nges par gyur/_/de nas mi bdag gis smras pa/_/gang zhig bdag gi lus las sha_/bcad nas srang la 'debs byed pa/_/de la nor ni rab tu sbyin/_/de nas rgyal po gser gyi char/_/
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]sa mA hU tAsta to dza naH/_/ku kar+m+ma kU Ni ta d+hi yaHpi d+hA ya shra ba Ne ya yuH/_/e kastu dA ru Na ma tir nam+nA ka pi la piM ga laH/_/a b+hut+ka na ka mA dA ya san+na d+d+haHkru ra karma NiH/_/sa ra lats+tshe dA da k+ShA
[\[40b.2\]]'bebs pas bos pa'i skye bo rnams/_/ngan pa'i las kyi blo rmus phyin/_/rna ba bsgribs shing song bar gyur/_/gdug pa'i blo zhes bya ba gcig_/ser skya'i mig ni ser po yis/_/gser dag blangs nas gdug pa yi/_/las la chas su zhugs par gyur/_/gdug pa'i las ni sog le
[\[40b.3\]]NAM ba krA NAM tsa ni sarga taH/_/kra kA tsA nA mi ba kraut+yA ta ki ma kr-i t+yaM du rAt+ma nAM/_/na shas+t+raM shak+taM yad+bi da la ya ti tat+ke li ba tsa sA na sha kyaM yarbak+tuM ki ma pi ku ru te tats+tsha sa ha sA/_/na sha kyaM
[\[40b.4\]]bzhin/_/drang po gcod la mkhas gyur cing /_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'khyog pa yi/_/gdug pa'i bdag nyid ci mi byed/_/gang gi mtshon gyis mi nus de dag kyal ka'i tshig gis 'joms par byed/_/gang zhig brjod par mi nus ci yang de dag 'phral la sgrub par byed/_/gang zhig bya bar
[\[40b.5\]]kartuM yat+ta da pi kA la ya t+ye ba ma na sA kha laHsar+b+bash+tsaR+YaM ki ra ti tsa ri tai ra pra ti ha taH/_/sa pA rA ba ta mA ro bya tu lA ma tha ma hi pa tiH/_/dak+Shi No kaM sa mut+k+r-it+taM mAn+pa tat+tu l+ya mA da d+he/_/pra tha me
[\[40b.6\]]mi nus de dag kyang ni yid kyis sems par byed/_/ma bsdams glang po dag gi spyod pas ngo mtshar thams cad rgyas par byed/_/de nas de yis phug ron ni/_/srang la gzhal nas sa bdag gis/_/byin pa g.yas pa'i sha dag ni/_/rab bcad de dang mtshungs par bkod/_/de nas sa yi
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ra tha b+hU b+hartuHspr-iSh+Ta ru d+hi ra bin+du b+hiH/_/big+d+hur+N+Na mA nA su tsi raM bi hwa le bA b+ha bat+ma hI/_/pA rA ba te tha gu ru tAM mAn+pe tsa la g+hu tAM ga te/_/dI ya tA mA n+ya dut+k+r-it+t+ya mAM sa mi t+yA ha b+hU pa tiH/_/kr-it+to ru
[\[41a.2\]]bdag po yi/_/khrag thigs dang po reg pa yi/_/'khrugs pa bzhin du sa gzhi ni/_/yun ring rnam par g.yos par gyur/_/de nas phug ron lci ba dang /_/sha ni yang ba nyid gyur tshe/_/sha ni gzhan dag rab chod la/_/byin zhes sa yi dag pos smras/_/brla dang dpung
[\[41a.3\]]b+hu dza mAM se pi na prAp+te kha gaM tu l+ya tAM/_/trai lo kya saM sha ya tu lA mA ru ro ha tu lA nr-i pa taH/_/nr-i pa tau swa ya ma rU D+he snA yu she Sha ta nau tu lAM/_/tat+yA gA dur+g+ra hong+pig+nA ya yau kIr+t+tardi gan+ta
[\[41a.4\]]pa'i sha bcad kyang /_/bya dang mtshungs pa nyid ma gyur/_/'jig rten gyi ni the tshom dang /_/mtshungs pa'i sang der mi bdag bzhugs/_/mi bdag chu rgyus lhag ma'i lus/_/rang nyid srang la 'dzegs pa'i tshe/_/de yi gtong ba bzung dka' bas/_/yid byung grags pa phyogs mtshams
[\[41a.5\]]raM/_/tasmin k+Sha Ne k+Shi ti pa te ra pa ri k+Sha te nA d+haiR+Ye Na bisma ya ma yas+t+ri da shAM ga nA nAM/_/mam+mal+la mA l+ya pa ri pU ri ta pA Ni pad+maHpU dzA da raHki ma pi tats+tsha ri tA ba b+hU baH/_/nir+b+bi kA raM sa mA lokya
[\[41a.6\]]song /_/de yi dus nas yi bdag po dag gi brtan pa 'di/_/nyams pa med pas ya mtshan gyur pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams/_/gtsug phud 'phreng bar 'os pa'i pad+mos yongs gang lag pa yis/_/de yi spyod tshul dag la mchod pa'i gus pa ci yang byung /_/rnam 'gyur med par sa yi bdag_/
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]tu la rU D+ha ma hI pa tiM/_/krU ra kA rI sa pa prats+tsha pu ru Sha staM sa sA y+wa saH/_/a ne na de ha dA ne na na dzA ne kiM ta bes+sa tiM/_/sar+b+ba lA b+ha sa ma raM b+ha sha rI rAr+thA hi de hi nAM/_/sa t+yaM bru hi ta nu n+yA ge tsit+taM ya
[\[41b.2\]]srang la 'dzegs pa mthong gyur nas/_/skyes bu gdug pa byed pa po/_/skrag bcas de yis de la dris/_/lus kyi sbyin pa 'di yis ni/_/khyod ni ci bzhed yongs mi shes/_/gang phyir lus can rnyed pa kun/_/yang dag rtsom pa lus kyi don/_/gal te lus ni btang la sems/_/nyams
[\[41b.3\]]di na khaN+Di taM/_/i ti bru bA NaM taM rA dzA ba b+hA She sa smi tA na naH/_/na prA pya masti me kiny+tsita lo kesmin+kiM twa nu tat+ta rAM/_/hi tA ya sarba dza ga tAM samyak+saM bo d+hi mar+tha ye/_/a khaN+Di ta mi daM tsit+ta ya di sa
[\[41b.4\]]pa med dam bden par smros/_/zhes smras de la rgyal po ni/_/bzhin 'dzum ldan pas rab smras pa/_/'jig rten 'di na thob bya ni/_/bdag la ci yang med mod kyi/_/'gro ba kun la phan pa'i slad/_/bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_/gal te bdag gi sems 'di ni/_/nyams
[\[41b.5\]]t+ye na te na me/_/astu pra kr-i ti mA pan+naM sha rI ra ma pa ri k+Sha taM/_/i t+yu dI ri ta mA tre Na sa t+ya shI la s+ya b+hU pa teH/_/aklI ba tsan+d+ra ru tsi raM rU D+ha bra Na ma b+hUd+ba suH/_/ta taHpA rA ba te pa te lub+d+ha ke
[\[41b.6\]]pa med na bden pa des/_/lus ni yongs su ma nyams shing /_/rang bzhin rdzogs pa nyid gyur cig_/ces pa brjod pa tsam nyid kyis/_/sa bdag bden pa'i ngang tshul gyis/_/lus kyi rma ni rab gsos te/_/ma nyams zla ba ltar mdzes gyur/_/de nas phug ron rngon pa dag_/song zhing sa
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ba ma hot+pa baH/_/b+hU pA la b+hA swa du da ye pra kA sha bi b+ha bo b+ha bta/_/sar+b+ban+da daHk+Shi ti pa tiHki la yo ba b+hU bA so haM pi ShaM ga pu ru ShaHsa tsa de ba dat+taH/_/tad+b+r-it+ta saM sma ra Na taHpra sr-i tasmi to haM shru twe
[\[42a.2\]]skyong 'od ldan ni/_/shar tshe spro ba chen po dang /_/rab gsal 'byor pa ldan par gyur/_/gang zhig nges par sa yi bdag po thams cad ster gyur pa/_/de nyid nga yin skyes bu ser skya de yang lha sbyin no/_/de yi sngon byung yang dag dran nas bdag gis 'dzum pa spros/_/zhes pa
[\[42a.3\]]tishAstu rA ma rA d+hi pa tin+na nan+dan/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM sar+b+ban+da dA ba dA naM pany+tsa pany+tsa shaHpal+la waH//_//san+daR+sha
[\[42a.4\]]ston pa las thos 'chi med bdag po dga' bar gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las thams cad ster ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//gang dag
[\[42a.5\]]ne na ye ShAM dwe Shi bi ShoSh+mA pra shAn+ti mu pa yAn+ti/_/a mr-i ta ra sa shI ta la ste ka s+ya na su dza nan+da bo ban+d+ya/_/d+hA rA mu kha s+yad+Ya k+Sha s+ya s+thAnA dan+tirda tasta taH/_/k+Sha NA da bA pa b+ha ga ban+na ga raM hiM gu marda naM/_/
[\[42a.6\]]mthong bas zhe sdang dug gi ni/_/tsha ba rab tu zhi ba nyid gyur cing /_/bdud rtsi'i ro bsil skye bo dam pa yi/_/zla ba de dag su yi phyag 'os min/_/gnod sbyin kha rnon dag gi gnas/_/de las snang ba min gyur te/_/grong khyer hing gu ma da nar/_/skad cig gis ni bcom ldan byon/_/
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bi na yA t+pU dzi tasta dra brah+ma dat+ta na b+hU b+hu dzA/_/tat+saM da k+Shi NaM tsakre d+ha n+yA nA ma nu shA sa naM/_/ta tra pau rAHsa ma b+h+ye t+ya b+ha ga ban+taM bya dzIr+N+Na ShuH/_/sar+b+ba sad+bi ni pa te Shu trA tA raM sarba de hi
[\[42b.2\]]der ni sa bdag tshangs byin gyis/_/dul ba yi ni mchod pa byas/_/de yis yang dag rjes mthun par/_/skal ldan rnams la rjes bstan mdzad/_/der ni grong pa rnams 'ongs te/_/rgud pa kun tu lus can rnams/_/rnam par lhung la skyob mdzad pa'i/_/bcom ldan 'das la rab gsol
[\[42b.3\]]nAM/_/b+ha ga ban+nasti na ga ra s+yAn+te sA ShA Na sar+b+ba taH/_/ta tra go pA la ko nA gaHkrU ro ba sa ti duHsa haH/_/sa pa shU nAM dzi nA nAny+tsa sha s+yA nAny+tsa ma hA sha niH/_/sam+pan+nA nA ma b+hA bA ya na bid+maHke na nir+m+mi taH/_/a dAn+ta da ma
[\[42b.4\]]pa/_/grong khyer mtha' na bcom ldan 'das/_/rdo ba yi ni ri zhig yod/_/de na klu ni ba lang skyong /_/drag po bzod par dka' ba gnas/_/de ni phyugs dang skye bo dang /_/'bru rnams kun gyi rdo rje che/_/phun sum tshogs rnams dngos med slad/_/ca yis rnam sprul rig ma gyur/_/ma dul 'dul
[\[42b.5\]]na s+yasmin+na shAn+ta sha ma na s+ya te/_/u ba sarge kr-i pAsmA kaM shar Na sha ra Nai Shi NA ma/_/i t+yuk+t+wA te Shu d+hA te Shu b+ha ga bAn ka ru NA ni d+hiH/_/an+tar+hi ta pra b+hA ma d+h+yA ta ya yau pA ShA Na b+hU d+ha raH/_/ta Te bi saM
[\[42b.6\]]mdzad ma zhig_/zhi mdzad khyod kyi brtse ba ni/_/nye bar 'tshe ba 'di dag la/_/bdag cag skyabs 'tshol rnams kyi skyabs/_/zhes brjod de dag song ba'i tshe/_/bcom ldan snying rje'i gter dag ni/_/'dus pa'i dbus las mi snang bar/_/rdo ba'i sa 'dzin dag tu gshegs/_/de ngos shin tu
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]ka Te ta s+ya b+ha ban b+hI ma b+ho gi naH/_/sa da daR+sha bi Sha shwA sai ri ba sh+yA mI kr-i to da kaM/_/tsa lan+niSh+ko Sha nis+t+riM sha bi Sha mormi ba nA ku le/_/tat+tI re b+ha ga bAnUd+d+haHpaR+YaM ka sa mu pA
[\[43a.2\]]stug po na/_/'jigs rung gdengs can khang pa ni/_/dug gi dbugs rnams dag gis chu/_/sngon por byas bzhin de yis mthong /_/ral gri shubs med g.yo ba yi/_/mi bzad rba rlabs kyis 'khrugs nags/_/de yi 'gram du bcom ldan gyis/_/skyil krung bcas te
[\[43a.3\]]bi shata/_/pra san+nA lo ka na su d+hA ban+d+hu nA snig+b+ha tsak+Shu Sha/_/sa ni nA shu sa bi ShaM bi ShaM nir+b+bi Sha tA mi ba/_/nI lAM bu bim+bi ta ta nu sa ba b+hau ka na kad+Yu tiH/_/ra birma ra ka tats+tsha yaM gA ha
[\[43a.4\]]nye bar bzhugs/_/mnyes gshin spyan ni bdud rtsi'i gnyen/_/dang bas rab tu gzigs pa yis/_/de yis myur bar dug bzhin du/_/dug dang bcas pa dug med thob/_/sku lus gser 'od mthing ga yi/_/chu la snang bas de rab mdzes/_/ma ra ka ta ltar mdzes pa'i/_/mkha'
[\[43a.5\]]mA na i bAM ba raM/_/ti mi raM nA ga b+ha ba ne tat+p+ra kA sha bi su tri taM/_/pa lA ya ma n+ya pyA lo la byA la dza lA tu lAM ya yau/_/nA ga rA dzasta mA lokya ru d+hi rA ru Na lo tsa naH/_/sa ha sA kA sha mA bi sh+ya tsakre
[\[43a.6\]]la nyi ma 'gro ba bzhin/_/de yi snang bas rnam bcom pas/_/klu yi khang par rab rib rnams/_/'bros par byed pa g.yo ba yi/_/sbrul gyi tshogs dang mtshungs par gyur/_/klu yi rgyal pos de mthong nas/_/mig ni khrag ltar dmar ba yis/_/'phral la nam mkhar rab zhugs te/_/'gro ba
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]me g+ha ma yaM dza gatra/_/kro d+hAg+ni d+hU ma na ba tai ri ba ta s+ya g+ha nod+ga maiH/_/bi t+yudz+dzi hwai ra kam+pan+ta di gaHpan+t+ra si tA i ba/_/gardzi tair+m+mat+ta me g+hA nAM pra lA yA raM b+ha gaM si b+haH/_/gu hA ge hA n+ya b+ha h+yan+ta hr-i da
[\[43b.2\]]sprin gyi rang bzhin byas/_/de yi khro ba'i me yis ni/_/du ba'i tshogs bzhin stug po las/_/rab 'thon glog gi lce rnams kyis/_/phyogs rnams skrag pa bzhin du 'dar/_/myos pa'i sprin rnams dag gi sgra/_/'jigs pa rtsom par sgrogs byed pas/_/sa 'dzin rnams kyi snying bzhin du/_/phug
[\[43b.3\]]yA nI ba b+hU b+h+r-i tAM/_/ta taHpiSh+Ta kra ma br-iSh+TiHklip+tA dri sa ka lA ba lI/_/sA da pa pA ti ta d+h+r-i tiHs+thU lo pa la ku lA ku lA/_/bA duSh+Ta b+hu dza got+p+r-iSh+Ta br-iSh+Tir+d+r-iSh+T+we ba tA yi naH/_/ya yau bA lA ni lo lal+lA
[\[43b.4\]]dang khang pa zhom par gyur/_/de nas rdo chen tshogs dkrigs char/_/ri 'phreng mtha' dag nyon mongs shing /_/brtan pa ltung byed ljon shing ni/_/phye mar byed pa bab par gyur/_/lag 'gro gdug pas rab spros pa'i/_/char de skyob pas gzigs nyid na/_/rlung bzhon g.yo bas bskyed pa yis/_/
[\[43b.5\]]sa la pata ku su ma baR+Sha tAM/_/dr-iSh+T+wA pra kA bi Sha da dA n+ya nu pa p+la bA ni b+h+rid+go pa gI ta ku su mA ni ba nA ni ta tra/_/haR+Sha smi ta pra sa ra nirdzi ta b+hA ra hA rAHkrU raM pha NIn+d+ra ma ba dan+ba na de ba tAsta/_/
[\[43b.6\]]me tog char pa nyid du gyur/_/der ni rab gsal dri med nags tshal nye bar bslad pa med/_/bung ba glu dbyangs len pa'i me tog dang ldan mthong gyur nas/_/dga' ba'i 'dzum dkrigs do shal khur las nges par rgyal gyur pa'i/_/nags kyi lha yis gdug pa'i gdengs can dbang po de la smras/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]b+hoHkA la me g+ha ni kr-i tiM pa ri muny+tsa kiny+tsaniSh+kam+pa e ba ka na kA tsa la e Sha ya s+ya/_/yuSh+ma dwi d+hAHpra la ya mA ru ta b+ha dz+ya mA nA lI lA ni tam+ba ku ha raM sha ra NaM pra yAn+ti/_/ta taHsad+ya
[\[44a.2\]]kye lags dus kyi sprin dag rnam 'gyur dag ni yongs su thob/_/khyod lta bu rnams 'jigs pa'i rlung gis bcom par gyur pa na/_/gang gi rked skabs phug gi rol pas skyabs su 'gro byed pa'i/_/gser gyi ri bo 'di la ci yang g.yo ba med pa nyid/_/de nas 'phral la
[\[44a.3\]]pa ri k+ShA Na ma daHsaM t+ya k+Sha bi kr-i yaH/_/nA gaHshAsta ra ma b+h+ye t+ya pra na nA ma kr-i tAny+dza liH/_/ta s+ya dza ta s+ya sha ra NaM b+ha ga ban+ka ru NA ni d+hiH/_/shik+ShA pa da pra dash+tsa kre ku sha lA gra ma nu gra haM/_/
[\[44a.4\]]rgyags pas ni/_/yongs su zad cing rnam 'gyur btang /_/thal mo sbyar nas mngon phyogs te/_/klu yis ston pa la phyag 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje'i gter/_/bslab pa'i gnas dag rab byin pas/_/skyabs su song bar gyur pa de/_/dge ba mchog la rjes bzung mdzad/_/
[\[44a.5\]]pra Na ya dar+thi taste na tsa ra NA lAM na mau li nA/_/sa ta taM ta s+ya b+ha ga bAn san+ni d+hi bi da d+he dzi naH/_/tasmin+na ba sa re ta tra pra saM gAp+ta s+ya shAn+ta ye/_/yak+Sha s+ye tsakra b+ha ga bAn badzra pa Ni ra nu gra haM/_/
[\[44a.6\]]zhabs la mgo yis gtugs pa de/_/gus pa yis ni gsol btab pa/_/bcom ldan rgyal bas rtag tu ni/_/de la yang dag nye bar mdzad/_/gnas skabs der ni de nyid du/_/gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dag_/zhar la 'ongs pa zhi ba'i slad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung mdzad/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]lo ko pa tA pa ma sa ma bi ni bAR+Ya shAstA bistA ri tastu ti pa das+t+ri da shA ts+ya mA naH/_/b+he dze ba nA ni bi ha ran+na tha pUr+b+ba bud+d+haHbA dAmU dza pra Na ya sU ta shi lA ta lA niH/_/ta tra san+daR+sha
[\[44b.2\]]de nas 'jig rten gdung ba mi bzad rnam zlog ston pa ni/_/rnam rgyas bstod pa'i tshig gis skabs gsum pa yis mchod gyur pa/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs pad dag dang mdza' ba las/_/dag pa'i rdo ba'i gzhi ldan nags tshal rgyu zhing bsten par mdzad/_/de der 'dzum dang
[\[44b.3\]]nAsta ra su ra rA dze na sa smi taH/_/smi ta s+ya kA ra NaM pr-iSh+TaHsarba dz+nyasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/e te Shu pu N+ya pa li lA ma le ni d+ha re Shu ni bai ra sa twa su b+ha ge Shu ta po pa ne Shu/_/d+har+m+mA d+hi bA sa ya
[\[44b.4\]]ldan pa las/_/lha yi rgyal po ltar 'ongs pas/_/'dzum pa'i rgyu dris de la ni/_/thams cad mkhyen pas bka' stsal pa/_/dag byed dri ma med pa'i chu yi rgyun dang ldan gyur cing /_/khon med sems can skal bzang 'khod pa dka' thub dag gi nags/_/chos ni lhag gnas sdom brtson
[\[44b.5\]]ti mA na sa mAs+dza ne Shu shAn+teHpa de Shu na ma yai ba kr-i ta bi hA raH/_/kra ku ts+tshan+daHshrI mAn ka na ka mu ni ra trai ba su ga taHsa samyak+saM bud+d+haHpa tsa bi ma li d+hIHkA sh+ya pa mu niH/_/bi bik+te smin siM hi sta
[\[44b.6\]]rnams kyi yid ni dag byed pa/_/zhi ba'i gnas 'di dag tu nga nyid kho nas rol byas min/_/seng ge'i nu 'og ri dgas phrug gu rgyu ba dben pa'i nags tshal 'dir/_/brgya byin dpal ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang bde gshegs gser thub de dang ni/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]na ta la tsa lad+bA la ha ri Ne ba ne tsa kruHshakra s+thi ti ma khi la lo kar+t+tib+hi Sha dzaH/_/i ti bru bA NaHsa mu pa ga ta s+ya sa pu N+ya pA ka da tha lub+d+ha ka s+ya/_/san+daR+sha ne nai ba sha man+di de shaM shik+ShA pa dAr+haM sha
[\[45a.2\]]med blo ldan thub pa 'od srungs te/_/mtha' dag 'jig rten gdung ba'i sman pa rnams kyis 'di nyid du gnas mdzad/_/de nas de skad smras des gzigs nyid kyi/_/bsod nams smin la nye bar 'ongs pa yi/_/rngon pa dag ni skyabs su song ba la/_/bslab pa'i gnas 'os zhi ba
[\[45a.3\]]ra NaM ga ta s+ya/_/b+hA gya bAn b+ha ga ba to nu gri ha taHlud+d+ha kaHku sha la lub+d+ha mA na sa/_/tat+p+ra diSh+Ta na kha ke sha lAny+tsha naM ta tra tsai t+ya ma ka ron+m+r-i gA d+hi paM/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa
[\[45a.4\]]bstan pa mdzad/_/skal ldan dge la yid chags rngon pa ni/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bzung ba las/_/der ni mchod rten ri dgas bdag po dag_/des gnas dbu skra sen mos mtshan pa byas/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
[\[45a.5\]]la tA yAM go pA la nA ga da ma naM Sha ShaT+pany+tsa shaHpal+la waH//_//dik+kAn+ta shra ba Not+taM pa tu lA ro pi ta sad+gu NAH/_/te dza yan+ti dza ga d+ye ShAM ya shaHstU bai rbi rA dza te/_/b+ha ga bAn
[\[45a.6\]]gyi 'khri shing las klu ba lang skyong btul ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o//_//phyogs kyi mdzes pa'i rna rgyan dang /_/mtshungs par yon tan dam pa bkod/_/gang zhig grags pa'i mchod rten gyis/_/'gro mdzes de dag rgyal gyur cig_/de nas der ni bcom
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]tha sha kre Na ta tra pra Ni d+hi nAr+thi taH/_/pUr+b+ba bud+d+ha kr-i ta stU po ni dzastu pa ma kA ra yata/_/kr-i te rat+na ma ye ta smin de baiHsUr+ya sha ta twi She/_/dza gA ma dza ga tAM kwA pi ma hA mo ha ba maM ta maH/_/ta tra kiM
[\[45b.2\]]ldan 'das/_/brgya byin gus pas gsol btab pas/_/sangs rgyas snga ma'i mchod rten mdzad/_/rang gi mchod rten byed du bcug_/lha rnams kyis der rin chen gyis/_/rang bzhin nyi 'od brgya ldan byas/_/'gro ba'i rmongs pa chen po dang /_/mtshungs pa'i mun pa ga shed song /_/der ni dri za
[\[45b.3\]]na ra gan d+harba na ra nA ga di bau ka sAM/_/d+har+m+mo pa de sha bi na yaM sa mA di sh+ya ya yau dzi naH/_/pA Sha Na par+b+ba te de bair+n+yastastu pa tsa tuSh+Ta ye/_/b+ha ga bAn+pany+tsa maM stU paM pany+tsa stU pair+n+ya be sha yata/_/a tha bA lok+Sha nA mA
[\[45b.4\]]mi'am ci/_/mi dang klu dang lha rnams la/_/'dul ba'i chos kyi man ngag ni/_/yang dag bstan nas rgyal ba gshegs/_/rdo ba'i ri la lha rnams kyis/_/mchod rten bzhi ni bkod pa la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi lnga pa yi/_/mchod rten mchod rten lnga dag bkod/_/de nas bA lo k+Sha zhes pa'i/_/
[\[45b.5\]]naM de sha prA p+tasta thA ga taH/_/shriSh+Shi nAM su pra bud+d+he na ku be re Ni ba pU dzi taH/_/di de sha d+har+m+ma bi na yaM tasmai ye na sa mA nu gaH/_/mo ha ni drAk+Sha ye na prAp+taHsu pra bud+d+haHpra bud+d+ha taM/_/sa shA sa nAr+b+ha
[\[45b.6\]]yul du de bzhin gshegs pa byon/_/lus ngan gyis bzhin tshong dpon ni/_/legs par rab sad ces pas mchod/_/gang zhig de ni rjes 'brang bcas/_/'dul ba'i chos ni de la bstan/_/rmongs pa'i gnyid sad legs par ni/_/rab sad rab sad nyid thob gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]ga ba taHpu N+ya ni dza mi bon+na taM/_/ba lo k+ShA yI d+hi d+ha stU paM rat+na dI paM n+ya be da yata/_/Dam+ba ra grA ma mA sA d+ya sha nai ra tha ta thA ga taH/_/bi nA ya Dam+ba raM nA ma yak+ShAM shi k+ShA pa da pra daH/_/tsaN+DA
[\[46a.2\]]kyi bka' las des/_/rang gi bsod nams bzhin mtho ba/_/bA lo k+ShI ya zhes pa yis/_/mchod rten rin chen 'bar ba byas/_/de nas dal gyis de bzhin gshegs/_/Dam ba ra yi grong du byon/_/gnod sbyin Dam ba ra zhes pa/_/bslab gnas rab tu byin pas btul/_/gtum
[\[46a.3\]]la grA ma ma b+h+ye t+ya tsaN+DA lI ma li kA b+hi d+hA/_/sa hi tAM sap+ta b+hiHpu trairbi na yon+na tAM bya d+hA ta/_/te kar+m+ma she Sha saM prap+ta mA taM ga ku la dU Shi taH/_/pad+mA ka ra i bA prA pUrbai ma l+ya dzi na daR+sha nI ta/_/an+t+ya
[\[46a.4\]]po'i grong du mngon phyogs te/_/gtum mo ma li ka zhes pa/_/bu bdun dag dang lhan cig nyid/_/'dul ba yis ni mtho bar mdzad/_/las kyi lhag mas gtum po'i rigs/_/thub pas sun phyung de dag rnams/_/rgyal ba mthong las pad+ma yi/_/'byung gnas bzhin du dri med gyur/_/tha shal
[\[46a.5\]]pra du Shi ta ta re Shu dzu gu p+sa te Shu pA po pa tA pa bi pu la bya sa nArta re Shu/_/saM ta pra br-it+ta ka ru NaHku bi kalba hI na dI nA ba lam+ba na ra sA da d+hi kaM b+ha ban+ti/_/a bA s+ya pA Ta
[\[46a.6\]]skyon gyis sun phyung smad pa dag tu 'os gyur cing /_/sdig pa'i nye bar gdung ba chen pos gdungs shing nyen rnams la/_/rnam rtog ngan pa dang bral snying rjes rab zhugs dam pa rnams/_/dman la dmigs pa'i rjes su chags pas lhag par gyur pa yin/_/de nas bde gshegs rjes
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]ma grA maM sA nu gaHsu ga tasta taH/_/d+ha n+yA gr-i ha pa tesh+tsa kre po ta lA khya s+ya sat+ka thAM/_/shik+ShA pa dA sta bai ma l+yeHsu ga tA nu gra he Na saH/_/tat+ke sha na khAM ka s+ya rat+na stU pa ma kA ra yata/_/ta tra
[\[46b.2\]]'brang bcas/_/pA Ta la yi grong khyer byon/_/dpal ldan khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes/_/bya la legs pa'i gtam dag mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs pas rjes bzung bas/_/bslab pa'i gnas thob dri med des/_/de yi dbu skra sen cha yis/_/mtshan pa'i rin chen mchod rten byas/_/de ni bltar
[\[46b.3\]]san+daR+sha na yA taM b+ha ga bA nin+d+ra ma bra bIta/_/mi lin+d+ronA ma rA dzAsmin de she sa stU paM ka re Sh+yati/_/i ti b+ha ga ba taHs+thA ne s+thA ne da yAr+d+ra bi lo ke nA da b+ha ba da khi lo lo kA sho ka pra mo ha b+ha
[\[46b.4\]]'ongs dbang po la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab gsungs pa/_/rgyal po mi lin dra zhes pas/_/yul 'di mchod rten byed par 'gyur/_/de ltar gnas dang gnas su bcom ldan brtse bas brlan pas gzigs pa yis/_/mtha' dag 'jig rten rnams kyi mya ngan rmongs dang 'jigs
[\[46b.5\]]yedz+dzI taH/_/a b+hi na ba kri tastU po ts+tsha ga twa Nan+ma Ni kid+ki NI ku la ka la ka la kr-i DA lo lA ba b+hU ba tsa me di nI/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM
[\[46b.6\]]pa btang bar gyur/_/mchod rten mngon par gsar byas skyibs na nor bu'i dril chung sgra sgrogs pa/_/dar dir tshogs kyi rtsed 'jo dag gis sa gzhi'ang sred pa ldan par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]s+t+wu pA ba dA naM sap+ta pany+tsa shaHpal+la waH//_//a nan+d+yA ban+d+yaste sa ka la ku sha lot+pat+ta ba su d+hAM su d+hAM sid+d+hA man+tarda d+hA ti ki la ye pUr+Na ka ru NAM/_/pra san+nai rA
[\[47a.2\]]las mchod rten gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//rgud pa'i gdung ba zhi byed gzigs pa rab tu dang ba'i ro dag gis/_/skyes bu rnams ni nad dang bral mdzad srid pas zil mnan 'khrugs pa'i sman pa gang /_/nges par dge ba mtha'
[\[47a.3\]]san+na bya sa na sa ma nA lo ka ra sa naiHkr-i tA ro gya pUM sAM b+ha ba pa ri b+ha ba k+Sho b+hi b+hi Sha dzaH/_/na gaR+YAM puSh+ka lA ba t+yAM sa smi taHsmi ta kA ra NaM/_/pu ra rA dze na b+ha ga bAn pr-iSh+TaHpu na ra b+hA Sha ta/_/shrI mAn pu
[\[47a.4\]]dag bskyed pa'i nor 'dzin grub pa'i bdud rtsi ni/_/rdzogs pa'i snying rje nang du 'dzin pa de dag mi smad phyag byar 'os/_/grong khyer pad+mo ldan pa na/_/bcom ldan 'dzum dang bcas pa la/_/lha yi rgyal pos 'dzum pa'i rgyu/_/dris nas slar yang rab gsungs pa/_/dpal ldan bsod
[\[47a.5\]]N+ya ba lo nA ma pu ra b+hUt+p+r-i thi bI pa tiH/_/ya s+yA shI ti sa ha srA Ni na ga rA NAM pa ri gra haH/_/ta s+ya pu N+ya ba ti nA ma rA dza d+hA nI bya rA dza ta/_/s+pha Ti kA kA ra ru tsi rA dz+yot+s+na ba ra dza nI pa te/_/sa ka dA
[\[47a.6\]]nams stobs zhes pa'i/_/sa yi bdag po sngon byung ste/_/gang zhig grong khyer stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin par gyur/_/de yi rgyal po'i pho brang ni/_/bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba ste/_/shel gyi rnam par yid 'ong zhing /_/mtshan mo'i bdag po'i 'od bzhin mdzes/_/skyed tshal gsar
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]tsin+na bo d+yA na yA trA yAM ra tha mA taH/_/da daR+sha sa th+ya bi hA rA ta pa ti sI dan+ta mA tu raM/_/pa taM dr-iSh+T+wA pa ri m+lA naM dIr+g+ha ro ga na durga taM/_/bi bya the ka ru Na krAn+tAHkran+tA khi la di gan+ta raH/_/
[\[47b.2\]]par 'gro ba'i slad/_/nam zhig shing rta zhon pa des/_/lam du phan pa'i zas bral bas/_/nad kyis gzir zhing 'dug pa mthong /_/ring po'i nad kyis mnar ba yis/_/yongs su nyams pa de mthong nas/_/phyogs mtshams ma lus gnon pa de/_/snying rjes zil mnan gdung bar gyur/_/
[\[47b.3\]]san+tap+taM pa ra mA la kya sa d+yaHsaM krAn+taM dar+p+pa NaH/_/san+taHsan+tA pa mA yAn+ti sUR+Ya kAn+ta ma yA i ba/_/sa map+ta dwA ra ra th+yA su sar+b+be Shu na ga re Shu saH/_/ro gi NaM ba k+Sh+ya b+hai Sha dz+ya shA la sha y+YA d+ya kA
[\[47b.4\]]gzhan gyis yongs gdungs mthong gyur na/_/'phral la 'phos te dam pa yi/_/me long rnams ni gdung 'gyur te/_/nyi ma me shel rang bzhin bzhin/_/de yis grong khyer thams cad dang /_/sgo dang srang rnams mtha' dag tu/_/nad pa rnams la zas dang sman/_/gnas dang mal stan la sogs
[\[47b.5\]]ra yatra/_/A di de sha ta taste b+h+yaHku sha lAn+pa ri tsA ra kAn/_/pra tha maM hi tsi ket+pAM gaM byA d+heHsat+pa ri tsA ra ka ra/_/ka ru NAr+d+raHk+Sha maHk+ShAn+tash+tsi kit+sa kA ma teHs+thi taH/_/sne hA da bi tsi kit+pash+tsa durla b+haHpa ri tsA ra kaH/_/
[\[47b.6\]]byas/_/de nas de dag rnams kyi slad/_/rim gro pa ni mkhas pa bskos/_/gang phyir dam pa'i rim gro pa/_/nad gso'i yan lag dang po yin/_/bzod ldan snying rjes brlan zhing bzod/_/gso byed 'dod pa dag la gnas/_/mdza' las the tshom mi byed pa'i/_/rim gro pa ni rnyed pa dka'/_/
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]rA dzA ta taHsa mA hU ya ni ya tAn+pa ri tsa ra kA na/_/a ba dat+k+r-i ya tAM ro ge pa ri tsar+YA di ba ni shaM/_/rA dzAr+ha shA la su kr-i ta ba ra shwa y+YA de kalpa nAH/_/ro gi NAM rat+na so pA nAHpad+mi n+yash+tsa la
[\[48a.2\]]de nas rgyal pos rim gro pa/_/dul ba rnams ni legs bos nas/_/smras pa nyin dang mtshan mor ni/_/nad pa rnams kyi rim gro mdzod/_/rgyal po la 'os gnas rnams su/_/mal stan mchog sogs phun tshogs byas/_/rin chen skas ldan pad+mo can/_/dri med chu ldan
[\[48a.3\]]lo da kAH/_/b+hi Shag+b+hai Sha dz+ya saM pat+tirbi hi tA tsa ma hI ya pI/_/a d+hu nA yuSh+ma dA yat+taM tat+s+wA s+th+ya mi ti me ma tiH/_/san+tA paM sha ma ya t+ya tI bra shi shi raiH_shI taM su khe noSh+ma NA tr-iSh+NA shI ta dza lairmu hurmi ta hi
[\[48a.4\]]nad pa'i phyir/_/sman pa dang ni sman dag kyang /_/phun tshogs shin tu che ba bsgrubs/_/da ni de dag bsos gyur pa/_/khyed kyi gnyer zhes bdag gi blo/_/'jig rten 'dir ni rim gro pa dang brtan pa'i sman pa chos kyi gzhan du mi rnams kyi/_/yongs su gdung ba shin tu bsil ba yis kyang /_/
[\[48a.5\]]tA hA ro ba tsA raiHkla maM/_/swas+tho sI ti d+hi ti pri ye na ba tsa pA he li kra me NA ra tiM lo kesmin+pa ri tsA ra kaHs+thi ra bi Shag+d+harmaHpa ra smin+n+r-i NAM/_/tasmAd+b+ha bad+b+hi stap+tA nAM ro ga yo ge na sI da
[\[48a.6\]]grang ba dag ni bde ba'i dro ba yis/_/sred pa bsil ba'i chu yis dang ni ngal ba yang yang chung ngu phan zas nyer bstabs pas/_/khyod gsos 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i tshig snyan ku re'i rim pas mi dga' ba dag zhi bar byed/_/de yi slad du khyed rnams kyis/_/nad kyis gdungs shing 'gyel
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]tAM/_/kAR+YA mu hurmu hurbA kye ri ya ma shwa sa na smr-i tiH/_/bai d+yo na ba d+yaHsu ga taHpra sA dI d+har+m+mo pa de shaHpa ra mo Shad+hany+tsa/_/saM sA ra dIr+g+ha dz+wa ra sho Shi tA nAM pA rA ya NaM shAn+ti ra pA ya nan+tata/_/
[\[48b.2\]]rnams la/_/yang dang yang du tshig dag gis/_/dbugs dbyung 'di ni dran par byas/_/sman pa skyon med bde gshegs bka' drin dang /_/chos kyi man ngag dam pa'i sman dag kyang /_/'khor ba ri po'i rims kyis bskams rnams kyi/_/dpung gnyen zhi ba'i bcud len de dag yin/_/
[\[48b.3\]]i t+yA diSh+TA nr-i pa ti nA te te na ba su baR+Shi NA/_/ga twA ya tho di taM tsakruHswAs+th+yA yA khi la ro gi nAM/_/ta taHku sha la ba de na te na tad+ga ta mA na sAn/_/byA d+hi muk+tAn+na ra pa tiHswa yaM traSh+TuM bi nir+ya yau/_/sha
[\[48b.4\]]mi bdag nor gyi char 'bebs des/_/de dag rnams la de skad bstan/_/nad pa ma lus gsos bya'i slad/_/song nas ji skad brjod bzhin byas/_/de nas nad grol de dag rnams/_/dge ba brjod pas de la yid/_/song ba rnams la blta ba'i slad/_/mi bdag rang nyid phyi rol byung /_/brgya
[\[48b.5\]]kras+t+wa da pa raHsha kra ta s+ya pu N+ya sa mudz+dz+wA laM/_/ra thaM bi nir+m+ma me yuk+taM Shad+dan+taiHpAN+Du dwi peH/_/su kha spaR+shA ni lA lo la he ma rat+na sa ro ru hA/_/b+h+r-ing+gAM ga no pa gI tA tsa di byA ka ma li nI pa thi/_/te Shu
[\[48b.6\]]byin gyis kyang de la ni/_/gnyis 'thung dkar po mche ba ni/_/drug ldan gyis drangs shing rta dag_/bsod nams rab 'bar rnam par sprul/_/rin chen gser gyi mtsho skyes rnams/_/reg na bde ba'i rlung gis g.yos/_/bung ba'i na chung glu len pa'i/_/lam du mchog gi pad ldan yang /_/rin chen
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rat+na sa ro dza Shu s+thi tA mr-i ta ka lA ku lAH/_/dU ran+n+r-i pa ti mA yan+ta su nAr+Ya She bi re/_/ta s+ya sa twa su d+hA sin+d+hoHsa twaM dz+nyA tuM ma ru t+pa tiH/_/kr-i twAn+d+ha rU pa mA h+mA na ma b+h+ye ta ta ma
[\[49a.2\]]mtsho skyes de dag la/_/gnas sogs bdud rtsi'i cha rdzogs pa'i/_/lha mo rnams kyis ring po nas/_/mi bdag byon pa bstan par gyur/_/snying stobs bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho de'i/_/snying stobs shes 'dod lha yi bdag_/bdag nyid long ba'i gzugs byas nas/_/de la mngon
[\[49a.3\]]b+hA Shata/_/rA dzan+na ya na hI no haM dzan+mA lo ka bi brdzi taH/_/sar+b+ba sa twa pa ri trA NaM san+nad+b+haM twA mu pA ga taH/_/e te ta ba pra b+hA be na ro gi NaHswAs+th+yA ma ga ta/_/twat+kir+t+ti ba da mu kha rAsh+tsa
[\[49a.4\]]du phyogs te gnas/_/rgyal po mig gis dman pa bdag_/skye bar snang ba rnam par spangs/_/sems can thams cad yongs skyob par/_/zhugs pa khyod can nye bar 'ongs/_/khyod kyi mthu yis nad pa ni/_/'di dag legs par gsos gyur nas/_/'od ldan mdzes pas khyod kyi ni/_/
[\[49a.5\]]ran+ti ru tsi ra twi ShaH/_/trA tu mar+ha si mAM de ba du kha dI nAn+d+ha bAn+d+ha ba/_/dak+Shi NaM na ya naM ma h+yaM dI ya tAM ya di shakya te/_/i t+yuk+taste na nr-i pa tiHpra san+na ba da na d+yu tiH/_/san+ta ra NA ya dza
[\[49a.6\]]grags pa mu cor sgrog cing rgyu/_/sdug bsngal bkren dang long ba'i gnyen/_/lha yis bdag ni bskyab par 'os/_/bdag la mig ni g.yas pa dag_/gal te phod na gnang bar mdzod/_/des 'di brjod tshe mi bdag ni/_/rab dang bzhin ras mdzes pa yi/_/'gro rnams yang dag
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]ga tAM samyak+saM bo d+hi sid+d+hi ye/_/bra Ni d+hA naM sa mA d+hA ya sha s+t+re Not+paSh+ya lo tsa naM/_/da dau d+heR+Ye ni d+histismai puSh+pai rA pu ri taHsu raiH/_/ta s+yA da b+hu ta da ne na bisma yA di ba sA tsa lA/_/bi tsa
[\[49b.2\]]bsgral ba'i slad/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/smon lam rab tu btab byas te/_/mig ni mtshon gyis rab phyungs nas/_/brtan pa'i gter gyis de la byin/_/lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtor/_/de yi rmad byung sbyin pa yis/_/ya mtshan nas bzhin sa gzhi ni/_/chu gter g.yo
[\[49b.3\]]tsA la khi la pr-i th+wI bi lo lAr+N+Na ba me kha lA/_/dzA tA lo kaM ta mA lo kya ne tre nai ke na b+hU pa tiH/_/i ti dA na ra sa prI t+yA dwi tI yaM dA tu mud+Ya yau/_/ta taHsu ra pa tista s+ya sa mA s+thA ya ni dzaM ba puH/_/swas+tha bi d+hA ya na ya
[\[49b.4\]]ba'i ske rags can/_/ri dang bcas pa ma lus 'dar/_/mig gcig gis ni snang ba dag_/skyes pa de mthong sa yi bdag_/sbyin pa'i ro la rab dgyes pas/_/gnyis pa sbyin par brtson par gyur/_/de nas lha yi bdag po ni/_/rang gi lus su yang dag gnas/_/de yi mig ni bsos byas te/_/
[\[49b.5\]]naM pra shaM shaM sA ti satwa tAM/_/dA na k+Sha Ne swA ba ya be+e pi ya s+ya na dzA ya te sne ha la baHka dA tsitra/_/kA nA ma ta s+yor+dz+dzi ta sa twa sin+d+hor+d+ha nA b+hI d+hA naM ra dza si swa bud+d+hiH/_/sa nr-i pa tiHpu N+ya ba lo ha me ba ta dA b+ha baM dA na ra prAp+ta
[\[49b.6\]]snying stobs mchog nyid rab tu bsngags/_/gang zhig sbyin tshe rang gi yan lag la'ang /_/nam yang chags pa chung ngu skye min pa/_/nges par snying stobs rgya mtsho rgyas de la/_/nor zhes brjod pa'i rtul la rang blo ci/_/de tshe mi bdag bsod nams stobs gyur te/_/nga nyid sbyin pa'i ro yis byang
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bo d+hiH/_/Ash+tsaR+Ya br-it+ta sma ra Ne na ta s+ya dzA na smi tastan+ma ya tA ma bAp+taH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa lA tA yAM pu N+ya ba lA ba dA naM nA mASh+TaHpany+tsa shaH
[\[50a.2\]]chub thob/_/de yi ngo mtshar spyod tshul dran pas na/_/de yi rang bzhin nyid thob 'dzum pa mdzad/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste
[\[50a.3\]]pal+la waH//_//e kaHpa e ba su kr-i to tsi ta tsakra bar+t+tiHsu byak+ta kIr+t+ti ti la kA gu Na rat+na b+hU ShA/_/am+lA na dA na ku su mA kr-i ta sa t+ya tsartsA ya s+yA ba b+hA ti shu tsi shI la du ku
[\[50a.4\]]lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//shin tu rab gsal grags pa'i tshon ris yon tan rin chen rgyan/_/ma nyams sbyin pa'i me tog dang ldan bden pa'i byug pa byas/_/gang gi dpal ni tshul khrims gtsang ma'i du gu las mdzes pa/_/de nyid gcig pu legs byas la 'os 'khor
[\[50a.5\]]li nI shrIH/_/su rot+ta me pA Ta li pu tra nAm+ni ma hI yu ba t+yAsti la kA ya mA ne/_/ya sho ni d+hiHsauR+Ya ku la ba taM saHshrI mA na sho kaHk+Shi ti bo ba b+hU ba/_/pUr+b+baM sa kA mo pa ba de na kA mI tsaN+Do pa tsa re Na ta tash+tsa tIk+Sh+NaH/_/d+har+m+ma pa dA ne
[\[50a.6\]]los sgyur ba yin/_/grong mchog pA Ta li yi bu zhes pa/_/na chung sa gzhi thig le ltar gyur par/_/nyi ma'i rigs kyi rgyan gyur grags pa'i gter/_/dpal ldan sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung /_/dang por 'dod ldan de 'dod nye tshig dang /_/de nas rnon po gtum po'i nyer spyad dang /_/phyi nas chos
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]na dza gA ma pash+tsad+bi be ka pA ke ba ya bi pra sid+d+hi ma/_/pra san+na pu N+yo pa ba na s+tha lI nA mud+b+hin+na sho b+hA b+ha ra NA pa mA ne/_/tasmin+na sho ke ku sha la pu ro hai ra sho ka tA me ba b+hA ra lo kaH/_/mUr+d+h+na s+thi tAM taHpu ra pun+da rI
[\[50b.2\]]ni nye bar 'dzin pa yis/_/dben pa smin pa'i na tshod rab grags gyur/_/mya ngan med de rab dang bsod nams kyis/_/nye ba'i nags tshal sa gzhi mdzes pas brgyan/_/rgyas par gyur tshe dge ba'i myu gu yis/_/'jig rten mya ngan med nyid nges par 'dzin/_/de yi bde skyed lha mo pad+ma ldan/_/pho brang
[\[50b.3\]]NAM pad+mA ba tI ta s+ya su khA ya de bI/_/sar+b+bot+sa baM pu tra ma sU tra pu N+yais+t+yA gA nu gA shrI ri ba sA d+hu bA daM/_/na ren+d+ra sU nuHka na kA ba dA taHshrI pad+mi nI pad+ma pa lA sha ne traH/_/hi mA tri haM sa s+ya ku lA la nA m+na stu l+ye
[\[50b.4\]]'khor gyi mdzes ma'i gtsug gnas pas/_/kun spro bu ni bsod nams dag gis bskyed/_/gtong ba rjes 'brang dpal gyi legs brjod bzhin/_/gser ltar dag pa mi yi dbang po'i bu/_/pad rdzing dpal gyi pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan/_/gser ri'i ngang pa ku lA la zhes pa'i/_/mig mtshungs
[\[50b.5\]]k+Sha No b+hUt+pa ku nA la nA mA/_/bi d+yA ba d+hU nAM bi ma lAt+ma daR+shash+tsai trot+sa baM sar+b+ba ka lA la tA nAM/_/sa sar+b+ba lo kA b+hi ma to ba b+hU ba tsan+d+ro da yaHkIr+t+ti ku mud+ba tI nAM/_/tA rA d+hi pot+saM ga mr-i go pa ma s+ya ta s+yA ya ta ne dra sa ro dza yu gaM/_/
[\[50b.6\]]de ni ku lA la zhes gyur/_/rig pa bu mo'i bdag mthong dri ma med/_/sgyu rtsal 'khri shing rnams kyi dga' ba'i dpyid/_/grags pa ku mud ldan pa'i zla rgyas pa/_/de ni 'jig rten kun gyi mngon 'dod gyur/_/rgyu skar bdag po'i nang gi ri dgas bzhin/_/de yi mig yangs mtsho skyes zung dag ni/_/
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]sa bi b+h+ra ma b+h+rU b+h+ra ma rA b+hi ra ShaM pa sh+yan+na ren+d+raHswa ya yau na trip+ta ma/_/nA nA gu NA laM ka ra NA ya tasmai kan+dar+s+sa muk+tA la ti kA ya mA nA/_/sa map+ta dig+d+wI pa pa rA d+hi nA thA d+ha n+ya b+hi mA ne na da duHswa ka n+yAH/_/ta s+yA ya tA k+Shi ta yi tA
[\[51a.2\]]g.yo ldan smin ma'i bung bas mngon dga' ba/_/blta bas mi dbang rab tu ngoms mi gyur/_/sna tshogs yon tan rgyan ldan de la ni/_/mtha' dag phyogs dang gling gi sa yi bdag_/skal bzang khengs pas rang gi bu mo dag_/'dod pa'i mu tig 'khri shing lta bu byin/_/skye bo rjes chags skyed pa mchog gi
[\[51a.3\]]ba b+hU ba tsan+d+rA na nA kAny+tsa na mA/_/li kA khyA dza nA nu rA god+d+ha ba di bya mUr+t+tirdzan+mAn+ta rAp+te ba ra tiHsma ra s+ya/_/ta taHka da tsin+pi tu ran+ti kas+thaM taM bIk+Sh+ya saM g+ha s+tha bi raHku mA ra/_/ma te na rA dz+nyaHswa ya sho bi hA re bi bik+ta de shaM sha na
[\[51a.4\]]gzugs/_/de yi dga' mar mig yangs zla zhal ma/_/'dod pa'i dga' ma skye ba gzhan thob bzhin/_/gser gyi 'phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar gyur/_/de nas nam zhig pha yi drung gnas pa'i/_/gzhon nu de mthong dge 'dun gnas brtan gyis/_/rgyal po'i 'dod pas rang gi grags pa yi/_/dben gnas gtsug
[\[51a.5\]]kairna nA ya/_/sa ta s+ya kA le na bi nA sha mak+Sh+Nor+dz+nyA twA ma nI ShI Sha Da b+hi dz+nya tsaR+Ya/_/a ga mi duHkhod+d+ha ra NA ya yo gI kA ru N+ya yo gI ta nu bA tsa br-id+d+haH/_/i dan+ta bA yA ta ni mit+tab+hu taM pa sh+yA mi tsit+ta bi b+ha bA b+hU
