[\[51a.6\]]lag khang du dal gyis khrid/_/rgan po mkhan po mngon shes drug ldan mchog_/snying rje'i 'byor ldan rnal 'byor ldan pa des/_/dus kyis de yi mig dag nyams shes nas/_/ma 'ongs sdug bsngal gdon slad de la smras/_/khyod kyi sems ni 'byor pas zil mnan nas/_/lang tsho me tog mtshon dang ldan pa'i/_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]taM/_/ba yaHsa hA yaM ku su mA yu d+ha s+ya ba push+tsa lI lA da li te nu dar+p+paM/_/dzA t+yai ba tsak+Shush+tsa pa lA kaM ma n+ya dasmin+na nA s+thai ba su kho pa pat+tiH/_/e te na kr-iSh+TAHswa pa da pra naSh+TAHspr-i hA b+hi d+hA ne ku ha re pa tan+ti/_/i daM hi
[\[51b.2\]]tshogs/_/rol pas zla ba'i dregs 'joms lus la ni/_/mtshan ma byung bar gyur 'di bdag gis mthong /_/mig ni rang bzhin gyis g.yo gzhan pa ci/_/'di la bde ba nyer bskyed gnas pa med/_/'di yis drangs pas rang gnas rab nyams te/_/'dod pa zhes brjod khung bur lhung ba nyid/_/nges par mi rnams
[\[51b.3\]]nI lot+pa la pal+la bA b+haM bi lo tsa naM nA ma nr-i NAM bi shA laM/_/rA go ra gats+tshi dra sa mu dra mi ba ye nen+d+ri yA N+yA shu pa ri shra ban ti/_/d+ha n+yA s+tha e ba sa ma sa twa d+hI raHshI la pra b+hA bAn+na b+ha ban+ti ye yAM/_/lA ba N+ya pA ne na bi she Sha trip+tA bi
[\[51b.4\]]mig bzang yangs pa ni/_/ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu 'di/_/chags pa ltos 'gro'i bug pa'i mtsho nyid de/_/gang gis myur du dbang po yongs ngal byed/_/tshul khrims mthu las gang dag rnams kyi mig_/mdzes pa'i btung bas khyad par du ngoms shing /_/rnam par g.yo ba min pa de dag nyid/_/snying stobs
[\[51b.5\]]g+hAr+N+Na mA nA ni bi lo tsa nA ni/_/i t+yA di ta s+ya pra sha pa pan+na mA kar+N+Na bA kyan+na ra nA tha su nuH/_/ta the ti kr-i twA ma na si pra san+ne kr-i ta pra Na maHswa pa dA dza gA ma/_/a tha ya yau b+h+r-id+ga ga No pa gI taM siM dU ra pU rA pi ta kiM shu ka shrIH/_/ma na swi nI mA na ba
[\[51b.6\]]brtan pa dang ldan skal ba bzang /_/zhes sogs de yi tshig ni rab zhi ba/_/nye bar rdzogs pa mi bdag bus thos nas/_/de bzhin zhes de rab dang yid la byas/_/phyag 'tshal nas ni rang gi gnas su song /_/de nas bung ba'i tshogs ni glu len cing /_/ki shu ka dpal li khris rgyas pa 'dra/_/khengs ldan ma yi khengs pa
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]d+hA nuban+d+hI ma d+hus rat+so ra b+ha mat+ta nA gaH/_/ud+YA na bal+lI na ba pal+la bA nAM bi yo gi nI tA pa bi pal+la bA nI/_/ba b+hU babrid+d+haHsa ha sA sa hai ba pra t+ya gra rA gad+go ma duHsa he ba/_/bA te ri taish+tsam+pa ka pa tra
[\[52a.2\]]'joms chas pas/_/ston gyi dris myos glang po cig 'ongs gyur/_/skyed tshal 'khri shing gsar pa'i yal 'dab dang /_/'bral ba'i gdung ba rgud pa'i cha shas dag_/gsar du chags pas rab bskyed bzod dka' nyid/_/'phral la lhan cig nyid du rgas par gyur/_/tsam pa ka 'dab rlung gis bskyod
[\[52a.3\]]le khair+m+mai trI pa mA sU tra ya taHsma re Na/_/sa pa srar+the dik+Shud+h+r-i ti pra mA thI tsai tra s+ya dze traHpra tha mA b+hi yo gaH/_/la sat+pu puSh+pe Sh+wa pi te Shu tre Shu ba b+hU ba b+hU m+nA ma d+hU ban+d+ha ba s+ya/_/b+h+r-id+ga swa nairgI ta ya sha pra kA raHkr-i to pa kA raH
[\[52a.4\]]pa yis/_/spring yig gis ni byams pa skyed byed cing /_/'dod dang lhan cig dpyid kyi dang po yi/_/mngon 'byor rgyal byed bdag 'joms phyogs su grags/_/me tog rab rgyas de dang de dag las/_/dpyid kyi gnyen la mchog tu phan pa ni/_/grags pa'i rnam pa bung ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i/_/sa ha kA ra nyid
[\[52a.5\]]sa ha kA ra ab//_/tasman+pa san+dot+pa ba bi b+h+ra me pi bi tsin+ta yan+taM s+tha bi ro pa de shaM/_/na ren+d+ra sU nuM bi dza ne da daR+sha taM ti Sh+ya dak+ShA k+Shi ti pA la pat+ni/_/aklI pa tsan+d+rA d+ha ti mA ya tA k+ShaM pI nAM ga mA dzA nu bi lam+ba bA huM/_//a b+h+ye t+ya taM sne
[\[52a.6\]]kyis byas par gyur/_/dpyid kyi spro ba'i rnam 'phrul de la yang /_/mi yi dbang po'i bu de dben par ni/_/gnas brtan gyis na man ngag sems pa dang /_/sa skyong btsun mo skar rgyal bsrung bas mthong /_/ma nyams zla ba'i 'od ldan yangs pa'i mig_/phrag mtho pus mor lag pas sleb de la/_/mdza' bas brlan pa'i
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ha ra pAr+d+ra tsit+tA ya bI ya sA sA ja na nI dza gAd/_/ku mA ra puSh+pe Shu na pA ba tA raM saM sA ra sA raM ta ba lo tsa na shrIH/_/d+h+r-i tiM ha ra t+ye ba na ka s+ya lo ke bi she Shi taHpe sha la e Sha be shaH/_/uk+t+we ti taM sA sa ha sA b+hu dzA b+h+ya mut+p+r-i dz+ya ladz+dzaM dr-i D+ha mA li
[\[52b.2\]]blo yis mngon phyogs te/_/ma yi chun ma de yis rab smras pa/_/gzhon nu me tog mda' can gsar 'jug pa/_/'khor ba'i snying po khyod kyi mig gi dpal/_/khyad par mdzes pa'i chas dang ldan pa 'di/_/'jig rten du ni su yi brtan mi 'phrog_/ces brjod de yis 'phral la lag gnyis kyis/_/ngo tsha btang nas brtan
[\[52b.3\]]ling+ga/_/pra kam+pa piny+tsa mu kha rai ra sak+taM ni bAR+Ya mA nA b+ha ra Nai ri ba swaiH/_/ba rA s+ya sau me dza na nAM ni dze ba bat+sa l+ya mA biSh+ku ru te sa dai ba/_/d+h+yA twe ti niHshaM ka ma tiHsa ta s+yAHpA da pra NA ma na ta she kha ro b+hUta/_/ma dod d+ha tA
[\[52b.4\]]pa de la 'khyud/_/rang gi rgyan gyi khral khrol mu cor gyis/_/'dar zhing rgyun du zlog par byed pa bzhin/_/gzhan 'di'ang rang gi ma bzhin bdag la ni/_/rtag tu mnyes gshin nyid dag skyed par byed/_/ces bsams dogs med blo ldan de yis de'i/_/rkang par phyag btsal zur phud dud par gyur/_/stug por rmongs
[\[52b.5\]]nAM g+ha na mo ha kA la prak+Sho b+hi tA nAM ma ka rAM ka pA taiH/_/ta raM gi nAM nA mi ba nAM ga nA nAM swa b+hA ba yA te sti ma nAd+ni ro d+haH/_/sA taM ba b+hA She ma da nA b+hi b+hU tA pra gal+b+ha saM raM b+ha bi shr-iM kha le na/_/pA pA ba pa te shu tsi nA ka laM ka b+hI
[\[52b.6\]]dus rgyags pas 'phyar gyur cing /_/chu srin mtshan ma lhung bas rab bskyod pa'i/_/rba rlabs can bzhin bud med rnams la ni/_/rang bzhin 'gros la 'gog pa cung zad med/_/bab col rtsol ba rnam par ma bsdams pas/_/sdig par lhung tshe dri mas 'jigs pa bzhin/_/tshul khrims gtsang mas rnam par btang gyur
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]t+ye ba shI le na be mu ts+ya mA nA/_/pri yo pi me tu l+ya ba yAHku mA ra mA tu sa sat+nI ba nA smi mA tA/_/i yaM twa dA ling+ga na saM ga yo gya sau b+hA gya b+hau gyaM b+ha dza tA ta nurme/_/ni ladz+dza tai thA pa ra mAr+tha nI ya ya daR+sha yan+te swa ya me ba nArmaR+YaH/_/
[\[53a.2\]]cing /_/'dod pas zil mnan de yis de la smras/_/bdag gi mdza' bo gzhon nu lang tsho mtshungs/_/khyod kyi ma yi chun ma bdag ma yin/_/khyod kyi 'khyud pas 'grogs 'os bdag gi lus/_/skal bzang longs spyod 'os 'di sten par mdzod/_/don du gnyer bya bud med rang nyid kyis/_/don gnyer gang de ngo tsha med nyid de/_/
[\[53a.3\]]pra sA da kiM ba kri ya te twa daM ga saM gash+tsi ri me hr-i da ye ba san+naH/_/sta na s+tha laM hA ra tA b+hi rA maM ni tam+pa bim+baM ra sa nA thaM/_/s+t+rI NAM na khol+le khe da ri dra me ti non+ni dra sho b+hA su b+ha gA b+hi mA naM/_/na bA b+hi lA ShA
[\[53a.4\]]ci bgyid bka' drin mdzod cig khyod lus dang /_/'grogs pa yun ring bdag gi snying la gcags/_/nu ngos do shal 'khri shing mngon dga' zhing /_/rked skabs dkyil 'khor dril chung ldan pa yi/_/bud med sen mo 'debs pas dbul ba ni/_/rab mdzes skal bzang ma nor khengs mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na bud
[\[53a.5\]]ti sha yon+mu khA ni tsi t+ya ni bA tU la ku tU ha la ni/_/s+t+ri NaM swa b+ha be na b+ha ban+ti lo ke lA ba ye lub+d+hA ni tsa lo tsa nA ni/_/uk+t+we ti sA kam+ba ta raM shi tAM gI shwA sA b+hi b+hU tA d+ha ra pal+la ba shrIH/_/swe dAm+nu na sh+yat+ti la kA bi kA raM sma ro
[\[53a.6\]]med rang bzhin gyis/_/sems ni rnam g.yengs dge mtshan ldan pa dang /_/gsar pa 'dod la shin tu mngon phyogs shing /_/mig kyang mdzes pa dag la sred ldan min/_/zhes smras rlung ltar 'dar ba'i lus can des/_/mchu 'dab dpal ni dbugs kyis zil mnan cing /_/rdul chu'i mtshon ris nyams byas rnam 'gyur ni/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]pa diSh+TaM pra ka Ta ba b+hA ra/_/bA NAM be rud+d+hAM sa ni sham+pata s+yastAn+tap+ta pU tsi mi ba dIN+Na kar+N+NAM/_/ni rI k+Sh+ya mA NaHk+Shi ti ma k+Shi lag+naM mu mo tsa tat+pA mi bA ba na mraH/_/ta s+yAHsha shAM ko pa mA na naM tat+pa mun+mI Sha b+h+yA pa ma laM ku mA raH/_/draSh+TuM
[\[53b.2\]]'dod pas nyer bstan rab tu gsal bar bzung /_/rna ba nyams byed gdung ba'i khab bzhin des/_/de yi tshig ni 'gal ba de dag thos/_/sdig de mig la chags pa 'dor ba bzhin/_/sa la blta zhing gdong ni dud par gyur/_/ri dgas rtags can lta bu de yi bzhin/_/sdig pa'i dri ma rab rgyas de ni bltar/_/gzhon nus
[\[53b.3\]]na se he sa ha sA bi ShA dA ladz+dzA ni mI lad+ba da nA ra bin+daH/_/a nalpa pA shra ba Na pra kam+pAd+bi lo la rat+nodz+dz+wa la kuN+Da lot+thaM/_/ta s+ya k+Sha NaM kar+N+Na yu gaM bi shud+d+ho pra b+hA ba naM ba hi mi bA bi be sha_/sa pA Ni na shro tra yu gaM pi d+hA ya sa sardza bA tsa da sha nAM
[\[53b.4\]]ma bzod 'phral la yid 'byung dang /_/ngo tshas bzhin gyi pad+ma zum par gyur/_/dag par bgyi slad de yi rna ba zung /_/mi chung sdig thos 'dar bas bskyod pa las/_/rin chen rab 'bar rna rgyan las 'khrungs pa'i/_/mthu ldan me ni skad cig zhugs pa bzhin/_/de yi lag pas rna ba zung bsgribs nas/_/skad cig 'khyud pa'i skyon
[\[53b.5\]]shu shub+h+rAM/_/prAk+Sh+ya la yan+tI k+Sha Na maM ga maM gaM gaM gA mi pA liM ga na do Sha shAM t+yai/_/mA tarna yuk+taM ta ba bak+tu me tat+sad+bar+t+ma nA gats+tsha ni yats+tsha bA tsaM/_/sa d+yaHpa ri t+yA ga da shA bi lo laM shI laM sa mA shwA sa ya shrIR+Ya mA NaM/_/dar+p+pa pra mA daHpa ra
[\[53b.6\]]ni zhi ba'i slad/_/yan lag yan lag 'khrud pa'i gang+gA bzhin/_/so yi 'od zer dkar ldan tshig spros pa/_/ma ma khyod kyis 'di dag smra mi 'os/_/dam pa'i lam nas song la tshig dag sdoms/_/'phral la yongs btang skabs kyi tshul khrims ni/_/nyams shing rnam par g.yo ba dbugs dbyung mdzod/_/dregs dang bag med gzhan
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bit+ta bAMts+tshA bA pA nu ban+d+hI bi Sha yA b+hi lA ShaH/_/e tA ni dzan+tor+b+ba nir+pA ta kA le dwA rA N+ya pA ya s+ya ni rarga lA ni/_/d+ha ne na keM dA na pa ri mu khA nAM shru te na kiM dre Sha bshI kr-i tA nAM/_/rU pe Na kiM sad+gu Na brdzi tA nAM ku le na kiM shI la bi nA
[\[54a.2\]]nor 'dod pa dang /_/sdig pa rjes 'brel yul la mngon sred pa/_/'di dag srog chags rnam par lhung dus su/_/bsdams pa med pa'i gnod pa'i sgo dag yin/_/sbyin las phyir phyogs rnams la nor gyis ci/_/sdang bas dbang byas rnams la thos pas ci/_/yon tan mchog spangs rnams la gzugs kyis ci/_/tshul khrims
[\[54a.3\]]kr-i tA nAM/_/mA tash+tsaM tsa la tAM bi muny+tsa ru tsi raM rak+ShA k+Sha yen+duM ya shaHshI laM pA la ya baM sha he tu ma ma laM pA pe ma tiM sA kr-i thAH/_/phUr+dz+dzan+nA ra ka ba h+ni pA ka bi ka la pre ta pra tA pot+ka TaHpA pA nAM pa ra lo ka bar+t+ma ni ki
[\[54a.4\]]btang ba rnams la rigs kyis ci/_/ma ma g.yo ba nyid dag thong la ma nyams grags pa'i zla ba mdzes par srungs/_/tshul khrims dri med rigs kyi rgyu dag skyongs shig sdig la blo gros yongs ma byed/_/rab 'bar dmyal ba'i me yis 'tshed cing 'khrugs te yi dgas rab tu gdung bas nyen/_/sdig can 'jig rten pha rol lam
[\[54a.5\]]la kle shA ku lA b+hU ma yaH/_/shru twe ti bAkyaM k+Shi ti pAt+ma dza s+ya rA ga gra haM sA na mu mo tsa tI braM/_/mo hAn+d+ha kU pa s+ya dza la s+ya nAn+tar+d+har+m+mo pa de shArka ka rA bi shan+ti/_/tsau rI ba sa man+ma tha pAr+thi be na pra mA thi nA byar+tha ta pra sa h+ya/_/
[\[54a.6\]]ni nges par nyon mongs dag gis 'khrugs pa'i sa/_/zhes pas bdag sras po'i tshig thos nas/_/mi bzad chags pa'i gdon ni des ma btang /_/rmongs pa'i mun can khron pa'i chu nang du/_/chos kyis nyer bstan nyi ma'i 'od mi 'jug_/rab tu 'joms byed yid srubs sa bdag gis/_/chom rkun ma bzhin 'phral la gzir gyur te/_/
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]shwA sa pra yA sa t+ya li tA b+hi d+hA na ma saM ga tAr+thaM pra la lA ba tat+tata/_/swas+tho pa de shaHkr-i ya te twa yA yaM sma rArdi tA haM na shri No mi kiny+tsita/_/nA yA ti bAg+b+hiHpra sha maM bi shA la dz+wa lA ka lA pa pra ba laHsma rAg+niH/_/de she s+kha lan+nis+dz+ha rA shI ta lo pa
[\[54b.2\]]shugs rings ngal zhing 'khrul bar rjod byed pas/_/'brel med don gyi cho nge de de smras/_/rnal gnas nyer bstan khyod kyis byed pa 'di/_/'dod pas gzir ba bdag gis 'ga' mi thos/_/lhag par rab 'bar 'dod pa'i me yi tshogs/_/rgyas pa tshig gis rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/_/yul na bsil ba'i chu rgyun 'brub mod kyang /_/
[\[54b.3\]]b+ha ban+ti tap+tA ni ma ru s+tha lA ni/_/rA gA tu rA NA mu da ye si b+hA nor+g+ho rAn+d+ha kA rA Ni di gan+ta rA Ni/_/nA s+t+ya ba tap+tA ma ba lAM da yA loHsaM rak+Sha ta ste ya di ko bi d+har+m+maH/_/tat+sA d+hu b+hirdaR+shi ta gau ra ba s+ya tas+ya y+Ya b+ha be ka tha mas+t+ya d+har+m+maH/_/ye
[\[54b.4\]]mya ngam thang rnams dag ni gdung bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma shar yang chags pas gzir rnams la/_/phyogs mtshams rnams ni 'jigs rung mun pa yin/_/gdung ba'i bud med bsrungs la chos ci yang /_/gal te brtse ldan khyod la med na ni/_/dam pa rnams kyis gus par bstan pa de/_/med pa la yang chos min ji ltar yod/_/gang
[\[54b.5\]]shrI ta laHswa s+tha d+hi yaHsu khA ya te shAM pra mA NaM s+thi ra e Sha d+har+m+maH/_/san+tA pi tA nAM bya sa nA tu rA NAM ni Shid+d+ha kAR+Ye Sh+wa bi ko bi tsA raH/_/ma mai ba pA paM pra tha ma gr-i hI taM d+har+m+mo sti te mat+pa ri rak+Sha Ne na/_/spaR+she na nir+b+bA pa ya san+ta tAm+me san+tA pa tAM
[\[54b.6\]]blo rnal gnas bsil ba de dag la/_/bde slad brtan pa chos 'di tshad ma ste/_/zhen pas gzir cing yang dag gdungs rnams la/_/bkag pa'i bya ba la yang spyod pa ci/_/nga nyid kyis ni sdig pa dang por blangs/_/bdag yongs bsrungs pas khyod la chos su 'gyur/_/rig pa ri bong can ltar bsil ba yis/_/rgyun du gdung
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ti sha sha shI ta le na/_/san+tA paM ha ra to bi d+hoHk+Sha ya ya hastI braM ta mo b+hA swa taHshrI ta kle sha ma harni shaM sha ma ya taHpA paM ki marmeHpha laM/_/krA hi dz+nyA dza sa masta shAs+t+ra ya dI pa sa t+yaM twa me b+haspu TaM tr-iSh+TaHkiM bya sa nA tu rak+Sha Na sa
[\[55a.2\]]bas nyen bdag bde bar mdzod/_/gdung ba 'phrog byed zla ba dang ni mi bzad mun pa nyams byed nyi ma dang /_/nyin dang mtshan mar grang ba'i nyon mongs zhi byed me la sdig pa'i 'bras bu ci/_/gdung bas gzir ba bsrung ba dang mnyam las bzang chos ni gang du ci zhig mthong /_/bstan bcos mtha'
[\[55a.3\]]maHsat+kar+m+ma d+har+m+maHkwa tsi ta/_/ra ha s+ya b+hai de tra na kash+tsi dasti dza nodz+dz+hi taHsaM pr-i ta e Sha de shaH/_/swets+tshA pra br-it+taM pra Na yo pa na mraHsrau D+hAM ga nA b+ha gya pa tAM b+ha ban+ti/_/kliSh+Ta d+ha raM klAn+ta ka po la pa traM shastA
[\[55a.4\]]dag shes pa khyod kyis gang 'di bden par gsal ba nyid du smros/_/yul 'di skye bos spangs shing legs par bsgribs/_/dben pa 'byed pa su yang med pa 'dir/_/rang 'dod du 'jug mdza' bas dud pa yi/_/bud med dar ma skal ldan nyid la 'gyur/_/bud med dga' mgus yongs su tshims rnams kyis/_/bzhin
[\[55a.5\]]la kAM swe de la ba gra rA baM/_/ni tam+bi nI nA ra ti Shi tA nAM pa sh+yan+ti d+ha n+ya ba da nA ra bin+daM/_/bi shaM ti kA tsit+ka ra bA la bal+lI bi lo la dzi hAM ra Na kA la bak+taM/_/yo Shit+k+r-i te kro d+ha na na kra tsa kraM kA rA la ma n+ye
[\[55a.6\]]gyi pad+ma 'gram pa'i 'dab dman bzhin/_/mchu nyams lan bu 'khrugs shing rdul gyi ni/_/thigs pas brlan chags skal ldan rnams kyis mthong /_/bud med ched du chu srin khros pa'i tshogs/_/'jigs rung chu srin 'byung gnas 'jings su 'ga'/_/ral gri'i 'khri shing g.yo ba'i lce ldan pa/_/g.yul ngo dus kyi khar ni
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ma ka rA ka rau g+haM/_/tI praish+tsi ra kle sha bi she Sha sho Shai rar+thi Shu sun+pAM pa ra ma pra yat+naH/_/d+har+m+mAr+tha e bAr+tha pa ri gra ho ya d+har+m+mA s+ya kA maM pha la ma gra mA huH/_/i ti bru bA NaM ba hu b+hiHpra ka raistA ma bra bI dA ku li taM ku mA raH/_/mA tas+t+ri brga s+ya pha laM sa mU
[\[55b.2\]]gzhan dag 'jug_/yun ring nyon mongs khyad par che gdung bas/_/nor rnams la ni skyes bu mchog tu 'bad/_/nor ni yongs 'dzin chos kyi don nyid de/_/chos kyi 'bras bu mchog ni 'dod par brjod/_/rnam pa mang pos de skad smra byed cing /_/'khrugs pa de la gzhon nus rab smras pa/_/ma ma tshogs gsum gtso bo'i 'bras
[\[55b.3\]]laM d+har+m+maHpra d+hA nAM ku shA la s+ya nA b+heH/_/na nirdza na pA pa mu pe ti gup+ta man+tar+hi taHswar+g+gi ga No tra sAk+ShI/_/ts+tshA yA pra pA tA hi sa hA ya b+hA baM dzA ye ba dzA nA ti dza na s+ya sar+b+baM/_/ra haHkr-i taM kar+m+ma pha laM t+ya ba s+yaM na kar+m+ma NA masti pha la pra NA
[\[55b.4\]]bu ni/_/dge ba'i lte ba rtsa ba dang bcas chos/_/skye bo med par sdig pa sbas mi 'gyur/_/'dir ni dbang po snang min mtho ris tshogs/_/grogs kyi dngos por gyur pa'i grib mas kyang /_/chung mas bzhin du skye bo'i thams cad rig_/dben par byas pa'i las 'bras nges par smin/_/las rnams 'bras bu rab nyams
[\[55b.5\]]shaH/_/bi ShaM ni pI taM bi dza nAn+d+ha kA re prA Ne Shu kiM na pra ha ra t+ya sa dz+ya/_/dzA t+yA tri yaHpA pa ni mit+ta b+hU tasta trA pi g+ho raHsa ra dA ra sargaH/_/mA te ti ma hAt+ka la he ti yuk+tAM nA n+yo pi dzan+tuHspr-i sha ti swa kAn+tAM/_/i t+yar+tha
[\[55b.6\]]yod ma yin/_/mun nag dben par dug ni 'thungs pa na/_/srog rnams mi bzad 'phrog pa min nam ci/_/rigs kyi bud med sdig pa'i mtshan mar gyur/_/de la'ang 'jigs rung gzhan gyi bud med 'grogs/_/'thab mo la rmongs ma zhes mngon sbyar ba'i/_/rang gi chung mar skye gzhan yang mi reg_/de ltar don gnyer
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]nA b+haM ga pa rad+mu khI sA ti rak+te tA te na ni tA ta tap+ta/_/ha rA mya ba sh+yaM ta ba ne tra dar+b+ba muk+t+we ti pA pA swa pa dA dza gA maH/_/tA taHpu rAn+tak+Sha shi lA b+hi d+hA ma hI pa teHkuny+dza ra kar+N+Na nA mAH/_/se nA ra dzaHpuny+dza bi nirdza
[\[56a.2\]]nyams pas phyir phyogs shing /_/de yi smad pas shin tu gdungs gyur te/_/khyod kyi mig dregs nges par bdag gis dbrog_/ces smras sdig can ma de rang gnas song /_/de nas grong khyer rdo 'jog ces par ni/_/sa bdag glang po'i rna ba zhes bya ba/_/'dul du gzhon nu dpung gi rdul tshub
[\[56a.3\]]tA ts+tshAM dze tuM ku mA raM bi sa sardza rA dzA/_/sa taM pu ri prAM s+ya ga dzAn+d+ha ka ra grastA khi lA shaHpa ri bAR+Ya tas+thau/_/k+Shub+d+hAb+d+hi d+hA rair+b+ha Ta kuny+dza rA NAM dwe d+he ba kur+b+ban+b+hu ba naM ni nA daiH/_/ta taHpra pAd+ya pra Ni pa t+ya mUdz+ha nr-i pArma dza tak+Sha shi la
[\[56a.4\]]tshogs/_/nyi ma 'pham byed ldan par rgyal pos btang /_/grong der des phyin glang po'i mun pa yis/_/ma lus phyogs bzung yongs su bskor te gnas/_/glang po dpa' sgra chu gter bskyod pa ltar/_/zab pas srid pa rnam gnyis byed pa bzhin/_/de nas rdo 'jog rgyal pos rgyal sras la/_/spyi bos phyag 'tshal rab tu
[\[56a.5\]]d+hi nA thaH/_/ga dzA shwa rat+nai ra b+hi pU dz+ya d+hI mAn swa ra dza d+hA ni swa ya mA ni nA ya/_/pri yo pa tsa rai ru pa se bya mA na ste nA da rAt+ta tra sa rA dza pu traH/_/di ne Shu ta s+thau d+ya na yau ba nA b+h+ra sa mul+la san+me g+ha ma lI ma se Shu/_/a trAn+ta re pu tra mu khA
[\[56a.6\]]dang bar byas/_/glang po rta dang rin chen dag gis mchod/_/blo ldan rang gis rang gi rgyal sar bos/_/der ni de yis dga' ba'i rim gro yis/_/gus pas nye bar bsten cing rgyal sras de/_/sprin tshogs gzhon nu gsal ba rab rgyas pas/_/dri mar bcas pa'i nyin rnams rab tu gnas/_/skabs der bu yi bzhin ras pad
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ra bin+da pa nrirga not+kaN+Tha ta mA na sa s+ya/_/tsin+tA nu ban+d+hA di ba b+hU mi b+har+t+tu byA d+hi ba bu b+ho da ra bad+d+ha mU laH/_/bai d+yai r+b+r-i ton+taHpu ra d+hA m+ni nA nA b+hai Sha dz+ya tsin+tA bi hi tA ba d+hA naiH/_/a sASh+pa ro gA ba ga mA b+hi yo ga
[\[56b.2\]]mo dag_/blta bar yid la rab tu 'dod pa yi/_/sa bdag lto bar rtsa ba bcings pa'i nad/_/byung bar gyur te bsams pas bcings las bzhin/_/sna tshogs sman bsam bsam gtan sgrub byed cing /_/nad gsos min par rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/the tshom gyis ni bzhin log mthong gyur pa'i/_/
[\[56b.3\]]pan+de ha san+daR+shi ta khed bak+t+raiH/_/ud+be ga b+hi t+ye ba ni ShaN+Na mau na kAM tsI ka lA be na ba d+hu ga Ne na/_/tsi trAr+pi tA kA ra tu laM shri te na ne san+da ne tre Na bi lokya mA naH/_/A san+na kAn+ta ka ra man+da man+da bi s+yan+di nA tsA ma ra pal+la
[\[56b.4\]]sman pas pho brang khang par rab tu bskor/_/mya ngan 'jigs pas bzhin du dril chung ste/_/smra bcad du gnas btsun mo'i tshogs rnams ni/_/ri mo bris pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs la/_/brten pa'i g.yo med mig gis lta bar byed/_/dal bu dal bur rnga yab 'dab ma ni/_/nyer 'khod mdzes pa'i lag pas rnam
[\[56b.5\]]be na/_/uts+tsh+wA sa b+hA dzA pa ri pAN+Du re Na sho kA ku le ne ba sa bI k+Sh+ya mA naH/_/shI tAM bu b+h+riM gA ra ni biSh+Ta dr-iSh+TiHkA ShA yaHpA ne bi hi tA ba mA naH/_/ni drA ni She d+ha pra ti ban+na ko paHpa th+yo pa de sha pra bi shad+bi ShA daH/
[\[56b.6\]]bskyod pa/_/mya ngan gyis 'khrugs shugs rings bstan pa yis/_/yongs su dkar ba lta bus g.yob pa de/_/chu grang ldan pa'i bum par mig gtad cing /_/bska ba'i btung ba dag la zhen log bskyed/_/gnyid ni dgag pa'i khro ba rab rdzogs shing /_/phan pa'i nyer bstan dag la chags bral zhugs/_/
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]ni d+ya ma yod+be ga dzu gup+s+ya mA naHkA ye pi sa dwe sha da shA ma bAp+taH/_/sat+nista not+saM ga ni ShaN+Na mUr+d+h+na k+ShA ma swa na k+Sh+mA pa ti rA tsa tsak+She/_/bai d+yaHki ma d+yA pi ni br-it+ta bai d+yair+b+ya thA ni mit+taiHki ma ta
[\[57a.2\]]zhe sdang bcas pa'i skabs thob lus la yang /_/smad 'os rang bzhin chags bral gyis smod cing /_/btsun mo'i nu ma'i bar du mgo bzhag pa'i/_/skad gdangs zhan pas bdag gis smras pa/_/rig bya rdzogs pa'i sman pas ding yang ci/_/gdung ba skyed byed bden med
[\[57a.3\]]th+ya pa th+yaiH/_/a maR+Sha kar+m+mo pa ni pI Di tA nAM d+har+m+mo pa de sha pre Na yats+tshi kit+sA/_/kA yaHpra yA to ya ma pA ya b+hU miM sha l+yA ya te b+ho ga ga No bya b+ho gyaH/_/an+d+ha bya lA ba N+ya ba tI ba kAn+tA b+ho godz+dz+hi tA shrIr+g+ha na e ba shA pa/_/
[\[57a.4\]]dpyad kyis ci/_/bde med las kyis yongs su gzir ba rnams/_/gso byed chos kyis nyer bstan la chags yin/_/lus 'di gnod pa'i sar song dpyad mi 'os/_/longs spyod tshogs kyang zug rngu lta bur spyod/_/long ba'i chung ma mdzes sdug ldan pa bzhin/_/spyod spangs dpal ni smod pa stug po nyid/_/
[\[57a.5\]]a t+yan+ta man+dAg+ni pa ri pra sak+ta pra dAp+taHshwa kA na la da h+ya mA naH/_/pra br-id+d+ha tr-iSh+No bya na pe ta dzA T+yaHsu khA ga tA shurna tu dir+g+ha ro gI/_/prats+tshan+na man+taHpa ri par+t+ti pA paM nI tsA ba mA naHka la hA nu bin+d+hu/_/byA d+hi s+thi rA
[\[57a.6\]]me dag shin tu dman yang rgyun du ni/_/rab 'bar mya ngan me yis srog byed cing /_/gdung ba rgyas kyang rengs dang mi 'bral ba'i/_/ring po'i nad ldan ma yin srog song bde/_/sdig pa rab bsgribs nang du yongs gnas dang /_/dman pa brnyas shing rtsod pa rjes 'brel dang /_/nad kyi bstan par
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]raM b+ha dzu gup+si tash+tsa dIp+tA g+ni tA se na sa maM pra yAn+tI/_/ku kar+m+ma NA me Sha bi tsi tra rU pa bi paR+Ya paR+YA sa ma yo bi lA saH/_/dA ri d+r+ya kaSh+TaM ya da ro ga b+hA dzAM la k+Sh+mI ba taM yats+tsha sa de ba ro gaH/_/ban+d+h+yaM dzan+ma sha rI ri
[\[57b.2\]]zil mnan smad pa dang /_/rab 'bar me yi gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur/_/las ngan rtse dga' nyon mongs rang bzhin 'di/_/rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs ni zlog pa ste/_/nad med bsten gang dbul bas sdug bsngal zhing /_/phun tshogs ldan gang rtag tu nad can no/_/rnam dpyod rgyas pa'i blo dang bral ba'i lus can
[\[57b.3\]]NAM bi ra hi taM bud+d+h+yA bi tsA red+ba ya d+hig+bud+d+hiM na kr-i taHpra sA d+ha na bi d+hir+Ya s+yA s+yAHshru te nodz+dz+wal+laH/_/kiM te na shru ta bista re Na na ga to nirdai n+ya tAM yaHshri yA kiM shrI bi b+h+ra ma dzr-im+b+hi te na naM ta rA mA ro gya b+ho gyaM na yata/_/A nI ya tAM me twa ra
[\[57b.4\]]rnams kyi skye ba 'bras med de/_/gang gis blo gros thos pas rgyan gyi sgrub byed rab 'bar byas pa min pa smad/_/gang gi dpal gyis dbul ba nyid min ma gyur thos pa rgya che de yis ci/_/shin tu nad med nyid kyis gang zhig spyod med dpal gyi rnam 'phrul rgyas pas ci/_/bdag gi gzhon nu skye rgu dga' ba
[\[57b.5\]]yA ku mA raHpra dzA pri yasta k+Sha shi la ni yuk+taH/_/pa sh+yA mi tasmin+bi ma le su br-it+te saM krAn+tarmA daR+sha i ba swa ra dz+yaM/_/sa mar+pi twa da gra pi tA ta pa traM ni bad+d+ha mau liM pra na yAn+ma yai ba/_/pa sh+yaM tu taM puN+ya ra pA ya nai na mA me
[\[57b.6\]]ni/_/rdo 'jog tu bskos myur du dgug par bgyi/_/me long la bzhin dri med legs spyod zlum/_/de la rang gi rgyal srid 'phos pa lta'i/_/nga nyid gus pas dbu rgyan bcings byas shing /_/gdugs dkar mchog ni yang dag gtad pa de/_/grong pas nga nyid bsod nams bcud len gyis/_/gzhon nu
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]ba pau rasta ru Na twa mAp+taM/_/i t+yug+ta mA kar+N+N+ya na re shwa re Na taM tiSh+ya rak+Sh+ya ni dza gA da dzA yA/_/tu l+ye pra br-it+ter+b+ha ya shwa ka dai n+ya mAtAR+Ya mo haiHpa ri pUR+Ya mA nA/_/a haM ma hI pA la ni rA
[\[58a.2\]]nyid thob bzhin du lta gyur cig_/ces pa mi yi dbang pos smras pa de/_/mtshungs par rab zhugs 'jigs dang mya ngan dang /_/dman dang phrag dog rmongs pas yongs khengs pa'i/_/btsun mo skar rgyal srung bas thos nas smras/_/sa skyong khyod ni nad med bdag
[\[58a.3\]]ma yaM twaM ka ro mi me pa sh+ya bi she Shi yuk+tiM/_/yaM twa swa si k+ShAr+tha ka dar+thi tAr+thA dza na k+Sha yA yAd+Ya dzu ShaHku be d+yaH/_/mi tho bi ShA daiHshru ta gar+b+ba na daista dz+nyA pa bA de ra bu d+hA nubA daiH/_/nirbi d+ya bai d+yAHk+Sha ya yin+ta
[\[58a.4\]]gis bgyi/_/bdag gi rig pa'i khyad par blta bar mdzod/_/rang gi bslab don nor nyams skye bo rnams/_/brlag slad tshe bsten sman pa ngan pa song /_/rtag tu brlag brtson sman pa rig byed bral/_/phan tshun chags bral thos dregs bsnyems pa dang /_/de nyid shes smod mi mkhas rjes smra
[\[58a.5\]]ni t+yaM k+Sha yo d+yA tA bA pA ra sA tu rany+tsa/_/t+yA dz+yaM na rA dz+yaM sA su to pi rA dzA na spri hA paras+thaM/_/t+yak+t+wa tsa lak+Sh+mIHku ru te k+Sha Ne na bi pat+sa ha sra dz+wa la nA nu ta paM/_/sad+yaHsu tA ro pi ta she kha rA NAM tat+kA la
[\[58a.6\]]bas/_/nyin zhag dang ni nad pa 'phen par byed/_/rang gi bu la'ang rgyal srid mi gtong ste/_/rgyal po gzhan la yod kun dga' skyed byed/_/phun sum tshogs pa btang na skad cig gis/_/rgud pa stong phrag me yis gdung bar byed/_/'phral la bu la zur phud bkod gyur cing /_/de dus rje bo'i
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]mi lat+p+ra b+hu gau ra bA NAM/_/rA dz+nyA ma na mrai ra ba d+ha ri tA ni tr-i NI b+ha ba t+ye ba hi shA sa nA ni/_/i ti k+Shi tI sha s+ya d+h+r-i tiM bi d+hA nirga t+ya tasmAd+ba ba nA ta rAt+sA/_/a n+wi Sh+ya tat+tu l+ya ga dA b+hi b+hU ta ma b+hI re ma kAn+ta ma thA ni
[\[58b.2\]]gus pa nyams gyur pa'i/_/rgyal po'i bka' ni dud pa min rnams kyis/_/cha yi gcod cing rtswa dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/zhes pas sa dbang brtan pa bsgrubs nas ni/_/khang nang de las de ni phyi rol song /_/ba rdzi de mtshungs nad gyis gzir ba zhig_/btsal nas dben pa'i gnas su
[\[58b.3\]]nA ya/_/krU rA sha ya krU ra d+hi yai ba dA s+ya ha twA ta mut+pA Ti ta nA b+hi ko shaM/_/ta s+yAM tra lag+naM pa ru ShaM da daR+sha g+h+r-i NA bi hI nI bi kr-i ta kr-i miM swA/_/ur+d+h+wa pra tsA re Na dza bA da d+hash+tsa sa kr-it+paM dzaM tat+ta ba be k+Sha han+tuM/_/sA pi
[\[58b.4\]]bos byas te/_/gdug pa'i bsam pas 'bangs mo gdug pa'i blos/_/de bsad lte ba'i mdzod ni rab phye ste/_/brtse bas sman des de yi rgyu mar ni/_/rnam 'gyur rtsub mo'i srin bu chags pa mthong /_/gyen du rab rgyu mgyogs par thur du yang /_/gci ba spro byed de mthong gsad phyir des/_/byi dang ga sbyar
[\[58b.5\]]sbi lI hiM gu bi DaM ga yuk+taM bik+She pa tasmai ma ri tsA di brgaM/_/taistaiHsa kI TaHsa bi Shesh+tsa kaish+tsita k+Sha re ra sa hairna mu mo dzI baM/_/pa lAN+Du nA ShaN+Di ta gan+da le na saM spr-iSh+Ta mA traHpra la yaM dza gA ma/_/u pa yA mA sa d+ya pa raM pra hr-iSh+TA ga twA ta
[\[58b.6\]]shing kun pi pi ling /_/pho ba ris sogs sde tshan de la blugs/_/mi bzad 'gyur byed drug ldan gang dag ste/_/de des srin bu de ni srog ma gtang /_/sgog skya'i rtsa ba dag ni gtubs pa yis/_/reg pa tsam las rab tu zhig par gyur/_/thabs mchog rnyed nas rab tu dga' ba de/_/de nas mi yi
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]taHpA nr-i pa tiHsa mI paM/_/pa laN+Du nA ts+tshin+na te nAr+pi te na k+Sha Ne na taM swas+tha ta nuny+tsa kA raH/_/bi Sha s+ya ya trAsti nA dzA tu kash+tir+Ya tra shu shas+t+rA N+ya pi kuN+Tha tA ni/_/ya trA la sot+pA ha ha to hu tA shasta trA pya b+haM ga pra
[\[59a.2\]]bdag po'i drung song ste/_/sgog skya legs par bcad pa byin pa yis/_/skad cig gis ni de lus bsos par byas/_/gang la dug gi nus pas cang yod min/_/gang la mtshon gyis kyang ni myur mi phugs/_/gang la me ni spro nyams le lo can/_/de la yang ni bud med brtan
[\[59a.3\]]Na yA yu ba t+yaH/_/ta taHkr-i ta dz+nyAHk+Shi ti bal+la b+ho sau pre ma nu ban+d+ha pra ti bad+d+hiH/_/ba ra da dau dzI bi ta lA b+ha haR+ShAt+ta yAr+thi taM sap+ta di nA ni ra dz+ya/_/saM prAp+ta rA dz+yA swa ba shai ba saR+YaM kar+t+tu pra br-it+tA k+Shi ti pA la kAR+YaM/_/saM pra
[\[59a.4\]]nyams min/_/de nas sa bdag byas shes mdza' ba yis/_/'ching bas blo gros bcings pas de la ni/_/'tsho ba thob pa'i dga' bas mchog dag byin/_/de yis nyin zhag bdun du rgyal srid bslang /_/rgyal srid thob nas sa skyong bya ba ni/_/thams cad rang dbang nyid kyis byed par zhugs/_/rdo 'jog
[\[59a.5\]]hi Not+tak+ta k+Sha shi le shwa rA ya le khaM sa mu draM pa ha tsA tu rat+nai/_/le khaM ta tastaM nr-i pa shA sa nAM ka mA dA ya mA n+yaM bi na yA ba na mraH/_/swa yaM bi b+hak+tA k+Sha ra lak+Shi tAr+tha ma bA tsa yat+ta k+Sha shi lA d+hi nA thaH/_/swasti shrA+e pA Ta
[\[59a.6\]]dbang po la ni spring yig dag_/rgya ldan rin cen mdzes pa dang bcas springs/_/de nas mi bdag bkas mtshan spring yig de/_/dul zhing rab tu dud pas mchod de blangs/_/rdo 'jog bdag po rang gis gsal ba yis/_/yi ges mtshon pa'i don ni rab tu bklags/_/swasti grong khyer pA Ta
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]li pu tra da sa ma sa ma ra sA ha sa sa mA di ta sa map+ta sin+d+hu pI mA saM pu kwa la da pi ra la bi ma la ya shaH/_/ka lA pa ka li ta d+ha ba la du kU la ba su d+hA ba d+hU dat+ta b+hau gya so b+hA gya gar+b+baHkhan+bI khan+bI kr-i ta ri su pratA paH
[\[59b.2\]]la 'i pu Ta las mtshungs pa med pa'i g.yul la dpa' bas yang dag par thob pa/_rgya mtsho mtha' dag gi mtshams su rab tu 'phro zhing mi zhan la dri ma dang bral ba'i grags pa'i tshogs las bsgrubs pa'i du ku la'i ras dkar pos nor 'dzin gyi bu mo la longs spyod par bya ba skal ba
[\[59b.3\]]shA pa/_/i bA rA ti ra ma NI bi lA sA nAM pra Na ti pim+bi tA nan+ta sa man+ta sa bak+t+ra sha ta pat+t+yai ka pA tr-I kr-i ta bi ma la ma Ni pa da pI ThaH/
[\[59b.4\]]bzang po nyid kyis bsnyems pa byin pa/_/dgra bo'i gzi byin nyams par byed cing mi dga' ba rnams kyi dga' ma'i rtse dga'i dmod pa bzhin du gyur pa/_dri ma med pa'i nor bu'i rkang stegs/_mtha' yas pa'i rgyal phran gyis rab tu btud pa'i bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gzugs can snod gcig tu
[\[59b.5\]]su kr-i ta ku sha la ka ma la bi kA sha bA sa re shwa raH_s+phI ta sauR+Ya biR+Ya ma hA bat+sa la ba na pany+tsA na naH_shrI ma da sho ka de ba stak+Sha shi lA d+ha yaM shrI kuny+dza ra kar+NaM saM
[\[59b.6\]]byas pa/_legs byas dge ba'i pad+mo rnam par rgyas par byed pa'i nyin mo'i dbang phyug rtul phod dang brtson 'grus dang spro ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa'i nags tshal gyi gdong lnga pa dpal lha mya ngan med pas/_/rdo 'jog gi dbang po dpal glang po'i rna ba la yang dag par rtogs par byed pa
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]bo d+ha ya ti ya thA/_/e Sha me ni ra pa tra paH_ku tsA ra ta mai trI pa ri trasta tsA ri traH_pu tra mu kha sha tru ra pa bi traH_shAs+t+ra bi dwe ShI pi tr-i ka la tra bi lA Sha bi Sha sa trI kr-i ta ne tra sha ta pa
[\[60a.2\]]'di lta ste/_/bdag gi bu'i bzhin dang ldan pa'i dgra_/khrel med cing ngan pa'i spyod pa la byams la yongs su skrag pa'i spyod pa can/_mi gtsang zhing bstan bcos la sdang ba mig gi 'dab brgya pha'i chung ma la mngon par sred pa'i dug gi snod du byed pa sdig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i
[\[60a.3\]]traHpA pA nu rU pa yau ba not+sA ha sa hA saHsa mut+pa Ti ta lo tsa na ma Nirni ba sa sa no nidrA s+ya tA+e dza na nI dza na b+hu dzaM ga i tasma da b+h+yar+tha nA pra Na yaH/_/le khAr+tha mi t+yu gra ta raM bi tsAR+Ya bi tsAR+Y+Ya ma NaHkr-i pa yA kr-i pa luH/_/prI t+yA
[\[60a.4\]]gzugs dang lang tsho dang spro ba dang rtul phod dang ldan pa/_skye bo mi'i lag 'gro 'di mig gi nor bu rab tu phyung ste gos dang bral bar bskrad par mdzod cig_/ces pa bdag gi 'bad pas don du gnyer ba'o/_/spring yig don ni rab brtags rnam dpyad nas/_/brtse ldan brtse bas rnam par 'gems byed cing /_/gzhon nu
[\[60a.5\]]ku mA ra s+ya nr-i pa s+ya b+hI t+yA do lA ya mA no nr-i pa tirba b+hU ba/_/ta tras+thi tastaM k+Shi ti mI k+Sh+ya mA NaM ni ri k+Sh+ya bASh+pA ku li taM ku mA raH/_/ki me ta dista ga ta paM sha yAr+t+tiHso yaM sa mA dA ya da daR+sha le khaM/_/A dz+nyAM gu rorbuH
[\[60a.6\]]la mdza' mi bdag la 'jigs pas/_/mi bdag yid ni khyogs la bteg par gyur/_/mchi mas 'khrugs shing sa la blta ba de/_/gzhon nu de na gnas pas mthong gyur nas/_/'di dag ci zhes the tshom gyis gzir gyur/_/spring yig rang gis yang dag blangs nas bltas/_/brdzun gyi rab bskrun cher khros
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]sa ha dur gra hAn+tAM nish+tsi t+ya mi th+yot+tha ta tI bra ma n+yoH/_/tasmin+na sa h+ya bya sa no da ye pi sa tsin+ta yan+nish+tsa la d+her+Ya br-it+tiH/_/its+tshA pi tuM stA ba di yaM na laM g+h+yA rak+Sh+yash+tsa tat+ko sa b+ha yAn+n+r-i po yaM/_/mi th+yA pA ra d+hAt+ku pe to pi rA dzA pra pA da
[\[60b.2\]]bla ma'i bka'/_/gzung dka' bzod par dka' ba de mthong nas/_/mi bzad gdung ba rgyas pa de la yang /_/brtan pa'i spyod tshul g.yo med de yis bsams/_/re zhig pha yi bzhed 'di 'gong mi bya/_/de khros 'jigs las mi bdag 'di yang bsrungs/_/rgyal po rdzun gyi gnod pas khros mod kyang /_/dag pa
[\[60b.3\]]mA yA ti na shud+d+ha ba daiH/_/nai tre pa ri t+ya dz+ya pi tuHka ro mi ko pAg+ni tA pa pra sha maM su khA ya/_/a s+yA pi tats+tshA sha na b+haM ga dzan+mA ma hI pa ter+m+ma bya sa no da yostu/_/bi na shwe ra kle da ma ye sha rI re tsak+Shurdza la sto ka bi kA ra rU paM/_/
[\[60b.4\]]brjod pas rab tu dang mi 'gyur/_/mig ni yongs btang bde slad yab kyi ni/_/khro ba'i me gdung rab zhi bdag gis bya/_/sa bdag 'di yang de yi bka' bcag las/_/skyes pa'i gdung ba rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi brtan mi gtsang rang bzhin lus dag la/_/mig ni chu yi thigs pa'i rnams 'gyur gzugs/_/
[\[60b.5\]]kA nA matasmin+k+Sha Ni pra kA she tr-i Na pra dI pa pra ti bim+pa gu NAs+thA/_/lo ke ya dA lo tsa na lo b+ha lo b+hA ta saM rak+Sh+ya te tsak+Shu ra ti pra yat+nAta/_/rU paM ta de tat+ta ra nen+d+ra dzA la swasnA ba lI mi tra ma b+hit+ti tsi traM/_/tsi raM
[\[60b.6\]]rtswa sgron gzugs brnyan skad cig rab gsal ba/_/de la nges par yon tan ci zhig gnas/_/gang zhig blta thob la chags 'jig rten na/_/shin tu rab 'bad mig ni yang dag bsrungs/_/de dag gzugs de rab g.yo mig 'phrul dang /_/rmi lam 'phreng grogs rten med ri mo'o/_/yun ring
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bi tsIR+Ye ti na ren+d+ra sU nusta smin+na ni ts+tshA bi mu khe si rA dz+nyA/_/ni rbAr+Ya mA ne pi dza naiHpa bASh+pai ra kA ra yat+ta tra big+hA ta mak+Sh+NoH/_/he ma pa daHkrU ra ta re Na puM sA sa bit+ta lub+d+he na sa mud+d+h+r-i tAk+Sha/_/dur+b+bA
[\[61a.2\]]'di spyad mi dbang sras po yis/_/rgyal po de ni bzhed min phyir phyogs shing /_/skye bo mchi mar bcas pas bzlog gyur kyang /_/der ni mig dag nyams par byed du bcug_/gdug pa'i skyes bu nor la brkam pa yis/_/gser byin mig ni rab tu phyung ba des/_/mi zlog
[\[61a.3\]]ra mA taM ga kr-i tAp+dza puny+dza pad+mA ka rA kA ra tu lA ma ba pA/_/dza yo d+ya me ta tra sa ho pa yA tA pre mo tsi tA kAny+tsa na mA li kA s+ya/_/taM de sha ma b+h+ye t+ya bi naSh+Ta ne traM dr-iSh+Tai ba taM mo ha ha tA pa pA ta/_/a
[\[61a.4\]]glang pos chu skyes tshogs bcom pa'i/_/pad+ma'i 'byung gnas rnam par mtshungs pa thob/_/de yis mdza' bos gser gyi 'phreng ldan ma/_/rgyal bar spyor tshe lhan cig der 'ongs pas/_/gnas der mngon phyogs mig ni rnam nyams de/_/mthong ba nyid na rmongs pas bcom nas 'gyel/_/'du
[\[61a.5\]]bAp+ta saM dz+nyi bi pu la pra la yA taM ne tra lA ba n+ya bi lA pa lub+d+hAM/_/a ni t+ya tA tsin+ta na dr-iSh+Ta sa t+yaHsro taHpha lAp+t+yA sa dza gA da d+hi raH/_/mug+d+he d+h+r-i ti saM shra ya bikla ba twAn+ma mo ha dai n+yo da ya ka ta rA b+hUH/_/a ba
[\[61a.6\]]shes thob cing rgya cher rab gdung ba/_/mig mdzes rtse dga' la chags de la ni/_/mi rtag nyid bsams bden pa mthong gyur cing /_/rgyun zhugs 'bras thob brtan pa des smras pa/_/mdzes ma 'khrugs pa nyid las brtan pa bsten/_/rmongs dang dman rgyas skrag par ma byed cig_/srog chags
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]sh+ya b+ho gyA ni b+ha ban+ti b+hI ru swa kar+m+ma NA me ba pha lA ni dzan+toH/_/an+d+ho d+d+hu nA haM bi dza naM pa dzA mi kle sha sa hA twaM shra ya ban+d+ha gi haM/_/kAr+Yo na sho gaHsu b+ha go pa b+ho ga bi yo ga sA ro hi b+ha swa b+hA baH/_/i ti bru bA NaM ta mu bA tsa dzA yA
[\[61b.2\]]rnams kyis rang las 'bras bu ni/_/'jigs pa nges par spyad par bya ba yin/_/da ni dben par long ba nga nyid 'gro/_/khyod kyi nyon mongs mi bzod gnyen kha bsten/_/skal bzang longs spyod 'bral ba'i snying po ni/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin mya ngan yongs mi bya/_/zhes smra de la 'bral ba'i 'jigs pa yis/_/
[\[61b.3\]]bi yo gab+hI tA pa ri kam+pi tAM gI/_/nI lAM dza nA sraiHku tsa yorli khan+tI duHkha s+ya bi kr-I ta shi ba swa tsit+taM/_/t+ya dzA mi na twAM ma ha mAr+Ya pu tra na tat+ku lAr+haM pra ta maM ga nA nAM/_/ya dA pa di swaM pa hi ma n+ya rU paM bi b+hU Sha NaM shI
[\[61b.4\]]yongs 'dar lus can btsun mos rab smras pa/_/rang sems sdug bsngal la btsongs nu ma la/_/mig sman gyis sngo mchi mas 'bri ba bzhin/_/bdag ni rje yi sras khyod yongs mi gtong /_/gang zhig rgud tshe rang bdag gzugs gzhan gyur/_/rgyan dang tshul khrims bzhin du gtong ba 'di/_/bud med rnams kyi
[\[61b.5\]]la mi ba t+ya dza nI/_/pa tI bra taM bit+ta ma tAM pri yA ya yat+ne na be sh+yA a pi daR+sha yan+ti/_/pa tiHsa tI nA ma d+hi kaM pri yasta bi sang+ga tor+thI ba ma hA dza nA nAM/_/yaSh+TiHprakr-iSh+Ta na ya nAn+d+ha kA rets+tshA ya bi pat+tA pa pa ri
[\[61b.6\]]rigs 'os brtul zhugs min/_/dag pa'i brtul zhugs mdza' slad nor ldan la/_/smad 'tshong rnams kyang 'bad nas sten par byed/_/bdag po rgud gyur dag rnams lhag par mdza'/_/skye bo che rnams slong ba dag la bzhin/_/mig ni long ba'i rab mchog 'khar ba ste/_/rgud pa'i gdung bas ngal la grib bsil
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]shra me Shu/_/da pa ts+yu ta na bi Sha me Shu puM sAM na s+t+ye ba dzA yA sa dr-i sha sa hA yaH/_/i t+yar+thi taHpA da yu ge ni ba t+ya pat+n+yA pra yat+nA da tha rA dza pu traH/_/sa hai ba dzIr+N+NaM shu ka mA tra she She sta yA ba d+d+h+r-i t+ya ba sha nairdza
[\[62a.2\]]yin/_/gnas nyams skyes bu rnams kyi mi bzad la/_/grogs ni chung ma dang mtshungs yod ma yin/_/de ltar 'bad pas don gnyer rgyal po'i bu/_/stod g.yogs hrul po tsam lhag brtan pa dang /_/zhabs zung la gtugs chung ma de dang yang /_/lhan cig nyid du dal gyis song
[\[62a.3\]]gA ma/_/bI na pra bI NaHsa su gI ta gI taHpUr+b+ban+ta dA bar+t+ma su br-it+ti mA pa/_/bi pat+su puN+yaM bi b+ha be lA saHka lA sa maM nAsti d+ha naM na rA NAM/_/mat+tA li mA lA kwa Ni to pa me na bI NA sra ne na shra ba NA mr-i te na/_/pik+taHsa b+hi k+Shu sra Na
[\[62a.4\]]bar gyur/_/rgyud mang sbreng mkhas glu snyan len mkhas des/_/dang por de tshe lam du 'tsho ba thob/_/rgud na bsod nams 'byor na rtse 'jo yis/_/sgyu rtsal mtshungs pa'i nor ni mi la med/_/bung ba'i 'phreng ba myos pa'i sgra lta bu/_/rgyud mang sgra snyan rna ba'i bdud rtsi yis/_/bran bzhin bsod snyoms slong de
[\[62a.5\]]yI pra bI sh+ya ge he Sh+wa gA yad+da yi tA sa hA yaH/_/gu ru dza na ko pa sa mud+ga ma rA hu ni shir+N+Na pra b+hA ba sUr+ya NAM bi ta tha pa ri bA da bi sla ba kr-iSh+Na di na k+Sha yi ta tsa ri ta tsan+d+rA NAM/_/gu Ni ga Na du ga Na ni pa ti ta
[\[62a.6\]]chung ma dang /_/lhan cig khyim rnams su zhugs glu blangs pa/_/skye bo bla ma khros pas rab bskrun sgra gcan gyi ni mthu yis nyi ma rnam par nyams byas shing /_/bden med yongs su smra ba'i rnam par bslad pa nag phyogs nyin gyis spyod pas zla ba zad par byas/_/yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la sun 'byin [(]lhung [,]ltung [)]
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]gu Na ba ra rat+na pra b+hA da ri drA NAM ba hu ta ra duSh+p-i ta pa ri Na ti pa ba nA ha ti bi ga ta ne tra dI pa nAM/_/b+ha ba bi pu la dza la da bi d+yut+ta ra la ta rashrI pra kA ra ra hi tA nAM puN+yaiHpra sa ra ti pu na ra
[\[62b.2\]]bas yon tan mchog gi rin cen 'od kyis dbul bar 'gyur/_/rab mang nyes byas yongs su smin pa'i rlung gis bsnun pas mig gi sgron ma dag dang bral gyur pa/_/srid pa'i chu 'dzin che la glog bzhin shin tu g.yo ba'i dpal gyi rnam pa dag dang bral rnams la/_/bsod nams dag gis slar yang dam
[\[62b.3\]]pi d+har+m+ma sma ra NaM na bA lo kaH/_/kA laM ka lA bA na ti ba h+ya gA yan paiN+Di n+ya br-it+tiHsa bi be ka tsak+ShuH/_/ya yau pri yAM yaSh+Ti mi tA ba laM bya bi tuHpu raM pA Ta lu pu tra ma ba/_/taM dIr+g+ha duHkha d+h+wa da ri dra de haM shI tA ta pA
[\[62b.4\]]chos dran par gyur pa'i snang ba gsar pa rab tu spro bar byed/_/sgyu rtsal dang ldan mig gis dben pa de/_/glu len slong zhing 'tsho bas dus 'das nas/_/yab kyi grong khyer pA Ta li pu Tar/_/'khar ba la bzhin chung mar brten te song /_/ring po'i sdug bsngal lam gyis lus dman zhing /_/bzhin pad
[\[62b.5\]]pI ta mu kap+dza bar+N+NaM/_/kAn+ta sa khaM bAM k+Sh+ya dza naHku mA raM shA pak+Sha taM man+ma tha me ba me ne/_/sha naiHsa rA dzo pa ba nA ba li nAM pa mI pa mAp+taHk+Sha Na bi shra mAr+thi/_/u d+yA na pa leHsa ru Sha bra lA pai ra maM ga la
[\[62b.6\]]dag gis grang dang tsha ba 'thungs/_/gzhon nu mdzes ma dang 'grogs de mthong nas/_/skye bos yid srubs dmod pas nyams par shes/_/dal gyis rgyal po'i nags tshal 'phreng nye bar/_/phyin cing skad cig ngal gso don gnyer de/_/rtsub mor smra byed skyed tshal skyong rnams kyis/_/bkra mi shis
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]twAt+ph+ra ti Shid+h+ya mA naH/_/niHsaM shra yaHsaM shra ya mI ha mA naHsa hasti shA lA N+r-i pa terbi be sha/_/bI nA bi no da dA ra kau tu ke na dat+tA ba kA shaHka ri pA la ke na/_/ta trAn+d+ha mA lo kya ni bad+d+ha saM dz+nya staM kuny+dza ren+d+raHpa ri
[\[63a.2\]]phyir rab tu bkag gyur pa/_/gnas med gnas ni 'chol bar byed pa des/_/mi yi bdag gi glang po'i gnas su zhugs/_/rgyud mang rtsed mo la gus dge mtshan gyis/_/glang po skyong ba dag gi go skabs byin/_/der ni long ba de mthong shes gyur pa'i/_/glang po'i dbang pos gdong ni
[\[63a.3\]]braMt+ta bak+t+raH/_/tat+s+wA ga tA ye ba d+hA naM dza gardza kr-I DA shi khaN+Di pra dza dat+ta nr-it+taH/_/taM ni sh+tsa laM kuny+dza ra gardzi te na ni saM b+h+ra maM hasdi pa ko bi lo kya/_/a ho nu sa two da d+hi ra pra kaM s+yaHsu k+Sha tri yaHko pya ya mi t+ya bo tsan/_/ga
[\[63a.4\]]yongs bskor cing /_/de la legs 'ongs 'dri bzhin sgra chen bsgrags/_/gtsug ldan rtse ba'i tshogs kyi gar dag phul/_/de ni glang po'i sgra yis mi g.yo zhing /_/'khrul pa med mthong lag ldan bdag po yis/_/kye ma snying stobs rgya mtsho rab mi 'dar/_/rgyal rigs bzang po 'di ni sus zhes smras/_/glang por
[\[63a.5\]]dzan+mu khA kA tsa na mA li kA pi ni shwa s+ya dwir+g+ha sa ha so di gA prA/_/U tsa smr-i ta shrI bi b+ha bA b+hi mA nA saM b+ha ha yan+ti tsa ra Nau pri ya s+ya/_/nr-i t+yan+ti ye ta ba pu raHshi khi no g+ha nA shA lo lAHpa raM ga di pa ter+b+ra dza gardzi
[\[63a.6\]]mngon phyogs gser gyi phreng ldan ma/_/dpal 'byor mngon par khengs pa dran gyur te/_/'phral la mchi ma 'dzag cing shugs rings 'byin/_/khyo yi zhabs dag nyed cing rab smras pa/_/glang po'i sgra yis lag ldan bdag po khyod kyi mdun na gang /_/sprin gyi bsam pas g.yo ldan gtsug phud can
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]te na/_/ko mA ra ba d+hi ku la saM b+ha ba e Sha bar+hi gardza k+Sha Na pa te ra pi nir+b+bi kA raH/_/ta taHsa rA gA tsa pa lA b+ha pa t+ya do Shon+mu kha dwe Sha ba tI ba san+d+h+yA/_/kr-i twA ra biM lo tsa nA dzi ba b+hU taM bi bad+d+ha sAn+d+h+yaM bi
[\[63b.2\]]ni gar rab byed/_/rma bya 'di dag gzhon nu'i rma bya'i rigs las 'khrungs pa ste/_/tshogs kyi bdag pos sgra bsgrags tshe yang rnam par 'gyur ba med/_/de nas chags ldan g.yo ba'i thun mtshams ni/_/skyon la mngon phyogs zhe sdang ldan bzhin 'ongs/_/mig ldan 'tsho bar gyur pa'i nyi ma bcom/_/skye bo mun pa rnam par
[\[63b.3\]]da d+hi dza na s+ya/_/lak+Sh+mI bi yo ga gra pi taM bi lokya pad+ma ka ra saM ku tsi tA na nAb+dzaM/_/sho kA b+hi b+hU ta b+ha bi ta bya tA yA dza shoM swa b+hA ba b+h+ra ma rA ba lI ba/_/bi shwa pra kA shai ka ma Ni pra dI pe yA te ra bau dI pa sa ha sra la k+Sh+yaiH/_/nA
[\[63b.4\]]rgyas par bsgrubs/_/pad+mo'i 'byung gnas chu skyes bzhin zum po/_/phun tshogs bral zhing dman pa mthong gyur nas/_/bung ba'i 'phreng ba mya ngan gyis zil mnan/_/nges par myong bya'i rang bzhin glu len bzhin/_/kun gsal nor bu'i sgron ma gcig pu nyid/_/nyi ma 'das tshe mar me stong 'bum gyis/_/nyin
[\[63b.5\]]b+hUd+d+hi bya lo ka la bA nu ka raHsar+b+bA ti rik+taM ma ha tAM ha te dzaH/_/sa rA dza d+hA nI ma Ni he ma har+m+m+yA pra kA sha mA nA ti mi re ra rA dza/_/b+hak+t+yai ba b+har+t+tu rbi hi to ba kA rA kr-its+tshe ra shI lA b+ha ra NA sa tI ba/_/lab+d+hA d+hi kA rA ti mi rod+ga tiHkr-i twA
[\[63b.6\]]mo'i snang ba cha la mtshungs ma gyur/_/gang phyir chen po'i gzi byin kun las lhag_/rgyal khang nor bu gser gyi ba gam can/_/rab gsal de ni mun la rab mdzes te/_/bdag po rgud tshe gus pas phan pa nyid/_/sgrub byed tshul khrims rgyan ldan dag pa bzhin/_/rab rib rab rgyas gtso bo nyid thob des/_/ma
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ni ra lo ka ma she Sha lo kaM/_/in+du da yA raM b+ha b+hA yA b+hi b+hA tA ni lI ya mA ne ba sha nairba b+hU ba/_/ya thA ya yau shrA ma la la k+Sh+mA le khA san+de sha shI la li pi san+ni be shaH/_/ku mad+ba tI haR+Sha su kr-it+si tAM shuHpad+mA ka ra
[\[64a.2\]]lus 'jig rten snang ba med byas nas/_/zla ba 'char rtsom 'jigs pas zil mnan te/_/dal bu yis ni yib pa bzhin du gyur/_/de nas nag po'i mtshan mo'i ri mo ni/_/'phrin gyi ngang tshul yig 'phreng rab bkod pa/_/ku mud can dga'i legs byas bsil zer can/_/pad+mo'i
[\[64a.3\]]shrI pa ri hA ra le kheH/_/a pU ra ya ta kAn+ti pi tAM shu ke na shu tsiHsu d+d+hAM shur+Ya sha se ba bi shwaM/_/dug+d+ha twi ShA mug+d+ha mr-i NA la bal+lI na bAM ku rA kA ra ma yU kha le khaH/_/ta taHk+Sha yA yAM sh+la tha yo ba nA yAM sha naiHsha shAM
[\[64a.4\]]'byung gnas dpal 'phrog spring yig byung /_/bdud rtsi'i zer dkar yid 'ong pad rtsa yi/_/'khri shing myu gu gsar dbyibs 'od ris kyi/_/'o ma'i 'od ldan mdzes pa'i gos dkar gyis/_/grags pas bzhin du thams cad khyab par byed/_/de nas mtshan mo'i lang tsho nyams gyur cing /_/zla ba mkha' la
[\[64a.5\]]ko da pi lam+ba mA ne/_/klai bya k+Sha yAn+na ga b+h+r-i to bi ni drA ni drA ya mA Ni dza ga duHku mA raM/_/ut+tiSh+Tha gAn+d+har+b+bi ka kin+na bI NA ma kaM sa mA ro pya kaM laM kwa Nan+ti/_/kAn+tI mi bai tAM na kha pa to lo lAM gri taM na bI NaM bi tarno Shi kAM tsa ta/_/i te
[\[64a.6\]]dal gyis babs pa'i tshe/_/skyo nges nyams pas rnam par gnyid sad pa'i/_/gzhon nu la ni glang po 'dzin pas smras/_/dri za can longs mi 'am ci rnams kyi/_/mdzes ma bzhin ni pang du rab bkod nas/_/sen mo btab bskyod yid 'ong snyan sgrogs shing /_/glu dang rgyud mang 'ga' zhig mi len nam/_/zhes
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]pra lA paiHshra mA nI dra yar+t+ta sa tir+m+ma de dai ra nu bad+d+hA mA naH/_/A dA ya bI NAM tsa ma lA mu hUr+t+ta ma tsin+ta yan+nI tsa pa tsaHpra tap+taH/_/dzI ba t+ya ho byA g+h+ra ga Nai ni sak+tai rA g+h+ra ta rak+ta ra g+h+r-i nai r+g+r-i hi teH/_/k+Shi bai ra d+hi k+Shi
[\[64b.2\]]smra rgyags shing 'phyar ba de dag gis/_/rjes bskul ngal zhing gnyid kyis gzir gyur pa/_/dman pa'i tshig gis rab gdungs yid byung bas/_/rgyud mang blangs nas yud tsam rab bsams pa/_/kye ma stag gi tshogs ni brtse med dag_/khrag la snom zhing nye bar lhags pa dang /_/rgyal po'i 'bangs ni myos pa'i
[\[64b.3\]]pa ka Tu pra lA pai rA bad+d+hA le Tairna tu rA dza tse TaiH/_/ni han+ti mA naM bi da d+hA ti ladz+dzaM ts+tshi nat+ti shar+m+mA Ni ta no ti tA baM/_/a sa h+ya ni rbai da bi par+pi d+hA yI na nI tsa se bA sa dri shosti sho kaH/_/mu hurbi tsiM t+ya ti sa nI tsa bA kyaM lI
[\[64b.4\]]tshogs bcas te/_/smod rtsub brjod pas gzung ba 'tsho ma yin/_/nga rgyal nyams myong ngo tsha sgrub par byed/_/bde ba 'joms byed gdung ba rgyas par byed/_/mi bzod sdug bsngal rgud pa skyed byed pa/_/dman pa'i bstan pa dang mtshungs mya ngan med/_/dman pa'i tshig de yang yang des bsams nas/_/
[\[64b.5\]]nA ba mA na bya sa nAg+ni tap+taH/_/ni shwa s+ya kA la k+Shi pa NA b+hi kAM k+Sha sha nai ra gA lat+ka la yan+bi pany+tsI/_/ma non+mAr+theHpra thi ta bi g+h+ra ba b+haM sa the lo pa ha sairnir+m+maR+YA dai ru di ta tsa ri taiHpA Ta naiHsA d+ha bA deH/_/mar+m+ma spaR+sha bya tha
[\[64b.6\]]smad pa'i gdung ba tsha ba'i mes reg pas/_/shugs phyung dus ni 'phang bar mngon 'dod pas/_/dal gyis rgyud mang dag ni sbreng zhing blangs/_/khengs pa rab 'joms dregs dang nor nyams bde blag tu ni nye bar rgod/_/tshul lugs min dang du ba'i spyod dang 'byed par byed dang skyon can dang /_/gnad du reg pa'i gdung
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]na bi Sha ma kle sha sha l+yA ya mA nai hA saM sA rar+kha la ka ma na yA nar+m+ma lI lAHka ro ti/_/bi tsa la da ni lo lol+lad+bal+lI da lAM tsa la tsaM tsa laHs+thi ra ta ra ma hot+pA haM puM sAM ka ro ti b+ha ba b+h+ra maH/_/a b+hi
[\[65a.2\]]ba mi bzod nyon mongs zug rngu ltar spyod pas/_/kye ma 'khor ba dag ni mi bsrun tshul gyis sbyar ba'i rtse dga' byed/_/rlung gis rab bskyod 'khri shing rab tu g.yo ba'i 'dab rtse ltar mi brtan/_/srid pa 'khor bas kye ma skyes bu rnams la rmongs pa rab brtan byed/_/chus gang skye
[\[65a.3\]]ka ta ra lAs+t+rA trA pye tA dza lA bi la sa m+mi ladz+dza na g+ha na ba na pro d+yad+bi d+yud+bi lA sa ra sa shri yaH/_/bi b+ha ba bi ra ha kle sha klAn+ta su kAn+ta ma hA ba Te na ya na bi ka laHpaM kur+m+mU kaSh+ts+yu to pi bi rA dza te/_/sa
[\[65a.4\]]bo'i sprin tshogs yang dag 'dus pas rab brtsams glog gi ni/_/rtse dga'i nyams ldan dpal 'byor 'di dag de la yang ni lhag par g.yo/_/skyes bu rnams kyi rgud pa mtha' dag bsrung ba'i rin chen tshul khrims ni/_/rab gsal bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin dri med gal te cha yang ma nyams na/_/'byor
[\[65a.5\]]ka la bi pa daM rak+ShA rat+naM pra kA sha su d+hA ma yaM ya di na bi ma laM shi laM pum+sA ma nA ga pi khaN+Di taM/_/dzaSh+TA bed+m+ri dza la s+tha laM sa sa ka laM spaR+she na gan+d+he na bA bud+d+h+yA sar+b+ba ma bai mi durga ma pa thaM shru twA pra dza mya n+ya
[\[65a.6\]]pa dang bral nyon mongs kyis nyen 'dren byed ma tshangs 'phye bo dang /_/lkugs par bde ba'i mjug tu g.yang sa chen por lhung yang rnam par mdzes/_/chu dang thang yang dbyug pas rig cing mtha' dag reg pa'am dri dag gis rtogs la/_/blo gros kyis ni bgrod dka'i lam kun rig cing thos nas gzhan du bdag
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]taH/_/bi shwA sAn+ta ra sak+ta g+ho ra na ra ka kle shaM na dzA nA t+ya pA ban+d+he ni ti bi DaM bya te ba hu ta raM mo hAn+d+ha da g+d+ho dza naH/_/i t+yAt+ma br-it+t+ya nu kr-i ti pra br-it+taM shA yA t+yu dA raM pa ra se na tasmin/_/harmya pra sup+ta sa ha
[\[65b.2\]]'gro ste/_/rmongs pas long zhing tshig pa'i skye bo 'di dag yid brtan dbus su chags gyur pa'i/_/'jigs rung dmyal ba'i nyon mongs mi shes so zhes long bas rab mang co 'dri bzhin/_/de ltar bdag nyid spyod pa'i rjes mthun 'jug_/yid 'ong nyams ldan de yi glu blangs tshe/_/mtshan mo'i mjug tu sa bdag
[\[65b.3\]]sa pra bud+d+haHk+Sha pA ba sA ne k+Shi ti paHpra dad+d+h+yau/_/sa dai ba duHswap+na ni rI k+Sha Ne na shaM kA ka laM kair+b+h+r-i sha mA ku lo haM/_/a d+ya pi me tak+Sha shi la ni bA pI ni kaM ku mA raHbra hi No ti le khaM/_/kiM ba s+thi to ni t+ya ma bi smr-i ta s+yA ta s+yA ha mA san+na mu kho n+mu kha
[\[65b.4\]]khang bzang na/_/gzims pa 'phral la sad nas rab tu bsams/_/rtag tu rmi lam ngan pa mthong nyid kyis/_/dogs pa'i chu bos bdag ni rab tu 'khrugs/_/gzhon nu rdo 'jog na gnas da lta yang /_/bdag la spring yig ci phyir yongs mi spring /_/rtag tu mi brjed nye ba'i bzhin ras la/_/mngon phyogs de ni nga nyid brjed dam
[\[65b.5\]]s+yA/_/tsi ra pra bA se na dza na s+ya nU naM sne ha nu ban+d+huHshi thi lI b+ha ban+ti/_/shri No mi tsai Sha ga ma kA nu ban+d+haM mUr+ts+tsha dwi paM tsI ma d+hu ra swa rAM kaM/_/tat+tu l+ya me ba shra ba NA nu kU laM gan+d+har+b+ba lo kA di ba gI taM shap+daM/_/ta s+yai ba tA ban+m+r-i
[\[65b.6\]]ci/_/nges par yun ring bral bas skye bo ni/_/mdza' ba'i rjes su 'ching ba lhod par 'gyur/_/ga ma kas bcings glu yi sgra 'di yang /_/rgyud mang dbyangs snyan gyis mtshan rab gsal ba/_/de yi nyid mtshungs snyan pa'i rjes mthun pa/_/dri za'i 'jig rten las bzhin bdag gis thos/_/re zhig glu snyan 'di
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]du gI ta ma tata gU D+haHsa kasmAt+ki mi daM na dzA ne/_/k+Sha Ne bi tsin+t+ye ti bi sr-i dz+ya rA dza ma hat+ta raM pu tra ma thA ni nA ya/_/du rAt+ta mA yAn+ta mu dasta ne traM sa ro ru haM shrI ra hi ta bi lo kya/_/pu traM pa ri dz+nyA ya ba d+hU sa hA yaM ma hI
[\[66a.2\]]ni de nyid kyi/_/ci slad de yib 'di ci yongs mi shes/_/skad cig nyid ltar rnam bsams rgyal po yi/_/nyug rum pa btang bu ni de nas bos/_/ring nas mig bral de ni 'ong ba dag_/mtsho skyes dpal dang bral ba bzhin mthong nas/_/chung mar bcas pa'i bu ni yongs shes te/_/sa yi
[\[66a.3\]]pa tir+m+mu hi ta saM pa pA taH/_/sa lab+d+ha sa dz+nyaHsha na kairdza ne na hi mats+tsha TA shI ka ra dan+tu re Na/_/sa mI pa mAp+taM nr-i pa tiHku mA ra mut+saM ga mA ro pya tsi raM shu sho tsa/_/hA pu tra ne trot+sa ba dzI ba lo ke kasmA di mA duHkha da shAM shri to
[\[66a.4\]]bdag po rmongs pas bcom nas 'gyel/_/kha ba'i zer ma'i thigs 'dra chus reg pas/_/dal gyis 'du shes thob pa'i mi bdag de/_/gzhon nu nye bar 'ongs pa phang par ni/_/yang dag bkod nas yun ring mya ngan byas/_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mig spro kyi hud bu/_/sdug bsngal skabs 'di khyod kyis ci slad
[\[66a.5\]]si/_/bi lo Da ni tat+su ra sun+da rI NAM kwa lo tsa nAM b+ho dza yu gaM ga taM te/_/gAM b+hIR+Ya b+hU me gu Na rat+na ko sha sa ra swa ti bal+la b+ha sa two rA she/_/twat+taHkwa pA bi b+h+ra ma b+hU sra yA tA hi mA ha tAM b+ho dza ba nA di ba shrIH/_/rU pa kwa tat+k+wo da ma sa h+ya
[\[66a.6\]]bsten/_/lha yi mdzes ma rmongs byed khyod kyi ni/_/mig gi chu skyes zung de gang du song /_/zab mo'i sa gzhi yon tan rin chen mdzod/_/snying stobs phung po dbyangs can grogs khyod las/_/kha bas bcom pa'i chu skyes tshal las bzhin/_/rnam 'phrul sa gzhi dpal de gang du song /_/gang du gzugs de mi bzod long
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]mAb+d+h+yaM kwa sA b+hi b+hU tiHkwa tsa durda ne yaM/_/na dIR+Ya te me hr-i da yaM na dzA ne ke nA s+ya dat+taHku li sho pa de shaH/_/kwA pau dza nas+t+wad+bi b+ha ba nu sA rI ku lA nu rU po b+ha ba nish+tsa le yaM/_/e kai ba sat+nI pa ri bA ra she ShaHkr-its+tshe pi sA d+ho ri pa d+haiR+Ya
[\[66b.2\]]'di gar/_/'byor de gang du gang du skabs ngan 'di/_/bdag snying mi 'gas 'di la su zhig gis/_/rdo rje'i man ngag byin pa yongs mi shes/_/khyod 'byor rjes 'brang skye bo de gang du/_/khyod kyi chung ma g.yo med gcig pu 'di/_/sdug kyang dam pa'i brtan pa'i spyod tshul bzhin/_/rigs kyi rjes mthun 'khor gyi lhag
[\[66b.3\]]br-it+tiH/_/i t+yA shru saM be ga bi shIr+N+NaM d+hu lA pe nasta s+ya ba tso ni sha mye/_/na twA ku mA rasta mu bA tsa d+hI ra stUr+N+NaM ta de kA da ba tIR+Ya b+hU miM/_/bi muny+tsa pri th+wI pu ra hU ta sho kaM shu tsA b+hi b+hU tA na b+ha ban+ti d+hI rAH/_/k+Sha yA ya dzA gar+t+ti na to nu b+hA bA me Sha swa b+hA
[\[66b.4\]]mar gyur/_/zhes pa mchi ma'i rgyun gyis yi ge nyams/_/cho nge smra ba de yi tshig thos nas/_/de yi phang las myur du sar babs te/_/gzhon nu brtan pas de la btud nas smras/_/sa yi brgya byin mya ngan rnam par thong /_/mya ngan dag gis zil mnan brtan pa min/_/mtho dang dma' rnams brlag slad nges par ni/_/myong bya'i
[\[66b.5\]]bo b+ha bi ta bya tA yAH/_/ai shwaR+Ya mAsh+tsaR+Ya su khA ba taM saM lA baN+ya lak+Sh+mi ti la kaM pa push+tsa/_/k+Sha Ne na yA t+ye ba kr-i tAM ta narma kar+m+mor+m+mi nir+m+ma Na hr-i taM na rA NAM/_/b+ha be da b+hA bA nu b+ha be b+ha be smin sa te swa b+hA bo ya di b+hA ba brgaH/_/
[\[66b.6\]]rang bzhin 'di ni mel tshe byed/_/mi rnams dbang phyug ngo mtshar bde ba yi/_/rna rgyan can dang dpal mdzes thig le can/_/lus kyang mthar byed rtse ba'i las rlabs kyi/_/sprul pas phrogs pa skad cig nyid kyis 'gro/_/gal te dngos med nyams myong srid pa 'dir/_/dngos tshogs rang bzhin bden par gyur pa na/_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]d+h+ru baM na kaR+Yurmu na yasta de te saM t+yak+ta b+ho gI bi dza ne ni ba saM/_/i ti bru bA Na sa bi pan+ni mIt+taM pr-iSh+TaHsu naHsho ka ma ye na rA dz+nyA/_/n+ya be da yel+le kha ni ban+d+ha masmai ni dza sha nairne tra bi nA sha brat+ti/_/shru twai
[\[67a.2\]]thub pa 'di dag longs spyod yongs btang nas/_/nges par dben pa dag tu gnas mi byed/_/ces smras de la rgud pa'i rgyu mtshan ni/_/rgyal po mya ngan ldan pas yang yang dris/_/de la dal gyis spring yig dang 'brel pa'i/_/rang gi mig ni rnam par nyams tshul bshad/_/spyod ngan
[\[67a.3\]]ba tat+tI bra b+h+r-i shaM sa br-it+taM ni br-it+taM br-it+te Sh+wa pi na pra bit+taM/_/ku ThA ra d+hA rA pa ri pU ri b+hU ta mU laHpa pA ta shA khI ba d+ha ra/_/sa lab+d+ha saM dz+nyAHku Ti laM bi tsin+d+ya taM ti Sh+ya rak+ShA ra tsi taM pra yo gaM/_/sa mu d+ya yau s+t+rI ba d+ha pA ta
[\[67a.4\]]spyod pa rnams la'ang ma spyad pa'i/_/gtum pa'i spyod tshul mi bzad de thos nas/_/sta re rnon pos rtsa ba yongs bcad pa'i/_/yal 'dab can bzhin 'dzin byed yu ba 'gyel/_/'du shes thob des skar rgyal srung ba yis/_/bkod pa'i sbyor ba gya gyu de bsams nas/_/de yi chad pa bud med gsod pa yi/_/
[\[67a.5\]]ko pa d+har+m+mA da re Ne ba bi ni gra he s+yAH/_/krot+Ya pra kA re bi pu lA pa ka re tasmin+p+ra tI ka ra sa mu d+ya taM taM/_/a bA ra yad+huHsa hA duHkha yo gaM swa kar+m+ma pA ke ba da na ku mA raH/_/ta ma bra bId+b+hA mi pa tir+b+ya thArtAHsho ke na ko pe nA ba da h+ya
[\[67a.6\]]sdig la'ang chos la gus pa bzhin brtson gyur/_/gdug pa'i rnam pa gnod pa rgya che ba/_/de la len sbyor rab tu brtson pa de/_/rang las smin pas bzod dka'i sdug bsngal dang /_/ldan par smra ba'i gzhon nus rab tu bzlog_/sa bdag gdung bas gzir cing mya ngan dang /_/khro bas tshig pas de la rab
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]mA naH/_/mo hAt+ki me tAM ni shi ti ma nAR+Ya kroR+Ya pra sak+taM pa ri rak+Sha sid+d+haM/_/dwe Sho d+ya te sne ha ni ban+d+ha ne bA tu l+yaM ma no ya s+ya sa kim+ma nu Sh+yaH/_/ya s+yA pa kA rasti na ro Sha le shasta s+yo pa kA ra pi ka thaM pra sA daH/_/i ti shwa san+taM pra la
[\[67b.2\]]smras pa/_/gdug pa la chags 'phags min gtum mo 'di/_/khyod ni rmongs pas yongs su srung ngam ci/_/sdang bar sbyor dang mdza' bas bcings pa la/_/mtshungs pa'i yid can gang de mi'am ci/_/gang la gnod la khro ba'i cha med pa/_/de la phan la drin yang ji ltar yod/_/ces pa rab smra shugs 'byin gzir
[\[67b.3\]]san+taM mar+t+taM d+hI raHku mA raHpi ta raM dza ga da/_/ra dzan+na me duHkha la bosti kash+tsit+tI prA pa kA ro bi na ma n+yu tA paH/_/ma naHpra san+naM ya di me dza na n+yAM ye nod d+h+r-i te ba swa ka re Na ne tre/_/tat+te na sa t+ye na ma mAstu tA ban+ne tra dwa yaM prAk+ta na me ba
[\[67b.4\]]ba yi/_/yab la gzhon nu brtan pas rab smras pa/_/rgyal po bdag la sdug bsngal cha 'ga' med/_/mi bzad gnod la'ang khro ba'i gdung ba min/_/mi bdag rang gi lag gis phyung ba bzhin/_/gal te ma la bdag yid rab dang na/_/bden pa de yis re zhig mig gnyis ni/_/sngon bzhin 'phral la yang dag
[\[67b.5\]]sa d+yaH/_/i t+yuk+ta ma tre nr-i pa nan+da na s+ya srA dur+b+ba b+hU bA k+Shi pa ro dza yuk+maM/_/sa t+ya pra ta pra t+ya ya kA ri lo ke bi lo b+ha naM tat+k+Sha Na me pa la k+Sh+m+yoH/_/nr-i paHsu khot+sA haM ka raM pra dzA nAM bI rA dza mA naM na ya na dwa ye na/_/taM pau ra rA
[\[67b.6\]]'byung bar shog_/ces brjod tsam la de yi dus nyid na/_/mi bdag bu yi spyan gyi mtsho skyes zung /_/'jig rten bden pa'i brtul zhugs yid ches byed/_/dpal mo rnam par chags byed rab tu byung /_/'dren byed zung gis rnam par mdzes gyur cing /_/skye rgu rnams ni bde dang spro byed pa'i/_/bu de rgyal tshab
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dz+ye bi mu khaM bi di twA ta mAt+ma dzaM saM pa di na n+ya yuk+ta/_/g+ho rA pa tsa raM sa dr-i shaM bi d+hA ya pat+n+yAHpra ti kA ra ma tha k+Shi tI shaH/_/ko d+hA na laM ta k+Sha shi lA d+hi pe pi tan+maR+sha NAd+duHsa ha mut+sa sardza/_/tat+kau tu kAd+b+hik+Shu ga
[\[68a.2\]]las phyir phyogs shes nas/_/mi bdag de yis phun tshogs rnams la bskos/_/de nas sa bdag gis ni btsun mo la/_/drag po'i gnod la mtshungs pa'i lan bsgrubs bzhin/_/rdo 'jog dbang po la yang khro ba'i me/_/bzod dka' de yis bzod pas rab tu btang /_/dge mtshan de las dge
[\[68a.3\]]Ne na pr-iSh+TaHpro bA tsa saM g+ha s+tha bi raHsa bi dwan/_/dzan+mAn+ta re lub+d+ha ka e Sha kA shi pu re ba b+hU ba k+Shi ti pA la pu traH/_/gu hA pra biSh+TaM hi ma bat+ta TAn+te lab+d+hA mr-i gA NAM sha ta pany+tsa kaM saH/_/an+d+haM bi d+hA yAk+Shi bi pA Ta ne na ya tho pa byak+taM n+ya
[\[68a.4\]]slong tshogs kyis dris/_/dge 'dun gnas brtan mkhas pa des smras pa/_/sa skyong bu 'di skye ba gzhan la ni/_/ka shi'i grong khyer dag tu rngon par gyur/_/de yis gangs ldan ngos kyi phug zhugs pa'i/_/ri dgas lnga brgya dag ni thob gyur nas/_/mig dag phyung nas long bar rab bsgrubs te/_/ji ltar nye bar
[\[68a.5\]]ba d+hIt+k+ra me Na/_/a thA n+ya dzan+ma n+ya pi bA la ko sau mug+d+d+hA b+hi d+haHshreSh+Thi su taHpra mo hAta/_/tsa kA ra tsai t+ya pra ti ma dzaM na s+ya shaste Na lo tsa nA mA na nAb+dzaM/_/sa dzA ta saM dz+nyash+tsa na ben+d+ra nI laM ma yaM bya d+hA dak+Shi yu gaM sa ta s+ya/_/ta to
[\[68a.6\]]'khor ba rim gyis bsad/_/de nas skye gzhan la yang tshong dpon bu/_/mug d+ha zhes ni byis pa rab rmongs las/_/mchod rten gyi ni rgyal ba'i sku gzugs kyi/_/bzhin ras pad+ma mtshon gyis mig med byas/_/'du shes bskyed des de yi spyan zur dag_/in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin gsar du bsgrubs/_/de nas
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]n+ya dzan+ma n+ya pi shIr+N+Na tsai t+yai saM skA ra pU dzAHsa su nash+tsa kA ra/_/ne trA pa hA re Na ba ne mr-i gA NI bA l+ye ba tsai t+ya pra ti mA k+Shi lo pAta/_/a bAp+ta bA ne Sha bi nA sha ma k+ShA+ordzan+mAn+ta re Sh+wa d+ye ba rA dza pu traH/_/sa rat+na ne traM pra ti
[\[68b.2\]]skye gzhan la yang mchod rten ni/_/zhig pa gso dang mchod pa dag kyang byas/_/nags su ri dgas rnams kyi mig phrogs shing /_/byis pas mchod rten sku gzugs spyan phyis pas/_/rgyal po'i bu 'dis skye ba gzhan rnams dang /_/da lta mig dag rnam par nyams pa thob/_/rin chen mig ldan sku
[\[68b.3\]]mAny+tsa kr-itwA dr-iSh+Ti bi nASh+TAM pu na rA sa pA da/_/bi shIr+N+Na tsai t+ya pra ti pU ra ne na pra sA di kaHkIn+taM ma yash+tsa dzA taH/_/shro taHprAp+ti pha la bra br-it+ta bi ma lA lo ka kra me NA mu nA bai rA gyo dz+wa la pa t+ya daR+sha na bi d+hau la b+hU d+hi kA
[\[68b.4\]]gzugs byas pa yis/_/rnam par nyams pa'i mig ni slar yang thob/_/mchod rten zhig pa rab tu rgyas byas pas/_/rab tu dang ldan mdzes pa'i rang bzhin gyur/_/rgyun zhugs 'bras bur rab 'jug dri ma dang bral snang ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/_/chags bral rab 'bar bden pa mthong ba'i sgrub byed dag la gnas
[\[68b.5\]]ras+thi tiH/_/samyak+pu N+ya ba shAd+b+ha bi Sh+ya ti sha naiHkA le na saM bud+d+ha tA mi t+yuk+taM s+tha bi re Na b+hik+Shu ni ba haHshru twA b+ha bang+gismi taH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM b+ho d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la ta yAM
[\[68b.6\]]ba'i dbang gyur thob/_/dus kyi yang dag bsod nams dbang las dal gyi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes pa gnas brtan gyis gsungs dge slong tshogs kyis thos nas ya mtshan ldan par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]ku NA lA ba dA na me kon+na ShaSh+Tha taHpal+la baH//_//i ha ka Sha ti sha rI raM kle sha rA shirna rA NAM da ha ti tsa pa ra lo ke nA ra kaHkru ra ba h+niH/_/sha ra Na ga ma na pu n+ya
[\[69a.2\]]'khri shing las ku lA la'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//'di ni mi rnams lus dag nyon mongs phung pos rab tu gdungs/_/'jig rten pha rol tu yang mi bzad dmyal ba'i me yis bsregs/_/skyabs 'gro'i bsod nams dang ni
[\[69a.3\]]prAp+ti shik+ShA pa dA nAM pra b+ha ba ti na tu de he duHkha dA haHka dA tsita/_/d+ha na nA mA sa mu drAn+te nA go b+hUd+ba hu bAn+d+ha baH/_/pha Na rat+no dz+wa lA lo ka ka li ta pUr+b+ba ba sa raH/_/pa pA tA harni shaM ta s+ya b+ha
[\[69a.4\]]bslab pa'i gnas dag thob rnams kyi/_/lus la nam yang sdug bsngal dag gis sreg pa'i mthu yod min/_/rgya mtsho'i mtha' ni nor zhes pa'i/_/klu ni gnyen mang ldan pa byung /_/gdengs ka'i rin cen rab 'bar gyi/_/snang bas sngon med nyin mor byas/_/de yi khang par nyin mtshan du/_/bye tshan
[\[69a.5\]]ba ni tap+ta ba lu kA/_/ya yAM ge Shu b+hu dzaM gA mA nAM tI pra tA pa bya thAM b+ha ba ta/_/ka dA tsitU d+ha no nA ma pu traHprats+tsha tAM pri yaH/_/su ku mA raHpra kr-i t+ye ba bA lu kA pa ri pI Di taH/_/kasma da ma ni yan+te ta bA pa ti tap+ta bA
[\[69a.6\]]dag ni babs gyur te/_/gang gis lag 'gro rnams kyi lus/_/gdung ba drag pos nyen par gyur/_/nor bzang zhes bya gces pa'i bu/_/rang bzhin nyid kyis rab gzhon pa/_/bye mas yongs su gzer gyur pas/_/nam zhig de la rab tu dris/_/yab gcig bye ma tsha ba 'dis/_/bdag cag ci slad gdung
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]lu kA/_/man+d+ra mU la pra yo ge na ke ne ya mu pa shA mya ti/_/asma da b+h+ya d+hi kAHke tsi dasmat+p+ra t+ya ba rAHpa re/_/nA gAHsan+ti sa mu dresmin duHkhAr+t+tA ba ya me ba keM/_/i ti pr-iSh+TaHsa pu tre Na ta mu bA tsa ma hA ma tiH/_/ya thA n+ya pha Ni
[\[69b.2\]]bar byed/_/sngags dang rtsa ba'i sbyor ba dag_/ci yis nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_/'ga' zhig bdag las lhag pa dang /_/gzhan ni bdag las dman pa yi/_/klu ni rgya mtsho 'di na gnas/_/yu nyid sdug bsngal gyis gzir ci/_/zhes pa bu yis dris de la/_/blo gros chen po des smras bu/_/ji ltar gdengs can
[\[69b.3\]]na pu tra d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na ta thA ba yaM/_/d+har+m+mo pa de sha shud+d+hA nAM shan+tA nAM sa t+ya bA di nAM/_/u pa tA po b+ha ba t+ye ba na sha rI ro na mA na saH/_/na tA na spr-i sha ti saM tA paHpuN+ya rat+na tra yaM bu d+hAH/_/ye bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma
[\[69b.4\]]gzhan gyi chos/_/shes pa de ltar yu cag min/_/chos kyi nyer bstan gyis dag pa/_/zhi zhing bden par smra rnams la/_/nges par nye bar gdung gyur pa/_/lus la ma yin yid la'ang min/_/sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs zhes pa/_/skyabs 'os bsod nams dkon cog ni/_/gsum la skyabs song
[\[69b.5\]]saM g+hA khyaM sha ra N+yaM sha ra NaM ga tAH/_/shi k+Sha pa dA n+ya bAp+tA ni kle sha pra sha ma nA ni yaiH/_/te ShA ma mr-i ta sik+tA nAM pA pa tA pa b+ha yaM ku taH/_/shrA bas+t+ya mAsti b+ha ga bAn dzi no dze ta ba nA shu yaH/_/lo ke shAkya ma niHsar+b+ba
[\[69b.6\]]mkhas pa gang /_/de la yongs gdung reg mi byed/_/gang gis nyon mongs rab zhi ba'i/_/bslab pa'i gnas rnams thob gyur cing /_/bdud rtsis bran pa de dag la/_/sdig dang 'jigs pa gang la spyod/_/shAkya thub pa 'jig rten gyi/_/nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi'i gnyen/_/rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal gnas la/_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]klai sha pra sha ma bAn+d+ha baH/_/u pa de shAM shu ni ba haiHsatwa shu b+h+rairdza gat+t+ra ye/_/ka ru Na kau mu dI su ti ra mr-i taM so b+hi baR+Sha ti/_/dur+b+bi nI tA na rak+Sh+yan+ti prA pya shi k+Sha pa dA ni ya/_/tI bra
[\[70a.2\]]mnyan yod na ni bcom ldan yod/_/snying rje zla ba'i 'od bskyed de/_/sems dpa' ltar dkar man ngag gis/_/'od zer tshogs kyis 'gro gsum du/_/bdud rtsi'i char pa mngon par 'babs/_/gang zhig rnam par ma thul bas/_/bslab pa'i gnas thob mi srung ba/_/de dag
[\[70a.3\]]tA sa ma yasti ShAM na ra ke Sh+wa k+Sha ya k+Sha yaH/_/i ti shru twA pi turbA kyaM dza na n+yAsh+tsa b+hu dzaM ga maH/_/A dA ya di bya puSh+pA Ni pu N+ya dze ta ba naM ya yau/_/su ga ta shra ma mA sA d+ya d+har+m+ma shra ba Na saM ga tAM/_/da
[\[70a.4\]]dmyal bar mi bzad pas/_/gdab pa drag pos brlag par 'gyur/_/zhes pa pha dang ma yi yang /_/tshig dag thos nas lag 'gro ni/_/me tog mchog dag yongs bzung nas/_/dag pa'i rgyal byed tshal du song /_/chog shes sgor ni mngon phyogs des/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas phyin te/_/der ni
[\[70a.5\]]daR+sha paR+Sha daM ta tra sa san+to Sha mu khyon+mu khaH/_/ta trA pa sh+ya dz+dzi naM kAn+ta ba da naM dIr+g+ha lo tsa naM/_/pUr+N+Nen+du pad+ma ba na yo ri ba mai trI su kha pra daM/_/u pa de sha kr-i tA byak+ta ma d+ha re NA pa rI kr-i tAM/_/tardza yan+ta
[\[70a.6\]]chos dag nyan pa la/_/tshogs pa'i 'khor dag mthong bar gyur/_/bzhin ras mdzes shing spyan yangs pa/_/zla ba nya dang pad tshal dag_/'grogs pa bzhin du bde ster ba'i/_/rgyal ba der ni mthong bar gyur/_/nye bar ston byed mchu yis ni/_/chags ldan rnams kyi dmar ba nyid/_/rab rgyas dman
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]mi bot+sik+tAM rA ga brga s+ya rak+ta tAM/_/ni rA b+ha ra NA lA bA N+ya kar+N+Na pA sha bi b+hU Shi taM/_/daR+sha yan+taM mi bot+sik+tAM ni rA ba ra Na shU n+ya tAM/_/d+har+m+ma dwi pa ka ro ba b+hU bi b+h+rA NaM dA na sho b+hi to/_/pra b+hA ba b+ha ba
[\[70b.2\]]pa nyid byas shing /_/gsal bar zil gyis gnon pa bzhin/_/rgyan dang bral ba'i mdzes sdug gis/_/rna ba'i zhags pa rab brgyan cing /_/sgrib pa dang bral stong pa nyid/_/rab tu rgyas pa ston pa bzhin/_/dpung pa chos kyi gnyis 'thung lag_/sbyin pas mdzes pa rnam par 'dzin/_/nus mthu'i khang
[\[70b.3\]]nastam+b+hau shA ta kum+b+ha ma yA bi ba/_/di shan+taM tsa ra Na ts+tshA yAM tsI ba rA b+ha ra NAM b+hU pa/_/lab+d+ha pra b+ho d+hi bi hi tA mi ba rA dzI bi taiH/_/de hi kAn+ti bi tA ne na na ya nA mr-i ta baR+Shi Na/_/saM sA ra ga ta
[\[70b.4\]]pa dag gi ni/_/ka ba gser gyi rang bzhin bzhin/_/chos gos rgyan dang ldan pa yis/_/zhabs kyi grib ma spro byed pa/_/sa gzhi rtogs pa thob pa la/_/pad+ma'i grogs rnams kyis bsgrubs bzhin/_/lus kyi mdzes pa rgyas pa ni/_/spyan gyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas/_/dam pa rnams kyis 'khor
[\[70b.5\]]saM tA pa bA ra yan+ti pa tA mi pa/_/taM bi lo kyai ba tat+yA dza saM tA paM nA ga nan+da naH/_/sar+b+bAr+t+ti do Sha sha ma naM daR+sha naM hi ma hAt+ma nAM/_/pra NA nA ma pa taM kIr+N+Na saM pUr+N+Na ku su mAny+dza liH/_/tat+pA da pad+ma spaR+she na sa d+yaHshI tal
[\[70b.6\]]ba yi/_/mya ngan yongs gdung bzlog pa bzhin/_/de mthong nyid na klu yi bu/_/yongs su gdung ba btang bar gyur/_/bdag nyid che rnams mthong ba nyid/_/gdung ba'i skyon kun zhi bar byed/_/snyim pa me tog gis gang ba/_/de la gtor nas des phyag btsal/_/de yi zhabs pad reg pa yis/_/'phral la bsil
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]tAM ga taH/_/kr-i tI b+ha ga ba taHprA s+ya ga ta shi k+Sha pa dA ni saH/_/tsakre kr-i tAMny+dza lista s+ya yA badz+dzI bA d+hi bA sa nAM/_/taM ba b+hA She b+ha ga bA na e ka s+yai bA d+hi bA sa nA/_/a nugrA h+ye Shu sarbe Shu yA badz+dzA ban+na
[\[71a.2\]]ba nyid du gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/_/bslab pa'i gnas thob mkhas pa des/_/thal mo sbyar nas de la ni/_/ji srid 'tsho bar lhag gnas byas/_/de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/_/thams cad rjes su gzung bya la/_/gcig nyid kho na'i lhag gnas ni/_/ji srid 'tsho
[\[71a.3\]]yu dz+ya te/_/i t+yuk+t+wA pra NA ya pr-i t+yai b+ha ga bAn+sa ta tro d+ya taH/_/sha naiHpra tas+the saM kalpaM b+ho gi naHpa ri pU ra ya na/_/kra me Na gats+tsha tasta s+ya b+hik+Shu saM g+hA gra yA yi naH/_/pra b+hA bAd+bi da d+he nA gaHswarga sho b+hAM pa de
[\[71a.4\]]ba ji ltar 'os/_/gus la dgyes pas de brjod nas/_/de la brtson pas bcom ldan de/_/gdengs can rnam par brtag pa ni/_/yongs rdzogs mdzad cing dal gyis chas/_/dge slong tshogs kyis sna drangs nas/_/rim gyis byon pa de la ni/_/klu yi mthu las gnas dang gnas/_/mtho ris lta bur mdzes
[\[71a.5\]]pa de/_/he ma rat+nAM shu sha ba lAn+di byat+Yo na ma no ha rAn/_/b+ho ga pa saM gra ha bya gra dA sa dA sI ga Na br-i tAn/_/kar+pU ra tsan+da no dA ra hA ra prA laM ba b+hU Shi tAn/_/s+thA ne s+thA ne b+ha ga wa taHsa bi hA rA na
[\[71a.6\]]pa bsgrubs/_/rin chen gser 'od bkra ba yi/_/mchog gi skyed tshal mdzes pa dang /_/longs spyod 'dzin pas brel ba yis/_/'bangs dang 'bangs mo'i tshogs rgyas dang /_/ga bur tsan dan rgya che yi/_/do shal 'phyang bas brgyan pa yis/_/gnas dang gnas su gtsug lag khang /_/bcom ldan
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]kA ra yatra/_/ka lan+da ka ni pA sA khyaM prAp+ta be na pa na ta taH/_/sa sar+b+ba b+ho ga saM b+hA rair+b+ha ga ban+ta ma pU dza yata/_/te na mA pa tra ya ta tra sa saM g+haHsu ga to ts+tsi taH/_/U tse bismi ta mA nan+daM hA ra rat+nA shu
[\[71b.2\]]'das la de yis byas/_/de nas ka lan da ka'i gnas/_/zhes pa 'od ma'i tshal du phyin/_/de yi longs spyod tshogs kun gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas/_/der ni de yis zla gsum du/_/dge 'dun dang bcas bde gshegs mchod/_/do shal rin chen 'od kyis bskor/_/ya mtshan kun
[\[71b.3\]]kair+b+b+ri taH/_/e Sha kalpa sha ta ma ts+ru taHpha NI sarba b+ho ga su kha b+hAg+b+ha bi Sh+ya te/_/bo d+hi ma pya pa ra dzan+ma ni spu TAM kiM ba su pra Ni hi taHka ri Sh+ya ti/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM
[\[71b.4\]]dga' ldan la gsungs/_/gdengs can 'di ni bskal pa brgyar mi g.yo/_/bde ba'i longs spyod kun gyi snod du gyur/_/'on kyang skye ba gzhan la byang chub kyang /_/rab tu 'bad pas gsal bar byed par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
[\[71b.5\]]nA ga ku mA rA ba dA naM Sha ShI ta maHpal+la baH//_//mU d+ha s+ya hasta pa ta to pi ni d+hiHpra yA ti lak+Sh+mI swa yaM b+ha ba na me ti bi shud+d+ha bud+d+haiH/_/dA ri dra tI bra ti mi rA pa ha raHpra kA maM
[\[71b.6\]]gyi 'khri shing las klu gzhon nu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu pa'o//_//blun po'i lag tu gter dag lhung yang rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rnam dag blo ldan khyim du dpal ni rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur/_/skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis yid ni rab tu dang ba dag_/dbul ba'i
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]pum+sAM bi b+hU Sha Na ma Nirma na saHpra pA daH/_/shrA pas+t+ya swasti ko nA ma brah+ma No nir+d+ha naHpu ra/_/a shi shri yat+k+r-i sha pha lA ma sha t+yA kr-i Shi dzI bi kAM/_/sat+k+She tra kar+m+ma ni ra taHshrI ta bA tA ta pak+Sha taH/_/tsa kA ra ha la kud+dA
[\[72a.2\]]rab rib mi bzad 'phrog pa'i rgyan gyi nor bu yin/_/mnyan yod du sngon bram ze ni/_/nor med bkra shis zhes bya ba/_/'tsho ba bral bas 'tsho ba'i thabs/_/'bras bu chung ba'i zhing las brten/_/zhing las la chags grang ba dang /_/rlung dang tsha bas nyen pa des/_/thong ba dang ni tog rtse'i
[\[72a.3\]]la b+hAr bA hI ga tA ga taM/_/sa ka dA tsit+sa mA yAn+taM shrA ba keHsa hi taM pa thi/_/dzi na dzA yA sa kho dr-iSh+TA pra sA daM sa ha sa ya yau/_/pra pan+na ba da nAM bit+nAM sa dza gA da bi tsin+ta yan/_/dA ri drA duHkha ma sa mAM dA na pu N+ya
[\[72a.4\]]khur/_/khyer zhing 'ong dang 'gro ba byas/_/nam zhig chung ma dang bcas de'i/_/lam du rgyal ba nyan thos dang /_/lhan cig byon pa mthong gyur nas/_/'phral la rab tu dang bar gyur/_/sbyin pa'i bsod nams yongs zad las/_/dbul ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_/sems shing de yis chung ma ni/_/rab dang bzhin
[\[72a.5\]]pa ri k+Sha yAta/_/A bA b+h+yA me Sha b+ha ga ban piN+Da ke nA pi nartsi taH/_/ku ta pu N+ya Sha NaM prA s+yA d+ha na sam+bat+ti rA ba yo/_/dzI ba t+ye ba mr-i to lo ke naSh+Ta kIr+t+tirbi pad+Ya de/_/na sa dzI bo na nirdzI baHsho b+ha te nir+d+h+ha no dza naH/_/
[\[72a.6\]]ldan la smras pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ni yu cag gis/_/rdog gcig gis kyang ma mchod las/_/bsod nams zong gis thob pa'i nor/_/phun tshogs yu la ga la 'ong /_/shi ba gson nyid 'jig rten na/_/grags pa nyams pa shi ba nyid/_/nor med skye bo mdzes pa ni/_/gson la ma yin gshin la min/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]d+ta nardzA tir+d+d+ha na bi d+yA d+ha nan+d+har+m+mo d+ha naM ya shaH/_/kin+d+ha ne na bi hI nA nAM yAts+nyA b+hirdzI tairgu NaiH/_/pa ro pA kA rA NI b+hU taiHgin+da ri dra s+ya sang+gu NaiH/_/kle shAr+thair+b+h+ra ri ka s+ye ba ma Ni kAny+tsa na b+hU Sha NaiH/_/da ri dro
[\[72b.2\]]nor rigs nor ni rig pa ste/_/nor chos nor ni grags pa yin/_/nor gyis dman zhing bslangs pa yis/_/'tsho ba'i yon tan rnams kyis ci/_/gzhan gyi nye mkhor gyur pa yis/_/dbul po'i yon tan dam pas ci/_/khur du bab la nor bu yis/_/gser rgyan ngal dub don gyis bzhin/_/dbul bo sbyin
[\[72b.3\]]dA ri d+yAM pra bi sha ti pu nardA na bi ra hAd da ri draHpA pAt+ma b+ha ba ti d+ha na lip+sA pa ra ba shaH/_/da ra drA sats+tsh+wA se mr-i ta i ti na tsA drasti bi ma tir da ri dra s+ye bai tA ni dza dza na bi hI no da sha di shaH/_/a b+h+yats+tsa
[\[72b.4\]]pa dag dang bral bas slar yang dbul por rab tu 'dzud/_/dbul po nor la chags pas gzhan dbang sdig pa'i bdag nyid dag tu 'gyur/_/dbul po dbugs dang bcas kyang shi zhes 'di la khyad par blo gros med/_/dbul po phyogs bcu 'di dag rang gi skye bo dag gis dman pa bzhin/_/de slad dman
[\[72b.5\]]yA baHsu ga taM ta smAt+k+r-i pa Na bat+pa laM/_/a na rA d+hi ta bud+d+hA nAM mug+d+hA nAM ku sha laM ku taH/_/e Sha pad+ma da lA shAk+ShaHk+Shi pa t+yA pan+nA bAn+d+ha baH/_/ya tra ya tra dri shaM dzA ne ta tra ta trA shra ya shri yaH/_/i ti pa
[\[72b.6\]]la mnyes gshin pa'i/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchod par bya/_/sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas pa'i/_/rmongs la dge ba ga la yod/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan/_/phongs pa'i gnyen 'dis gang gang du/_/spyan ni 'phangs pa de dang der/_/dpal ni gnas pa dag gis shes/_/de skad bdag po'i
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]t+yurba caHshru twA brAh+ma NI pA da ra gr-i he/_/shu tsi pra NI ta bi da d+he b+ho dz+yaM b+ha ga ba taHkr-i te/_/b+ha ga bAn pi sarba dz+nyasta yor+dz+nyA twA sa mI hi taM/_/pra Na yAr+tha na yA tsa kre ta s+ya pU dzA pra ti gra haM/_/
[\[73a.2\]]tshig thos nas/_/khyim du gus byas bram ze mos/_/zas ni gtsang mar sbyar ba dag_/bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du bsgrubs/_/bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang /_/de dag bsam pa yongs mkhyen nas/_/gus pas gsol ba 'debs pa de'i/_/mchod pa dag ni blang bar mdzad/_/
[\[73a.3\]]byak+ta dA ri d+r+ya duHkha s+ya b+hU yasma bi b+ha bod+b+ha baH/_/tsa kA ra dzi na pU dzAn+te pra Ni d+hA na mi ti dwi dzaH/_/a tha ga twA ni dzaM k+She traM bi praHsa pya ya bAM kurAn/_/sarbA na pa sh+yat+sau bar+N+NAn sa ha sA t+yak+ta durga tiH/_/ta s+ya
[\[73a.4\]]dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab bsal pa/_/bdag la 'byor pa 'byung gyur cig_/ces pa'i smon lam gnyis skyes kyis/_/rgyal ba mchod pa'i mjug tu byas/_/de nas bram ze rang zhing du/_/song bas 'bru nas myu gu ni/_/thams cad gser du mthong gyur nas/_/'phral la nyid du dbul ba btang /_/sa yi
[\[73a.5\]]pu N+ya sa mud+b+hU taM driSh+t+rA he ma ma hI pa tiH/_/ta t+yA dza bismi taHpri t+yaHrA dza b+ha gaM pra ben dzi ta/_/te na hem+nA su ma ha tA lab+d+hai shwaR+Ya ni d+hir+d+h+wi dzaH/_/saM bud+d+ha pra mu kha saM g+ha sarba b+ho gai ra bU dza
[\[73a.6\]]bdag po gsal rgyal gyis/_/de yi bsod nams las 'khrungs pa'i/_/gser dag mthong nas ya mtshan te/_/dga' bas rgyal po'i cha shas btang /_/shin tu mang po'i gser de yis/_/dbang phyug gter thob gnyis skyes kyis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs dge 'dun ni/_/longs spyod kun gyis rab tu
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]yata/_/d+har+m+ma de sha na yA shAstu shro taHprAp+ti pha lo da yAta/_/dr-iSh+Ta sa t+yaHsa kA le na pra bra dz+nyAM sa mu pA da de/_/sar+b+bi kle sha pra h+ya ne na tasmin+nar+ha twa mA ga te/_/tat+kar+m+ma b+hi k+Shu b+hiHpr-iSh+To b+ha ga bA na b+h+ya b+hA Sha
[\[73b.2\]]mchod/_/ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras thob nas/_/bden mthong de yis dus kyis ni/_/rab tu byung ba yang dag blangs/_/nyon mongs thams cad rab bcom ste/_/de yis dgra bcom nyid thob tshe/_/las de dge slong rnams kyis dris/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon
[\[73b.3\]]ta/_/a n+ya dzan+ma ni bi phro yaM kA sh+ya pa s+ya ma hAd+ma naH/_/brah+ma tsaR+Ya b+ha ga ba taHshA sa ne na pu rA tsa rata/_/sa mA diSh+Ta s+ya te nai ba dzan+ma n+ya smin+ma hI ya sA/_/mat+pe kA shA di yaM sid+d+hiHsen+d+ro sen+d+ra su rAr+ts+tsi tA/_/shru
[\[73b.4\]]par gsungs/_/skye ba gzhan la bram ze 'dis/_/bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/'od srungs kyis ni bstan pa la/_/tshangs par spyod pa sngon tshe spyad/_/nye dbang dbang bcas lhas mchod pa/_/shin tu che ba'i grub pa 'di/_/bdag gi sngon du skye ba 'dir/_/'di la de yis yang dag bstan/_/de skad
[\[73b.5\]]twe ti ta s+ya su kr-i taM ka thi taM dzi ne na sar+b+ba pa bisma ya d+hi yaHku sha lA da re Na/_/haR+ShA ku lAHsu tsa ri taM pra sha shaM su ran+taHsaM krAn+ta tang+gu Na ma yA i ba b+hik+Sha bste/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo
[\[73b.6\]]de yi legs byas rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/_/de yi yon tan rang bzhin nang du 'phos bzhin dge slong ni/_/de dag thams cad ya mtshan blo ldan dga' bas 'khrugs gyur cing /_/dge la gus pas bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu bsngags pa mdzad/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]d+hi sa twA ba dA na kal pa la tA yI kaR+Sha kA ba dA na me ka ShaSh+Thi maHpal+la waH//_//Ur+N+NA yu pUr+N+Na ja na kA na na san+ni be she dzA tash+tsa mad+d+hu ti ma yaHpu ru ShaHsa e kaH/_/ya s+yAn+d+ha
[\[74a.2\]]sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las zhing pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//lug gis gang bar gyur pa'i skye bo'i nags tshal gnas dag tu/_/lang tshos long zhing bde ba la 'os mdzes pa'i chas ldan tshe/_/dben pas
[\[74a.3\]]yau ba na su kho tsi ta tsA ru be sha bai rA gya mA di sha ti shAn+ti si taM bi be kaH/_/n+ya gro d+ha ru tsi rA rA ma bi hA ri Ni dzi ne pu rA/_/bA rA Nas+yAM gr-i ha pa tiHsu pra bud+d+hA b+hi d+ho b+ha bta/_/t+yA go pa b+ho ga saM b+hA ra bi b+hU Shi ta d+ha
[\[74a.4\]]chags bral zhi zhing dag pa gang la rab byin pa/_/skyes bu de nyid gcig pu ya mtshan rang bzhin rab tu skyes/_/rgyal ba sngon tshe n+ya gro d+ha'i/_/kun dga' ra ba mdzes par bzhugs/_/bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag ni/_/legs par rab sad ces pa byung /_/nor ni rgyas pa gtong ba dang /_/longs spyod tshogs
[\[74a.5\]]no da yaH/_/e shwaR+Ya yaHku be rA s+ya kau sha lI naM n+ya mI la yata/_/sa sar+b+ba su kha sam+pat+tau niSh+pu traHpu tra tsin+ta yA/_/pa raM san+ta pa mA ye de niHsha l+ya ka s+ya sam+pa daH/_/taM sho ka shi khi san+tap+taM bAn+d+ha bA ban+d+hu
