[\[74a.6\]]kyis rnam par brgyan/_/gang gi dbang phyug lus ngan bu/_/mdzod na gnas pa'ang zum par byed/_/bde ba thams cad phun tshogs te/_/bud med bu yi bsam pa yis/_/mchog tu yang dag gdung ba thob/_/phun tshogs su yi zug rngu min/_/de yi bsam pa 'phos pa yis/_/yun ring yid 'khrugs
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bat+sa laM/_/u tsi re bi sak+tan+ta tats+tsin+tA bat+ta mA na sAH/_/klI bo tsi tAM gr-i ha pa te na tsin+tAM kartu mar+ha si/_/d+hI rA NAM pr-i thu sa twA nAM nAsti lo ke Shu dur+l+la b+haM/_/ya e Sha bi shru to dik+Shu de shesmin+pau ra pU
[\[74b.2\]]gnyen rnams kyis/_/gnyen la gnyen ni mya ngan gyi/_/me yis rab gdungs de la smras/_/khyim bdag ma ning la 'os pa'i/_/bsam pa bya bar mi rigs so/_/brtan ldan snying stobs che rnams la/_/'jig rten na ni rnyed dka' med/_/gang 'di phyogs su grags gyur cing /_/yul 'dir grong khyer pas
[\[74b.3\]]dzi taH/_/n+ya gro d+ha pA da pa ta s+ya pU dza ya sar+b+ba mA s+ya te/_/a pu trAHpu tr-i NaHke tsin+nir+d+d+ha nA d+ha niHba re/_/ro gi No pya ru dza sh+tsA n+ye dr-iSh+TAsta du pa yA tsi taiH/_/sa t+ya yA tsa na tsai t+yA khyaHpo yaM n+ya gro d+ha pA da paH/_/pha la pu trA b+hi
[\[74b.4\]]mchod pa/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi shing de la/_/mchod pas thams cad thob bar 'gyur/_/de la zhus pas 'ga' zhig ni/_/bu med bu dang ldan pa dang /_/gzhan ni nor med nor dang ldan/_/gzhan yang nad can nad med mthong /_/n+ya gro d+ha yi rkang 'thung ni/_/mchod rten slong ba bden zhes bya/_/'os par mchod na khyod
[\[74b.5\]]d+han+tu l+yaM dA s+ya t+yu tsi ta mar+ts+tsi taH/_/i ti te ShAM pa tsaHshru twA tA nu bA tsa sa sasmi taH/_/a ho nu mo hA ta sne hA yU yaM mUr+kha twa mAg tAH/_/swa kar+m+ma pa ra tan+t+ra smi na lo ke na ni ya te nish+tsa le/_/s+thi taM ka ro ti puSh+Na ti ha ra ti han+ti
[\[74b.6\]]la ni/_/bu zhes brjod pa'i 'bas ster 'gyur/_/zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas/_/'dzum bcas de dag la smras pa/_/kye ma rmongs pa'i mdza' ba las/_/khyed rnams rmongs pa nyid du gyur/_/rang las gzhan dbang 'jig rten 'di/_/nges par g.yo ba med pa la/_/su yis su yi brtan pa dang /_/rgyas dang 'phrog dang
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]ka s+ya kaH/_/swa kar+m+mo pa na taM prA pya tu Sh+ya t+ya n+ya s+ya mug+d+ha d+hI/_/swa lA lA la ba mA swA d+ya shwe ba shuSh+ka s+ya tsar+m+ma NaH/_/pr-ik+ShaHpu trAr+tha daHpuM sA mi t+ya tat+mUr+kha b+hA Shi taM/_/dA tuM shak+taHsa nA kA le pa tra mA tra ma bi swa yaM/_/ta da d+hiSh+ThA
[\[75a.2\]]'joms par byed/_/rang las nye ba nyid thob nas/_/blo gros blun po gzhan la tshim/_/rang gi kha chu'i cha myangs nas/_/khyi ni pags pa skam la bzhin/_/shing gi bu nor skyes bu la/_/ster zhes 'di ni rmongs pa'i gtam/_/'dab ma tsam yang dus min du/_/de nyid rang la sbyin nus med/_/gal te de
[\[75a.3\]]tr-i de bash+tse ta pU dzA lub+d+haHka ro ti tata/_/pUr+N+No sa hA ra pU dzA yAM kiM swa yaM sr-i dza ti nAt+ma naH/_/prAp+ta byaM prA bya ya di bA g+hu NA k+Sha ra pa do pa maM/_/kA ka tA li yA sam+bA dat+te dat+taM ma n+ya te dza naH/_/prAp+ta byaM yat+pha la pa ri Na tau karma NaM prA pya te tata
[\[75a.4\]]ni byin rlob lhas/_/mchod pa la chags byed pa na/_/bdag nyid rang gis mchod pa ni/_/yo byad rdzogs pa cis mi spro/_/srin bu'i rjes ni yi ge bzhin/_/gang yang thob bya thob pa na/_/bya rog ta la ltar brjod pas/_/skye bo de yis byin par sems/_/gang zhig thob bya de ni las rnams 'bras bu yongs su
[\[75a.5\]]nAnA yat+na pra Na ya ya ta nairla b+h+ya te na twa la b+h+yaM/_/yad+me nai ba sra ya mu pa tsi taM b+ho ga b+ha gI sa tasmin+ne te nai tat+k+r-i ta mi ti mu pA ma n+ya te mug+d+ha bud+d+hiH/_/i ti shru ba NiHsa sne hai ra nu ban+d+he
[\[75a.6\]]gyur tshe thob/_/sna tshogs 'bad cing gus pas bsgrubs kyang thob bya min pa 'thob ma yin/_/gang zhig gang gis rang nyid kyis bsags longs spyod skal ldan de la ni/_/'di dag 'di yis byas shes rmongs pa'i blo can 'bras med de dag sems/_/zhes pa smra de mdza' gcugs dang /_/ldan pa'i gnyen
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]na nan+d+ha baiH/_/pre ri to sa ya yau gU D+ha e kA kI pA da bAn+ti kaM/_/sa ku ThA ra sa mA dA ya n+ya gro d+ha ta ru ma b+h+ya b+hAta/_/pU dzA yAM mU la b+ha te bA sadz+dzo haM twA mu sA ga taH/_/pu tra pra dA tuM pU dzan+te ka ri Sh+yA mya kr-i tAM pa reH/_/na d+yaM twA ma
[\[75b.2\]]gyis rab 'bad de/_/bskul nas gcig pu gsang ba yis/_/rkang 'thung gi ni drung du song /_/sta re brdung nas de yis ni/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la smras/_/mchod pa'am rtsa ba gcod pa la/_/ngas ni chas nas khyod can 'ongs/_/bu dag sbyin na khyod la bdag_/gzhan gyis ma byas mchod pa byed/_/rnam pa gzhan
[\[75b.3\]]n+ya thA ts+tshi tA dag+d+hA peSh+TA yA mya haM/_/i ti ta dwa tsa na shru twA de ba tA br-ik+Sha bA pi nI/_/sa ha se ba b+ha yod+big+nA kam+pa mA nA bya tsin+ta yata/_/na ma yA ka pyaM tsit+su nurbit+taM bA dat+ta mits+tsha yA/_/dza naHswa
[\[75b.4\]]du khyod bdag gis/_/bcad bsregs btags la chu bor 'phangs/_/zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/lha ni shing la gnas pa dag_/'phral la 'jigs pas 'khrugs gyur te/_/'dar bar byed cing rab bsams pa/_/'dod pa'i bu'am nor dag ni/_/bdag gis su la'ang sbyin pa med/_/rang gi las kyis
[\[75b.5\]]kar+m+ma saM prAp+taM mad+dat+ta mi ti ma n+ya te/_/i daM twa pUr+b+ba mA yA taM pu trAr+thI ya da yaM ba lAta/_/kar+m+ma yo ga da saM prAp+tau dai ba tAMts+tshet+tu mA ga taH/_/s+thi ti mA tra mi daM pU dz+ya te yat+pha lAr+thi b+hiH/_/kar+m+ma ba d+ha pha lA la b+he kwa de baH
[\[75b.6\]]thob pa la/_/skye bo bdag gis sbyin par sems/_/gang 'di stobs kyis bu slong zhing /_/las kyi sbyor bas ma thob na/_/lha nyid gcod du 'ongs gyur pa/_/'di ni sngon chad med pa 'ongs/_/'bras don gnyer bas mchod bya ni/_/mchod pa gang 'di lugs tsam ste/_/las kyis bcings pa'i 'bras thob pa/_/su yis
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]ke na dA yi taH/_/tsi kit+sA yA ma sid+d+hA yAM byA d+hau puM saHswa kar+m+ma Na/_/gr-i h+yan+te nai ba ga Na kA na bai d+ya na tsa man+t+ri NaH/_/br-ik+Sha ts+tshe da bi kalposti na tsA bya kAR+Ya kA ri NaH/_/a n+yA yA b+hi ni biSh+TA nAM ki ma kAR+Ya pra ma di
[\[76a.2\]]byin cing gang du lha/_/skyes bu rang gi las kyis nad/_/bsos pa grub pa min pa la/_/rtsis mkhan 'dzin pa nyid ma yin/_/sman pa ma yin sngags pa'ang min/_/bya min byed pa 'di la ni/_/shing ni bcad par rnam brtags yod/_/tshul min dag la mngon zhen pa'i/_/bag med rnams la bya min
[\[76a.3\]]nAM/_/br-ik+Shats+tshe da na sha kro mi s+thA tu ma n+ya tra niHsu khA/_/saM gA dA b+h+ya si kI prI ti mu ni nAm pi duHkhA dzA/_/i ti saM tsin+d+ya tUr+N+Na sA ga twA sha kra s+ya man+di raM/_/ta mar+tha bi ni bai d+yAs+thai pa ri trasto ba dat+pu naH/_/dza ne na pU dza
[\[76a.4\]]ci/_/shing ni bcad na gzhan du bdag_/gnas par mi nus bde ba med/_/'grogs pas goms can dga' ba ni/_/thub pa rnams la'ang sdug bsngal skyed/_/de dag bsams nas brgya byin gyi/_/khang par myur bar de song nas/_/don ni de la brjod nas ni/_/yongs su skrag pas slar smras pa/_/rtag tu bdag ni
[\[76a.5\]]mA nA pi br-ik+She tasmi nA haM sa dA/_/nA nAr+thAr+tha b+hi ra t+ya thaM sau pa bA saiHka dar+thi tA/_/la b+haM te su kr-i tAt+k+wa tsita kwa tsita gats+tsha t+ya d+ho mu khAH/_/te trai ba n+yai pra lI yan+te ha tha mUr+khAHkha ra bra taiH/_/ga twA nu ga
[\[76a.6\]]ljon pa der/_/skye bo rnams kyis mchod gyur kyang /_/sna tshogs don gnyer nyer gnas pas/_/bdag ni shin tu gzir bar gyur/_/'ga' yis legs byas bdag la thob/_/'ga' zhig kha ni 'og phyogs gyur/_/g.yo rmongs mi bsrun brtul zhugs kyis/_/gzhan ni de nyid na rab chags/_/song ba'i rjes
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]ti ka te na pra sid+d+hi sha ra No dza naH/_/sar+b+bAt+ti pa ri hA rA ya maug+d+hat+mA me d+hA ba ti/_/ud+d+he dzi tA pya haM tI bra dza ne nA kU ta bud+d+hi nA/_/ta ruM t+yak+tuM na sha kyo mi tad+gu Na brdzi ta sha yA/_/ban+d+ha kle shaM bi sha ti ma
[\[76b.2\]]su 'gro nyid kyis/_/skye bo grags pa la ston rnams/_/gdung ba thams cad gzhom pa'i slad/_/rmongs pa bdag cag nyid du rgyug_/skye bo blo gros mi gzo bas/_/mi bzad gtses par gyur kyang bdag_/bsam pa de yi yon tan la/_/chags pas shing ni gtong mi nus/_/dri la chags pa'i bung ba 'dam
[\[76b.3\]]d+hu paHpang+ga dzaM gan+d+ha lub+d+haHpaM kA taM kaM ga Na ya ti bi sA swA da na nai ba haM saH/_/shI tAr+t+tash+tsa t+ya dza ti na dza naHpA ba kaM d+hU ma d+hU mraM tasmin+do ShaM sa ki la sa ha te ya s+ya ye no pa yo gaH/_/tasmAd+b+r-ik+Sha bi yo gar+t+taM trA tu mar+ha si
[\[76b.4\]]skyes 'ching ba'i nyon mongs ldan par 'jug_/pad rtsa'i ro myang ngang pa nyid ni 'dam gyi 'jigs pa rtsi mi byed/_/grang bas gzir ba'i skye bo du bas 'khrugs pa'i me ni yongs mi 'dor/_/gang la gang zhig nyer mkho de la de yi skyon ni nges par bzod/_/de slad shing bral gdung ba las/_/khyab bdag bdag
[\[76b.5\]]mAM bi b+ho/_/sha rI ra t+yA ga sa dr-i shaHs+tha na t+yA go hi de hi nAM/_/ar+thi ta pra Na ye ne ti pau lo mA ra masta yA/_/pu tra lA b+haM gr-i ha pa teHkar+m+mA yat+ta ma tsin+ta yata/_/a trAM ta re br-i tra sha trUrde ba pu tra tri piSh+Ta
[\[76b.6\]]ni bskyab par 'os/_/gang phyir lus can rnams kyi gnas/_/gtong ba lus ni gtong dang mtshungs/_/zhes pa de yi 'bad pa yis/_/gsol gdab pau lo mA dga' bas/_/khyim bdag gis ni bu thob pa'i/_/las kyi dbang ni yang dag bsams/_/skabs der lha min dgra bo yis/_/skabs gsum pa yi lha yi
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]ye/_/su ma tir+n+nA ma saM prAp+ta ts+yu ti kA laM bya lo ka ya ta/_/mA lA m+lA na mu pA ya yau kha la na ti kliSh+Te kIr+t+ta na sa tats+tshA yA prA du ra b+hUt+ta maHpa ri tsi tA yAts+nye ba dai n+yo da ye/_/swa daHpu N+ya pa ri k+Sha ye na ba i bA pA ya
[\[77a.2\]]bu/_/blo bzang zhes pa lhung ba yi/_/dus la bab pa mthong gyur te/_/mi bsrun la btud grags pa nyams pa bzhin du 'phreng ba dri ma can gyur cing /_/dman gyur slong ba bzhin du mdzes pa mun pa dag dang yongs 'dris byung bar gyur/_/bsod nams yongs su zad las gnod pas bzhin du rdul
[\[77a.3\]]kra kA rA spa daM ta s+yA b+hU da ra ti rni pA ta pi shu NA sa dwe Sha do She ba d+hiH/_/gu Ni naHsu pra bud+d+ha s+ya pr-i thI byAM pra thi ta shri yaH/_/su ma teHpu tra tA me hi ta mi t+yA ha su re shwa raH/_/so bra bIt+ta tra mAM kA le shAstuHshAkya mu neHpu raH/_/
[\[77a.4\]]gyis kyang ni gnas dag byas/_/zhe sdang skyon bcas blo bzhin de ni lhung ba gsal byed dga' ba min par gyur/_/legs par rab sang yon tan can/_/sa la dpal ldan grags pa yis/_/blo bzang bu nyid du song zhes/_/de la lha yi bdag pos smras/_/des smras ston pa shAkya thub/_/bla med rgya che chos kyi ni/_/
[\[77a.5\]]shak+ta s+yA nut+ta ro dA ra d+har+m+ma tsakra pra bar+t+ta ne/_/pra bra dz+yA sa da nA ya twaM ya di saM bo d+ha yi Sh+ya pi/_/ta da haM su pra bud+d+ha s+ya bra dzA mi b+hU bi pu tra tAM/_/i t+yuk+t+wa de ba pu tre Na sha kre Nok+to ta the ti tsa/_/ts+yutasmr-i ta smA dA dz+nya p+tastat+pat+n+yAH
[\[77a.6\]]'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad pa'i/_/mdun du dus der gal te bdag_/rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa la/_/khyod kyis yang dag rtogs byed na/_/sa la legs par rab sad kyi/_/bu nyid du ni bdag gis 'gro/_/lha yi bu yis 'di brjod las/_/brgya byin de bzhin zhes smras tshe/_/rjes gnang de ni de nas 'phos/_/
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]ku k+Shi mA bi sha ta/_/de ba tA swa pa da ga twA su pra bud+d+ha ma b+hA Sha tra/_/pra bra dz+yA b+hi ra ta sA d+ho b+ha bi Sh+ya ti su tasta ba/_/i ti shru twA gr-i ha pa tiHpra hriSh+TaHpra ya yau gr-i haM/_/pra bra dz+yAM bA ra yiSh+yA mi pu tra s+ye ti bi tsin+ta ya ta/_/
[\[77b.2\]]de yi chung ma'i dku ru zhugs/_/lha ni rang gi gnas song ste/_/legs par rab sad de la smras/_/rab tu 'byung la mngon dga'i bu/_/dge ba khyod la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa thos nas khyim bdag ni/_/rab tu mgu nas khyim song ste/_/bu ni rab tu 'byung ba dag_/bdag gis bzlog par bya zhes bsams/_/
[\[77b.3\]]ta taHkA le na tat+pat+nI la li tA nA ma bA la kaM/_/sar+b+bA ga lak+Sha No be ta ma sU ta ka na ka d+ha taM/_/sar+b+ba rat+na ma yaM ta s+ya dzA te s+yai ba bya dzA ya ta/_/ts+tshA t+t+raM mur+t+ta mi bA sh+tsaR+Ya mUt+ta maM su kr-i ta shri yaH/_/sa ya sho dA b+hi
[\[77b.4\]]de nas dus kyis de yi ni/_/chung ma rol pa ma zhes la/_/yan lag thams cad mtshan nyid ldan/_/byis pa gser 'od can de btsas/_/de skyes nyid ni rin chen ni/_/kun gyi rang bzhin gdugs 'khrungs te/_/legs byas dpal ni bla med dang /_/ngo mtshar gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin/_/mchog tu pha yis
[\[77b.5\]]d+ha no b+hUd+Ya sho br-id+d+h+yA pi tuHpa raM/_/bi d+yA ka lA b+hi b+hU tI nAM sa mA ga ma gr-i ho pa maH/_/de ba tA ba tsa naM smr-i twA pra bra dz+ya shaM ki taHbi tA/_/ta s+ya tsakre gr-i ha pu ra dwA ra go pu ra rak+Sha NaM/_/a thA b+h+ye ta sa sha kre Na smA ri dzaH
[\[77b.6\]]grags 'phel bas/_/rig pa sgyu rtsal 'byor pa rnams/_/tshogs pa'i khang pa lta bu ste/_/grags sbyin zhes ni bya bar gyur/_/lha yi tshig ni dran gyur nas/_/de ni rab tu byung dogs te/_/grong dang khang pa grong khyer gyi/_/sgo rnams pha yis bsrung bar byas/_/de nas brgya byin mngon phyogs te/_/sngon gyi bgro ba
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]pUr+b+ba sam+bi dA/_/ba b+hU ba sha ma saM pik+taHpra bra dz+yA b+hi mu khA da raH/_/sa ka da tsin+ni dzod+YA naM ra thA rU D+haHsha nai r+b+ra dza na/_/da daR+sha dzi na mA yAn+taM b+ha ga ban+taM ya dr-its+tsha yA/_/hr-i da ya su kha saM spaR+sha baR+Sha n+taM pra
[\[78a.2\]]brtan par byas/_/zhi bas dran pa rab byung la/_/mngon par phyogs shing gus par gyur/_/nam zhig rang gi skyed tshal du/_/dal gyis shing rta zhon 'gro des/_/bcom ldan rgyal ba ji zhig ltar/_/byon pa dag ni mthong bar gyur/_/snying la bde bas yang dag reg_/rab zhi bdud
[\[78a.3\]]sha mA mr-i taM/_/taM bi lo kyai ba sa ha pA ra thA da ba ta tA ra saH/_/taM tr-i dak+Shi Ni kr-i t+ya tat+pA da na li na dwa yaM/_/sa ba ban+de pra pA dA r+d+ra dr-i sha te nA ba lo ki taH/_/b+ha ga ban+taM pra Na myA tha pra san+naM ta da nu dz+nya ya/_/dza
[\[78a.4\]]rtsi'i char 'babs pa/_/de mthong nyid na 'phral la ni/_/shing rta dag las de yis babs/_/de la bskor ba gsum byas te/_/de yis zhabs pad zung dag la/_/dang bas brlan pa de yis ni/_/spyan gyis gzigs pa des phyag btsal/_/de nas rab dang bcom ldan la/_/rab btud de yi rjes gnang gis/_/de
[\[78a.5\]]gA ma ni dza mud+yA naM sa ta me ba bi tsan+ta ya ta/_/b+hik+Shu ma shwa dzi taM brA ha b+ha ga bA na na tha sa smi taH/_/e Shon+ti ke me rA trau ku mA raHpra bra dzi Sh+ya ti/_/i t+yuk+t+wA swa pa daM yA te su ga te sa ha b+hi k+Shu b+hiH/_/sha kra
[\[78a.6\]]nyid rnam par sems shing de/_/rang gi skyed mos tshal du song /_/de nas bcom ldan 'dzum ldan pas/_/dge slong rta thul la gsungs pa/_/bdag gi drung du gzhon nu 'di/_/mtshan mo rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs bde gshegs rang gnas su/_/dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gshegs/_/brgya byin
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]nir+m+mi ta ma drAk+ShI ta ku mA rAHs+t+rI ka la ba raM/_/pU ya baR+Yu Shi taM kle da sI dat+k+r-i mi ku lA ku la/_/sa dr-iSh+TA sha ba muR+Yu ne pod+be gaHsa ma tsin+ta ya ta/_/bi kA ra e ba tA ru N+ye ru pa lA ba N+ya kAn+ta yaH/_/tsar+m+ma mA sa
[\[78b.2\]]gyis sprul bud med lus/_/gzhon nu yis ni mthong gyur te/_/brnags shing rdul la mi gtsang ba/_/srin bu'i tshogs kyis 'khrugs shing gnas/_/skyed mos tshal gyi ro mthong nas/_/chags bral ldan pa des bsam pa/_/dar bab gzugs ni mdzes pa dang /_/sdug pa rnam par 'gyur ba nyid/_/pags pa sha
[\[78b.3\]]sa mu hA nA mi yaM sA pra kr-i tir+n+n-i NA/_/lo lA lo tsa na mun+mi Shang+ku tsa yu gaHko ShaM sha shAM ka twi ShA me tat+tan+na ba yau ba no da ya la pal+lA pa N+ya ba buH/_/yA taM pU ti ba sA ba pe ka pi ka la kla mya ta kr-i mi byA ku la klin+na klo
[\[78b.4\]]tshogs mi rnams kyis/_/rang bzhin de ni 'di nyid do/_/mig dag g.yo zhing nu ma zung ni rab rgyas ri bong can gyi 'od kyi mdzod/_/lus de lang tsho gsar pa dar bab mdzes sdug 'phro bar bgrang ba 'di dag ni/_/rul ba'i brlan gyis nges bran 'khrugs shing dman pa'i srin bu rnams kyis dkrigs/_/ngan zhing rab mang
[\[78b.5\]]ma ya kr-id+bi kIr+N+Na sa ka la slI hAn+t+ra niR+Yan+t+ra taM/_/a smin+dA ga bi mo ha hA ri ta dr-i shaHsar+b+baM ga saM got+pa be saM lI nAsta na maN+Da le ha ta d+hi yaHpra pUHpa rAM nir+b+r-i taM/_/ya sma de Sha ga ta spr-i haHka ba la ne bai
[\[78b.6\]]bshang bas bsgos shing mtha' dag rgyu mchin 'khrul 'khor med nyid gyur/_/yan lag thams cad 'grogs par spro ba 'di la chags shing rmongs pas mig phrogs shing /_/nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la chags blo gros nyams pas mchog tu bde ba thob gyur pa/_/gang las wa skyes 'di ni chags bral bza' ba dag
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mu khya ba krA na naHkle da mo da bi ShA da kU Ni ta ma tirdu ri ga to dzaM bu kaH/_/i ti pany+tsin+t+ya saM dzA targU D+ha bai rA gya bA sa naH/_/dza gA mod+YA na bi mu khaHsa sha nai ni dza man+di raM/_/a trAM ta re de na m+lA ni khin+no
[\[79a.2\]]las phyir phyogs bzhin 'khyog cing /_/mi gtsang dri nga dag gis yid byung blo gros rmus phyin ring du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes bsams chags bral bag chags ni/_/sbas pa yang dag rgyas gyur te/_/de ni skyed tshal las phyir phyogs/_/rang gi khang par dal gyis song /_/skabs der nyin byed 'jig rten gyi/_/spyod
[\[79a.3\]]p+hUd+p+ra sha man+mu khAH/_/bi ra saM lo ka pr-it+tAM traM bi lo kye ba di bA ka raH/_/a she ShA yA sha pa ri t+yA ga yo gyaM pra sha me yu ShaH/_/san+d+h+yA rak+tAm+ba ra dzu ShaHpra bra dz+ye ba ra be ra b+hU ta/_/lo kot+ta ra pa daM yA te b+hA nau b+hu ba na tsak+Shu
[\[79a.4\]]tshul ro bral mthong bas bzhin/_/skyo zhing rab zhir mngon phyogs te/_/nyin par dag ni nyams par gyur/_/ngal dub ma lus yongs gtong bar/_/'os pa rab zhir 'gro 'dod cing /_/thun mtshams mkha' yi gos dmar bsten/_/nyin mo rab tu byung bzhin gyur/_/nyi ma srid pa'i mig dag ni/_/'jig rten pha rol gnas
[\[79a.5\]]Shi/_/bA sa ro pi pa ri t+ya dz+ya lo kaM ta da nu go b+ha bta/_/ta taHpra t+ya gra ti mi rod+be ga yo gaM dza gadz+dzu ShaM/_/pra dI pa maN+Da lA lo kaHkr-i pa ye ba n+ya bA ra ya ta/_/a smin na ba sa ri shAstA ya sho da da ya yA swa yaM/_/pu ra na d+yAHpa ra
[\[79a.6\]]song tshe/_/'jig rten yongs btang nyin mo yang /_/de yi rjes 'brang nyid du gyur/_/de nas 'gro bsten gsar pa yi/_/rab rib mya ngan sbyor ba dag_/sgron ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba yis/_/brtse bas bzhin du rab tu bzlog_/skabs der ston pa rang nyid ni/_/grags sbyin dag la brtse ba yis/_/grong khyer klung 'gram pha rol tu/_/
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]pA raM prAp+t+yai sa mu pA ya yau/_/ya sho de pi di nA ya sa tu la yA ka la yan+mu huH/_/saM sA rA sA ra ta me ba shay+YA b+ha ba na mA be shata/_/bi Nu bI NA mr-i daM ga di bi no dair+m+ma da nir+b+ba raH/_/ta trA ba sh+yad+pa la lAHshra ma ni drA ni
[\[79b.2\]]de 'thob slad du yang dag gshegs/_/grags sbyin gyis kyang nyin par gyis/_/nyon mongs mtshungs pa yang yang du/_/'khor ba snying po med pa nyid/_/sems shing nyal ba'i khang par zhugs/_/gling bu rgyud mang rdza rnga sogs/_/rtse dga' la zhing gnyid log pa/_/mig zum rgyags pas 'khrugs pa yi/_/bud med
[\[79b.3\]]mI li tAH/_/bI NA bi n+ya sta ba da nA mr-i daM gAr+p+pi ta doR+Ya tAH/_/k+Sha Ni ka twA su kha s+ye ba duHkha d+h+yA na mu pa ga taH/_/bi lo kya shra sta ba da nAstA mr-i tA i ba ni sh+tsa lAH/_/saM dzA tA d+hi ka bai rA gyaHsa tsi raM sa ma tsin+ta
[\[79b.4\]]rnams der de yis mthong /_/kha ni rgyud mang la bkod cing /_/lag pa'i 'khri shing rdza rngar gtang /_/bde ba skad cig pa nyid kyis/_/sdug bsngal bsam gtan la zhugs bzhin/_/gos ral shi ba bzhin du ni/_/g.yo med de dag mthong gyur nas/_/lhag par chags bral yang dag skyes/_/yun ring de yis yang dag
[\[79b.5\]]ya ta/_/a ho ba tAsmin+bi Sha ye paR+Yan+ta bi ra pe ba raM/_/e baM bi d+he ba d+hU nAm+ni mug+d+hA nAM b+h+ri sha mA da raH/_/bi d+h+yu dwi la Shi tA n+yA su ma sat+su kha g+ha no da ye/_/sup+tA nAm tsa mr-i tA nAMny+tsa kut+si dzaM kU tsa baM b+h+ra maH/_/she te kA tsi da d+ho mu khI bi
[\[79b.6\]]bsams/_/kye ma yul ni 'di dag rnams/_/mjug tu mchog tu ro dang bral/_/bud med ces pa 'di lta la/_/rmongs pa rnams ni mchog tu gus/_/mchog min bde ba'i sprin rgyas la/_/glog gi rtse dga' 'di dag rnams/_/gnyid log shi ba dag la yang /_/rnam 'phrul gang na 'dzum gang na/_/'ga' zhig 'og tu kha bltas nyal
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ba li tA pr-iSh+The ts+yu tA s+yaHpa rA yA tA n+yA pi bi kA shi tA s+ya bi ba rA sar+b+bAM ga mut+tA na tAM/_/aM sA sak+ta bi b+hak+ta muk+ta ka tsa rI kA kai r+b+r-i te bA pa ra bi b+h+rA t+me b+ha ba naM ni lI na na ya nas+t+rai NaM sh+ma shA nA
[\[80a.2\]]zhing de yi rgyab ni gzhan du bzlog ste lhung /_/gzhan yang gan kyal yan lag kun brkyangs kha yi bu ga rnam par bye bar gyur/_/gzhan dag skra ni grol zhing dral bas phrag pa la chags bya rog babs pa bzhin/_/bdag gi khyim ni mig zum bud med tshogs rnams rnam 'dzin dur khrod lta
[\[80a.3\]]ya te/_/a ha ma d+yai ba niSh+k+ra mya bra bra dz+yAr+thI pu rAM ta rA ta/_/b+ha ga ban+taM pra dzA mye ba draSh+TuM mo ha ni br-it+ta ye/_/bi tsin+t+ye ti sa mA dA ya ma hAr+g+he rat+na pA du ke/_/sha kra pra b+ha bA tsha ya yA ba dz+nyA ta pu ra rak+Shi taH/_/a
[\[80a.4\]]bur spyod/_/deng nyid rab byung don gnyer bdag_/grong khyer nang las phyir 'thon te/_/rmongs pa bzlog slad bcom ldan 'das/_/nges par blta ru 'gro bar bya/_/zhes bsams rin thang che ba yi/_/rin chen mchil lham zung nas de/_/grong srung rnams kyis ma shes par/_/brgya byin gyi ni mthu yis song /_/grong
[\[80a.5\]]b+hi niSh+k+ra mya na ga ra dwA rAt+p+ra pya pa rid+pa rAM/_/saM sA ra ma ru tshaM krAn+taM tA paM t+yak+tu mo bod+Ya taH/_/ta mA yAn+taM bi lo kyai ba b+ha ga bAn+b+hU ta b+ha ba taH/_/prI t+yA san+tA ra Ne ta s+ya ya yau pot+kaN+Thi tA mi ba/_/sa he ma
[\[80a.6\]]khyer sgo las mngon par ni/_/byung ste chu klung mchog thob nas/_/'khor ba'i mya ngam 'phos pa yis/_/gdung ba gtong bar brtson pa bzhin/_/bcom ldan 'byung po dgongs pa yis/_/de ni 'ong ba gzigs gyur nas/_/dgyes pas de ni bsgral ba la/_/bzhed dang ldan pa bzhin du gyur/_/de yis rjes mthun
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]bar+N+Na mu da mya dak+Shi NaM dak+Sha NaM b+hu dzaM/_/do ha pra b+hA ba pra kA she na rta maHpa ri ha ran di shAM/_/e h+yai hi prAp+nu hi pa daM ni ra pA ya ma nA ma yaM/_/a b+h+ya d+hA di ti taM du rA ta me g+ha g+ho Sha g+ha na swa raH/_/shru twA
[\[80b.2\]]gser gyi mdog_/phyag ni g.yas pa brkyangs mdzad nas/_/sku yi gzi brjid snang ba yis/_/phyogs kyi mun pa yongs phrogs shing /_/tshur shog tshur shog gnod med la/_/nad med gnas ni khyod kyis 'thob/_/ces pa 'brug dbyangs ltar sdug sgras/_/ring po nas ni de la gsungs/_/bcom ldan
[\[80b.3\]]b+ha ga ba taHshap+da ma mr-i te ne ba pU ri taH/_/ya sho da s+t+yak+ta san+tA paHpa d+yaHshI ta la tAM ya yau/_/t+yak+t+ya sa sa rai tastIr+thA ma hA r+he rat+na pA du ke/_/dat+tA ba gA hA mut+tIr+Ya tA pa raM pA ra mAp+ta bA na/_/b+ha ga ban+taM sa saM prA pya
[\[80b.4\]]'das kyi gsung thos nas/_/bdud rtsi yis ni gang ba bzhin/_/yongs gdung btang nas grags sbyin ni/_/'phral la bsil ba nyid du gyur/_/rin chen rin chen mchil lham ni/_/klung gi ngogs su de yis dor/_/brgal phyin de yis pha rol gyi/_/'gram du thar pa nyid thob gyur/_/bcom ldan drung du des phyin te/_/
[\[80b.5\]]tA pi tsan+da na pA da paM/_/pra NA nA ma pra pA dAr+d+raM tsa ra NAM lI nA she kha raH/_/ta tasta s+yA sa mot+kaR+Sha shA linIn+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/tsa kA ra shAstA ye nA sau le b+he bi ga ta rA ga tAM/_/swA khyA te d+har+m+ma bi na ye brah+ma tsaR+YA ya
[\[80b.6\]]gdung ba can gyi tsan dan shing /_/dang bas brlan la zur phud ni/_/zhabs la gtugs pas rab tu btud/_/de nas de la ston pa yis/_/gang gis 'di ni chags bral nyid/_/'thob pa mtshungs med mchog gyur pa/_/legs pa'i chos ni bstan par mdzad/_/brtul zhugs bzang de bcom ldan drung /_/legs par gsungs
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]su bra taH/_/sa ni yuk+to b+ha ga ba tA pra ya yau pUr+N+Na ka ma tA/_/su pra bud+d+haHpra bu d+ho tha shru twA niSh+k+rAn+ta mAt+ma dzaM/_/tad+bi yo gA g+ni saM tap+ta ma n+we Sh+TuM niR+Ya yau/_/sa sho ka sa hi taHsne ha mo ha na ma ha tA ji taH/_/bra
[\[81a.2\]]pa'i chos 'dul la/_/tshangs par spyad slad rab tu bkod/_/'dod pa rdzogs pa nyid du gyur/_/de nas bu ni song ba dag_/legs par rab sad sad pas thos/_/de bral me yis gdungs pa yis/_/de ni 'tshol du phyi rol song /_/mdza' dang rmongs pa chen po yis/_/gzir cing mya ngan ldan pa des/_/chu bo'i
[\[81a.3\]]dzan+daR+sha bA gan+te gan+te rat+na pA du ke/_/sa sa mut+tIR+Ya pA ri taM b+ha ga ban+taM bya lo ka ya ta/_/tat+p+rA b+hA pa pra tits+tshan+naM na tu pu traM bu raHs+thi taM/_/ta taHkr-i ta pra Na ma s+ya ta s+yA bi b+ha ga bA na pu naH/_/d+harmya ya ka tha ya mo
[\[81a.4\]]ngogs kyi 'gram du phyin/_/rin chen mchil lham dag kyang mthong /_/de yis chu bo yang dag brgal/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mthong gyur te/_/de yi mthu yis rab bsgribs pas/_/mdun na gnas pa'i bu ma mthong /_/de nas slar yang bcom ldan gyis/_/rab tu btud byas de yi yang /_/rmongs pa chos gtam
[\[81a.5\]]haM twi Sha ta ma i bA ha ratra/_/tI bra mo hasta taHpu traM sa driSh+T+wA bi ma la gyu tiM/_/shAstu sh+tsa kA rA nu ma taHpra Na yA da d+hi bA sa nAM/_/b+ha ga ba na tha ting+g+r-i he kr-i twA pU dzA pra ti gra haM/_/taM pat+nI sa hi taM tsakre shud+d+ha shik+ShA pa
[\[81a.6\]]rigs pa yis/_/'od kyi mun pa bzhin du phrogs/_/de nas rmongs bral de yis bu/_/dri med 'od ldan mthong gyur nas/_/rjes su 'dod cing gus pa yis/_/ston pa lhag par gnas pa byas/_/de yi khyim du bcom ldan gyis/_/mchod pa rab tu blangs mdzad nas/_/de ni chung mar bcas pa la/_/dag pa'i bslab gnas
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]do dz+wa laM/_/ta to ya sho da sa ci bAsh+tsa twA ra shrI man+tAM bA rAH/_/bi ma lA khyaHsu bA hush+tsa pUr+N+Na ko tha ga bAM pa tiH/_/ya shaHpra kA shi ta di shaM ya sha da b+ha ga bad+pu raH/_/brah+ma tsaR+Ya bra tA sak+taM shru twA taM de sha gA ya
[\[81b.2\]]rang 'bar mdzad/_/de nas grags sbyin grogs po ni/_/dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog_/dri med gang po lag bzang dang /_/ba glang bdag ces bya ba bzhis/_/bcom ldan mdun na grags sbyin ni/_/tshangs spyod brtul zhugs la chags pa'i/_/grags pa phyogs su rab gsal ba/_/thos nas gnas der 'ongs
[\[81b.3\]]yu/_/te ShAM ku sha lA pA ke na prA p+tA nAM b+ha ga bAn+pu naH/_/bi da d+he d+har+m+ma bi na ye shA sa naM shud+d+ha shA sa naH/_/ya sho da ste tsa tsa twA ro b+hik+Sha paHpany+tsa tsA pa ro/_/ar+hat+pa daM da sha prA pusta da b+ha ga ba ton+ti ke/_/shru twA ya
[\[81b.4\]]par gyur/_/dge ba smin pas thob gyur pa/_/de dag rnams la bcom ldan 'das/_/dag pa'i bka' yis slar yang ni/_/'dul ba'i chos la bstan pa bsgrubs/_/bzhi po de dag grags sbyin dang /_/dge slong gzhan pa lnga dag ste/_/bcu yis bcom ldan drung du ni/_/dgra bcom gnas dag thob par gyur/_/grags sbyin
[\[81b.5\]]sho da pr-it+tAM taM d+ha n+yA stat+sa tsi bA pa re/_/pany+tsA sha dan+ti kaM shAstu rga twA tat+tu l+ya tAM ya yuH/_/sha ta paM tsa ka ma n+yats+tsa t-id+b+ra t+tAn+to di tA da rAM/_/tat+tu l+yaM d+har+m+ma bi na yaM le b+he b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/_/ta taHka dA tsid+b+ha ga bA na kau tu kAt+sar+b+ba
[\[81b.6\]]spyod tshul thos gyur nas/_/de yi grogs po skal ldan gzhan/_/lnga bcus ston pa'i drung du ni/_/phyin nas de mtshungs nyid dag thob/_/tshul des gus pa skyes gyur pa/_/gzhan ni brgya phrag lnga yis kyang /_/de dang mtshungs par 'dul ba'i chos/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du thob/_/de nas nam zhig dge mtshan las/_/dge slong
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]b+hik+Shu b+hiH/_/pr-iSh+TaHpuN+ya ya sho da s+ya sar+b+ba dz+nyA stA na b+hA Sha ta/_/pu ra pra t+ye ka saM bud+d+haHbu rA ta saM prap+tA piN+Da kaH/_/bA rA ti shan+te b+ha ga bAn shi khwi k+Sha Na su thA bi shA ta/_/gan+d+ha ba tI pa ti dA brah+me na dza gA pi thi tat+t+wa/_/nA
[\[82a.2\]]kun gyis bcom ldan la/_/grags sbyin gyi ni bsod nams dris/_/de la thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/_/sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan gtsug tor can/_/grong khyer las ni bsod snyoms thob/_/pha rol ngogs 'gram skad cig bzhugs/_/sa yi bdag po tshangs
[\[82a.3\]]ma su b+hA nu sa raista smin+s+thi ka b+hau ti ka pA sh+ya/_/sh+lo lo ka gnyis kyi skad dod sdeb sbyor rkang bkra yod pa 'di za hor ban+des kha bskang ba mkhas pa rnams kyis dpyad pa zhu/_go ra bi rau dri Nata pyaiHsre da a b+hU ta sa hi t+ya/_/tshA tri Na d+hA ra dr-ik+taM te na tsha yI ya kr-i sI ta/_/ta s+yAn+ti ke brah+ma tsaR+Ya sa mA dA ya sa sha sa
[\[82a.4\]]pas byin/_/lam de nas ni 'gro ba yi/_/rjes 'brang 'od bzang zhes pa yis/_/de ni bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer drag po yi/_/gdung bas rdul dang bcas gyur pa/_/de mthong nas ni de la des/_/gdugs dag bzung nas grib bsil byas/_/de yi drung du tshangs spyod la/_/de yis bstan pa bzung
[\[82a.5\]]na ma/_/ba b+hU ba tsit+ta bai ma l+yAt+ku sha la pra d+hA na bAn/_/ta taHpra t+ye ka saM bud+d+ha sta mu bA tsa pra san+na d+hIH/_/b+ha bi Sh+ya taHshAkya mu ne ran+ti ke bo d+hi mAp+s+ya si/_/i t+yuk+taste ni ya taM kA le na t+yak+ta pi gra haH/_/so b+ha bat+su ma tirnA ma de
[\[82a.6\]]nas ni/_/sems ni dri ma med nyid las/_/dge ba mchog ldan thob par gyur/_/de nas rab dang blo ldan pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis de la gsungs/_/'byung 'gyur shAkya thub pa yi/_/drung du khyod ni byang chub 'gyur/_/de yis nges par de gsungs te/_/dus kyis lus ni btang byas nas/_/blo bzang zhes pa lha yi bur/_/mtho
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]ba pu trak+tsi ran+di bi/_/sa e Sha pu N+yo bA na yaHya sho daHshre ya sA ni d+hiH/_/su hr-i dA ma pi saM prAp+taHkIr+t+yA ku sha la se tu tAM/_/kr-i kIrnA ma k+Shi ti pa tiHka s+ya pya s+yA ka tot+pu rA/_/shAstuHsha rI ra nit+pA Ne rat+na stU pa mu dA ra d+hIH/_/
[\[82b.2\]]ris su ni yun ring gyur/_/bsod nams ldan pa de nyid dang /_/grags sbyin dge legs gter 'di ste/_/grags pa yis ni grogs rnams kyang /_/dge ba'i zam stegs nyid dag thob/_/sa bdag kr-i kI zhes bya ba/_/rgya chen blo yis ston pa ni/_/'od srung sku dag myang 'das la/_/rin chen mchod rten sngon tshe byas/_/
[\[82b.3\]]ya sha swI ra me ta na yas+t+ri tI yasta s+ya b+hU pa teH/_/b+hak+t+yA tasmrin+ma NistU pe rat+na ts+tshat+t+raM n+ya be sha yata/_/te nA pi pUr+b+ba puN+ye na dzan+ma n+yasmin+ma ha ya shAH/_/dzA to ya shodash+ts+tshat+t+re Na rat+na dIp+te na b+hU Shi taH/_/i t+ye n+ya dzan+ma su
[\[82b.4\]]sa yi bdag po de yi bu/_/gsum pa grags ldan dga' ba yis/_/nor bu'i mchod rten de la ni/_/gus pas rin chen gdugs dag bkod/_/de dang bsod nams snga ma yis/_/skye ba 'di la grags sbyin ni/_/grags chen rin chen 'bar ba yi/_/gdugs kyis brgyan pa dag tu skyes/_/de ltar skye ba gzhan la
[\[82b.5\]]kr-i to da ya bad+d+ha mU la son+me Sha ye Sha sha shi shu b+h+ra ya shoM shu puSh+paH/_/d+har+m+ma dru maHpr-i thu ta raHpa li tA s+ya sA d+hoHshru twe ti bisma ya ma bA pa sa b+hik+Shu saM g+haH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM b+ho d+hi sa twA ba dA na
[\[82b.6\]]legs byas rgyas pas rtsa ba bcings/_/zla ba ltar dkar grags pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i me tog can/_/dge ba de yis chos kyi ljon pa rab rgyas 'bras smin 'di/_/de skad thos nas dge slong tshogs des ya mtshan thob par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]kalpa la tA yaM ya sho dA ba dA naM dwA ShaSh+Thi ta maHpal+la waH//_//sha kra bA yu ba ru NA da yaHsu ra bi kr-i yAn+mu ni ba rAsh+tsa yat+k+r-i te/_/yAn+ti tat+s+Sha ra su khaM tri NA ya te
[\[83a.2\]]brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las grags sbyin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//brgya byin rlung dang chu sogs lha rnams dang /_/thub mchog rnams kyang gang slad rnam 'gyur du/_/'gyur ba'i dran bde rtswa ltar gcod pa'i
[\[83a.3\]]ya s+ya ka s+ya na sa bisma yaspa daM/_/dwi dzan+mA mA ga d+hA gra me bi shru ta shrir+m+ma hA s+tha le/_/n+ya gro d+ha kalpa nA ma b+hUn+ma hA shA ya ku lod+b+ha baH/_/ta s+ya b+hAr+YA su rU pA khyA gr-i hod+YA na bi ha ri NaM/_/a suM ta su ta markA b+haM pispa la s+ya ta
[\[83a.4\]]gnas/_/ya mtshan can de gang su rung ba'i min/_/ma ga d+hA grong thang chen du/_/sA la chen po'i rigs 'khrungs pa/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi tog ces pa/_/gnyis skyes grags pa'i dpal ldan byung /_/de yaM chung ma gzugs bzang ma/_/zhes pa khang pa'i skyed tshal na/_/rol pas ljon shing pispa la'i/_/'og tu bu ni nyi 'od
[\[83a.5\]]ro ro d+haH/_/dzA ta mA tri su te tasmin+dAp+ta dzam+bu na da d+yu tai/_/di byaM shu kaM ya sha shU b+h+raM tasmat+p+ra pur b+hUt+ta roH/_/sa pispa lA ya no nA ma bA laHka ma la lo tsa naH/_/bi d+yA ka lA ka li ta d+hir+b+ya bar+d+ha ta sa ha shri yA/_/sa pi trA prAr+th+ya no pi bi bA
[\[83a.6\]]bskrun/_/gser gyi 'od zer rab 'bar ba'i/_/bu de skyes pa tsam nyid la/_/grags pa ltar dkar lha yi gos/_/shing de las ni rab tu byung /_/pispa la skyes zhes bya ba/_/byis pa pad+ma'i mig can de/_/rig dang sgyu rtsal blo sbyangs shing /_/dpal dang lhan cig rnam par rgyas/_/de ni pha yis gsol btab kyang /_/
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]ha bi mu khaHsa da/_/ba b+hU ba bi Sha ya dwe ShI bi be ga bi Sha dA sha yaH/_/baMshats+tshe ta b+ha yAt+pi trA sa pu naHpu na rar+thi taH/_/ta mu tse ro tsi te ma h+yaM nA sa Ni gra ha ban+d+ha nAM/_/na tA ta kA ma kA bo haM brah+ma tsaR+Ye ma tir+m+ma
[\[83b.2\]]rtag tu khyim thab las phyir phyogs/_/yul la sdang ldan dben pa ni/_/dri med bsam pa ldan par gyur/_/pha ni rigs brgyud chad pa yis/_/'jigs nas yang yang gsol btab ste/_/de la smras pa khyim thab kyi/_/'ching ba la ni bdag mi srid/_/yab gcig 'dod pa bdag mi 'dod/_/bdag gi blo gros tshangs
[\[83b.3\]]ma/_/sha ma swAts+tshan+d+ya mut+su ka ka s+yeSh+TaM b+ha ba ban+d+ha naM/_/bASh+pa s+ya d+ya sa ta ta sa ne ho ma d+hU meHpra praMt+tiHpa t+ya gran+thir+b+ya pa na sha ra Nau tu s+ya ha stAr+p+pa Ne na/_/saM sA rA dz+nyA sa ma ya tsa la ne ban+D+ha naM mA le dAm+nA mo hA
[\[83b.4\]]spyod la'o/_/rang 'dod zhi ba dor nas ni/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba su zhig 'dod/_/dang por sbyin sreg du bas mchi ma rtag tu 'bab la rab tu 'jug_/mtshungs par lag pa gtad pas gdung ba'i lam la bden par mdud pa mdzad/_/'phreng ba'i thag pas 'khor ba'i bka' yi dam tshig dag la g.yo ba
[\[83b.5\]]ro ho pa ha ta ma na sAM haR+Sha he turbi bA haH/_/yair+n+r-i t+ya ni la lo la bA la la la na bal+la bi lA sA nu gA bI NA baM sha ra bA bi bA ha sa ma ye prot+pA hi tairna shru taH/_/ha pu tre ti ba pu pra lA pa ka la na klI bA na
[\[83b.6\]]'chang /_/khyim thab yid ni rmongs pa gnas pas nyer bcom rnams kyi dga' ba'i rgyu/_/na chung gzhon nu'i 'khri shing gar gyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse dga'i rjes 'brang ba'i/_/rgyud mang gling bu'i sgra ni khyim thab dus su spro ldan gang gis ma mnyan pa/_/de dag la brten kyi hud bu zhes chung mas cho nge smra zhing
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]te ShAM shri tA shrA yan+ti gu ru bASh+pa gang+ga da ga lang+ga Ta b+hi yo gA gi riH/_/i t+yuk+t+wa ti bra nir+b+han+d+haM pi ta raM dza na nIM tsa paH/_/ta ma ka n+yaM sa mA dA ya ku sha laiHshilpi b+hiHkr-i tAM/_/saM dzAtAM kran+ti pik+ta s+ya kau tu
[\[84a.2\]]dman gyur pa/_/mchi ma lci bar thigs thigs 'bab pas mngon par sbyar ba'i sgra grags thos mi 'gyur/_/zhes pa 'bad pa drag po yis/_/pha dang ma la des smras nas/_/mdzes pas dran pa dge mtshan gyis/_/myu gu yang dag skyes pa bzhin/_/bzo bo mkhas pas byas pa yi/_/gser
[\[84a.3\]]ka s+ye ba kan+da lIM/_/kul bi ts+tshe da tsit+tAr+t+taM d+hI raHpu na ru bA tsa ti/_/tu l+ya lA bAr+N+N+ya bar+NA s+ya la b+h+ya te ya di ka n+ya kA/_/ka ro mi twid+gi rA tA ta ta da haM dA ra saM gra haM/_/i ti bu tra ba tsaHshru twA tat+tu l+ya di bi durla b+hAM/_/
[\[84a.4\]]gyi bu mo bzung nas ni/_/rigs chad bsams pas gzir de la/_/brten pas slar yang rab smras pa/_/kha dog mdzes sdug 'di mtshungs pa'i/_/bu mo gal te rnyed gyur na/_/yab gcig khyod kyi tshig gis ni/_/bdag gi bud med bzung bar bgyi/_/zhes pa bu yi tshig thos nas/_/de mtshungs bu mo mtho ris su/_/rnyed
[\[84a.5\]]brAh+maNaHka n+ya kAm+ma twA na rA sho b+hU da d+ho mu kha/_/bi ga ta nan+da ni s+yan+da su hrits+tsha ru ra kA bi d+haH/_/taM bi praHshru twA br-it+tAn+taHsho ka klAn+ta ma tA pa ta/_/pra yat+na mA tra sA d+h+yar+the na sho kaM ka stu mar+ha si/_/e Sha bra dzA mya haM draSh+TuM ka n+ya kA ka na
[\[84a.6\]]dkar shes nas bram ze ni/_/re thag chad cing bzhin du 'gyur/_/tsats+tsa ka ra zhes pa'i grogs/_/bram zes gtam de thos pa yis/_/kun dga' dang bral g.yo med pa/_/mya ngan gyis nyen de la smras/_/rab 'bad tsam gyis bzod don la/_/khyod ni mya ngan byar mi 'os/_/bu mo gser 'od ldan pa ni/_/blta ru nga nyid 'gro bar
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ka pra b+haM/_/i ti snig+d+ha s+ya su hri daHsa kr-i twA d+haiR+Ya ma gra dzaH/_/A dA ya he ma pra ti mAM ya yau d+hI man di gaM ta raM/_/de ba tAM lany+ts+tsha na ts+tshan+na sa mA l+yAM shru ka b+hU Shi taM/_/gr-i hI twa dik+Shu ba b+h+ra ma ka n+ya pU dz+ya mu dA ha ran/_/
[\[84b.2\]]bya/_/zhes te mdza' ba'i grogs po ni/_/dang por skyes pas bstan byas nas/_/gser gyi gzugs brnyan bzung nas ni/_/blo ldan phyogs rnams dag tu song /_/'phreng ba gos dang bcas pas brgyan/_/lha yi mtshan ma'i zol gyis ni/_/bzung nas phyogs su 'khyam byed cing /_/bu mos mchod par bya zhes smras/_/
[\[84b.3\]]tat+pu dzo pa ga tAHka n+yA na ga ra grA ma bar+t+ma su/_/bi lo ka yan+sa pa ta ti na tat+tu l+ya ma b+hAp+ta bA na/_/ta taHka dA tsid+bai shA l+yaM ka pi la s+yA gra dzan+ma naH/_/ka n+ya mA pa sh+yad+b+ha trA khyaM he ma ka n+ya d+hi ka pra b+haM/_/bi bA ha bi mu khI kAn+taM tAM bai rA gya
[\[84b.4\]]grong khyer grong dang lam rnams su/_/de mchod du 'ong bu mo rnams/_/rtag tu rnam par blta ba des/_/de dang mtshungs pa rnyed ma gyur/_/de nas bram ze ser skya yis/_/bu mo gser gyi bu mo bas/_/'od lhag bzang mo zhes pa yi/_/yangs pa can du nam zhig mthong /_/mdzes ma khyim thab las phyir phyogs/_/chags bral
[\[84b.5\]]bi be ki nAM/_/sa he ma shulkaM ka bi laM ya yA tsi ka thi tA n+wa yaH/_/taM ka n+ya dza n+ya kaHprA ha sat+ku laM ku la be shru taM/_/lo ke n+ya gro d+ha ka pra b+haM go tra dzA ta s+ya kA sh+ya pya/_/kiM tu ka n+yA pra yat+nen d+ha na man+bi Sh+ya di ya te/_/
[\[84b.6\]]dben pa dang ldan zhing /_/gser rin ma da ser skya la/_/rjes 'gro bshad pa de yis bslangs/_/bu mo'i pha yis der smras pa/_/'od srungs rigs skyes 'jig rten na/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog pa yin/_/rigs mchog rigs ni rnam par grags/_/'on kyang mdzes ma 'bad pa yis/_/nor ni brtags nas sbyin par bya/_/
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]dA ri drots+tsha pi nA pa ha pi turda ha ti mA na saM/_/pat+nI ka la haM saM sak+taM ka n+ya kA nir+d+ha nar+p+pi ta/_/bye ba no pa ha taHsU nusta p+tAsh+tse ta sa sU tsa yaH/_/da twA shri yaM dza la ni d+hiHpu ru Shot+ta mA ya dz+nya twA tha
[\[85a.2\]]dbul ba'i shugs rings ldan ma des/_/pha yi yid ni gdung bar byed/_/chung ma 'thab mo la chags dang /_/bu mo nor med la sbyin dang /_/bu ni gdung bas nyer bcom rnams/_/sems la khab bsregs lta bu yin/_/chu gter gyi ni skyes bu mchog la dpal mo byin byas te/_/ci ste de
[\[85a.3\]]ba ma na ta raM ba li yAts+nya yA taM/_/a d+ya pi sak+ta ba Da bA na la ru pa sho kaHsots+tsh+wa sa e ba na bi muny+tsa ta tI bra tA paM/_/tasmAd+bit+taM sa ma b+hi Sh+ya dz+nyA twA ha d+bi b+ha bon+na tiM/_/da s+ya maHsat+ku le ka n+yAM d+ha nA d+hI na hi sang+gu NaH/_/
[\[85a.4\]]ni stobs ldan la slong mi'u thung shes nas/_/da lta'ang mya ngan la chags rta gdong me yi rang bzhin gyis/_/gdung ba drag po shugs rings dang bcas nges par gtong mi byed/_/de slad nor ni btsal byas te/_/de 'byor mngon mtho shes gyur nas/_/dam pa'i rigs la bu mo sbyin/_/dam pa'i yon tan nor gyi dbang /_/
[\[85a.5\]]i ti ka n+yA pi tuHshru twA tat+pu tra NA ny+tsa b+ha Shi taM/_/ta the t+yuk+t+wa dwi dzaHg+r+ye yat+ku mA ra dza na kan+ti kaM/_/su par+N+Na lA pa N+ya prAp+tA shru twA ka n+ye ti tad+ba tsaH/_/n+ya gro d+ha kalpaHshru twai pa ba b+hU pA nan+da nir+b+ha raH/_/brah+ma tsar+Ye Shi NaM shru twA ka n+ya kA
[\[85a.6\]]zhes pa bu mo'i pha dang de'i/_/bu rnams kyis kyang brjod thos nas/_/de bzhin zhes smras gnyis skyes ni/_/gzhon nu'i pha yi gan du song /_/gser gyi mdzes ma las lhag pa'i/_/bu mo thob ces de yi tshig_/n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog pa yis/_/thos nas kun dga' rgyas par gyur/_/bu mo tshangs spyod don gnyer ma/_/thos nas
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]pispa lA ya naH/_/swa ya me bAr+thi be she na pra ya yau tad+g+r-i haMsha naiH/_/saM prAp+ta ti thi sat+kA raHsa pr-iSh+T+wa ta tra taM kr-i tI/_/brah+ma tsaR+YAr+thi nI dz+nyA twA pra ha pur+N+Na ma no ra thaH/_/ka l+yA Ni brah+ma tsaR+Yar+thi pi pro haM pispa lA ya naH/_/yat+k+r-i te ta na bi
[\[85b.2\]]pispa la skyes ni/_/slong mo pa yi chas kyis de'i/_/khyim du rang nyid dal gyis song /_/mgron dang bkur sti thob gyur pa/_/mkhas pa des der de la dris/_/tshangs spyod don du gnyer shes nas/_/re ba rdzogs pas rab smras pa/_/dge ba tshangs spyod don gnyer ba'i/_/pispa la skyes bram ze bdag_/gang gi ched du bram ze
[\[85b.3\]]pre Na twaM pra yat+ne nA yA tse tA/_/a haM bi bA ha bi mu khaHpi trA twa dar+tha mar+thi taH/_/twa ma s+ya bam+bi d+hA b+ha dre diSh+T+yA tu l+yAHsa mA ga maH/_/i ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA pra hriSh+TA ta mu bA tsa sA/_/a bA yo ra bi rud+d+ho yaM bi ba haHsha ma saM
[\[85b.4\]]des/_/khyod ni 'bad pas bslangs pa'o/_/khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs bdag_/pha yis shin tu don du gnyer/_/bzang mo khyod kyang 'di lta bur/_/mtshungs par dga' bas yang dag 'grogs/_/zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/rab dga' de yis de la smras/_/zhi zhing dul bas khyim thab 'di/_/yu cag la ni
[\[85b.5\]]ya mAta/_/ta taHsa mu tsi tA bap+ta pra haR+Shot+pA ha pU ri taH/_/ni dzaM ga twA sa b+ha ba naM pi turbA kya ma ma n+yata/_/ka pi lo pi sa man+bi Sh+ya ta ma nan+ta d+ha no da yaM/_/pra da dauta na yAM ta smai ba ra rat+nai ra laM kr-i tAM/_/ta yor+m+ma hAr+ha bi b+ha be br-it+te pa ri
[\[85b.6\]]'gal ba med/_/de nas yang dag 'os pa thob/_/rab dga' spro ba rgyas pa de/_/rang gi khyim du song nas ni/_/pha yi tshig dag kha yis blangs/_/mtha' yas nor ni rgyas pa de/_/rnam par brtags nas ser skyas kyang /_/rin chen mchog gis brgyan pa yi/_/bu mo de la rab tu byin/_/'byor ba rin thang che ba yis/_/de dag khyim
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]Na yod+sa be/_/a lub+d+ha brah+ma tsar+Yo b+hUn+nirbi ka raH sa mA ga maH/_/rU pa yau ba na saM b+hA re ta yos+saM ya ma shI la yoH/_/ba b+hU ba bi b+ha ba glA ni rA dz+nyA b+haM gAn+ma no b+hu baH/_/paR+YA ye Nai ka ni drA yAM dzA gar+t+t+ya
[\[86a.2\]]thab spro bar zhugs/_/tshangs par spyod pa ma nyams shing /_/rnam 'gyur med par 'grogs par gyur/_/dul ba'i ngang tshul de dag gi_/_gzugs dang lang tsho rgyas pa'i tshe/_/yid la byung ba'i bka' bcag pas/_/'byor pa dman pa nyid du gyur/_/de gnyis reg pa bsrung ba'i slad/_/res kyi
[\[86a.3\]]kaHsa mut+thi ta/_/i ti tau spaR+sha rak+Sha ye tsakra tuHsha ya nas+thi tiM/_/ka dA tsi da tha sha y+YAM te kA la byA laM bya lo ka ya ta/_/ni drA mu dra ti ne trA yAM pisba lA ya naH/_/ta taHsa tad+b+ha yAt+ta s+ya dorla tA sAr+Sh+wa lam+bi nI/_/sa
[\[86a.4\]]gcig ni gnyid log cing /_/gcig ni langs nas mel tshe byed/_/ces pa nyal ba'i rnam gzhag byas/_/de nas nam zhig mal stan mthar/_/de yi mig ni gnyid kyis rgyas/_/thebs tshe pispa la skyes kyis/_/sbrul ni nag po mthong bar gyur/_/de nas de lag 'khri shing ni/_/logs su 'phyang ba brtse ldan des/_/rnga
[\[86a.5\]]da yash+tsa ma rAn+te na ra rak+Shot+k+Shi pya bA sa pA/_/sa ha sA bA hU tsa la na trastA ha ri Na lo tsa nA/_/sA pa kam+pa ku tsA lo la hA ra pa ti ma b+hA Sha ta/_AR+Ya pu tra ka thi na ma sa ma yaHpa t+ya bA di naH/_/bi smri tasta ba saM dzA to ya
[\[86a.6\]]yab mtha' dang gos dag gis/_/bsdus nas 'jigs pa de las bsrungs/_/'phral la lag pa bskyod pa yis/_/skrag pa'i ri dgas mig can ma/_/nu ma 'dar zhing do shal ni/_/g.yo ldan ma des khyo la smras/_/jo yi sras po ji ltar na/_/nges par dam tshig brjed gyur cing /_/bden par smra ba khyod kyi thugs/_/
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]da yaM tsit+ta bi sla baH/_/ladz+dza ba hA bi kA ra s+ya ke ya ma t+yat+ta tA ta ba/_/t+ya dzan+ti d+h+ri ti maR+YA dAM b+hU d+ha ra na tu sA d+ha baH/_/i ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA tA mu bA tsa ba sa smi taH/_/b+hA dre nAs+t+ya ba ma na saHswap+ne pi ma ma bi sla baH/_/
[\[86b.2\]]gang 'di rnam par bslad pa skyes/_/khyod kyi rnam 'gyur ngo tsha'i rgyun/_/shin tu che ldan 'di ni ci/_/sa 'dzin dag kyang brtan pa'i lugs/_/gtong gi dam pa yongs ma yin/_/zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/'dzum ldan de yis de la smras/_/rmi lam na yang bdag gi yid/_/bzang mo nges par bslad pa med/_/
[\[86b.3\]]ki twe Sha kr-iSh+Na sar+p+po tra b+hI Sha NaHpa ri bar+t+ta te/_/ba huste sha ya nA lam+bI b+hI t+yaM saM rak+Shi to ma ya/_/e tat+pa t+yur+b+bA tsaHshru twa te shaM kA dza ga da sA/_/diSh+T+yA t+ya pa t+ya shI la s+ya na kA ma ma li na ma ti/_/sar+p+paHsA
[\[86b.4\]]'on kyang 'dir ni sbrul nag 'di/_/'jigs su rung ba yongs su rgyu/_/khyod kyi lag pa mal stan las/_/'phyang ba 'jigs nas bdag gis bsrungs/_/khyo yi tshig 'di thos gyur nas/_/dogs btang dga' ba des smras pa/_/bden pa'i ngang tshul khyod kyi blo/_/'dod pas dri mar byas pa med/_/gdug pa'i
[\[86b.5\]]d+hur+b+ba rA ko yaM b+haM yaM rA go ra gAt+pa raM/_/e kaM han+ti ti nuM sar+p+paHkA maHkA ya sha tAM ta kr-i ta/_/rak+Sha tasmId+ba kA ro yaM mi t+yuk+t+wA bi ra rA ma sA/_/tI braM tsa pra sha shaM sA s+yAHsaM ya maM pispa lA ya naH/_/n+ya gro d+ha
[\[86b.6\]]sbrul ni khegs pa ste/_/chags pa'i lto 'phyes mchog tu 'jigs/_/sbrul gyis lus gcig 'joms pa ste/_/'dod pas lus ni brgya mthar byed/_/de slad rnam 'gyur 'di dag bsrungs/_/zhes smras de ni chags dang bral/_/de yi shin tu dul ba yang /_/pispa la skyes dag gis bsngags/_/dus kyi n+ya gro d+ha
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]kalpe kA le na sa b+hAR+Ye tr-i di baM ge te/_/pra b+hU ta gr-i ha saM b+hA ra tsin+tA b+hA ra mu bA hA saH/_/ka dA tsit+tai la pA nA ya br-iShA NAM ti la pI Da Ni/_/te na b+ha drA sa mA diSh+Ta n+ya yuk+taM pa ri ba ri kAH/_/tAHbi
[\[87a.2\]]yi tog_/chung mar bcas pa mtho ris song /_/rab mang khyim gyi tshogs dag gis/_/bsam pa'i khur ni de yis blangs/_/nam zhig til mar btung ba'i slad/_/khyu mchog rnams kyi til 'tshir la/_/bzang mos yongs su bstan pa yis/_/'khor rnams dag ni yongs su bskos/_/til ni
[\[87a.3\]]Di ta ti lAste la kuM b+he Shu kr-i mi saM tsa yaM/_/ts+yu taM bi lo kya pI dan+ta mu tsuHsa ka ru Na mi thaH/_/a ho nu pA ba masmA kaM ba hu prA Ni pa ri k+Sha yata/_/b+ha drA yAHsar+b+ba me tad+bA pA ta kaM yad+gi rA kr-i taM/_/tats+tsha twA
[\[87a.4\]]'tshir ba de dag gis/_/til mar bum par srog chags tshogs/_/lhung zhing nyams pa mthong gyur nas/_/snying rje bcas pas phan tshun smras/_/srog chags mang po yongs brlag pas/_/kye ma bdag kyang sdig pa can/_/yang na gang gi tshig gis byas/_/sdig pa 'di kun bzang mo la'o/_/bzang mo khyim
[\[87a.5\]]tad gr-i ha ga tA b+ha drA bai rA gya mA ya yau/_/tasmin+ne bak+Sha Ne b+hArtA pra bi sh+yo ba tsa tAM ra haH/_/b+ha dre gr-i ha ma hA b+hA raM shran+to haM na pa he sa dA/_/kr-i Sha kle shardi ta br-i Sha pra Na hiM sA nu shA sa naM/_/i mAH parlan+tan+ta bi ra sA niH
[\[87a.6\]]nang 'khod pa yis/_/de thos chags bral nyid du gyur/_/de dus nyid na bdag po ni/_/nang zhugs dben par de la smras/_/zhing las nyon mongs kyis gzir par/_/khyu mchog srog chags 'tshe ba ston/_/bzang mo bdag gi khyim gyi khur/_/rtag tu yongs 'dzin yongs mi bzod/_/bde ba'i phun tshogs 'di dag rnams/_/
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]sA rAHsu kha sam+pa daH/_/A swA d+ya mA nAHkur+b+ban+ti na Da shA khA i ba byar+thI/_/kle sha shai bA la dzA le Shu pA pa saM ke Shu besh+minaH/_/a ba san+na gr-i he Sh+we ba nim+ne Sh+wa ba dza rad+ga baH/_/tasmAd+g+r-i ha sa mA raM b+ha s+t+ya ga yau gyA yarma ba yoH/_/i t+yuk+t+wa
[\[87b.2\]]mjug tu ro bral snying po med/_/myangs na 'dam bu'i 'dam ma bzhin/_/gdung bdag ni skyed par byed/_/khyim pa rnams ni sdig pa'i 'dam/_/nyon mongs nya lcibs dra ba can/_/khyim nyid du ni nyams 'gyur te/_/rlubs su glang ni rgan po bzhin/_/de slad khyim gyi rtsol ba 'di/_/yu cag gis ni gtong bar 'os/_/zhes smras chung
[\[87b.3\]]nu ma taHpat+n+ya shAn+tau nish+tsa ya mA da d+hai/_/sa twA d+ha na mar+thi b+h+ye gr-i haM tsa sa pa rits+tsha daM/_/nish+tsa krA ma sa mun+muk+ta sar+b+bA shA pA sha nan+da naH/_/so thA kA sh+ya pa go tA twA ta ma hA kA sh+ya pa tAM ga taH/_/tat+kA la samyak+saM bud+d+ha kA sh+ya pa
[\[87b.4\]]mas khas blangs pas/_/zhi ba la ni nges par byas/_/khyim dang yo byad bcas pa yi/_/nor rnams slong la des byin nas/_/re ba'i zhags pas 'ching ba kun/_/rnam par grol te nges par byung /_/de nas 'od srungs rigs nyid phyir/_/'od srungs chen po nyid gyur te/_/de dus yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od
[\[87b.5\]]sa mu pA ya yau/_/ba hu pu trA khya tsai t+ya s+ya mU les+thi ta mu pe t+ya taM/_/tad+dat+ta d+har+m+ma bi nA yaHshud+d+haM bo d+hi ma bAp+ta bAn/_/b+ha drA pi lap+d+ha bi na yA bai rA gyA diSh+Ta bar+t+ma na/_/prAk+pu N+ya pa ri NA me na le b+he ku sha la mu dz+wa laM/_/
[\[87b.6\]]srungs drung du de song gyur/_/mchod rten bu mang zhes pa yi/_/rtsa bar gnas pa de can phyin/_/'dul ba'i chos ni des byin pas/_/dag pa'i byang chub thob par gyur/_/bzang mo yis kyang chags bral gyi/_/bstan pa'i lam gyi 'dul ba thob/_/sngon gyi bsod nams yongs smin pas/_/dge ba dri ma med pa bsten/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ma hA ka sh+ya pa mA lokya prAp+taM su ra ban+d+ya tAM/_/tat+pu N+yaM bik+Shu b+hiHpr-iSh+TastA nu ba tsa ta thA ga taH/_/pra bi ra ta ni khi lAn+na pa s+ya kA le bi Sha ma ta ra bi ni br-it+ta paN+Di pA te/_/kr-iSha d+ha na
[\[88a.2\]]'od srungs chen po lha rnams kyis/_/phyag 'os nyid thob mthong nas de'i/_/bsod nams dge slong rnams kyis dris/_/de bzhin gshegs pas der bka' stsal/_/zas dang 'bru rnams ma lus rab tu nyung ba'i dus/_/bsod snyoms rnam par log cing shin tu mi bzad tshe/_/nor chung skyes bu
[\[88a.3\]]pu ru She Na kA shi puR+Ya ta ga ra shi khI ma hi taHswa b+ho dza ne na/_/kr-i kI na ra ba ti nA kr-i te pi tsai t+ye ba ra ru tsi ra rat+na tsi te ta dAt+ma dzash+tsa/_/ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi tra mA ta pa traM bya d+ha ti mahA ta ku sha lA ya pu N+ya shI laH/_/dzan+ma dwa yo
[\[88a.4\]]yis ni kA shi grong khyer du/_/ta gar shi khI rang gi zas kyis legs par mchod/_/mi yi bdag po kr-i kIs byas pa'i mchod rten ni/_/rin chen gyis spras mchog tu mdzes la de yi bu/_/bsod nams ngang tshul gyis kyang dge ba chen po'i slad/_nor bu gser gyis rnam par bkra ba'i gdugs dag bkod/_/skye ba gnyis su
[\[88a.5\]]pa tsi ta pu N+ya ma ho da ye na so sam+ma ho ba pa da kA sh+ya pa tA ma bAp+taH/_/la b+hon+na tiHka na ta ka la i ba pra b+hA ba mar+hat+pa daM ku sha la mU la ka laM bi b+har+t+ti/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yaM b+ho d+hi sa twA ba da
[\[88a.6\]]nye bar bsags pa'i bsod nams cher rgyas pas/_/nye ba'i gnas kyi 'od srungs chen po nyid ni 'di yis thob/_/gser gyi ta la bzhin du mtho ba'i mthu ni thob gyur nas/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu dgra bcom gnas ni rnam par 'dzin/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]na kalpa la tA yaM ma hA kA sh+ya pA ba dA na tri ShaSh+Thi ta ma pal+la waH//_//a b+hi na ba ka sha la ya ko ma la na ma na sA ma pi ku li sha ka thi na d+haiR+YA NAM/_/ma ha tAm+ma naM ma Ni bi mA lA nA ma pi b+ha pa ti na rA ga saM
[\[88b.2\]]pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las 'od srungs chen po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//yal 'dab mngon par gsar pa lta bur mnyen gyur kyang /_/sra zhing brtan pa dag ni rdo rje ltar gyur pa/_/chen po rnams kyi yid kyi nor bu dri ma dag_/med pa la yang chags pa dag ni
[\[88b.3\]]kAn+t+riH/_/shAkyA la ya daR+sha na me ba pi trA sar+b+bA nu kam+pA b+h+r-i sha mar+th+ya mA naH/_/ya dA ya dA nan+dA su d+hA ra sen+du bi be sha shAstA ni dza rA dza d+hA nI/_/ta rA ta dA harmya ga tA mr-i gA k+ShI kar+N+NA ba taM bI kr-i ta ne tra kAn+tiH/_/
[\[88b.4\]]'pho ba min/_/kun la rjes su brtse ldan yab kyis shAkya yi/_/gnas rnams lta ba nyid la mchog tu gsol btab pa/_/kun dga' bdud rtsi'i bcud kyi zla ba ston pa ni/_/gang dag tshe na rang gi rgyal sar zhugs gyur pa/_/de de'i tshe na ba gam du song ri dgas mig_/rna ba'i rgyan gyis mig ni rab tu mdzes byed pa/_/
[\[88b.5\]]kAM t+yA di shaM bisma ya mul+li khan+taM ya sho d+ha rA taM da yi taM bi lo kya/_/tat+saM ga mA liM ga na yor+Ni ra shA b+h+ran+tA khi lA shA bi Sha mUts+tshi ta ba/_/d+h+r-i taM ba ya s+yA mi ba bA ra yan+tiM ni ra s+ya sau d+hA tun+ta mut+sa sar+dz+dza/_/
[\[88b.6\]]grags 'dzin mas ni mdzes pa dag gi phyogs rnams su/_/ya mtshan rab tu 'bri ba'i bdag po de mthong nas/_/de dang 'grogs dang 'khyud bdag gi re bral ba'i/_/dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du ma lus phyogs 'khor zhing /_/grogs po bzhin du zlog par byed pa'i brtan pa ni/_/dor nas khang bzang dag las lus ni rab tu 'phangs/_/
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]ya dA ya dA pal+la ba se sa lAM gI de haM sa mut+s+r-iSh+Ta ba tI pa ti sA/_/ta dA ta dA man+tha tha mo hi tAM tAM da yAr+d+ra tsak+Shur+b+ha ga bAnd rak+Sha/_/ta taHka da tsid+b+ha ga bAn+panAn+te tat+kau tu kAd+b+hi k+Shu ga Ne na pr-iSh+TaH/
[\[89a.2\]]dag pa yal 'dab ltar mnyen lus dang ldan pa des/_/gang gang tshe na lus ni rab tu 'phangs gyur pa/_/de de tshe na yid srubs kyis ni rmongs pa de/_/brtse bas brlan pa'i spyan ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrungs/_/de nas nam zhig nags kyi mthar ni bcom ldan la/_/de yi dge mtshan dag las dge slong tshogs kyis
[\[89a.3\]]dza gA da dan+ta d+yu ti tsan+d+ri ka b+hi rni pa ra yanrA ga mi bA d+ha ra s+ya/_/ya sho d+ha rA mad+bi ra he Na ni t+yaM ka ro ti yat+sA ha sa ma ha tAr+t+ti/_/ha ran+ti d+her+YaM be ta ran+ti mo ha me Sha swa b+hA baHsma ra bi b+h+ra
[\[89a.4\]]dris/_/tshems kyi 'od zer zla ba'i 'od rnams dag gis ni/_/mchu yi dmar ba 'gebs par mdzad pa bzhin du gsungs/_/bdag dang bral bas rtag tu gzir bar gyur pa yi/_/grags 'dzin ma ni gang zhig gzu lums 'di dag byed/_/brtan pa 'phrog cing rmongs pa rnam par ster ba 'di/_/chags pa'i rnam 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyi rang
[\[89a.5\]]mA NAM/_/ma mA pi ta s+yA bi ra he pUr+b+bAM dzan+mAM ta re mA ra bi mo hi te na/_/saM sak+ta saM tA pa ni mit+ta b+hu taHkhe daHpra b+hu ta bya pa no nu b+hU taH/_/pu rA dzi tA ma ra pu re mat+pu re ha sti na su re/_/rA dza d+ha nA bi d+hA no b+hUn+ne d+hA
[\[89a.6\]]bzhin nyid/_/sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la de dang bral ba yis/_/'dod pas rnam par rmongs par byas te bdag gis kyang /_/rgyun du yongs su gdung ba dag gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rab mang gdung ba'i nyon mongs dag ni nyams su myong /_/grong mchog hasti na yi grong /_/'chi med yon tan thul bar sngon/_/yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i gter/_/
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]naM gu Na saM pa dAM/_/b+hu dze nA liM gi tA b+hU miHkr-i tA kaN+The sa ra swa tI/_/lak+Sh+mIHpra sA d+hi tA ye na kIr+t+ti re ba pra bA si tA/_/rA mA yAM ta s+ya dzA yA yAM ta na yaHsu d+ha nAb+hi d+haH/_/a b+ha bat+sa ha saM dzA ta ni d+hA na sha ta bi shru taH/_/sar+b+ba bi d+yA ku mu di nI bi kA
[\[89b.2\]]rgyal po nor zhes bya ba byung /_/lag pa yis ni sa la 'khyud/_/dbyangs can dag ni mgrin par byas/_/ngag gi dpal ni rab tu bstar/_/grags pa kho na rab tu bskrad/_/de yi btsun mo mdzes ma la/_/bu ni nor bzang zhes bya ba/_/gter brgya dang ni grags pa dang /_/lhan cig skyes pa byung bar gyur/_/rig gnas kun gyi ku mud can/_/rtag
[\[89b.3\]]sha ra si kaHsa dA/_/ka lA bAn+nir+m+ma la tu tsiR+YaHpUr+N+Nan+du ri bA ba b+hau/_/ba b+hU ba ta s+ya b+hU bar+t+tur+b+hU pa tir+b+hU mya nan+ta raH/_/mA nI ma hen+d+ra se nA khyAHpra khyA ta pr-i thu bi kra maH/_/te na ruHsa ha daN+De na sar+b+ba sar+b+ba swa hA ri NA/_/a kA la kA la kalpe
[\[89b.4\]]tu rnam rgyas byed la chags/_/dri med mdzes pa sgyu rtsal can/_/gang ba'i zla ba lta bur mdzes/_/sa bdag de dang sa gzhi ni/_/bar med sa bdag byung gyur pa/_/khengs ldan dbang chen sde zhes pa/_/rgya che rnam par gnon par grags/_/dus yin dus su brtag bya zhing /_/kun gyi bdog kun 'phrog byed pa/_/bzod dka'i dpya dang ldan pa
[\[89b.5\]]na bI Da tAHshu shu tsuHpra dzAH/_/ta s+yA d+har+m+ma pr-i brat+ta s+ya ni br-it+ta su kr-i tot+pa be/_/tI bro pa tA paM tAp+te Shu su re na ba br-iShur+g+hA nAH/_/pra ti kU le ma hA pA le ta tra dur+b+hi k+Sha pi p+la paH/_/ba b+hu ba bya sa ne Sh+we ba b+ha ban+ti bya pa no da yAH/_/ta taHkle sha
[\[89b.6\]]des/_/gzir ba'i skye rgus mya ngan byas/_/chos min la ni zhugs pa de'i/_/grong ni legs byas spro ba dag_/log cing gdung ba drag po yis/_/gdung bar sprin gyi char ma phab/_/sa skyong rjes su mi mthun pa/_/der ni mu ge'i nyen 'tshe byung /_/sdug bsngal can rnams kho na la/_/sdug bsngal rgyas par gyur pa yin/_/de nas nyon mongs
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bi she ShAr+t+taHsar+b+be pu ra ni bA si naH/_/ku pa ti ba sa nod+be gA de gI b+hU tA bya tsin+ta yan/_/rA dz+nyA do Sha ka re Ne yaM ja Ne na dza na ta pa raM/_/pra t+ya gra ka ra pa te na na li nI ba ni mI li tA/_/e Sha dur+b+ya sa nI ni
[\[90a.2\]]kyis khyad gzir/_/bdag ngan gyis gdungs yid byung zhing /_/grong nang gnas pa thams cad ni/_/gcig tu 'tshogs nas rnam par bsams/_/rgyal blun mtshan mor byed pa ni/_/gsar pa'i dpya zer 'bebs pa yis/_/mchog tu skye bo'i tshogs pa ni/_/pad+mo can bzhin zum par gyur/_/rtag tu ngan par zhen pa 'dis/_/
[\[90a.3\]]t+ya ma sa t+yA ma t+ya sam+ma taH/_/asmAn+na bI D+d+ya puSh+NA ti bi Ta tse Ta ka gA yAnAM/_/kaSh+Th+ya ta trA s+ya nA br-iSh+TaH pA pa shA pe na b+hU pa teH/_/dur+b+hi k+Sha dza na nI dza tA dza na saM k+Sha ya sA k+Shi NI/_/su tIk+Sh+NaHk+Sh+mA pA lAH kha ra mu kha ra mUr+khaHpa ri dza naHka
[\[90a.4\]]bden med blon po'i gros dag gis/_/bdag cag btsir nas g.yo can dang /_/bran dang glu mkhan rnams dag bsos/_/de la'ang sa bdag sdig pa yi/_/dmod pas chad med sdug bsngal ba/_/skye bo yang dag brlag pa'i dbang /_/mu ge skyed par byed pa skyes/_/sa skyong shin tu rno zhing 'khor gyi skye bo rtsub cing mu cor rmongs/_/blon po rnams
[\[90a.5\]]daR+Ya shwA mA t+yAHka Tu ka pa Ta kau Ti l+ya pa Ta baH/_/pa das+thAHkA yas+thA bi Sha ma mu kha ro gAHpra ku pi tAHka thaM san+taHso D+haM kr-i pa Na da la no dA ru Na ga NaH/_/d+ha na shrI mAn k+Shi ti pa tiHshrU ya te rASh+Ta bar+d+ha naH/_/gats+tsha mastad+pur sosmAn bat+pa laHpha la yi
[\[90a.6\]]kyang gdug cing drag pa g.yo ldan gya gyu dga' mkhas/_/zhabs drung gnas dang yig mkhan mi bzad kha skyon rab tu khros gyur pa/_/dman pa 'joms byed ma rungs tshogs pa 'di dag rnams ni ji ltar bzod/_/dpal ldan sa yi bdag po ni/_/nor gyis yul 'khor skyong ba thos/_/bdag cag de grong song ba na/_/mnyes gshin de yis skyong
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]Sh+ya ti/_/a pa t+yA mi ba rASh+TuM yaHpa dA pa sh+ya ti b+hU pa tiH/_/bi Sha ye dzI bya te ta s+ya dza na ka s+ye ba besh+ma ni/_/i ti nish+tsa ya mA d+hA ya ya yusta hasti nA pu ra/_/t+yA dz+yaHkA yo pi sA pA yaHkiM pu narda sha saM shra yaH/_/dz+nyA twA ma hen+d+re se no pi swa pu raM ni dza naM nr-i
[\[90b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/sa bdag gang gi yul 'khor la/_/bu bzhin rtag tu lta byed pa/_/de yi yul du pha yis ni/_/khyim du bzhin du 'tsho bar bya/_/de ltar nges bsgrubs de dag rnams/_/hastin yi grong khyer song /_/lus kyang gnod bcas gtang bya na/_/yul dang gnas ni smos ci dgos/_/mi bdag dbang chen sde yis kyang /_/rang grong skye bo med shes
[\[90b.3\]]paH/_/tI brA nu tA paHsa miR+ShaM ma hA mA t+yA na b+hA Sha ta/_/d+ha na s+ya d+ha ni no rA dz+nyAHpu ram+mat+pu ra ba si naH/_/pra yA tA i ba nish+tsA reHka thi taM gU D+ha tsA rib+hiH/_/dur+b+hik+Sha khin+nA ya di te yA tA ma ma ri poHpu raM/_/tatshar+b+ba tra b+ha baM t+ye ba par+YA yerde ba bi sla bIH/_/a
[\[90b.4\]]nas/_/'gyod pa drag pos khro ldan par/_/blon po chen po la smras pa/_/rgyal po nor gyi grong khyer du/_/bdag gi grong gnas skye bo rnams/_/rab tu song zhes nyan sna ni/_/gsang nas rgyu ba dag gis smras/_/gal te bdag gi dgra grong du/_/de dag mu ges nyen 'gro na/_/gnam gyi nyer 'tshe thams cad du/_/re mos kyis ni 'byung ba nyid/_/yang
[\[90b.5\]]tha bA rA dza do She Na ga taste su kha bAMts+tsha yA/_/beSh+Da daN+Da ka ron+muk+taHka s+ya rA dz+nyAHpu re dza naH/_/prA yaHpa ri tsi ta dwe ShAtsha dA na ban bai Shi NaH/_/dU ra s+tha e ba sar+b+ba s+ya sar+b+ba b+ha ba ti bal+la b+haH/_/asma da b+h+ya d+hi kaHko sau ta s+ya b+hu mi pa tergu NaH/_/
[\[90b.6\]]na rgyal po'i skyon gyis ni/_/bde ba 'dod pas de dag song /_/rgyal po su yis grong khyer gyi/_/skye bo las dang dpya las grol/_/phal cher yongs su 'dris la sdang /_/rtag tu gsar pa gsar pa 'tshol/_/ring na gnas pa thams cad ni/_/kun gyi yid du 'ong ba yin/_/gang gis gzhan gyi skye rgu ni/_/rmongs pa chung ma bzhin du 'phrog_/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa re ShAM ha ra te ye na mug+d+hA dzA yA i ba pra dzAH/_/u pA yash+tsan+t+yi tAM tA bat+ta s+ya dar+p+pa pra shAn+ta ye/_/sa mr-id+d+hi kA ra NaM yats+tsha tad+bi g+hA to bi d+hI ya tAM/_/i ti rA dza ba tsaHshru twA ma hA mA t+ya ba b+hA Shi re/_/shrU ya tAn+de ba ye nA sau rA dza
[\[91a.2\]]sa bdag de la yon tan ni/_/bdag las lhag pa ci zhig yod/_/re zhig de yi grags pa ni/_/rab gzhil thabs dag bsam par mdzod/_/gang yang phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/_/de dag gzhom pa bsgrub par mdzod/_/ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/_/blon po chen pos rab smras pa/_/lha gcig gang gi rgyal po ni/_/nor
[\[91a.3\]]d+ha na dza nordzi taH/_/bi Sha ye nA ga rA dzosti tsi tro nA ma ba hU da kaH/_/ta s+yak+Shi ti pa termUr+t+taHpu N+ya ba d+ha i bo da yaH/_/a kA le sa s+ya niSh+pat+tistit+p+ra b+hA be ne dzA ya te/_/kr-i Shi saM pat+ti mU la sh+tsa b+hU b+hU dzAM sar+b+ba saM pa daH/_/tasmad+bi d+ya ba lAn+nA gaHsa
[\[91a.4\]]dang skye bo dar ba nyon/_/sa bdag de yi dar ba ni/_/gzugs can bsod nams kyis btags bzhin/_/yul na klu yi rgyal po ni/_/chu mar tsi tra zhes pa yod/_/de yi mthu yis dus min du/_/'bru ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/sa bdag phun sum tshogs kun gyis/_/rtsa ba zhing ni phun sum tshogs/_/de slad rig pa'i stobs dag gis/_/
[\[91a.5\]]har+t+tuM ya di shakya te/_/ta dA yAn+ti swa yaM ta s+ya pra dzAs+t+wa me ba saM shra yaM/_/dIp+ta man+d+ra ba laM kiny+tsit+tasmA da n+wi Sh+ya sA d+ha kaM/_/nA ga rA dza s+ya ha ra Ne kr-i ya tAM tUr+N+Na mu d+ya ma/_/i t+yA mIt+ya ba tsaHshru twA ta the d+yA ha ma hI pa tiH/_/swa gu NA d+ha na b+hi ka lA ba ra do Sho
[\[91a.6\]]klu de gal te 'phrog nus na/_/de tshe de yi skye rgu rnams/_/rang nyid khyod la brten par 'gyur/_/de slad sngags stobs 'bar ba yi/_/sgrub pa po 'ga' btsal nas ni/_/klu yi rgyal po 'phrog pa la/_/brtson pa dag ni myur du mdzod/_/ces pa blon po'i tshig thos nas/_/pha bdag gis ni bden zhes smras/_/rang nyid yon tan nor nyams pa'i/_/mi bsrung
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]d+ya tAHkha lAH/_/ta taHpra b+hU ta ka na ka pra dA na paN d+yo pa NAM/_/kr-i twA te man+t+ra NiHprAsnurnA ga ban+d+ha na man+t+ri NaM/_/sa tir+b+bi d+yA d+ha ro nA ma su bar+N+Nar+b+bi Na sam+bi dA/_/prAr+thi tash+tsi tra ma ne tuM pra ya yau ha sti nA pu raM/_/ta tra kA na na paR+Yan+te sni g+d+ha sh+yA ma la pA
[\[91b.2\]]pha rol skyon la sbyor/_/der ni gser ni mang po dag_/rngan pa rab tu ster ba'i sgra/_/bsgrags nas gros pa rnams kyis ni/_/klu dag 'ching ba'i sngags pa thob/_/gser sbyin dam bcas de dag gis/_/gsol gdab rig 'dzin zhes bya ba/_/de ni tsi tra blang ba'i slad/_/hasti na yi grong khyer song /_/der ni nags tshal dag gi mtha'/_/snum ljang rkang 'thung
[\[91b.3\]]dpe/_/b+ha ba naM b+ho gi nAM b+har+t+tuHsa da daR+sha na b+haHpra b+haM/_/tsa lang+ba ku la mA lA yaM bi la bat+ti la ka shri yaH/_/ba na lak+Sh+ma i ba pan+naM maN+Da nA ma Ni dar+p+pa NaM/_/bi lo kyA ma la dza maM spr-i ha ma li na mA na saH/_/man+t+ra nu d+h+yA na san+nad+ha ta sid+d+h+yai dig+ban+d+ha
[\[91b.4\]]ldan pa na/_/gdengs can bdag po'i khang pa ni/_/nam mkha'i 'od can de yis mthong /_/ba ku la yi 'phreng g.yo zhing /_/ti ka la yi dpal rgyas pa/_/nags kyi dpal mo'i rgyan dag gi/_/nor bu'i me long nye ba bzhin/_/dri med chu de mthong gyur nas/_/chags pas nyams pa'i yid can gyis/_/sngags kyi bsam gtan chas zhugs te/_/bsgrub
[\[91b.5\]]mA ba da de/_/dig+ban+d+he bi hi tai te na pra te na t+yu gra te dza sA/_/shi ro bya thA nA gA ba te ra b+hUt+tap+ta pa NA ma NeH/_/a thA dr-i sh+yA sa mut+thA ya taM tr-iSh+T+wA man+d+ra sA d+ha kaM/_/kam+ba mA naHpha Ni pa tir+b+ban+d+ha trA sa da tsin+ta yata/_/
[\[91b.6\]]slad phyogs ni bcing ba byas/_/brtul zhugs rab drag gzi ldan des/_/phyogs ni bcings pa bsgrub pa ni/_/klu bdag gdengs ka'i nor bu ni/_/gdung zhing mgo bo gzir bar gyur/_/de nas ma mthong yang dag langs/_/sngags ni bsgrub pa de mthong nas/_/'dar zhing gdengs can bdag po ni/_/bcings pas skrag pas rab bsams
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ba b+h+rur+b+hUsh+ma shru sa pa la sta Dit+ka pi la lo tsa naH/_/a kA le kA la saM kA shAHku taHkrU ro pa mA ga taH/_/ba ne saM pra ti dig+ban+d+haH kr-i to ne na du rAt+ma nA/_/ba d+h+na t+ye Sha na yA ban+mAM tA bad+yug+ti kra maHk+Sha maH/_/ti ro pAn+te ba sa t+yasmin+ma
[\[92a.2\]]pa/_/khro bo sma ra smin ma ser/_/lta byed ser skya glog lta bu/_/dus min dus dang mtshungs pa yi/_/gdug pa 'di ni ga las 'ongs/_/da ni gdug pa'i bdag nyid 'dis/_/nags kyi phyogs ni bcings pa byas/_/ji srid 'dis bdag ma bcings pa/_/de srid rigs pa'i rim pa bzod/_/drang srong chen po shin shun can/_/'jug
[\[92a.3\]]ha R+Shir+b+balka lA ya naH/_/dzA ne so si nA ma sA d+hu pa ri trA Ne pra gal+b+ha te/_/ta s+yA shra ma ya de yo sau pa ri tsaR+YA sa raHsa dA/_/lub+d+ha kaHpad+mako nA ma sa me saM rak+Sha Na k+Sha maH/_/i ti nish+tsi t+ya ma na sA ga twA lub+d+ha kAn+ti kaM/_/swa braMt+tAn+taM ni bir+d+ya
[\[92a.4\]]ngogs nye ba'i mtha' 'dir gnas/_/bdag yongs bskyab pa dam pa ni/_/des kyang nus pa min par shes/_/gang 'di de yi bsti gnas na/_/rtag tu rim gro yongs bsgrub pa/_/rngon pa pad+ma can zhes pas/_/de yis bdag ni bsrung bar bzod/_/ces pa yid kyis nges byas nas/_/rngon pa ga la ba der song /_/rang gi spyod tshul bshad
[\[92a.5\]]smai ban+d+ha rak+ShA ma yA tsa ta/_/sA d+ha ka s+ya ba d+hA yai ba nA gA rA dze na sor+thi taH/_/d+ha n+wI taM de sha ma b+h+ye t+ya man+t+ra bI raM bya lo ka yata/_/asmin+na ba sa re man+t+ra sA d+ha ko pi hu ta na laH/_/A kr-iSh+TiM nA ga rA dza s+ya bi da d+he ban+d+ha not+su
[\[92a.6\]]nas ni/_/de la 'chi ba bsrung bar zhus/_/klu yi rgyal pos sgrub pa po/_/gsad pa'i slad du gsol btab ste/_/gzhu dang ldan pas gnas der phyin/_/sngags pas dpa' bo mthong bar gyur/_/gnas skabs der ni sgrub pa po/_/sngags pa yis kyang sbyin sreg mes/_/bcing bar 'dod pas klu yi ni/_/rgyal po rab tu dgug par
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]kaH/_/man+t+ra kr-iSh+Te pha Ni sa tau kr-i NaM tad+b+ha ba no da kaM/_/bi ShA da la ka ro de ba pro d+yad+bud+bu da ga daM/_/saM trA sa bi hwa la b+hu dzaM ga ba d+hU bi ShA da ni shwA sa be ga bi hi to dz+wa la phe Ni mA laM/_/rak+ShAr+tha nA mi ba tsa
[\[92b.2\]]byas/_/gdengs can bdag po sngags kyis ni/_/drangs tshe de yi gnas kyi chu/_/chu yi chu bur rab dkrigs pas/_/mya ngan byed par brtson pa bzhin/_/lag 'gro'i chung ma kun tu skrag pas 'khrugs pa'i mya ngan gyis/_/shugs rings shugs kyis rab bsgrubs rab 'bar dbu ba'i phreng ba can/_/rab tu 'dir zhing g.yo
[\[92b.3\]]kA ra ta raM ga hasta sak+tAny+dza li pra tsa la kam+pa bi lo la maM b+haH/_/A bar+t+taM bi d+yA ba lAt+te na nA ge ga ru Da te dza sA/_/saM ko tse ku Te lA b+hoge k+Ship+tai ba dza la b+hA dza ne/_/taM he ma lub+d+ha bA Ne na trA sa saM dig+d+ha lo tsa naM/_/bi byA
[\[92b.4\]]ba'i chu ni rba rlabs lag pa yis/_/thal mo sbyar byas bsrung ba don du gnyer bar byed pa bzhin/_/mkha' lding gzi byin ldan pa des/_/rig pa'i stobs kyis klu bzung ste/_/'khums shing gya gyu ldan pa'i lus/_/chu yi snod du btsal ba na/_/rngon pa yis ni gzhu bkang ste/_/dug gis byugs pa'i mda' dag gis/_/skrag
[\[92b.5\]]d+ha d+ha nu rA kr-iSh+ya bi Sha dig+d+he na lub+d+ha ka/_/mag+na pA NaM taM ma b+h+ye t+ya b+ha ya t+yak+ta b+hu dzaM ga ma/_/kA rA la ka ra bA le na bi shi raskaMny+tsa kA ra saH/_/sA bi d+yA ban+d+hu ki ta s+ya lo b+hA da n+yo pa yo gI nI/_/a b+hUt+sid+d+hA bi mug+d+ha s+ya
[\[92b.6\]]pas mig ni nyams gyur cing /_/gser la chags pas de la bsnun/_/'jigs pas lag 'gro btang gyur cing /_/mda' zug de la mngon phyogs te/_/de yi 'jigs rung ral gri yis/_/mgo bo dag dang bral bar byas/_/rmongs pa de yi rig pa ni/_/g.yem ma chags las gzhan dag dang /_/nye bar sbyor de grub mod kyang /_/rang
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]swa bi nA shA ya ke ba laM/_/yuk+tAHpa ro pa tA pA ya bi d+yA bi b+ha ba shak+ta yaH/_/sa ha sai ba bi mU D+hA nAM bi na sh+yan+ti sa hA su b+hiH/_/ta taHpra haR+Sha saM pUr+N+NaHkr-i ta dz+nyaHpa Ni nA ya kaH/_/taM ni nA ya swa b+ha ba naM lub+d+ha kaM sne ha
[\[93a.2\]]nyid brlag don 'ba' zhig gyur/_/blun po'i rig pa 'byor pa stobs/_/pha rol nye bar gdung ba'i slad/_/sbyor ba rnams ni 'phral la nyid/_/srog dang lhan cig nyams par gyur/_/de nas rab dga' yongs rdzogs pa/_/byas shes gdengs can 'dren pa yis/_/rang gi khang par rngon pa de/_/mdza' gcugs blo
[\[93a.3\]]lub+d+ha d+hIH/_/ta tra rat+na la to d+yA na ma Ni baish+ma su/_/a t+yar+g+ha mA nash+tsi tre Ne ka tsit+kA la mu bA sa saH/_/ka dA tsi da tha nA ge na pU dz+ya mA na sa bisma yaH/_/bid+yud+dA mo pa maM pA sha ma mo g+hA khyaM da daR+sha saH/_/taM driSh+Ta tat+p+ra
[\[93a.4\]]dang ldan pas bos/_/nor bu'i khang pa gzhal yas khang /_/rin chen 'khri shing skyed tshal der/_/tsi tra yis ni mchod byed cing /_/de yi dus ni 'ga' zhig gnas/_/de nas ya mtshan ldan pa des/_/nam zhig glog 'phreng lta bu yi/_/zhags pa don yod ces bya ba/_/klu yis mchod par byed pa mthong /_/de mthong de yi nus
[\[93a.5\]]b+hA baM tsa shru twA nA ga ni be di te/_/yat+nAt+tadar+tha naM tsakre lub+d+ha ki lub+d+ha mA nA saH/_/a dzay+YaM pa ma rong+Yo ge su rA NA ma si ban+d+ha naM/_/taM dzI bi kA d+hi kaM tasmai da dau prI t+yA pa NI shwa raH/_/ta tastaM pA sha mA dA ya tsi tra mA man+t+r+ya lub+d+ha kaH/_/ut+t+wiR+Ya
[\[93a.6\]]mthu dag_/klu yis bshad pa thos gyur nas/_/rngon pa chags pa'i yid ldan pas/_/de ni 'bad nas rab tu bslangs/_/g.yul gyi sbyor ba mi pham zhing /_/lha rnams kyang ni 'ching byed pa/_/srog las lhag pa de de la/_/gdengs can dbang po dga' bas byin/_/de nas zhags pa de blangs nas/_/tsi tra la zhus rngon pa ni/_/klu yi khang pa
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]nA ga b+ha ba nAl+lab+d+har+thaHswa pa daM ya yau/_/nA ga pra b+hA ba saM tap+tA tsi raM b+huk+t+wA sa saM pa daM/_/pu trA yot+pa lA khyA ya pA shaM da twA bya pa d+ya ta/_/pA la yan+pi tu rA tsa raM so pi lub+d+ha ku mA ra ka/_/mu nesta s+ya ku la s+thi t+yA pa ri tsar+YA pa ro b+ha bta/_/ta taHka
[\[93b.2\]]las 'thon te/_/don thob rang gi gnas su song /_/klu yi mthu yis thob pa yi/_/phun tshogs yun ring de spyad nas/_/ut+pal can zhes bya ba yi/_/bu la zhags pa byin nas 'das/_/rngon pa gzhon nu de yis kyang /_/pha yi spyod pa skyong byed cing /_/rigs kyi lugs kyis thub pa de'i/_/rim gro byed pa nyid du gyur/_/de nas nam zhig
[\[93b.3\]]dA tsit+sa mu nerbi shrAn+ta s+ya s+thi taHpu raH/_/shu shrA ba kA ka li gI taM tIr+N+Na kar+Na ra sA ya na/_/tsi tra n+yasta mi ba lo kya so pr-its+tshad+bismi te mu niM/_/ka ma lA ban+d+ha saM rud+d+ha ma d+hu pa d+h+wa ni so da raH/_/ku to yaM ko ki lA lA pa la li taHshrU ya te shwanaH/_/
[\[93b.4\]]thub pa ni/_/bzhugs pa'i mdun na gnas pa des/_/shin tu phra zhing snyan pa'i glu/_/rna ba'i bcud len rgyas pa thos/_/thub pa ri mo bkod pa bzhin/_/mthong nas ya mtshan des dris pa/_/pad+mo khongs su byung ba ni/_/yang dag bsdams pa'i sgra mtshungs shing /_/khyu byug dbyangs ltar snyan pa yi/_/sgra 'di dag ni gang las thos/_/
[\[93b.5\]]i ti lub+d+ha ka pu tre Na pr-iSh+TastaM mu ni ra bra bI ta/_/gA yan ti ma d+hu rA lA pa me tAHkin+na ra ka ne kAH/_/dru ma s+ya kin+na ra pa teHka n+yA ka n+yA sha tair+b+r-I tA/_/pany+tsa b+hirnA ga b+ha ba na krI Da t+ye ShA ma no ha rA/_/shru twai tat+kau tu kA krAn+taHsa pu narmu ni ma b+h+ya d+hAta/_/
[\[93b.6\]]zhes pa rngon pa'i bu yis dris/_/de la thub pas rab smras pa/_/mi'am ci yi bu mo rnams/_/snyan par brjod pa 'di dag len/_/mi'am ci bdag ljon pa yi/_/bu mo yid 'phrog ma 'di ni/_/bu mo lnga brgyas yongs bskor nas/_/klu yi khang pa dag na rtse/_/de thos dge mtshan gyis non nas/_/de yis slar yang thub la smras/_/
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]a pi shak+no pi pu ru ShaHprAp+tuM kin+na ra ka n+ya kaM/_/ta tra bA tsa mu niR+Ya s+ya b+ha bet+pA shaHka rA gra gaH/_/a mo g+hA khyaHsa shak+no ti kar+t+tuM kin+na rA kA mi nIM/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya sot+pA hastaM pra Na myA tha lub+d+ha kaH/_/pra ya yau bA sha mA dA ya b+ho gin+d+ra
[\[94a.2\]]mi 'am ci yi bu mo dag_/skyes bus thob par nus sam ci/_/thub pas der smras gang gi ni/_/lag rtser don yod ces bya ba'i/_/zhags pas song ste 'dod ldan ma/_/mi'am ci mo blang bar nus/_/de nas de thos spro ldan pa'i/_/rngon pas de la phyag btsal nas/_/zhags pas bzung ste gdengs can gyi/_/dbang
[\[94a.3\]]b+ha ba nAM ti kaM/_/ta tra ke li bi lA sA kaM so pa sh+ya ta kin+na ra ga NaM/_/bi b+h+rA Na ma ni lA lo la he ma bal+li bas na shri yaM/_/mad+d+h+ya snA not+thi tAM tA sAM sa da daR+sha ma no ha rAM/_/sma ra s+ye ba tri ne trAg+ni nir+b+bA Na dza la de ba tAM/_/a na
[\[94a.4\]]po'i khang pa dag tu song /_/der des mi 'am ci mo'i tshogs/_/rtse dga' rol pas mtshan pa ni/_/gser gyi 'khri shing nags kyi dpal/_/rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin pa mthong /_/de dag dbus su yid 'phrog mas/_/khrus byas langs pa mthong gyur te/_/dran pa'i mig gsum me dag gi_/zhi byed chu yi lha mo bzhin/_/lus med rnam
[\[94a.5\]]ga bi b+h+ra ma raM b+ha nirba ror+m+mi Ni yau ba ne/_/madz+dza taHshai sha ba s+ye ba kur+b+bA Na mi ba lam+ba naM/_/me kha lA bad+d+ha san+na d+d+ha di byam+ba ra ma no ra mAM/_/dza la ke li ka la sak+ta spA ra phe nA ba lI mi ba/_/la ba N+ya pra sU te ne ba pra bA he na ma
[\[94a.6\]]'phrul rtsom pa yi/_/rba rlabs tshogs ldan lang tshor ni/_/gzhon nu ma nyid bying ba yi/_/rten pa dag ni byed pa bzhin/_/yid 'ong lha yi gos bgos shing /_/ske rags dag ni legs par bcings/_/chu rtsed rol pas dbu ba yi/_/'phreng ba rab gsal chags pa bzhin/_/mdzes sdug rab tu dkrigs gyur pa/_/do shal
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]hI ya sa/_/ha rin+t+raM tA ra hA re Na sha shI shu b+h+ra ni shA shri yaM/_/ka la yan+tiM dza lo l+lI D+hA lI lA pa tra la tAM pu naH/_/kar+N+NA b+ha ra Na rat+nAM shu ka lA pe na ka po la yoH/_/kastu ri le kha yA sa khyA li khyA mA nA la lA Ti kAM/_/ka laM ka ka la
[\[94b.2\]]gsar pa'i rgyun dag ni/_/shin tu che bas mtshan mo'i dpal/_/zla ba dkar ba phrogs pa bzhin/_/rna rgyan rin chen 'od zer gyi/_/tshogs kyis 'gram pa dag la ni/_/rol pa'i pa Ta 'khri shing slar/_/chu yi dag pa bri ba bzhin/_/dpral ba'i rgyan du grogs mo yi/_/gla rtsi'i ri mo 'bri byed pa/_/bsil zer dri ma ldan
[\[94b.3\]]na klai byaM sha ma yaM ti hi ma twi ShaH/_/tAM dr-iSh+T+wA bisma yA be sha pA she nA kr-iSh+Ta mA na saH/_/tsakre pA sha mA mo g+hA khyaM sadz+dzaM sa d+hA da lub+d+ha kaH/_/ta taHsaM trA sa ta ra lAHsa ha sA ha ri Ne k+Sha NAH/_/kin+naR+Yo di ba mut+pe tuH bA sha hastaM
[\[94b.4\]]pa yis/_/skyengs pa zhi bar byed pa bzhin/_/de mthong ya mtshan 'bebs pa yi/_/zhags pas yid ni drangs gyur pa/_/rngon pas 'phral la zhags pa ni/_/don yod ces pa legs par bstar/_/de nas lag na zhags pa de/_/mthong nas 'phral la rab skrag cing /_/g.yo ba ri dwags mig can ma/_/mi 'am ci
[\[94b.5\]]bi lo kya taM/_/la g+hu hasta ta yA k+Ship+t+wA pA shaM tsa ki ta lo tsa nAM/_/ma no ha rAM pa dza grA ha ha ri NI mi ba lub+d+ha kaH/_/sA pA sha bi ba shA te na kr-iSh+To kaSh+Ta da shAM shri tA/_/ke me ta di ti nA dz+nyA sIt+k+Sha NaM mUr+ts+tshA ni mi li
[\[94b.6\]]rnams mtho ris song /_/de yis myur bar lag pa yis/_/zhags pa 'phangs pas yid 'phrog ma/_/skrag pa'i mig dang ldan pa bzung /_/ri dgas mo ni rngon pas bzhin/_/de yis dbang med zhags pas drangs/_/skad cig brgyal bas mig zum zhing /_/sdug bsngal gnas skabs bstan pa der/_/'di ci zhes pa shes
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]tA/_/yU tha b+haSh+Te ba ka ri NI swa ja nA lo kA nA sha thA/_/ni rI k+Sh+yu mA NA ka ku b+haHsA muM b+h+rAn+tA ta ma b+h+ya d+hAta/_/muny+tsa muny+tsa dr-i D+hA k+Ship+taM mA sprA k+ShIHpa ri rak+Sha mAM/_/krU rA a pi b+ha baM t+ye ba sho kIr+t+ti Shu kr-i pA la baH/_/
[\[95a.2\]]ma gyur/_/khyu nyams ri dwags mo bzhin du/_/rang gi skye bo lta bsam pas/_/phyogs su rnam par lta byed cing /_/kun rmongs ma des de la smras/_/thang zhig thong zhig brtan par bcings/_/bdag la ma reg yongs su srungs/_/nges par mya ngan gyis gzir la/_/gdug pa rnams kyang brtse ldan yin/_/
[\[95a.3\]]lo b+hA da nut+ta ma pa da pra yuk+tA di bya ka n+yA kA/_/sa d+yaHpra dIp+tA bi d+ye ba nirda ha t+ye ba sA d+ha kaM_/mAM bi tsaR+Ya d+h+ya yA d+hI man+mu tsi tA ya pra yats+tsha taH/_/b+ha biSh+ya ti ta bA ba sh+yaM ma hAn+d+har+m+ma d+ha nAM ga maH/_/pI DAM pA sha kr-i tA me tAM na sa he muny+tsa
[\[95a.4\]]chags las lha yi bu mo ni/_/mchog min gnas la spyad pa na/_/'phral la sgrub pa po nyid sreg/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i rig pa bzhin/_/blo ldan blo yis rnam dpyad nas/_/'os pa dag la bdag stsal na/_/khyod la nges par chos dang ni/_/nor gyi tshogs chen 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhags pas bsdams pa'i gdung ba ni/_/bdag gis mi
[\[95a.5\]]ban+d+ha naM/_/swa ya bra dzA mya hi ta tra ya tra te b+hi mA tA ga tiH/_/di ba mut+p+lu t+ya gats+tshA mi na twa haM muk+ta ban+d+ha nA/_/yad+ba shAn+ma ka tir+b+yom+ni tsU DA rat+naM gr-i hA Na tata/_/i t+yuk+taHsa ta yA sA sru pra yAtaHka ru NAr+d+ra tAM/_/
[\[95a.6\]]bzod bcings pa thong /_/gang du khyod 'gro mngon 'dod pa/_/der ni bdag rang nyid kyis 'gro/_/bcings pa btang bar gyur kyang bdag_/mkha' la 'phur nas yongs mi 'gro/_/gang gi dbang gis mkha' la bdag_/'gro ba'i gtsug gi rin chen bzung /_/zhes des mchi ma dang bcas smras/_/snying rjes brlan pa nyid gyur des/_/
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]tsU DA ma Ni sa mA dA ya pA shaM muk+t+wA dza gA ma da tAM/_/sa mA swa pe hi ka l+yA Ni na sho ki kar+t+tu mar+ha si/_/na nA ma nu tsi tA ya twI pra yats+tshA mi ni dzets+tsha yA/_/asti rA dza su taHshrI mA na gu Na rat+na ma ho da d+hiH/_/pU ri taHka ku b+ha sar+b+be ye
[\[95b.2\]]gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs/_/zhags pa bkrol nas de la smras/_/dge ma dbugs ni dbyung bar mdzod/_/mya ngan bya bar yongs mi 'os/_/nges par 'os pa min la khyod/_/rang gi 'dod pas stsol mi bgyid/_/gang gi grags pa bdud rtsi yi/_/rba rlabs kyis ni phyogs kun khengs/_/yon tan rin chen chu gter che/_/
[\[95b.3\]]na kIr+t+t+ya mr-i tor+m+mi b+hiH/_/sa bi d+yA ba da nA sak+taHka lA ke li bi b+hU Sha NaM/_/su br-it+taHsu d+ha nAM nA ma ni dza baM sha bi she Sha kaH/_/sa te sa mu tsi taHsu b+h+ru bi b+h+ra mA b+ha ra NaM b+hu baH/_/t+ya go pa b+ho ga su b+ha gaHsu khot+sa ba i ba shri
[\[95b.4\]]dpal ldan rgyal po'i sras po yod/_/de ni rig pa zhal la chags/_/sgyu rtsal rtsed 'jos rnam par brgyan/_/rang gi rigs kyi khyad par can/_/legs spyod nor bzang zhes pa'o/_/bde dga' dag gi dpal bzhin du/_/gtong dang longs spyod skal ba bzang /_/rnam 'phrul sa yi rgyan gyur de/_/smin legs khyod la yang dag
[\[95b.5\]]yaH/_/su ra kin+na ra gan+d+har+b+ba bi d+yA d+ha ra bi la si nAM/_/yaHkhir+b+bAM ku ru te gar+b+ba mur+b+ba ri shar+b+ba rI pa tiH/_/i ti te na kr-i tA shwA sa ban+d+hu brga bi yo gi nI/_/ku ra rI bA ti kA ru NaM pi la lA sa ma no ha rAH/_/a trAM ta re bin+d+h+ya ta TiM mr-i ga ke
[\[95b.6\]]'os/_/gang gi sa yi mtshan mo'i bdag_/lha dang dri za mi 'am ci/_/rig 'dzin rnam par rtsen rnams kyi/_/khengs pa dag ni thung ngur byed/_/ces pa de yi dbugs phyung zhing /_/gnyen tshogs bral ba'i yid 'phrog ma/_/ku ra ri bzhin shin tu ni/_/snying rje rje skad cho nge bton/_/skabs der 'bigs byed ngos la ni/_/rngon gyi
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]li kau tu kaM/_/pras+thi taHsu d+ha no d+ha n+wIM sha nesti de sha mA ya yau/_/ra tha ne mi swa naistas+ya sra nrit+taM shi khi maN+Da li/_/ba na lak+Sh+m+yAHk+Sha NaM le b+he lo la nI la du ku la tAM/_/sa ka po la pra Na yi b+hirba b+hau swe do da
[\[96a.2\]]rtsed mo'i dge mtshan la/_/'phong mkhas nor bzang song gyur pa/_/rim gyis gnas der 'ongs par gyur/_/de yi shing rta'i mu khyud smras/_/rma bya'i tshogs kyis gar byas nas/_/du ku la nyid g.yo zhing sngo/_/nags kyi dpal mos skad cig thob/_/de ni rngul gyi chu thigs dag_/'gram par chags pas
[\[96a.3\]]ban+du b+hiH/_/saM krAn+taiHkuN+Da la prAn+ta muk+tA pha lai ri ba ts+yu ti/_/s+yan+da nA shwa khu rod+d+hu taM dan+ta dI pi ti b+hiHpu raH/_/ha ran+ni ba ra dzaHpuny+dzaM byA dza hA ra sa sA ra thiM/_/a ho ma no ra the ne ba ra thA ni la la ra ha sA/_/dU
[\[96a.4\]]rab mdzes pas/_/rna rgyan mtha' na rab mdzes pas/_/mu tig 'bras bu 'phos pas bzhin/_/mdun du so yi 'od zer gyis/_/shing rta'i rta rmig gis bslangs pa'i/_/rdul gyi tshogs rnams 'phrog pa bzhin/_/kha lo pa la des smras pa/_/kye ma yid kyi shing rtas bzhin/_/shing rta rlung ltar mgyogs pa yis/_/rang sde
[\[96a.5\]]rodz+dz+hitA swa sai ne na ki ya tI laM g+hi tA k+Shi tiH/_/e tA bA lA ni lol+lA pa lo la pispa la pal+la ba/_/ha ran+ti ha ra tits+tshA yAM ha ri NA b+ha ra NA b+hu baH/_/e tA bA la pra bA loSh+Th+ya sta ba ka sta na ban+d+hu raH/_/sot+kaN+ThA i ba dzriM b+han+te many+dzaR+Y+Y+YAHshwa sa
[\[96a.6\]]ring du btang nas ni/_/ji snyed sa gzhi 'das par gyur/_/byang chub shing gi yal 'dab ni/_/rlung gzhon gyis bskyod g.yo ldan pa/_/sa 'dis rgyan ni ljang gu yis/_/ljang pa'i mdzes pa nyid dag 'phrog/_/'khri shing gsar pa byi ru'i mchu/_/me tog phun bu'i nu ma rgyas/_/snye ma rlung gis dkrugs 'di dag_/sred ldan bzhin
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]nA ku lAH/_/i mA ma ra ka ta sh+yA ma sha y+Ya saM tsa ya kaM tsu kAH_/rA dzan+te kau su ma ra dzo ra dzi tA ba na rA dza yaH/_/e ta bi tsa li tA grI bA ha ri N+yas+t+rA sa bi dru tAH/_/tI lot+pa la ba nA nI ba sr-i dz+yan+ti ta ra le k+Shi taiH/_/e te ni
[\[96b.2\]]du glal bar byed/_/ma ra ka ta ltar ljang ba'i/_/rtswa sngon tshogs kyi stod kor can/_/me tog rdul gyis spras pa yi/_/nags 'phreng 'di dag rab tu mdzes/_/skrag nas bros pa'i ri dwags mo/_/'di dag mgrin pa 'khyog po yis/_/g.yo zhing blta bas ut+pal ni/_/sngon po'i nags tshal spro ba bzhin/_/so ni mtshan mor
[\[96b.3\]]shA ka ra ka lAM ku ra kAn+ta tan+tAHpal+lI pa ti pra Na yi nIsta na tu l+ya kuM b+hAH/_/pa sh+yaM ti dan+ti shi sha paHpa ri to ra thaM me ne me swa nA sa hr-i ta tsA pa la lI na kar+N+NAH/_/e te nir+m+ma la nar+m+ma dA pa ri sa ra byA dzriM b+hi bal+lI ba lat+phuSh+po dA ma ma
