[\[96b.4\]]byed pa'i cha yi myu gu ltar mdzes shing /_/bum pa ri khrod ma bdag mdza' mo'i nu ma dag dang mtshungs/_/rtsibs kyi sgras bcom rnam par g.yo ba'i rna blags so ldan gyi/_/phru gu 'di dag kun nas bdag gi shing rta dag la blta/_/sha ba ri yi rked skabs las 'phro rma bya'i 'dab 'phreng rol pas bskyod pa yi/_/rtsed 'jo'i
[\[96b.5\]]d+hUt+pa ba pra Na yi naHk+ShI bA i ba g+hUr+N+Ni tAH/_/san+nad+d+huHsa pa rI ni tam+ba bi la san+mA yU ra pa trA ba li lI lan+do la na nar+m+ma bi b+h+ra ma ka lA bin+da Shu ban+d+h+ya ni lAH/_/i ti bru ba NaHka la ya n+wa na lak+Sh+mI nr-i bat+ma dzaH/_/shu
[\[96b.6\]]rnam 'phrul cha yi 'ching ba rnams la chas par gyur pa 'bigs byed rlung /_/dri med chu klung nar ma dA ngogs 'khri shing g.yo zhing rnam par rgyas pa yi/_/me tog sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston rgyas pas rab bsgos 'di dag myos pa bzhin du 'khyam/_/zhes pa smra ba'i mi bdag bu/_/nags kyi dpal la spyod pa yis/_/skye bo
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]shrA ba nidz+dza na kar+N+NaM kin+nar+YA ru Na swa naM/_/shru twai pa kau tu kA kr-iSh+Tastat+pa mI paM kr-i pA ni d+hiH/_/so t+ye t+ya sad+gu NA daR+shastAn+da daR+sha mr-i gI tr-i shaM/_/yA tsa mA nA pa ri trA NaM lub+d+ha kaM sA sru lo tsa naM/_/ba ne tsa ra k+Sha yod+bi grA mi
[\[97a.2\]]med par mi'am ci'i/_/snying rje'i sgra yis gang ba thos/_/thos nas dge mtshan gyis drangs te/_/de dang nye ba brtse ba'i gter/_/yon tan dam pa'i me long de/_/song bas ri dwags mig de mthong /_/mig tshur bcas pas rngon pa la/_/yongs su bskyab pa zhu byed cing /_/nags rgyu zad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_/
[\[97a.3\]]ba kA na na de ba tAM/_/a n+weSh+TuM lub+d+ha kA kr-iSh+TaM swa maM ka mr-i ga mA ga tAM/_/khin+nA mi ba ba na b+h+rAn+h+yA lak+Sh+mI ba ha ri Na lak+Sh+ma NaH/_/tAM bi lo kya sa Ash+tsaR+Ya rU pA ti sha ya bismi taH/_/a b+hi lA Sha pa Te k+Shi praM tsi tra n+yasta i bA b+ha
[\[97a.4\]]ldan pa'i nags tshal lha mo bzhin/_/ri dwags mtshan pa'i dpal mo ni/_/rab brtags ri dwags rngon pa yis/_/drangs pa 'tshol du 'ongs gyur pa/_/nags su 'khyam zhing skyo ba bzhin/_/de mthong phul du byung ba'i gzugs/_/ngo mtshar bcas pas ya mtshan te/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i ras la ni/_/myur du ri mo bkod bzhin
[\[97a.5\]]bta/_/so tsin+ta ya da ho ra mya nir+m+mA NA b+h+yA sa kA ri NAH/_/asmin+mu kha pa mul+le khe re khA pa ri Na ti rbid+hiH/_/dur+l+la b+hA b+ho gi b+ha ba ne mar+t+ya lo ke ka thai ba kA/_/ma n+ye lA ba N+ya mu dre yaM swarge Sh+wa b+hi na bo di tAH/_/tA ru
[\[97a.6\]]gyur/_/de bsams kye ma 'di yi bzhin/_/legs par 'bri la mdzes pa ni/_/rnam par sprul byed goms byas pa'i/_/byed po ri mo yongs su smin/_/gdengs can gnas na rnyed par dka'/_/mi yi yul na gtam nyid ci/_/mdzes sdug rgya 'di mtho ris su'ang /_/gsar du mngon par 'khrungs sam snyam/_/gzhon
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]N+ye na ni pI ta she sha ba ta yA sA naM ga shrIM gA ri NI tan+baM gyAHsA ka lAM ga saM ga ma sa khI b+haM gi rna bAM gA kr-i tA/_/niHsaM raM b+ha pa rA kra maHpr-i thu ta rA raM b+hA b+hi yo gaM bi nAt+samrA dz+ye dza ga tAM ya yA bi dza ya te de
[\[97b.2\]]nu ma nyid dar la bab pas 'thungs pas lus med dang bcas sgeg ldan zhing /_/lus phra mnyen lcug gsar du bstar byas yan lag kun 'grogs grogs can gang gis ni/_/'bad med pha rol gnon la shin tu rgya cher rtsom pa'i mngon sbyor dang bral bar/_/'gro ba'i rgyal srid che la rtse dga'i mtshon dang ldan
[\[97b.3\]]bo bi lA sA yu d+hAH/_/i ti bisma ya gar+b+b+he Na sA b+hi lA She Na tsa k+Shu ShA/_/tAM bi ban+ta mi bA b+h+ye t+ye pra Na mya prA ha lub+d+ha kaH/_/ku la kalpa dru ma s+ye yaM dru ma s+ye da yi tA su tA/_/de ba kin+nar ra rA dza s+ya pA she nA pa kr-i tA ma yA/_/A
[\[97b.4\]]pa'i lha ni rnam par rgyal/_/de ltar ya mtshan snying po can/_/mngon par 'dod ldan mig gi ni/_/de 'thungs mtshungs la mngon phyogs te/_/phyag 'tshal rngon pas rab smras pa/_/mi 'am ci rgyal rigs kyi ni/_/dpag bsam ljon pa ljon pa yi/_/bu mo yid du 'ong ma 'di/_/lha gcig bdag gi zhags pas drangs/_/khyod
[\[97b.5\]]nI tA twat+k+r-i te di bya ka n+yai ShA pra ti gr-i h+ya tAM/_/twa me gA s+ya gu No dA ra b+har+t+tA b+hu ba i bo tsi taH/_/A s+yAsh+tsU Da ma Ni ra yaM ma yA swets+tshA ga ti pra daH/_/gr-i hI dastad+bi ra hi tA nai yaM yA ti bi hA ya sA/_/rak+Sho ma Ni ra yaM nAsti dat+te smin+saM ga mo
[\[97b.6\]]slad blangs pa'i gzhon nu ma/_/mchog 'di rab tu gzung bar mdzod/_/yon tan rgya che khyod nyid ni/_/sa gzhi 'di yi bdag tu 'os/_/'di yi gtsug gi nor bu 'di/_/rang 'dod 'gro ster bdag gis ni/_/bzung ste de dang bral bas ni/_/nam mkha' dag la 'gro ba med/_/nor bu 'di ni bsrung bya ste/_/'di byin 'di dang phrad
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]na yA/_/i t+yAk+t+wa smai da dau ka n+yA rat+naM rat+naM tsa lub+d+ha kaH/_/gr-i hI tA rA dza pu tre na sa ma hI mr-i ga lak+Sha NA/_/su d+hA sik+tI pa ta t+yA dza swa dai sha bi ra hA na laM/_/ut+kaN+The lo ka nA lo lA taM bAM la ha ri NI mi pa/_/ba ban+d+ha
[\[98a.2\]]pa med/_/bu mor ni chen rin chen yang /_/de brjod de la rngon pas byin/_/sa yi ri dwags mtshan ma de/_/rgyal po'i bu yis blangs pa na/_/bdud rtsis bran bzhin rang yul dang /_/bral ba'i me ni btang bar gyur/_/'dod ldan mig gis g.yo ba yi/_/ri dwags gzhon nu ma 'dra de/_/rngon pas btang
[\[98a.3\]]lub+d+ha ka t+yak+tAM rAg bA gu ra yA ma naH/_/kin+na riM ra thA mA ro bya rat+nai rA pUR+Ya lub+d+ha kaM/_/haR+Sha pUr+N+NaHswa na ga raM pra ta s+the pAr+thi bAt+ma dzaH/_/sa hasti nA pu raM prA bya ni be d+ya swa ka thAM pi tuH/_/haR+ShAd+bisma yi nI te na bi bA he gi
[\[98a.4\]]nas yid kyis ni/_/chags pa'i rgya yis bcings par gyur/_/mi 'am ci mo shing rtar bkod/_/rngon pa rin chen rnams kyis bkang /_/dga' ba rgyas pa'i sa bdag sras/_/rang gi grong khyer dag tu song /_/hasti na yi grong phyin te/_/rang gi gtam ni pha la bshad/_/dga' bas ya mtshan gyur pa des/_/bag ma yi ni
[\[98a.5\]]hi tot+sa baH/_/su kr-i tair+b+ho gya tAM yA tAM mUr+t+ta mi ba sha shi shri yaM/_/an+taHpu ra pra Na yi nIM tsakre kin+na ra ka n+ya gAM_/da d+ha tA ma d+hu pe ne pa te nA d+ha ra ma d+hu spr-i haM/_/spr-iSh+TAn ta mu khAM b+ho dzA tsa ka m+pe na lI mI ba sA/_/mau ne pa ka thi
[\[98a.6\]]dga' ston bsgrubs/_/gzugs can ri bong can gyi dpal/_/dge bas spyad byar gyur pa bzhin/_/mi 'am ci yi bu mo ni/_/pho brang 'khor du gnas par byas/_/mchu yi sbrang rtsir chags ldan pa/_/sbrang rtsi 'thungs pas bzhin du des/_/reg pas bzhin gyi chu skyes ni/_/dud cing pad+mo can de 'dar/_/smra ba bcad kyang sred pa
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]tot+kar+N+NaM mu huHkam+pe pi nish+tsa lAM/_/bai lak+Sh+ya bi s+phu Ta lak+Sh+ma ta s+yaHprI tAM ta tA na sAH/_/sa sha nai ra d+hA rA swA de da twA dan+ta bi b+hI yi kAM/_/bi ni drASh+Ta dr-i shasta s+ya mau na mu drA ma bA ra yata/_/nI bI mo k+She ni She d+he tsa da ma b+h+yoHpA Ni
[\[98b.2\]]'chad/_/g.yo ba med kyang yang yang 'dar/_/skyengs par gyur kyang dpal mdangs gsal/_/de yi dga' ba de yis bsgrubs/_/dal gyis mchu yi ro myang zhing /_/so yi 'jigs pa byin nas ni/_/chu skyes rgyas pa'i mig can de'i/_/smra bcad rgya ni de yis phral/_/gos mdud 'grol dang dgag pa la/_/khyo shug lag
[\[98b.3\]]pad+ma yoH/_/bi bA da i ba sot+kam+pa kaM ka Na swa na yo ra b+hUta/_/sa rA ga bal+la bsta s+ya bi mA pa smi ta puSh+pi taH/_/kAn+tA ku tsa pa lA ko b+hUd+b+ha gyaHsaM b+ho ga pA da paH/_/a trAn+ta re dak+Shi NA t+yau bi prau ka pi la puSh+ka rau/_/
[\[98b.4\]]pa'i pad+ma dag_/rab tu 'dar ldan gdu bu'i sgra/_/rtsod pa byed par gyur pa bzhin/_/rtse dga' 'dzum gyi me tog rgyas/_/mdzes pa'i nu ma'i 'bras bu mtshan/_/chags bcas yal 'dab ldan pa de'i/_/longs spyod rkang 'thung spyad byar gyur/_/gnas skabs der ni lho phyogs pa/_/bram ze ser skya puSh+kar gnyis/_/
[\[98b.5\]]a dzag+ma tur+b+r-it+ti kA mau d+ha na s+ya nr-i pa teHsa b+hA ma/_/to bi d+yA ti sha yash+mA g+h+yau pau rA hi t+ya ma bA pa tuH/_/ka pi laHk+Shi ti pA lA s+ya rA dza pu tra ba tsa sa raH/_/ta yor+s+wAR+shA tsa ban+d+he na sa dA bi bA da mA na yoH/_/e ka dra byA b+hi lA She Na bi
[\[98b.6\]]rgyal po nor gyi mdun sar ni/_/'tsho ba 'dod pas 'ongs par gyur/_/rig pa phul byung bsngags 'os pa/_/de dag mdun na 'don gnyis thob/_/ser skya dag ni sa skyong gi/_/rgyal po'i bu yis gzhan pa'o/_/de dag reg pas bcings pa yis/_/rtag tu rnam par rtsod byed cing /_/rdzas gcig mngon par 'dod pa yis/_/
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]dwe Sha sa ma dzA yata/_/dwe Sha do She Na mA taM ga yo gya nir+g+ha ta yosta yoH/_/bi da d+he ma da le khe ba bi d+yA ma li na tAM mu khe/_/ye ShAM bstu bi be ki nI gu Na sa khI lo ka pra kA shon+mu khI bi d+yA dI pa shi khA ka ro ti bi Sha maM dweShAn+d+ha
[\[99a.2\]]rnam par sdang ba yang dag skyes/_/glang po la 'os snun byed pa/_/de dag gdong gi rig pa ni/_/chang gi ri mo lta bu dag_/zhe sdang skyon gyis nyams par bsgrubs/_/gang gis rig pa mar me'i rtse mo dngos po rnam 'byed yon tan dag gi grogs/_/'jig rten rab tu gsal la mngon phyogs mdun
[\[99a.3\]]kA raHpu raH/_/te mo ho sa ha tA bi tsA ra bi hi tAHsau dza n+yA hi tA dag+d+hA sh+tsan+dan tsan+d+ra kAn+ta ka ma la s+yan+dod+ga te nAg+ni nA/_/shru ti smr-i ti bi bA de Shu puSh+ka re NA pa de pa de/_/ni gr-i h+ya mA NaHka bi laHko
[\[99a.4\]]du zhe sdang mun pa mi bzad byed/_/rmongs pas nyer bcom rtog dpyod dang bral gzhung bzang chung ma'i dgra bo de dag rnams/_/tsan dan zla ba chu shel pad+mo khu ba las 'khrungs me yis sreg par byed/_/thos dang dran dang rtsod rnams la/_/gnas dang gnas su puSh+kar gyis/_/nges par tshar bcad ser skya yis/_/khro
[\[99a.5\]]pa tA pA da tsin+ta yata/_/man+dA t+ya saM dr-i D+hA b+h+yA sastIk+Sh+NastI bra ma dod+d+ha taH/_/sa dA saM sA daM mA me ba na ya t+yai Sha bi lak+Sh+ya tAM/_/pradz+nyA pany+tsa ka br-it+tA ya shru taM dar+p+pa dz+wa ra pa bA/_/d+ha naM d+har+m+ma ni She d+hA ya b+ha ba t+ya
[\[99a.6\]]ba'i gdung bas yongs su bsams/_/rno zhing brtan par goms gyur pa/_/mi bzad rgyags shing 'char ba 'dis/_/rtag tu goms pas zhan pa bdag_/mdun sa dag tu skyengs par byed/_/shes rab slu byed tshul dang ni/_/thos pa dregs pa'i rims dag dang /_/nor ni chos dag 'gog pa'i slad/_/ma rabs
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]d+ha ma tse ta sAM/_/dr-ip+taHpa ri b+ha bya t+ya Sha rA dza pu trA shra yai Na mAM/_/tasmA dA shra ya e bA s+ya shrI mU le pra ha rA mya haM/_/ni d+ha ne rA dza pu tra s+ya yuk+t+yu pA ye Na kai Na tsita/_/yuk+taHkar+t+tuM pra yat+no me mA na grA niM
[\[99b.2\]]sems ldan rnams la 'gyur/_/dregs ldan 'di yis rgyal sras la/_/brten nas bdag ni yongs su 'joms/_/de slad 'di yis rten nyid la/_/dpal gyi rtsa ba bdag gis gzhom/_/rigs pa'i thabs ni 'ba' zhig gis/_/rgyal po'i sras ni dgum pa la/_/bdag ni 'bad pa bya bar 'os/_/khengs pa nyams
[\[99b.3\]]ka thaM pat+te/_/i t+yu gra pA pa saM kalpa ta s+ya dwe ShAt+sa mu d+ya yau/_/nAsti tat+pA ta kaM lo ke yan+na kur+b+ban+ti mat+pa rAH/_/ka thaM pa sh+ya taM sa bar+t+ma pa pa dA bya thi tA sha yaH/_/dat+ta na yan yoR+Ye na tI bra maR+Sha bi ShAM dza naM/_/
[\[99b.4\]]pa ji ltar bzod/_/de ltar drag po'i sdig brtags pa/_/de la snang bas yang dag sbyar/_/phrag dog gis gang mi byed pa'i/_/sdig de 'jig rten na yod min/_/gang gis mi bzad khro ba yi/_/dug gi mig sman mig tu btab/_/rtag tu bsam pa 'khrugs pa des/_/legs pa'i lam ni ji ltar mthong /_/
[\[99b.5\]]rA gaM pA paM pa ra ma ma d+hi kan+dar+p+pa pA paM ta to pi kro d+hAt+pA paM dza ga ti na pa rA duHsa haM lo b+ha pA baM/_/yA bA ne Sha bya ba ni ni dza ne ga N+ya te pA pa brgaHpA pAM sha s+ya spr-i sha ti na tu lAM so pi bi dwe Sha sU teH/_/ta taH
[\[99b.6\]]'dod chags mchog tu sdig cing de las kyang ni lhag par dregs pa sdig_/khro las sdig gzhan 'gro ba na med bzod dka'i sdig pa chags pa'o/_/gdung ba dang ldan 'gro na sdig pa'i tshogs ni ji snyed bgrangs gyur pa/_/des kyang rnam par sdang bas bskrun pa'i sdig pa'i cha la mtshungs reg min/_/de nas
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ka dA tsin+me g+hA khyaM krU raM kar+b+ba Ta bA si naM/_/bi sr-iSh+Ta sai n+ya haM tA ra sA man+ta ma pa kA ri NaM/_/shru twA na ra ba tiHko bA ts+tsa tur+thopA ya nish+tsa ye/_/a mA t+yA nA mA nu ma he ku mA ra mi da ma bra bIta/_/ku mA ra
[\[100a.2\]]nam zhig sprin zhes pa'i/_/gdug cing kar pa Tar gnas pa/_/gnod pa byed pa'i rgyal bran gyis/_/dpung rnams springs pa gsod pa dag_/thos nas mi bdag khros pa yis/_/thabs ni bzhi par nges byas te/_/blon po rnams kyi 'dod pa yis/_/gzhon nu la ni 'di dag smras/_/gzhon nu stobs
[\[100a.3\]]ga mya tAM tUr+N+Na muts+tshet+tu ta ra sA ri pUM/_/kra mo sa san+naM sA mra dz+yAM niHsha l+ya mi da mastu te/_/a yaM te sa ma rA raM b+h+ye pra b+hA bA b+ha ra No b+hu dzaH/_/A lA na staM b+ha tI yA tu dza gad+bi dza ya dan+ti niH/_/me g+he b+hU b+h+r-it+ku lA kran+ti saM raM b+hA b+h+ya
[\[100a.4\]]kyis dgra dag ni/_/myur du gcod du 'gro bar gyis/_/khyod kyis rim 'ongs rgyal srid che'i/_/'di ni zug rngu med par 'gyur/_/g.yul gyi rtsom par khyod kyi ni/_/dpung ba mthu yis brgyan pa 'di/_/'gro bar rgyal ba'i glang po dag_/'dogs pa'i ka ba nyid du 'gyur/_/sa 'dzin rigs ni non pa'i sprin/_/sdug cing lhag
[\[100a.5\]]d+hi ko da yi/_/ha te ta ba pra ta pa s+ya nirbi g+h+nA ba ra NA di shaH/_/dur+b+ba laiHkiM ha tai ra n+yaiHsa man+tai ran+ta bA pi b+hiH/_/dr-ip+taHsa e ba han+ta byastad+ba d+he sar+b+ba sad+d+hi yaH/_/kiM kau tu kaM ya di ha riHka ri tsa kra pa lA mA han+ti
[\[100a.6\]]par rgyas pa dag_/bcom na khyod kyi gzi byin gyis/_/phyogs su sgrib pa'i bgegs med 'gyur/_/stobs med mtha' na gnas pa yi/_/rgyal phran gzhan ni bsad pas ci/_/dregs ldan de nyid gzhom par bya/_/de bsad na ni thams cad 'grub/_/gang zhig cha yi rang zas nyid du rnam par bsgrubs pa yi/_/glang chen
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dai ba bi hi taM ni dza me ba b+ho dz+yaM/_/pany+tsa na naM ya di b+hi nat+ti na khAT+Ta hA saM tat+ta s+ya pau ru Shu ka thA ba tha me ti shauR+YaM/_/i ti pi drA sa ma diSh+TaHsa mI hi ta ra Not+sa baH/_/kin+na rI bi ra hA lo laHso b+hUd+do lA ku
[\[100b.2\]]tshogs ni 'phrog byed kyis bcom dge mtshan ci zhig yod/_/gal te sder mo'i gad rgyangs ldan pa'i gdong lnga mngon bcom na/_/de ni de yi skyes bu rtul phod gtam gyi lam du 'gyur/_/zhes pa pha yis bstan pa na/_/g.yul gyi dga' ston 'dod pa dang /_/mi 'am ci 'bar g.yo bas de/_/skad cig khyogs la
[\[100b.3\]]laM k+Sha NaM/_/a tsi rA ga ma na khyA naiR+Ya rA shwa s+ya bal+la b+hAM/_/dza na nIM swai ra ma b+h+ye t+ya pra Ni sa t+ya dza gA da saH/_/du hi tA sha kra kalpa s+ya kin+na ren+d+ra s+ya mA ni nAM/_/pA l+yA pi ra ha sho kAr+t+ti mad+pA t+pa l+yad+hi yAM twa yA/_/
[\[100b.4\]]'phyang bzhin gyur/_/yun ring 'gro ba min brjod pas/_/'bad pas chung ma dbugs phyung nas/_/de yi ma la mngon phyogs te/_/phyag byas dal gyis rab smras pa/_/mi 'am ci dbang brgya byin du/_/brtag bya'i bu mo khengs ldan ma/_/khyod kyis bdag la byams pa'i blos/_/'bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gzir skyongs/_/
[\[100b.5\]]a s+yA sh+tsU DA ma Ni ra yaM rak+Sh+yaHs+yets+tshA ga ti pra daH/_/da ta byaHsar+b+ba thA mA ta nA n+ya tra prA Na saM sha yAta/_/i t+yuk+t+wA dza na nI haste gAn+taM kAn+tAM shi khA ma NiM/_/ni k+Shi pya sa ya yau tUr+N+NaM sai n+yAts+tshA di ti did+mu khaH/_/ta s+ya bA dzi bra dzod+b+hU ta raHpuny+dza g+d+ha na do
[\[100b.6\]]'di yi gtsug gi nor bu ni/_/rang 'dod 'gro ba ster 'di dag_/srog la the tshom ma gtogs pa/_/ma ma kun tu sbyin mi bya/_/zhes brjod ma yi lag tu ni/_/mdzes ma mdzes ma'i gtsug gi nor/_/gtad nas dpung gi phyogs kyi sgo/_/sgrib cing de ni myur du song /_/de yi rta tshogs kyis bslang ba/_/rdul tshub sprin ltar rgyas
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]yaH/_/pra ya yau rA dza haM sA nAM saM trA sA yA sa he tu tAM/_/dU ra pra yA te da yi te bi ra he Na ma no ha rA/_/ba b+hU ba bA la na li nI pa lA sha sha ya rA sha yA/_/sot+kaN+ThA yA di ba pa ga Na nA raM b+ha ni t+yA b+hi yau ge saM khyA re khA sha ri Ni ma
[\[101a.2\]]pa yis/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po skrag pa dang /_/nyon mongs rgyu nyid dag tu gyur/_/khyo ni ring du song ba na/_/'bral ba yis ni yid 'phrog ma/_/pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma yis/_/mal stan la ni brten par gyur/_/sred ldan nyin par bgrang ba'i rtsom pa dag la rtag tu mngon sbyor zhing /_/grangs kyi ri mo'i
[\[101a.3\]]ba nau kam+ba lo laM li khaM b+h+yaH/_/ta s+yaHpA Nau ni pa ti ta ra Nat+kaM ka Ne tA na be na k+Shi praM muk+tA ba la ya ka la nA ma shru d+hA rA tsa kA ra/_/dwe ShaHpuSh+pa sha re su khe ba mu kha tA de he yi ni sne ha tA pa t+yau d+h+yA na pa rA ya Na twa ma ni
[\[101a.4\]]lam ni sa la 'dar zhing g.yo bas 'dri byed pa/_/de yi lag pa phra ba nyid kyis sgra ldan gdu bu lhung ba la/_/mchi ma'i rgyun gyi mu tig gdub kor dag ni myur du gnas par byas/_/me tog mda' can la sdang bde la phyir phyogs lus la'ang chags pa nyid ma yin/_/bdag po'i bsam gtan skyong
[\[101a.5\]]shA tan+nA ma man+t+ro dza paH/_/sha y+YA b+hU mi ta laM ta thA pi su ta nostA pak+Sha tirnA b+ha ba nU naM nish+tsa la lI na rA ga ma na sAM muk+tI tsa tI pra bra taiH/_/lI nA s+pha Ti ka bar+YA kai ha ri tsan da na pAN+Da
[\[101a.6\]]zhing nyin mtshan du ni de yi ming gi gsang sngags zlos/_/mal stan sa gzhir byas te de lta na yang gzugs bzang gdung ba nyams ma gyur/_/'dod chags g.yo med chags pa'i yid rnams brtul zhugs drag pos grol ba min nam ci/_/shel gyi khri stan la 'dug cing /_/ha ri tsan dan gyis skye
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]rA/_/tsan+d+ra le khe ba sA ta n+wI dz+yot+s+na ma d+h+ya ga tA ba b+ho/_/ka dA tsi da tha b+hU pA laHswasna daR+shaM na shi ki haH/_/pu ro hi ti sa mA hU ya pa prats+tsha ka pi li ra haH/_/dr-iSh+Ta ma d+ya ma yA swasne ni rud+d+haM sha tru b+hiHpu raM/_/pA Ti to da ra kr-iSh+Taish+tsa
[\[101b.2\]]ba/_/gzugs can ma de zla 'od kyi/_/dbus song zla ris bzhin du mdzes/_/de nas nam zhig sa skyong ni/_/rmi lam mthong nas dogs gyur pas/_/mdun na 'don ni ser skya dag_/yang dag bos nas dben par dris/_/grong khyer dgra rnams kyis bkag cing /_/bdag gi lto ba rdol rgyu ma ni/_/drangs nas yongs su dkris pa
[\[101b.3\]]ma mAn+t+re pa ri beSh+Ti taM/_/swasna s+yA s+ya bi pA karta pha laM bru hi ma hA ma te/_/bi tsin+ta ya shu b+ho da kA nu tsi tAM tsa pra ti kr-i yAM/_/i ti pr-iSh+TaHk+Shi tI she na k+Sha Na man+daHpu ro hi taH/_/b+hak+ti daM b+had+h+r-i ta d+h+yA naHsa mI
[\[101b.4\]]yi/_/rmi lam de ring bdag gis mthong /_/blo gros chen po rmi lam 'di'i/_/rnam smin 'bras bur 'os pa gsungs/_/dge bar yongs sgyur 'os pa yis/_/phyir bcos dag kyang bsam par mdzod/_/ces pa sa yi dbang pos dris/_/mdun na 'don gyis skad cig ni/_/gus pa'i tshul 'chos bsam gtan bzung /_/nang
[\[101b.5\]]hi ta ma tsin+ta yata/_/u pA yo yaM ma yA diSh+T+yA prAp+taHsu tsi ra tsin+ta taH/_/puSh+ka ra s+ya shra yots+tsha t+yai rA dza pu tra bi nA sha ne/_/pri yA mA ni ha ro dz+yeSh+ThaM dzI bi taM ta s+ya kin+na rI/_/a b+hA be ni ya taM ta s+ya na dzI ba ti duHkhi taH/_/i ti saM tsi t+ya
[\[101b.6\]]du mngon par 'dod pa bsams/_/puSh+ka ra yi rten gcad slad/_/rgyal po'i bu ni nyams pa la/_/shin tu yun ring bsams pa'i thabs/_/'di ni bdag gis dga' bas thob/_/de yi chung ma mi'am ci/_/yid 'phrog ma mchog 'tsho ba nyid/_/de dngos med na nges par ni/_/sdug cing bsngal bas de mi 'tsho/_/zhes pa bsams nas
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]sha na kermi th+yA khe da bi ShA da bAn/_/a b+h+ya d+hAd+ba su d+hA pI sha ma hi te ShI pu ro hi taH/_/duHswasno ya twa yA de ba hri da yA kam+pa naHpa raM/_/dr-iSh+TaHspaSh+Ta pha laM ta s+ya duHsa haM ka tha mu ts+ya te/_/pra
[\[102a.2\]]dal bu yis/_/brdzun gyis skyo dang chags bral can/_/mdun na 'don ni mi phan pa/_/'tshol bas nor 'dzin dbang la smras/_/lha gcig khyod kyi rmi lam na/_/mchog tu snying ni 'dar byed 'di/_/mthong ste de yi 'bras bu ni/_/bzod dka' gsal bar ji ltar brjod/_/rje
[\[102a.3\]]b+hU b+tak+ti bra tas+thA nAM do She Sh+wa bi hi tAt+ma nAM/_/na kar+N+Na ka Tu kaM bak+tuM ni She d+hosti hi tai Shi NAM/_/rA dz+yAd b+h+raM shaHsha rI rAd+bA swAp+na s+yA s+ya pa la spu TaM/_/shaM kA bi ra hi taiHkAR+YaHpra tI kA ro tra b+hU ta ye/_/
[\[102a.4\]]la gus pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/gnas shing skyon sgrub bdag nyid min/_/phan pa 'tshol rnams rna bar ni/_/mi snyan brjod pa dgag pa med/_/rmi lam 'di 'bras gsal bar ni/_/rgyal srid dam ni lus las nyams/_/'di la dogs dang bral ba yis/_/'byor pa'i slad du phyir
[\[102a.5\]]puSh+ka ri N+yAM kra tu k+She tre pUr+N+NA yAM pA shu sho Ni taiH/_/snA tas+t+waM mArdzi to bi pair+b+hU ri rat+na su bar+N+Na daH/_/kin+na rI me da sA pa h+niM hu twA ku sha la mAp+s+ya si/_/an+taHpu re snu ShA te sti kin+na rI na durla b+hA/_/
[\[102a.6\]]bcos bya/_/mchod sbyin zhing du rdzing bu ni/_/phyugs kyi khrag gis yongs gang bar/_/khyod bkrus bram zes dag byas shing /_/gser dang rin cen rab mang byin/_/mi'am ci mo'i tshil gyis mer/_/sbyin sreg byas pas khyed dge 'thob/_/khyod kyi mna' ma pho brang na/_/yod pas mi'am ci mi
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]i ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA krU raM pA ta ka kU Ni taH/_/nr-i shaM pa br-it+ta saM trastastasta ma b+hA Shad+b+hU pa tiH/_/ni dza dzi bi ta rak+ShA yi ka thaM s+t+rI ba d+ha mut+pa he/_/kin+na rI bi ra he ba sh+yaM na tsa dzI ba ti me su taH/_/i
[\[102b.2\]]dkon/_/zhes pa de tshig ma rungs pa/_/thos nas sdig pas rmus phyin cing /_/gtum po'i spyod pas skrag gyur pa/_/sa yi bdag pos de la smras/_/rang gi srog ni bsrung slad du/_/bud med gsod par ji ltar spro/_/mi'am ci mo dang bral na/_/nges par bdag gi bu mi 'tsho/_/zhes te
[\[102b.3\]]ti b+hU mi b+hu dzA ta s+ya pra t+yA khyA te sa mI hi te/_/taM pA pA b+hi ni be she na su naHprA ha pu ro hi haH/_/a ho rA dzan+na dzA nI She d+hI mA na bi dza nas+thi taM/_/tri brga sA d+ha naM t+yA dz+ya na ra dz+yaM na tsa dzI bi taM/_/ar+thA i ba swa dza na
[\[102b.4\]]sa la spyod pas de'i/_/'dod pa phyir la bzlog pa na/_/mdun na 'don ni sdig pa la/_/mngon par zhen pas yang der smras/_/kye ma rgyal po blo gros dang /_/ldan yang skye ba'i lugs mi shes/_/sde gsum sgrub byed rgyal srid dang /_/srog kyang gtang bar bya ba min/_/nor bzhin nang mi
[\[102b.5\]]mi tra ka la tra pu trAnaSh+TaHs+thi ta s+ya pu ru Sha s+ya pu nar+b+ha ban+ti/_/uts+tsh+wa sa mA tra bi ra he ga ta dzI bi ta s+ya tat+kA la san+ni hi tam s+ya sa de ba sar+b+baM/_/t+yA dzan+ti dzI bi ta s+yAr+the ni dza de sha pri yAt+ma dzaH/_/dzI bi tA da pa raM
[\[102b.6\]]grogs po chung ma bu dag ni/_/nyams pa skyes bu gnas na slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dbugs tsam bral zhing srog ni song bar gyur pa las/_/de dus nye bar gnas kyang thams cad med pa nyid/_/'tsho ba'i don du rang yul dang /_/gces pa'i bu yang gtong bar byed/_/rgyal po 'tsho ba'i
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]rA dza na dzI bi lo kesti na pri yaM/_/i ti dzI bi ta lo b+ha ya te na nA nA ni daR+sha naiH/_/sha naiHpra tA ri teHsA re rA dzA yuk+ta ma ma n+ya ta/_/ta taHsu saM b+h+r-i tA raM b+he pra br-it+te ya dz+nya kar+m+ma Ni/_/kr-i tA yAM
[\[103a.2\]]'jig rten na/_/srog las gzhan ni gces pa med/_/de ltar de yi sna tshogs kyi/_/dpe yis dal gyis brid pa na/_/rgyal po srog la chags pa yi/_/sdig la rigs par kha yis blangs/_/de nas phun tshogs rtsom pa yis/_/mchod sbyin las la 'jug byed cing /_/phyugs kyi
[\[103a.3\]]puSh+ka ri N+yAM tsa pur+N+NA yAM pa shu sho Ni taiH/_/rA dz+nyA ka thi ta pr-it+tAn+tA ni dza pat+nI swa yAM ra haH/_/pu tra pra bA pa sho kAr+t+tA pA pa tra stA bya tsin+ta yata/_/a ho mUr+khA ta ro rA dzA mo hAn+d+he na pu ro d+ha sA/_/snu ShA ba d+ha bi d+hA
[\[103a.4\]]khrag gis gang ba yi/_/rdzing bu yang ni byas pa'i tshe/_/dben par rang gi btsun mo la/_/rgyal pos rang gi spyod tshul bshad/_/bu ni byes bgrod mya ngan gyis/_/gzir cing sdig pas skrag pas bsams/_/kye ma mna' ma gsod pa yi/_/sgrub byed sdig pa rgya che 'dir/_/mdun na 'don ni gti mug
[\[103a.5\]]nesmin+p+re ri taHpri thu pA ta ke/_/yat+ne ra pa ri hAR+Ye pi ni bad+d+he ni d+ha nA baM d+hau/_/pa ra prA NA pa hA re Na mU D+hA bAny+ts+tshi ti dzI bi taM/_/ya di dzI bi ta lub+b+he na mug+d+hA mr-i ta ba d+hU ri ba/_/snu ShA pi ha n+ya ti rA
[\[103a.6\]]gis/_/long bas rgyal po rab rmongs bskul/_/'chi ba'i mtshams ni nges bcad pa/_/'bad pas yongs 'phrog mi nus kyang /_/gzhan gyi srog ni phrogs pa yis/_/blun po rnams ni 'tsho bar 'dod/_/gal te srog la chags pa yis/_/bu mo bzhin bzang bdud rtsi 'dra/_/mna' ma yin yang
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dz+nyA tit+ki bak+Sh+ya mya haM su taM/_/mA tastA me yaM bAt+pa myAta pA l+ya ma ma ma no ha rA/_/i t+yuk+t+wA su d+ha na sU nurga to ni k+Shi s+ya me ba d+hUM/_/tasmAts+tsha DA ma NiM mat+taHprA pya byo m+nA pra yA tu pA/_/b+ha bi Sh+ya ti
[\[103b.2\]]rgyal po yis/_/bsad na bdag gis ci zhig smra/_/ma gcig khyod kyis mnyes gshin las/_/bdag gi yid 'phrog ma 'di skyongs/_/zhes brjod bu ni nor bzang dag_/bdag la chung ma gtad nas song /_/de slad bdag las gtsug gi nor/_/thob nas de ni mkha' la 'gro/_/de ni 'tsho na bdag po
[\[103b.3\]]ta yA ba t+yu dzI baM t+yA saM ga ma phu naH/_/i ti saM tsi t+ya mA ga twA sA sru netrA snu ShAn+ti kaM/_/rA dzA br-it+taM ni be d+yA sau sot+kam+pA pu na ra pra bI ta/_/bAt+pa tsU DA ma NiM bad+d+h+wA gats+tsha tUr+N+Na bi hA ya pA/_/nr-i pa pA pa pra br-it+to yaM na
[\[103b.4\]]dang /_/slar yang phrad pa nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bsams mna' ma ga la bar/_/mig chur bcas pa de song nas/_/rgyal po'i tshul ni de la bshad/_/rab 'dar ldan pas slar smras pa/_/mnyes gshin gtsug gi nor bu chings/_/nam mkha' dag la mgyogs par song /_/mi bdag 'di ni sdig dang
[\[103b.5\]]pa dA tsa ra mI k+Sha te/_/yadz+nyA b+hU miM twa lA ga trA gan+ta byaM pyo ma bar+t+ma nA/_/a n+ya thA twA ma pau be hi gu D+ha n+yastA ma yA kwa tsita/_/i ti b+har+t+r-i pra bA sAr+t+tA ba tsaHshru twA ma no ha rA/_/tat+saM ga mA ya rak+Sha n+tI yat+nAt+p+ri
[\[103b.6\]]ldan/_/dam pa'i spyod la mi lta'o/_/khyod ni mchod sbyin sar song nas/_/nam mkha'i lam nas 'gro bar bya/_/gzhan ni khyod ni 'ga' zhig tu/_/bdag gis sbas bkod 'di yis rig_/ces pa'i tshig thos yid 'phrog ma/_/khyo dang bral bas gdungs gyur pas/_/'bad pas de dang phrad pa'i slad/_/
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]ya ta raM pa puH/_/shwa swA dat+taM sa ma dA ya bad+d+h+wA nUr+d+hi shi khA ma NiM/_/snu ShA hUM tA kra tu k+She traM ga twA bya ma bya gA ha ta/_/rA dzan+nai tat+ta ba sa mu tsa taM yat+p+ri ya s+yA d+hi sU noHba d+h+yA pat+nI ni dza pa da mi yaM swasti
[\[104a.2\]]rab tu gces pas lus bsrungs shing /_/gtsug gi nor bu sgyug mo yis/_/byin pa blangs nas spyi bor bcings/_/mna' ma bos pa mchod sbyin gyi/_/zhing du song nas mkha' la 'gro/_/rgyal po bu ni gces kyang mna' ma gsad par bya ba gang 'di ni/_/khyod kyis 'os pa ma yin khyod ni
[\[104a.3\]]tu b+h+yaM ga tA haM/_/rak+Shash+tsA pau pra ti ha ta d+h+r-i tir+m+ma b+bi yo ge ku mA raHta tre t+yuk+t+wA ta nu ta ra ta Did+ba b+h+ra maiHsA dza gA ma/_/ta s+yAM ga tA yAM nr-i pa tiR+Ya dz+nyA big+h+ne shaM kitaH/_/pu ro hi ta sta ma ba dad+b+hu
[\[104a.4\]]shis gyur bdag ni rang gnas song /_/bdag bral brtan pa rab tu nyams pa'i gzhon nu 'di yang bsrung bar gyis/_/der de brjod nas rab phra glog gi rnam 'phrul dag gis de song gyur/_/de song tshe na mi bdag gi/_/mchod sbyin bgegs kyis dogs par gyur/_/mdun na 'don gyis de la smras/_/
[\[104a.5\]]ba mA saM sha yaM kr-i thAH/_/man+t+rair+m+ma yA pa mA kr-iSh+TaH krU rA khyo brah+ma rAk+Sha saH/_/nir+b+big+h+na te kra tuHsid+d+hiH sA ha tA te na kin+na rI/_/i ti mi th+yA ba tsa sta s+ya rA dzA sa t+ya ma ma n+ya ta/_/nar+t+yan+te ku Ti lermug+d+ho
[\[104a.6\]]sa bdag the tshom yongs ma byed/_/gdug pa zhes bya tshangs pa yi/_/srin po bdag gis sngags kyis drangs/_/mi 'am ci mo de des gsad/_/khyod kyi mchod sbyin bgegs med grub/_/ces pa de yi brdzun gyi tshig_/rgyal po yis ni bden par bsams/_/'khrul 'khor gzugs brnyan rtse
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]yan+t+ra put+ta ka lI la yA/_/pi tur+b+ha ba na ma b+h+ye t+ya kIr+N+NaM haR+ShA ma no ha rA/_/n+ya be da yet+t+wa br-it+tan+taM ba han+tI pal+la b+ha hr-i di/_/sA pi tuHshA sa nAt+mar+t+ya saM ga bau ra b+ha shAn+ta ye/_/he ma kuM b+ha sha taiHsnA naM
[\[104b.2\]]dga' yis/_/rmongs rnams gya gyus gar byed do/_/pha yi khang par mngon phyogs te/_/dga' ba ster byed yid 'phrog mas/_/snying la khyo ni bzung byas te/_/rang gi spyod pa'i mtha' rnams bshad/_/yab kyi bka' yis mi dang ni/_/'grogs pa'i dri ma zhi ba'i slad/_/gser gyi bum pa lnga brgya yis/_/
[\[104b.3\]]pany+tsa b+hiHpra t+ya haM pya d+hAta/_/mar+t+yA mo daHpra ta nUk+ShA li tA yAHsha nai ya yau/_/su d+ha na sne ha saM yo ge na tu rA go mr-i gI dr-i shaH/_/di byod+yA no ba b+ho ge Shu na pA nar+p+r-i ti mA ya yau/_/a n+ya tra bad+d+ha rA gA NAM ra tirnA n+ya tra de hi
[\[104b.4\]]nyi ma so sor khrus dag byas/_/bkrus pas mi yi dri ma ni/_/rab tu chung ba nyid du gyur/_/nor bzang la ni mdza' gcugs ldan/_/ri dgas mig gi chags pa min/_/lha yi skyed tshal longs spyod la/_/de ni dga' bar yongs ma gyur/_/gzhan la chags par gyur pa yi/_/lus can gzhan na dga'
[\[104b.5\]]nAM/_/sAM kAn+ta bi ra hA krAn+tA ka dA tsid+b+yo ma gA mi nI/_/tAM nA ga b+ha ba no pAn+ta ba nAn+ta ba su d+hAM ya yau/_/ta trA shra ma s+tha lI pak+taM ma haR+Shi balka lA ya na/_/a bat+sA sa ma b+h+ye t+ya pra NA ma pi na man+mu khI/_/
[\[104b.6\]]ba med/_/nam zhig mkha' la 'gro ma de/_/sdug pa dang bral nyon mongs shing /_/klu yi khang pa'i nye 'khor de/_/nags mtha'i nor 'dzin dag tu song /_/drang srong chen po bsti gnas der/_/gnas pa shing shun can de la/_/rab tu btud cing phyag btsal te/_/dud cing mngon du phyogs pas smras/_/
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]lub+d+ha ka s+yo pa di sha tA b+ha ba tA ma ma ban+d+ha naM/_/twa me ba bru hi b+ha ga ban ya di yuk+ta mi daM kr-i taM/_/i ti ta s+yA ba tsAHshru twA kiny+tsil+ladz+dzA na tA na naH/_/tA mu bA tsa mu nirmug+d+he ta bai ShA b+ha bi ta bya
[\[105a.2\]]bdag ni 'ching ba rngon pa la/_/nye bar bstan pa khyod kyis ni/_/gal te rigs pas 'di byas na/_/bcom ldan khyod nyid bdag gis gsungs/_/zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/cung zad ngo tshas bzhin btud de/_/thub pas der smras bzhin bzang ma/_/'di ni khyod kyis myong bya
[\[105a.3\]]tA/_/a mo g+ha pA shasta s+yAstI t+ya dz+nyA twA ka thi tam+ma ya/_/u pa la b+h+ya ka thaM d+hAr+t+tas+t+wAM pa ban+d+ha pa lub+d+ha kaH/_/duSh+TAt+ma nAM na dzA nI maHkau Ti l+yaM krU ra tse ta sA/_/ba t+ya pra bA da mu kha rAHsata b+h+ya ba pa ra lA
[\[105a.4\]]nyid/_/de la zhags pa don yod ni/_/yod ces bdag gis ma shes bshad/_/g.yon can rngon pas de yi gtam/_/shes nas khyod ni bcings par gyur/_/bden par smra ba'i mu cor can/_/rang bzhin drang ba bdag cag gis/_/ma rungs bdag nyid gdug pa yi/_/sems kyi gya gyu yongs
[\[105a.5\]]ba yaM/_/i t+yuk+t+wA mu mi nA ta n+wI pra Ne yAt+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/b+ha ga ban+k+Sha mya tA me tad+bA lA ba tsa na tsA pa laM/_/i dan+tuM b+ha ba ta ma gre yan+ma yA kiM tsi du ts+ya te/_/la lA su b+ha gaHso yaM pA dA tsA ra bya ti kra
[\[105a.6\]]mi shes/_/zhes pa thub pas brjod de la/_/gzugs can ma yis gus pas smras/_/bu mo'i tshig ni g.yo ba 'di/_/bcom ldan gyis ni bzod par mdzod/_/khyed kyi mdun du bdag gis ni/_/gang 'di cung zad brjod gyur pa/_/dam pa'i spyod las 'gal ba 'di/_/bud med rnams kyi skal ba
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]maH/_/duHkhod+d+hA ra Na san+nad+d+hAHsan+tap+tA nAM da ya la baH/_/kAR+Yan+ta ra gAHprA ye Na b+ha baM t+ya nu tsi te Sh+wa pi/_/pA sha ban+d+hAd+bi muk+tA haM lub+d+ha ke na pra lA si nAM/_/ni bad+d+hA rA dza pu tre Na sne ha pA she na ha
[\[105b.2\]]bzang /_/sdug bsngal 'don la chas gyur cing /_/yongs su gdung la brtse ldan rnams/_/'os pa min pa rnams kyi yang /_/phal cher bya ba sgrub mdzad yin/_/cho nge dang ni ldan pa bdag_/rngon pa'i zhags pas bcings las grol/_/'phrog byed mdza' ba'i zhags pa yis/_/rgyal po'i bu
[\[105b.3\]]ri NA/_/su b+ha gaHsu d+ha nA khyau sau mad+bi yo gA na lA ku laH/_/a nu nA ya di marge Na sa me Sh+ya te ta bAn+ti kaM/_/ta di daM b+ha ba tA bAts+yaHkA ru N+yad+ba tsa sA ma ma/_/s+thi tA twad+baM ra sA yA pa niHsu khA haM gr-i he
[\[105b.4\]]yis nges par bcings/_/nor bzang zhes pa skal ba bzang /_/bdag bral me yi gdung ba 'di/_/gal te lam ni 'di nyid nas/_/khyod can nye bar 'ongs gyur na/_/snying rje las ni khyod nyid kyis/_/bdag gi 'phrin 'di smra bar byos/_/khyod bral gdung bas bde med cing /_/bdag ni yab kyi
[\[105b.5\]]pi tuH/_/ut+kaN+ThA ma nu kaM pa mU sa ha dzA d+yA gr-i ta dz+nyA tAM/_/dAk+Shi N+yaM bA pu raskr-i t+ya tUr+N+Na mA ga mya tA mi taH/_/durga maHkin+na ra pu re mArgaHkle sha sha tA sha yaH/_/a b+hU mi re ba mar+t+yAnAM malpa bIR+Ya ba lau dza
[\[105b.6\]]khyim na 'khod/_/'dun dang rjes su brtse ba'am/_/byas shes lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/rjes mthun mdun du bdar byas te/_/'di nas myur du 'byon par mdzod/_/mi'am ci yi grong khyer lam/_/bgrod dka' nyon mongs brgya yi rten/_/brtson 'grus stobs gzi chung ba yi/_/mi rnams kyis ni sa
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]sAM/_/dIp+tA ta po ba nAn+te smin+su d+hA nA ma ma hau Sha d+hiH/_/dr-i sh+ya te ha bi bA pa kwAM pA ta byA sA swa yaM twa yA/_/tat+p+ra b+hA bat+sa mut+tiR+Ya kle shaM sa twa sa hA ya bAn/_/kai lA sa hA sa shu b+h+re Na pa thA
[\[106a.2\]]min nyid/_/dka' thub nags mtha' 'dir 'bar ba/_/bdud rtsi zhes pa'i sman chen ni/_/mthong ste zhun mar la btsos pa/_/khyod rang nyid kyis btung bar bya/_/de mthus snying stobs grogs ldan khyod/_/nyon mongs rab tu sgrol 'gyur te/_/lam ni kai lA sa dgod ltar/_/dkar bas
[\[106a.3\]]mat+pu ra me Sh+ye pi/_/i daM tsa tasmai dA ta byaM ma da b+hi dz+nyAM gu rI ya kaM/_/i t+yuk+t+wA bi Sha maM bar+t+ma ka tha yi twA kra me Na sA/_/big+h+na pra ti kri yo pA yAt+san+da sh+yash+tsaR+Ya yuk+ti b+hiH/_/A shA ban+b+ha d+h+r-i ta prA Na
[\[106a.4\]]bdag grong phyin par gyur/_/bdag gi rtags mtshan sor gdub ni/_/'di yang de la sbyin par bya/_/zhes brjod de yis mi bzad pa'i/_/lam ni rim pas bshad byas te/_/ngo mtshar rig pa dag gis ni/_/bgegs rnams phyir bcos thabs bstan nas/_/re ba'i 'ching bas srog bzung
[\[106a.5\]]ya yau da twAM gu lI ya kaM/_/ta yA ka thi ta mA kar+N+N+ya dU rA d+h+wa ta ra NAd+b+hu taM/_/aM gu rI ya ka mA dA ya ta de bA tsin+ta yan+mu niH/_/a trAn+ta re rA dza sU nu rdzi twA me g+ha ma hI pa tiM/_/A ya yau ko sha mA dA ya da
[\[106a.6\]]ba/_/sor gdub byin nas song bar gyur/_/lam ring sgrol byed rmad byung dag_/de yis bshad pa thos gyur te/_/sor gdub dag ni blangs byas nas/_/thub pa de dag nyid la sems/_/skabs der sa yi bdag po sprin/_/pham par byas shing mdzod blangs nas/_/chung ma blta bar 'dod pa yi/_/rgyal po'i
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]yi tA daR+sha not+su kaH/_/sa bi be sha swa na ga raM pA man+ta ts+tshat+t+ra maN+Da laiH/_/phul+la phe Na smi ta s+yAb+d+hiH kur+b+bA NaHsan+ni b+han+na b+haH/_/snu ShA bai sha sha br-it+tAn+ta ka tha na kle sha kam+pi taM/_/a thAn+taHpu ra ma b+h+ye t+ya dza
[\[106b.2\]]bu ni 'ongs par gyur/_/rgyal phran gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/_/mkha' ni chu gtor lbu ba'i 'dzum/_/rgyas pa dag dang mtshungs byed cing /_/de ni rang gi grong khyer zhugs/_/de nas mna' ma'i nyes gyod kyi/_/lo rgyus 'chad la nyon mongs shing /_/'dar ba'i pho brang 'khor song ste/_/de yi
[\[106b.3\]]na kaM pra Na nA ma paH/_/a d+ho mu khA khi la dza naM sho ka sha l+ya ha tot+sa baM/_/pi tu ran+taHpu raM dr-iSh+T+wA sa bi pri ya ma shaM ka ta/_/a bi dzI ba ti ma ta n+wI bi ra hAr+t+tA ma no ha rA/_/i ti bru bA NaM nA ya dA ta mu tse
[\[106b.4\]]yab la rab tu btud/_/'og tu bzhin phyogs skye bo kun/_/mya ngan zug rngus dga' ston bcom/_/yab kyi pho brang 'khor mthong nas/_/de ni dga' dang bral bar dogs/_/'bral bas gzir ba'i yid 'phrog ma/_/gzugs bzang ma de 'tsho'am ci/_/zhes smra de la su yis kyang /_/gang tshe mi
[\[106b.5\]]kash+tsa da pri ya/_/ta dA gA da dza na nI pu tra dzI ba ti te pri yA/_/ga tA tsU DA ma Ni prA pya kiM tu dzI bi ta saM sha ye/_/i ti shru twai ba sa ha sA pa pa pA ta ma hI ta le/_/kIr+N+Na hA ra la tAM kur+b+ban+sA sru d+hA rA mi pak+Shi tiM/_/tu
[\[106b.6\]]snyan ma brjod pa/_/de tshe ma yis rab smras pa/_/bu gcig khyod kyi dga' ma 'tsho/_/'on kyang srog la the tshom tshe/_/gtsug gi nor bu thob nas song /_/zhes pa thos pa nyid na de/_/'phral la sa yi gzhi la 'gyel/_/do shal 'khri shing bkram pa'i sa/_/mchi ma'i rgyun ldan byed pa bzhin/_/kha
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]Sha ra shI ka rasma ra ha ri tsan+da na bA bi b+hiH/_/sa lab+d+ha saM dz+nyaHsha na kair+b+bi la lA pA sru gad+ga daH/_/a nA ka sha sha shAM ka shrI ra man+thA mr-i ta bA hi ni/_/a yat+na rat+na ba la b+hI kwa sA ku su ma d+ha n+wa
[\[107a.2\]]ba'i thigs pa ltar dkar ba'i/_/ha ri tsan dan chu dag gis/_/dal gyis 'du shes rnyed pa des/_/mchi mas 'gar 'gar rnam par smras/_/mkha' ming ri bong can gyi dpal/_/bsrubs min bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang ldan/_/'bad med me tog gzhu can gyis/_/rin cen gnas de gang na
[\[107a.3\]]naH/_/gu ru shA sa na yaM tri te na dU raM bra dza tA bASh+pa ni rud+d+hA lo tsa nA yAH/_/bi hi tA na d+h+r-i ti tir+m+ma yA mr-i gA k+Sh+yA t+yu da yaM me pa ti taHsma rA b+hi shA baH/_/de hi pra ti ba tsaHsu b+h+ru kwa ga tA pi ma no ha re/_/ma yA pra ma da
[\[107a.4\]]yod/_/bla ma'i bkas bcings ring du 'gro byed pa/_/bdag gi ri dgas mig can mchi ma yis/_/mig ni 'gags pa'i dga' ba ma bsgrubs pa/_/des na dran pa'i dmod 'di bdag la lhung /_/yid 'phrog ma ni gang du song /_/smin legs tshig gi lan dag sbyin/_/bag med blun po bdag
[\[107a.5\]]mU D+he na ha ri NA k+Shi na rak+Shi tA/_/twA t+sa mA ga ma sau b+hA gya sh+lA g+h+ya s+ya su ra saM pa di/_/ma me ba ma r+t+ya lo ka s+ya twa d+bi yo ga s+ya kA d+yu ti/_/i ti bru pA Na sha na kaiH kAn+tA saM b+ho ga sA k+Shi Shu/_/u
[\[107a.6\]]gis ni/_/ri dgas mig can khyod ma bsrungs/_/khyod dang 'grogs pa'i skal bzang ldan/_/lha yi mdun sa bsngags par 'os/_/khyod dang bral bas mi yis ni/_/'jig rten bdag bzhin ci zhig mdzes/_/zhes pa smra zhing dal bu yis/_/mdzes ma'i longs spyod dbang gyur pa/_/skyed mos
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]d+yA ne Shu pri ya ta mAM bi tse tuM swa ya mud+Ya yau/_/pany+tsa yi twA pa ri dza naM pa ra dza n+yA ma la k+Shi taH/_/ga twA ba nAn+taM bi b+h+rA ma ba me Shu bi Sha me Shu tsa/_/tI bra tA ga pi shA tse na ma ha tA pa bi mo hi taH/_/
[\[107b.2\]]tshal du dga' ma mchog_/'tshol du rang nyid song bar gyur/_/'khor gyi skye bo brid byas te/_/mtshan mo dag ni ma tshor bar/_/nags mthar song nas mnyam pa dang /_/mi mnyam rnams su rnam par 'khyam/_/'dod chags drag po'i sha za ni/_/chen pos rnam par rmongs pa des/_/smyon pa
[\[107b.3\]]un+mat+ta i ba pa prats+tsha tse ta nA tse ta nA na pi/_/brU hi sa khe shu ka shA ba ka sa khyAHprA Na sa khIM ni khi len+du mu khiM tAM/_/tad+da sha nats+tsha da rA ga bi b+hA ge bim+pa pha le stu pa dA ta ba b+ho gaH/_/haM ho haM
[\[107b.4\]]bzhin du sems ldan dang /_/sems med la yang rnam par dris/_/grogs po ne tso'i phru gu grogs kyi grogs mo ni/_/srog mtshungs zla rdzogs bzhin ldan de ni smra bar byos/_/de yi so yi sgrib byed dmar ba dag gi char/_/bim+ba'i 'bras bu rtag tu khyod kyi longs spyod yin/_/kye lags dang
[\[107b.5\]]sa mi tAM ga saM ga na li nI lI lA ba taM pa d+yu te tr-iSh+TA sau ra b+ha pad+ma pad+ma ba da nAM kiM kAn+ti kal+lo li ni/_/ya s+yAHpI na pa yo d+ha rA gra bi lu thin+muk+tA ka lA pa s+ya sA haM sa s+ye ba bi b+hA ti ro ma la ti kA shai bA la bal+lIny+tsU
[\[107b.6\]]pa lus dkar dang 'grogs pad+mo can rol rna rgyan ltar mdzes pa/_/mu tig tshogs ni rnam par g.yo ba gang gi 'o ma 'dzin pa rgyas pa'i rtser/_/ba spu'i 'khri shing ngang pa la ni nya lcibs 'khri shing lhung bzhin rnam mdzes pa/_/dri bzang khang pa pad+ma'i bzhin ldan mdzes pa'i rba rlabs can de mthong
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]tAM/_/ta s+ye ti tI bra bya sa nA nu ban+d+hAt+p+ra lA pi naHpra s+t+ya la taHsa mo pi/_/di shan+p+ra kA shaM da ya ye ba mArge sha nairdza gA he ga ga naM si tAM shuH/_/sh+yA mA pa ter+m+man+ma tha bAn d+hA ba s+ya kAn+taM sa dr-iSh+TAm+ba ra tsum+bi
[\[108a.2\]]ngam ci/_/de ltar sdug bsngal drag pos bcings pa las/_/rab smre mnyam pa la yang 'gred de la/_/brtse bas lam ni rab gsal ster ba bzhin/_/dal gyis bsil zer can ni nam mkhar 'dzegs/_/mtshan mo'i bdag po yid srubs gnyen gyi ni/_/gzugs mdzes mkha' la sbyar ba
[\[108a.3\]]bim+baM/_/san+daR+shi ta min+bu mu khyA me ne smi ta mu khaM byo mA bi mA na shriM gAta/_/mU kaM ka laM kAM ka ma bASh+Ta do Sha ma bi b+h+ra maM hA sa bi lA sa hI nAM/_/tsi re Na ni sh+tsa t+ya sha shAM ka mi ba pa prats+tsha gats+tshan+na ra nA tha
[\[108a.4\]]de mthong nas/_/'dzum ldan zla zhal ma yis nam mkha' yi/_/gzhal yas khang pa'i steng nas bzhin bstan bsams/_/mi smra dri mas mtshan zhing skyon dag thob/_/rnam 'phrul med cing dgod dang rtsed 'jos dman/_/zla ba bzhin du ring zhig lon nas des/_/mi yi mgon po'i bus ni 'gro
[\[108a.5\]]sU nuH/_/a pi twa yA kAn+ti sa khI pa khe khe tu l+ye k+Sha NA lak+Sh+mA mr-i ga s+ya dr-iSh+TA/_/ta bo di tA yad+ba da no pa mA na sam+ban+d+ha lab+d+ha dza ga ti pra sid+d+hiH/_/ka thaM na kiM tsit+ka tha ya t+ya yaM me ga ta s+ya kAn+tAM ka tha ner+the
[\[108a.6\]]zhing dris/_/grogs po khyod kyis mkha' la mdzes sdug grogs/_/gang gi bzhin gyi nyer 'jal 'brel thob pa'i/_/'gro la khyod kyi grags pa rab rgyas pa/_/mtshan ma ri dgas mig mtshungs mthong ngam ci/_/mdzes ma'i gtam ni don gnyer dngos gyur pa/_/bdag la cung zad ji ltar 'di
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]b+hA baM/_/pa rAr+tha sam+pA da na shI ta le na ka lA ba dA ka s+ya kr-i to nu rA gaH/_/a pi twa yasnig+d+ha ta Dit+p+ra kA shAd+ya na sta nIts+tsha pi ma yU ri dr-iSh+TA/_/twAd+bardi b+hA ra s+ya su kr-in+ma ya s+yA bi tsi tra mA n+yaHka pa rI ka lA paH/_/b+hu
[\[108b.2\]]mi smra/_/gzhan don bsgrub pa la ni bsil gyur pa/_/sgyu rtsal cha ldan su yi ngo dag byed/_/gang gi sgra sogs 'phreng bas rnam bkra ste/_/khyod kyi mjug ma'i tshogs kyi grags gyur pa/_/yid 'ong glog gi rab gsal sprin ldan gzhi/_/'gar yang rma bya khyod kyis mthong ngam ci/_/gtsug na
[\[108b.3\]]dzaM ga kaM tsid+b+ha ba tA b+hu dzaM gI dr-iSh+TA kwa tsit+sA ba ra rat+na tsU DA/_/bi Sha ts+tsha TAHpa sh+ya ya yA bi sr-iSh+Ta mAM duHsa he smin bi ra he da han+ti/_/sA rad+ga sA rad+ga bi lA si nI kiM dr-iSh+TA twa yA man+ma tha pAr+thi ba s+ya/_/ya s+yAHka TAk+Shot+pa
[\[108b.4\]]rin cen mchog ldan lag 'gro ma/_/gal te lag 'gro khyod kyis 'gar mthong ngam/_/ltos shig gang gis dug gi zer spros pas/_/bzod dka'i 'bral bas 'dir ni bdag sreg go/_/ri dgas khyod kyis yid srubs sa dag gi/_/do ra'i rtsed 'jo ma de mthong ngam ci/_/gang gis zur mig ut+pal
[\[108b.5\]]la saM bi b+hA gairbi b+hAn+ti ma n+ye ga ha ne ha ri N+yAH/_/a pi twa yA bi b+h+ra ma dzan+ma b+hU mi ba na pa te pal+la ba pe sha loSh+Thi/_/lI lA bi lo lA la la nA ba nAn+te la te ba dr-iSh+Ta sta ba ka nI pA/_/e na nu naM ba na kuny+dza re na sA rA
[\[108b.6\]]cha dag gis/_/ri dgas rnams ni nags na mdzes sam snyam/_/rnam 'phrul skye sa yal 'dab mdzes pa'i mchu/_/rol pas rnam par g.yo ba'i bud med dag_/phud bu can de 'khri shing bzhin du ni/_/nags mthar nags bdag khyod kyis mthong ngam ci/_/de ni sprin dang mtshungs pa nags tshal gyi/_/
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]dza raM b+hA pa ri raM b+ha lo lAtra/_/A kr-iSh+ya nI tA g+ha na san+ni b+he na saMts+tshA di tA bAgAM sha shi naHka le baH/_/i ti kA na na kuny+dze Shu ta s+yon+mA da pra lA pi naH/_/sho kA di ba bi bar+N+Nen+du ba da nA ra dza nI ya yau/_/sa
[\[109a.2\]]glang po 'di yis zla ba'i cha bzhin du/_/gser gyi chu shing yongs 'khyud la chags nas/_/blangs nas khyer ram bsgribs pa ma yin nam/_/de ltar nags tshal skyibs rnams su/_/bla bcol rab brjod de yis ni/_/mya ngan gyis bzhin mtshan mo ni/_/zla ba'i bzhin ras mdog bral song /_/de
[\[109a.3\]]nA ga b+ha ba nA san+ta tI ro pAn+ta po ba naM/_/sha naiHpra bi sh+ya sa prats+tsha ma haR+Shi balka lA ya naM/_/i ha bi ra hi bi tsit+tA sho ka ni shwA mUr+ts+tshan+ma da na da ha na d+hU ma sh+ya ma sak+tai ka bi NI/_/i pi sha mi ta
[\[109a.4\]]yis klu yi gnas dang nye/_/ngogs 'gram dka' thub nags tshal du/_/dal gyis zhugs te drang srong che/_/shing shun can la rab tu dris/_/'dir ni 'bral bas sems dman mya ngan shugs rings kyis spar ba'i/_/'dod pa'i me yi du bas sngo chags lhas ma gcig pa can/_/ri bong can gyi mdzes sdug
[\[109a.5\]]sha shAM kod+dA ma saun+dar+Y+Ya dar+p+pA mu ni ba ra hari NA k+ShI kin+na rI kA pi dr-iSh+TA/_/i ti kAn+tA bi yu k+ta s+ya prAp+ta pon+mA ni nin+da shAM/_/mu niHshru twA ba tsa ta s+ya pa ri dz+nyA ya ta ma bra pIta/_/sa mA shwa si hi bi shra mya san+t+rA pas+t+yA dz+ya tA ma
[\[109a.6\]]dregs rgyas zhi byed ri dgas mig_/mi'am ci mo su zhig thub pa mchog gis gzigs sam ci/_/zhes pa mdzes ma dang bral zhing /_/smyon pa'i skabs ni thob gyur pa/_/de yi tshig thos thub pa yis/_/yongs su shes nas de la smras/_/khyod ni ngal gso dbugs phyung la/_/yongs su gdung ba 'di gtang
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]yaM/_/dr-iSh+TA sA ta bka l+yA NI ma yAmAn sa tsan+d+ri yA/_/yU tha b+h+raSh+Te ba ha ri NI ni se k+ShA pi dzI bi te/_/pA shA kr-iSh+Te ba ka ri NI d+h+waR+Ya te sA twa dA sha yA/_/pA Nau she te ba da na ka ma laM pra sta re pal+la bA nAM tA pa klAn+tA ta
[\[109b.2\]]mdzod/_/khyod kyi dge ma yid kyi ni/_/zla ba'i 'od de bdag gis mthong /_/khyu nyams ri dgas mo bzhin du/_/'tsho ba la yang ltos pa med/_/glang mo zhags pas drangs pa bzhin/_/de ni khyod kyi bsam pas 'tsho/_/lag pa dag la [(]bzhan [,]bzhin [)]gyi pad+ma nyal zhing yal 'dab mal stan la/_/gdung bas nyan cing
[\[109b.3\]]ra la ba tsa na shraM pi nI gA tra le khA/_/A shA ban+d+he d+h+r-i ti ri ba ma ti s+t+wad+pi yo gA ku lA yAsta s+yA nai pa ka tsi da pi ma naHkiM tu bi shrAM ti me ti/_/dru ma s+ya kin+na ra pa teHs+thi tA haM b+ha ba ne pi tuH/_/A gan+ta byaM twa yA tUr+N+NaM
[\[109b.4\]]g.yo ba'i tshig ldan ri mo kun du nyams pa'i lus/_/re ba bcas la brtan pa bzhin du blo gros khyod bral 'khrugs gyur pa/_/de yi yid ni 'gar yang ci yang ngal gsos nyid du 'gyur ma yin/_/ljon pa mi'am ci yi bdag_/yab kyi khyim na bdag gnas so/_/khyod ni myur du shog cig ces/_/de
[\[109b.5\]]mi ti twAM san+di de sha pA/_/bIR+Ya sa twa ba lo pA ya d+haiR+Yot+pA ha ba tA ma pi/_/a ga mya kin+na ra pu re kra mAd+bar+t+ma sha shaM sa ba/_/i daM tsa twat+k+r-i te dat+taM ta mA rat+nAM gu lI ya kaM/_/ya s+ya snig+d+ha pra b+hA d+yaM shau rdi
[\[109b.6\]]yis khyod la yang dag bstan/_/brtson 'grus snying stobs stobs dang thabs/_/brtan dang spro ldan rnams kyis kyang /_/bgrod min mi'am ci yi ni/_/grong khyer lam yang rim pas bshad/_/gang gi 'od 'jam reg pa yis/_/phyogs rnams ser po nyid 'gyur ba/_/rin cen sor gdub 'di yang ni/_/de
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]sho yan+ti pi ShaM ga tAM/_/i t+ya nan+da su d+hA sak+ta muk+t+wo d+haiR+YA pa laM ba naM/_/aM gu rI yaM da dau tasmin+mArgaM tsA ka tha yan+mu niH/_/sa thA ta du pA diSh+Te na so pA ye na nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/_/d+hI raHpra tsakra me gan+tuM d+ha na dA
[\[110a.2\]]yis khyod kyi ched du byin/_/zhes brjod kun dga'i bdud rtsi yis/_/dran bzhin brtan pa dag gi rten/_/sor gdub dag ni de la phyin/_/lam yang thub pas rab tu bshad/_/de yis bstan pa'i lam dag ni/_/thabs dang bcas pas mi bdag bu/_/brtan pas nor 'dzin gnas pa yi/_/phyogs
[\[110a.3\]]d+h+yu Shi tAM di shaM/_/saM sid+d+haM g+h+r-i ta pA ke na su d+hAM pi twA ma hau Sha d+hiM/_/lab+d+har+d+d+hi ba la ma hAt+m+yaHsa yud+d+taH pra ya yau sha nai/_/rid+h+yA san+ni hi taM ta s+ya sar+b+bo pa ka ra Na pa thi/_/a b+hUt+sa twa sa hA yA nAM
[\[110a.4\]]su 'gro bar rab tu brtsams/_/sman chen bdud rtsi legs grub pa/_/mar gyis smin pa 'thungs nas ni/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi bdag nyid thob/_/mtshon cha dang bcas dal gyis song /_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lam du de'i/_/nyer mkho thams cad nyer gnas gyur/_/snying stobs grogs dang ldan rnams
[\[110a.5\]]swA d+hI nAHsid+d+hi sam+pa daH/_/a tha bi d+yA d+ha ra ba d+hU bi lA sa ha si ta d+yu tiM/_/hi ma ban+ta ma ti kra mya ku kU lA r+h+ri ma bA pa paH/_/pa lo pa hA re swI kr-i t+ya ta tra bA na ra yU tha paM/_/ba yu be gA khya mA ru h+ya ga taM shai la ma laM g+ha yata/_/
[\[110a.6\]]kyi/_/grub pa phun tshogs rang dbang nyid/_/de nas rig 'dzin bu mo ni/_/rtse dga' dgod pa ltar mdzes pa/_/gangs can brgal nas de yis ni/_/ku kU lA yi ri la sleb/_/'bras bu'i skyes kyis khas blangs byas/_/der ni spre'u'i khyu yi bdag_/rlung shugs zhes pa la zhon nas/_/ri bo de ni de yis 'gongs/_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]a thA dza pa thA nA mAn ma ti tsakrA ma b+hU d+ha raM/_/ni ha t+ya dza ga raM g+ho ra big+h+na saM g+ha mi be Shu NA/_/bI NA swA nairba shI kr-i t+ya rAk+Sha sIM kA ma rU pA NIM/_/kA ma rU pA dri mul+laM g+h+ya pra ya yau kin+na rI pri yaH/_/
[\[110b.2\]]de nas lug gi lam zhes pa'i/_/sa 'dzin dag ni rab tu brgal/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sbrul chen ni/_/bgegs kyi tshogs bzhin mda' yis bsnun/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can srin mo ni/_/rgyud mang sgra yis dbang byas nas/_/'dod pa'i gzugs kyi ri bo 'das/_/mi'am ci mo'i bdag po song /_/
[\[110b.3\]]pA la bA na mu hu rA g+hA ta ni khA taiHshas+t+ra shaM ku b+hiH/_/e ka d+hA raM ta taHshai laM mA ru ro hA ti sA ha paH/_/a tho gra ta ra mA ru h+ya badzra kA khyaM sa sar+b+ba taM/_/gr-i d+h+ra rU pAM sa mA lo kya rAk+Sha sI pi pi tai Sha NIM/_/pa ri
[\[110b.4\]]de nas rgyun gcig ri bo la/_/yang yang mtshon gyi rtse mo yis/_/bsnun cing brkos pa dag gis ni/_/stobs ldan shin du rtul bas 'dzegs/_/de nas rdo rje can zhes pa'i/_/ri bo rab bral de yis 'dzegs/_/srin mo sha ni 'tshol byed pa/_/bya rgod gzugs can yang dag mthong /_/sha ldan ri dgas
[\[110b.5\]]pr-it+te na saM ts+tshan+na pa mAMs mr-i ga tsar+m+ma NA/_/sa pa da mU le ta s+yA dresta s+thau ni sh+tsa la bi gra haH/_/mAM sa lup+d+ha ta mut+k+Shi s+ya gr-i d+h+ra rU pA ni shA tsa rI/_/ni da d+he shi kha ra s+yA gre b+hok+taM b+hI Sha Na bi gra hA/_/mr-i ga tsar+m+ma sta
[\[110b.6\]]bags pa ni/_/yongs su bsgyur bas kun du g.yogs/_/ri bo de yi zhabs kyi rtsar/_/de yi lus ni g.yo med 'khod/_/mtshan rgyu bya rgod gzugs can ni/_/sha la chags pas de blangs nas/_/'jigs rung gzugs kyis bza' ba'i phyir/_/ri rtsi'i steng du rnam par bkod/_/brtson 'grus can gyi
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]mut+s+r-i dz+ya tAM ni ha t+ya pa bIR+Ya bAn/_/nI ran+d+ha kha di ra kIr+N+NaM prA pa kha di ra b+hU d+ha raM/_/pra bi sh+ya tad+gu hAM le b+he shi lAM bya s+ya ma hau Sha d+hi/_/shI tA ta pa ta maHsar+b+ba rAk+Sha sA di b+ha yA ba haM/_/sa yan+t+ra sar+b+ba
[\[111a.2\]]ri dgas kyi/_/pags pa btang nas de bsad de/_/seng ldeng stug pos khengs pa yi/_/seng ldeng sa 'dzin dag tu phyin/_/de yi phug zhugs rdo bsal bas/_/grang dang tsha dang mun pa sprul/_/srin po la sogs 'jigs pa dag_/'phrog pa'i sman ni chen po thob/_/'khrul 'khor ri gnyis
[\[111a.3\]]tau prA pya paM g+haT+TaiHprA Na ha ri Nau/_/yan+t+ra kI laM sha rA gre Na ts+tshi twA tsakre bi nish+tsa lau/_/yan+t+ra kI las muts+tshe daiR+Yan+t+ra dwA raM bi dAR+Y+Ya paH/_/ts+tshe da naM yan+t+ra tsakra s+ya yan+t+ra yuk+tau ta thA ya
[\[111a.4\]]rab bsdebs pas/_/srog ni 'phrog par de yis sleb/_/'khrul 'khor phur pa mda' rtse yis/_/bcad nas g.yo ba med par byas/_/'khrul 'khor phur pa bcad rnams kyis/_/'khrul 'khor sgo ni des bcom zhing /_/'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bcad de bzhin/_/lcags kyi 'khrul
[\[111a.5\]]sau/_/tI bra sra hA rau pu ru Shau yan+t+ra ma Shau tsa duHsa hau/_/yan+t+ro gra dan+ta ni Sh+ye yau ta thA ma ka ra rA k+Sha sau/_/g+ho rAn+d+ha kA ra gaM b+hI gu hA kU pa bi laM g+ha tsa/_/tuM gAM pa ri
[\[111a.6\]]'khor sbyar ba'o/_/drag tu snun byed skyes bu gnyis/_/bzod dka' lug gi 'khrul 'khor gnyis/_/de bzhin chu srin srin po'i so'i/_/'khrul 'khor drag pos 'joms pa gnyis/_/'jigs rung mun pa zab pa'i phug_/khron pa gnyis kyang rnam par 'gongs/_/chu bo chen po yang
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ta mut+tIR+Y+ya ha twA tat+ku la rAk+Sha sAn/_/A shI bi Sha d+h+r-i ta dza lAM pa taM gA khyA ba nim+ba gAM/_/ro di nI tsa na dI tI re ya s+yAHkin+na ra tse Ta kaH/_/kur+b+ban+ti ro da na ra bairbi g+h+naM tad+ga ta tse ta sAM/_/tad+bi d+hAM hA
[\[111b.2\]]dag brgal/_/de ngogs srin po rnams bsad nas/_/mche ba'i dug ldan gnas pa'i chu/_/pa ta gA zhes thur bgrod dang /_/gang 'gram mi'am chi dag gi/_/'bangs rnams ngu ba'i sgra dag gis/_/de 'gro'i sems la bgegs byed pa/_/klung ni du ba can dag dang /_/de bzhin dgod pa
[\[111b.3\]]bi nIM nA ma hA sA pa kr-i ta tse ta sAM/_/di shan+ti pra li ne ya s+yA bya pha naM kin+na rAM ga NA/_/laM g+ha yi twA ba gAsh+tsa n+ya be trAM prA pya na dIt+na taH/_/kU la be tra lA tA lam+bi ta s+ya ma tha ti tIR+Ya ya/_/pa ba na
[\[111b.4\]]can zhes pa/_/dgod pas sems la gnod byed dang /_/mi'am ci mo rnams dag gis/_/gang gi 'gram du gdung ster ba/_/thur bgrod gzhan yang bzlas byas te/_/de 'og spa ldan klung can phyin/_/de nas de las thar 'dod pas/_/'gam phyi spa yi 'khri shing bzung /_/rlung gis bskul
[\[111b.5\]]bre ri tAM pA ra bai tra pal+li la bA pa saH/_/ta yA prA pya pa raM pA raM mA sha ye bA ti dIr+g+ha yA/_/da daR+sha kin+na ra pu raM s+ph+ya ra s+pha Ti ka man+di raM/_/pra bi sh+ya pa sha n+yaiH prA pya kAn+tA ka na ka pad+mi nIM/_/tat+tI ra ta ru mA ru h+ya ta s+r+bau rat+na
[\[111b.6\]]pas pha rol phyin/_/spa yi 'khri shing de yis thob/_/re ba bzhin du rab ring ba/_/de yi pha rol 'gram du phyin/_/mi'am ci yi grong khyer ni/_/rab gsal shel gyi khang pa mthong /_/de yi dal bus nang du zhugs/_/gser gyi pad ldan mdzes par phyin/_/de yi ngogs kyi shing la 'dzegs/_/rin cen
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]la tA br-i taH/_/sa da daR+shAm+bu dza radzaHpuny+dzaiH su ra b+hi piny+dza raM/_/he ma kuM b+hairdza lan+ta tra na yan+tIH kin+na rAM ga nAM/_/kum b+hot+k+She pe shrA mAr+t+tI ya sta tre ka s+yAHsa ma b+h+ye t+ya saH/_/hastA lam+be na ba hA
[\[112a.2\]]'khri shing gis bsgribs nas/_/der des chu skyes rdul tshogs kyis/_/dri bzang ser por gyur pa'i chu/_/mi'am ci mo rnams dag gis/_/gser gyi bum par len pa mthong /_/der ni bum 'degs ngal ba yis/_/gzir ba cig can des mngon phyogs/_/lag pas rten nas grogs
[\[112a.3\]]yaM kr-i twA sa prats+tsha tAM sha naiH/_/mA taHka s+ya kr-i te to ya mi daM yat+ne na nI ya te/_/yang+b+hak+t+yA ga N+ya te nA yaM b+ha ba tI b+hiHpa ri shra maH/_/i ti te na pri ya gi rA pA priSh+TA ta ma b+hASha ta/_/mA d+huR+Ya d+huR+Ya saun+daR+Ya bak+Sha pA ta
[\[112a.4\]]byas te/_/dal bu yis ni de la dris/_/ma ma su yi ched du ni/_/chu 'di 'bad nas len par byed/_/gang la gus pas khyed rnams ni/_/yongs su ngal 'di rtsi mi byed/_/de ltar tshig snyan gyis des dris/_/mdzes sdug snyan sgra ldan pa yis/_/phyogs su skad cig gis lhung ma/_/de
[\[112a.5\]]pa tI k+Sha NAta/_/mar+t+ya mo dA sa no dA ya sa dA su ra b+hi bA ri b+hiH/_/pi tuHkin+na rarA dzas+ya gi rA snA ti ma no ha rA/_/ta ye ti ka thi taM shru twA su d+hA sik+ta i bak+Sha NA ta/_/sa he ma kuM b+he bik+She bta da b+hi dz+nyAM gu lI
[\[112a.6\]]yis de la rab smras pa/_/mi yi ding dag bya'i slad/_/rtag tu dri bzang chu rnams kyis/_/mi 'am ci rgyal yab kyi bkas/_/yid 'phrog ma ni khrus byed do/_/zhes pa de yis brjod thos nas/_/skad cig bdud rtsis bran pa bzhin/_/de yi rtags mtshan sor gdub ni/_/gser gyi bum par de
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ya kaM/_/snA t+yAsta tasta da b+hi hA ri ma no ha rA yAH kuM b+hAt+pa pA ta ku tsa kuM b+ha yu geM gu lI yaM/_/ya s+yAM shu mata pra ti ma rat+na ma yU kha le khAHk+Shi sraM na kha k+Sha ta bi lA sa tu lA ma bsduH/_/mUr+t+taM
[\[112b.2\]]yis 'phangs/_/de nas sor gdub mngon par 'phrog byed de ni bum pa las/_/khrus byed yid 'phrog ma yi nu ma'i bum pa zung la lhung /_/gang gi gzugs brnyan zer ldan rin cen 'od zer ri mo yis/_/myur du sen mo 'debs pa'i rtse dga' dag dang mtshungs pa thob/_/de rjes
[\[112b.3\]]ta taHswa ma nu rA ga mi bA ka la y+Ya rat+nAM gu li ya ka ma naM ga ka thAn+ta raM gaM/_/sA kAn+ta mA ga ta ma be t+ya ku ta sta ye daM saM prap+ta mi t+ya ba da duts+tsha li te ba dA sI/_/ta tastA ma ba dad+dA sI
[\[112b.4\]]rin cen sor gdub lus med gtam dag nang song ba/_/rang gi rjes su chags pa gzugs can bzhin du brtags byas nas/_/bdag po 'ongs par shes te 'di ni khyod kyis gang las thob/_/ces pa de yis 'bangs mo la ni rangs pa bzhin du smras/_/de nas 'bangs mos de la
[\[112b.5\]]de bi puSh+ka ri NaMta Te/_/s+thi taHko pi yu bA kAn+taHpra t+yak+Sha i ba man+ma thaH/_/ni k+Ship+taM he ma kuM b+hesmini daM te nAM gu lI ya kaM/_/b+ha dza te yaM d+gar+b+haM pa yaHkuM ku ma kAn+ta tAM b+hA ba/_/i ti tad+ba tsa ni ta
[\[112b.6\]]smras/_/lha mo rdzing bu'i ngogs dag na/_/yid srubs mngon du gyur pa bzhin/_/dar bab mdzes pa 'ga' zhig mchis/_/gang mthu snying po can gyi chu/_/gur gum mdzes pa nyid bsten pa/_/sor gdub 'di ni de nyid kyis/_/gser gyi bum pa 'di ru 'phangs/_/zhes pa de yi tshig snyan
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]n+wI pri yaM shru twA ma no ha rA/_/nish+tsi t+ya da yi taM prAp+ta mA ni nA ya ta yai ba taM/_/ta yA gup+ta ta re n+yastaM kAn+ta mud+yA na man+di ri/_/ku mud+ba tI ba sha shi naM ga twA pa shan+ma no ha rA/_/pa ra spa ra
[\[113a.2\]]thos/_/gzugs bzang ldan pa'i yid 'phrog mas/_/khyo ni 'ongs par nges byas nas/_/de nyid de ni 'gugs su btang /_/de yis rab sbas skyed tshal gyi/_/khang par bkod pa'i mdzes pa ni/_/ku mud can gyi zla ba bzhin/_/yid 'phrog ma ni song bas mthong /_/phan tshun lta bar byed
[\[113a.3\]]lo ka na bi b+h+rame bA bi yo ga san+tA pa ni pe da ne na/_/ta yoHpra haR+ShA nu b+ha be na le b+he sho b+hA ma she ShAM ga ba tI ma naM gaH/_/yad+ya t+kiM tsit+paM ra ha sa ma ye tsin+ta yA b+h+yastamaM taR+Yad+Ya t+p+rau D+ha pra mo da su hr-i dA man+ma the
[\[113a.4\]]pa'i rnam 'phrul dang /_/'bral ba'i yongs gdung rnam par chad pa dang /_/de dag rab dga' nyams su myong gyur pa/_/lus mad yan lag kun ldan mdzes pa thob/_/bral ba'i dus su gang gang cung zad bsams pas nang du goms byas dang /_/gang gang rab dga' rab rgyas yid srubs
[\[113a.5\]]no pa diSh+TaM/_/yad+Yat+p+rem+laHdr-i sha mu tsi taM yad+Ya daut+su kya rA she stat+tat+sar+b+baM pra na ya su b+ha gaM dam+pa tI tsakran+tasto/_/ta taHprats+tshan+na br-it+tAn+taM ladz+dza mA na ma no ha rA/_/bi be d+yA daR+sha
[\[113a.6\]]grogs kyis nye bar bstan pa dang /_/gang gang mdza' bar mtshungs dang gang gang sred ldan phung por 'os gyur pa/_/de de thams cad mdza' gcugs skal bzang khyo shug de gnyis dag gis byas/_/de rjes spyod tshul bsgribs pa ni/_/ngo tsha ldan pa'i yid 'phrog mas/_/bshad nas pha ma dag
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]yat+pi troHpa tiM b+hU mi ma no b+ha baM/_/ta taHkin+na rA rA dzastAM ko pa pra s+phu ri tA d+ha raH/_/u bA tsa daR+sha na pa thi pa rihr-i t+yAt+ma dzA ba teH/_/a ho pra mA dA pa ti tA dai ba dA nu tsi te dza ne/_/na bi muny+tsa pi dur+b+r-it+te k+Sha l+ya mA
[\[113b.2\]]la ni/_/bdag po sa yi yid 'byung bstan/_/de nas mi'am ci yi rgyal/_/de la khros pas mchu bskyod cing /_/bu mo'i bdag ni mthong ba'i lam/_/yongs su btang nas rab smras pa/_/kye ma mi 'os skye bo la/_/cha yis bag med lhung gyur pa/_/spyod tshul ngan pa bkrus kyang ni/_/chags pa
[\[113b.3\]]nA pi rak+ta tAM/_/yau ba nA ba ni lA ba N+yaM spr-i ha NI yAM di bau ka sAM/_/ba ta pra yA ta ma tat+te mar+t+ya sne he na sho ts+ya tAM/_/u da gra go tro pra b+ha bA g+ha na yo ba na nir+b+ha rA/_/nim+na ge k+Sho b+ha bi b+h+raSh+TA yA tA si su ta rA ma
[\[113b.4\]]nyid ni khyod mi gtong /_/khyod kyi mdzes sdug lang tsho la/_/lha rnams kyis ni reg bya 'di/_/kye ma mi dang mdza' ba yis/_/mya ngan bya 'os nyid du gyur/_/mthon po'i rigs las skyes gyur cing /_/stug po'i lang tsho rab rgyas pa/_/thur 'gro 'khrugs pas rnam nyams pa/_/khyod ni shin tu 'og
[\[113b.5\]]d+haH/_/bid+ba dud+be ga dza na nI ku la bai lak+Sh+ya kA ri NI/_/ma li na kha la bi d+ye ba sam+ma tA pi na ka s+ya tsita/_/rU pa mA tre Na tuSh+TA tha ya di mar+t+ya ba shaM ga tA/_/tat+kin+na ra mat+sa he ma nir+m+ma Na pu ru Sha twi Sha/_/
[\[113b.6\]]tu 'gro/_/mkhas pa chags bral skyed byed cing /_/rigs ni skyengs par byed pa mo/_/mi bsrun rigs bzhin dri ma can/_/khyod ni su yang mi 'dod do/_/gzugs tsam gyis ni khyod tshim nas/_/gal te mi yi dbang gyur na/_/gser las sprul pa skyes bu yi/_/gzugs dang rtse dga' cis mi byed/_/
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pra b+hA ba gu Na hI nA s+ya puM sAMsh+tsa tu ta ra kr-i teH/_/A le khyA pu ru Sha s+yai ba saud+naR+YaM b+hit+ti raM dza naM/_/ba d+h+yo me twat+pa tiHpA pe hI na sam+ban+d+ha ladz+dza yA/_/mu khaM dr-iSh+TaM na shak+no mi twat+Yats+nyASh+Ta di bau ka
[\[114a.2\]]mthu dang yon tan gyis dman pa/_/skyes bu rab mdzes dbyibs can gyi/_/mdzes sdug ri mor bris pa yi/_/skyes bu yi bzhin rtsig pa mdzes/_/'brel dman ngo tshas sdig can ma/_/khyod khyo bdag gis gsad par bya/_/khyod slong la 'ongs lha rnams kyi/_/bzhin ni bdag gis lta
[\[114a.3\]]sAM/_/sa t+ya mut+pA hA yuk+ta s+ya ku la s+yon+na ti shA li naH/_/dza re bi ki la kA la ka n+yA saM ko tsa kA ri NAM/_/i ti bA b+har+t+si tA pi tA ta mu bA tsa na tA na nA/_/a sU tra hA raM kur+b+bA NAM ku tsa yorbASh+pa bin+du b+hiH/_/
[\[114a.4\]]mi phod/_/bden par spro ba dang ldan zhing /_/mthon por gyur pa'i rigs dag ni/_/bu mos 'khums par byed pa ste/_/dus ni nges par dga' bas bzhin/_/de skad pha yis smad gyur des/_/mchi ma'i thigs pa nu ma la/_/do shal skud med sgrig byed cing /_/bzhin btud de la rab smras pa/_/
[\[114a.5\]]ko pa da nu tsi taM tA ta nai tan+mAM bak+tu mar+ha si/_/na shrU yan+te pra b+hA pe na kin+na rAHkin+na rA d+hi kaH/_/ga ru Da s+yA pi durlaM g+h+ya mi mA mul+laM g+h+ya yaHk+Shi tiM/_/pra b+hA ba b+hU mi rA yA ti ma nu Sh+yaHsa ka tha b+ha beta/_/gu
[\[114a.6\]]yab lags khro bar mi 'os pa/_/de dag bdag la gsung 'os min/_/mthu yis mi'am ci dag las/_/lhag pa'i mi ma thos sam ci/_/mkha' lding gis kyang bgrod dka' ba/_/sa 'di gang gis bgrod gyur nas/_/'ongs pa mthu yi sa gzhi de/_/mi nyid yin par ci ltar 'gyur/_/lus
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]Na saM bA di nI mUr+t+tir+b+ha ba t+ya ya sha rI rA NAM/_/ka ro t+yA nan+da saMm+bA daM d+yu ti re ba hi ma twi ShaH/_/dzA t+yA kiM kr-i ya te tA ta swa b+hA bA nu gu NA gu NAH/_/pur+N+Nen+du ra mr-i ta s+yan+dI kA la kuT s+ya so da raH/_/b+ha
[\[114b.2\]]can rnams kyi lus dag ni/_/yon tan yang dag rjod byed nyid/_/bsil zer can gyi 'od zer ni/_/kun dga' skyed par byed pa yin/_/yab gcig rigs kyis ci zhig bya/_/yon tan rang bzhin rjes su 'brang /_/zla rgyas bdud rtsi zag pa ni/_/nag po brtsegs pa'i spun zla nyid/_/kha cig
[\[114b.3\]]baM t+yan+targu Na ke tsits+tshan+na do ShA sta thA pa re/_/a pa rI k+Sh+ya na kar+t+ta bya ma NI nAM mU l+ya laM g+ha nA/_/shru twai tat+kin+na ra pa tistat+ta the ti bi tsin+t+ya tsa/_/dzA mA ta raM sa mA hU ya gu Na dzi dz+nyA sa yA bra bIta/_/twa yA kaM
[\[114b.4\]]nang na yon tan ldan/_/de bzhin gzhan ni skyon bsgribs pas/_/nor bu rnams kyi rin dag ni/_/ma brtags 'gongs par yongs mi bya/_/de thos mi'am ci yi bdag_/de de bzhin zhes sems byed cing /_/mag pa yang dag bos nas ni/_/yon tan shes par 'dod pas smras/_/mi'am ci yi bu 'di
[\[114b.5\]]t+yA dzi tastA ba de te kin+na ra dA rA kAH/_/san+daR+shi ta pra b+hA bstu di bya sam+ban+d+ha mar+ha si/_/a byA ya taM sha ra ba NaM kr-i twod+d+h+r-i ta sha raM k+Sha NAta/_/byup+ta ma nu na muts+tshi t+ya pu narde hi ti lA D+ha kaM/_/san+daR+sha ya d+ha nurbe de dr-i D+ha lak+Sh+yA
[\[114b.6\]]dag_/re zhig khyod kyi mdzes pas btul/_/mthu ni yang dag bstan pa ni/_/mchog gi 'brel pa dag tu 'os/_/shin tu yangs pa sha ri'i nags/_/sha ra phyung byas skad cig gis/_/til bre gang btab mi nyung bar/_/rab tu bsdus la slar yang byin/_/brtan dang 'ben la sogs pa yi/_/gzhu yi
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]di kau sha laM/_/ta taHkIr+t+ti pa tA ke yaM ta ba yat+tA ma no ha rAH/_/i t+ya sha kye pi ko Ta l+yAt+p+re ri taste kar+m+ma Ni/_/sar+b+ba kAn+tA nu ra ge Na ku mA raHkar+t+tu mud+Ya yau/_/mi th+yA shra ma kle sha pha la pra
[\[115a.2\]]rig byed mkhas pa ston/_/de nas grags pa'i ba dan ni/_/yid 'phrog ma 'di khyod dbang gyur/_/zhes te de yis gya gyu las/_/'os pa min pa'i las la bskul/_/gzhon nu mdzes ma la chags pas/_/thams cad bya bar rab tu brtsams/_/don med ngal zhing nyon mongs 'bras/_/sha
[\[115a.3\]]br-it+taM sha ra pA Ta ne/_/ta bi dz+nyA ya sa ha srA k+ShaH pak+Sha pA tA da tsin+ta yata/_/kiM b+hA tra kalpi ko bo d+hi sa two yaM pAr+thI bAt+ma dzaH/_/ni yuk+taHkin+na ren+d+re Na nis+pha le kle sha kar+m+ma Ni/_/a s+yAsmin+sa ma yA yA se kAR+YaM sA hA
[\[115a.4\]]ra 'byin la rab zhugs pa/_/de shes mig stong ldan pa ni/_/phyogs su lhung bas yang dag bsams/_/ci slad bskal pa bzang po ba'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal sras 'di/_/'bras med nyon mongs las la ni/_/mi'am ci yi dbang gis bskos/_/'di yi ngal dub dus 'di la/_/bdag gis stong
[\[115a.5\]]ya kaM ma yA/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sha kro s+ya kar+m+ma niSh+pat+ti mA da d+he/_/sha ta kra tu mA diSh+TaiR+Yak+ShaiHshU ka ra rU pi b+hiH/_/ut+pA Ti te sha ra ba Ne ba me byup+ti ti lA D+ha ke/_/e kI kr-i taM sa muts+tsi t+ya sha kra sr-iSh+TaiHpi pI li
[\[115a.6\]]grogs rab tu bya/_/de ltar bsams nas brgya byin gyis/_/de yi las ni rdzogs byas te/_/mchod sbyin brgya pas bstan pa yi/_/gnod sbyin phag gi gzugs can gyis/_/sha ra'i nags ni rab byung ba/_/mnyam par til ni bre gang btab/_/brgya byin gyis spros grog sbur gyis/_/yang dag bsdus nas gcig tu
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]kaiH/_/ku mA raHkin+na ren ya bismi tA ya n+ya be da yata/_/sa sap+ta ka na ka staM b+hAn+sap+tap+tA lAn+ba lordzi ti/_/shU ka rI tsakra saM yuk+tAn bid+d+hA ni shi ta pat+t+ri NA/_/shAs+t+rAs+t+ra bi kra ma ka lA shilpa shak+ti ma daR+sha yata/_/ya yA pA pe turmu ku
[\[115b.2\]]byas/_/mi'am ci yi dbang po la/_/ya mtshan slad du gzhon nus phul/_/stobs rgyas de yi gser gyi ni/_/ka ba 'dun dang ta la bdun/_/phag gi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/_/sgro ldan shin tu rno bas phug_/gang gis de yi cod pan la/_/lha yi me tog char 'thob pa/_/bstan bcos mtshon dang rtsal dang
[\[115b.3\]]Te di byaHku su ma br-iSh+Ta yaH/_/bi smi to pi pra b+hA be na ta s+ya kin+na ra b+hu ba tiH/_/pu nastad+ba nA yai pa tAM tA tA yuk+ti ma tsin+ta yata/_/da d+ha ti bi pu sh+tsaR+Ye mau naM ha pan+ti pa tAMstu tau ma li na ba da nAHkIr+t+yut+kaR+Shabra dzan+ti
[\[115b.4\]]ni/_/sgyu rtsal bzo dang stobs rnams bstan/_/mi'am ci yi rgyal po ni/_/de mthus ya mtshan gyur mod kyang /_/de nyid bslu ba'i slad du slar/_/rig pa de de sems par byed/_/mngon par zhen pa shin tu brtan ldan gzhan gyi gnod pas chu bzhin 'khrug_/yon tan brgya phrag gis kyang mi mgu shin tu
[\[115b.5\]]bi bA di tAM/_/a pi gu Na sha tairnA rA d+h+yan+to bi rud+d+ha d+hi yaHpa raM pa ra pa ri b+ha bak+Sho b+hAM b+ha sa s+thi rA b+hi ni be shi naH/_/pa ta mU tse pra b+hA po yaM di byaHpra ka Ti tas+t+wa yA/_/pra dz+nyA pra kaR+Sha ma d+hu nA san+daR+sha yi tu
[\[115b.6\]]'gal ba'i blo can rnams/_/rgya che mtshar la smra bcad 'dzin cing dam pa bstod la dgod par byed/_/grags pa mchog la bzhin dag log cing 'gal ba brjod pa nyid du gyur/_/de la des smras khyod kyis ni/_/lha yi mthu 'di gsal bar byas/_/da ni shes rab khyad 'phags dag_/khyod kyis yang dag
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]mar+ha si/_/a b+hin+na bar+N+Na rU pA NAM tu l+yA b+ha ra Na ba ya pA/_/kin+na rI NAM s+thi tAM ma d+h+ye gr-i hA Na ni dza bal+la b+haM/_/i t+yuk+taste na sa pu naHkin+na rI sha ta pany+tsa kaM/_/tu l+ya bar+N+Na ba yau be shaM da daR+shA bya gra ma gra
[\[116a.2\]]bstan par 'os/_/gzugs dang kha dog dbyer med cing /_/rgyan dang na tshod mtshungs gyur pa/_/mi 'am ci mo 'khod pa yi/_/dbus nas rang gi dga' ma zungs/_/zhes pa brjod nas de yis slar/_/mi'am ci mo lnga brgya dag_/rdzogs pa kha dog lang tsho dang /_/chas mtshungs mdun du de yis
[\[116a.3\]]taH/_/tA sAm+ma d+h+ye pa ri dz+nyA yaM sa dza grA ha ma no ha rAM/_/bal+larI ba na saM ts+tshan+nAM b+h+r-i gash+tsU ta la tA mi ba/_/de bo ya mi ti nish+tsi t+ya ta tastaM kin+na re shwa raH/_/tuSh+Tastasmai da dau ni bya rat+naiHsa ha ma no ha rAM/_/sh+la
[\[116a.4\]]mthong /_/de dag dbus nas yid 'phrog ma/_/de yis yongs su shes nas bzung /_/'khri shing nags kyis bsgribs pa yi/_/tsU ta'i 'khri shing bung bas bzhin/_/de nas mi'am ci dbang gis/_/'di ni lha zhes nges byas nas/_/tshim pas de la yid 'phrog ma/_/lha yi rin cen dang bcas byin/_/mchog
[\[116a.5\]]g+h+yo pa b+ho ga bi b+ha baiHpU dzi taste na mA da raM/_/dzA yA sa ha sta mA man+t+r+Ya ku mA raHswa pu ri ya yau/_/ma no ha rA gra gaM prAp+ta pu tra mA lo kya b+hU pa tiH/_/nA gen+d+ra daR+sha nod+d+hU taHsu d+hAm+bu b+hi ri bA bab+hau/_/pu traM
[\[116a.6\]]gi longs spyod 'byor pa yis/_/gus dang bcas pas de yis mchod/_/de la zhus nas chung mar bcas/_/gzhon nu rang gi grong khyer song /_/yid 'phrog ma sngon 'gro ba'i bu/_/'ong ba mthong nas sa yi bdag_/bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshos glang po'i dbang /_/mthong nas 'phyur bzhin rnam par mdzes/_/de nas rgyal
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ta tash+tsa ri ta tsan+d+ra si tA ta pat+te rA dz+ye b+hi Shi ts+ya pa ri tA pa ha raM pra dzA nAM/_/san+to Sha shI ta la bi be ka su d+hA b+hi ra maM ts+tsha yA ma se ba ta nr-i paHpra sha ma dru ma s+yaH/_/prAp+tA b+hi She kaM su d+ha naM
[\[116b.2\]]srid spyod tshul zla ba'i gdugs dkar ldan pa la/_/skye rgu'i gdung ba 'phrog pa'i bu ni mngon par dbang bskur nas/_/chog shes bsil ldan dben pa'i bdud rtsis mngon par dga' ba yis/_/rab tu zhi ba ldan pa'i grib bsil mi yi bdag pos bstan/_/nor bzang dbang bskur thob
[\[116b.3\]]pra b+hU te taM sap+ta rat+nA ni pr-i thu pra tA baM/_/na ba pra b+hA ba pra b+hu tA ba b+hI t+yA se bA ni pa sAr+tha mi bo pa dza g+muH/_/sa bo d+hi satwaHsu d+ha no ha me pa ya sho d+ha rA sA pi ma no ha rA b+hUta/_/tad+bi pra yo ga bya sa
[\[116b.4\]]pa'i snga dro nyid/_/gzi byin rgya che de la rin cen bdun/_/gtso bo nyid gyur gsar pa'i mthus 'jigs nas/_/g.yog la gnas pa'i don bzhin nye bar 'ongs/_/nor bzang byang chub sems de nga nyid de/_/yid 'phrog mar gyur de yang grags 'dzin ma/_/de dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal
[\[116b.5\]]nA na lAr+t+tiHkA mA nu ban+d+h+ya dA ya ti ma yAp+tA/_/tasmAt+kA maHka ma la ba da nA ne tra paR+Yan+ta bA sI brdzaHsad b+hiHsha ma mr-i ga pa d+hU ban+d+ha ke liHki rA traH/_/s+phu dzAt+puSh+pa pra pa ba dza ra dzaHpuny+dza hA lA ha lA grairlo
[\[116b.6\]]mes gdungs pa/_/'di snyed 'dod pas bcings las bdag gis thob/_/de slad 'dod pa pad+mo'i bzhin gyi mig gi mtha' la gnas gyur cing /_/rab rgyas me tog las skyes rdul tshogs hA la hA la'i rtse mo can/_/rmongs byed mya ngan gdung ba'i mda' yis gang gi 'jig rten 'bigs byed
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]kaHsha ka bya pa na bi shi khermo naiR+Ya na bid+b+haH/_/i ti b+hik+Shu ga Na swa yaM dzi ne naswa ka thAM tAM bi ni bai di taM ni sha mya/_/sa ra paM pr-i thu mU la me ba me ne sha ta shA khA s+ya ma no b+ha baM b+ha s+ya/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra
[\[117a.2\]]pa/_/rngon pa'i rtse dgas zhi ba'i ri dgas 'ching byed dam pa rnams kyis spangs/_/de nas rgyal ba rang gis rang gi gtam/_/bshad pa de ni dge slong tshogs kyis thos/_/'dod pa ro ldan kho na srid pa ni/_/'dab brgya'i rtsa ba sbom po nyid du nges/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
[\[117a.3\]]bi ra tsa tA yaM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yaM su d+ha na kin+naR+Ya ba dA na tsa tuHShaSh+TaM ta maHpal+la waH//_//prAg+dzan+mA b+h+yA sa lI nA da ti sa ra sa sa sad+bA pa nA mU la she ShAn+niHshaM ka s+ya pi dza noHka ma
[\[117a.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nor bzang gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//longs spyod rtse dga' dag gi dri yi tshogs kyis dbang po thams cad yongs su drangs gyur pa/_/chags ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs
[\[117a.5\]]la ka la na yA dzA ya te mA na se smin/_/rA gaHpaM b+ho ga lI lA pa ri ma la pa Ta la kr-iSh+Ta sar+b+ben+d+ri yA NAM ma trai bA a ti mA traM pa ra pa ma d+hu li haM ban+d+ha naM yaHka ro ti/_/n+ya gro d+hA rA ma ni ra taM pu ra shAkya
[\[117a.6\]]rnams shin tu dam par 'di nyid du ni gang gang 'ching byed pa/_/skye ba sngar goms zhen cing shin tu chags bcas las byung bag chags rtsa ba'i lhag ma las/_/dogs pa med kyang skye bo'i yid 'dir pad+mo'i rjes su mthun pa'i 'dod chags 'byung bar 'gyur/_/shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon/_/n+ya gro d+ha
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]pu re dzi ni/_/b+ha ga ban+taM sa mu pan+nAHpa prats+tshur+b+hik+Sha baHsu naH/_/pra br-it+ta shAn+tiM pa ri br-it+ta be shi ni br-it+ta saM sA raM bi kA ra br-it+taM/_/an+taHpu raM twaM nr-i pa terbi shan+tam ya sho d+ha rA b+hIk+Sh+ya bi mu h+ya tI
[\[117b.2\]]yi kun rar gnas/_/rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das la slar/_/dge slong yang dag tshogs pas zhus/_/zhi bar zhugs shing chas ni yongs su bsgyur/_/'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur spyod las zlog pa khyod/_/mi yi bdag po'i pho brang 'khor 'jug pa/_/grags 'dzin mas mthong rnam par rmongs pa
[\[117b.3\]]ba/_/twad+daR+sha ne tiSh+Tha ti sar+b+ba thai ba bi b+hU Shi tA kAm+pa ta raM gi tAM gI/_/b+ho gyA d+hi bA se b+ha ba taHka ro ti bi lo b+ha naM mo da ka pA tra hastA/_/nA d+yA bi shAn+ti mu pai ti ta s+ya ma no bi kA raHsa ba hu pra kA raH/_/twa dA na
[\[117b.4\]]bzhin/_/khyod mthong nyid na kun du brgyan byas shing /_/'dar zhing g.yo ba'i lus ldan rnam par gnas/_/lag na la du'i snod bzung khyod kyis ni/_/zas kyi lhag gnas dag la chags par byed/_/de yi yid kyi rnam 'gyur rnam mang ldan/_/da lta yang ni nye bar zhi mi 'gyur/_/khyod zhal zla 'od bral
[\[117b.5\]]nin+du d+yu ti bi pra puk+tA sI dA t+ya laM sAh+ni ku mud+ba tI ba/_/i ti bismi ta b+hik+Shu ga Ne na pr-iSh+TaHkiM tsita smi te nA d+ha ra pal+la ba s+yA/_/pra t+yug+hA pha la bi dru mA b+haM bi be sh+ya sho b+hAM b+ha ga bAn ba b+hA She/_/ya sho d+ha rA d+ye ba bi kA ri yuk+tAM bi b+har+t+ti nai
[\[117b.6\]]na shin tu de/_/nyams de nyin par ku mud ldan pa bzhin/_/de skad mtshar las dge slong tshogs kyis dris/_/cung zad 'dzum pa mchu yi yal 'dab la/_/mu tig 'bras bu rab spras byu ru'i 'od/_/mdzes ma 'god cing bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/_/mngon 'dod rtse dga' rnam 'gyur ldan pa 'di/_/grags
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ta ma b+hi lA Sha lI lAM/_/dzan+mAn+ta re pi sma ra bi b+h+ra mairme sA mo da kairlo b+ha ban me ba tsakre/_/kA sh+ya paHpu rA kA shi pu ri na ren+t+ra sh+tsan+d+rA ba dA ta d+yu ti kIrtI rA sIta/_/a s+yaM ku shaHsha tru ma da dwi pA nAM ma tIk+Sh+Na br-it+taHpa ra la swa
[\[118a.2\]]'dzin ma ni ding nyid 'dzin pa min/_/skye gzhan la yang 'dod pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis/_/de yi la dus bdag la chags par byas/_/ka shi'i grong du mi dbang kA sh+ya sngon/_/zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i grags pa can/_/dgra myos gnyis 'thung lcags kyu yin mod kyang /_/spyod tshul mi rno rang bzhin drang
[\[118a.3\]]b+hA baH/_/pu tror+thi na sta s+ya ta paHpra yat+nai re kai ba ka n+yA na li nI ba b+hU ba/_/prA ya pra dzA pA la na sA ba le pAHswalpA n+wa ya e ba b+ha ban+ti b+hU pAH/_/an+taHpu re tAM pa ri war+d+ha mA nAM tsit+ta tsa tsin+tAM nr-i pa ti bi tsAr+ya/_/A hU
[\[118a.4\]]por gyur/_/dka' thub 'bad pas bu don gnyer de la/_/bu mo pad+ma ldan nyid gcig pu byung /_/skye rgu skyong la g.yel ba dang bcas pa'i/_/sa bdag phal cher rigs brgyud nyung bar 'gyur/_/pho brang 'khor du de ni yongs bskyed cing /_/sems 'bad bsams pa'o mi bdag gis spyad nas/_/mkhas pa
[\[118a.5\]]ya bid+bat+p+ra mu khA na mA t+yAnra pra dzA ga ra gasta ra tirdza ga da/_/bi stIr+N+Na shA khaM s+thi ra bad+d+ha mU la mat+yun+na traM sar+b+ba dza no pa dzI byaM/_/a the mi tu l+ya pra sa bA ba hI naM g+hu Na k+Sha taM br-ik+Sha mi bA d+hi ba t+t+yaM/_/e kai ba ka n+yA na li nI ma
[\[118a.6\]]la sogs blon po bos nas ni/_/gnyid bral dga' ba nyams pas rab smras pa/_/lo 'dab rgyas shing rtsa ba brtan par zug_/skye bo kun gyi nyer 'tsho shin tu mtho/_/mtshungs par skye bas dman pa'i rgyal srid ni/_/srin bus zos pa'i shing bzhin bdag gis rig_/lang tsho rab tu sbyin 'os bsten pa
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]mAsti ba yaHpra dA no tsi ta mA shra yan+ti/_/ta byAM pra yat+ne ne ba rAt+pi tA yA ma pa t+ya tA taM pra Na yo pi dU re/_/pA Nau pra dIp+ta mi ba dI brtiM d+hartuM na shak+no ti dza na swa ka n+yA/_/n+ya pAr+tha tu l+yA pa rAr+pa NI yA tsin+tA pha lA e ba ku la s+ya
[\[118b.2\]]yis/_/bu mo pad ldan gcig pu bdag la yod/_/de ni 'bad pas mag pa la byin tshe/_/bu tsha nyid dang de la byams pa'ang ring /_/lag par sgron me'i sdong bu rab 'bar bzhin/_/skye bos rang gi bu mo bzung mi nus/_/gtams pa'i nor bzhin gzhan la gtad bya ba/_/rigs kyi bu mo bsam pa'i
[\[118b.3\]]ka n+yA/_/na b+h+r-it+ya de yA na tsa pau ra yo gyA dU ro tsi tA e ba na ren+d+ra ka n+yA/_/a dz+nyA ta mi t+ya bA tsi ta s+ya dU ra mr-i ta s+ya yA ta s+ya tsa ko ni she ShaH/_/tasmAt+p+ra yat+ne na ma ma sa kash+tsidz+dzA mA twa b+hA be gu Ne bAn+bi yo dz+yaH/_/swa de sha mut+s+r-i dz+ya ma
[\[118b.4\]]'bras bu nyid/_/g.yog la sbyin min grong pa la 'os min/_/mi dbang bu mo ring po nyid la 'os/_/de ltar kun spyad ring po mi shes pas/_/shi dang song ba dag la bye brag ci/_/de slad gang zhig bu dngos bdag nyid can/_/rang yul rab spangs bdag gi yul 'dzin pa/_/bdag gi mag pa'i dngos
[\[118b.5\]]mai ba de she bi b+har+t+ti yaHpu tra bA d+hi pa t+yaM/_/shru tam+ma yA dzah+nu su tA pra bA ha pu N+yA pa dA te pu li no pa kaN+The/_/sa hAny+dza lI nAm+ni ta po ba nAn+ti rA dzaR+Shi rAste ki la kA sh+ya sA khyaH/_/ta s+ya ts+yu taM pra shra ba Ne na bIR+Ya de bo da yA
[\[118b.6\]]gyur 'ga' zhig de/_/yon tan ldan pa 'bad pas btsal bar bya/_/bdag gis thos pa gang+gA dag gi rgyun/_/bsod nams dag pa'i ngogs dang nye ba na/_/snyim par bcas na dka' thub nags mthar ni/_/rgyal po'i drang srong kA sh+ya pa gnas lo/_/de yi sa bon lci bas lhung gyur pa/_/lha yis bskyed
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]dash+ma ni san+ni tA gre/_/to y-isbra hAr+t+ta ha ri NI ni bI ya su bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra be ku mA raM/_/bai na mr-i gAsta su bi bad+d+hi to sau pi trA gr-i hi to bi hi ta bra tash+tsa/_/nA m+nA pra sid+d+haHshi shu re ka shrid+gaH
[\[119a.2\]]las rdo steng dma' bar chags/_/chu 'dod kyis gzir ri dgas mo yis 'thungs/_/gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu btsas par gyur/_/de yi phas bzung nags su ri dgas de/_/rnam par bskyed cing brtul zhugs dag kyang bsgrubs/_/sor tshad rwa yis yang dag mtshan gyur pas/_/
[\[119a.3\]]saM lak+Sh+ya mA nAM gu la mA tro shrid+gaH/_/yU bA tsa tur+d+h+ya na pa rA ya Nash+tsa sa brah+ma tsa rI bi ma la swa b+hA ba/_/niH saM ga bA pa bi Sha yA na b+hi dz+nyAsta trA ka tho rAr+ts+tsa tu tsish+tsa kAstaM/_/sA tsan+ni li n+yAHpa te tA mu pai ti ta de Sha baM shaHpra
[\[119a.4\]]byis pa rwa gcig pa zhes ming du grags/_/dar bab bsam gtan bzhi po skyong byed cing /_/tshangs spyod dang bcas dri med rang bzhin can/_/yul ni mngon par mi shes grogs med gnas/_/der ni drag po'i nyi 'od lta bur mdzes/_/de ni gal te pad ldan khyod nyid du/_/gyur nas rgyud ni rab tu
[\[119a.5\]]sha maM na yA ti/_/te dzo ni d+he rA na ya ne tu ta s+ya bi tsin+t+ya tAM kA s+ya na bA ya yuk+tiH/_/shru twe ti bA kyaM nr-i pa te ra mA t+yA bi tsAR+Ya sar+b+ba su tsi rAt+ta mU tsUH/_/ta dA shra mo pAn+ta ba ne bi hartuM bi sr-i dz+ya tAM saM pra ti dzA dza pu trA/_/tad+bA kya lab+d+hA nu
[\[119a.6\]]zhi mi 'gyur/_/gzi brjid gter de rab tu 'gugs pa yis/_/gnod med rigs pa ci yang bsam par mdzod/_/ces pa mi bdag tshig thos yun ring du/_/dpyad nas blon po kun gyis de la smras/_/da ni de yi bsti gnas nye ba yi/_/nags su rgyal po'i bu mo rtse ru thong /_/de tshig rjes su 'dod byas
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ma te na rA dz+nyA sA hi tAr+thi bi ni bi d+ya sar+b+baM/_/ya yau bi sr-iSh+TA na li nI bi har+t+tuM har+t+tuM pra gal+b+he ba mu neHku mA raH/_/kAn+tA ba nAn+taM sha na kai ra bA s+yaM lI lA b+hi rA mA bi dza hA ra ta n+wI/_/bA lA ni le nA ka li tA la te
[\[119b.2\]]rgyal po yis/_/'dod pa'i don kun rnam par bshad nas ni/_/pad+mo can bsrings rab tu spobs pa bzhin/_/thub pa'i gzhon nu dbrog phyir rtse ru song /_/mdzes mas nags kyi mthar ni dal gyis phyin/_/gzugs bzang rtsed 'jos mngon par dga' bas rol/_/mdzes pa'i mig can de ni rlung gzhon
[\[119b.3\]]ba saM tsA ri NI tsA ru bi lo tsa nA pA/_/bi lA sa puSh+pA ba tsa ye na ta s+ya shriM got+ta raM sham+bi tsa lat+ku raM gaM/_/ba na bi lo kya swa ta po ba nAt+sa mA ya yau kau tu kabAn+ku mA raH/_/sa san+na tAM gi ma ma nu Sh+ya paM gasta raM gI tA yau
[\[119b.4\]]gyis/_/bskyod pa'i 'khri shing bzhin du yang dag rgyu/_/de ni rol cing me tog 'thu ba yis/_/ri dgas rwa rab g.yo zhing rnam bskyod pa'i/_/nags mthong rang gi dka' thub nags tshal nas/_/dge mtshan ldan pa'i gzhon nus yang dag 'ongs/_/mi yi grogs med pad+ma ltar yangs mig_/ya mtshan mig ni
[\[119b.5\]]ba na bi b+h+ra me Na/_/da daR+sha tAM biSh+ma ya nir+m+ma me baHpul+lot+pa lak+ShIM ka ma lA ya tA k+ShaH/_/bi lo kya kAn+tAM mr-i ga lo tsa nAM tAM rA mA na b+hi dz+nye bi mu nirdza haR+Sha/_/na bAs nA b+h+yA pa ni lI na man+ta dza hA ti dzaM turbi Sha yA b+hi
[\[119b.6\]]'dzum dang bral ba des/_/lang tsho'i rnam 'phrul gyis g.yo lus btud cing /_/ut+pal rgyas pa'i mig can de mthong gyur/_/mdzes ma ri dgas mig can de mthong nas/_/dga' ma mngon shes med kyang thub pa dga'/_/bag chags goms pas nang du zhen pa yi/_/yul la mngon 'dod skye bos
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]lA ShaM/_/su snig+na mug+d+hAM bi ni ba sh+ya dr-iSh+Ti mr-i gI su ta stad+ba da nA ra bin+de/_/bi d+yA d+ha raM bA mu ni bu tra kaM bA bi dz+nyA ya tAM brI ti ba sAd+ba ban+de/_/ya ti pra NA mA ba na tA na nA yAsta s+yAHpra bA la d+yu ti nA d+ha re Na/_/Ats+tshA
[\[120a.2\]]gtong ma yin/_/ri dgas bu yi rab mdzes yid 'ong mig_/de yi bzhin gyi pad+mar rnam bkod nas/_/rig 'dzin nam ni thub pa'i bu dag tu/_/shes nas mdza' ba'i dbang gis der phyag 'tshal/_/sdom brtson gyis btud bzhin ras dud gyur pa/_/de yi mchu ni byu ru'i 'od ldan gyis/_/'od
[\[120a.3\]]d+ya mA noM shu ba ne na rA gaM dzagrA ha hA ro s+ya ma la swa b+hA baH/_/tAM swe da sha sI dat+ti la kAn+ta kAn+tA mut+kam+bi tAM gI ma ba dat+ku mA raH/_/sa khau kaM byA ma d+hu ra swa re Na sma ro pa tsA re Shu kr-i to pa de shAM/_/b+ho swA ga taM
[\[120a.4\]]zer tshogs kyis kun bsgribs do shal dag_/dri med rang bzhin gyis kyang chags pa bzung /_/dril chung sgra snyan dag gis grogs kyi bzhin/_/'dod pa'i nye bar spyod pa gdams byas pa/_/rngul zags thig le dag gis mthar mdzes shing /_/rab 'dar lus can de la gzhon nus smras/_/kwa ye thub pa'i
[\[120a.5\]]te mu ni pu tra kash+tsit+ta po ba nAn+te ku sha laM mr-i gA nAM/_/pa dA twa dA lo ke na nish+tsa lAM s+tha lAM Shu ye ShAM bi ra laHpra tsA raH/_/i daM bi lo kyA d+ya ta bA na ba d+yaM di bya pra ta s+yA mr-i ta baR+ShirU paM/_/ba purdza TA balka li nAM mu nI nAM
