[\[120a.6\]]sras khyed legs 'ongs sam/_/dka' thub nags mthar ri dgas dge'am ci/_/rtag tu khyod la lta zhing g.yo med pa/_/gang dag rnams ni thang la dman par rgyu/_/brtul zhugs mchog ldan khyod gzugs bdud rtsi'i char/_/kha na ma tho med pa 'di mthong ba'i/_/ral pa shing shun ldan pa thub rnams kyi/_/lus
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]shuSh+ka dru mA NA mi ba ta ts+tsha yA mi/_/a yan+ta ba snig+d+ha dza TA ka lA baHkr-i to pa kA raHku su mairla tA b+hiH/_/na bA b+ha saM b+hA ra bi dzriM b+ha mA Na kAn+ta ma yU ra pra ti b+hA bi b+har+t+ti/_/i dam ta ba shrI pha la yug+ma sho b+hi bak+Sho bi ni k+Ship+ta pa
[\[120b.2\]]ni shing skam bzhin du bdag rtog go/_/'khri shing me tog rnams kyis spras byas pa/_/khyod kyi ral pa'i tshogs ni mdzes pa 'di/_/sprin gser tshogs la rnam par gdengs pa yi/_/rma bya'i mjug ma'i mdzes sdug rnam par 'dzin/_/khyod kyi brang 'di dpal 'bras zung gis spras/_/bgrang 'phreng dkar po
[\[120b.3\]]tA k+Sha sU traM/_/a sU tra yan+d+ho la ku raM ga ne tra bai tsi trA mai tsi tri ma na sash+tsa kAsti/_/ho mag+ni la ga na s+pha Ta bi s+phu li gA mo dzI da d+ha na na ba pal+la bAM gAM/_/ku tU ha laM bA la la te ba ta n+wI ta nusta be yaM na ta no ti
[\[120b.4\]]dag gis rnam par bcings/_/ri dgas gzhon nu'i mig ltar bkra ba yis/_/yid la dga' ba skyed byed rnam par mdzes/_/sbyin sreg me yi me stag gsal chags pa'i/_/ske rags 'dzin cing lus phra 'khri shing gzhon/_/yal 'dab gsar pas mtshan 'dra khyod kyi lus/_/'di ni su yi dge mtshan
[\[120b.5\]]ka s+ya/_/shrU hi pra san+na kwa ta po ba nAn+te twat+pA da bi d+ho pa bi kA shi nI b+hiH/_/ya tra pra b+hA b+hiHsa ta taM bi b+hA ti saM tsA ri NI paM ka dzi nI s+tha li Shu/_/la lA nA na b+hi dz+nya nA na b+hi dz+nyaM mr-i ga swa b+hA baM ta ma bai t+ya bA lA/_/ut+s+r-i
[\[120b.6\]]rgyas mi byed/_/tha dag gang du g.yo ldan 'dab skyes ni/_/khyod zhabs bkod pas rnam par gsal byas pa/_/'od kyis rtag tu rnam par mdzes pa yi/_/dka' thub nags mtha' gang yin dang bas smros/_/ri dgas rang bzhin thub pa'i gzhon nu ni/_/bud med mi shes de rig bu mo yis/_/ngo tsha rab
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]dz+ya ladz+dza ma bi shaM ka mA nA niR+Yan+t+ra lI lA b+ha ra Na ba b+hU ba/_/ta tasta mA nan+da ra sAd+d+ra tsit+taM sha nai ba b+hA Shai mr-i du b+hA Shi NI sa/_/ta po ba na s+yA sa mI pa bar+t+ti ma mA shra ma swa du pha la pra sU naH/_/uk+t+we te
[\[121a.2\]]btang rnam par dogs med pa/_/ma bsdams rtse dga' dag ni rgyan bzhin gyur/_/de nas kun dga'i ros brlan sems ldan der/_/'jam par smra byed de yis dal gyi smras/_/bdag gi bsti gnas 'bras zhim me tog can/_/dka' thub nags tshal 'di dang nye bar gnas/_/zhes brjod ka
[\[121a.3\]]khaN+Di smi ta mo da kaiHsA ta s+yA tha karbU ra sa ra ga gar+b+haiH/_/tsa kA ra mA paR+Ya tsa mat+k+r-i yAr+haurbi lo b+ha naM sat+ka Ti sUk+ta tu l+yaiH/_/un+mA da keHsA rA sa nA nu kU lesh+tsit+tat+pa baiHpre ma ma yaurbi lA seH/_/bar+N+NA mr-i tesh+tsa pra Na
[\[121a.4\]]ra'i 'dzum dang ga bur gyis/_/nang tshangs ldan zhing yid 'ong ya mtshan ngos/_/la du mkhas pa'i legs bshad mtshungs pa yi/_/de yis de ni rnam par chags par byas/_/de yi myos byed ro 'dzin rjes mthun pa/_/sems dga' mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rtse dga' dang /_/bsngags pa bdud rtsi gus
[\[121a.5\]]yok+ti ban+d+haistam+bA gu ra bAR+Ya mr-i ga dza hA raH/_/ta po ba nan+daR+sha ya me ma hAr+ha mi t+yul+la yan+taM b+hu dza bal+la ri b+h+yAM/_/gA D+ha pa raM g+ha dz+ya ni mI li tA k+Sha me hI ti taM rA dza su tA dza gA da/_/ti pra s+thi taM sA ka ti
[\[121a.6\]]mchod 'ching ba yis/_/'phags pa'i ri dgas de ni rgyas bzhin bcings/_/cher 'os dka' thub nags tshal bdag la ston/_/zhes brjod mig zum de la rgyal po yi/_/bu mos lag pa'i 'khri shing dag gis ni/_/dam du yongs 'khyud tshur shog ces pa smra/_/chas shing cung zad rkang gis song
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]tsit+pa dA ni ga twA pu nastad+ga ma nA ya madz+dzaM/_/ra thaM sa mA ru h+ya bi sAR+Ya pA Ni mA ro ha NA yai ba gi rA n+ya yuk+taM/_/ra the tu raM gAn sa bi lo kya yuk+tan+ma twA ku raM gAn+pi ga lad+bi she ShaH/_/mr-i gI du to haM na mr-i gA gra me baspr-i shA mi bat+b+hA
[\[121b.2\]]de la/_/slar yang de bgrod slad du bstar byas pa'i/_/shing rta la zhon lag pa brkyangs nas des/_/bzhon pa nyid ni tshig gis rab tu bskos/_/shing rta 'dren pa'i rta dag des mthong nas/_/bye brag ma rtogs ri dgas yin par shes/_/ri dgas bu bdag ri dgas steng du ni/_/rkang pas mi reg ces
[\[121b.3\]]mi ti tA mu bA tsa/_/ra the na ga twA tha ma no dza be na mu nIn+d+ra sU nuM ma na sA ba han+tI/_/nr-i pa s+ya ka n+yA swa pu rI ma bA s+ya n+ya pa da yat+tAts+tsa ri taM nr-i pA ya/_/rA dzA pi ta s+yA ga ma ne pa yat+nA da tsin+ta yan+man+t+ra b+hi ra b+h+yu pA yaM/_/
[\[121b.4\]]pa de la smras/_/de nas yid kyis thub dbang bu 'dzin cing /_/shing rta yid ltar mgyogs pas song nas ni/_/mi bdag bu mo rang gi grong khyer phyin/_/de yi spyod pa mi yis bdag la bshad/_/stobs kyis rab sbyar dgug pa'i mngon sbyor la/_/me mtshungs drang srong chen pos 'jigs gyur pa/_/
[\[121b.5\]]ha tha pra yuk+t+yA ha ra NA b+hi yo ge pI taHkr-i shA nu pra ti mAn+ma haR+ShaH/_/ta taHku mA rA ya tsa ne pu nastAM bi lA saHbal+lI bi pa sar+dz+dza rA dzA/_/nau b+hir+g+haT+TA ban+d+ha kr-i ta shra mA b+hirman+dA ki ni kU la ta po ba nAn+taM/_/a trAM
[\[121b.6\]]rgyal po blon dang bcas pas de 'ong la/_/rab tu 'bad pas thabs naM mngon par bsams/_/de nas slar yang gzhon nu 'gugs pa la/_/gru yi tshogs bltams bcings shing ngal byas pas/_/gang gA'i ngogs kyi dka' thub nags kyi mthar/_/rtse dga'i 'khri shing de ni rgyal pos gtang /_/skabs
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]ta re t+yak+ta sa map+ta kr-i t+ya nr-i pAt+ma dzA d+h+yA na ni bad+d+ha mau naM/_/na bA b+hi lA Sha bra ta mA ka la s+ya pu traM mu nir+pi sma ya nish+tsa lo b+hU ta/_/briSh+To tha pi trA mu ni pu tra kastaM pro bA tsa ni shwA sa pa raM pa rA b+hAH/_/sa mI
[\[122a.2\]]der bu ni bya ba mtha' dag btang /_/mi bdag bu mo'i bsam gtan smra bcad bcings/_/mngon 'dod gsar pa'i brtul zhugs ldan rtogs nas/_/thub pa dag ni ya mtshan g.yo med gyur/_/de nas phas dris de la thub sras kyis/_/shugs rings rgyud ma dag gi bsti gnas dang /_/nyer gnas
[\[122a.3\]]pa bak+tA shra ma many+dza rI NaM di shan+mu hu bal+la ba lA s+ya lI lA/_/ta po ba ne tA ta ma yA d+ya dr-iSh+TaHbra mr-iSh+Ta tsan+d+ra pra ti bim+ba bak+t+raH/_/ma haR+Shi sU nurna ya na pra b+hA b+hirdar+pA sa hA rI ha ri NAM ga nA nAM/_/bak+Sh+yaHka TI pA Ni ga lA ba sak+ta bi tsi tra sU trA
[\[122a.4\]]snye ma'i yal 'dab yang yang du/_/sgeg cing rol pa bskyed cing rab smras pa/_/yab gcig dka' thub nags su ding bdag gis/_/zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rab tu phyis pa'i zhal/_/drang srong che sras 'dren byed 'od dag gis/_/ri dgas bu mo'i dregs pa 'phrog pa mthong /_/de yi snying ga rkang lag
[\[122a.5\]]Ni b+ha ban+ti ta s+ya/_/in+d+rA yu d+hA ya t+ya naM b+hA ni san+ti ma mA pi kiM tA ta na ta bi pA ni/_/ci yang yod min sogs bod skad kyi rkang pa gcig chad pa 'dar los gsar du bsgyur ba slar dpyad/_a d+yA pi men+tar+d+d+h+wa na tI ba ta s+ya bA NI sa tAM pa sra ti mA pi ya s+yAH/_/shru tA ma yA tsU ta ba ne ka dA tsin+na ko
[\[122a.6\]]mgrin pa la/_/btags pa'i skud pa rnam par bkra gyur pa/_/dbang po'i mtshon yangs dag dang mtshungs pa yod/_/yab gcig bdag kyang ci slad de lta min/_/gang gi tshig gi rgya che mtshungs pa yang /_/ci yang yod min phul du byung ba'i sgra/_/nam yang tsU ta'i nags su bdag gis ni/_/thos pa khu
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]kaM lA nAM na tsa ShaT+pa da nAM/_/man+dA ki nI madz+dza na nI la phe na sA mA na b+hA sA na ba balka le na/_/ta nI ya pI ta s+ya ba pu bi b+hA ti ne daM pri yaM balka la kaM ma mA d+ya/_/ni bi sh+ya bak+t+raM ba da nA ra bin+de ni bi D+ya dor+b+h+yAM su tsi raM ba
[\[122b.2\]]byug gi min bung ba'i min/_/de ni da lta'ang bdag nang sgrogs pa bzhin/_/dal bab lag bkrus dbu ba chags pa yi/_/'od dang mtshungs pa shing shun gsar pa yis/_/shin tu phra ba de yi lus dag mdzes/_/bdag gi lus ni lag pas yun ring bsdams/_/gdong gi pad+mar bzhin ras rnam
[\[122b.3\]]purme/_/tsakra dza ya pra s+phu ri tA d+ha ro sau haR+ShA mr-i ta spaR+sha bi she Sha di k+ShAM/_/ra me k+ShA mA kAn+ta bi lak+Sha Ne na nai ba k+Sha NaM te na bi nA tsa ne smin/_/ka ro ti me yad+b+ra ta shA sa ne na dr-i shoHpa daM mo ha sa khI na ni
[\[122b.4\]]par bkod/_/bslabs pas mchu bskyod 'di yi dga' ba yis/_/bdud rtsi reg pa'i khyad bar bslab par byas/_/mdzes pas rnam par mtshan pa de med na/_/bdag gi bzod pa nags 'dir skad cig min/_/gang gis brtul zhugs bstan pas bdag nyid la/_/rmongs pa'i grogs po gnyid ni
[\[122b.5\]]drA/_/dr-iSh+Ti sta dA lo ka na mI ha te me shru tirba nA tad+ba tsa na tsAste/_/tats+tsin+ta yA tAm+ba ti d+hIrni tAn+ta man+taM na dzA ti ta nu byA yA yAH/_/shru twe ti kan+ta hr-i ta mA na s+ya san+ta pa tsiM tA pi shu nAm+ma haR+ShiH/_/pu tra s+ya ba
[\[122b.6\]]gnas mi byed/_/bdag gi mig ni de la lta bar 'dod/_/de tshig med na thos pa yongs mi gnas/_/lus la gnod byed blo ni nang dag tu/_/mi gsal de yi bsam pas mchog tu gzir/_/zhes pa mdzes mas yid phrogs bu yis ni/_/gdung ba'i bsam pa go byed tshig thos nas/_/dka' thub bar
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]kyAM ta pat+sAn+ta rA ya ni pA ta b+hI tAHsu tsi raM pra da d+h+yau/_/kaSh+TaM ta pa swI mr-i ga shA ba ko yaM tI bre Na mug+d+haHsma ra lub+d+ha ke na/_/ba rAM ga nA bA gu rA yA ka TA k+Sha kU T+wA ba pA tI sa hA sA ni bad+d+haH/_/k+Sha NaM bi tsin+t+ye mu nirma nI
[\[123a.2\]]chad gyur pas 'jigs pa yis/_/drang srong chen po shin tu yun ring bsam/_/kye ma dran pa'i rngon pa mi bzad pas/_/dka' thub can rmongs ri dgas bu 'di ni/_/bud med mchog tu gyur pa'i rgya dag gis/_/zur mig gal du lhung bas 'phral la bcings/_/skad cig de bsams thub pa
[\[123a.3\]]ShI ma no pi kA raM ta na ya s+ya hartuM/_/ta ma bra bIt+kA ma b+hu dzaM ga muk+taM bi ShaM ba han+taM pi Sha yA b+hi lA ShaM/_/na pu tra sA d+huHsa ma haR+Shi sU nuHsA s+t+rI ma ne dzanra b+hu dzaM ga b+hU miH/_/ta tra ts+yu tan+tI bra ta rA nu rA ga bi Sha bya thA
[\[123a.4\]]mkhas pa yis/_/bu yi yid kyi rnam 'gyur dbrog pa'i slad/_/'dod pa'i lag 'gros dug btang yul la ni/_/mngon 'dod 'dzin pa de la phas smras pa/_/bu de drang srong che sras legs pa min/_/de ni bud med yid skyes lag 'gro'i sa/_/der lhung rmongs pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i/_/rjes chags dug
[\[123a.5\]]me ba bi b+har+t+ti mU D+haH/_/dza nAHpra sak+tAM dza na kA la kU Ter+b+bid+d+hAHsu tI k+Sh+Naista ru NI ka TA k+ShaiH/_/sho tsan+ti yo Shin+b+hu dza pA sha bad+d+hAHsaM sA ra kA rA pa da ne pa do ShAH/_/g+ha na s+ya saM mo ha ma lI ma sa s+ya ma d+h+ye ku Ti lAHs+phu raM t+ya
[\[123a.6\]]gi gdung ba rnam par 'dzin/_/mig sman nag po brtsegs chags na chung gi/_/zur mig rnon pos phug pa'i skye bo dag_/skyon bcas bud med lag pa'i zhags pas bsdams/_/'khor ba'i btson ra dag tu mya ngan byed/_/kun rmongs dri mar ldan pa'i srid pa dag_/sprin gyi dbus su gya gyur gsal byed
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]kur+b+pan+di/_/kAn+tAsta Di taHk+Sha NAn+tAHpuM sAM bi yo ge b+h+r-i sha man+b+ha kA raM/_/e tA b+hi rut+se ka ku TuM bi ni b+hi run+mA da mUts+tshA bi Sha bal+la rI b+hiH/_/s+t+rI b+hir+m+ma hA mo ha pi shA tsi kA b+hiHsaM spr-i sh+ya mA naHku sha lI na lo kaH/_/swas+thAsta
[\[123b.2\]]pa/_/skad cig mtha' can mdzes ma'i glog dag gis/_/bral tshe skyes bu mchog tu mun par byed/_/bud med rnams ni mya ngan rgyas pa'i gnyen/_/smyo zhing brgyal byed dug gi 'khri shing ste/_/rmongs pa'i sha za chen mo 'di dag gis/_/kun tu reg pa'i 'jig rten dge ldan min/_/bud med mig zur
[\[123b.3\]]e to ni ba san+ti san+taHsan+to Sha kAn+ti Shu ta po ba ne Shu/_/san+tA pa naM s+t+rI na ya nAn+ta sha l+yaM ye ShAM shi taM tse ta bi nA ba san+naM/_/i ti pra yat+nAdz+dza na ke na testerbi be ka bA kyaiHpra ti bo d+h+ya mA naH/_/na bu d+h+ya ta so ma da nA n+wi te na lA ba N+ya pA ne nA
[\[123b.4\]]gdung byed zug rngu ni/_/rnon po gang gis sems la ma zug pa/_/chog shes kyis mdzes dka' thub nags tshal du/_/gnas pa'i dam pa 'di de rnal du gnas/_/zhes pa dben pa'i tshig ni de dang des/_/pha yi 'bad pas rab tu rtogs par byas/_/'dod pa dang ldan mdzes sdug btung ba yis/_/rnam par
[\[123b.5\]]ni g+hUr+N+NA mA na/_/a thA sa re d+h+yurbi shwa kr-i t+ya kr-i to mu nau pha le d+h+ma ha ra NA ya yA te/_/lI lA ba ti lo b+ha yi tuM ku mA raM na ren+d+ra ka n+yA pu na rA dza grA ma/_/dA sI ga Ne nA nu ga tA la tA nAM puSh+pa smi tA nAM shri ya mA shra yan+tA/_/
[\[123b.6\]]'phrul pa de ni rtogs ma gyur/_/de nas nyin gzhan sna tshogs bya ba byas/_/thub pa 'bras bu yam shing len du song /_/mi dbang bu mo 'jo sgeg ldan pa ni/_/gzhon nu chags par byed du slar yang 'ongs/_/'bangs mo'i tshogs rnams rjes 'brang 'khri shing ni/_/me tog 'dzum ldan dag gis dpal bsten cing /_/
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]smAM gaM na pAM ga mi bai ka shr-iM ga mA pA d+ya hr-iSh+TA bi b+ha bo na tAM gI/_/di byo tsi taM kalpa la tA gra laM bi la tAM b+hi rA maM ru tsi rA shra ma me/_/traSh+TuM twa mA he t+ya b+hi d+hA ya sA taM ni nA ya tI raM tri da shA pa gA yAH/_/sa
[\[124a.2\]]lus can lus med gsar mtshungs rwa gcig can/_/'byor pas mtho ba'i lus ldan brtan pas phyin/_/bdag gi bsti gnas dpag bsam shing rtse las/_/'phyang ba'i 'khri shing gis dga' lha la 'os/_/lta bar khyod kyis smras zhes brjod nas des/_/de ni gang gA dag gi ngogs su khrid/_/des der
[\[124a.3\]]ta tra rat+no dz+wa la pi tsi tra pa tra su bar+N+Na bal+lI pha la puSh+pa ra myaM/_/no b+har+d+d+hI taM kr-i tri ma mA ka la y+Ya su khA shra maM haR+Sha mi bA ru ro ha/_/saM sA ra tu l+ye na hr-i taHsa te na sa rit+p+ra ba he na ka pa TA shra me Na/_/a dz+nyA ta ta two pya nu rak+ta
[\[124a.4\]]rin cen rab 'bar 'dab ma bkra/_/gser gyi 'khri shing me tog 'bras bu dga'/_/gru yi bzung ba'i bcos ma rnams brtags nas/_/dga' ba ma bzhin bde ba'i gnas la 'dzegs/_/'khor ba dang mtshungs zol gyi bsti gnas der/_/chu bo'i rgyun la de ni rab tu khyer/_/de nyid shes pa min yang chags tshul
[\[124a.5\]]b+h+r-it+tirbA rA Na sIM prI ti mi bA sa pA da/_/a bA pya kA sh+ya s+ya sa rA dza nIM ma hi ma hen+d+ra s+ya ma hArta rat+n+na/_/me ne mu nIn+d+raiHka thi taM ka thA su swargAM ga naM tr-iSh+Ti pa thaM pra yA tAM/_/ta taHpra mo dA ku li taHk+Shi tI shastasmai mr-i gA k+ShI bi d+hi nA bi b+hi dz+nyAH/_/
[\[124a.6\]]gyis/_/mdza' bo can bzhin bA rA Na sIr phyin/_/de yi sa gzhi dbang chen kA sh+ya yis/_/rin cen rin thang che ldan rgyal sar phyin/_/thub dbang rnams kyi gtam la bshad pa yis/_/mtho ris gnas ni mig lam gyur par sems/_/de nas rab dga' rgyas pa sa yi dbang /_/sgrub shes tshogs de la ri dgas mig_/
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]pra dak+Shi NA bar+t+ta bi lo ma hA raM da dau su tAM pUr+N+Na ma no ra tha shrIH/_/na ren+d+ra ka n+yA ka ra sak+ta pA Nirbi ba ha byA ba hi taM hu tA sha naM/_/a ma n+yA tA ma n+ya ma tiHku mA ra sta trAg+ni ho tra s+ya pa raM pra kA raM/_/ma hot+sa bot+sA ha ra sA ku le
[\[124b.2\]]g.yas skor bskor ba do shal g.yo ldan ma/_/bu mo re ba rdzogs pa'i dpal gyis byin/_/mi dbang bu mo lag par lag bkod cing /_/bag ma'i bsreg rdzas me la rnam par bkod/_/der ni gzhon nu blo gros gzhan pa med/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa gzhan dag yin par sems/_/dga' ston che dang spro ba'i nyams rgyas
[\[124b.3\]]na pa pU dz+ya mA naHpra Na ye na rA dz+nyA/_/s+thi twA ta paHsaM ya ta e ba ta tra dzA yA sa khAHsraM pra ya yau ba nAn+taM/_/dzA yA dwi tI yam+bi dza ne bra dzan+ta tr-iSh+TA mr-i gI taM dza na nI pra hr-iSh+TA/_/mu ne pra pA dap+ta ma nu Sh+ya bA tsA ku tasta be yaM
[\[124b.4\]]pa/_/rgyal pos gus pas rab tu mchod pa des/_/brtul zhugs dul ldan nyid du der 'dug nas/_/chung ma dang 'grogs rang gi nags mthar song /_/chung ma'i grogs bcas dben par bgrod pa de/_/ma ma ri dgas mos mthong rab dga' ste/_/thub pa'i drin las mi yi tshig thos pas/_/gang nas khyod kyi bud
[\[124b.5\]]la la ni t+yu bA tsa/_/sa tAM pra Na mya pra Na yAd+ba b+hA She mA tar+m+ma yA yaM d+yu ti mAn ba ya s+yaH/_/prAp+taHpra yat+nA ta spr-i ha NI ya rU paHsa khye na dIp+tA na la pA kr-i ke na/_/i ti shru bA NaM ta ma be t+ya mug+d+haM mr-i gI bi bA hA di ka thA nA b+hi dz+nyaM/_/pa ti bra tA nA
[\[124b.6\]]med 'di zhes smras/_/de la rab btud de yis gus smras pa/_/ma ma bdag gi mdzes ldan grogs mo 'di/_/rab 'bar me yi dbang can grogs med kyis/_/'dod par bya ba'i gzugs can 'bad pas thob/_/ces smras bag ma la sogs gtam mi shes/_/rmongs pa de rig ri dgas mo de yis/_/khyo yi brtul zhugs
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ma tha tA pa sI nAM ta po ba naM sA sha na kairni nA ya/_/d+har+m+mA nu ga te sa ha tsA ri NI yaM pa te twa ma s+yaHpa ti ri t+ya she ShaM/_/bi bA ha br-it+taM ka thi ta sa tA b+hiHshru twA pri ya me bA bi bi da dzA yAM/_/pi trA pra haR+ShA da pi kA sh+ya pe na
[\[125a.2\]]dka' thub can rnams kyis/_/dka' thub nags tshal dag tu dal gyis khrid/_/chos rjes 'gro 'di khyod kyi lhan cig spyod/_/'di yi bdag po khyod ces ma lus pa/_/bag ma'i spyod tshul dag gi bshad pa de/_/thos nas chung ma dga' ma nyid du rig_/yab ni 'od srungs kyis kyang dga' ba yis/_/
[\[125a.3\]]bi bA ha d+har+m+ma bi hi to pa de shaH/_/pra Na mya taM tad+ba tsa sA dza gA ma pu raM sa b+hAR+YaHshwa su ra s+ya rA dz+nyAH/_/br-id+d+he na te na swa pa de b+hi Shik+taHsa two dz+wa laM shAn+ti pa thaM shri te na/_/sha shA sa sa mAn+ta ki rI Ti bi shrAn+ta pA daHsa ma hI ma she
[\[125a.4\]]bag ma'i chos ni nye bar bstan pa bsgrubs/_/der btud de yi tshig gis chung mar bcas/_/gyos po rgyal po'i grong khyer dag tu song /_/snying stobs rab 'bar zhi ba'i lam bsten pa/_/rgan po de yi rang gnas la dbang bskur/_/rgyal phran cod pan ngal gso'i gnas de yis/_/ma lus sa gzhi dag ni
[\[125a.5\]]ShAM/_/ai shwaR+Ya mo hA na b+hi b+hU ta bud+d+hid+d+har+m+ma swa b+hA bAt+sa la pa d+bi be keH/_/dza rA n+wi to b+hUd+ba hu pu tra pau tra pra bra dz+ya yA shAn+ti pa thA b+hi kA laH/_/yo b+hUt+ku mA ro mu ni re ka shr-iM gaHso haM na li n+ye ba la sho d+ha rA tsa/_/a d+yA pi
[\[125a.6\]]rab tu bskyangs/_/dbang phyug rmongs pas blo gros zil mnan na/_/dben pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las 'khrungs shing /_/rgan po bu dang tsha bo mang ldan de/_/rab tu byung bas zhi ba 'dod par gyur/_/thub gzhon rwa gcig ldan par gang gyur de/_/nga nyid pad ldan de yang grags 'dzin ma/_/ding yang skye ba gzhan
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]dzan+mAn+ta ra bA sa na s+yA bi lo b+ha nA yai ba mA b+hi yuk+tA/_/ni dza dzan+mAn+ta ra ka thAM dzi ne ne t+yu pa bar+N+Ni tAM/_/A kar+N+N+ya b+hik+Sha baHsar+b+be ba b+hU bu ste sa bismA yAH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM
[\[125b.2\]]gyi bag chags las/_/bdag la chags pa'i slad du mngon par sbyor/_/rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam/_/rgyal bas nye bar bsngags pa 'di/_/thos nas dge slong de dag rnams/_/thams cad ya mtshan ldan par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
[\[125b.3\]]me ka shr-IM gA ba dA na pany+tsa ShaSh+Thi ta mAHpal+la baH//_//nA yA ti kA ya pa ri br-it+taM sha tairbi rA maM bi ts+tshe da me ti na dza pe na pa lA yi ta s+ya/_/lak+Sh+mA na nA ma pa pu ShaHsa ha tsA ri NI yaM ts+tshA ye ba kar+m+ma sha ra
[\[125b.4\]]bsam gyi 'khri shing las rwa gcig pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//'jig rten du ni skyes bu'i las lam grib ma bzhin/_/lus la lhan cig spyod 'di nges par mi mtshon te/_/lus 'di yongs bsgyur brgya yi mtha' mar mi phyin cing /_/mgyogs par bros pa dag la
[\[125b.5\]]NiHpu ru Sha s+ya lo ke/_/de ba dat+ta shi lA pA ta pA dAM guSh+Tha tA sr-i dzaH/_/kA ra NaM b+ha ga pAn pr-iSh+Ti b+hik+Shu b+hista na b+hA Sha ta/_/shru ya tAM ye na dur+b+bA ra bai ra sma ra Na dzan+ma nA/_/ma ma kar+m+ma bi pA ke na pA dAM guSh+ThaHpa ri
[\[125b.6\]]rnam par 'chad mi 'gyur/_/lhas byin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te/_/zhabs mtheb snad nas khrag byung ba'i/_/rgyu mtshan dge slong rnams kyis dris/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis der bka' stsal/_/mi zlog khon ni dran pa las/_/skyes pa'i las kyi rnam smin dag_/gang gis bdag gi rkang pa yi/_/mthe bong yongs su snad pa
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]k+Sha taH/_/pany+tsA le Shu ma hI pA laHkAM pi l+ye na ga re pu rA/_/a b+hUt+sa t+ya ra to nA ma saM shra yaHsa t+ya d+har+m+ma yauH/_/ba b+hU ba lak+Sha NA nA ma pat+nI ta s+ya su lak+Sha NA/_/pra dzA saM rak+Sha NArda s+ya ya dza na s+ye ba dak+Shi NA/_/dzai bAt+ta s+yA ma
[\[126a.2\]]nyon/_/lnga len dag tu grong khyer ni/_/ka bi l+yar sngon sa gzhi skyong /_/bden dang chos la yang dag brten/_/bden par dga' zhes bya ba byung /_/skye rgu yang dag bsrung 'os pa/_/de yi btsun mo mtshan nyid bzang /_/mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba ni/_/mchod sbyin dag gi yon bzhin gyur/_/phywa las de la bu
[\[126a.3\]]pu trA yAM pu trA r+thI pri thi bI pa tiH/_/su d+har+m+mA nA ma bai de hI mu pa ye me ta pAr+thi taH/_/pa t+yau grita bi bA he tha lak+Sha NA sU ta da ra kaM/_/mi th+yA sa sat+nI lA b+he na pash+tsAt+tA pa mu pA ha tsa/_/so b+hU da non man+tA khyaHku mA raHbi tu
[\[126a.4\]]med tshe/_/de yis gsol btab sa yi bdag_/bu don gnyer bas lus 'phags ma/_/chos bzang zhes pa khab tu blangs/_/khyo yis bag ma blangs pa'i tshe/_/mtshan nyid can la bu btsas te/_/don med chun ma thob pa yis/_/rjes su 'gyod pa dag kyang bzung /_/de ni ma dud pa zhes bya/_/gzhon nu pha ni rab tu
[\[126a.5\]]rIp+sa taH/_/bi d+yA bi na ya sam+pan+naHka lA shAs+t+rAs+t+ra pA ra gaH/_/su d+har+m+ma yAM sa gar+b+b+hA ya ma tha rA dza bya ba d+ya ta/_/sar+b+bA raM b+ha s+thi rA sha nAM de hi nAM na s+thi ra ta nuH/_/a mA t+yai ra b+hi Shik+toHta s+yAn+te lak+Sha NA su
[\[126a.6\]]dgyes/_/rig gnas dul ba phun tshogs shing /_/sgyu rtsal bstan bcos mtshon mthar phyin/_/de nas chos bzang mngal dag dang /_/ldan pa'i tshe na rgyal po 'das/_/rtsom pa kun la lus can gyi/_/bsam pa brtan gyi lus mi brtan/_/de nas de mthar blon rnams kyis/_/rgyal phran glang po'i lcags kyu
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]taH/_/na po\u0f85ku sha i bA b+hU d+ya stI k+Sh+NaHsA man+ta dan+ti nAM/_/go bi ShA NA b+hi d+ha s+t+wa s+ya ma hA mA t+yA pri yo b+ha ba taH/_/go shr-iM ga ku Ti lA ya s+ya nI tirna dz+nyA ya te sa raiH/_/prat+yA sa n+ne su d+har+m+mA yaHkA le na sra sa bA ba d+hau/_/gar+b+haM nr-i pAn+taM prA ha
[\[126b.2\]]ni/_/gsar pa bzhin du gang gyur pa/_/mtshan nyid can gyi bu dbang bskur/_/gang lugs ba lang rwa co ltar/_/gya gyu gzhan gyis mi shes pa/_/blon po chen po ba glang rwa/_/zhes pa de yi mdza' bor gyur/_/dus kyis chos bzang btsa' ba yi/_/mtshams dang nye bar gyur pa na/_/mtshan mkhan mdun na
[\[126b.3\]]ni mit+ti ka dz+nyAHpu ro hi taH/_/a tha man+t+ri gi rA rA dzA dzan+ma k+Sha Na ba d+he shi shoH/_/ta dan+taHpu ra rak+ShA rdo na bi de sho d+ya tA pra d+hA na/_/tad+bi dz+nyA ya su d+har+m+mA pi si trastA sha ra NaM ya yau/_/ma hA mA t+yaM bi d+hA tA ra mi ba swa ts+tshan+da
[\[126b.4\]]'don dag gis/_/mngal gyi mi bdag mthar byed smras/_/de nas blon po'i tshig gis ni/_/byis pa skyes tshe gsod pa la/_/de yi pho brang srung 'os pa/_/mtshon gyi sbyor ldan rgyal pos bskos/_/de dag shes nas chos bzang yang /_/blon po chen po ba glang rwa/_/rang 'dod bzhin du byed pa las/_/shin tu skrag nas
[\[126b.5\]]kA ri NAM/_/pra b+hu b+hAR+Ye ti sA te na nirdiSh+Ta ta na ya b+hi yA/_/saM dzA taM su ta ma t+yAk+ShI t+ke bar+t+ta nAn+ni ke ta ne/_/ta ta e ba sa mA nI tAM ta pA ka n+yAm+p+ra daR+shi tAM/_/dz+nyA twAnai mit+ti ka ba tsaHsa t+ya m+me ne na b+hU pa tiH/_/d+hI mAn ka bi ku mA rA
[\[126b.6\]]skyabs su song /_/de yi rje bo'i chung ma zhes/_/bstan des bu yi 'jigs pa la/_/bu ni yang dag skyes pa dag_/nya pa rnams kyi khang par bzhag_/de nyid nas ni bu mo dag_/de yis blangs nas rab bstan pa/_/shes nas sa yi bdag po yis/_/mtshan mkhan tshig ni bden min bzung /_/nya pa'i khyim du byis pa
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]khyAHsa ke bar+t+ta gr-i he shi shuH/_/le b+he ya ta sta tan+tAM bi d+yA shil+lAr+thi tAHka lAH/_/sa ta tra bA la kaiH sAr+d+ha krI DA na ga ra kr-i ta pa thi/_/rA dza ka lI pa ri tsa yairbi dza hA ra ma hA b+hu dza/_/ya dr-its+tsha yA ga tasta tra nai mit+ti
[\[127a.2\]]des/_/rig pa bzo gnas sgyu rtsal dag_/de de thos pa gang des na/_/blo ldan gzhon nu snyan dngags mkhan/_/byis pa rnams dang lhan cig der/_/lam du rtsed mo'i grong khyer byas/_/rgyal po'i rtsed 'jo yongs 'dris la/_/dpung chen de ni rnam par rtse/_/der ni mtshan mkhan mdun na 'don/_/'dod
[\[127a.3\]]kA pu ro hi taH/_/taM dr-iSh+TA nr-i pa ma b+h+ye t+ya ba b+hA She b+hak+Shi sam+ma taH/_/de bai ka bar+t+ta pa da ne ma yA dr-iSh+TaHku mA ra kaH/_/ya e ba ka thi ta pUr+b+baM rA dz+ya prA NA pa ha sta ba/_/shru twe ti nr-i pa tiHkro pAn+nir+b+b+har+t+s+ya pa ra mA
[\[127a.4\]]dga' dag tu 'ongs pa yis/_/de mthong mi bdag la phyogs te/_/gus par mngon par 'dod pas smras/_/lha gcig nya pa'i khang par ni/_/gang gis khyod kyi rgyal srid dang /_/srog dag 'phrog par sngar brjod pa'i/_/gzhon nu bdag gis mthong bar gyur/_/'di thos mi bdag khros pa yis/_/gzhan pa'i ma la
[\[127a.5\]]ta raM/_/go bi Sha Ni sa mA hU ya ma hA mA t+ya ma b+hA Sha ta/_/a ho ba tA ba tA pe na b+ha ba tA ma ma saM sha ye/_/rA dz+yAb+d+hi kar+N+Na d+hA re Na nau ri ba shrI ru phe k+Shi tA/_/twAm+ma ti n+ya sta tsit+ta s+ya su khaM ni drA b+ha ban+ma ma/_/sai bA d+ya prA Na saM de ha
[\[127a.6\]]rab smad de/_/blon po chen po ba glang rwa/_/yang dag bos nas rab smras pa/_/kye ma bdag gi the tshom la/_/rna ba 'dzin pa rab g.yel ba/_/khyod kyi rgyal srid chu gter la/_/gru bzhin dpal la btang snyoms byas/_/khyod kyi blo la sems bkod pa/_/bdag ni bde bar gnyid gyur te/_/de ring srog la the tshom gyi/_/rim
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]dz+wa ra tan+tI pa daM shrI tAM/_/gU D+ha gar+b+haM pa ri t+ya dz+ya kai bar+t+te Shu ma dan+ta kaM/_/pa hr-iSh+TA pa ra mA tA me ga Na ya t+ye ba bA sa rAn/_/a d+yA pi tad+ba d+ho pA ye twa yA yuk+tirbi d+hi ya tAM/_/na kha ts+tshe d+yi ku ThA ro kA le nA yA ti
[\[127b.2\]]gyi dbang gi gnas dag bsten/_/bdag gi mthar byed sbas pa'i mngal/_/nya pa dag la yongs gtad nas/_/rab tu dga' bas gzhan pa'i ma/_/nges par nyi ma bgrang bar byed/_/da dung de ni gsad pa'i thabs/_/rigs pa khyod kyis sgrub par mdzod/_/sen mos chod pa'i dus kyi ni/_/sta re yis kyang
[\[127b.3\]]kuN+Tha tAM/_/rak+Sha ti swA mi rASh+TAr+tha durga mi t+t+ra ba lo da yAM/_/a mA t+ya bra kr-i tistasmAt+p+ra kr-i ti b+h+yo ga ri ya sI/_/bya sa na sha ma na d+h+yA nA sak+tAHsa dA hi ta pA yi naHpra Na d+hi ni ya ta byak+t+yA b+hak+ti pra tA ki la man+d+ri NaH/_/
[\[127b.4\]]nus mi 'gyur/_/rje bo yul 'khor nor dang rdzong /_/grogs dang dpung rgyas srung byed pa/_/de yi slad du rang bzhin las/_/blon po'i rang bzhin shin tu brling /_/blon po gdung ba zhi byed bsam gtan la chags rtag tu phan pa blos/_/nyan rna dul ba'i tshul ldan gus pa'i brtul zhugs dag ni nges par 'dzin/_/
[\[127b.5\]]a b+hi ma ta pha la prAp+t+yA sa d+yAHpra daR+shi ta sid+d+ha yaHshu tsi pa ri tsa yo dA rA pu N+yair+b+ha ban+ti ma hI b+hu dzAM/_/tUr+N+NaM gu ru ta rA raM b+hairdA ra ko sau ni dAR+Y+Ya tAM/_/kA la hI naHpra yat+no ti pash+tsat+tA pA ke ba laM/_/i ti rA dz+nyA sA mA
[\[127b.6\]]mngon 'dod 'bras bu thob pas grub pa dag ni 'phral la rab tu ston/_/yongs 'dris dag cing rgya che sa bdag rnams kyi bsod nams dag gis thob/_/myur du rab lci rtsom pa yis/_/byis pa 'di ni rnam par chom/_/dus dang bral ba'i 'bad pa ni/_/rjes su gdung byed 'ba' zhig yin/_/zhes pa rgyal pos yang dag
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]diSh+TaHpUr+b+bo pe k+ShA bi lak+Sha d+hIH/_/ga dza b+ha dzi ra thA nI kai ra mA t+ya pa hi to ya yau/_/a trAn+ta re su d+har+m+mA bi gU D+ha mA hU ya pu tra kaM/_/tan+man+t+ri Ni ni pe d+yAsmai ga mya tA mi t+yu bA tsa tAM/_/da twA tsU DA ma Nim+mA trA sa bi
[\[128a.2\]]bstan/_/sngon gyi btang snyoms skyengs pa'i blos/_/blon po glang po rta dang ni/_/shing rta'i tshogs dang lhan cig song /_/chos bzang gis kyang gnas skabs der/_/bu ni gsang nas bos byas te/_/gros de de la rnam par bshad/_/'gro bar mdzod ces de la smras/_/ma yis gtsug gi nor byin nas/_/btang
[\[128a.3\]]sr-iSh+Ta s+t+wa rA ku laH/_/bra dzan dU rA da ma t+ye na dr-iSh+To rat+na bi b+hU Shi taH/_/rA dza pu traHsa e bA yaM nU na gU D+ha pa lA ya te/_/i t+yuk+t+wA s+ya ba d+hA yo grAn sa sai n+yA grA na tso de ya ta/_/dza be na dra ba tAM te ShAM mr-i ga be shaHsa dU ra gaH/_/
[\[128a.4\]]pa de ni rings pas 'khrugs/_/rin cen gyis brgyan 'gro ba dag_/blon po yis ni ring nas mthong /_/rgyal po'i bu de gsad nas ni/_/bos pa 'di nyid ma yin nam/_/zhes brjod de yis de gsad slad/_/dpung gi sngon 'gro drag po bskul/_/mgyogs pas de dag la 'bros shing /_/ri dgas ltar mgyogs ring bgrod de/_/
[\[128a.5\]]tsam+pa kA khya s+ya nA ga s+ya madz+dza ta b+ha ba nAM b+ha si/_/dr-iSh+Ta naSh+Te ta ta stasmi stan+d+haSh+TuM pra yat+na bAn/_/pa da kA khyaM ma hA mA t+yaM bash+tsA ts+tsA raM bi sr-iSh+Ta bA na/_/tsU Da ma Ni pra b+hA be na saM staM b+hi ta dza laM ta taH/_/nA gaHku mA ra mA shwA s+ya s+thI ya tA mi t+ya b+hA Sha
[\[128a.6\]]tsam pa ka zhes bya ba yi/_/klu yi gnas kyi chu la bying /_/de nas mthong nyams de yi tshe/_/blon po chen po 'bad ldan pas/_/rjes su de ni btsal ba'i slad/_/pa ta ka zhes nyan rna btang /_/de nas gtsug gi nor bu yi/_/mthu yis chu ni rengs byas shing /_/klu yis gzhon nu dbugs phyung nas/_/'dug cig ces pa rab tu
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]rta/_/bi smA kya rA dza pu trAr+ha pA da mu drA ba tIM b+hu baM/_/s+thi taM nA ga s+ya b+ha ba ne pa da kasta su tsa ya ta/_/a tha nA gen+d+ra b+ha ba naM pa ri bAR+Y+Ya sa man+ta taH/_/a shrA ba yan+ma hA mA t+yaHpAr+thi bA dz+nyAM pha NI shwa raM/_/pAM shu b+heHpU
[\[128b.2\]]smras/_/rgyal sras la 'os rkang pa yis/_/rgya ldan sa gzhi mthong gyur nas/_/klu yi gnas na gnas pa dag_/pa da ka yis de la brjod/_/de nas klu yi dbang po'i gnas/_/kun nas yongs su bskor nas ni/_/blon po chen pos sa bdag bka'/_/gdengs can dbang la rab tu bsgrags/_/lag 'gro khyod kyi
[\[128b.3\]]ra ya mye Sha b+ha ba naM te b+hu dzaM ga ma/_/dza laM s+tha laM s+tha laM shwa b+h+raM ka ro ti ku pi taHpra b+huH/_/b+hu dzi gI b+ho ga bi ts+tshe daM na tse dits+tsha si tra swa yaM/_/a hi ta rA dza rA dza s+ya rA dza pu traM pa ri t+ya dza/_/i ti san+tardzi ta ste na nA ga stUr+N+Na k+Sha yA k+Sha Ne/_/
[\[128b.4\]]khang pa ni/_/bdag gis rdul gyis khengs par bya/_/chu ni jo bo khros pa yis/_/thad dang gcong rong dag tu byed/_/rang nyid lag 'gro'i longs spyod dbang /_/gal te 'chad par mi 'dod na/_/rgyal po'i rgyal po mi phan pa/_/rgyal po'i bu ni yongs su thong /_/de skad de yis bsdigs pa na/_/mtshan mo'i dus su klu yis ni/_/
[\[128b.5\]]ta t+yA dza rA dza na b+ha thaM b+ha ya b+ho gyA hi dzaM dza naH/_/prats+tshan+naM rA dza pu tro tha ra dza kA ba pa thAs+thi taH/_/tsa rA Na n+yA sa mu drA b+hiHpra ta ke no pa lak+Shi taH/_/ta taHprAp+te ma hA mA t+ye ra dza ke nA bi tad+b+ha yAta/_/bas+t+ra b+hA rAn+ta
[\[128b.6\]]myur bar rgyal po'i bu btang ste/_/srog chags rnams ni 'jigs dbang gyur/_/de nas rgyal sras rab bsgribs te/_/'khrud mkhan dag gi khang par gnas/_/rkang pa bkod pa'i rgya dag gis/_/pa ta ka yis nye bar mtshon/_/de nas blon chen 'ongs pa'i tshe/_/des 'jigs 'khrud mkhan dag gis kyang /_/gos kyi khur gyi
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]ra ga taHpa ri t+yak+ta sta dAn+ta re/_/gU D+haM ta to pi ga twA sau kuM b+ha kA ra ni she sha ne/_/tas+thau yo d+ha d+huM sa mar+tho pi kA lA kAM k+ShI nr-i pAd+ma dzaH/_/ta trA pi go bi ShA Ne na pA da mu drA nu sA ra NA/_/ma had+ba la tsa kre Na san+ni rud+d+he
[\[129a.2\]]nang bcug nas/_/'jug ngogs mtha' ru yongs su btang /_/de nas kyang ni gsang ste song /_/de ni rdza mkhan khang pa na/_/g.yul sprad nus kyang mi bdag bu/_/dus la sdod cing rab tu gnas/_/der yang ba glang rwa dag ni/_/rkang pa'i rgya yis rjes 'brang ba/_/dpung gi 'khor lo chen po yis/_/lam
[\[129a.3\]]Shu bar+t+ma su/_/bas+t+rA ts+tshA di taHpuSh+pa mA lAM ka k+Shi ti pAt+ma dzaH/_/t+yak+taHku lA laiHsA kran+deHsha ba byA dze na ni rdza ne/_/dza be na bra dza tasta s+ya bi dza ne pa da saM k+ti b+hiH/_/ga tiM ga twA ma hA mA t+yastUr+N+NaM pash+tsa sa mA ya
[\[129a.4\]]ni yang dag bgags pa'i tshe/_/sa bdag bu ni gos dag gis/_/g.yogs shing me tog 'phreng bas mtshan/_/cho nge dang bcas rdza mkhan gyis/_/ro yi zol gyis dben par dor/_/dben par mgyogs pas 'gro byed pa/_/de yi rjes kyi 'phreng ba dag_/song ba'i rjes su song gyur pas/_/blon po chen po mgyogs
[\[129a.5\]]yau/_/a saM t+yak+ta s+ya sar+b+ba tra kar+m+ma Ne bA nu sA ri NA/_/a nr-i Sha Na shra mAr+t+te na dr-iSh+TiHkrud+d+he na man+t+ri NA/_/be gA da ga Ni ta shwa b+h+raHsa pa pA ta ma hA ba Te/_/lag+na tsU DA ma NIHshuSh+ka la tA bi Ta pa paM ka Te/_/
[\[129a.6\]]par 'ongs/_/kun tu yongs su mi gtong zhing /_/las bzhin du ni rjes 'brang ba/_/'tshol ba'i ngal dub kyis gzir ba/_/blon po gdug pas de mthong gyur/_/mgyogs las g.yang sa ma brtsis te/_/g.yang sa chen por lhung gyur nas/_/'khri shing shing skam tshogs dag la/_/gtsug gi nor bu chags par gyur/_/
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]taM dr-iSh+T+wA pa ti taM man+t+rI bi Sha me shwa b+h+ra ko Ta re/_/tsU DA ma Ni sa mA dA ya ga twA rA dz+nye n+ya be da yata/_/ku mA ro s+ya dza nA khya na lak+She Na shwa b+h+ra bA si nA/_/rak+Shi taHk+Shi ti mA sA d+ya pak+Shi ban+na bya pa d+ya ta/_/su d+har+m+mA pi pa ti tAM shru
[\[129b.2\]]mi bzad g.yang sa gcod dag tu/_/lhung ba de mthong blon po yis/_/gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs/_/song nas rgyal po dag la bshad/_/gnod sbyin a dza la zhes pa/_/g.yang sar gnas pas gzhon nu yang /_/bsrungs te 'dab chags bzhin du ni/_/sa la phyin cing shi ma gyur/_/bu ni lhung thos chos bzang dag_/
[\[129b.3\]]twA pu traM swa ni d+ha ne Shi NI/_/su tA te dzI ba tI t+yu k+t+wA rak+Shi tA di bya yo Shi tA/_/ku mA ro pi kha la byA g+h+ra k+Shu ra k+Shur+N+Na shi lA ta laM/_/ga dzA sr-it+mat+ta shArdU la dA ru NaM ba na mA bi shata/_/ta tra siM ga la ka k+Shi na lub+d+ha ke na ni be di taM/_/
[\[129b.4\]]rang nyid 'chi ba 'tshol ba ni/_/lha mo rnams kyis khyod kyi bu/_/'tsho zhes brjod nas rab tu bsrungs/_/gzhon nu'ang stag rmig rnon po yis/_/rdo ba'i gzhi ni nyams byas shing /_/glang po'i khrag gis myos pa yis/_/mi bzad stag ldan nags su zhugs/_/de ni rngon pa mig ser can/_/zhas pa yis ni rab bshad de/_/
[\[129b.5\]]mArga mA sA d+ya pu ru ShaM kr-it+ta gA traM bya lo ka ya ta/_/bi lo kya dza ta ka ru Na staM sa prats+tsha nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/_/ke nai mAM bai sha ba s+thAM nI to pi bi dza ne ba ne/_/so brU bIn+na ti dU re tra tsAN+DA la sh+tsaN+Da tseSh+Ti taH/_/ni ba sa t+yan+ta kaHpuM sA su dA
[\[129b.6\]]lam ni thob pa'i skyes bu dag_/lus kun bcad pa mthong bar gyur/_/de mthong snying rje skyes pa yi/_/mi bdag bu yis rab tu dris/_/khyod kyi sdug bsngal gnas skabs 'di/_/mi med nags su ci yis thob/_/des smras ring po min 'di na/_/gtum po gtum po'i spyod tshul can/_/bzod dka' su dA sa zhes pa/_/skyes
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]so nA ma duHsa haH/_/ta s+ya shaM kha mu kho nA ma pA ra me yosti b+hI Sha NaH/_/pan+thA s+thi sa ka la kIr+N+NA ye nai tA bi hi tA di shaH/_/tad+go tsa rats+yu ta s+ye ya maM gats+tshe da sa mud+b+ha bA/_/mU hUr+t+ta she Sha dzI ba s+ya bya thA me marma shA
[\[130a.2\]]bu rnams kyi mthar byed gnas/_/de la dung gi kha zhes pa/_/khyi ni 'jigs su rung ba sod/_/lam gnas mtha' dag gang mthong ba/_/gdon mi za bar rnam 'joms pa/_/de yi spyod tshul lhung gyur pa/_/yud tsam 'tsho ba'i lhag ma can//bdag gi gnad bsnun zug rngu 'di/_/yan lag bcad
[\[130a.3\]]yi nI/_/krUd+d+haHshaM kha mu khot+k+r-it+taM kaN+ThA nI sAr+tha ga mi nAM/_/ma d+h+yA h+na tap+ta sh+tsaN+Da laHpa dA pi ba hi sho Ni taM/_/i ti ta s+ya ba tsa shru twA rA dza pu tro ni rA yud+d+haH/_/kiM ka ro mI ti kr-i pa yA pra da d+h+yau bi d+ha mA na saH/_/sh+tsaN+Da ko
[\[130a.4\]]las yang dag skyes/_/gtum po nyin gung gdung ba'i tshe/_/gdug pa dung gi kha dag gis/_/mgrin pa rab bcad don mthun gyi/_/khrag ni rtag tu 'thung bar byed/_/ces pa de yis tshig thos nas/_/brtse bas yid ni phug gyur cing /_/mtshon dang bral ba rgyal po'i bu/_/ci zhig bya zhes rab tu bsams/_/drag po
[\[130a.5\]]tsaN+Da maN+Da laHa tha dza gA ma tsaN+DA la/_/dik+Shu k+Shi pan+naM ba tr-i sha ba rA ha ru d+hi rats+tsha TA/_/tat+par+sh+we kra tsa krU ra pa sha naHshwA s+ya dr-i sh+ya te/_/pra t+ya gra sho Ni tA sak+ta na kha ko Ti k+Sha tA pa niH/_/aM ga b+haM ga ku raM gA
[\[130a.6\]]gzhu yi dkyil 'khor can/_/de nas gtum po 'ongs gyur te/_/phyogs su mig gis phag gi ni/_/khrag gi zer ma 'phen pa bzhin/_/de yi ngos su khyi yang mthong /_/sog le ltar rtsub so dang ldan/_/gsar pa'i khrag gis bsgos pa yi/_/sder mo'i rtse mos sa la 'brad/_/ri dgas rnams kyi yan lag
[\[130a.7\]]tshig rkang gnyis po 'di bod skad du ma bsgyur 'dug pa za hor ban des bsgyur ba mkhas pa rnams kyis dpyad par zhu/
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]NAM tsa ma rA NAMny+tsa bA la gra haH/_/shr-i gA lA nAM ku la byA d+hiHshU ka rA NAM k+Sha ya dz+wa raH/_/mA taM ga pak+Sha pa te na bi d+hi nA ba na bar+t+ma ni/_/krauR+Ya dar+p+paH sa si hA nA mA yA pa i ba nir+m+ma taH/_/ta s+yA tha n+ya ba d+hU na bya
[\[130b.2\]]'joms/_/g.yag rnams dag ni byis pa'i gdon/_/ce spyang rnams kyi rigs kyi nang /_/phag rnams nyams par byed pa'i rims/_/gtum po'i phyogs su lhung ba yis/_/byed pos nags kyi lam du ni/_/'tshe ba dag gi ngal dub bzhin/_/dregs ldan gdug pa can de sprul/_/'gron po'i chung ma gsar du ni/_/
[\[130b.3\]]be d+ha bya bA d+ha bed+ha saH/_/hA+o+uM kA rag+har+g+ha rA rA bairdu dru buHkhaD+ga d+he na baH/_/ta ma b+hi dru ta ma t+yu gra tsaN+Da lak+She Da saM dz+nya yA/_/dr-iSh+T+wA ru ro ha b+hU bA la sU nu ra ma la ka dru maM/_/taM bI k+Sh+ya pA da pA rU D+ha A dr-iSh+Ta kar+N+Na sA Sha kaH/_/krud+d+haH
[\[130b.4\]]yugs sa'i gdung ba sgrub byed de'i/_/hUM zhes g+har g+har sgra dag gis/_/bse ru drus ma rnam par 'bros/_/shin tu gtum po rbod pa yi/_/brda yis mngon du 'ong ba de/_/mthong nas sa skyong bu yis ni/_/skyu ru ra yi shing la 'dzegs/_/shing la 'dzegs pa de mthong nas/_/rna ba'i bar du mda' drangs shing /_/gtum pos
[\[130b.5\]]shaM kha mu khaM tsakre tsaN+DA lastad+ba d+ho n+mu khAM/_/sha ra shwa daMSh+TU tIk+Sh+Na b+hir+b+bAg+g+hi rud+d+ha ta bA di nA/_/bid+d+haHkrU ra dr-i shA te na rA dza sU nu ra tsin+ta yata/_/a ho ni rA yud+d+ha s+yA yaM be d+ha pA ma ma nir+m+mi taH/_/rA dza rA dza ra Not+sA ha yo gya
[\[130b.6\]]gdug pa dung gi kha/_/de ni gsod la mngon phyogs byas/_/'phyar smra gdug pa'i mig de yis/_/mda' dang khyi yi mche ba ltar/_/rno ba'i tshig gis phug pa yi/_/rgyal po'i bu yis rab bsams pa/_/kye ma rgyal po'i rgyal po yis/_/g.yul du spro ba dang ldan pa/_/mtshon med bdag lus 'jig pa 'di/_/byed
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]s+ya ba pu ShaHk+Sha yaH/_/na sne he na na dA ne na na mA ne na gu Ne na bA/_/a ya niHkA ra Na ri pur+n+nirdzi tA me ni durdza naH/_/nA ra kaM ni ya tA kA sa ma s+ya sadz+dzI kr-i taM pu raH/_/na ra kaM kA la mA li n+yo ba dan+ti ba na b+hU ma yaH/_/
[\[131a.2\]]po dag gi rnam par sprul/_/skye bo ngan pa rgyu med kyis/_/dgra 'di thul bar gyur pa ni/_/mdza' bas ma yin sbyin pas min/_/mchod min yon tan gyis kyang min/_/nges par dmyal ba'i gnas dag ni/_/'di yi mdun na bstar byas pa/_/mi yi keng rus 'phreng ba can/_/nags kyi sa gzhi rab tu smra/_/
[\[131a.3\]]ku dzan+ma rA dza tsan+d+ra s+ya baM she k+Sha tra shi ro ma NaiH/_/shu nush+tsaN+DA la pu trAd+ba niHshas+t+ra s+ya ba d+haHkwa me/_/sar+b+ba thA nish+tsa la ye ba dzan+ma paR+Yan+ta shA mi ne/_/pu ru ShAr+thaM bi rud+d+hA ya na maHprAk+ta na kar+m+ma Ne/_/nits+tsha drA lI na
[\[131a.4\]]gang du rgyal rigs gtsug gi nor/_/rgyal po zla ba'i rigs su skyes/_/khyi'am gtum po'i bu dag gis/_/mtshon med bdag ni gsod par byed/_/rnam kun nges par mi g.yo zhing /_/skye ba'i mthar thug gnas gyur pa/_/skyes bu'i don dang 'gal 'gyur ba/_/sngon gyi las la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dman pa'i dra ba
[\[131a.5\]]tsa gu Na ta ti rga N+ya te dzAt+ma dzA le sar+b+bon+na t+yA swa ku la sha shi nasta s+ya dzan+me ba mA b+hUta/_/do ShaM do Sha pra tsa ya ba pa ti daR+sha ya t+ye ba dU rA ta ya s+yAM gu l+yA ta nu ta ma ti byak+ta mA lo kya lo kaH/_/i ti tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya bi Sha me prA Na saM
[\[131a.6\]]dag la skyon bug rtsi min yon tan skud rgyas min/_/'jig rten rab mang skyon gyis gang skyon shin tu chung ba dag_/ring nas shin tu gsal bar mthong nas mdzub mo dag gis ston byed pa/_/kun las mtho bas rang rigs zla ba de yi skye bar ma gyur cig_/de ltar sems dpa' de yis ni/_/mi bzad srog gi the tshom
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]sha ye/_/a b+hUt+sA re k+Sha yA de ba na sha rI rak+Sha yad+b+ha yaM/_/a trAn+ta re di bya tr-i shrA dz+nyA twA bi d+yA d+ha ro mu niH/_/ma tha raHkr-i pa yA ta s+ya tI bra kle sha baM tIn+da shAM/_/khaD+ga mkha' dang ral gri 'grogs pa yi zhes pa'i skad dod chad pa 'dar los bsgyur ba slar rgya dpe rnyed na zhus dag byed/_pA NiHsa mA ya yau khash+tsa khaD+gas+sa hI ta
[\[131b.2\]]la/_/bdag nyid nyams pas lus dag ni/_/'jigs pas 'jigs pa yongs ma gyur/_/skabs der thub pa rig pa 'dzin/_/ma tha ra yis lha mig gis/_/de yi gnas skabs mi bzad pa'i/_/nyon mongs can zhes brtse ba yis/_/mkha' dang ral gri 'grogs pa yi/_/yon tan gcig nyid ston byed
[\[131b.3\]]yoH/_/na b+ho ni s+t+riM sha yo mai trI me kA rU pAM pra daR+sha yan/_/so b+h+ye t+ya b+hI Sha Na ta nuHkro d+ha krU ra ta rek+Sha NaH/_/tsaN+DA la sU nosh+tsits+tshe da shi raHshaM kha mu kha s+ya tsa/_/a tha swa mA shra maM nI twA ta mA shwA s+ya nr-i pAt+ma dzaM/_/sa tasmai pra
[\[131b.4\]]cing /_/lag na shubs med ral gri can/_/mkha' yi lam nas yang dag 'ongs/_/khros shing shin tu sdug pa'i mig_/'jigs rung lus can de 'ongs te/_/gtum po'i bu dang dung gi ni/_/kha yi mgo dag rab tu bcad/_/de nas rang gi gnas su khrid/_/mi bdag sras de dbugs phyung nas/_/rdzu 'phrul che
[\[131b.5\]]da do mA yA bi d+yAHsa ha ma har+d+d+hi b+hiH/_/ta ta staM mu ni mAM maM t+r+ya mA nI sha tru dzi gI Sha yA/_/rA dz+ya kA maH sha naiHpra yAta kAM pi l+yaM pAr+thi bAt+ma dzaH/_/pa ta pra nar+t+ta kI rU paM kr-i twa ra ti ma no ha rAM/_/la li tA naR+Yau tai staiHsau ra lo ka ma
[\[131b.6\]]dang lhan cig des/_/sgyu ma'i rig pa de la byin/_/de nas thub pa de la zhus/_/khengs ldan rgyal sras rgyal srid ni/_/bzhed cing dgra las rgyal 'dod pas/_/kAM pi lar ni dal gyis song /_/de yis der ni gar mkhan ma/_/yid 'phrog dga' ma'i gzugs byas nas/_/yid 'ong gar stabs de dang des/_/grong
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]to Sha ya ta/_/shru twA na ra ba tista s+ya kau sha la nr-it+tu nA n+yA yoH/_/swa yaM draSh+TuM sa hA ma hA t+yeHpra ya yau nA T+ya maN+Da paM/_/sa ta tra kai shi kI lI la li taM tad+b+ya lo ka ya ta/_/a mr-i tA ha ra NA yA taM kAn+ta rU pa mi bA ts+yu taM/_/
[\[132a.2\]]ba'i 'jig rten tshim par byas/_/de yi gar dang zlos gar dag_/mkhas pa mi bdag gis thos nas/_/blon po dang bcas rang nyid ni/_/zlos gar khang par lta ru song /_/de yi de ni sgra can gyis/_/rtse dga' yid 'ong de dag mthong /_/mdzes ma'i gzugs su g.yo med ni/_/bdud rtsi len du 'ong ba bzhin/_/
[\[132a.3\]]ta s+yA b+hi na ya baun+daR+YaMM bi tsAR+Ya d+h+wa ra NI d+ha raH/_/shriM gA rA swa da nak+ShI baHpra d+hA nA mA t+yA ma bra bI ta/_/a ho saM pUr+N+Na lA ba N+ya d+ha n+yA ba ra ta nosta nuH/_/i yaM ha ra ti na sh+tse tash+tsi trA b+hi na ya shA li nI/_/i yaM
[\[132a.4\]]de yi gar stabs mdzes sdug la/_/rnam par dpyad nas 'dzin ma 'dzin/_/'jo sgeg myang zhing myos gyur pas/_/blon po'i gtso la rab smras pa/_/kye ma mdzes sdug kun rdzogs shing /_/bsngags 'os lus mchog ldan pa'i lus/_/ngo mtshar gar stabs ldan pa ni/_/bdag cag rnams kyi yid 'phrog byed/_/mtho
[\[132a.5\]]sA me na kA nU na swa rga raM ga bi la si nI/_/a n+ya thA na ba ne pa th+yA ku taHkan+te ya mA kr-i tiH/_/b+hA bA b+ha bya ta ra swa b+hA ba ra tsa nA bai tsi t+ya tsA ru kra mai rA mA d+ya s+ya ra sa s+ya saM g+ha ta ta yA niHpA da nA yo d+ya taH/_/
[\[132a.6\]]ris do ra'i rtsed 'jo mkhan/_/me na ka de 'di min nam/_/gzhan du gsar pa'i tshon ris dang /_/dbyibs mdzes 'di ni ga la 'ong /_/'gyur bag shin tu legs pa'i rang bzhin gyis spras rnam bkra mdzes pa'i rim pa yi/_/tshogs rnams nyid kyis nyams su myong bya nyams rnams nges par rdzogs pa la brtson zhing /_/
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]niSh+pan+na s+ya mu huHpra sA da na pi d+her+m+ma d+h+ya bru bA gI ti b+hiHsaM mUr+ts+tsha na mu ra dzo pa raM dzi ta ma ho na T+ya ma naHkaR+Sha ti/_/bA NI pA N+ya pa ri gra he ba ri Na mad+nI NA swa nA mo di sa twa byak+ti bi b+hak+ti kam+pa ta ra lA tA ron+mu khI
[\[132b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i dbus su glu yi 'gyur gyis yang yang rab tu dang ba sgrub byed pa/_/rdza rnga yang dag bsgrags pas nye bar spros pa'i zlos gar kye ma yid dag 'gugs/_/skad ni brjod pa yongs su 'dzin tshe yid 'ong rgyud mang sgra yis dga' ldan pa/_/snying stobs gsal bar 'byed pas 'dar zhing g.yo ldan 'og pag
[\[132b.3\]]me kha lA/_/A hAR+Ya ra tsa ya t+ya daR+YA tu tsi raM sau rdaR+Ya re khA sa khI tan+b+ya lA s+ya bi lA sa shi Sh+ya ka ma nAM b+h+rU yug+ma mA se ba te/_/i ti tad+ba da nAM b+ho dza n+ya sta ne tra s+ya b+hU pa teH/_/ud+Ya yau ba da na swe
[\[132b.4\]]mdzes sdug ri mo'i grogs/_/gsang por brjod la mngon phyogs mi 'phrogs yid 'ong stabs dang ldan par sgeg par spras/_/gzugs bzang smin ma zung ni sgeg cing rol pa'i bslab pas spras pa kun tu bsten/_/zhes te de gdong chu skyes la/_/mig bkod sa yi bdag po yi/_/bzhin gyi rdul gyis bran pa yi/_/

[\[132b.6\]]'dod pa'i rkang 'thung yang dag skyes/_/de la tshim med nyin mo'i mthar/_/rin cen yongs rdzogs byin nas ni/_/pho brang 'khor gyi nang song ste/_/mi yi bdag pos bdag nyid bsams/_/'khor ba'i rgyus bzhin bden med gzugs/_/bcos ma'i 'dod ldan ma yis ni/_/sa bdag de yi nang dag tu/_/rnam par gnas
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]ma hI pa teH/_/A ni nA ya sa tAM srai raM pa da naM ma da nA tu raH/_/pa ri NA ma bi ro d+hi n+ya spr-i ha yan+te mu muR+She baH/_/ya shaHpuSh+pa pra kA rA NAM tri brga pha la shA khi nAM/_/paR+shu nr-i pa br-ik+ShA NA min+t+ri yA Na ma ni gra
[\[133a.2\]]shing rmongs par byas/_/'dod pas gzir ba de yis de/_/dal bu yis ni khyim du bos/_/yongs su gyur pa'i 'gal ba la/_/'chi bar 'dod rnams chags par byed/_/grags pa me tog rnam bkra zhing /_/sde tshan gsum gyi 'bras bu can/_/mi bdag ljon pa rnams dag gis/_/dbang po ma bsdams
[\[133a.3\]]haH/_/ne bA ba Te pa ta ti pA ti ni yU tha nA thaHsaM pUr+N+Na dA na pa ri pU ri ta b+h+r-ing+ga sAr+thaH/_/sA ban+d+ha kI ya di ka ro ti na kuny+dza ra s+ya gA D+hA nu rA ga bi ba sha s+ya bi mo ha di k+Sh+yaM/_/ta taHswai ra gr-i haM twA rA dz+nya sh+tsai Ta kaiH

[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]rAtra/_/bi hA ya nar+t+ta kI rU paM ku mA raHsa ha sA bra bI ta/_/b+ho gA nuts+tshe na b+ha ba tA b+h+rA tr-i sne hA na pe k+Shi NI/_/sa ha b+ho gya mi daM rA dz+ya ka tha me ke na b+hu dz+ya te/_/ni rdo ShaHkle sha dza la d+hauk+Ship+to haM bi Sha me twa yA/_/swa kar+m+ma
[\[133b.2\]]de la/_/gzhon nu gar mkhan ma yi gzugs/_/spangs nas 'phral la rab smras pa/_/khyod kyo longs spyod la chags shing /_/spun zla'i mdza' la ltos med pas/_/lhan cig spyad bya rgyal srid ni/_/gcig pu yis ni ji ltar spyod/_/mi bzad nyon mongs chu gter du/_/skyon med nga ni khyod kyis 'phangs/_/de yi le
[\[133b.3\]]yo gA dut+tIr+N+Nastat+p+ra tI kA ra tsin+ta kaH/_/u k+t+we ti bad+d+hA nr-i pa tiM prAM dz+yaM rA dz+ya ma ba s+ya saH/_/mub+d+ha pra baM sha ma baM tsakra dza na tA shwA pa ne na paH/_/sa saM prAp+taM pa dastI braM tsin+ta yan swa pa rA b+ha baM/_/shi lAM pra b+hA te bik+She pa nr-i pa ter+m+ma

[\[133b.5\]]n+yu ni/_/tAM b+h+rA tri ba d+ha saM sak+ta rak+ta sik+tA mi ba shri yaM/_/b+huk+t+wa ka bi ku mA ro pi de hAn+te na ra kaM ya yau/_/so haM baR+Sha sa ha prA Ni b+hug+t+wa tat+kar+m+ma pA ta kaM/_/pra k+Shi Na kilbi Sho s+yA d+ya pA dAM guSh+The pa ri k+Sha teH/_/dzan+mA

[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]bar+t+ta kra ma pa ri tsa yaiHsan+ta taiHpa ts+ya mA naM pash+tsA dz+dzA taM s+tha la dza la ta ru grA ba gar+b+hAn+ta re pi/_/tai stair+n+na nA ra sa pa ri ka raiHkA ya pA tre swa b+huk+taM kalpA pA yai ra pi na pu ru ShaHkar+m+ma she Sho dza hA ti/_/i t+ya n+ya dzan+ma tsa
[\[134a.2\]]mor rim gyis yongs 'dris rgyud dag gis ni smin byas shing /_/phyi nas skam dang chu dang shing dang rdo yi snying po'i dbus skyes kyang /_/sna tshogs ro yi yo byad lus kyi snod ni de dang des spyad de/_/skyes bu'i las kyi lhag ma skal ba gnod pa yis kyang gtong mi 'gyur/_/de skad skye ba gzhan gyi spyod/_/

[\[134a.5\]]waH//_//d+ha n+yA te pa ri pUr+N+Na pu N+ya ni d+ha yaHsad+d+har+m+ma saM po d+ha na dz+nyA no da gra gu rU pa de sha ma hi mA ya b+h+yI pra b+hA bo da yA//_/ge ha prAM ga Na lI la yA ba hu ta ra kle sho gra saM tA pa kr-i ta

[\[134b.1\]]yaiHsaM sA ra si pA ri mA ra ba ma hA mArgaHsa mul+laM g+h+ya te/_/pu rA b+ha bang+g+r-i ha pa tiHshrA ba s+t+yaM bud+d+ha rak+Shi taH/_/ar+thi sarbo pa ka ra NaM gur+b+yo ya s+ya gr-i ha shri yaH/_/yaHpra san+na ma no br-it+taMHku sha lA ya pra sA di nA/_/kr-i taH

[\[134b.3\]]shik+ShA pa don+m+r-iSh+TaHshA ri put+t+re Na b+hik+Shu NA/_/saM g+ha rak+Shi ta nA mA b+hU ta saM pUr+N+Na gu Na lak+Sha NaH/_/pu traM sta s+ya dA tsA raHsar+b+ba bi d+yA bi tsak+Sha NaH/_/taM ka dA tsing+g+r-i ha pa te shA ri pu tra pi tA bra bIta/_/twa mu pas+thA ya kaHpu tra gar+b+ha s+tho

[\[134b.5\]]s+ya pra ti shru taH/_/tasmA ta da d+hu nA sa t+yaM kar+t+tu mar+ha si me ba tsa/_/pu N+yair+b+ha ban+ti sat+pu trAHpi tu pA nr-i N+ya kA ri NAH/_/i ti pi trA sa mA diSh+TaHpra hr-iSh+TaHsaM g+ha rak+Shi taH/_/a nu gaHshA ri pu tra s+ya pa ri tsaR+Ya pa ro b+ha ba ta/_/ta

[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]taHpra brA dzi ta ste na sa mu dA tsA ra shik+Sha yA/_/a d+h+yA pi taHpa ni khi laM d+har+m+mA ga ma tsa tuSh+Ta yaM/_/ta taHka dA tsid+ba Ni dzAM man+t+ra NA tu l+ya dzan+ma nAM/_/sha taiHpany+tsa b+hi raM b+hi d+hi ga ma ne na sa hA n+wi taH/_/A ru ro ha pra ba ha

[\[135a.3\]]NaM te ShAM ku sha la tsin+ta kaH/_/b+ha ye Sh+wa d+haiR+Ya dza na naM gr-i hi twA shA sa naM gu roH/_/a thAb+d+hi ma d+h+ye saM rud+d+he tasmin+p+ra ba ha Nai k+Sha NaM/_/saM kran+te ba Ni dzAM sAr+the prots+tsa tsA ra ba tso b+ha saH/_/ya di pra ba he Na s+yA s+ya muk+tiR+YuSh+mA ka
[\[135a.4\]]'jigs pa dag la brtan bskyed pa/_/bla ma'i bka' ni bzung byas te/_/gzings la rab tu zhon par gyur/_/de nas gzings de chu gter gyi/_/dbus su yang dag 'gags gyur cing /_/tshong pa'i don mthun cho nge dag_/sgrogs tshe chu las tshig drag pa/_/gal te gzings 'di khyed cag rnams/_/grol bar
[\[135a.5\]]mip+si tA/_/ta de Shak+Shi pya tAM k+Shi praM sa li le saM g+ha ra k+Shi tAH/_/shru twai ta ta prA Na san+de he te ShA me kA b+ha ban+ma tiH/_/ba raM ni d+ha na me bstu na tu sA d+hu su hr-id+pa d+haH/_/bi Sha me saM sha ye te ShAM kr-i pa yA rak+Sha Nod+Ya taH/_/bi k+She pa swa ya mAt+mA
[\[135a.6\]]'dod pa de lta na/_/dge 'dun srung 'di chu la ni/_/myur ba nyid du 'phang bar mdzod/_/de thos srog la the tshom tshe/_/de dag rnams la blo 'di byung /_/shi bar gyur pa mchog yin gyi/_/dam pa'i grogs po gsod pa min/_/de dag mi bzad the tshom la/_/brtse ba yis ni bsrung brtson pas/_/chu gter 'khrugs par dge
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]naM k+Shu b+d+hA b+d+hau saM g+ha rak+Shi taH/_/sa nA ga ni la yaM prAp+ta sta tra nA gai rar+thA n+wi taH/_/bi d+hA ya pUr+b+ba saM bud+d+ha dr-id+d+ha tse t+yA pi ban+da naM/_/dr-iSh+Ta shwA sa ra da spaR+sha bi ShA NAM tsin+ta ya kr-i shaH/_/su tsa ri tA b+hi ma
[\[135b.2\]]'dun srung /_/rang gis bdag nyid rab tu 'phangs/_/de nas klu yi gnas su phyin/_/de ni klu yis gsol btab des/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la/_/mngon par phyag 'tshal mngon bsgrubs nas/_/bsam pas phra des mthong dbugs dang /_/so reg dug ldan de dag la/_/legs pa'i spyod tshul mngon
[\[135b.3\]]tAn+te ShAM bi da d+ha d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/tI bra ra ti sa mud+big+naHswa de sha ga ma not+su kaH/_/sa nA gairba Ni dzA me ba n+ya staHpra ba ha Ni k+Sha NA ta/_/te pra hr-iSh+ThAHsa mA sA d+ya pa ra lo kA di bA ga taM/_/pra t+yA br-it+ta pra ba
[\[135b.4\]]'dod pa'i/_/chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/_/chags bral drag po'i yid 'byung gis/_/rang yul 'gro bar 'dod pa de/_/klu rnams kyis ni tshong pa yi/_/gzings la skad cig nyid kyis bkod/_/'jig rten gzhan las 'ongs pa bzhin/_/de dag dga' ba yang dag thob/_/gzings ni phyir la log
[\[135b.5\]]ha Na stI raM prA pur+m+ma ho da d+heH/_/swa gr-i hot+kaN+Tha ya te ShAM bra dza tA ma ti sa twa raM/_/ni drA lur+b+bA lu kA kU le bi smr-i taHsaM g+ha rak+Shi taH/_/ga te sAr+the pra bud+d+ho tha pra b+hA te bi dza nA di shaH/_/pa sh+ya naM su hr-id+bi ra hi taHpra da
[\[135b.6\]]gyur nas/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs su phyin/_/rang gi 'dod pas de dag rnams/_/shin tu rings par bgrod pa yis/_/dge 'dun srung ni bye ma yi/_/ngogs su gnyid du song ba brjed/_/de nas don mthun song tshe sad/_/snga dro mi med phyogs rnams su/_/lta zhing grogs dang bral ba yis/_/chags bral blo
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]d+h+yau sa bi ShaN+Na d+hIH/_/a ho dr-iSh+TA sh+tsa naSh+Na sh+tsa gan+d+har+b+ha na ga ro pa mAH/_/bi mo ha yan+ti bi ra he su hr-id+ban+d+hu sa mA ga maH/_/ta ru Na sa pa rod+phA lA lo lAHpa ra pri ya saM ga mA bi da d+ha ti nr-i NA mA bi da d+ha ti nr-i NA mA s+tho mi th+yas+thi ra
[\[136a.2\]]can des bsams pa/_/kye ma mthong dang nyams pa can/_/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu yi/_/snying sdug gnyen dang 'grogs pa dag_/bral na rnam par rmongs par byed/_/sa khar nya gzhon 'phar ba lta bur rab tu g.yo ba'i mdzes sdug grogs/_/mi rnams dag la brdzun gyi yid brtan brtan
[\[136a.3\]]s+thi ti ban+d+ha nI/_/swa dza na ra hi taHshe te gar+b+he ta thai ba bi pa d+ya te ba tsa ra ti sa hA pak+tai rdzun+tuHshu b+ha kar+m+ma b+hiH/_/e tad+b+h+ya twA d+hi yA d+hI raHsa bra dzan+bi Sha yA kr-i yA d+h+wa nA/_/dza na tsin+tA mi bA nam tAM prA pa shA lA Ta
[\[136a.4\]]par gnas pa'i 'ching ba sgrub/_/rang gi skye bo dang bral mal du nyal zhing de bzhin nges par mchis/_/kun tu chags pa dge dang mi dge'i las dang lhan cig srog chags rgyu/_/brtan pa'i blo yis 'di bsams te/_/yul gyi lam nas 'gro ba des/_/dal gyis skye bo'i bsam pa bzhin/_/mtha' med sA la'i
[\[136a.5\]]biM sha naiH/_/ta tasta tra sa mud+b+hu ta rat+na pra sA da man+di raM/_/ma hA bi hA ra ma drAk+ShIt+sa mur+t+tA mi ba kau tu kaM/_/swAstIr+N+NA pa na paR+YaM ke tasmin+tu tsi ra tsI ba raM/_/da daR+sha saM g+ha b+hik+Shu NA ma k+ShuN+Na sha ma la k+Sha
[\[136a.6\]]nags tshal sleb/_/de nas der ni khang bzang dang /_/khang pa rin chen las 'khrungs pa/_/gtsug lag khang chen mngon gyur te/_/dge mtshan gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin/_/khri dang mal stan legs bshams pa/_/der ni dge slong dge 'dun ni/_/chos gos mdzes pa zhi ba yi/_/mtshan nyid nyams pa med pa
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]NaM/_/ta tastairbi hi ta ti th+yaHpa ta trA laM kr-i tA sa naH/_/lab+d+ha b+ho dza na sat+kA raHk+Sha NaM bi shrAn+ti mAp+ta bAn/_/b+hik+ShU NAM ma tha saM prAp+te b+ho dza nA ba sa ra pu raH/_/sadz+dzI kr-i tA ni pA trA Ni s+thU la mung+ga ra tAM ya yau/_/bi hA
[\[136b.2\]]mthong /_/de nas de dag gis mgron bsgrubs/_/der ni de yis stan dag brgyan/_/zas dang bkur sti rnyed gyur nas/_/skad cig ngal bsos thob par gyur/_/de nas dge slong rnams dag gis/_/zas kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/_/mdun du lhung bzed bstar byas pa/_/tho ba chen po nyid du gyur/_/gtsug lag
[\[136b.3\]]ran+ter+hi he tasmiM ste ma hA mung+ga rA yu d+hAH/_/mi thaHshi rAM si nir+b+hi d+ya tsi kruHk+Sh+mAM sho Ni to k+Shi tAM/_/A hA ra kA le ti krAn+te bi hA re b+h+yu di te pu naH/_/swa s+thA ste b+hik+Sha bstu s+thu stu thai ba pra shra mA n+wi tAH/_/sa ta dAr+sh+tsaR+Ya ma lo kya
[\[136b.4\]]khang de mi snang bar/_/de dag tho chen mtshon cha yis/_/phan tshun mgo bo rnams bcom nas/_/sa gzhi khrag gis bran par byas/_/zas kyi dus ni 'das pa na/_/gtsug lag khang yang mngon byung zhing /_/de bzhin dge slong de dag rnams/_/rab zhi ldan par rnal du gnas/_/ngo mtshar de mthong ya mtshan can/_/de
[\[136b.5\]]tAn+sa prats+tsha sa bisma yaH/_/b+hak+ta kA le ka yiHkasmA d+yuSh+mA ka ma ya mung+ga taH/_/ta me bo tsa tesmA b+hirbi hA re pUr+b+ba dzan+mA ni/_/b+hak+ta kA le kr-i taM yud+d+haM ta s+yai tat+kar+m+ma NaHpha laM/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya sa ta taHpra yA to n+ya tra tad+bi d+haM/_/ra myam+bi hA
[\[136b.6\]]yis de dag rnams la dris/_/zas kyi dus su rtsod pa 'di/_/khyed cag rnams la ci slad byung /_/de la des smras bdag cag gis/_/skye ba snga mar zas dus su/_/gtsug lag khang du rtsod pa byas/_/las de'i 'bras bu 'di dag go/_/de dag thos nas de nas de/_/song bas gzhan du de lta yi/_/gtsug lag khang
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ra ma pa raM pra dUr+b+hu taM lo ka yata/_/a tha ta trA pi b+hak+ShU NA ma sha na b+ho dza nak+Sha Ne/_/a yo ra sa twaM saM prAp+taM dr-iSh+T+wa pr-its+tshat+sa tAn+pu raH/_/te taM pa b+hA Shi re mo hA dA gaM tU nAM du rAt+ma b+hiH/_/b+hak+ta bi g+hanaHkr-i tosma
[\[137a.2\]]gzhan dga' ba ni/_/rab tu 'khrungs par gyur pa mthong /_/de nas der yang zas kyi tshe/_/dge slong rnams kyi mdun du zas/_/lcags kyi khu ba nyid gyur pa/_/mthong nas de dag la des dris/_/de la des smras rmongs pa las/_/dge slong 'ongs pa'i zas kyi gegs/_/dge slong ngan pa'i bdag nyid
[\[137a.3\]]b+hir+b+hik+Shu NaM b+hik+Shu b+hiHpu rA/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya pa ta to ga twA pa sh+yan+ni baM pu raH/_/tr-i tI yai ru tsi rA bA saM bi hA raM b+hik+Shu b+hi r+b+r-i taM/_/b+hi k+Shu b+hak+ta k+Sha ne taM tsa ni dag+d+haM pu na rud+ga taM/_/dr-iSh+T+wA taM pismi taHsaM g+ha ma
[\[137a.4\]]can/_/bdag cag rnams kyis sngon tshe byas/_/de thos de nas song gyur pa/_/de yis gser zhing mdzes pa'i gnas/_/gtsug lag khang ni gsum pa dag_/dge slong gis gang mdun du song /_/dge slong rnams kyi zas kyi tshe/_/de yang tshig cing slar yang byung /_/de mthong ya mtshan gyur pa yis/_/'tshig pa'i
[\[137a.5\]]pr-its+tshad+dA ha kA ra NaM/_/te ta mU tsuHpu rAsmA b+hir+b+hik+Shu mat+sa rA tra bi hA ra/_/A dI pi taHkroR+Ya ra tairbi hA raHpUr+b+ba dzan+ma ni/_/shru twai tat+pa ta to ga twA da daR+ShA n+ya tra mish+tsa lAn/_/staM b+ha ku D+ya pha lA kA rAn mArdza nI radz+dzu pan+ni
[\[137a.6\]]rgyu ni tshogs la dris/_/de la des smras dge slong la/_/phrag dog las sngon gtsug lag khang /_/sngon gyi skye bar gdug pa la/_/dga' ba bdag cag rnams kyis bsregs/_/de thob de nas song ba des/_/gzhan du g.yo med ka ba dang /_/rtsig pa 'bras bu'i rnam pa can/_/phyags ma thag par mtshungs pa
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]b+hA na/_/kha T+wA d+yul+la kha la s+thu lAM stan+tu she Shan+d+wi d+hA ga tAn/_/sa twAnas twa ba tA ma g+r+yaHsup+ta tse t+ya n+ya niHsu khan/_/sa tAn+d+riSh+T+wA bra dzan+ni ba pu N+yaM prA pa ta po ba naM/_/se ba tAM tI bra ta pa sAM mu nI nAM pany+tsa b+hi sha
[\[137b.2\]]dang /_/khri sogs gtun ni drag pa dang /_/rnal ma'i lhag dang rnam gnyis gyur/_/nyal zhing sems ldan bde med pa'i/_/sems can snying stobs mchog gis mthong /_/de mthong 'gro ba de nyid kyis/_/dka' thub drag ldan thub pa ni/_/brgya phrag lnga yis bsten pa yis/_/bsod nams dka' thub
[\[137b.3\]]taiH/_/te taM dU rAt+pa mA lo kya tsakri re nish+tsa yaM mi thaH/_/a s+ya dA ta bya masmA b+hirna s+thA naM na pri yam+ba tsaH/_/shAkya shi Sh+ya na saM b+hA Sh+yo ba hu dzalpaHswa b+hA ba taH/_/i ti saM bi da mA thA ya te tas+thur+m+mau na ni pu raM/_/tai ra
[\[137b.4\]]nags tshal thob/_/de dag gis de ring po nas/_/mthong nas phan tshun nges par byas/_/bdag cag rnams kyi 'di la gnas/_/'di sbyin snyan par smra mi bya/_/shAkya'i slob ma rang bzhin gyis/_/mang brjod phebs par smra bye min/_/zhes pa'i gros ni rab bsgrubs te/_/thub pa de dag rab tu gnas/_/de dag
[\[137b.5\]]dat+tA shra yasta tra sa ba b+h+rA ma di na k+Sha ye/_/bad+d+hA kau sherbi naSh+Ta sha baM ka dzai ri ba ShaT+pa daH/_/mu ni re kastu bA sA ya ta s+yaHshU n+yA ku TiM da do/_/twa yA mo na ba twa rA trau s+thA ta bya mi ti saM bi dA/_/ta tra te ra kr-i tA ti th+yaM
[\[137b.6\]]gis der gnas ma byin/_/de yi nyin mo zad tshe 'khyam/_/'dam skyes mdzod ni bsdams pa yis/_/rkang drug re ba nyams pa bzhin/_/thub pa gcig gis de la ni/_/mtshan mo khyod ni mi smra bar/_/gnas par bya zhes rab brjod nas/_/zhag sar bsti gnas stong pa byin/_/de dag gis der mgron ma byas/_/
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]taMk+Sha pAk+Sha ya kA ri NaM/_/U tse sha yA na ma b+h+ye t+ya sha nai rA shra ma de ba tA/_/ut+tiSh+Tha sA d+ho sau dza n+yA ta ku ru me d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/sad+d+har+m+ma bA di nAM lo ke pra tha mo d+yu si me me taH/_/i t+yar+thi tasta yA
[\[138a.2\]]mtshan mo 'phen byed nyal gyur pa/_/de la bsti gnas lha mo ni/_/mngon du phyogs te dal gyis smras/_/dam pa legs pa'i tshul gyis bzhengs/_/chos ni rab tu bstan par mdzod/_/'jig rten dam chos smra rnams kyi/_/dang por khyod ni bdag gis bkur/_/zhes des gsol btab thub
[\[138a.3\]]mau nI sa tAM prA ha la g+hu swa naH/_/mA tar+n+niSh+ka sa nA thA yai ba tam+me ke nA pi nir+m+ma tA/_/a smin+me mu ni nA mau naM sa ma ya saM shra ye hr-i taH/_/niSh+kA sa ya ti mA me Sha tad+b+ya ti kra ma kA ri NaM/_/i ti bru bA NaHpra Na yAd+ba hu shaHsa
[\[138a.4\]]pa des/_/gcom bskyungs de la rab smras pa/_/ma ma khyod dang kho bo yis/_/nges par 'byin pa ci slad sprul/_/gnas der bdag la thub pa yis/_/mi smra ba yi dam tshig byas/_/de las 'das par gyur na bdag_/nges par 'di yis 'byin par 'gyur/_/zhes smra de la gus pa yis/_/de yis mang du
[\[138a.5\]]ta yAr+thi taH/_/brAh+ma NA nu ma tan+d+har+m+ma muk+tuM sa mu ba tsakra me/_/nai ba bra tA ni ta nu sho Sha Na san+ta tA ni no pA ba nA ni bi dza nA ni ta po ba nA ni/_/puM sA dza TA dzi na pa ri gra ha dur+g+ra hA NAM tse taHspr-i
[\[138a.6\]]gsol btab ste/_/bram zes rjes su gnang ba yis/_/chos ni smra bar yang dag brtsams/_/rgyun du lus ni gdung bar byed pa nges pa brtul zhugs min/_/skye bo med pa'i dka' thub nags tshal dag par byed pa min/_/bzung dka'i ral pa pags pa yongs 'dzin skyes bu rnams dag gis/_/chags
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]hA pa ri tsi taM pa ri sho Sha yan+ti/_/e te ba ne pha la b+hU dzaHka pa yo na yuk+tA br-ik+ShAHsa balka la pa lA sa dza TA dz+nya TAsh+tsa/_/an+tardza la pra Na yi nasti ma yash+tsa tIr+the mith+yA ta paHpa ri ka raHpra sha
[\[138b.2\]]pas yongs 'dris sems ni yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin/_/nags su 'bras bu za ba'i spre'u 'di dag rnams dang ni/_/ljon pa 'dab ma shing shun dang bcas ral tshogs ldan pa dang /_/'jug ngogs chu nang du chags nya mid rnams kyang 'gro ba min/_/rab zhi spangs ba rnams kyis dka' thub yo
[\[138b.3\]]modz+dz+hi tA nAM/_/na b+hU ti d+ha ba lai ri b+haiHsa ba na pA yi b+hiHsan+na garbai na bya sa ni d+hir+m+r-i gaiHpa la la kaiHs+tha lI shA yi b+hiH/_/pha la pra Na yi b+hiHshu kai ra pa ni ram+ba rairlub+d+ha kai ra muk+ta bi Sha ya spr-i he ra b+hi ga tA pra shAn+tiH
[\[138b.4\]]byad brdzun pa nyid/_/thal bas dkar ba'i glang po dang ni rlung dag 'thung ba'i sbrul rnams dang /_/nags na zhen pa'i ri dgas rnams dang thang la nyal ba'i gzungs mo dang /_/'bras bu za ba'i ne tso dang ni gos med rngon pa rnams kyis kyang /_/yul la chags pa ma btang rab tu zhi ba 'ga' yang rtogs mi
[\[138b.5\]]kwa tsita/_/i ti tad+ba tsa na shru twA mu na yo bi sa bisma yAH/_/ta mA dA rot+mu khA sar+b+be pa ri pA yaR+YA ba s+thi re/_/so tsin+ta ya di yaM paR+Shata saM sA ra pa ri bar+t+ti nI/_/mi th+yai ba bra ta san+tA pa san+ta ta kle sha mash+nu te/_/
[\[138b.6\]]'gyur/_/zhes pa de yi tshig thos te/_/ya mtshan bcas pa'i thub rnams kyang /_/de la gus pas mngon phyogs te/_/kun gyis yongs su bskor nas gnas/_/de yi bsam pa 'khor bar ni/_/yongs su bskor ba'i tshogs pa 'di/_/nges par brdzun gyi brtul zhugs kyis/_/rgyun du nyon mongs gdung ba spyod/_/
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]nr-i NA ma bi d+yA saM skA rA bi dz+nyA naM nA ma rU pa tA/_/Sha DA ya ta na saM spaR+sho be da nA pa tr-iSh+Na yA/_/u pA dA naM b+ha bo dzA tirdza rA ma ra Na durga teH/_/e Sha duHkha ma yaHskan+d+haHsu ma hAn+pa ri bar+d+d+ha te/_/a pi d+yA di kra
[\[139a.2\]]mi rnams ma rig 'du byed dang /_/rnam shes ming dang gzugs dang ni/_/skye mched drug dang reg pa dang /_/tshor ba sred pa dang bcas dang /_/len pa srid pa skye ba dang /_/rga shi yis ni ngan par 'gro/_/sdug bsngal rang bzhin phung po 'di/_/shin tu che bar yongs su 'phel/_/rab zhi mkhas pa rnams
[\[139a.3\]]me Ne ba pra shAn+tA nAm+ma nI NAM/_/e kai ka s+ya ni ro d+he na la yaM yA ti ba raspa raH/_/i ti nish+tsi t+ya ma na sA pa te ShAM tad+bi d+haM pu raH/_/sad d+har+m+ma de sha nAM kr-i twA pu nastA ni da ma bra bIta/_/te ShA ma sho ts+yaM spr-i ha NI ya me ba dzan+ma
[\[139a.4\]]kyis ni/_/ma rig la sogs rim pa yis/_/re re 'gags par gyur pa na/_/gzhan dang gzhan ni 'gag par 'gyur/_/de ltar yid kyis nges bya des/_/de dag mdun du de lta yis/_/dam pa'i chos ni bstan byas nas/_/slar yang de dag la 'di smras/_/gang dag yid ni byams pas gtsang gyur cing /_/'tsho ba
[\[139a.5\]]pra sha mo tsi ta mun+na tAM nAM/_/mai trI pa pi trA Ni ma nAM si ye ShAM sad+d+har+m+ma shud+d+hA ni tsa dzI bi tA ni/_/yA ban+to s+ya b+hu bi na b+ha si bA b+ho gi nA mA ya le tsa sa twAH san+ti pra Na ya ba tsa sA tAn su kr-i ta prAr+tha ye haM/_/mai trI pA traM ku ru ta hr-i
[\[139a.6\]]dag kyang dam pa'i chos kyis dag_/rab zhi 'os pas mtho ba de dag gis/_/skye ba mya ngan mi bya dga' bar bya/_/sa gzhi 'di dang nam mkha' dang ni gdengs can dag gi gnas na yang /_/sems can gang 'khod de la gus pa'i tshig gis legs byas bdag don gnyer/_/snying ni byams pa'i snod du mdzod cig blo
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]da yaM d+har+m+ma bud+d+hiM b+ha dza d+h+waM d+har+m+ma da n+yasta ma pi pi Sha me de hi naM nAsti dI paH/_/i t+yuk+t+wa pA da pa ta le kr-i ta paR+YaM ka ban+d+ha naH/_/r-i dzu pra kA sha mar+ha twaM ta tra sAk+ShAts+tsa kAr paH/_/te ta mU tsur+b+ha daM tasmAn+na ya shAkya
[\[139b.2\]]gros dag gis chos dag bsten/_/lus can rnams la mi bzad mun par chos las gzhan pa'i sgron ma med/_/ces brjod ljon pa'i 'og tu ni/_/de yis skyil krung bcings pa byas/_/drang po rab tu gsal ba yi/_/dgra bcom nyid der mngon du byas/_/de la des smras bdag cag rnams/_/shAkya thub
[\[139b.3\]]mu neHpa daM/_/swA khyA te d+har+m+ma bi na ye pra bra dz+nyA mar+tha ma he/_/i ti te rar+thi taHso tha tsI ba ra prAn+ta lam+bi naH/_/tA nA dA ya ya yau byom+nA ma har+d+d+hi saM g+ha rak+Shi taH/_/sa shAstuHpa da mA pAR+Ya tat+pA da
[\[139b.4\]]pa'i gnas su khrid/_/legs gsungs chos ni 'dul ba las/_/rab byung bdag cag don gnyer ro/_/de nas de ltar de dag gis/_/gsol btab chos gos sna la 'phyangs/_/de dag khyer nas dge 'dun srungs/_/rdzu 'phrul che de mkha' la song /_/de yis ston pa'i gnas su phyin/_/de yi
[\[139b.5\]]na li na dwa yaM/_/mUr+d+h+nA p+ti ban+d+ya sA nan+dastasmai sar+b+baM n+ya be da yata/_/b+ha ga bAn+p+ra Na yi prI t+yA mu nI nA ma tha tad+gi rA/_/ma naHpra sAd dza ni nAM tsakre sad+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/te tat+p+ra sA dA saM dzA ta bi ma la pra sha
[\[139b.6\]]zhabs pad gnyis la ni/_/kun dga' ldan pa'i spyi bo yis/_/mngon btud de la thams cad bshad/_/de yi tshig gis thub rnams la/_/bcom ldan brtse ldan dgyes pa yis/_/yid ni rab dang skyed pa yi/_/dam pa'i chos ni bstan par mdzad/_/dri med rab zhi rgyas pa ni/_/de yi drin las skyes de
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mo da yA/_/sar+b+ba kle sha bra hA NAr+ha pU dz+ya twa mA ya yuH/_/te bra dzA te Shu shAstA ra ma pr-its+tshat+saM g+ha rak+Shi taH/_/b+ha ga baM staM b+ha ku T+yA di rU pA puSh+pa pha lo pa mAH/_/rA dz+wA b+hAstan+ta she ShA sh+tsa dr-iSh+TaHsa twA ma
[\[140a.2\]]dag_/nyon mongs thams cad gtong 'os pa'i/_/mchod 'os dgra bcom nyid du gyur/_/de dag song tshe ston pa la/_/dge 'dun srungs kyis rab dris pa/_/bcom ldan ka ba rtsig sogs gzugs/_/me tog 'bras bu mtshungs pa dang /_/thag mtshungs snal ma'i lhag ma yang /_/sems can
[\[140a.3\]]yA pa thi/_/tat+te ShAM kar+m+ma NaHka s+ya pha laM mo hA nu ban+d+hi nAM/_/i ti ta nA da rAd+p+r-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nyasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/ba b+hU buHkA sh+ya pA khya s+ya te shAstuHshrA ba kaHpu rAH/_/staM b+ha ku n+ye Shu taiHsh+leSh+ma pra k+Ship+taM saM b+ha man+di re/_/
[\[140a.4\]]bdag gis lam du mthong /_/rmongs pas bcings pa de dag ni/_/de dag las ni ci yi 'bras/_/zhes pa de yis gus pas dris/_/de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa/_/de dag sngon tshe ston pa ni/_/'od srungs zhes pa'i nyan thos gyur/_/dge 'dun khang pa'i ka ba dang /_/rtsig pa la des ngar snabs 'phangs/_/
[\[140a.5\]]ku DA ni saM g+ha br-ik+She b+h+yaHpha la puSh+pA Ni tsI pa reH/_/b+hik+Shu b+ho dza na pA ne Shu dwe ShAd+bi g+h+naM kr-i two\u0f85pa pa reH/_/saM b+ha lA b+ha pa rA br-it+tir+b+hik+ShU NA ma pa reHkr-i tA/_/te tat+kar+m+ma bi pA ke na tat+ta dA kA ra tAM ga tAH/_/i t+yA khyA
[\[140a.6\]]gzhan gyis dge 'dun ljon pa las/_/me tog dang ni 'bras bu blangs/_/dge 'dun zas dang btung ba la/_/gzhan gyi sdang bas gegs dag byas/_/gzhan gyis dge 'dun rnyed pa ni/_/dge slong dag la yongs bsgyur byas/_/de dag las kyi rnam smin des/_/rnam pa de de nyid du gyur/_/bcom ldan gyis
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]taM b+ha ga ba tA shru twA so b+hUtsha bisma yaH/_/prAp+ta mar+hat+pa daM dr-iSh+Ta b+hik+Sha baHsaM g+ha rak+Shi taM/_/dzi naM tat+kar+m+ma pa prats+tshuHpr-iSh+TaHsa tsa dza gA da tAn/_/e ka pra bra dzi taHshAstuHkA sh+ya pA khya s+ya shA sa naM/_/pu rA bi hA ra saM g+ha
[\[140b.2\]]bshad de thos nas/_/de ni ya mtshan ldan par gyur/_/dgra bcom gnas thob dge 'dun srungs/_/dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas ni/_/las de rgyal ba dag la dris/_/dris pa des kyang de la gsungs/_/ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi/_/bstan pa la ni rab byung 'di/_/dge 'dun gtsug lag khang
[\[140b.3\]]s+ya tse ya sr-i t+ya ka ro b+ha bta/_/pany+tsa ba s+ya sha tA n+yA saM saM ga tA ni bi hA ri NAM/_/pra Ni d+hA naM sha rI rAM te ku sha lA ya tsa kA ra saH/_/te nAsminy+dzan+ma ni prA pa darta twAM saM g+ha rak+Shi taH/_/ta de tat+saM ga taM bA s+ya mu nI nAM sha ta
[\[140b.4\]]du sngon/_/zhal ta byed pa nyid du gyur/_/gtsug lag khang na gnas pa ni/_/lnga brgya de yi grogs por gyur/_/lus kyi mjug tu smon lam ni/_/dge ba'i slad du de yis byas/_/skye ba 'di la dge 'dun srungs/_/de yis dgra bcom nyid thob cing /_/de dag thub pa lnga brgya po/_/'di dag de dang yang
[\[140b.5\]]pany+tsa kaM/_/rak+taiHshu klai ra si ta sa bA le rdai hi nAM kar+m+ma sU traish+tsi trA kA raM b+ha ba ti ba hu shaHprA pr-i taM dzan+ma bas+t+ra/_/t+yak+te t+yasminy+dza Tha ra b+hu dza ga m+lA na nir+m+mo ka yuk+t+yA tat+kai ba l+yaM bi sha ti ku sha lI yan+na shI taM na
[\[140b.6\]]dag 'grogs/_/lus can rnams ni dmar dang dkar dang gnag dang phra ba'i las skud kyi/_/rnam par bkra ba skye ba'i gos kyis lan mang dag tu g.yogs par gyur/_/lag 'gro rgan po lkogs dman 'dor ba'i rigs pa dag gis de btang nas/_/grangs med tsha ba med pa'i 'ba' zhig gang
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]tsoSh+NaM/_/i ti ta s+ya ni sha mya sA da rAHka thi taM te na ta thA ga te na/_/pra shaM shaM su ra na n+ya mA na pAsh+tsa ri taM sats+tsi ta s+ya b+hik+Sha baH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yaM bo d+hi sa twA bA dA
[\[141a.2\]]der dge ba ldan pa 'jug_/ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa/_/thos nas dge slong de dag gus bcas pas/_/dam pa'i sems ldan de yi spyod pa dag_/yid ni gzhan dang bral bas rab tu bsngags/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa
[\[141a.3\]]na kalpa la tA yAM saM g+ha ra k+Shi tA ba dA naM sap+ta ShaSh+Thi ta maHpal+la waH//_//kar+m+ma Ni pUr+b+ba bi hi tAM na hi tA ni tA ni kl-iSh+TA ni b+ho ga sa ma yair ti bA hi tA ni/_/gats+tshan+ti dzaM tu Sha la
[\[141a.4\]]brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dge 'dun srungs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//phan dang mi phan las rnams dag ni sngon du bsgrubs gyur pa/_/longs spyod dus kyis shin tu 'das shing nyams par gyur pa dag_/rab rgyas me tog mtshungs pas til
[\[141a.5\]]sat+ku su mo pa mA ni lI naM ti le Sh+wa na ni d+hA ya ni dzA pi saM/_/badzrA sa ni badzra sa mA d+hi ban+d+hA da thot+thi te bud+d+ha su d+hA ma yU kheH/_/sam+bad+sa rauHSha Ta b+hi ra bAp+ta dIp+ta dz+nyA no da ye b+hik+Shu ga Nesta mU tsuH/_/twad+bi yo
[\[141a.6\]]rnams dag la bsgo ba bzhin/_/srog chags rnams la rang gi bag chags bzhag nas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i gdan la sangs rgyas bdud rtsi'i zer/_/rdo rje ting 'dzin bcings las bzhengs pa'i tshe/_/rab 'bar ye shes rgyas pa lo drug gis/_/thob pa de la dge slong tshogs kyis zhus/_/khyod bral me
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gAg+ni saM ta p+tA b+ha ga bAn+ku k+Shi ko da re/_/ni yI naM su pra b+he gar+b+haM ShaD+d+hir+b+bar+ShaiR+Ya sho d+ha rA/_/tasmin+RA hu la kA b+hi khye dzA te twat+sa dr-i she shi shau/_/dzA tAHku to ya mi t+yA ha rA dzA shud+d+ho da naHkru d+hA/_/sA ba d+h+yaM ba su
[\[141b.2\]]yis gdungs gyur pa/_/grags 'dzin ma yi dku nang du/_/mngal ni chags par gyur pa dag_/bcom ldan lo drug dag nas btsas/_/khyod mtshungs byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin/_/zhes pa de ni skyes pa na/_/rgyal po zas gtsang khros pa yis/_/'di ni ga las skyes zhes smras/_/sa bdag bka'
[\[141b.3\]]d+hAM ni twA shA si ne na ma hI pa teH/_/sa b+hI ta bai ba le khe na pra b+hA be nai ba rak+Shi ta/_/twAd+b+yA yA ma shi lot+pAM ge ni k+Ship+ti tha ta yA shi shau/_/tat+pa t+ya yA tsa ni nA sau sa li le Shu p+lu bi shi kA/_/sA d+hI bra ta pa ri trA yA sta s+yaHshwa su ra
[\[141b.4\]]yis de nyid ni/_/gsod pa'i sar ni khrid gyur pa/_/spring yig gis bzhin khyod kyi mthus/_/dag pa de ni rab tu bsrungs/_/de nas khyod byon rdo nang du/_/de yis byis pa nges par bkod/_/de yis bden pa brjod pa yis/_/rdo ba de ni chu la ldengs/_/mi g.yem dag pa'i brtul zhugs can/_/de la gyos po khro
[\[141b.5\]]ko pa dzaH/_/duHkhA ba mA na san+tA paHsa pA kAt+ka s+ya kar+m+ma NAH/_/i ti b+hi k+Shu ba tsaHshru twA b+ha ga bAn+p+ra ti b+hA Sha ta/_/shrU ya tAM kar+m+ma NA ye na duHkhaM le b+he ya sho d+ha rA/_/kam+pi l+ye na ga re rA dzA brah+ma dat+taHpu rA b+ha bta/_/b+hU
[\[141b.6\]]ba skyes/_/sdug bsngal smad cing gdung ba de/_/las ni ci yi rnam smin lags/_/zhes pa dge slong tshig thos nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsungs pa/_/las ni gang gis grags 'dzin ma/_/sdug bsngal thob pa rab tu nyon/_/grong khyer kam+pi la dag tu/_/sa yi brgya byin dpal dang ldan/_/'dod ldan
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]ta lA khaN+Da laHshrI mAn+kA mi nI ku su mA yu d+haH/_/khaD+ga d+hA rA d+ha re NA dzau b+hu dze na dzi na tiHpa raM/_/pra dza dz+wA la pra tA pAg+niR+Ya s+yA rA ti ta maHpra daH/_/sa kA da tsid+ba na d+ha n+wI mr-i ga ya ke li kau tu kI/_/bi be
[\[142a.2\]]ma yis me tog mtshon/_/rgyal po tshangs byin sngon byung gyur/_/g.yul du ral gri'i rgyun 'dzin pa'i/_/dpung pa yis ni rab bskyed pas/_/gang gi gzi byin me dag ni/_/dgra la mun pa rab ster 'bar/_/nam zhig nags su gzhu 'dzin des/_/sngon gyi rtse dga'i dge mtshan la/_/shin tu
[\[142a.3\]]shA dU rA mi kA kI kr-i to shwe nA ti raM ha sA/_/ta s+yAr+k+ka ki ra Ne ta b+hi n+wA ka po le swe da bin+da baH/_/tsa kruHkuN+Da li muk+tA nAM pra ti bim+ba bi Dam+ba naM/_/mArgA ga te na sa mu hur+m+r-i ga shA ba ke na ra myA ba lo ka na ku
[\[142a.4\]]mgyogs 'gro rta yis ni/_/gcig pur byas te ring du zhugs/_/de yi 'gram par rngul gyi thigs/_/nyi ma'i zer gyis rab bskyed pas/_/rna rgyan mu tig rnams kyi ni/_/gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs par byas/_/lam nas 'ong ba'i ri dgas phrug gu dge mtshan g.yo med kyis/_/yang dang yang du de
[\[142a.5\]]tU ha la nish+tsa le na/_/hA rA gra rat+na sha ka la pra ti pim+pa te na prA dAt+k+Sha NaM sa dr-i sha rU pa pa daM su d+hAM shoH/_/ta s+yA nu rak+Sha ha ri NI ka ri NaM pra sak+ta byA mI li tIk+Sha Na mr-i ga dwi pa se bya mA na/_/
[\[142a.6\]]la dka' bar kun tu lta byed cing /_/do shal rtse yi rin cen dum bur gzugs brnyan snang byed pas/_/skad cig bdud rtsi'i zer gyi gzugs kyi gnas dang mtshungs par gyur/_/rjes su chags ldan ri dgas mo dang glang mo la chags pa'i/_/mig zum ri dgas gnyis 'thung rnams kyis rab tu bsten bya ba/_/
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]dza h+nuHshra mAm+bu shab rI ka ba rI ka lA pa puSh+pa spr-i shaHsu ra b+hi mat+ta ba nAn+ta bA tAH/_/asmi n+na ba sa re ka n+yaM shAn+Ti l+ya s+ya ma hA mu neH/_/pra srA ba pA na saM prAp+ta gar+b+ha mu kha mr-i gI su tAM/_/sa li lA ha ra NA yA tAM lA ba N+ya mr-i ta
[\[142b.2\]]ri khrod ma yi skra tshogs me tog la reg dri bzang can/_/myos pa'i nags mtha'i rlung gis de yi ngal ba'i chu dag phrogs/_/skabs der thub pa chen po ni/_/shAM Ti l+ya yi gzhon nu ma/_/gci ba 'thungs pas mngal gyi sgo/_/thob pa ri dgas bu mo ni/_/mdzes sdug bdud rtsi'i rgyun ldan zhing /_/chu ni len du 'ong
[\[142b.3\]]bA hi NAM/_/sa da daR+shA shra ma sa rit+tI re ta ra la lo tsa nAM/_/ka ma lAM ka ma lA rA ma prI t+ye ba ka ma lA ka ra/_/sr-i dzAn+tAM tsa ra Na n+yA sa dzA taiHka ma la maN+Da laiH/_/a pUr+b+ba ko tu ka ba tIM tIM dr-iSh+T+wA ma nu dze shwa raH/_/a ma ra twa
[\[142b.4\]]ba dag_/mig rab g.yo ldan bsti gnas kyi/_/chu klung ngogs su de yis mthong /_/dpal mo pad+ma'i dga' tshal la/_/dga' bas bzhin du pad+mo'i tshal/_/rkang bkod las skyes pad+mo yi/_/dkyil 'khor dag gis spro byed cing /_/sngon med dge mtshan ldan pa de/_/mthong nas mi yi dbang po ni/_/skad cig mig ni
[\[142b.5\]]mi ba prA ba nir+n+ni mo She k+Sha NaHk+Sha NaM/_/so tsin+ta ya da ho kA pi kAn+te yaM mu ni ka n+ya kA/_/ha ri NI ba ha ra t+ye ba snig+d+ha mug+d+her+b+bi lo ki taiH/_/se ba sim+ni ni be si tA ka ma li nI sa d+yA ha ne bA da yoHpUr+N+Nen+dur+b+ba da na s+ya lak+Sh+ma
[\[142b.6\]]'dzum bral bas/_/lha nyid thob pa bzhin du gyur/_/des bsams kye ma mdzes ma 'di/_/thub pa'i bu mo su zhig yin/_/ri dgas mo bzhin rab mdzes shing /_/yid 'ong lta bas yid 'phrog byed/_/pad+ma can ni rkang pa nyed pa'i g.yog gi mtshams la nges par bskos gyur cing /_/zla ba nya ba bzhin gyi mtshan ma
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]li khi taM dA sa twa mA pA di taH/_/prA rab+d+he swa ya me ba bi shwa bi dza ye b+h+ru bi b+h+ra maiHsu b+h+ru bA kA maM nir+m+ma la kArmu kA ni ta la tA nairgu N+ya mA lam+ba te/_/ki ra ti ba da na bim+ba haR+Sha pe yU Sha ma s+yA la li ta si ta ma
[\[143a.2\]]bris pa'i 'bangs nyid rab tu thob par byas/_/smin legs smin ma'i rnam 'phrul rang nyid kun las rgyal bar rab tu rtsom pa na/_/nges par 'dod pa'i gzhu yi 'khri shing dri med yon tan med pa nyid la brten/_/'di yi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsil zer can dag gis/_/bkod pa'i
[\[143a.3\]]yU khol+le kha re khA kra me Na/_/i ya ma ti sha ya mai trI ne tra yoHshro tra mU le na ba ku ba la ya lI lot+taM sa kAn+tiH ta no ti/_/i ti saM tsiM t+ya pa sha nai ra ba ru h+ya tu raM ga mAta/_/tA mu bA tsa sa ma b+h+ye te kau tu kA lo
[\[143a.4\]]ri mo'i rim pas dga' ba'i bdud rtsi rgyas par byed/_/mig dag rna ba'i rtsa bar shin tu byams par gyur pa 'di/_/ut+pal gsar pa rol pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa rab tu 'dzin/_/zhes bsams de yis dal gyis ni/_/rta las yang dag babs byas te/_/dge mtshan blta la mngon phyogs ma/_/de la btud
[\[143a.5\]]ka non+mu khIM/_/am+lA na su kr-i to dA ra su re kaN+Tha gra ho tsi tA/_/bi dza ye ma Ni mA le ba kA twaM ku ba la ye k+Sha ne/_/a ya mA nan+da san+do ha s+yan+di nI la li tA ta ba/_/na ka s+ya ku ru te kAn+tiHkau tu kA kuny+tsi tam+ma naH/_/brU hi
[\[143a.6\]]de rab smras pa/_/legs byas rgya che mi dman pa'i/_/lha yi mgrin par gzung 'os ma/_/rnam rgyal nor bu'i 'phreng ba bzhin/_/ut+pal mig can khyod ni su/_/khyod kyi mdzes sdug dga' ba yi/_/tshogs ni rgyas par byed pa 'dis/_/su yi yid ni dge mtshan la/_/'gugs pa nyid du byed ma yin/_/su yi rigs
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ka s+ya twa yA prAM shuHsha rats+tsan+d+rA ra dA ta yA/_/kA ma muk+tA la b+he baM shAHsaM b+ha be na bi b+hU Shi taH/_/i ti te nA da rAt+p+r-iSh+TA dz+nyA twA taM mu ni pu tra kaM/_/a dz+nyA ta kA ma br-it+tA pi sA b+hi lA ShA dza gA da pA/_/a ho pad+mA ba tI na ma pA
[\[143b.2\]]brgyud mu tig gi/_/'khri shing rab tu 'thob pa dag_/ston zla ltar dkar khyod 'khrungs pas/_/rnam par brgyan pa rab tu smros/_/zhes pa de yis gus pas dris/_/de ni thub pa'i bur shes nas/_/'dod pa'i spyod tshul mi shes kyang /_/mngon par 'dod ldan de yis smras/_/rkang pas pad 'phreng rab bskyed
[\[143b.3\]]do d+yat+pad+ma mA li kA/_/mr-i gi gar+b+b+ha sa mud+b+hu ta shAN+Di l+ya s+ya su tA mu neH/_/swA ga taM te mu ni su ta pri yaM me ta ba daR+sha naM/_/ma no ha ra ta raM tsi tra balka laM ki mi daM bra taM/_/bi b+hU Shi to yam+mA yU raiHshi khaN+Dai ri ba pany+tsa
[\[143b.4\]]pas/_/bdag ni pad+ma can zhes bya/_/ri dgas mngal skyes thub pa ni/_/shAM Ti l+ya yi bu mo yin/_/thub pa'i sras khyod legs par 'ongs/_/bdag ni khyod mthong rab tu dga'/_/shin tu yid 'phrog bkra ba yi/_/shing shun brtul zhugs 'di ni ci/_/rma bya'i gtsug phud lnga dag gis/_/brgyan pa bzhin du khyod
[\[143b.5\]]b+hiH/_/su rAts+tsA kIr+N+Na ku su maHsho b+ha te te dza TA b+ha baH/_/i ya mA ma la kashrU la prA le ya pha la ko dz+wa laH/_/dIr+g+hA k+Sha sU tra mA la b+hi kaN+The ba hu gu NaM ta ba/_/A sU tra ya ti te pA Nish+tsi traiHku sha pa bi tra kaiH/_/ku Ti me be Nu
[\[143b.6\]]kyi ni/_/ral tshogs 'di dag lha las kyang /_/me tog dag gis rgyas par mdzes/_/skyu ru ra ni rags pa yi/_/'bras bu kha ba rab 'bar 'dra/_/bgrang 'phring 'phreng ba ring po yis/_/khyod kyi mgrin la yon tan mang /_/'od ma'i dbyug pa 'khyog po 'dir/_/yal 'dab gsar pa'i 'phreng ba la/_/khyod kyi lag pa ku
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]daN+Desmin bya la pal+la ba mA li kAM/_/ra ma NI yA bra ta ba taHka th+yAM tAM kwa ta bA shra maH/_/ma no mr-i gA dzi na shrAn+ti me ti me ya tra sA d+hu tsa/_/i ti mug+d+ha ba tsaHswA du su d+hAr+d+raM ba su d+hA d+hi paH/_/A sA d+ya da twA pA
[\[144a.2\]]sha yis/_/dag byed bkra bas kun tu spras/_/legs pa bdag yid ri dgas ni/_/gang du ngal ni bsos gyur pa/_/dga' bar rma bya'i brtul zhugs can/_/khyod gnas gang na yod pa smros/_/zhes pa bzhin bzang ma yi tshig_/snyan zhing bdud rtsis brlan pa dag_/sa bdag gis myang lam
[\[144a.3\]]thre ya mo da kaM ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/nai bAsmin+nu tsi taM su b+h+rU dar+b+ha su tsI ra yA tsi te/_/su ku mA raM ta ba ba puHshuSh+yat+ta ru tri Ne ba nai/_/i taHsaM b+ho ga yo gyA shrIrnA ti dU re ma mA shra maH/_/e baM bi d+hA bi shI
[\[144a.4\]]brgyags kyi/_/la du byin nas de la smras/_/smin legs khyod lus shin tu gzhon/_/shing dang rtswa ni bskams gyur cing /_/ku sha'i khab kyi tshogs gtams pa'i/_/nags tshal 'dir ni 'os pa min/_/'di nas ha cang mi ring na/_/bdag gnas longs spyod 'os pa'i dpal/_/gang na rnam pa 'di lta yis/_/
