[\[144a.5\]]yan+te yasmin+pha la pa raM pa rAH/_/ni bA saHkri ya tAM ta tra tsaR+Ya tAM mAn+ma thaM ta paH/_/saM b+ho ga pa ri tsaR+YA su dza no yaM ba ni yu dz+ya tAM/_/ag+n+yut+saM ga pa taM ga taM ga ta ba tas+t+yak+Sha pra ko pa k+Sha Ne dzI bo b+h+yA da na me ta de ba bi
[\[144a.6\]]'bras bu brgyud pa rgyas pa yod/_/der ni rnam par gnas par mdzod/_/yid srubs dag gi dka' thub mdzod/_/skye bo mchog ni longs spyod kyis/_/rim gro dag la rnam par sbyor/_/mig gsum rab tu khros tshe me yi lam du phye ma leb nyid gyur ldan pa/_/srog ni rab tu rdzogs pa byed pos gsar du sprul
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]d+hi nA ma n+ye na baM nir+m+mi taM/_/kAn+tan+te ba su d+hA su d+hA ka ra ka lA ko shA nu kA ram+ba purlA ba N+yA di sa hi i me ba a sa mA nA n+yan+ma no dzan+ma naH/_/i ti shru twA tu big+d+ha s+ya mug+d+hA b+hU mi pa ter+b+ba tsaH/_/tsan+d+rA ba dA ta mA swA d+ya mo da
[\[144b.2\]]pa 'di nyid yin bsam ste/_/khyod kyi lus mdzes nor 'dzin bdud rtsi'i zer gyi cha yi mdzod kyi rjes mthun pa/_/yid las skyes pa'i mdzes sdug mtshungs med dang po de ni 'di nyid gzhan ma yin/_/zhes pa sa bdag mdzangs pa'i tshig_/bzhin bzang ma yis thos nas ni/_/la du zla ba ltar dkar ba/_/myangs
[\[144b.3\]]kan+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/twAd+b+ra tA nu br-i tai bA haM ni ba pA mi ta ba shra me/_/pra tIk+Sha swak+Sha NaM yA bad+ga twA dz+nyA mar+tha ye gu roH/_/i ti sam+bi da A sA d+hA ya sa mi twA ni dzA shrA maM/_/na bA b+hi lA Sha bi ba shA swa pan+tI mu ni ma b+h+ya
[\[144b.4\]]nas de la rab smras pa/_/khyod kyi brtul zhugs rjes spyod pa/_/khyod kyi gnas su bdag gnas bgyi/_/ji srid song nas bla ma'i bka'/_/don du gnyer la skad cig sdod/_/ces pa'i gros ni bsgrubs nas de/_/rang gi bsti gnas dag tu song /_/mngon 'dod gsar pas dbang bral bas/_/shugs ni 'byin cing
[\[144b.5\]]d+hAta/_/dr-iSh+TastA ta ba ne ko pi ma yA mu ni ku mA ra kaH/_/pra san+nA sa li la ts+tshA yA tsi tra paR+Yan+ta balka laH/_/di bya ta dA shra mod+b+hU taM pha la mA swA di tam+ma yA/_/ye nA n+ya pha la saM b+ha ro ni ya maHpa ri kalpaM taH/_/
[\[144b.6\]]thub la smras/_/yab lags bdag gis thub pa yi/_/gzhon nu su zhig nags su mthong /_/shing shun mtha' ni bkra ba dag_/rab tu dang ba'i chu ltar mdzes/_/gang gi 'bras bu gzhan gyi tshogs/_/bsdom par yongs su rtog byed pa/_/de yi gnas su rab 'khrungs pa'i/_/'bras bu mchog ni bdag gis myong /_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]gats+tshA mi twa da nu dz+nyA tA kAn+taM ta s+ya ta po ba naM/_/tat+sau dza ne pra sak+ta me nA n+ya tra ra ma te ma tiH/_/i ti tad+pa tsa naM shru twA bismi taHsma ra sU tsa kaM/_/tA mu bA tsa mu nirmug+d+hA yo ba non+mA da shaM ki taH/_/dr-iSh+Ta s+t+wa
[\[145a.2\]]de yi dka' thub nags tshal du/_/khyod kyi rjes gnang bdag mchi'o/_/de yi gzhung bzang la chags pa'i/_/bdag blo gzhan na dga' ba med/_/ces pa de tshig 'dod pa ni/_/gsal byed thos nas ya mtshan zhing /_/lang tsho smyon par dogs pa yi/_/thub pas mdzes ma de la smras/_/khyod kyis
[\[145a.3\]]yA b+hu dza go sau ma n+ya rat+na bi b+hU Shi taH/_/b+ha ban+ti mu na yaHpu tri na dwi dzi hwA na b+ho gi na/_/sa sne hargu ru b+hiHsa rA pa ri Na tau duHkha pra der+m+mo da kai rA yA to bi kha yau ra bA ti ma d+hu raiHpri tiM br-i thA mA kr-i thaH/_/mug+d+he kA
[\[145a.4\]]mthong de lag 'gro ni/_/rin chen gyis brgyan yin nam snyam/_/bu mo thub pa rnam dag ni/_/longs spyod can min lce gnyis min/_/yul bzhin yongs su gyur tshe sdug bsngal rab ster snum bcas lci ba'i la du ni/_/shin tu dngar ba dag gis 'ongs pa la ni don med dga' bar yongs ma byed/_/mdzes ma
[\[145a.5\]]ma pha lA ni tA ni pa ra sAM n+yA yA sa sik+tA n+ya laM ye ShA me ba bi Sho pa me na dza na tA swA de na saM mU ts+tsha ti/_/e hi daR+sha ya me d+hU rA t+kastA bat+sa mu neHsu taH/_/i t+yuk+t+wA ta Ta nI tI raM ta yA sa ha ya yau mu niH/_/sa bi
[\[145a.6\]]'dod pa'i 'bras bur ro ldan nyon mongs dag gis bran pa gang de rnams/_/shin tu nges par dug dang mtshungs pa'i nyams su myong ba bskyed pas rgyal bar byed/_/tshur shog re shig thub pa'i sras/_/de su ring nas bdag la ston/_/zhes brjod klung gi ngogs su ni/_/de dang lhan cig thub pa song /_/de yis chu klung
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]lo kya pa rit+tI ra bra h+madat+taM ma hi pa tiM/_/yo gyaM gu Na ga No dA raM dzA mA ta ra ma ma n+ya ta/_/nr-i po pi mu ni mA lokya bai la k+Sh+ya bi na tA na naH/_/dwi gu Ne na pra NA me na ni nA ye ba pra san+na tAM/_/ni dzo tsi te na bi d+hi nA
[\[145b.2\]]ngogs su ni/_/sa yi bdag po tshangs byin mthong /_/yon tan tshogs ni rgya che ste/_/mag pa dag tu 'os par bsams/_/mi bdag gis kyang thub pa ni/_/mthong nas skyengs pas bzhin dud cing /_/gnyis 'gyur rab tu btud pa yis/_/nges par rab tu dang ba thob/_/thub pas rang la 'os pa yi/_/
[\[145b.3\]]mu ni nA pra ti pA di tAM/_/ta tastAM haR+Sha pe yU Sha ra ha li ma gra hIn+n+r-i paH/_/nA s+yAHka dA tsit+kar+t+ta byo ma n+yuHpa ra gi rA twa yA/_/mug+d+hA pA l+ye ya mi t+yuk+t+wA mu niHprA yAtshwa mA shra maM/_/a tha haR+Sha mi bA ru h+ya ha yaM dzA yA sa khaHk+Sha
[\[145b.4\]]cho ga yis ni rab tu byin/_/de nas rab dga' bdud rtsi yi/_/rlabs de mi yi bdag pos blangs/_/nam yang khyod kyi tshig gzhan gyis/_/'di la khro bar mi bya zhing /_/mdzes ma 'di ni bskyab bya zhes/_/brjod nas thub pa rang gnas song /_/de nas dga' bzhin rta la zhon/_/chung ma dang 'grogs skad cig
[\[145b.5\]]NAtra/_/rA dza d+hA niM sa mA sA bya nr-i pany+tsa kre ma hot+pa baM/_/sar+b+bAn+ta pu ra dza na s+ya mUr+d+d+h+ni n+yasta ma hI b+hu dzI/_/sa ya yau shi Sh+ya tAM pa t+yuHka lA kau sha la ke li Shu/_/pA da n+yA paiHka ma la ka li kaM b+hu mi mA lo kya tas+ya de
[\[145b.6\]]gis/_/rgyal sar yang dag phyin nas ni/_/rgyal pos dga' ston chen po byas/_/pho brang 'khor gyi sde kun gyi/_/gtsug tu sa bdag gis bkod de/_/sgyu rtsal mkhas pa'i rtsed 'jo la/_/bdag po'i slob ma nyid du gyur/_/de yi rkang pa bkod pas sa gzhi pad+mas brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/_/der ni
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bI shab+daM nr-i pa pa ri dza nasta tra me ne ya thAr+thaH/_/di byod+kaR+ShaHsu kr-i ta pa tsi baHsU ts+ya te ke tu b+hU taHs+phI tAsh+tsaR+Yai ra ti sha ya ma yairlak+Sha NaiHpu N+ya b+hA dzAM/_/an+taHpu ra pu ran+d+hI Shu bi mu khe na ma
[\[146a.2\]]rgyal po'i 'khor gyi lha mo'i sgra dag ji bzhin don can bzung /_/bsod nams ldan pa'i mchog tu khyad 'phags legs byas grogs ni rtogs gyur pa/_/ngo mtshar rgyas pa phul byung rang bzhin mtshan nyid rnams kyis gsal bar byed/_/pho brang 'khor gyi bud med las/_/phyi rol phyogs
[\[146a.3\]]hI b+hu dzA/_/le b+he sau b+hA gya sho b+ha pA ra ma mA nA g+ha na sta nI/_/a tha kA le na sA gar+b+ha mA d+hat+ta ba su d+hA pa teH/_/tsin+tA sha l+yaM tsa saM sak+ta man+taHpu ra ba d+hU dza naH/_/A san+na pra sa pA mug+d+hAM ta tasta me t+ya man+di re/_/kau Ti
[\[146a.4\]]pa'i sa bdag dang /_/rtse zhing nu rgyas ldan pa des/_/skal ba bzang zhing mdzes pa thob/_/de nas dus kyis nor 'dzin gyi/_/bdag las de yis mngal bzung zhing /_/pho brang btsun mo'i skye bo yis/_/bsam pas chags pa'i zug rngu yang /_/de nas khyim du mdzes ma ni/_/btsar nye de la mngon phyogs te/_/gya gyu
[\[146a.5\]]l+ya kru ra mAt+paR+Ya dU tser dzAM ga nA dza naH/_/pra sha ba s+ya bi d+hiM mug+d+he na dzA nI ye nr-i po tsi taM/_/dza na nI hi su ta sU te paT+Te na pi hi te k+Sha NA/_/i t+yuk+t+wA sA sa pat+nI b+hiHprau D+ha gar+b+ha b+ha rArdi tA/_/u tsi taM b+ha ba
[\[146a.6\]]gdug pa'i phrag dog las/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis smras/_/mi bdag la 'os btsa' ba yi/_/cho ga rmongs ma khyod mi shes/_/ma yi mig ni gos dag gis/_/bsgribs la bu ni btsa' bar bya/_/zhes pa btsun mo gzhan gyis smras/_/mngal rgyas khur gyis gzir ba des/_/khyod kyis bdag la 'os
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]tI b+hir+m+mA kri ya tA mi t+yu bA tsa tA/_/ta tastA b+hir+n+ni rud+d+hA k+ShI dr-i D+ha ban+d+he na bA pa sA/_/sA sU ta bA la yu ga laM pra tap+ta ka na ka pra b+haM/_/d+h+r-i twA tau bas+t+ra bi hi te many+dzu She gU D+ha mu dr-i te/_/gi gA dza le niHka ru NaHku mA rau
[\[146b.2\]]pa ni/_/mdzod ces de dag rnams la smras/_/de nas de dag rnams kyis mig_/ras kyis dam du bcings pas bkab/_/btso ma gser gyi 'od ldan pa'i/_/byis pa zung ni de las btsas/_/gzhon nu de dag sgrom bur bcug_/gos kyis dkris shing rgya btab nas/_/bud med snying rje med rnams kyis/_/gang gA'i chu la
[\[146b.3\]]bik+Ship+ta s+t+ri yaH/_/kr-i twA rak+tAk+ta ba da nA mU tsuHpad+mA ba tIM tsa tAH/_/sha ka la dwa ya ma s+yan+daM dzA taM te k+Ship+ta maM b+ha se/_/bi pu lot+pa ba pan+nad+d+haHkiM dzA ta mi ti b+hU pa tiH/_/a prits+tsha dAn+ta pu ri kAn+pu tra san+daR+sha not+pu kAH/_/te taM ba
[\[146b.4\]]gsang ste 'phangs/_/pad+ma can gdong khrag gis ni/_/bsgos te de dag gis smras pa/_/khyod la dum bu g.yo med gnyis/_/btsas pa dag ni chu la 'phangs/_/dga' ston rgya che chas bcug cing /_/bu ni blta bar 'dod pa yis/_/sa yi bdag pos ci skyes zhes/_/pho brang 'khor pa rnams la dris/_/de la de dag
[\[146b.5\]]b+hA Shi ri de ba sa dr-i shaM su tA twad+d+wa ya/_/saM dzA taM b+hak+Shi taM de byA pi shA ts+ye ba ki muts+ya te/_/trastaHshru twe ti nr-i pa tirga twAn+taHpu ra man+di raM/_/rak+tAk+ta ba da nAn+de bIM dr-iSh+T+wA sa t+ya ma ma n+ya ta/_/ba d+hA ya ba hi rut+s+r-iSh+TA sa
[\[146b.6\]]gis smras lha/_/sras ni khyod dang mtshungs pa gnyis/_/yang dag 'khrungs pa lha mos zos/_/sha za mo nyid ci zhig brjod/_/'di thos mi bdag skrag pa yis/_/pho brang 'khor gyi khang par song /_/lha mo bzhin ras khrag gis ni/_/spags pa mthong nas bden par bsams/_/sa bdag rab tu khros pa yis/_/de
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]krud+d+he na ma hI b+hu dzA/_/gup+tA d+h+r-i tA man+t+ri ba raiHsa pat+nI do Sha saM ki b+haH/_/a tha byom+nA sa ma b+h+ye t+ye shAN+Di l+yA shra ma de ba tA/_/an+tar+hi tA dza na s+yA gre dza gA da dza ga tI pa ti/_/nirdo ShAM twad+ba shAM yo ShAM ba d+hA yot+s+r-i dza
[\[147a.2\]]ni gsad slad phyi rol btang /_/chun ma'i skyon du dogs pa yis/_/blon po mchog gis sbas te bzung /_/de nas mkha' la shAn Da l+ya'i/_/bsti gnas lha mo mngon phyogs te/_/mi snang bar ni skye bo yi/_/mdun du 'gro ba'i bdag la smras/_/khyod dbang bud med skyon med ni/_/gsed slad gtong ba
[\[147a.3\]]tasta ba/_/nirbi tsA ra pra mA de na ma n+ya nirmU li taM ya shaH/_/pad+mA ba tI pa pat+nI b+hi rmug+d+hA ba na mr-i gI su tA/_/pany+tsi tA swa su khA ye ti na dzA nI She bi shA mya te/_/bi b+ha bo gra pi sha tse na ni t+yA d+hiSh+Thi ta tse ta saM/_/e baM
[\[147a.4\]]khyod nyid kyis/_/rnam par ma dpyad bag med kyis/_/grags pa rtsad nas phyung ngam snyam/_/nags kyi ri dgas bu mo rmongs/_/pad+ma can ni chun ma yis/_/rang nyid bde slad bslus pa 'di/_/sa bdag khyod kyis yongs ma shes/_/'byor pa'i sha za drag po yis/_/rtag tu byin brlabs sems ldan la/_/phal cher
[\[147a.5\]]bi d+hai ba prA ye Na b+ha ba t+yun+ma di nI ma tiH/_/b+ho gAn+d+haHpra b+ha baHswa b+hA ba su la b+ha shrI pi b+h+ra mot+saM kha lAHsa t+ya bya t+ya ya b+hU ma yo yu ba ta yaHpu N+yA b+hi tsA ra kri yAH/_/swa ts+tshan+dAr+b+hu ta bA da na sh+tsa pi shu nAHkhe tsi tra kar+m+mo d+ya
[\[147a.6\]]rnam pa 'di lta yi/_/blo gros smyon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rje bo longs spyod kyis long rang bzhin gyis smod dpal gyi rnam 'phrul ldan zhing 'phyar/_/na chung bden pa nyams pa'i sa gzhi bsod nams mngon par 'joms pa'i bya ba can/_/phra ma ldan pa dang 'dun rmad byung smra byed mkha' la ri mo'i las sbyor rnams/_/
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]tA ya trai ka tra ba san+ti ta tra pa ra laHsAd+huH ka thaM dzI ba ti/_/an+tar+hi ta ta no di byAHshru twe ti ba tsa saM nr-i paH/_/ku pi ta ta s+ya br-it+tAM taM sa prats+tshAn+taHpu rAM ga nAH/_/kro d+hA krAn+ta s+ya nr-i pa te stI bra shA sa na shaM ki tAH/_/tA ni bi d+ya ya thA br-it+taM ba b+hU
[\[147b.2\]]gang du nges par rnam par gnas pa der ni dam pa drang po ji ltar 'tsho/_/lha mo lus ni mi snang ba'i/_/tshig de thos nas sa bdag ni/_/khros pas de yi byung tshul dag_/btsun mo'i tshogs la rab tu dris/_/khro bas non pa mi bdag gi/_/bka' ni drag pos dogs gyur pa/_/de dag gis ni byung tshul bzhin/_/bshad
[\[147b.3\]]bur+b+ha ya bi hwa lAH/_/nirdo ShaM da yi tAM dz+nyA twA pa pat+nI bany+tsi tAM nr-i paH/_/ba d+h+ya b+hU mi sa mut+p+r-iSh+TA shu sho tsA nu sha yA ku laH/_/rA ga kro d+ho kr-i pA ladz+dzA sho kaistu l+ya ba lo da yaiH/_/sa mu hur+m+mo ha pa tsi bair+b+hA gI kr-i
[\[147b.4\]]nas 'jigs pas 'khrugs par gyur/_/chun mas bslus pa'i btsun mo ni/_/gsod sar rab tu btang ba dag_/skyon med shes nas mi yi bdag_/'gyod pas gzir bas mya ngan byas/_/mtshungs par stobs rgyas chags dang khro/_/brtse bas ngo tsha mya ngan dang /_/rmongs pa'i grogs kyis yang yang du/_/de ni
[\[147b.5\]]ta i bA b+ha bta/_/hA bri ye hI na pu N+ya s+ya kwa pu naHsaM ga mas+t+wa yA/_/ma me t+yuk+t+wA na ra pa tir+b+bi pa pA ta ma hI ta le/_/a tha gaM gA pra bA hAp+taM many+dzu ShaM dzA la dzI ba naMH/_/A dA ya rA dza mu drAM ka mA ya yur+d+hI ba rAH
[\[147b.6\]]bskal par byas bzhin gyur/_/kyi hud dga' ma khyod dang ni/_/phyi nas bsod nams dman pa dag_/gang du 'grogs pa zhes brjod nas/_/mi bdag sa la 'gyel bar gyur/_/de nas gang gA'i rgyun thob pa/_/sgrom du rgyal po'i rtags mtshan can/_/nya pa rgya yis 'tsho rnams kyis/_/bzung nas mdun sar yang dag
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]sa b+hAM/_/tair+n+yaste pu ra tasta smin sa ha sod+g+ha Ti ta nr-i paH/_/da daR+sha bA la yu ga laM pra t+ya ga ka ma la pra b+haM/_/tu l+ya rU pau nr-i pa s+ya mau sa ha srAM sho ri bA shwi nau/_/ku mA rau lak+Sha No dA dau dzA tA bi ti dza na swa
[\[148a.2\]]'ongs/_/de dag gis de mdun bkod cing /_/'phral la mi bdag gis phye tshe/_/pad+mo gsar pa'i 'od ldan pa'i/_/byis pa zung zhig mthong bar gyur/_/'od stong pa yi tha skar bzhin/_/gzhon nu 'di dag mi bdag gi/_/gzugs mtshungs mtshan nyid rgya che bar/_/skyes zhes skye bos rab tu
[\[148a.3\]]naH/_/ta taHsa bASh+pa ta na yau gr-i hI twAM ke ma hI pa tiH/_/pri yA bi ra hA sho kAr+t+taHsan+tA pa ma d+hi kaM ya yau/_/a tha dIr+g+ha ma tirnA ma ma hA mA t+yasta ma bra bIta/_/de ba dzI ba ti pat+nI pa pat+nI dza na bany+tsi tA/_/shru twai
[\[148a.4\]]bsgrags/_/de nas sa bdag mchi ma dang /_/btsas pas sras dag pang du blangs/_/dga' ma dang bral mya ngan gyis/_/gzir ba'i gdung ba lhag par gyur/_/de nas blo gros ring zhes pa'i/_/blon po chen pos de la smras/_/lha gcig khyod kyi btsun mo ni/_/chun ma'i tshogs kyis bslus pa 'tsho/_/de thos
[\[148a.5\]]tat+sa ha sA rA dzA lab+d+ha dzI ba i bot+thi ta/_/pr-iSh+TaH san+daR+sha ye t+yuk+t+wA pra ya yau man+t+ri man+di raM/_/ta tra tAM duHkhi tAM dr-iSh+TA ma n+yu bi smr-i ta saM b+h+ra mAM/_/a ba pA na sa mud+big+nAM dza gA da dza ga tI pa tiH/_/yai re Sha bi Sha maHsh+le ShaHpri
[\[148a.6\]]'phral la rgyal po ni/_/'tsho ba thob pa bzhin du langs/_/dga' bas ston zhes brjod nas ni/_/blon po'i khang par rab tu song /_/der ni sdug bsngal ldan pa de/_/khro bas gus pa brjed gyur cing /_/smad pas kun tu yid byung ma/_/mthong nas 'gro ba'i bdag gis smras/_/gang gis mi bzad lhag ma ni/_/dga'
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ye ta ba bi nir+m+mi ta/_/e hi pa sh+yA d+hu NA te ShAM bi tsi tra ba d+ha be sha saM/_/pra sI da t+ya dza saM tA paM mA mau nA b+hi mu khi b+ha ba/_/i t+yu k+t+wA ni pa pA tA s+yAHpA da yoHpr-i thi bI pa tiH/_/sA ba dad+bASh+pa d+hA ri b+hi ShiM ts+ya mA non+na tasta nI/_/
[\[148b.2\]]ma khyod la rnam sprul pa/_/tshur shog da ni de dag rnams/_/gsod pa'i sdug bsngal dka' la ltos/_/gdung ba thong la dang bar mdzod/_/mi smra mngon du phyogs ma byed/_/ces brjod de yi rkang pa la/_/sa yi bdag po rnam par 'gyel/_/nu ma rgyas pa mchi ma yi/_/rgyun gyis bran byed des smras pa/_/
[\[148b.3\]]na ren+d+ra mA kr-i thAHko saM dza ne tI brA pa kA ri Ni/_/pa t+yaM bi pr-i ya kA ri NI Shu nr-i pa te ma n+yarna me bi d+ya te bai raM hik+Sha ma yai ba yA t+yu pa sha maM bai re Na tad+bar+t+b+ha te/_/sha truM nai ba bi b+huHpa rA b+ha ba ba d+ho nai po pa kA re su kr-ita
[\[148b.4\]]skye bo mi bzad gnod byed la/_/mi dbang khro ba yongs ma mdzad/_/mi bdag bden par dga' dang bral bar byed pa rnams la bdag ni khro yod min/_/nges par bzod pas dgra ni nye bar zhi 'gyur khon gyi de nyid 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gnod pa bsgrub la dgra ni khyab bdag ma yin nges par grogs ni phan la
[\[148b.5\]]sar+p+paM prAk+ta na kar+m+ma nir+m+mi ta mi daM duHkhA hi kaM de he nAM/_/kr-i tA pa kA re bi pa rA b+ha bod+ya maM na nA ma kuR+YA da bi tsAr+ya bud+d+hi mAn/_/kru d+hA pa raM kro d+ha bi ShaM bi bar+d+d+ha te na shAn+ti me ti dz+wa li tog+ni rag+ni nA/_/duH
[\[148b.6\]]min/_/lus can rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las kyis sprul/_/gnod pa byed pa la yang gnod pa'i sbyor ba dag_/ma dpyad par ni blo gros ldan pas mi bya ste/_/khros pas mchog tu khro ba'i dug ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/me nyid mnan pas me ni zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/re zhig
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]kha saM tA pi tA tA bat+tA ta s+yai be ta po ba naM/_/gats+tshA mi tad+ba tsaHpUr+b+baM kA mi n+yA na kr-i tam+ma yA/_/bA ri tA pi pa ran+ne na ma ma kA mA pha la spr-i hA/_/yau ba naun+mA da do She Na na ni br-it+tA ka ro mi kiM/_/i t+yuk+t+wA ni shwa san+ti
[\[149a.2\]]sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bdag_/yab kyi dka' thub tshal nyid du/_/'gro de de tshig 'dod ldan ma/_/bdag gis sngon tshe yongs ma byas/_/bdag ni 'dod 'bras la chags pa/_/de yis rab tu zlog gyur kyang /_/lang tshos myos pa'i skyon gyis ni/_/zlog par ma gyur ci zhig bya/_/zhes brjod de ni shugs
[\[149a.3\]]sA bi li khan+tI pA dA b+hu baM/_/ba b+hU ba na mra bad nA k+Sha NaM mau nA ba lam+bi nI/_/pra NA me nA pi nr-i pa terna prA pa sra ban+na tAM/_/srem+nA sha l+ya tu lAM d+hat+te mi th+yA do Sha pa ri gra haH/_/sA d+hA tu rak+ta ba sanA dza gA pa pi tu rA shra maM/_/
[\[149a.4\]]'byin cing /_/rkang pa yis ni sa la 'bri/_/skad cig bzhin ras dud pa yis/_/mi smra ba la brten par gyur/_/mi bdag gis ni phyag byas kyang /_/de ni rab dang nyid ma gyur/_/rdzun gyi skyon ni yongs bzung ba/_/mdza' ba'i zug rngu mtshungs par 'dzin/_/de ni dmar ba'i bzhin bzung nas/_/yab kyi bsti gnas dag tu song /_/
[\[149a.5\]]b+hu dzaM ga ko Ti lo ma n+yur+m+mA ni nAM sa hi duHsa haH/_/A liM gya mA ne ba la tA sa khI b+hir+b+h+r-iM ga swa naiHswA ga ta ba di nI b+hiH/_/prem+nA mr-i gI b+hiHpa ri baR+Ya mA NA ta ta po ba naM sA pi tu rA pa sA da/_/yA ti mu nau pu nya ni d+ho pra san+nan+ta
[\[149a.6\]]khengs ldan rnams kyi khro ba ni/_/lag 'gro gya gyu de bzod dka'/_/bung ba'i sgra yis dge legs brjod pa yi/_/'khri shing grogs mo rnams kyis 'khyud pa bzhin/_/ri dgas rnams kyi mdza' bas yongs bskor zhing /_/pha yi dka' thub nags su de phyin gyur/_/dka' thub khyad par gyis bsgrubs 'jig rten
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]pa bi she ShArdzi ta me ba lo kaM/_/dr-iSh+T+wA shra maM shU n+ya ma d+hA ra br-it+taHpad+mA ba tI mo ha ha tA ba b+hU ba/_/bAt+sa l+ya mA dzan+ma ni lI na man+taHswas+tha swa b+hA ba s+ya pi tuHsma ran+ti/_/shU n+yA s+t+ri lo ki ma ba ma n+ya mA nA bi ShA rdi te bA hi
[\[149b.2\]]ni/_/dang bar thub pa bsod nams gter song tshe/_/bsti gnas stong mthong 'tsho ba mi brtan pa'i/_/pad+mo can ni rmongs pas bcom par gyur/_/rang bzhin rnal gnas pha yi mnyes gshin dang /_/skye ba'i bar ni nang du gcags pa dran/_/'jig rten gsum bzhin stongs par sems shing de/_/dug gis gzir
[\[149b.3\]]ha te ba sA b+hUta/_/ta de ba ta s+yA mu ni nA bi hI naM baM naM dza gA ma pri yaM twaM kA le na/_/niHshe Sha ni pI ta sA ra b+ha ban+ti ra ha swa b+hA bA bi ra ha swa b+hA ba/_/te Sh+we ba de she Shu ma no ha re Shu te Sh+wi ba puSh+bA ka ra bA sa re Shu/_/
[\[149b.4\]]bzhin sbrul gyis bcom bzhin gyur/_/thub pas dman pas nags tshal de nyid ni/_/de la dga' ba dga' min nyid du gyur/_/dus kyi snying po ma lus 'thungs gyur pa'i/_/dngos po rnams ni 'bral ba'i rang bzhin yin/_/yid 'phrog yul ni de dag kho na dang /_/me tog 'byung gnas nyin par de dag nyid/_/
[\[149b.5\]]e ke na ke na pi bi nA dza na s+ya sar+b+ba bi ShA dA spa da tA mu pai ti/_/bai shaM ta taHpra bra dzi tA nu rU paM bi d+hA ya sA b+hU ta la tsan+d+ra re khA/_/su khodz+dz+hi ta dik+Shu pa ri b+h+ra man+tI bA rA Na sIM shAn+ti mi bA pa pA da/_/ta trA tha rAdz+nyA kr-i kI nA mri
[\[149b.6\]]su zhig gcig dang bral ba'i skye bo la/_/thams cad chags bral gnas nyid dag tu 'gyur/_/de nas sa gzhi dag gi zla ris de/_/rab byung rjes su mthun pa'i chas bzung nas/_/bde bas btang ste phyogs su yongs 'khyam zhing /_/zhi bar bzhin du bA rA Na sIr phyin/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kI 'dod ldan pas/_/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]gA k+Shi pa prar+th+ya mA nA s+ya b+hi lA Sha b+hA dzA/_/ta paHpra dIp+tag+ni shi khe ba ta s+ya saM spaR+sha yo gyA na ka thaM tsi dA pIta/_/sA rA dza pat+nI b+hi ra ti pra yat+nA da b+h+yA ts+ya mA na tri da shAM ga ne ba/_/ta tra su pr-it+tA ni tsin ta yan+tI pa ti bra tA kA
[\[150a.2\]]der ni ri dgas mig de don gnyer yang /_/dka' thub me lce 'bar bzhin de yis ni/_/ji zhig ltar yang reg 'os nyid ma gyur/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis rab 'bad nas/_/mngon par mchod cing lha mo bzhin du de/_/legs spyod sems shing bdag po'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/der
[\[150a.3\]]la mu pA sa kaM tsita/_/tAM bra h+ma dat+to pi bi shiSh+Ta tsA rasta tra s+thi tA b+hU mi pa tin+ni sha mya/_/bi yo ga duHkhA na la da h+ya mA naHsa mA ya yau brah+ma Na kU Ta be shaH/_/a tha bra tAts+tshA di ta tsA ru be shAM bi lo kya tAM shI la
[\[150a.4\]]ni cung zad dus shig nye bar gnas/_/'bral ba'i sdug bsngal mo yis sreg byed cing /_/de ni de na gnas pa sa yi bdag_/tshangs byin gyis kyang nyan rna bsrings las thos/_/bram ze'i chas su bcos nas yang dag 'ongs/_/de nas brtul zhugs mdzes pa'i chas kyis bsgribs/_/tshul khrims
[\[150a.5\]]ya shaHpa tA kaM/_/pra sA da nA ya pra Na yA b+hi pA rI nr-i paHswa rU paM pra ka TI tsa kA ra/_/tI brA pa d+ho ha mi ti bru bA Ne na ma hI pa tau pA su tsi raM ru ro da/_/ma na swi nI nA ma ba lA na ma n+yu ru dI ra Ne nA pi na ba twa me ti/_/
[\[150a.6\]]grags pa'i ba dan de mthong nas/_/dang ba'i slad du mi bdag gus par ni/_/mngon du phyogs pas rang gzugs gsal bar byas/_/sa bdag bdag gi gnod pa mi bzad pa/_/zhes smra tshe na de ni yun ring dus/_/khengs ldan rnams kyis smad pa'i khro ba ni/_/brjod pa na yang gsar pa nyid du 'gyur/_/
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]g+ha nA shru d+hA rA pa ri hA ra kA rI sma ren+du re khAM sa pha lI kr-i tA shaH/_/kAn+tA sha rat+kA la i ba pra pA d+ya ni nA ya rA dzA ni dza rA dza d+hA nIM/_/pA dAM bu dza n+yA pa pa ro dza mA lI bi yo ga kA le pra sha maM prA yA tA/_/prA durba b+hu ba pri
[\[150b.2\]]stug po mchi ma'i rgyun ni yongs sel zhing /_/'dod pa'i zla ris phyogs su 'bras ldan byed/_/rgyal po ston dus lta bus mdzes ma ni/_/dang bar byas nas rang gi rgyal sar khrid/_/rkang pa'i pad+mo bkod pa'i mtsho skyes 'phreng /_/bral ba'i dus su rab tu zhi gyur pa/_/dga' dang 'grogs tshe de la rab
[\[150b.3\]]ya saM ga me s+yAHsaM b+ho ga lak+Sh+mI ri ba gA D+ha rA gA/_/dzan+mAn+ta re pA ki la ka n+ya ke pa pra t+ya ka bud+d+hA ya bi la sa pad+maM/_/da twA pi lo b+hAt+pu na rA da de tad+bi tsAR+Ya sho b+hAM pra da dau pu na sh+tsa/_/pad+ma pra dA ne na ba b+hU bu ra s+yAHpA dA ba
[\[150b.4\]]'khrungs te/_/chags pa drag po'i longs spyod dpal 'byor bzhin/_/skye ba gzhan las nges par bu mo des/_/rang sangs rgyas la rtse dga'i pad+ma dag_/phul nas chags pas blangs te de yis ni/_/mdzes par spyad nas slar yang de yis ni/_/rab tu phul bas 'di yi rkang pa ni/_/bkod pa
[\[150b.5\]]tA re Shu sa ro ru hA Ni/_/A dA no do ShAd+bi ra tA ni kA le pu naHpra dA nAt+pu na rung+ga tA ni/_/te ne ba dat+tA ha ra Nod+b+ha be na swa kar+m+ma pA ke na ma lI ma se Shu/_/pad+mA ba tI ba d+h+ya pa daM bi siSh+Ta sai bA d+ya kA le na
[\[150b.6\]]rnams la mtsho skyes 'khrungs par gyur/_/blangs pa'i skyon las dus su bral gyur cing /_/slar yang phul bas slar yang byung bar gyur/_/byin dang len pa de dag las 'khrungs pa/_/rang las smin pa yis de skyon rnams la/_/pad+mo can de gsod pa'i gnas btang ste/_/dus kyis da lta grags 'dzin
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ya sho d+ha rA tsa/_/shru twe ti sar+b+be ka thi taM dzi ne na tAM tsi tra tAM kar+m+ma pha lo da ya s+ya/_/ba b+hU bu sh+tsaR+Ya pa ri gra he Na tsi trA b+hi lI nA i ba b+hik+Sha bste/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA
[\[151a.2\]]ma yang ngo /_/las kyi 'bras bu rgyas pa'i bkra ba de/_/de skad rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/_/dge slong de dag thams cad ngo mtshar ni/_/yongs su 'dzin pas ri mor bkod bzhin gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
[\[151a.3\]]yAM pad+mA pa t+yA ba dA na maSh+Te ShaSh+Thi ta maHpal+la baH//_//te ShA ma she Sha ku sha la pra Ni d+hA na d+hAm+nA shud+d+haH su kha s+thi ti ra yaM tsa pa rash+tsa lo kaH/_/ye ShAm+bi she Sha tsa ri ton+na ta lak+Sha
[\[151a.4\]]bsam gyi 'khri shing las pad+ma ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//gang gi spyod pa'i khyad par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid ldan rnams kyis/_/legs byas dag ni mchod rten ldan pa'i nor 'dzin mas smra zhing /_/ma lus dge ba'i smon lam gnas su gyur pa de
[\[151a.5\]]NA nAM tsai t+yA n+wi tA ba su ma tI su kr-i taM bra bI ti/_/pu re pa Ta li pu tre b+hU da sho kaHpr-i thi bi pa tiH/_/ye nA sho kaHkr-i to lo kaHsa myak+pA la nA pA li taH/_/bi d+hA ya bo d+hi mu pa naM ye na kAny+tsa na baR+Sha Na/_/tri
[\[151a.6\]]dag ni/_/'jig rten 'di dang gzhan yang dag cing bde ba bstan par gyur/_/grong khyer pa tra li pu trar/_/gang gis yang dag bskyangs bsrungs pas/_/'jig rten mya ngan med byed pa/_/sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung /_/byang chub slad du khrus bsgrubs nas/_/gang gis gser gyi char 'bebs shing /_/chos
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]tsI ba rAts+tsha da ne na b+hik+Shu saM g+ho b+hi pU dzi taH/_/mA n+yaHs+yA dut+ta maHshrI mAnya sha pa s+tha bi ra s+ya paH/_/a tI ta bud+d+ha sha rI ra d+hA tU nAM dIp+ta te dza sAM/_/a nar+g+hA NAM tsa rat+na nAM kr-i twA saM gra ha mA da
[\[151b.2\]]gos gsum ni 'gebs pa yis/_/dge slong dge 'dun rnam par mchod/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas sku yi ni/_/ring bsrel gzi brjid 'bar rnams dang /_/bla med dpal ldan gnas brtan ni/_/grags pa de yis mchod byar gyur/_/rin thang med pa'i rin cen rnams/_/gus pas bsdu ba byas
[\[151b.3\]]rAta/_/bi da d+he mau k+ti ts+tshat+t+ra tsA ru tse t+yAM ki tAM ma hIM/_/nA ga lo kaM swa yaM ga twA sau ga taM d+hA tu sany+tsa ya/_/sa nA gA kr-i ta mA dA ya rat+na snyu pA ba lIM bya d+hAta/_/ta s+yA shI ti sA ha prA Ni
[\[151b.4\]]nas ni/_/sa gzhi mu tig gdugs mdzes kyi/_/mchod rten dag gis mtshan pa bsgrubs/_/rang nyid klu yi 'jig rten du/_/phyin nas bde gshegs ring bsrel tshogs/_/klu yis byin pa blangs nas de/_/rin cen mchod rten 'phreng ba byas/_/de yi mchod rten chos rgyal gyis/_/
[\[151b.5\]]tsa twA ri tsa ma hI ta le/_/d+har+m+ma rA dzaM kaM yuk+tA nAM snyu pA nAM nair+m+mi taM ba b+hau/_/e ka k+Sha Na pra tiSh+ThA su pr-i thi byAM s+tha bi ra sta dA/_/kha mu pe t+yats+tshA mAts+tshA d+yats+tshA ya saM dz+nyA ma kalba ya ta/_/ni t+ya pra brit+te ta s+yA tha bi ta te
[\[151b.6\]]lugs dang ldan pa stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dus gcig la/_/sprul pa yis ni rnam par mdzes/_/dus gcig rab tu gnas pa la/_/de tshe gnas brtan mkhar song nas/_/nyi ma bsgribs te sa gzhi ni/_/grib ma'i 'du shes dag tu brtags/_/de nas de yi dge 'dun gyi/_/mchod ston
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]saM g+ha b+ho dza ne/_/sha naiH pra pra dzi taHkash+tsidz+dza rA dzIr+N+NaHsa mA ya yau/_/rA dzAr+haM ma sha nan+ta tra pre Shi taM sa ma hI b+hu dzA/_/b+huM dzA naHpa ra mAM prI ti mA pa pA da su d+hA mi ba/_/tAM prA hA n+ya ta mo b+hik+Shu ra pi dzA nA
[\[152a.2\]]rgya che rtag 'dzugs la/_/rab byung rga bas 'khogs gyur pa/_/'ga' zhig dal gyis 'ongs par gyur/_/der ni rgyal po la 'os zas/_/sa yi bdag pos rab springs pa/_/za zhing mchog tu dga' ba ni/_/bdud rtsi bzhin du de yis thob/_/dge slong gzhan gyis de la smras/_/rang la
[\[152a.3\]]bi b+hU b+hu dzA/_/ki mar+thaM swo tsi tA mi daM tu b+h+yaM b+ho dz+ya mu dA hr-i tam/_/a ti br-id+d+hAMn+ta rA twat+taHsad+d+har+m+maM shro tu mut+su kaH/_/twa ma ts+tsha ya ti b+hu pA laHsat+kA re Na ma hI ya sA/_/i ti smi ta mu khe nok+taM b+hik+Shu NA maur+kh+ya ladz+dzi taH/_/
[\[152a.4\]]'os pa'i bza' ba 'di/_/khyod la sa bdag gis byin pa/_/ci yi don slad khyod shes sam/_/shin tu rgan pa khyod nyid las/_/dam chos nyan dang 'dod pa yi/_/sa skyong gis ni bkur sti dag_/shin tu che bas khyod la mchod/_/ces pa bzhin 'dzum dge slong gis/_/brjod tshe rmongs pas ngo tsha zhing /_/
[\[152a.5\]]sha l+ya bid+d+ha i ba k+Shi praM brid+d+ha b+hik+Shu ra tsin+ta yata/_/ladz+dzA yai ki mi daM b+huk+taM duHkhAn+ta ma sha nam+ma yA/_/a pi gA thA tsa tur+b+hA gaM na dzA nA mi ni rak+Sha raH/_/kiM ka ro mi sa tAM ma d+h+yaM ya di pr-its+tshen+ma hI pa tiH/_/tat+kiM
[\[152a.6\]]myur du zug rngus phug pa bzhin/_/dge slong rgan pos rab bsams pa/_/ngo tsha'i slad du sdug bsngal mtha'/_/zas 'di bdag gis ci slad zos/_/tshigs su bcad pa bzhi cha yang /_/bdag gis mi shes yi ge med/_/dam pa'i dbus su sa bdag gis/_/gal te dris na bdag ci byed/_/skye bo 'ga'
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]bak+Sh+ya te mA me Sha mU kaM hA s+ya ra tir+dz+dza naH/_/kI TaiHko Ta ra kA ri b+hirbi g+ha Ti ta s+than+da pra ban+d+haHsha nai ran+taHsup+ta kr-i shA nu d+hU ma ma li na shwa b+h+re pi d+ha n+yasta ruH/_/mUr+khaHpaN+Di ta khaN+Di tA na na ru tsirbai lak+Sh+ya lI na s+thi te
[\[152b.2\]]zhig dgod 'di dag_/lkugs pa bdag la ci brjod 'gyur/_/srin bu khong stong byed pa rnams kyis dal gyis sdong po'i rgyun ni gzhigs gyur cing /_/nang du me dag nyal zhing du bas dri mar gyur pa g.yang sa'i shing yang sla/_/mkhas pa bzhin ras mdzes pas bcom pa'i rmongs pa skyengs shing zhum
[\[152b.3\]]mU kAn+d+ha pra ti maHpra mA da ba pa tir+m+mA mastu sA dr-i g+ha naH/_/i ti tsin+tA pa ri tsi te tap+ta ni shwa sa niHsu khaM/_/bud+d+ha pra sA di ni de bI ma b+h+ye t+ya dza gA da taM/_/prak+Sh+ya ti twaM ya dA rA dzA bak+ta
[\[152b.4\]]pas gnas gyur pa/_/lkugs shing long ba'i gzugs can bag med du gnas skye bo bdag 'drar ma gyur cig_/de ltar bsams pa yongs 'dris shing /_/tsha ba'i dbugs 'byin bde med pa/_/de la lha mos sangs rgyas la/_/rab dang mngon du phyogs te gnas/_/gang tshe khyod la rgyal po 'dri/_/de
[\[152b.5\]]byaM b+ha ba tA ta dA/_/bistI r+N+Na ta ra d+har+m+mA s+ya saMk+She baHshrU ya tA mi ti/_/kiM tsin+mA traM d+ha na mu sa kr-i tau kr-i t+ya ma t+yan+d+h+ya me ba prA NA d+hA rA ta nu ta ra ma ti swA da nirmuk+ta man+naM/_/ni drA mu drA k+Sha Na ma pi dr-i sho ri t+ya sak+to
[\[152b.6\]]tshe khyod kyis 'di brjod bya/_/shin tu rgya che bden pa'i chos/_/mdor bsdus pa dag nyan par mdzod/_/nor ni cung zad tsam zhig phan pa byed cing bya ba shin tu nyung ba nyid/_/srog gi zungs ni shin tu chung zhing ro dang bral ba'i zas kyis kyang /_/mig dag gnyid kyi rgya ni skad cig gis kyang 'di nyid rgyun du
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]sa muk+taM she ShaM t+yak+t+wA bra dza ti bi pu lA raM b+ha b+ho gaM sha rI rI/_/i ti de byA sa mA diSh+TA br-id+d+haHyaSh+Ta ta ra swa raH/_/shro tuM prAsta s+ya b+hu b+har+t+turbi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/rA dzA hr-i da ya saM bA di shru twA ta s+ya su b+hA Shi taM/_/
[\[153a.2\]]ni/_/nyer mkho lhag ma btang nas lus can longs spyod rtsom pa rgya cher 'gyur/_/zhes pa lha mos yang dag bstan/_/rab gsal dbyangs can rgan po yis/_/sa bdag nyan du 'ongs pa la/_/chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/_/snying la bab pa de yi ni/_/legs bshad rgyal pos thos gyur nas/_/
[\[153a.3\]]a tsin+ta ya da ho sa t+ya mi da muk+taM mA nI Shi NA/_/ma ma bai ta ta sa mud+d+hi sh+ya hi ta mA ha ma hA ma tiH/_/ta twa ba swA da sA swA dAHpu N+ya prA pyAHsa tAM gi raH/_/yat+ko she Shu ni d+hI ya te d+ha na ba naM dr-i Sh+T+wA na la s+yen+d+ha naM
[\[153a.4\]]kye ma mkhas pa brjod gyur pa/_/'di ni bden zhes rab tu bsams/_/blo gros chen pos bdag nyid kyi/_/ched du phan pa 'di dag gsungs/_/de nyid brjod pa dam pa'i tshig_/nyams myong bsod nams dag gis thob/_/gang gi mdzod rnams su ni me yi bud shing du mthong nor gyi nags dag bsgrubs/_/
[\[153a.5\]]kr-i t+yaM ya ts+tsa tsa tuHsa mu dra ba sa nAM byAsno ti bi shwaM b+ha rAM/_/A hA ro pi bi tsi tra tA pa ri tsi bI ni drA pi me b+hU ya sI sar+b+baM mo ha su khA ya nAn+ta sa ma ye kiM tsih+k+wa tsid+d+r-i sh+ya te/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya nri pa tista smai kAny+tsa na bar+ts+tsa
[\[153a.6\]]gang yang bya bas rgya mtsho bzhi yi gos can sna tshogs 'dzin pa khyab par byas/_/zas kyang rnam par bkra la yongs su 'dris shing bdag gi gnyid kyang shin tu che/_/thams cad rmongs pa'i bde slad mjug gi dus su gang du ci yang mthong ma yin/_/zhes bsams mi yi bdag po yis/_/de la rab tu phyag
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]taM/_/pra Na mya pra da dau tsA ru ru tsi mats+tsI ba rAM shu kaM/_/pra dzan+ta ma tha taM mArge rA dza pU dzA bi rA dzi taM/_/d+h+yA nA d+h+ya ya na yo gA ya de ba tA pa ma tso da yata/_/ta tasta du pa de she na ni khi la kle sha saM k+Sha yAta/_/pA
[\[153b.2\]]'tshal te/_/'od ldan mdzes pa'i chos gos ni/_/gser gyis rab tu spras pa phul/_/de nas lam du 'gro byed cing /_/rgyal po'i mchod pas mdzes pa de/_/bsam gtan kha ton sbyor ba'i slad/_/lha mo yis ni yang dag bskul/_/de nas de yi man ngag gis/_/de yis bsam gtan bsgrubs pa na/_/nyon
[\[153b.3\]]k+Shad+bi hi ta mar+ha twaM te na d+h+yA nA ba d+ha ni nA/_/ka dA tsi da tha b+hU b+har+t+tur+b+bi pu le saM g+ha b+ho dza ne/_/na baHsa mA ya yau b+hik+ShArdi bya sau ra b+ha tsI ba raH/_/a pUrba gan+d+ha lub+d+hA ni mA lI ba la yi taM nr-i paH/_/taM ma br-its+tshat+ku
[\[153b.4\]]mongs ma lus zad pa las/_/dgra bcom nyid ni mngon du bsgrubs/_/de nas nam zhig sa bdag gis/_/dge 'dun mchod ston yangs pa la/_/dge slong chos gos lha yi ni/_/dri bzang ldan pa gsar du 'ongs/_/sngon med dri la chags pa yi/_/bung ba'i 'phreng bas bskor de la/_/mi bdag gis dris khyod
[\[153b.5\]]tastA ba da yaM te sau ra b+ho da b+ha baH/_/po ba da de ba lo ke haM pA ri dzA ta ta ro sta le/_/u Shi to bAR+Shi kaM kA laM tat+puSh+pai ra d+hi ba pi taH/_/e ta dA kAr+N+N+ya nri pa tistata pra b+ha bA d+hi kA daraH/_/rat+na tra yAts+tsha na pak+taHpu N+yA rA ma
[\[153b.6\]]kyi dri/_/rgyas 'di re zhig gang las byung /_/des smras lha yi 'jig rten gyi/_/yangs 'du ljon pa'i 'og tu bdag_/dbyar gyi dus su gnas gyur pa/_/de yi me tog dag gis bsgos/_/de thos mi bdag de yi ni/_/mthu la lhag par gus gyur cing /_/dkon cog gsum mchod la chags pa/_/bsod nams
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]ra to b+ha bta/_/d+har+m+ma s+thi ti bra Na yi nAM ya di sai ba br-ita tiHsa t+yo pa b+ho ga su b+ha go ya di sai ba bA NI/_/paR+Yan ta tsin+ta na ra tA ya di sai ba bud+d+hirdA na kri yo pa ka ra NaM ya di sai ba lak+Sh+mIH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra
[\[154a.2\]]kun rar dga' bar gyur/_/gal te gus par chos la gnas na de nyid 'tsho ba yin/_/gal te skal bzang bden par spyod na de nyid smra ba yin/_/gal te mthar thug sems par byed na de nyid blo gros yin/_/gal te sbyin pa'i bya ba byed na de nyid dpal 'byor yin/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos
[\[154a.3\]]bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM d+har+m+marA dzi kA bra tiSh+ThA ba dA naM mU naM sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//b+ha k+ti pra bar+t+ti ta dzaM no di ta bA pa nA nAM te ShAM dza ya t+ya b+hi ma taHsu kr-i tA b+hi
[\[154a.4\]]byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las chos kyi rgyal po rab gnas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//gang gi grags pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par rnam par bkod pa yis/_/sa gzhi bsod nams mchog gi bsod nams
[\[154a.5\]]yo gaH/_/puN+yA ti pu N+ya ta ra tA mu pa ya ti pr-i th+wAM yat+kIr+t+ti lak+Sha Na bi she Sha ni be sha ne na/_/ma d+h+yan+ti kA b+hi d+ha b+hik+Shu rA nan+ta s+ya gu ro ga rA/_/bud+d+ha shA sa na mA d+hAn+taM ya yau kaSh+mI ra maN+Da laM/_/tan+nA
[\[154a.6\]]ldan par nyer bskrun cing /_/rgyal ba la ni gus pa rab bsgrubs bag chags bskyed byas la/_/de dag rnams kyi mngon 'dod legs byas sbyor ba rgyal gyur cig_/dge slong nyi gung zhes bya ba/_/bla ma dga' bo'i tshig gis ni/_/kha che'i dkyil 'khor dag tu ni/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin du song /_/klu yis
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]gA d+hiSh+Thi taM dz+nyA twA b+hI ra sa twaHsa mA d+hi nA/_/sa saM k+Sho b+haM bi da d+he na nA gA naM kaM bi tA ba niH/_/shas+t+rAg+ni br-iSh+TA but+p+riSh+TA tai ra maR+sha bi kA ri b+hiH/_/pra b+hA be na b+ha bat+ta s+ya mUr+d+hi pad+mot+pa lA ba lI/_/ta tastaM dza ga durnA gAstad+bIR+Yo t+kaR+Sha
[\[154b.2\]]byin brlabs de shes nas/_/sa gzhi 'dar byed de yis ni/_/snying stobs brtan ldan ting 'dzin gyis/_/klu rnams kun tu bskyod pa bsgrubs/_/rnam 'gyur khro ldan de dag gis/_/mtshon dang me yi char spros pa/_/mthu yis de yi spyi bor ni/_/pad+ma ut+pal 'phreng bar gyur/_/de nas de yi brtson 'grus kyis/_/rab tu ya
[\[154b.3\]]bi smi tAH/_/yA ban+baR+YaM ka ban+d+ho tra de shastA ban+ba she ta ba/_/uk+t+we ti tasmai paR+YaM ka ban+d+ha tu l+yaM pra mA Na taH/_/na ba dro Na mu khA yA laM pra da duHshU maN+Da laM/_/sa ta tra na ga ra grA ma pan+ni be sha bi she Sha kr-ita/_/s+thi taM ba ban+d+ha
[\[154b.4\]]mtshan klus de la/_/smras pa ji srid skyil krung bcas/_/de srid yul 'dir khyod kyi gnas/_/zhes pa brjod nas de la ni/_/skyil krung yangs par bcings pa yi/_/tshad dang mtshungs pa stong pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni rab tu byin/_/der ni de yi grong khyer dang /_/grong gi khyad par 'god byed cing /_/dgra bcom lnga brgya
[\[154b.5\]]sa hi taHsha taiHpany+tsa b+hi rar+ha tAM/_/ta trA k+Sha yaM b+ha ga ba taHpan+ni be sh+ya d+har+m+maM kr-i twa bi hA ra ru tsi rA b+ha ra NAM d+ha ri trIM/_/taM gan+d+ha mA da na ta Tod+d+h+r-i ta lab+d+hA sA rair+b+yAp+tA tsa kA ra na ba kuM ku ma kan+da br-in+daiH/_/i ti k+She
[\[154b.6\]]dag dang ni/_/lhan cig rab tu gnas par byas/_/der ni mi zad bcom ldan chos dag rnam par bkod byas nas/_/mdzes pa'i gtsug lag khang gi rgyan dang ldan pa'i 'dzin byed de/_/spos ngad ldang gi ngos las blangs shing snying po thob gyur pa/_/gur gum gsar pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyis rab tu khyab par byas/_/zhes pa dge
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yA bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ma d+h+yan+ti kA ba dA na sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//shAn+ti spr-i shaM bi ma la shI la du kU la lI lA sho b+hA dzu ShAM bi Sha ya be
[\[155a.2\]]ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nyi ma gung pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu pa'o//_//zhi ba la reg dri med tshul khrims ras dkar rtse dga' yis/_/mdzes pas bsten cing yul dang chas las
[\[155a.3\]]Sha pa rAt+mu khA nAM/_/tsI nAM shu kair+m+ma li na shA Na ba Tats+tsha rai bA Nai bA b+hi mA na ka la nA ni ba dai n+ya br-it+tiH/_/shA na ba sI pu ra b+hik+Shurgu Na bAn+gu ru shA sa nA ta/_/dzi na shA sa na mA d+hA tuM ma thu rAM pras+thi taHpu rI/_/
[\[155a.4\]]phyi rol phyogs rnams la/_/dar gos dag dang shA na'i gos hrul dri ma can gyis kyang /_/mngon par khengs pa skyed min dman pa nyid du bsgrub pa min/_/shA na'i gos can dge slong sngon/_/yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma'i bkas/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa gzung ba'i slad/_/grong khyer bcom brlag dag tu zhugs/_/
[\[155a.5\]]pra bra dza pa thi shu shrA ba mal+la yor+b+ba da to r+m+mi thaH/_/pra paM go pa gA tA me rU mAR+Ya mAR+Ya swa b+hA ba yauH/_/ye bi ma la shI la ni la yAHshru ta bi shru ta tsak+Shu ShaHk+Sha mA ban+taH/_/tA ne ba shA Na bA sI ka tha ya ti b+hik+Shur+b+hu bi shra ma
[\[155a.6\]]de ni lam du 'gro ba na/_/'phags pa'i rang bzhin gyad gnyis dang /_/phan tshun rab tu brjod pa yi/_/zhar byung 'phags pa 'di dag thos/_/dri med tshul khrims gnas dang thos pa yi/_/mig dang ldan par grags shing bzod pa can/_/dge sbyong de dag nyid ni sa gzhi la/_/dge slong shA na'i gos can dag tu
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]NAn/_/e ta duk+t+wA tha te nA pi ta de bok+taM ni sha mya tau/_/ta mU tsa tu s+t+wa me bA sau shA Na bA sI na saM sha yaH/_/kasmAt+t+waM shA Na bA sI ti su ma te dik+Shu bi shru taH/_/gA thAM sha yan+ti mu na yasta ba sad+d+har+m+ma ba di naH/_/sa dza
[\[155b.2\]]brjod/_/de brjod de nas de yis kyang /_/de nyid brjod thos de dag gis/_/der smras shA na'i gos can de/_/khyod nyid yin par the tshom med/_/ci slad shA na'i gos can zhes/_/blo bzang khyod ni phyogs su grags/_/thub pa dam chos smra ba rnams/_/khyod kyi tshigs su bcad pa sgrogs/_/des
[\[155b.3\]]gA da ma yA n+yasmin+dzan+ma n+yA sha yA n+yasmi/_/pra t+ye ka su ga taHswA s+th+yaM nI to bai d+ya tsi kit+pa yA/_/shA NaM shIr+Na ta raM bA sasta s+ya dr-iSh+T+wA ma yAlpa kaM/_/u pa nI taM pra Na yi nA rA dzAr+g+ha ru tsi rA mA raM/_/so bra
[\[155b.4\]]smras skye ba gzhan la bdag_/smin pa gso bar byed pa yis/_/rang sangs rgyas ni snying nad kyis/_/gzir ba rab tu bsos par byas/_/de yi shA na'i gos dag ni/_/chung zhing rab tu rnyings pa mthong /_/rgyal po la 'os mdzes pa'i gos/_/bdag gis rab tu gus pas phul/_/de yis smras
[\[155b.5\]]bin+na sa khe ma h+yaM ro tsa te ru tsi rAM shu kaM/_/la b+h+ya te pra sha ma sh+lA g+h+yA sho b+hA shA Na ni bA sa sA/_/e t+ya haM tad+ba tsaHshru twA dzIr+N+Na shA NAM shu kot+su kaH/_/sat+saM ga mAp+ta bai rA gyaHsad+bas+t+ra bi mu kho d+b+ha baM/_/kA le na
[\[155b.6\]]pa grogs po dag_/mdzes pa'i gos la bdag mi sred/_/shA na'i gos kyi rab zhi ba/_/bsngags par 'os shing mdzes pa thob/_/ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/shA na'i gos rnying 'dod pa bdag_/dam pa'i grogs kyis chags bral thob/_/dam pa'i gros las phyir phyogs gyur/_/dus kyis de yi
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]ta s+ya de hAn+te ru tsi rA tsA bi d+hA yi nA/_/ma yA tat+tu l+ya b+hA bAp+t+yai pra Ni d+hA na ma tiHkr-i tA/_/te nA haM pra Ni d+hA ne na tat+sa ma b+h+ya ts+tsA ne na tsa/_/sa shA Na bas+t+raHsaM dzA taHshA Na bA pI ti bi shru taH/_/i
[\[156a.2\]]lus kyi mthar/_/mdzes pa'i mchod pa bsgrubs byas te/_/de mtshungs nyid ni thob pa'i slad/_/bdag gis smon lam blo gros byas/_/smon lam de dang de la ni/_/yang dag mchod pa yis kyang bdag_/shA na'i gos dang ldan par skyes/_/shA na'i gos can zhes su grags/_/zhes
[\[156a.3\]]t+yuk+t+wA sa sha nai rgats+tshan+na bASh+pa ma thu rAM pu rIM/_/u ru muN+DA b+hi d+haM she la mA ru ro ha ma hod+Ya maH/_/ta tro pa pi sh+ya paR+YaM ka ban+d+he nA kam+bi ta k+Shi tiH/_/bi nI ya big+h+na pan+nad+d+ho nA gau tu mu la baR+Shi Nau/_/ma thu
[\[156a.4\]]brjod bcom brlag grong khyer du/_/phyin cing dal gyis 'gro ba des/_/mgo chen zhes pa'i ri bo la/_/rtsom pa chen po dag gis 'dzeg_/der ni sa gzhi 'dar byed pa'i/_/skyil krung bcas te nye bar 'khod/_/char chen 'bebs pa'i klu dag ni/_/bgegs la chas pa rnam par btul/_/bcom
[\[156a.5\]]rA bA si nau shreSh+Thi su tau na Ta b+haT+TA b+haMd+d+hau/_/A dA ya sa h+ya kr-i t+yA ya sa bi hA raM bi nir+m+ma me/_/rat+no dz+wa la s+pha Tika kAny+tsa na ra mya harmeHpaR+YaM ka pI tha ra tsa nA sha ya nA b+hi rA maH/_/sargo pa maHswa b+ha ga b+ho ga Ni
[\[156a.6\]]brlag la gnas tshong dpon bu/_/na Ta b+ha Ta zhes bya ba/_/grogs kyi slad du bzung nas ni/_/de yi gtsug lag khang par sprul/_/rin cen rab 'bar shel dang gser gyi ba gam dag dang ldan/_/khri dang khri'u mal stan dag gis spras shing mngon par dga'/_/mtho ris lta bu skal bzang longs spyod
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]b+hirbi hA raHpu N+ya s+thi tirna Tab+ha Ta b+hi d+ha e ba po b+hUT/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM shA Na bA s+yA ba dA na me ka sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//
[\[156b.2\]]gter gyi gtsug lag khang /_/bsod nams gnas pa de ni na Ta b+ha Ta zhes par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shA na'i gos can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//
[\[156b.3\]]yai re ba yA ti bi Sha yai ra b+hi lA Sha b+hU maHsar+b+bo dza naHsma ra ra dzaHpa ra b+hU ta dr-iSh+TiH/_/tai re ba pu N+ya pa ri mArdza na shud+d+hi b+hAdzAM bai rA gya yo ga mu pa yA ti ma naHpra shAn+ti ma/_/a b+hud+gup+tA b+hi d+ha na s+ya gan+d+hi ka s+ya su
[\[156b.4\]]skye bo 'dod pa'i rdul gyis mig ni yongs su nyams pa kun/_/yul ni gang dag nyid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i sar gyur ba/_/de nyid kyis ni bsod nams yongs gtsang dag pa bsten rnams kyi/_/yid ni rab tu zhi zhing chags bral ldan pa dag tu gyur/_/bcom brlag dag na gnas pa sngon/_/sbas pa
[\[156b.5\]]taHpu rAH/_/ma thu rA bA si na shrI mAn+nu pa gup+tA i ti shru taH/_/A dzA taHkalpi taHpi trA sa b+hik+ShoHshA Na bA si naH/_/a n+wa yA yI ti ba tsa sA tad+b+ha k+ti ni ra to b+ha bta/_/bai rA gyA b+hi mu khe ta smin+na ba yau ba na shA li ni/_/b+hag+na
[\[156b.6\]]zhes bya spos 'tshong gi/_/bu ni dpal dang ldan pa dag_/nyer sbas zhes par grags pa byung /_/shA na'i gos can dge slong gi/_/rjes 'brang ngo zhes pha yi ni/_/tshig gis ma skyes pa nas btags/_/de ni de la gus ldan gyur/_/lang tsho gsar pa dang ldan de/_/chags bral la ni mngon phyogs tshe/_/bgegs
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]b+hig+h+na ga NA rA b+hash+tsi t+taM le b+he ma no b+ha baH/_/ha ri tsan+dan kastu ri kar+pU rA ga ru bi kra yI/_/sa kany+tsit+kA ma ka rod+b+ya ba hA raM pi turgi rA/_/a tha bA pa ba dat+tA khyA gan+d+ha kra yA bi sr-iSh+Ta yA/_/swa dA
[\[157a.2\]]tshogs rtsom pa nyi mas pa yis/_/yid dbyung gi ni bsam pa thob/_/pha yi tshig gis dus 'ga' zhig_/ha ri tsan+dan gla rtsi dang /_/a ka ru dang ga pur 'tshong /_/tha snyad rnams ni de yis byas/_/de nas nor lhas byin zhes pas/_/spos ni nyo ru btang ba yis/_/rang gi 'bangs
[\[157a.3\]]s+ya ka thi taM shru twA taM rU pa gu Na bi shru taM/_/saM dzA tA rA ga saM be gA ga Ni kA saM ga mAr+thI nI/_/bi sr-i dz+yA b+hi ma tA dU tIM b+hA ban+ta smai n+ya be da yata/_/sa swai ra mar+thi to dU t+yA sasmi tastA ma b+ha Sha ta/_/
[\[157a.4\]]mos de yi gzugs/_/yon tan grags pa bshad thos nas/_/chags pa'i tshogs ni rab rgyas shing /_/'grogs pa don gnyer smad 'tshong mas/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i pho nya mo/_/btang nas de la bsams pa bshad/_/dal gyis pho nya mas don gnyer/_/'dzum ldan de yis der smras pa/_/
[\[157a.5\]]a yaM nA d+hi ma taHkA lasta s+yAHsan+daR+sha ne ma ma/_/a tha ngU t+yAM pra yA tA yIM sod+be shA ga Ni kA b+ha ba ta/_/nA nu rA ge bI rA ge bA ni tha ti thai Sha yo Shi tAM/_/ka dA tsit+man+di re ta s+yAHs+thi te yU ni ba nik+su te/_/na
[\[157a.6\]]de dang phrad pa'i dus 'di ni/_/bdag la mngon par 'dod pa med/_/de nas pho nya mo 'ongs tshe/_/smad 'tshong chags bral ldan par gyur/_/rjes su chags pas chags bral ba/_/smad 'tshong ma la nges pa med/_/tshong dpon bu ni lang tsho ldan/_/nam zhig de yi khyim gnas tshe/_/dpal dang
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]ba sAr+tha pa tiHshrI mA nA dza gA mot+ta ra pa thA ta/_/bi sr-iSh+Ta rA tri b+ho ga yi te na hem+ni pa hAM shu kaiH/_/dza na n+yA pa te tA lub+d+hA ga Ni kA sa ma tsin+ta ye ta/_/e Sha tA bat+s+thi to ge he ba Ni sU nuHkr-i ta bya yaH/
[\[157b.2\]]ldan pa'i don mthun bdag_/byang gi lam nas gsar du 'ongs/_/de yi mtshan mo longs spyad slad/_/gos dang bcas pa'i gser dag springs/_/brkam chags ldan pa'i smad 'tshong ma/_/ma dang bcas pas rab bsams pa/_/nor zad byas pa tshong pa'i bu/_/'di ni re zhig khyim na gnas/_/
[\[157b.3\]]ar+thI ma hA d+ha na sh+ts+'+ya n+yaHkiM ka ro mi na bed+mi ta tra/_/bAn+ta bit+taHbu naHkA mI na b+ha ba t+ya d+hi ka pra daH/_/te na paR+Yu Shi te nai ba kri ya te niSh+pa le na kiM/_/na bs+t+wa bi na bot+su kyAt+sar+b+ba mu tsa t+ya yA tsi taH/_/a
[\[157b.4\]]gzhan yang don gnyer nor chen ldan/_/bdag gis ci bya de ma rig_/'dod ldan nor ni skyugs pa dag_/phyi nas lhag par ster mi 'gyur/_/'bras bu med par yongs rnyings par/_/gyur pa de yis ci zhig bya/_/gsar pa mngon 'dod gsar pa las/_/ma bslangs par yang thams cad ster/_/dang
[\[157b.5\]]pri ye pi pri yA swA daM ka ro ti pra tha mA da raH/_/tasmAt+ke ma s+ya kr-i ya tA man+taHpak+ta s+ya sha l+ya batra/_/a b+ho ge na na yA t+ye Sha kar+m+ma ban+d+he ba a nu gaH/_/nA smA ka me tad+ba Ni dz+yaM t+yadz+ya te ya di bit+ta ba na/_/na d+har+m+mA
[\[157b.6\]]por gus pas mi mdza' yang /_/mdza' ba nyams su myong bar byed/_/de slad nang du zug rngu bzhin/_/zhugs pa 'di la ci zhig bya/_/las kyis 'ching bzhin rjes 'brang 'di/_/ma bcad par ni 'gro ma yin/_/gal te nor ldan 'di btang na/_/bdag cag la ni tshong khe med/_/chos phyir ma
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]ya na kA mA ya ba ya mar+thA ya nir+m+mA taH/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sA mA tuHsam+ma te dra bi NA r+thi nI/_/ba rA pa be na n+ya ba d+hAt+sa bi She Na ba Ni k+su taM/_/nik+Shi s+ya bska ra tsa ye ta tsa ye ta ta staM ga ta dzI bi taM/_/a bA bya
[\[158a.2\]]yin 'dod phyir min/_/bdag cag nor gyi phyir du sprul/_/zhes bsams nor ni don gnyer ma/_/de yis ma yi gros kyis ni/_/chang mchog dug ldan blud pa yis/_/tshong pa'i bu ni rab tu bsad/_/de nas srog dang bral ba de/_/phyag dar khrod kyi phung por sbas/_/ded dpon nang du
[\[158a.3\]]bi pu laM bit+taM sAr+b+ba ba haM pu ri sh+ya pA/_/dr-iSh+TaHpra biSh+To ga Ni kA gr-i haM na b+hu bi nirga taH/_/i ti ban+d+hu b+hi ra n+wi Sh+ya bya su la b+d+ho ba Nig+su taH/_/ta tastad+ba d+ha saM tab+taiHshrA bi tastair+m+ma hI pa tiH/_/bai sh+yA yAstI
[\[158a.4\]]rab bcug nas/_/de yis nor ni rgya chen thob/_/smad 'tshong ma yi khang par ni/_/'jug pa mthong ste phyir 'thon min/_/zhes te gnyis rnams kyis btsal bas/_/tshong pa'i bu ni srog bral rnyed/_/de nas de bsad gdung ba can/_/de dag gis gsol sa bdag gis/_/sdig drag la
[\[158a.5\]]bra pA pAr+ha mA di de sho gra ni gra haM/_/sA ba d+h+ya ba su d+hAM nI tA muk+ta ke shI ni ram+ba rA/_/ni kr-it+ta pA Ni tsa ra NA ts+tshin+na shwa ma Na nA si kA/_/be bib+tan+tI bya thA krAn+tA ni dza sho Ni ta gar+d+ha me/_/ni bAR+Ya mA Na kra byA
[\[158a.6\]]'os chad pa ni/_/mi bzad smad 'tshong ma la bstan/_/skra grol gos dang bral ba de/_/gsod sa yi ni sar khrid de/_/lag pa rkang pa rab bcad cing /_/rna ba dang ni sna yang bcad/_/rang gi khrag gi 'dam la ni/_/gdung bas nyen cing 'dre ldog byed/_/sha za log cing 'phyon
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]dA dA s+yA tsu kro sha ban+d+hu kI/_/u pa gup+ta sta tasta s+yAHshru twA bi Sha rma bai sha saM/_/tad+bi lo ka na kA lo ya mi t+yuk+t+wA taM b+hU baM ya yau/_/dA s+yA ni bi de taM dr-iSh+T+wA ta mA yAn+taM sha shad+Yu tiM/_/pUr+b+bA b+hi lA Sha she
[\[158b.2\]]ma ni/_/'bangs mor bcas pa mya ngan byed/_/de nas de yi sdug bsngal ni/_/mi bzad nyer sbas kyis thos nas/_/de ni blta ba'i dus 'di zhes/_/brjod nas sa gzhi de ru song /_/zla 'od can de 'ong ba ni/_/'bangs mos bshad pa mthong gyur nas/_/sngon gyi mngon 'dod lhag
[\[158b.3\]]She Na sA ladz+dza ku Ti lA b+ha ba ta/_/an+taHpra briSh+TaHke nA pi bA pa nA b+h+ya pa bar+t+ma na/_/na ka s+yaM tsi da bas+thA yAM rA ga s+t+ya dza ti de hi nAM/_/dza g+ha nA ba ra NaM kr-i twA dA s+yA ba sa na pal+la baM/_/
[\[158b.4\]]ma yis/_/ngo tsha ldan zhing gyu gyur gyur/_/bag chags goms pa dag gis lam/_/'ga' las nang du rab zhugs pa/_/lus can rnams kyi chags pa ni/_/gnas skabs 'gar yang btang mi 'gyur/_/'bangs mo'i gos kyi 'dab ma yis/_/mdoms ni rab tu bsgribs byas shing /_/
[\[158b.5\]]pA sta na n+yasta hasta taM ba b+hA She bi nI tA na nA/_/pra yat+ne nA pi ma ha tA nA yA ta s+t+waM ma yAr+thi taH/_/a d+hu na man+da b+hA gyA yAsta ba saM daR+sha ne na kiM/_/ya dA ma yA b+ha bat+ko pi b+hau gya sau b+hA gya bi b+h+ra maH/_/na
[\[158b.6\]]nu mar lag bkod bzhin ras ni/_/rab dud de yis de la smras/_/bdag gis 'bad pa chen po yis/_/don du gnyer yang khyod ma 'ongs/_/da lta skal ba zhan pa bdag_/mthong ba yis ni khyod la ci/_/gang tshe bdag ni longs spyad kyis/_/skal bzang rnam 'phrul ci yang ldan/_/de yi tshe
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]daR+sha na s+ya kA lo ya mi t+yuk+taM b+ha ba tA ta dA/_/kr-it+tAM gI ru d+hi ra d+hi rA di g+d+hA ts+yu tA haM kle sha sA ga re/_/kA laHka ma la pa trA k+Shi ki ma yan+daR+sha na s+ya te/_/i ti bru bA NAM bASh+pAM bu blA bya mA nAM shu kAM tsa lAM/_/
[\[159a.2\]]na khyod kyis ni/_/blta ba'i dus 'di yin zhes smras/_/yan lag bcad cing khrag gis bsgos/_/nyon mongs rgya mtshor lhung ba dag_/lta ba yi ni dus 'di dag_/pad+ma'i mig can khyod kyis ci/_/zhes pa smra zhing mchi ma yi/_/chu yis gos kyi mtha' dag bslad/_/
[\[159a.3\]]sha na kai ru pa gup+ta stAM sA nu tA pA ma b+hA Sha ta/_/kAn+ti sh+tsan+d+rA sa khI su bar+N+Na ka da lI lA ba N+ya tsau raM ba pur+b+ba k+t+raM pad+ma ni mI la naM ku ba la ya kle bya pra de lo tsa ne/_/nair+m+me mo da yi taM ma no ha
[\[159a.4\]]rjes su gdung ba can de la/_/dal gyis nyer sbas kyis smras pa/_/mdzes sdug zla ba'i grogs dang lus ni gser gyi chu shing mdzes pa'i rkun po dang /_/bzhin ras pad+mo zum byed mig ni ut+pal dag la dman pa ster byed pa/_/shin tu yid 'phrog de dag rnams la bdag ni
[\[159a.5\]]ra ta raM kiM tu pra yat+nA da haM kA mA nAM pra kr-i tiM bi tsA ra bi ra sAM draSh+TuM sa ma b+h+yA ga taH/_/bi b+hU Sha NaM shu kats+tshan+nai ba ra sau ra b+ha bA si te/_/sho b+hA ta bA b+ha bat+kA ye swa b+hA baHpu na rI dr-i shaH/_/
[\[159a.6\]]mi dga' 'on kyang 'bad pas bdag_/rnam par spyad na ro dang bral ba 'dod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin lta ru 'ongs/_/rgyan dang gos kyis rab bsgribs shing /_/dri bzang mchog gis rab bsgos pa/_/khyod kyi lus ni mdzes pa dag_/slar yang rang bzhin 'di 'drar gyur/_/
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]ba ta ba ta ni ha tA ste kIr+N+Na ke shAs+thi saM s+the pa ta ta ma na la tA pot+pa ts+ya mA nA khi ldaM ge_/ku Na pa ba ti ra ma Sh+TA ye dzu gub+sA ni d+hA ne bya sa na ga Na ni d+hA ne kA ya nAm+ni sh+mar shA ne/_/ba ShIn+di
[\[159b.2\]]skra dang rus pas gang ba'i dbyibs can rtag tu me yis ni/_/yan lag ma lus rab 'tshed rnag khrag dang ldan smad pa'i gnas/_/lus kyi ming can dur khrod sdug bsngal tshogs kyi gter dag la/_/gang gi dga' ba de dag kyi hud kyi hud brlag par 'gyur/_/kye ma rmongs
[\[159b.3\]]ni du rA mo de bi kr-i ta ts+tshi drA saM ku le/_/a ho mo hAn+ma nu Sh+yA NAM kA ye pi pri ya b+hA ba nA/_/pA pA yaHkA ya paR+YA ya mA yA bi Sha ma saM shra yaH/_/duHkha skan+d+haHk+Sha yaM yA ti su ga to pA pa nA da yaM/_/mo
[\[159b.4\]]las mi rnams ni/_/rnam par zag cing dri nga can/_/rnam 'gyur bug pas gang gyur pa'i/_/lus po la yang dga' ba bsgom/_/bde gshegs nye bar bsten pa las/_/lus kyi rnam grangs gnod pa can/_/mi bzad sgyu ma dag gi gnas/_/sdug bsngal phung po 'di zad 'gyur/_/rmongs pa'i
[\[159b.5\]]ha d+h+wAn+ta di bA ka ra s+ya sa ka la kle shA ba bA sa ts+tshi daHshAstuHshA sa na saM shra ye pra Ni hi taM ka l+yA Na mi tra s+ya yaiH/_/nai ba klin+na pu naHka raM ka ka li li kA+er+N+NAn+t+ra mA lA ku le te madz+dzan+ti bi kA ra b+hA
[\[159b.6\]]mun pa dag gi nyin byed nyon mongs gnas skabs mtha' dag gcod byed pa/_/ston pa'i bstan pa'i gnas la gang gis dge ba'i grogs kyi smon lam btab/_/de dag lus zhes brjod pa'i dmyal ba dman pa'i keng rus dra bas gang gyur cing /_/rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba rgyas pas
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]dza na ra ke kA yA b+hi d+hA ne Shu naH/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya ga Ni kA duHkhod+be ga bi rA gi NI/_/pu N+ya rat+na tra yaM shAM t+ye sha ra N+yaM sha ra NaM ya yau/_/u pa gup+ta ka thA bAp+ta shro
[\[160a.2\]]dkrigs pa'i rnam 'gyur snod du slar yang lhung mi 'gyur/_/de dag thos nas smad 'tshong ma/_/sdug bsngal gyis nyen chags bral can/_/zhi slad bsod nams dkon mchog gsum/_/skyabs 'os dag la skyabs su song /_/de nas de yis nyer sbas kyi/_/gtam
[\[160a.3\]]taHprAp+ti pha lA tha sA/_/d+har+m+ma mArga pra Na yi nI dr-iSh+Ta pa t+yA byA pa t+ya ta/_/ta s+yAM de ba ni kA ye tha saM b+hu tA ya pra b+hAM ma ye/_/ma thu ra bA si nAHshru twA tsa krustad+de ha sad+k+r-i yAM/_/a trAn+ta re shA Na bA
[\[160a.4\]]gyis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob/_/chos kyi lam la gus pa yis/_/bden pa mthong nas shi bar gyur/_/de nas de ni lha yi tshogs/_/'dod dang ldan par skyes pa dag_/bcom brlag dag na 'khod rnams kyis/_/thos nas de lus sbyang ba byas/_/skabs der shA na'i gos
[\[160a.5\]]sI sa ma b+h+ye t+ya pra san+na d+hIH/_/pra bra dz+yA mu pa gup+ta s+ya prAp+ta kA la la ma ma n+ya ta/_/so tha pra bra dzi taste na prA byAr+ha t+pa da mut+ta maM/_/sad+d+har+m+ma de sha nA raM b+haM bi da d+he pu rA bA si nAM/_/
[\[160a.6\]]can ni/_/rab dang blo yi mngon phyogs te/_/nyer sbas rab tu 'byung ba yis/_/dus la bab par yang dag bsams/_/de nas de yis rab byung des/_/bla med dgra bcom gnas thob nas/_/grong khyer dag na gnas rnams la/_/dam chos ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad/_/
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]d+har+m+ma pra di sha tasta s+ya ta s+yA ma paR+Sha di pA mr-i taM/_/tsa kA ra mA raHpra tsu rAM tAn+tAm+bi g+h+nau g+ha bi kri yAM/_/bA baR+Sha mauk+ti kaM ta tra ru tsi raM tsa sa kAny+tsa naM/_/ye na bya k+Ship+ta tsih+tA nAM sho tri NA ma b+ha bad+d+ha
[\[160b.2\]]'khor der chos ni bdud rtsi dang /_/bcas pa rab tu ston de la/_/bgegs tshogs rnam 'gyur rab mang ba/_/de dang de ni bdud kyis byas/_/nyan pa sems ni g.yeng ba rnams/_/gang gis rnam par 'khrul gyur pa/_/mdzes pa gser dang bcas pa yi/_/der ni mu tig
[\[160b.3\]]maH/_/sa kr-i twA hAR+Ya paun+daR+Ya la li taM nar+t+ta kA ba puH/_/na nar+t+ta sa hi tasta tra gan+d+har+b+bAb+sa ra sA+e ga NaiH/_/kAn+tA nr-it+ta bi lA se na he lA ba kr-i ta tse ta sAM/_/a b+hUt+ta tra bi ne yA nAM
[\[160b.4\]]char pa phab/_/de yi mi 'phrogs gar mkhan ma/_/mdzes sdug 'jo sgeg gzugs byas nas/_/dri za lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang /_/lhan cig der ni gar dag byas/_/mdzes pa'i gar dang rol rtsed kyis/_/bde blag tu ni sems phrogs pa/_/gdul bya rnams kyi yid ni der/_/
[\[160b.5\]]kA maM kA ma ma yam+ma naH/_/a bi nI ta ta s+ya tha mA ra s+ya bi na yo d+ya taH/_/a tsin+ta yad+bi kA rA r+hA mu pa gup+taHpra ti kr-i yAM/_/so b+h+ye t+ya mA ra ma ba dat+tuSh+To haM ta ba kau sha lAta/_/a ho
[\[160b.6\]]nges par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin gyur/_/de nas rnam par ma dul ba'i/_/bdud ni 'dul ba la brtson pa/_/nyer sbas kyis ni rnam 'gyur la/_/'os pa'i phyir bcos rab tu bsams/_/bdud la phyogs te des smras pa/_/khyod ni mkhas pas bdag tshim ste/_/kye ma gar dang
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]nr-it+ta ma ho gI taM di bya me ba ki mu ts+ya te/_/uk+t+we ti mA lA byA dze na ba ban+d+ha s+ye sha ba tra yaM/_/masta ke sar+p+pa ku Na paM kaN+The tsa shwa ma nu Sh+ya yoH/_/swa yaM mok+tu ma shak+to sau mA rastat+ku Na pa tra yaM/_/pra ya yau sha ra NaM
[\[161a.2\]]kye ma glu/_/mchog nyid kho na ci zhig brjod/_/ces brjod 'phreng ba'i zol gyis ni/_/ro ni gsum dag de la btags/_/mgo la sbrul gyi ro dang ni/_/mgrin par mi dang khyi yi'o/_/bdud des ro ni gsum po de/_/rang gis sgrol bar ma nus nas/_dbang po nye dbang gdong bzhi
[\[161a.3\]]de bAn sen+d+ro pen+d+ra tsa tur+m+mu khAn/_/te Shu mok+ta ma shak+te Shu pre ti taHpad+ma dzan+ma nA/_/b+hag+na dar+p+po tha kan+dar+p+pa sta me ba sha ra NaM ya yau/_/sA na pa t+yA ti bi na yA du pa gup+ta s+ya pA da yoH/_/pra pA d+ya da ma mr-it+s+ra
[\[161a.4\]]dang /_/bcas pa'i lha la skyabs su song /_/des kyang dgrol bar ma nus tshe/_/pad+ma skyes kyis rab bskul te/_/de nas dregs pa nyams pa'i bdud/_/de nyid la ni skyabs su song /_/shin tu dul bas nyer sbas kyi/_/rkang pa dag la des gtugs te/_/rgyags pa btang nas rab dang
[\[161a.5\]]dz+ya ta mu bA tsa kr-itAny+dza liH/_/kr-i taHkr-i tA pa rA d+ha s+ya twa yA ta du tsi tam+ma ma/_/pra sI da t+ya dz+ya tAm+ma nyu ra d+h+yu nA haM twa dA shra yaH/_/a haM kr-i tA pa rA d+ho pi su ga te na ma hAt+ma nAM/_/a pi nI ta ta
[\[161a.6\]]pas/_/thal sbyar de la rab smras pa/_/gnod pa byas pa bdag la ni/_/yang dag 'os pa khyod kyis byas/_/da ni khyod la bdag brten pas/_/khro ba thong la bka' drin mdzod/_/bdag gis gnod pa byas mod kyang /_/bde gshegs bdag nyid chen po yis/_/bu ni rnam par ma dul
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]raHsU nurdza na ke ne ba rak+Shi taH/_/bo d+hi mU le ma yA ta s+ya badzrA sa na dzu ShaHpU ra/_/kr-i tA ni kA ra ni ka rAHk+Shan+ti me ba tsa te na me/_/nA nA kA ra bi kA ra ka ri Ni ma yi prA kA ra tAM bi b+h+ra tA tasmin+bo d+hi sa mA d+hi
[\[161b.2\]]ba/_/pha yis bzhin du rab tu bsrungs/_/byang chub snying por rdo rje'i gdan/_/bstan pa de la bdag gis sngon/_/gnod pa yi ni tshogs dag byas/_/de yis bdag la bzod pa nyid/_/byang chub ting 'dzin grub pa'i gnas der skyil krung dag ni bcas nas gnas pa'i tshe/_/rnam 'gyur rnam pa sna
[\[161b.3\]]sid+d+hi b+ha ba ne paR+YaM ka bar+d+ha s+thi tau/_/k+ShAn+ti k+ShA li ta ma n+yu nA b+ha ga ba tA bud+d+he na shud+d+hAt+ma nA te na d+h+yA na pa rA ya Ne nA nA ma nA gun+mI laM taM lo tsa naM/_/b+ha ba tA twa d+ya ka ru Na mut+p+r-i dz+yA haM kha lI kr-i taH/_/sA
[\[161b.4\]]tshogs byed pa bdag la ra ba nyid ni 'dzin byed cing /_/khro ba bzod pas bkrus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan dag pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can/_/bsam gtan mchog tu skyong bar byed pa de yi spyan yang cung zad phye ma yin/_/khyod kyis snying rje btang nas ding /_/bdag ni rab tu smad par byas/_/gnod
[\[161b.5\]]pA rA d+he pi ma hA tAM na ma n+yu ma li nam+ma naH/_/muny+tsa me ku Na pA ban+d+haM s+thi to haM ta ba shA sa ne/_/i ti bru bA NaM phi na yA du pa gup+ta sta ma n+ya d+hAta/_/na ka ri Sh+ya pi tse de baM b+hik+Shu NAM bi sla ba pu naH/_/ta de ba ta ba muny+tsA mi dr-i
[\[161b.6\]]byed la yang chen po yis/_/yid ni khro ba'i dri ldan min/_/bdag la ro dag btags pa thong /_/khyod kyi bka' la bdag gnas so/_/dul bas de skad smra byed pa/_/de la nyer sbas kyis smras pa/_/gal te slar yang nyer 'tshe khyod/_/dge slong rnams la mi byed na/_/khyod la brtan par bcings pa yi/_/
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]D+haM ku Na pa ban+d+ha naM/_/i daM tsa b+ha ba tA kAr+YaM pri yaM pra Na yi no ma ma/_/a tI ta su ga tA kA raM san+daR+sha yi tu mar+ha si/_/dr-iSh+Ta ta ba ma yA shak+tirnA T+ye sar+b+bA nu kA ri NaH/_/sa n+daR+sha
[\[162a.2\]]ro 'di dag ni bdag gis dgrol/_/gus ldan bdag la dga' ba ni/_/'di yang khyod kyis rab tu bya/_/'das pa'i bde gshegs rnam pa ni/_/khyod kyis yang dag bstan par 'os/_/kun gyi rjes mthun khyod kyis ni/_/zlos gar nus pa bdag gis mthong /_/bcom
[\[162a.3\]]ne b+ha ga ba taHpa ra mut+kaN+Thi to h+ya naM/_/d+har+m+ma kA yo ma yA dr-iSh+TaHsu ga ta s+yA shru tAt+ma nA/_/rU pa kA yastu ne bA sau na ya nA mr-i tA nir+dz+dz+ha raH/_/i ti ni rmuk+tA ku Na saste nok+taHku su mA yu d+haH/
[\[162a.4\]]ldan 'das ni mthong ba dag_/bdag ni mchog tu 'dod par gyur/_/bde gshegs kyi ni chos kyi sku/_/thos pa'i bdag nyid bdag gis mthong /_/nges par mig gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun/_/gzugs kyi sku de ma yin no/_/zhes brjod de yi ro dag ni/_/bkrol ba me tog mtshon can gyis/_/
[\[162a.5\]]ta mU rtse sau ga ta rU paM tu l+yaM kar+t+tuM na shA kya te/_/ta thA pi daR+sha ya mye Sha twa dA dz+nyA pi na ye s+thi taH/_/pra Na mye na pra Na myo haM na twa yA su ga tA kr-i tiH/_/i t+yuk+t+wA su ga tA kA raM sar+b+ba kA ra
[\[162a.6\]]de la smras pa bde gshegs kyi/_/gzugs dang mtshungs par byed mi nus/_/de lta na yang khyod kyi bka'/_/'dul ba la gnas bdag gis bstan/_/khyod kyis bdag ni bde gshegs dbyibs/_/phyag 'os la yang phyag mi bya/_/zhes brjod bde gshegs rnam pa ni/_/rnam pa kun tu
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]su kha pra daM/_/sa sa ut+p+r-iSh+Ta ka na kA lo kaM kAn+ta ma daR+sha yata/_/dIr+g+ha d+h+yA na ni lI na lo tsa na yu gaM niHsaM b+h+ra ma b+h+rU la taM na sA baM sha ni sak+ta kAn+ta ka na kats+tsha tro pa mA nA li kaM/_/nir+b+hu
[\[162b.2\]]bde ster zhing /_/gser gyi snang ba rab tu spro/_/mdzes pa dag ni de yis bstan/_/spyan ni zung dag ring zhing bsam gtan la chags smin ma'i 'khri shing rnam 'gyur bral/_/shangs kyi rgyud ni mdzes par chags shing gser gyi gdugs dang mtshungs pa'i mtshan ma can/_/rgyan med snyan
[\[162b.3\]]ShA ya ta kar+N+Na pA sha la li tAM byA lam+ba bA hu dru maM baud+d+hi rU pa ma bek+Sh+ya nir+b+r-i ti ra b+hun+nish+tse ta nA nA ma pi/_/u pa gup+ta sta dA lo kya kAn+ta b+ha ga ba to ba puH/_/sa bASh+pa pu la kA kIr+N+Nash+tsa kre tat+pA da
[\[162b.4\]]gyi zhags pa ring zhing mdzes la phyag gi ljon pa kun tu 'phyang /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs dag mthong na bsam pa med pa rnams kyang dga' bar gyur/_/bcom ldan sku ni mdzes pa de/_/mthong nas nyer sbas mchi ma dang /_/bcas shing spu long rgyas pa yis/_/de yi zhabs la
[\[162b.5\]]ban+da naM/_/na nA ma pra Na myo haM mi ti ba di ni pa man+ma the/_/u pa gup+tasta ma ba dat+p+ra Na myas+t+waM dzi nA kr-i tiH/_/kr-i tri me Sh+wa pi bim+ba Shu ban+d+yA b+ha ga ba tasta nuH/_/na sa mr-it+kASh+Thi d+hA tU nAM pra NA maH
[\[162b.6\]]phyag dag byas/_/nges par bdag gi phyag 'os min/_/zhes pa yid srubs smra byed tshe/_/de la nyer sbas kyis smras pa/_/rgyal ba'i rnam pa khyod phyag 'os/_/bcom ldan sku ni bcos ma yi/_/gzugs rnams la yang phyag byar 'os/_/mkhas pa rnams ni sa shing dang /_/khams
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]kri ya te bu d+haiH/_/i t+yuk+ta mu pa gup+te na shru twA mA raHpra san+na d+hIH/_/bi hA ya sau ga taM rU paM swam+ga puHpra t+ya ya d+ya ta/_/te ne bA tha sa mA hU tA bi nI te na hi te Shi NA/_/u pa gup+tAn+ti kaM pau
[\[163a.2\]]la phyag de byed pa min/_/nyer sbas kyis ni 'di brjod pa/_/rab dang blo ldan bdud kyis thos/_/bde gshegs gzugs ni yongs btang ste/_/rang gi gzugs su rab tu bstan/_/de nas dul zhing phan pa 'tshol/_/de yis yang dag bos pa yi/_/grong khyer ba rnams dam pa'i
[\[163a.3\]]rAHbad+d+har+m+ma shro tu ma ya yuH/_/ta s+yo pa de sha ka tha yA sa t+ya daR+sha na nirb-i taH/_/la k+ShA n+yaSh+TA da sha prAp+ti rar+ha twAM su ra bA si nAM/_/i ti sa sa ka la lo kA lo ka ka l+yA Na kA rI bya d+hi ta ti mi ra hA rI
[\[163a.4\]]chos/_/nyan du nyer sbas drung du 'ongs/_/de yi man ngag gtam gyis ni/_/bden pa mthong zhing dga' ba yis/_/grong khyer na gnas 'bum phrag ni/_/bco brgyad dgra bcom nyid thob 'gyur/_/de ltar 'jig rten mtha' dag dge ba dag gis snang byed cing /_/rab rib 'phrog
[\[163a.5\]]d+har+m+ma mArgo pa de shaM/_/bi pu la ku sha la mU la prAp+ta pu N+yo da yA nAM b+ha ba ti ki la ma har+d+d+hiR+YaHba re ShAM hi tA ya/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM mu
[\[163a.6\]]par byed pas chos kyi lam gyi man ngag bsgrubs/_/rgya che dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams rgyas pa thob rnams kyis/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po gang de gzhan la phan pa'i don du 'gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa gup+tA ba dA naM dwA sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//a khaN+Di taM shA sa na mA ya tA shrIR+Ya shAstu ShA rAM shu sha tA ba dA taM/_/A sh+tsaR+Ya tsaR+YA ru tsi raHpra b+hA baHpha lAM sha
[\[163b.2\]]gyi 'khri shing las nyer sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//nyams pa med pa'i bka' dang yangs pa'i dpal/_/grags pa bsil zer byed pa brgya ltar dkar/_/ngo mtshar spyod pas mdzes pa'i mthu dag ni/_/bde gshegs
[\[163b.3\]]le shaHsu ga tAts+tsa na s+ya/_/rA dzA shrI mA na sho ka b+hUt+pu re pA Ta li pu tra ke/_/dA nAr+thA nA ma b+hUd+Ya s+ya saM khyA shab+da da ri dra tA/_/taM ka dA tsip+ta b+hA bI naM pa Ni dzo dwi pa gA mi naH/_/sar+b+ba swa nA shru sho kAr+t+tiHsa
[\[163b.4\]]mchod pa'i 'bras bu'i cha shas yin/_/grong khyer pa Ta li pu trar/_/rgyal po dpal ldan mya ngan med/_/byung ste gang gis sbyin pa don/_/grangs kyi sgra yis dbul bar gyur/_/nam zhig mdun sar 'khod de la/_/tshong pa gling du 'gro ba po/_/bdog kun nyams pa'i mya ngan
[\[163b.5\]]niHshwA sA bya jidz+nya yuH/_/de bi dIr+g+ha b+hu dzats+tsha ya bi shran+ta b+hu ba na s+ya te/_/rA dz+nye na dr-i sh+ya te kash+tsits+tsin+tA pan+tA pi tA sha yaH/_/a smA kaM tu pra ba ha NaM b+haM k+t+wA rat+na d+ha naM hr-i taM/_/
[\[163b.6\]]gyis/_/gzir cing shugs ring ldan pas zhus/_/dpung pa'i grib ma ring po la/_/srid pa ngal gso lha khyod kyis/_/rgyal srid dag na 'ga' zhig kyang /_/re ba bsam pas gzir ba mthong /_/skal ba nyam chung 'ba' zhig las/_/rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis/_/
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]ke ba laM b+hA gya rdaur+b+ba l+yAn+nA gaiHsA ga ra bA si b+hiH/_/ba ya ma n+ya tra dzI bA masta du pe k+Sha tu te bi b+ho/_/sa mu dra yA trA bi ts+tse dAt+ko sha sho Sha b+hi d+hA yi nAM/_/i ti te ShA m+ba
[\[164a.2\]]bdag cag rnams kyi gzings bcag nas/_/rin cen nor rnams phrogs par gyur/_/bdag cag rnams ni gzhan du 'tsho/_/khyab bdag de la btang snyoms na/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba chad pa las/_/khyod kyi mdzod nyid skam par sgrub/_/ces pa de dag tshig thos nas/_/
[\[164a.3\]]tsaHshru twA rA dzA saM krAn+ta tad+b+ya thaH/_/sa mu drAn+targa tAn+nA gAn bi tsiM t+yasti mi to b+ha bta/_/taM d-iSh+T+wA niSh+Tha tI kA sa ko pa byA ku la mA na saM/_/in+d+ra nA mA bra bIta b+hik+ShuHSha Da b+hi dz+nyaM s+thi ton+ti ke/_/nA gA nAM
[\[164a.4\]]de dag gdung ba 'phos pa yis/_/rgyal pos rgya mtshor song ba'i klu/_/rnam par bsams nas g.yo med gyur/_/yid ni khro bas 'khrugs gyur cing /_/bcos thabs med pa de mthong nas/_/drung gnas mngon shes drug pa yi/_/dge slong dbang po zhes pas smras/_/rin chen
[\[164a.5\]]rat+na tsau rA NAM twat+p+ra tA pAg+ni sU tsa kaH/_/tA mra baT+TAr+p+pi to le khaHpreSh+ya tAM pr-i thi bI pa te/_/i ti b+hik+Shu ba tsaHshru twA le kha rA dzA bi sr-iSh+Ta bAn/_/k+Ship+ta me ba ta maM b+ho d+hau nA gAstI re Shu pra bi puH/_/nr-i bste
[\[164a.6\]]rkun po klu rnams la/_/khyod mthu me ni go byed pa/_/zangs kyi glegs bu la bkod pa'i/_/spring yig sa bdag spring bar mdzod/_/ces pa dge slong tshig thos nas/_/rgyal po yis ni spring yig springs/_/chu gter dag tu 'bangs pa de/_/klu rnams kyis ni ngogs su 'phangs/_/ma bkur
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]na bi mA ne na bi ts+tshA ya ba da nAM bu dzaH/_/tsin+tA sup+ta ma ti sta s+thau shwa san+nA sarbi tAM gu liH/_/ni drA pa rAng+gu khI ta s+ya kI ba s+ye bAM ga nA b+ha bta/_/dIr+g+hA tr-iSh+Ne ba lu g+d+ha s+ya na tsa rA triHk+Sha yaM ya yau/_/
[\[164b.2\]]pa des mi bdag ni/_/bzhin gyi chu skyes mdzes bral zhing /_/bsam pas blo nyal dbugs 'byin cing /_/sna la sor mo bkod de gnas/_/ma ning la ni bud med bzhin/_/de la gnyid ni phyir phyogs gyur/_/brkam chags can gyi sred pa ni/_/ring bzhin mtshan mo zad ma gyur/_/
[\[164b.3\]]taM byo ma de ba tA b+h+ye t+ya pra rAr+thod+ya ta ma b+h+ya d+hAta/_/u pA yo sa ti b+hU pA la na tsin+taM kar+t+tu mar+ha si/_/ye pU dza yan+ti dzi na many+dza li raM dzi te na mUr+d+hA pra NA ma ba ri NA ma ma har+hA pu N+yaH/_/te ShAM su ra
[\[164b.4\]]gzhan don sbyor ldan de la ni/_/nam mkha'i lha mos mngon phyogs smras/_/sa skyong thabs ni yod pa la/_/bsam pa bya bar mi 'os so/_/gang zhig phyag 'tshal yongs su bsngo bas cher 'os bsod nams can/_/spyi bo thal mo sbyar bas mtshan pas rgyal la mchod byed pa/_/rnam par
[\[164b.5\]]a pi su bstu bi tsi tra sho b+hA mA dz+nyA pra dzaM bi dza yi nAM shi rA sA ba han+ti/_/e ta dA kar+N+ya nr-i pa tiHpra ta snA twA shu tsi pra taH/_/sid+d+h+yai shud+d+he na ma na sA d+h+ya twA bud+d+haM sa ma b+h+ya d+hAta/_/sa twa sme
[\[164b.6\]]rgyal ldan de dag bka' yi 'phreng ba rnam bkra zhing /_/dngos po mchog gi mdzes pa lha rnams kyis kyang spyi bor 'dzin/_/de thos nang par mi bdag ni/_/khrus byas brtul zhugs gtsang ldan pas/_/dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas ni/_/bsams nas grub slad rab smras pa/_/snying stobs
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]raM sa ra sa ka ru NA kau mu dA pU ri tA shaM kAn+tAM shAn+t+yai pa ka la ta me sAM shukla sa k+She ni bistaM/_/ni t+yA nan+daM pa ra ma ma mr-i taM nirbi kA raM sr-i dzan+t-i ben+daM tA pa pra sha ma su hr-i daM bud+d+ha pUr+N+Ne n+du
[\[165a.2\]]kyis 'dzum ro ldan snying rje zla ba'i 'od kyis re ba skong /_/mdzes shing mtha' dag mun pa zhi slad dkar po'i phyogs la rnam par gnas/_/rtag tu kun dga' rnam 'gyur med cing mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam par spro/_/gdung ba rab zhi'i grogs po sangs rgyas zla nya'i
[\[165a.3\]]bim+baM/_/tsit+taM sa dA bi Sha ya do Sha pa rAd+mu khA nAM ye yA m+pa she pra tsu ra pA ra mi tA shra yA NAM/_/te me pa raM pa ra hi tI b+hi ni be sha b+hA dzaHsaM kalpa kalpa ta ra baHku sha lan+di shaM
[\[165a.4\]]gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig rtag tu yul gyi skyon las phyi rol phyogs gyur cing /_/rab mang pha rol phyin la brten pa'i sems ni dbang gyur pa/_/gzhan phan dag la mchog tu mngon zhen rten cing kun rtog gi/_/dpag bsam ljon pa de dag bdag la dge bar ster
[\[165a.5\]]tu/_/i ti b+hak+ti bi d+hA ne na pra Ni d+hA ne na b+hU ba tiH/_/sa ha prA N+yar+ha tAM ShaSh+Tha stur+N+Na di g+b+h+yaHsa mA ya yuH/_/a then+d+ro b+hik+Shu rA kA raM he maM ra mya ma kA ra yata/_/sa dr-i shaM nr-i pa te re kaM nA ga rA dza s+ya
[\[165a.6\]]gyur cig_/ces pa sa yi bdag po yi/_/smon lam gus pa sgrub byed kyis/_/dgra bcom stong phrag drug cu ni/_/phyogs rnams dag las myur bar byon/_/de nas dge slong dbang po yis/_/gcig ni mi bdag mtshungs pa dang /_/gzhan pa klu yi rgyal po yi/_/rnam pa gser gyi rang
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bA pa raM/_/ta taHk+Shi ti pa ter+m+mur+t+tirni na nA ma sha naiHsha naiH/_/un+na nA ma tsa nA gen+d+ra mUr+t+tirbi smi ya kA ri NAM/_/ya thA ya thA nr-i bash+tsakre sa dA rat+na tra yA tsa naM/_/ta thA ga thA nA ga mUrtIrbi na nA mo d+ya yau pA
[\[165b.2\]]bzhin byas/_/de nas dal bu dal bu yis/_/sa bdag gzugs ni dma' ba dang /_/klu yi dbang po'i gzugs dag ni/_/ya mtshan byed pa mtho bar gyur/_/ji lta ji ltar mi bdag gis/_/rtag tu dkon mchog gsum mchod byas/_/de lta de ltar klu yi gzugs/_/dma' zhing gzhan pa mtho bar
[\[165b.3\]]rA/_/a tha rA dz+nyAHpu naR+Ya khe pra hi ta nA ga puM ga bA/_/skan+d+hA rbi tA khi la ba Ni grat+na b+hA rAHsa mA ya yuH/_/ta da she ShaM na ra pa tirbi tIR+Ya ba Ni dzAn+d+ha naM/_/bi sri dz+ya nA gA na b+ha badz+dzi na shA sa na sA da raH/_/
[\[165b.4\]]gyur/_/de nas rgyal pos spring yig slar/_/springs tshe klu yi gang zag rnams/_/ma lus tshong pa'i rin chen khur/_/phrag la bkod nas 'ongs par gyur/_/ma lus nor de mi bdag gis/_/tshong pa rnams la rab tu byin/_/klu rnams btang nas rgyal ba yi/_/bstan la gus dang bcas par gyur/_/
[\[165b.5\]]su bi d+hAR+YAr+ha tAM pU dzA mu pa tsA rai nr-i po tsi taiH/_/ba b+hU pA nalpa saM kalpe rbud+d+ha san+daR+sha rot+su kaH/_/durla b+he pa ri nirbA Na ni lI na dzi na daR+sha ne/_/u pa gup+ta pa shu shrA ba su ga ta pra ti maM
[\[165b.6\]]mi bdag la 'os nyer spyad kyis/_/dgra bcom rnams la mchod pa bsgrubs/_/kun tu rtog pa mi chung bas/_/sangs rgyas blta bar 'dod par gyur/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pas/_/rgyal ba mthong ba rnyed dka'i tshe/_/yon tan gyis ni nyer sbas dang /_/bde gshegs mtshungs par de
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gu NaiH/_/bi d+he yaM b+hak+ti yuk+tA nAM nr-i paHpra Na yi bat+sa laM/_/u ru muN+Da s+thi taM dU tai ra ni nA ya ta mA da rAtra/_/tat+pa paR+YAp+ta gar+thAp+ta sad+d+har+m+ma ku sha lo da yaH/_/ba b+hU ba sa ta taM rA dzA rat+na
[\[166a.2\]]yis thos/_/gus dang ldan pa'i dbang gyur cing /_/mdza' la mnyes gshin 'gro tshe na/_/gnas pa de ni mi bdag gis/_/gus pas pho nya dag gis bos/_/dam chos dge ba rgyas pa ni/_/yongs rdzogs de yis mchod pas thob/_/rtag tu dkon mchog gsum po ni/_/
[\[166a.3\]]tra ma pa rA ya NaH/_/i ti dzi na sma ra Ne na ma hI pa tiHpra ba ba pu N+ya ma ho da ya sam+pa daH/_/bi Sha b+h+r-i tA ma pi mau li Shu shA sa naM ku su ma bA ma pi lA sa ma bAp+ta banra/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi
[\[166a.4\]]rgyal po'i dpung gnyen dag tu gyur/_/de ltar rgyal ba dran pas sa yi bdag po dag_/rab rgyas bsod nams che bar dar ba phun tshogs kyis/_/bka' ni me tog 'phreng bar gyur pa'i rtse dga' dag_/dug 'dzin rnams kyi mgo bo la yang thob par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos
[\[166a.5\]]ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM nA ga dU ta pre Sha NA ba dA naM tri sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waMH//_//pu N+yaM pra NA ma pa tha me ti ka than+na te ShAM dA nod+ya tAHpa ya di gA mi ba lI
[\[166a.6\]]byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las klu la springs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//gang zhig sbyin la brtson pas 'phral la dga' ba glang chen bzhin/_/yan lag rdzogs shing
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]la yai ba/_/pUr+N+NAM ga pUr+N+NA ru tsi rAM pr-i thu ma d+h+ya de shAM ye ShAM swa bat+sa sa hi tAM pra ti pA da yan+ti/_/a thA sho kaHk+Shi ti pa tirdA nA b+h+yA se na b+hU ya sA/_/A pa ga ta pra Na yi nAM
[\[166b.2\]]mdzes sdug rgyas la rgya che dbus kyi phyogs/_/sa ni rang gi mnyes gshin dang bcas rab tu ster byed pa/_/de dag bsod nams rab smin lam du ji ltar 'gro ma yin/_/de nas sa bdag mya ngan med/_/sbyin la shin tu cher goms pas/_/slong ba phyogs nas 'ongs rnams kyi/_/
[\[166b.3\]]pra ya yau kalpa br-ik+Sha tAM/_/rA dzo tsi tiHsa sa ta taM b+ho dza nA b+ha ra NAm+ba raiH/_/b+hik+Shu la k+Sha tra yaM ge he b+hak+taM pU tai ra pU dza yata/_/he ma ko Ti sha taM dA tuM s+thi to b+hUd+ya s+ya nish+tsi yaH/_/sa twa me bAk+Sha
[\[166b.4\]]dpag bsam shing nyid dag tu gyur/_/rtag tu rgyal po la 'os pa'i/_/zas dang gos dang rgyan rnams kyis/_/khyim du dge slong 'bum phrag gsum/_/gus shing gtsang ba dag gis mchod/_/gser ni bye ba brgya ster ba/_/gang gi lugs la nges par gyur/_/dge ba ldan pa'i snying
[\[166b.5\]]ya ta rAHko shaHku sha la shA li nAM/_/sAm+RA dz+ya b+hU ri bi b+ha baHShaT+t+riM shad+b+hiHsaM bat+sa raiH/_/hem+naHShaN+Na ba tiM ko TI rdaM rau saM g+hA ya sa twa d+hIH/_/ta taHkA le na nr-i pa tir+b+yA d+hi nA glA ni mA ya yau/_/s+the rA Ni su kr-i tA n+ye ba
[\[166b.6\]]stobs nyid/_/shin tu zad pa med pa'i mdzod/_/rgyal srid che la 'byor mang des/_/snying stobs blo yis dge 'dun la/_/lo ni sum cu drug gi gser/_/bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug phul/_/de nas dus kyis mi bdag ni/_/nad kyis thebs pa nyid du gyur/_/lus can rnams kyi legs byas
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]na sha rI rA NI de hi nAM/_/ta nu mA pan+na paR+Yan+tAM nish+tsi t+ya pr-i thi bI pa tiH/_/b+hik+Shu b+h+yaH kuk+kuT+TA rA me tra bi Ni dA tu mud+ya yau/_/tat+pau traHsam+pa dI nA ma lo b+hAr+thasta s+ya shA sa ni/_/dA nA pu N+ya pra br-it+ta s+ya ko shA
[\[167a.2\]]nyid/_/brtan pa yin gyi lus ni min/_/lus ni mtha' la nye ba nyid/_/des nas sa yi bdag po yis/_/bya gag kun rar dge slong la/_/nor ni 'bul bar rtsom par gyur/_/de yi tsha bo phun tshogs can/_/zhes pas chags slad mdzod srung la/_/bskos pas sbyin pa'i bsod nams
[\[167a.3\]]d+h+ya k+Shai ra bA ra yata/_/dA ne ni Shid+d+he bau tre Na saMg+hA ya pr-i thI bI pa tiH/_/b+haiSha dz+yA ma la ka s+yAr+d+d+haM da dau swa b+hAM ga b+ha ba taM/_/d+hI ma taHsam+ma tA+e nA tha ra d+hi gup+ta s+ya man+t+ri NaH/_/da dau saM g+hA yA ni khi lAM pr-i thi bI pri thi
[\[167a.4\]]la/_/zhugs pa de yi bka' dag bzlog_/tsha bos sbyin pa bkag pa'i tshe/_/dge 'dun la ni sa bdag gis/_/rang skal nyid du gyur pa'i sman/_/skyu ru ra yi phye dag phul/_/de nas blon po blo ldan ni/_/mgu byed sbas pa'i gros dag gis/_/dge 'dun la ni sa gzhi dag_/ma lus sa yi bdag
[\[167a.5\]]bI pa tiH/_/gaM gAm+bu hA ra ru tsi rAM tsa tu raMm+bu rA shi be lA bi shA la ra pa nAm+ma la yA ba taM sAM/_/dA twA khi lAM ba su ma tIM pa ba mA sa sA da pu N+yaM pra mA Na ka la nA ra hi taM hi tA ya/_/pra khyA ta
[\[167a.6\]]pos phul/_/gang gA'i chu yi do shal mdzes ldan rgya mtsho bzhi yi ni/_/rba rlabs ske rags yangs shing ma la ya yi rna rgyan can/_/nor 'dzin ma nyid ma lus byin nas phan pa'i slad du ni/_/bsod nams chad kyis dpag dang bral ba de yis yang dag thob/_/de nas gser ni bye ba dgu
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]ShaN+Na ba ti ko Ti bu bar+N+Na dA ne yA te di baM na ra pa tA ba tha ta s+ya pau traH/_/she She Na man+t+ri ba tsa pA k+Shi ti mA dza hA ra spaSh+Ta kra yI ka na ka kau Ti tsa tuSh+Ta ye na/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na
[\[167b.2\]]bcu drug byin rab grags pa/_/mi yi bdag po mtho ris song tshe de yi tsha bo yis/_/sa de gser gyi lhag ma bye ba phrag ni bzhi rnams kyis/_/blon po'i tshig gis gsal bar rab tu nyos te blangs par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs
[\[167b.3\]]kalpa la tA yAM pr-i thi bI pra dA naM tsa tuHsap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//sar+b+ba ma bi d+yA mU le saM sA ra ta ru pra kA ra bai tsi t+r+yaM/_/dz+nyA tuM bak+tuM hartuM kaHshak+to n+ya tra sar+b+ba dz+nyAta/_/
[\[167b.4\]]pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sa gzhi phul ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//ma rig pa yi rtsa ba can/_/'khor ba'i ljon pa rnam bkra kun/_/shis dang brjod dang gzhom par ni/_/kun mkhyen ma gtogs su yis nus/_/
[\[167b.5\]]shrA bas+t+yA swa staM mA na pUr+b+baM dzi no dze ta ba na s+thi tiH/_/a she Sha daR+shi b+ha ga bAn b+hik+Shu saM b+ha ma b+hA Sha ta/_/shr-i nu ta shre ya se dz+nyA nA lo ka nir+m+ma la mA na sAH/_/pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA daM baHka tha yA
[\[167b.6\]]mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal na sngon/_/bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dge legs can/_/ma lus gzigs pa bcom ldan gyis/_/dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_/ye shes snang ba dri med kyi/_/yid can dge legs slad du nyon/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung bdag gis ni/_/khyed la rim
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]mi ya thA kra ma/_/a bi d+yA bA pa ni be yaM duHkha kan+d+ha s+ya b+hU ya saH/_/saM sA ra bi Sha br-ik+Sha s+ya mU la ban+d+ha bi d+hA yi nI/_/tat+p+ra t+ya yAstu saM skA raHkA ya pAd+mA na pAt+ma kAH/_/saM skA rot+thany+tsa bi dz+nyA naM ma naH
[\[168a.2\]]bzhin bshad par bya/_/ma rig pa yi bag chags 'di/_/'khor ba dug gi ljon pa ni/_/sdug bsngal phung po chen po yis/_/rtsa ba 'ching ba sgrub par byed/_/de yi rkyen gyis 'du byed de/_/lus ngag yid kyi bdag nyid can/_/'du byed kyis bskrun rnam shes yid/_/
[\[168a.3\]]ShaSh+Then+d+ri yAt+ma kamra/_/ta t+p+ra t+ya yaM nA ma rU paM saM dz+nyA san+daR+sha nA b+hi d+haM/_/ma naHShaSh+Thin+d+ri ya s+thA ni Sha DA ya ta na ma s+ya taH/_/Sha DA ya ta na saM sh+Ye ShaH spaR+sha i t+ya b+hi d+hI ya te/_/Sha Ta spaR+shA
[\[168a.4\]]dbang po drug po'i bdag nyid can/_/de yi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_/ming dang mthong ba zhes brjod pa'o/_/'di las drug pa yid dag kyang /_/dbang po la gnas skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gis yang dag sbyor/_/reg pa zhes ni mngon par brjod/_/reg pa drug gi
[\[168a.5\]]nu b+ha bo yash+tsa be da nA sA pra kIr+t+ti tAH/_/ta yA bi Sha ya saM kle shAd+d+rA ga tr-iSh+NA pra dzA ya te/_/kA mA di Shu ta b+hU ta ma sA dA naM pra bar+t+ta te/_/u pA dA nod+b+ha baHkA ma rU bA rU bya ma yo b+ha baH/_/
[\[168a.6\]]nyams myong gang /_/de ni tshor ba dag tu grags/_/yul gyi kun nas nyon mongs las/_/de yis chags sred rab tu skyed/_/de las byung ba'i len pa ni/_/'dod pa sogs pa 'jug par 'gyur/_/len pa las byung srid pa 'dod/_/gzugs dang gzugs med rang bzhin no/_/
[\[168b\]]
