[\[168b.1\]]nA nA yo ni pa rA br-i t+yA dzA tir+b+ha ba sa mud+d+ha bA/_/dza rA ma ra Na sho kA di pan+da tirdzA ti saM shra yA/_/a bi d+yA di ni ro d+he na te ShAM b+hu pa ra ma kra maH/_/pra tI t+yot+pA do yaM ba hu ga ti ra bi d+yA hr-i ta pa daHsa
[\[168b.2\]]srid pa las byung sna tshogs kyis/_/skye gnas su 'jug skye ba'o/_/rga shi mya ngan la sogs brgyud/_/skye ba la ni brten pa yin/_/ma rig la sogs 'gog pa yis/_/de dag rim bzhin zhi bar 'gyur/_/ma rig pas drangs lus mang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gnas
[\[168b.3\]]tsin+t+ya yuSh+mA b+hirbi dza na ba na bi shrA ma sha ma b+hiH/_/pa ri dz+nyA te sa myak+b+ra dza ti ki la kA le na ta nu tAM ta nu twaM saM prap+ta su kha ta ra ni baR+Yash+tsa b+ha ba ti/_/i ti k+She men+da pi ra tsi tA yA bo d+hi sa twA
[\[168b.4\]]'di ni/_/dben pa'i nags su gnas shing zhi ba khyed rnams dag gis bsam par bya/_/yang dag yongs su shes na dus kyis nges par phra ba nyid du 'gyur/_/phra ba nyid ni yang dag thob nas bde blag nyid du zlog par 'gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[168b.5\]]ba bA na kalpa la tA yAM pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA dA ba dA naM pany+tsa sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//kro d+haHsan+di hi taHpra tap+ta ma ni pI mIR+Sh+yA ba shAt+kA mi nAM kro d+hAn+d+hA ni pa tan+ti tI bra ti mi ra shA b+h+re
[\[168b.6\]]rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//'dod ldan rab gdungs yid can rnams la phrag dog dbang gis khro ba nye bar gnas/_/khro bas long bzhin blo gros nyams rnams mi bzad rab rib
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]ma ti b+h+raM bi naH/_/sa tra krU ra ta ra pra kA ra ka kle shoSh+ma mUts+tsha dzu ShA yA kalpaM k+Shu ra tal+la kalpa bi Sha yak+Sho NI k+Sha tA nAM k+Sha yaH/_/na dI ma dzi ra ma t+yA khyA shrA bas+t+yA b+ha ga bAny+dzi naH/_/saM prAp+ta sa twa ma
[\[169a.2\]]g.yang sar rnam par lhung /_/der ni rab drag rnam mang dmyal ba'i nyon mongs tsha bas rmongs pa rten byed cing /_/bskal pa'i bar du spu gri mal stan du brtags yul gyi sa gzhis bcom rnams brlag_/bcom ldan rgyal bas mnyan yod kyi/_/chu klung khyams ldan zhes par ni/_/byon pas sems can
[\[169a.3\]]drA k+ShI A br-i taM bi kr-i taM dza naiH/_/ma hA kA ya kr-i mi ku lair+b+hak+Sh+ya mA Na pra Nod+b+ha baiH/_/sU tsa yan+taM bya thA rA bair+n+na ra kas+thi ti be pa paM/_/taM dr-iSh+TA dzA ta ka ru NaHsar+b+ba dz+nya sta Ti nI ta Te/_/u pA bi shat+pau ra dza nai rA sa na
[\[169a.4\]]rnam 'gyur can/_/skyo bos kun tu bskor ba gzigs/_/rma las byung ba srin bu yi/_/tshogs kyis lus chen za byed cing /_/gdung ba'i cho nges dmyal ba na/_/gnas pa'i sdug bsngal gnas byed pa/_/de mthong thugs rje skyes pa yi/_/kun mkhyen chu klung ngogs su ni/_/grong khyer ba yi skye bo yis/_/yongs su
[\[169a.5\]]pa ri kalpi te/_/so bad+pi kr-i tA kA raM dzA t+yan+d+haM ma hi Sho yaM/_/kr-i twA dzA tasma raM pa d+yasta dU pe Na sa mA d+hi nA/_/a pi to bi du ra krU ra kar+m+ma NAM b+hu dz+ya te pha laM/_/a pi daurdza n+ya dza na nI sA ma ti
[\[169a.6\]]bshams pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/de yi rang bzhin ting 'dzin gyis/_/'phral la skye ba dran mdzad nas/_/dmus long rnam 'gyur rnam pa can/_/ma he mtshungs la des gsungs pa/_/bi du ra khyod mi bzad pa'i/_/las kyi 'bras bu longs spyod dam/_/tshul ngan skyed par byed pa yi/_/blo de khyod kyis
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]smaR+Ya te twa yA/_/shru twai tat+su ga te nok+taM sa ma nu Sh+ya gi rA bra bIta/_/tI bra pA pa s+ya b+ha ga bAn b+hu dz+ya te bi pu laM pha laM/_/i ti ta s+ya bru bA Na s+ya dzA ti saM sma ra NAt+pa raM/_/ki me ta di ti pa prats+tsha b+hik+Shu saM g+ha ma hA dza naH/_/Ash+tsaR+Ya
[\[169b.2\]]dran nam ci/_/bde gshegs kyis gsungs de thos nas/_/mi yi tshig gis des smras pa/_/bcom ldan mi bzad sdig pa yi/_/'bras bu rgya che longs spyod do/_/zhes pa smra ba de yis ni/_/mchog tu skye ba dran pa las/_/skye bo mang pos 'di ci zhes/_/dge slong dge 'dun dag la dris/_/de nas dge slong
[\[169b.3\]]br-it+taM b+ha ga bAn A nan+de nA ba b+hik+Shu NA/_/tat+kar+m+ma ko tu kAspr-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nya sa ma b+hA Sha ta/_/udz+dza ya n+yA ma b+hUt+pUr+b+ba bi du ro nA ma b+hU pa tiH/_/a sho ka i ba lo lAk+Shi tsa ra NA ha ti ko tu kI/_/sa ka dA tsid+ba d+hU
[\[169b.4\]]kun dga' bos/_/de yi las kyi dge mtshan las/_/ngo mtshar sngon byung dris de la/_/bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa/_/sa bdag bi du ra zhes pa/_/mya ngan med bzhin mig g.yo mas/_/rkang pas bsnun pa'i dge mtshan can/_/'phags rgyal dag tu sngon byung gyur/_/nam zhig sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa'i
[\[169b.5\]]br-in+dair+m+ma d+hau ma d+hu pa bAn+d+ha bai/_/bi la lA sA ni lA lo la la tA la lo ta kA na ne/_/tA b+hU mi pA li la la nAsta tra puSh+pots+tsha yA ku lAH/_/bi tse ru nU pu rA rA ba ta raM gi ta bi haM ga mAH/_/dben par rnam par gnas pa yi zhes pa'i skad dod chad pa 'dar los bcug pa slar rgya dpe rnyed na zhus dag byed/_e kAn+ta tA bi tiSh+Tha sh+tsakAn+tAHshAn+te ri bA shra maM/
[\[169b.6\]]gnyen/_/dpyid dus rlung gi g.yo ba yis/_/'khri shing yid 'ong nags tshal du/_/de ni bud med tshogs dang rtse/_/sa skyong bud med de dag der/_/me tog 'thu bas brel gyur pa/_/rkang gdub sgra yi 'dab chags ni/_/rnam par bskyod cing rab tu 'khyam/_/der ni zhi ba la brten bzhin/_/dben bar rnam par gnas pa yi/_/
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pra t+yaM ka bud+d+ha mar+had+b+hir+d+da tr-I shuHpa r-i bA ri taM/_/s+thi taM paR+YaM ka ban+d+he na d+h+yA na sti mi ta lo tsa naM/_/taM dr-iSh+T+wA sa ha sai bA saM pra san+na ma b+ha ban+ma naH/_/d+h+yA nAn+te tA de shan+ta taM d+har+m+ma shud+d+ha mi bA mr-i
[\[170a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas ni dgra bcom gyis/_/yongs bskor mdzes ma rnams kyis mthong /_/skyil krung bcas nas gnas gyur cing /_/bsam gtan spyan ni g.yo med pa/_/de mthong 'phral la de dag rnams/_/yid ni rab tu dang bar gyur/_/bsam gtan mthar ni dag pa'i chos/_/bdud rtsi bzhin
[\[170a.3\]]taM/_/pa ri tsAr+yo pa bi bi shuHkr-i ta pa dA b+hi ban+da nAH/_/nr-i pa staM de sha ma b+h+ye t+ya s+t+rai NaM dr-iSh+T+wA ta dun+mu baM/_/sha rI raM shud+d+ha shI lA nAM te ShAn+ni gra ha mA di ta shata/_/te na bA be na bi pu laM kA la na ra ka saM ka re/_/pa
[\[170a.4\]]du ston de la/_/rkang par phyag byas de dag gis/_/yongs su bskor nas nye bar gnas/_/mi bdag yul der song ba yi/_/bud med rnams der mngon phyogs mthong /_/tshul khrims dag ldan de dag gi_/lus ni bcad pa rab tu bskos/_/sdig pa de yis yangs pa yi/_/dus su dmyal ba nyam nga bar/_/rnams
[\[170a.5\]]kwo yaM bi kr-i taiHsa twair+b+hak+Sh+ya mA No du rA kr-i tiH/_/a pA da masta kA ne ka bi kA ri bra Na saM b+ha baiH/_/kIr+N+NaM kr-i mi ku laiHkA yaM pa sh+ya tA s+ya dzu gup+si taM/_/kalpAn+te na ra kaM b+huk+t+wA tsaN+DA ya twa mu pA ga taH/_/pra t+ye ka
[\[170a.6\]]'gyur sems can gyis za zhing /_/ngan pa'i dbyibs can 'di dag smin/_/mgo nas rkang bar du ma yi/_/rnam 'gyur rma las byung gyur pa'i/_/srin bu'i rigs kyis khengs gyur pa/_/'di yi lus ni smad pa ltos/_/bskal pa'i mthar ni dmyal ba dag_/spyad nas gtum po nyid gyur te/_/rngon pa'i ngang
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]bud+d+ha mr-i ga yA mI shI lo yan+ni ha ni Sh+yAta/_/pu na rna ra ka saM kle sha shIR+Ya mA nA ya tA kr-i tiH/_/saM khyA tI te na kA le na pra yA s+ya ti ma nu Sh+ya tAM/_/shAstu rut+ta raM saM dz+nya s+ya ta taHk+Sha yi ta kilbi ShaH/_/dIr+g+hA
[\[170b.2\]]tshul ldan pa 'dis/_/rang sangs rgyas ni gsod par 'gyur/_/slar yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/lus can rnam par nyams byed cing /_/grangs las 'das pa'i dus kyis ni/_/mi nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/de nas sdig pa zad gyur te/_/nyon mongs me chen dag gis ni/_/yid byung
[\[170b.3\]]kle sha na lod+big+nAHshA sa ne pra bra dzi Sh+ya ti/_/u d+yA ne kA shi rA dza s+ya kAn+tA b+hiHpU dzi tasta taH/_/IR+Sh+yA ko pe na sha rI ra la pAp+s+ya t+yu gra ni gra haM/_/ta to s+ya tI pra duHkhAg+naM ba ba pA naM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_/i ti shAstur+b+ba tsaH
[\[170b.4\]]ston pa ud ta ra/_/zhes pa'i bstan la rab 'byung 'gyur/_/de ni kA shi'i rgyal po yi/_/skyed mos tshal du mdzes mas mchod/_/phrag dog khro bas lus dag ni/_/chad pa drag pos gcod par 'gyur/_/de rjes 'di yi sdug bsngal me/_/mi bzad rab tu nyams par 'gyur/_/zhes pa ston pa'i gsung
[\[170b.5\]]shru twA sar+b+ba bai rA gya ma ya thuH/_/ud+big+nA nA ma tha b+ha ba b+ha ya kle sha tsin+tA tu rA NAM shAstuHpUr+N+Ne rA mr-i ta ba sa rer+b+bAd+ma ye sta tra te ShAM/_/sak+tA h+lA daiHku sha la pa li laiHpra b+h+ya mA nA sha yA
[\[170b.6\]]thos nas/_/thams cad chags bral ldan par gyur/_/de nas der ni ston pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i rgyun rdzogs pas/_/chags bral srid pa'i 'jigs pa'i nyon mongs bsam pas gzir ba de dag rnams/_/dga' ba dang ldan dge ba'i chu yis bsam pa rab tu rdzogs gyur cing /_/
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]nAM tA baHkwA pi pra sha ma ku su nA rA ma b+hA dzaM dza gA ma/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM bi du rA ba dA na ShaT sap+ta ta ta maHpal+la waH//_//kha lot+kaR+she Na sar+b+ba s+ya gu
[\[171a.2\]]rab zhi me tog dga' tshal ldan pa rnams kyi gdung ba ga shed song /_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bi du ra'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//mi bsrun rab tu rgyas pa yis/_/
[\[171a.3\]]Na lag+nA niHpra dzA ya te/_/b+ha ba t+ya b+hu da yA yai ba pra b+hA bstu ma hAt+ma nAM/_/A tra mA yAM ba no pAn+te b+ha ga bAn+su ga taHpu rA/_/b+hU tA ga ra gu hA gar+b+ha ta s+thaud+h+yA na pA rA ya NAH/_/ta tra tI brA sha ni s+pho Ta niSh+paSh+Ta br-i Sha
[\[171a.4\]]kun gyi yon tan nyams par byed/_/bdag nyid chen po'i mthu yis ni/_/mngon par dar ba nyid du 'gyur/_/A tra mA yA'i nags kyi mthar/_/'byung po'i khang pa'i phug nang na/_/bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon/_/bsam gtan rab tu skyong zhing gnas/_/der ni mi bzad lce 'bab pa/_/drag pos khyu mchog
[\[171a.5\]]kaR+Sha kaH/_/te na d+h+yA na li ne na g+ha na shap+do pi na shru taH/_/d+h+yA nAn+te tha pra ba tsa naM shAstur+m+man+dA ki nI ta Te/_/tsa tu raHshro tu mA dza g+mar+m+sa hA rA dzA b+hi d+hAHpu ra/_/d+h+r-i ta rASh+T+ya bi rU D+hA khya bi rU pak+Sha d+ha nA d+hi pAH/_/te
[\[171a.6\]]zhing pa bcom/_/des ni bsam gtan la chags pas/_/sprin gyi sgra yang gsan ma gyur/_/de nas dal 'bab ngogs su ni/_/bsam gtan mtha' ru ston pa'i gsung /_/nyan du rgyal po chen po ni/_/bzhi zhes brjod pa sngon du 'ongs/_/yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/_/mig mi bzang dang nor bdag go_/_de yi
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]kIr+N+Na rat+na ku su mAsta s+ya pA dau pa ban+di re/_/te b+h+yo hi tsAR+Ya dzA tI yau d+h+r-i ta rASh+T+ya bi rUD+ha kau/_/dwA pa n+yau krU rA dzA tI yau te ShAM spo tsi tab+hA Sha yA/_/sad+d+har+m+ma de sha naM tsa kre b+ha ga bAn+b+hU ta b+hA ba naH/_/ye na
[\[171b.2\]]zhabs la de dag gis/_/phyag 'tshal rin chen me tog gtor/_/de dag las ni 'phags pa'i rigs/_/yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/_/gzhan gnyis gdug pa'i rigs can te/_/de dag la ni dam chos dag/_/bcom ldan 'byung po dgongs pa yis/_/rang la 'os pa'i skad kyis bstan/_/gang
[\[171b.3\]]shA sa na d+harme Shu ba b+hU puste bi shA ra daH/_/shik+ShA pa da pra Na yi na ste rat+na tra ya mA shrI tAH/_/na twA b+ha ga ba taHpA dau bi ma nai s+t+ri di paM ya yuH/_/te Shu yA te Shu b+ha ga bAn b+hi k+Shu b+hirdzA ta bisma yeH/_/prAk+pu
[\[171b.4\]]gis de dag bstan pa yi/_/chos la rab tu mkhas par gyur/_/dkon mchog gsum la rab brten cing /_/bslab pa'i gnas bzung de dag rnams/_/bcom ldan zhabs la btud nas ni/_/gzhal med khang nas mtho ris song /_/de dag song tshe bcom ldan la/_/dge slong ya mtshan skyes rnams kyis/_/de dag
[\[171b.5\]]N+ya pany+tsa yan+te ShAM pr-iSh+TiHpro bA tsa sar+b+ba bi ta/_/alpa shwA sa ma hA shwa so pu ra nA go ba b+hU ba tuH/_/ta dwe Sha nau su par+N+Nau tsa tsU Dir+m+miT+Ta swa rasta thA/_/nA go kA sh+ya pA shAstu saM prA s+ya b+hU ta sha sa naM/_/su par+N+Na
[\[171b.6\]]sngon tshe bsod nams tshogs/_/dris pa thams cad rig pas gsungs/_/klu ni dbugs chung dbugs chen dag_/sngon byung de dag dgra bo ni/_/'dab bzang gtsug ldan de bzhin du/_/mi Di'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'o/_/klu yis ston pa 'od srungs kyi/_/bka' ni yang dag thob gyur nas/_/stobs ldan
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]yo ra sra d+h+r-i Sh+yA ba b+hu ta m+ba la shA li nau/_/dwe Sha spar+d+hA b+hi mA ne na su par+N+NA ba pi kA sh+ya pA ta/_/gr-i hi twA shA sa naM rat+na tra yaM sha ra Na mA pa tuH/_/tau nA gA bAR+Ya dzA tI yau d+h+r-i ta
[\[172a.2\]]'dab bzang dag gis ni/_/brdzi bar nus pa min par gyur/_/zhe sdang 'gran zhing mngon khengs pa/_/'dab bzang gis kyang 'od srungs la/_/bstan pa rin chen bzung nas ni/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song /_/klu de dag ni 'phags pa'i rigs/_/yul 'khor
[\[172a.3\]]rASh+T+ra bi rU D+ha kau/_/krU ro su par+N+Nau tA pe tau bi rU pA k+Sha d+ha nA d+hi pau/_/dzi na s+ye ti brU ba Na s+ya pu N+yaM pra ba tsa nA mr-i taM/_/tad+ba nau pAn+ta ni la yaHshru twA ke ne ya ko mu niH/_/bIsmi ta stat+p+ra b+hA be na ta me ba sha ra
[\[172a.4\]]srung dang 'phags skyes po/_/gdug pa'i 'dab bzang de dag ni/_/mig mi bzang dang nor bdag 'di/_/zhes pa gsung ba rgyal ba yi/_/bsod nams gsung rab bdud rtsi ni/_/nags tshal de na gnas pa yi/_/thub pa ke ne ya kas thos/_/de yi mthu yis ya mtshan te/_/de nyid la ni
[\[172a.5\]]NaM ga taH/_/a nA gA mi lAp+t+yA b+hU ta pa t+ya daR+sha na nir+b+r-i taH/_/tad+b+hA gi ne yaHshi lo pi ta thai ba bi na yaM shri taH/_/a nA gA mi pha lo dA raM sa t+ya daR+sha na mAp+ta bA na/_/tau sA nu gau b+ha ga ba taHpra san+ne d+har+m+ma shA sa ne/_/
[\[172a.6\]]skyabs su song /_/phyir mi 'ong ni thob gyur nas/_/bden pa mthong zhing dga' bar gyur/_/de yi tsha bo shi la yang /_/de bzhin 'dul ba la brten nas/_/bden pa mthong zhing rgya che ba/_/phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras thob 'gyur/_/de dag 'khor bcas bcom ldan gyi/_/bstan pa'i chos la rab dang zhing /_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]pra bra dz+yAM sa mu pA dA ya sh+lA b+h+ya mar+ha twa mA pa tu/_/ta ta sta da ba shiSh+TA nAM tsa kruHsu ga ta shA sa nAta/_/kat+phi NaHshA ri pu trash+tsa maud+ga l+yA sh+tsAR+Ya de sha nAM/_/ma naHbra pA da ma lo kya pa raM kai ne ya she ma yoH/_/tat+pUr+b+ba puN+yA
[\[172b.2\]]rab tu byung ba blangs nas ni/_/bsngags par 'os pa'i dgra bcom thob/_/de nas de yis lhag rnams la/_/bde gshegs bka' yis ka pi na/_/shA ri'i bu dang mau gal gyi/_/bu yis kyang ni bstan pa mdzad/_/kai na ya ka shai la ni/_/yid rab dang mthong de dag gis/_/sngon gyi bsod
[\[172b.3\]]b+ha ga wAn pr-iSh+To b+hik+Shu b+hi ra b+h+ya d+hAta/_/e tau gr-i ha pa tI pUr+b+ba dzan+ma n+ya gAM ga nA b+hid+hau/_/sa kr-i dau d+har+m+ma ni ra tau bA rA Na s+yAm+ban+d+ha ba tuH/_/tsa ri ta bra h+ma tsar+yau tau kA sh+ya pa s+yAn+ti ke pu roH/_/paR+Yan+ta pra Ni d+hA ne
[\[172b.4\]]nams dge slong gis/_/dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/_/sngon gyi skye bar 'di dag ni/_/bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag gnyis/_/ang ga a ga na zhes pa/_/grogs po chos la dga' bar gyur/_/bla ma 'od srungs drung du ni/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dag_/mthar thug smon lam
[\[172b.5\]]na prA p+tA sa d+ya pra shAn+ta tA+e/_/ka thi ta mi ti ta thA ga te na pu N+yaM mu ni ba ra yoHpra Ni d+hA na dzaM ni sha mya/_/a b+ha ba da ba hi ta prA shAn+ti yuk+t+yA b+ha ba b+hu dza gA b+hi b+ha bA ya b+hik+Shu saM g+haH/_/i ti
[\[172b.6\]]dag gis ni/_/da lta rab tu zhi nyid thob/_/de ltar thub mchog bsod nams smon lam las skyes pa/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dag ni thos gyur nas/_/rab tu zhi ba'i rigs pas srid pa'i lag 'gro ni/_/zil gyis mnan slad dge slong dge 'dun rtse gcig gyur/_/zhes pa
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]k+She me n+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba da na kalpa la tA yAM kai ne ya kA ba dA naM sap+ta sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//ut+tuM ga shr-iM ga ma pi ro ha ti ko tu ka s+ya te ShAM pra
[\[173a.2\]]dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las kai ne ya ka'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//gang gi skabs gsum dbang phyug la yang brtse ba dang ldan
[\[173a.3\]]b+hA ba ma hi mA ma ha taM ma hAr+haH/_/ye pA ta yaM t+ya shi ba shaM pa ma na pra ga l+b+h+yaM tr-iSh+TiM da yA pra Ni yaM nIM tri da she shwa re pi/_/sa b+hA sI naHpu rA sha krasti di ba ts+yu ti lak+Sha NaiH/_/spraSh+Ta siM hA sa
[\[173a.4\]]pa'i/_/mig ni zhi ba min pa zhi byed la dpa' ltung byed pa/_/chen po de dag rnams kyi mthu ni cher 'os chen po nyid/_/dge mtshan gyis ni rtse mo shin tu mtho ba dag tu 'dzegs/_/brgya byin mdun sar 'khod pa sngon/_/mtho ris nas lhung mtshan nyid kyis/_/reg cing seng
[\[173a.5\]]not+saM ge na ra ti pra t+ya pa d+ya ta/_/su bar+N+Na ru tsi rA ta s+ya mau lau man+da ra mA li kA/_/u pu N+yot+san+na tA ru N+ya shrI ri bam+lA na tAM ya yau/_/ya shaHshun+d+he bi lo pA ya ti la ka ta s+ya tsa kri be/_/a pa
[\[173a.6\]]ge'i gdan steng du/_/dga' ba rab tu thob ma gyur/_/de yi mgo la man+da ra'i/_/phreng ba gser ldan mdzes pa ni/_/bsod nams ma yin bsgribs pa yis/_/lang tsho'i dpal bzhin nyams par gyur/_/de yi thig le grags pa ltar/_/dkar la nyams par bya ba'i slad/_/rdul gyi
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]bA dA i ba na paHpa daM swe dau da bin+da baH/_/A san+ne pa ta na s+yA tha tsin+ta saM sak+ta tse ta saH/_/iR+Sh+ya ru She ba pra ya yau ta s+yA dU ra ta raM d+h+r-i tiH/_/shu tsaHpa ri tsi taM dr-iSh+T+wa ta mU tse tsa ki tA sha
[\[173b.2\]]chu thigs gsar pa yis/_/ngan smras bzhin du gnas dag byas/_/de ni sems ni bsams pa la/_/chags shing lhung la nye gyur pa/_/de yi bstan pa phrag dog gis/_/khros bzhin rab tu ring par song /_/mya ngan yongs 'dris de mthong nas/_/'jigs pa'i sde sogs kyis
[\[173b.3\]]tsI/_/A pan+ne smin+ne pa ta ne tsin+t+ya tA ma ba lam+ba naM/_/a laM g+h+ya nAsti lo ke Shu na pa dA mi ti ni sh+tsa yaH/_/ta bA pi dza ga tAM pa t+yuR+Ya di mA kle sha bi pru ShaH/_/sar+b+ba thA kha lu bai mu khyAHdar+thi Sh+yAr+thi Sh+yi
[\[173b.4\]]smras pa/_/ltung ba dag la nye ba 'dir/_/rten ni rab tu bsam par mdzod/_/'jig rten rnams la rgud pa yis/_/bgom bya min pa med ces des/_/gang zhig nyon mongs thigs pa 'di/_/'gro ba'i bdag po khyod la yang /_/nges par rnam kun phyir phyogs pas/_/'bad pa yis ni
[\[173b.5\]]yat+na taH/_/ma had+b+hiHsaM ga mits+tshan+ti gu Na lub+d+hA i bA ba daH/_/a ba tIR+Ya swa yaM tA ba ta dzaM bu dwI paM twa yA bi b+ho/_/mr-i gya tAM shra ma NaHkash+tsid+bA sa na rak+Sha Na k+Sha ma/_/pra b+hA ba bi pu lot+kaR+ShAHshru yen+ta
[\[173b.6\]]btsal bcal nas/_/ltung ba yon tan la sred cing /_/chen po rnams dang 'grogs par 'dod/_/khyab bdag rang nyid 'dzam gling du/_/re zhig bobs la khyod kyis ni/_/rgud pa bsrung bar bzod pa yi/_/dge sbyong 'ga' zhig bstsal bar mdzod/_/gang dag dge bas bgrod byed cing /_/dge
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]shra ma NAHki la/_/yu Sh+yan+ta ku sha lai re ba ye ShAM ku sha la gA maM naH/_/i ti pri yA ba tsaHshru twA ta the t+yuk+t+wA ma rud+ba ti/_/k+Shi ta ma b+h+ye t+ya pa prats+tsha shra ma NA kle sha saM k+Sha yaM/_/sha kra pra Na yaM mA tre Na
[\[174a.2\]]ba nyid kyis sbyor byed pa/_/dge sbyong mthu ni rgya che zhing /_/khyad par 'phags pa grags pa thos/_/zhes pa dga' ma'i tshig thos nas/_/de bzhin zhes smra lha yi bdag_/sa la mngon phyogs nyon mongs ni/_/'jil ba dge slong rnams la dris/_/brgya byin gyis ni dris tsam
[\[174a.3\]]te pra b+hA bA b+hi mA ni niH/_/ba b+hU bu runy+dza li bya grA stat+p+ra NA ma na tA na nAH/_/te kur+b+ban+ti ka thaM rak+ShA mA me ba pra Na man+ti ye/_/pa tir+d+h+yA twe ti ma ru tA ma b+hag+nA shaHswa pa daM ya yau/_/ta taHsa su ga taM
[\[174a.4\]]gyis/_/mthu yis mngon khengs de dag gis/_/thal mo sbyar byas de nyid la/_/phyag btsal bzhin ras btud par gyur/_/gang zhig bdag nyid la 'dud pa/_/de yi ji ltar srung byed 'gyur/_/zhes bsams lha yi bdag po ni/_/re ba nyams pas rang gnas song /_/de nas de yi bde gshegs
[\[174a.5\]]dz+nyA twA saM prAp+ta pa ra mA mr-i taM/_/pra t+yA san+ne ni pa ta ne ba ri trA Na ma ma t+ya ta/_/in+d+ra mA la gu hA gar+b+ha s+thi taM po tha ta thA ga taM/_/te dzo d+hA tu sa mA pan+naM ya yau traSh+TuM sa hA nu gaiH/_/gu hAn+ti ka ma thA sA h+yA pa ha sha tsI pa
[\[174a.6\]]ni/_/mchog gi bdud rtsi thob shes nas/_/ltung ba rab tu nye ba ni/_/yongs su skyob pa dag tu bsams/_/de nas de ni rjes 'brang bcas/_/dbang po'i phreng ba'i phug nang na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me khams la/_/snyoms zhugs gnas pa lta ru song /_/de nas bde sogs bdag po des/_/'phral la
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]tisti taH/_/U tse pany+tsa shI khaM nA ma gan+d+har+b+ha su ta mA da rA ha/_/te dzo d+hA tu sa mA ban+naM b+ha ga ban+taM ta thA ga taM/_/swa ka lA kau sha le na twAM pra bo d+ha yi tu mar+ha si/_/u bar+Y+Yar+Y+Ya t+ya kA le yaHpra b+hi pa t+ya ni be di taH/_/
[\[174b.2\]]phug dang nye bar phyin/_/zur phud lnga pa zhes pa yi/_/dri za'i bu la gus pas smra/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/_/me yi khams la snyoms zhugs pa/_/khyod ni rang gi sgyu rtsal la/_/mkhas pas rtogs pa bya bar 'os/_/gang zhig dus min nyer bgrod dang /_/ma brjod par ni nang 'jug dang /_/
[\[174b.3\]]a nA sha ya dz+nyAHsa pa tA ma ba mA na s+ya b+hA dza naM/_/i t+yuk+taHsu ra rA dze na d+hI mAr+g+gan+d+har+b+ha dA ra kaH/_/bai DUR+Ya daN+DA ma ka raHd+bI NAM su swa ra pA ra NAM/_/swa b+hA ba ma d+hu ro d+ha ra ra myA b+hiHstu ti gI ti b+hiH/_/sa bi bo d+h+ya dzi naM tsakre
[\[174b.4\]]bsam pa shes pa min pa de/_/dam pa rnams kyis smad pa'i gnas/_/zhes brjod lha yi rgyal po yis/_/blo gros ldan pa dri za'i bu/_/bai DUR+Ya yi dbyug pa can/_/rgyud mang sgra snyan len du bcug_/rang bzhin gyis snyan yid du 'ong /_/bstod dbyangs dga' ba dang bcas pas/_/de yis rgyal ba sad byas
[\[174b.5\]]daR+sha nA ba pa raM ha reH/_/ta taHpra bi sh+ya su ga taM de bai sa ha sha ta kra tuH/_/da daR+sha haR+Sha dza nan baR+Shan+taM pra sha mA mr-i taM/_/sa pra NA maHshAstu na kha dar+p+pa Na mArdzA naM/_/tsa kA ra mau li man+dA ra ma ka ran+de na
[\[174b.6\]]te/_/'phrog byed lta ba'i go skabs phye/_/de nas lha dang bcas pa yi/_/mchod sbyin brgya par bzhugs te/_/rab zhi'i bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/_/dga' ba skyed byed bde gshegs bltas/_/phyag 'tshal rab tu btud pa des/_/mgo yi man+da ra ba'i gos/_/ston pa'i zhabs kyi sen mo yi/_/me long dag
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]bA da yoH/_/ta tasta s+ya pra biSh+Ta s+ya pra pA daM bi da d+he dzi naH/_/sa t+ya daR+sha nAd+ye na d+har+m+ma na tsak+Shurba b+hU ba paH/_/pa ri ts+yu taHsa ha sA swa ya be bA sa na mAp+ta bAn/_/te na pu N+ya pra b+hA bo na pra shAn+ta ts+yu ti lak+Sha
[\[175a.2\]]ni rab tu phyis/_/de nas rab zhugs de la ni/_/gang gis bden pa mthong ba la/_/chos kyi mig ni 'byung gyur pa'i/_/bka' drin rgyas pa de yis mdzad/_/yongs ltung de yi 'phral la ni/_/rang gi stan nyid thob par gyur/_/bsod nams mthu ni de dag gis/_/ltung ba'i mtshan
[\[175a.3\]]NaH/_/ya bAdz+dzI baM sa su ga taM sha raM N+yaM sha ra NaM ga taH/_/a ti krAn+to ha mi t+yuk+t+wA ta mA maM t+t+r+ya ya yau di baM/_/la li tAM tum+pu ru su tAM da dau pany+tsa shi khA ya baH/_/ri Na bat+ku ru te tsin+tA mu pa kA ra ka Na pa
[\[175a.4\]]nyid rab tu zhi/_/ji srid 'tsho bar bde bar gshegs/_/skyabs 'os de la skyabs su song /_/bdag ni rab thar ces brjod nas/_/de la zhus nas mtho ris song /_/tum bu ra yi bu mo mdzes/_/zur phud lnga pa la des byin/_/dam pa rnams ni phan pa'i cha/_/bu lon bzhin du sems par
[\[175a.5\]]tAM/_/shakra s+ya ku sha la bAp+s+ya pra t+ya grod+d+hu ta bisma yaiH/_/b+hik+Shu bir+b+ha ga bAn+p+r-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nya stA na b+hA Sha ta/_/sho b+hA ba t+yAM pu rA sho b+hA khyaHpr-i thi bI pa tiH/_/kra kuts+tshan+da s+ya shA ri rastU paM shAstu ra kA
[\[175a.6\]]byed/_/dge ba thob pas brgya byin ni/_/gsar du 'khrungs pas ya mtshan pa/_/dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das/_/thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/_/grong khyer mdzes ldan dag tu sngon/_/sa yi bdag po bskal bzang gis/_/ston pa log par dad sel gyi/_/sku yi mchod rten
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]ra yata/_/tat+pUr+N+Na pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA na yo gA prAp+taHsa rA dzA ti di be shwa ra twaM/_/d+har+m+ma nu bad+d+haM b+ha ga ban+bi b+hU ti muk+t+we ti bA NI ma na yat+p+ra shAn+tiM/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra pi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA
[\[175b.2\]]rab tu byas/_/de yi bsod nams smon lam rdzogs ldan pas/_/rgyal po des ni lha yi dbang nyid thob/_/'byor pa'i chos kyis bcings zhes gsungs nas ni/_/bcom ldan gsung ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
[\[175b.3\]]yAM shakre ts+yA ba nA ba dA na maSh+Ta sap+ta ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//s+t+rI b+hirbi mo hi ta ma ter+m+ma ti rAk+Sha sI b+hir+b+bat+ta pra br-it+ta ma na saHsu kha bAMny+tsa yai ba/_/kle shaHpa tan+ta sa ha sA pu ru Sha s+ya te
[\[175b.4\]]bsam gyi 'khri shing las brgya byin ltung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//bud med blo yi srin mo rnams kyis blo gros rmongs byas shing /_/bde ba 'dod pa nyid kyis yid ni nor la zhugs gyur pa/_/skyes bu gang zhig rab zhi dang bral zhi bar mi bgrod
[\[175b.5\]]te gats+tshan+ti nA ma pa bi nA pra sha maM sha maM ye/_/shrA bas+t+yAM brAh+ma NaHpUr+b+ba dzI ba shar+m+mA b+hi d+ho bta/_/ba ya sor+b+d+ha shru tA d+h+yA yI bra h+ma tsaR+YaM tsA ra yaH/_/sa dza rA sha ba lash+tsa shruHsne hAd+ban+b+hu b+hi ra n+wi taH/_/d+har+m+ma mA rga nu ro d+he na
[\[175b.6\]]pa/_/de de nges par 'phral la nyon mongs dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/gang gis na tshod byed dag ni/_/thos pa brjid cing tshangs spyod spyad/_/bram ze 'tsho ba bde zhes pa/_/mnyan yod du ni sngon byung gyur/_/mdza' bas gnyen gyis gsol btab pa'i/_/rgan po sma ra khra bo de/_/chos kyi lam gyi ngo dag tu/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]bi da d+he dA ra saM gra haM/_/pat+nI ta ra li kA nA mA ta ru NI ta ra lak+She NA/_/na ba saM b+ho ga lub+d+ha s+ya ta s+yA ti da yi tA b+hA bta/_/ta s+yA dz+wa ro pa me tasmin+na ru ciHsu ta rA ma b+hUta/_/a b+hak+ta rak+ta saM sak+ta bi rak+tA e ba yo
[\[176a.2\]]bud med rab tu bzung bar byas/_/longs spyod gsar pa la chags de'i/_/chung ma g.yo ldan ma zhes pa/_/dar la bab cing mig g.yo ma/_/shin tu yid 'ong nyid du gyur/_/de ni de la rim bzhin du/_/shin tu sred pa min par gyur/_/bud med mi gus la chags shing /_/yang dag chags
[\[176a.3\]]Shi taH/_/sA tsin+ta ya da raR+Yo yaM dza rA shA ra shi ro ru haH/_/ma ma yo ba na dar+p+pe smin+na pu N+yo pa naHpa tiH/_/br-id+d+ha s+ya ta ru NI b+ho gaHsha rI rak+Sha ya sU tsa kaH/_/ke sha gra he na dza ra yA bAt+sa
[\[176a.4\]]la chags bral nyid/_/des bsams kun tu mi 'phrogs pa'i/_/rga bas skra dkar ldan pa'i khyo/_/bdag gi lang tsho'i dregs 'di la/_/bsod nams min pas nye bar gnas/_/rgan pos gzhon nu ma spyod pa/_/lus ni nyams pa go byed dag_/rga bas skra nas bzung byas te/_/mnyes
[\[176a.5\]]l+ye ne ba bAR+Ya te/_/kiM tsit+saM ko tsa ku Ti laHpra yA tis+tha bi ra sha naiH/_/hA ri taM yau ba na ma NiM bIk+Sh+ya mA Na i pA ba nau/_/br-id+d+he na pa ra lo kAr+tha dz+nya yA nI tA da d+hI ma tA/_/pa ra b+ho ga pra Na yi NI tat+ta de ba ka ro mya haM/_/
[\[176a.6\]]gshin gyis ni zlog pa bzhin/_/rgan po dal gyis cung zad ni/_/'khums shing sgu bor rab gyur pa/_/sa la lang tsho'i nor bu ni/_/stor ba 'tshol bar byed pa bzhin/_/rgan po blo ldan ma yin pa/_/'jig rten pha rol don shes pas/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod la sbyar gang /_/de nyid bdag gis rab tu bya/_/
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]an+tar+g+r-i ha ma te twasmin+na shakyaM tsor+Ya kA mi b+hiH/_/pre ma ni rda ya saM b+ho ga ni rarga la su kham+ma yA/_/i ti saM tsin+t+yA pa b+he t+ya sha naiHpa ti mA b+hA ShaT/_/ladz+dza mA ne ba bi na yA dA b+hi dzAt+ya nu kA ri NAM/_/gr-i ha pak+te na b+ha
[\[176b.2\]]'di ni khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/_/rkun po'i 'dod ldan dang mdza' bas/_/brtse med longs spyod ma bsdams pa/_/bde ba dag gis spyod mi nus/_/zhes bsams rigs bzang rjes mthun zhig_/ngo tsha ldan pa bzhin du des/_/dul ba yis ni mngon phyogs te/_/dal gyis bdag po la smras pa/_/bya med bde ba 'tshol
[\[176b.3\]]ba tA nirbA pA ra sU khai Shi NA/_/taste nA kr-i Sh+ya dA ri drA mA nI taM ta ba duHsa haM/_/saM b+ho ga dwe Shi na stI bra mA la s+yaM ya s+ya ba lu b+haM/_/ba hu bya ya pra bA hAr+ha bi bA haM pa ka ro ti kiM/_/ya tra la s+yAd+g+r-i ha pa ti r+g+r-i hra ko NaM na
[\[176b.4\]]byed pa/_/khyod ni khyim du chags pa yis/_/bzod par dga' ba'i dbul po nyid/_/khyod kyi lag pas drangs nas blangs/_/gang zhig rtsom pa la sdang zhing /_/drag po'i snyom las dag la dga'/_/rab mang 'god pa'i brgyud ldan pa'i/_/khyim na gnas pa des ci byed/_/gang du khyim bdag snyom las las/_/khyim gyi
[\[176b.5\]]muny+tsa ti/_/d+har+m+ma dzA nA ya niR+YAn+tu mu b+d+hA sta tra ki maM ga nAH/_/sot+sA haHpu ru Sho ya tra bya ba hA ra ra tir+b+ba hiH/_/gr-i ha byA gA ra bak+tAs+t+rI sar+b+basta trAr+tha saM pa daH/_/a b+hU Sha Na ma nam+ba ra ma li na ko Na lI nAM ga naM bi
[\[176b.6\]]zur ni mig gtong ba/_/der ni bud med rmongs pa rnams/_/nor sgrub slad du 'byung ngam ci/_/gang na skyes pa spro ldan pas/_/phyi yi tha snyad la dga' zhing /_/bud med khyim gyi bya bar chags/_/de ni don kun phun sum tshogs/_/las dang bral ba rnams kyi khyim ni dga' ston longs spyod nyams gyur
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]shIr+N+Na sha ya nA sa na spu Ti ta bA ri d+hA nI g+ha TaM/_/a tra sa ma nu pa ska raM tsi ra ni br-it+ta man+tha swa naM gr-i haM bi ra ta kar+m+ma NaM b+ha ba ti b+hag+na b+ho got+sa baM/_/i t+yuk+taHsa ta sA bi praHpra te s+the dra bi Non+mu
[\[177a.2\]]cing /_/rgyan med gos med bud med dag ni zur phug dri ma can na zhen/_/khri dang mal stan rnam par nyams shing chu snod chag pa'i sgra dang ldan/_/'bangs med yo byad med cing yun ring zho srub sgra ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de yis de brjod bram ze de/_/nor la mngon du phyogs te
[\[177a.3\]]kha/_/pa tan+ti bi Sha ya shwa b+h+re Sh+wa pi yo Shid+pa shI kr-i tAH/_/sa sA ga rAn+taM ba su d+hAM b+h+rAM twAM la b+ha pra ti gra haH/_/kA le na swa pu rAM prA ya saM pUr+N+Na ka na kam+ba raH/_/gr-i hot+kaN+kot+ka rA krAn+taHpu ri paR+Yan+ta kA na
[\[177a.4\]]song /_/bud med kyis ni dbang byas rnams/_/yul gyi g.yang sa dag tu lhung /_/de yis nor 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mthar/_/'khyams nas sbyin pa thob gyur te/_/gser dang gos ni rdzogs gyur pa/_/dus kyis rang gi grong khyer song /_/de nas khyim 'dod tshogs kyis de/_/song ba grong mtha'i nags
[\[177a.5\]]ne/_/sha rI ra mA tre she Sho b+hUd+hA s+yu b+hirmu Shi tau tha saH/_/a nar+tho pArdzi to s+yar+thaHsA mar+the na su khar+thi nA/_/ka ro t+ya nits+tsha yA d+hA tur+m+ma ru bA ri ka NA d+hi taM/_/so tsin+ta ya da ho yat+nA da bi bit+taM ma yArdzi taM/
[\[177a.6\]]tshal du/_/chom rkun pa yis bcom gyur nas/_/lus tsam lhag ma nyid du gyur/_/bde ba don gnyer nus pa yis/_/don med nor ni nyer bsgrubs kyang /_/mya ngam chu yi thigs pa bzhin/_/byed po bzhed pa min pas byed/_/des bsams kye ma 'bad pa yis/_/bdag gis nor ni bsgrubs gyur kyang /_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]a b+hA gya yo gA ya taM me swap+na daR+sha na tu l+ya taM/_/shU n+ya pA Ni d+ha nAr+thi n+yaHpat+nIHprA byA ha man+ti kaM/_/naMdzI bA spa ba sA no gra bi ShaiHpa ru Sha b+hA Shi taiH/_/tasmA di hai ba me sa d+yaHpA she nod+ban+d+ha naM hi taM/_/dA ri
[\[177b.2\]]bdag ni skal dang mi ldan pas/_/rmi lam mthong dang mtshungs par gyur/_/nor ni don gnyer chung ma yi/_/gan du lag stong bdag phyin na/_/smad pa drag po'i dug ldan pa'i/_/tshig rtsub brjod pas bdag mi 'tsho/_/de slad bdag ni 'di nyid du/_/'phral la zhags pas bcings pa phan/_/dbul
[\[177b.3\]]dro pa dra ba krU res+t+rI shas+t+raM na sa he gr-i haM/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sa la tA pA sha kaN+The n+ya be sha yata/_/tI pra kle sha bi ShaN+NA nAM ni d+ha naM ban+d+hu saM ga maH/_/a trAn+ta re kr-i pA sin d+hu b+hag bAn b+hU ta b+hA ba naH/_/duH
[\[177b.4\]]ba'i nyer 'tshe drag po yis/_/khyim du bud med mtshon mi bzod/_/ces bsams de yis 'khri shing gi/_zhags pa dag ni mgrin par bkod/_/nyon mongs drag pos nyen rnams kyis/_/gnyen dang phrad pa 'chi ba yin/_/skabs der bcom ldan brtse ba yi/_/rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs pa/_/thams cad
[\[177b.5\]]khaM dz+nyA twA s+ya sar+b+ba dz+nyasta dar+thaM ba na mA ya yau/_/da ya yA shwA si taste na t+yak+t+wa pa sha ma tha dwi dzaH/_/tad+dat+taM ni d+ha mA dA ya taM pra Na mya ya yau gr-i haM/_/ta s+ya b+hAR+YA d+ha ne nA pi na ja gA mA nu ku la taM/_/pa ra
[\[177b.6\]]mkhyen pas de yis ni/_/sdug bsngal shes nas nags su byon/_/de nas de yis gnyis skyes ni/_/brtse bas dbugs phyung zhags pa btang /_/de yis byin pa'i gter blangs nas/_/de la phyag 'tshal khyim du song /_/de yi chung ma nor gyis kyang /_/rjes su mthun pa nyid ma gyur/_/gzhan
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]saM spaR+sha rA gi n+yastu Sh+yaM t+yar+the na nas+t+ri yaH/_/sa kA le na ma hA raM b+ha b+ho ge pyud+big+na ma na saH/_/a tsin+ta ya da ho nAsti saM sA ra taM twa taHsu khaM/_/dA ri drA tu l+yaM ki mi bAsti du khaM d+ha nA dzA ni duHkha ta raM ta
[\[178a.2\]]gyi reg pa la chags pa'i/_/bud med nor gyis tshim mi 'gyur/_/longs spyod rtsom pa che la yang /_/dus kyis yid ni chags bral des/_/bsam pa kye ma 'khor ba na/_/de nyid du na bde ba med/_/dbul dang mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal ci zhig yod/_/de bas kyang ni nor bsgrub
[\[178a.3\]]to pi/_/d+ha no pa b+ho gaHsu kha le sha dig+d+haHpa de pa de duHkha sha ta ni sU te/_/bi rak+tash+tsit+ta yi twe ti sa ga twA dze ta kA na naM/_/b+ha ga ba taM b+ha bots+tshit+t+yai shAsta raM sha ra NaM ya yau/_/ta s+yA sha yaM sA nu sha
[\[178a.4\]]rab sdug bsngal/_/nor gyi longs spyod bde ba'i chas bsgos pa/_/gnas dang gnas su sdug bsngal brgya phrag skyed/_/de ltar chags bral rab bsams te/_/rgyal byed tshal du song nas des/_/srid pa bcad slad bcom ldan 'das/_/ston pa la ni skyabs su song /_/de yi bsam pa bag la
[\[178a.5\]]yaM tsa d+hA tuM dz+nyA twA ga ti ta thA/_/b+ha ga bAn d+har+m+ma b+hai Sha dz+yaM b+ha ba ro ga b+hi Shag+da dau/_/sa dr-iSh+Ta sa t+yaH pra bra dz+nyAM sa mA dA ya pra sA dI nAM/_/sar+b+ba kle sha pra haR+ShAr+tha mar+ha twaM sa ma bAp+ta bAnra/_/ta s+ya tA mad+d+hU taM sid+d+haM dr-iSh+T+wa bi pu la bisma
[\[178a.6\]]nyal/_/khams dang de bzhin 'gro mkhyen nas/_/chos kyi sman ni bcom ldan 'das/_/srid pa'i nad kyi sman pas byin/_/bden mthong de yis rab byung ni/_/rab tu dang ba yang dag blangs/_/nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i slad/_/dgra bcom nyid ni thob par gyur/_/de yi grub pa rmad byung de/_/mthong nas ya mtshan rgyas pa
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]yeH/_/b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn+p+r-iSh+Ta stad+b+r-it+tAn+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/pu rA ma hen+d+rA se no b+hUd+bA rA Na s+yA na re shwa ra/_/ya s+yA grA sar+b+ba sa twe Shu da yai ba da yi tA b+ha bta/_/ya dzu naHpa ra de she b+h+yastI braM ku pa ti dA bi taH/_/ts+tsha yA br-ik+Sha mi
[\[178b.2\]]yi/_/dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/_/de yi sngon byung rab gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sIr mi yi dbang /_/dbang chen sde ni sngon byung ste/_/sems can kun la gang gis ni/_/brtse ba mchog nyid yid 'ong gyur/_/bdag po ngan pas rab gdungs pa/_/yul gzhan nas 'ongs skye bo yis/_/lam gnas gang
[\[178b.3\]]bA b+h+ye t+ya san+mArgas+thi ma shi shri yata/_/ka dA tsit+p+ra ti pA man+terni rud+d+ha na ga ro pi saH/_/a kro d+haHsar+b+ba ni d+ha ni na yud+d+he bid d+he d+hi yaM/_/taM bi dz+nyA ya ni rud+sA haM bi rak+tA sar+b+ba man+ti NA/_/
[\[178b.4\]]gi grib bsil gyi/_/ljon pa bzhin du mngon phyogs bstan/_/nam zhig pha rol rgyal phran gyi/_/grong khyer dag ni bkag gyur kyang /_/khro med de yis g.yul dag ni/_/thams cad gsod la blo ma bsgrubs/_/de ni spro ba med shes nas/_/chags bral blon po thams cad kyis/_/
[\[178b.5\]]lup+d+ha tra pi na mA dA ya ba b+hU baHsha tru saM shra yAH/_/a tha prA Ni ba d+hod+be ga t+yak+ta rA dz+yaHsa b+hu pa tiH/_/a lak+Shi taHk+Sha maHk+She tra me kA ki kA na naM ya yau/_/pra b+hu b+hak+te sa mut+s+r-i dz+ya sa twaM ladz+dzaM tsa dur+dz+dza nAH/_/
[\[178b.6\]]sred pas nor ni blangs byas te/_/dgra bo dag la brten par gyur/_/de nas srog chags gsod pa la/_/yid byung rgyal srid rab btang nas/_/sa yi bdag po bzod pa'i zhing /_/gcig pu ma chor nags su song /_/rje la gus dang sems can la/_/ngo tsha rab btang ngan pa yi/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]a mA t+yAHpra ti sA mAn+taM lod+d+hAn+d+hA sh+tsa kri raM nr-i paM/_/na ba s+yA nr-i pa ti pAr+sh+wi na bA e ba dzaM dzr-iMm+b+hi re/_/swa b+h+yA mi t+yA gi nI lag+naM ma nau tsi t+ya tu ke pa laM/_/te na ba s+ya k+Shi ti sa ter+d+wA ras+thir+b+bA ri tAsh+tsi raM/_/khe dA
[\[179a.2\]]blon po chags pas ldong rnams kyis/_/pha rol rgyal phran rgyal por byas/_/mi bdag gsar pa'i ngos na ni/_/gsar pa nyid du rnam par 'phel/_/rang gi rje bo btang rnams la/_/'os pa min pa 'ba' zhig ldan/_/de dag sa bdag gsar pa yi/_/sgo srung rnams kyis yun ring bkag_/skyo bas
[\[179a.3\]]dAt+ma na mud+bi sh+ya dza gurni shwa s+ya ladz+dzi tAH/_/ma hen+d+ra se na paM t+ya dz+ya pe sha laM su la b+haM pra b+huM/_/pa ra ma dwA ri pa yaM pA pAHshA pa tA saM sa hA ma he/_/t+yak+ta shrI dza na kaHsu rA su ra na ra byA kir+N+Na rat+not+ka ra sa swats+tshaHpa ya saM ni d+hiHpri
[\[179a.4\]]bdag nyid la mtshon te/_/shugs byung ngo tshas glu blangs pa/_/rje bo mnyes gshin rnyed sla ba/_/dbang chen sde ni rab btang nas/_/sdig can bdag cag gzhan sgo na/_/dmod pa'i gdung ba bzod par byed/_/dpal ni skyed byed lha dang lha min mi rnams rin chen tshogs kyis rgyas par byed/_/chu gter dri med
[\[179a.5\]]thu ta raHshU n+yA sha ye na twa yA/_/he nI twon+mu kha shaM kha mUr+kha ku pa te dwA re d+hu nA laM ba pe tUSh+NI ma shwa kha le na phut+k+r-i ta mu khastA raM ki mA kran+da pi/_/na ba rA dz+yA ta pi tI pra man+t+ri NA mi tI sho tsi tAM/_/ma hen+d+ra se na tsan+d+ra
[\[179a.6\]]shin tu rgya che de ni khog pa stong pa khyod kyis btang /_/da lta bdag ngan sgo la brten cing gyen du phyogs thob rmongs pa'i dud dag kye/_/kha la brlang pos phud byas cho nge drag po ci zhig la sgrogs mi smrar 'dug_/de ltar rab gdung blon po rnams/_/rgyal srid gsar pa'i tsha gdung la/_/dbang chen sde yi zla
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]s+ya spr-i ha san+daR+sha ni b+ha bta/_/asmin+na ba sa re rA dz+nyaHsha mA rA ma ba nas+thi teH/_/sa mI saM kau shi ko nA ma brAh+ma Nor+thI sa mA ya yau/_/sa bi shrAn+taHk+Sha tA ti th+yaHpha la mU lair+m+ma hI b+hu dzA/_/pr-iSh+TiHpro ba tsA bi na yAt+ta dA ga ma na kA ra NaM/_/
[\[179b.2\]]ba ni/_/rab tu blta bar 'dod par gyur/_/skabs der rgyal po zhi ba yi/_/dga' tshal nags na gnas pa dang /_/nye bar bram ze slong ba yi/_/ko'u shi ka zhes pa 'ongs/_/'bras bu rtsa bas sa bdag gis/_/mgron byas ngal bsos de la ni/_/de yis 'ongs pa'i rgyu mtshan dag_/dul bas dris pa rab smras pa/_/
[\[179b.3\]]sar+b+bAr+thi pAr+thA saM kalpa kalpa br-ik+Sham+ma hA pha lAM/_/ma hen+d+ra se naM gats+tshA mi da ri d+r+yA d+YA tsi tuM nr-i paM/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya nr-i pa tista ma pra b+hA Shad+duHkhi taH/_/brAh+man+ma hen+d+ra se no haM d+hig+mAm+bi ra hi ta shri yA/_/bi pa rI te na bi d+hi nA
[\[179b.4\]]slong ba'i tshogs kyi kun rtog gi_/_'bras bu che ldan dpag bsam shing /_/mi bdag dbang chen sde la bdag_/dbul ba yis ni slong du 'gro/_/de thos mi bdag sdug bsngal dang /_/ldan pas de la rab smras pa/_/bram ze nga ni dbang chen sde/_/dpal dang bral bas bdag smad do/_/slong ba khyod ni phyir phyogs
[\[179b.5\]]nI to haM bi pa rI ta taM/_/baimu khyA d+ya s+ya saM tA sa mar+thI twaM dA tu mA ga taH/_/kiM niH pha le na ba su ShAM shuSh+ka br-ik+Sho pa ma s+ya me/_/A sAM b+ha ga ba ri m+lA naM mu khaM pa sh+ya ti yor+thi naH/_/i ti rA dza ba tsaM shru twA dwi dzash+tshan+ni ma no
[\[179b.6\]]las/_/gang la gdung ba ster du 'ongs/_/sgrub byed phyin ci log las ni/_/phyin ci log nyid bdag gis thob/_/gang gi re ba nyams pa yi/_/slong ba'i bzhin log mthong gyur pa/_/shing skam lta bu bdag gi lus/_/'bras bu med pa dag gis ci/_/zhes pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/_/rdo ba bsnun bzhin
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]ra thaH/_/tsi re Na saM dz+nyA mA pA d+yashi lA ha ta mi bA pra bIta/_/a b+hA gaur+m+ma ma b+hU pA la b+ha bAn+bi b+ha ba brdzi taH/_/su la b+has+t+warbi d+ho dA tA b+hu ba ne la b+h+ya te kutaH/_/rA dz+yA da t+yad+hi ka sho b+ha san+to ShA b+ha ra Na s+ya te/_/
[\[180a.2\]]gnyis skyes ni/_/re thag chad pas yun ring na/_/'du shes thob nas rab smras pa/_/bdag la skal ba med pa yis/_/sa skyong khyod kyis 'byor pa spangs/_/gtong ba khyod ltar rnyed sla ba/_/'jig rten du ni ga la rnyed/_/chog shes rgyan ldan khyod mdzad pa/_/rgyal srid dag las shin tu lhag_/
[\[180a.3\]]a pu N+yA n+yA d+ha tA me ba ye ShA ma n+yosti na shri yaH/_/t+yak+ta s+ya tsaM tsa la ta yA sa ha sai ba lak+Sh+m+yA rat+nA ka ra s+ya na ma nA ga pi hI na tA b+hUta/_/lak+Sh+mIHshu nI ba kha la lub+d+ha gr-i hA ba san+nA nA d+yA pi sat+pu ru Sha saM shra
[\[180a.4\]]gang zhig mdza' bo gzhan med pa'i/_/slong rnams bsod nams med pa nyid/_/dpal mo g.yo ba nyid kyis 'phral la nges pa btang gyur pa'i/_/rin chen 'byung gnas dag ni bag kyang dman par gyur pa med/_/dpal ni khyi bzhin mi bsrun brkam chags khyim na dman ldan zhing /_/da dung skyes bu dam pa la
[\[180a.5\]]ya haR+Sha mi ti/_/i t+yuk+t+wA nr-i pa mA man+t+ya ba nai rA mya bi ShA tu raH/_/pha la br-it+ta ta ruts+tshe da bi ShA dAn+mar+t+ya muR+Ya yau/_/ta s+ya kaN+Tha ga taM pA sha ma pa nI ya sa b+hU pa tiH/_/ta mU tso ka ru NAM sin+d+hur+b+ban+d+huHsnig+d+ha ta
[\[180a.6\]]brten dga' bar yongs ma gyur/_/zhes brjod mi bdag la gsol nas/_/bsam bral dug gis gzir ba de/_/'bras bu 'tsho ba'i shing bcad de'i/_/mya ngan las ni 'chi bar brtson/_/de yi mgrin par song ba yi/_/zhags pa sa bdag de yis bsal/_/snying rje'i rgya mtsho slong rnams kyi/_/mdza' gcugs
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]ror+thi nAM/_/bad+d+h+wA mAM pra ti pak+Sha s+ya na ya b+hu mi pa tiHpu rIM/_/mad+ba d+hai ShI pa te bit+taM dA s+ya t+ya b+hi ma tA d+hi kaM/_/i t+yuk+taHpAr+thi ben+d+re Na ladz+dza ma na i ba dwi dzaH/_/ta mar+thi ban+d+ha baM bad+d+h+wA na nA ya d+ha na
[\[180b.2\]]gnyen gyis de la smras/_/bdag chings sa yi bdag po ni/_/mi mthun phyogs kyi grong khyer khyer/_/khyod la bdag ni gsod 'dod des/_/mngon 'dod las lhag nor ster 'gyur/_/de skad sa yi bdag pos brjod/_/ngo mtshar gyur bzhin gnyis skyes kyis/_/slong ba'i gnyen de bcings nas ni/_/nor la sred pas
[\[180b.3\]]tr-ip+ta yAH/_/taM dr-iSh+T+wA pra ti sA man+ta ste nA nI taM ma hI pa ti/_/tad+b+r-it+tAM taM tsa bi dz+nyA ya bi smi ta pra sha shaM pa taM/_/sa bi prA ya d+ha naM da rang gi gnas su sa bdag de zhes pa'i skad dod chad pa 'dar los bsgrigs pa slar rgya dpe rnyed na zhus dag byed/_twA swas+tha ne b+hU mi pa ti saH/_/tsa ra NA li na mu ku Ta staM pra sA d+ya n+ya be sha yata/_/ma nu dza pa ti ra haM
[\[180b.4\]]rab tu khyer/_/sa bdag de yis khrid pa de/_/pha rol rgyal phran dag gis mthong /_/de yi byung tshul thos gyur nas/_/ya mtshan gyur pas de la bsngags/_/bram ze la ni nor byin nas/_/rang gi gnas su sa bdag de/_/zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/_/dang bar byas nas de yis bkod/_/mi yi bdag po dbang chen
[\[180b.5\]]ma hen+d+ra se no d+ha na bi hi tasta ya e ya kau shi kor+thIH/_/pu na ra pi ba sa e ba dzi ba shar+m+mA tsa ri ta mi ti swa pa dA hri taM dzi ne na/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra pi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA naM kalpa la tA yAM ma hen+d+ra se nA ba dA na mU nA shi ti ta maH
[\[180b.6\]]sde ni nga nyid de/_/gang 'dis slong ba ko'u shi ka'i nor dag bsgrubs/_/slar yang de nyid kho na 'tsho ba bde ba'o/_/zhes pa'i spyod pa rgyal bas rang la dper brjod do/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dbang chen sde'i rtogs pa
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]pal+la baH//_//nod+pe ga mA yan+ta ka dar+th+ya mA nAH shik+Sha gra he NA pi hi taM ba dan+ti/_/ba ro pa kA re Shu ha Tha pra brit+tAHsan+taHsa hen+te b+h+ri sha mAt+ma pI DAM/_/pu ra pu
[\[181a.2\]]brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//gdungs par gyur kyang yid 'byung mi 'gyur zhing /_/bslab pa bzung ba yis kyang phan pa brjod/_/gzhan la phan pa dag la cher zhugs pa/_/dam pas mchog tu bdag nyid gdung ba bzod/_/sngon tshe dpal
[\[181a.3\]]ran+da raHshrI mAn pri ya s+ya pri ya kA mya yA/_/sa khyurgan+d+har+b+ha rA dza s+ya su pri ya s+ya gr-i haM ya yau/_/sa ta tra pU dzi ta te na ba hu mA ne na b+hU ya sA/_/At+tA sa nasta ma ba dad+de paHpra Na yi bat+sa laH/_/e hi su pri ya gats+tsha
[\[181a.4\]]ldan 'byer 'jig ni/_/dga' bar 'dod pas dga' ba yi/_/grogs po dri za'i rgyal po ni/_/rab dga' dag gi khang par phyin/_/de yis der ni mchod pa dag_/shin tu che zhing mang bas mchod/_/mdza' gcugs mnyes gshin ldan pa'i lha/_/stan la 'khod des de la smras/_/rab dga' tshur shog sa la
[\[181a.5\]]baHpr-i thi bI pr-i thi bI pa teH/_/dzA taHshud+d+ho da nA khya s+ya pu traHpu N+ya ma ho da d+hiH/_/prAp+tA sha mA mr-i taM te na dza ga tAM ku sha lA ya saH/_/tata saM bi b+hA gaM ku ru te ka ri Sh+ya t+yA ba yo ra pi/_/ma yA saM ti pra bI NA yAM yo dzi tA gI
[\[181a.6\]]'dong /_/sa yi bdag po bsod nams kyi/_/chu gter chen po zas gtsang zhes/_/bya ba'i sras su rab 'khrungs pa/_/de yis rab zhi bdud rtsi thob/_/dge ba'i slad du 'gro la des/_/de ni yang dag 'god par mdzad/_/yu cag la yang mdzad par 'gyur/_/da lta bdag gis rgyud mang la/_/glu dbyangs
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]ti sA ri NA/_/ka tha gats+tsha mi pash+tsat+Ye duHka rai Sha b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_/i t+yuk+taste na ma g+ha bAn+bi ma nAHswa pa daM ya yau/_/bi Sha yA sak+ta tsit+tA nAM ku sha lA b+hi ra tiH ku taH/_/a trAM ta re mar+t+ya lo ka ku shaM purlaM sa
[\[181b.2\]]rgyun ni rab tu sbyar/_/ji ltar bdag 'gro phyin nas ni/_/bdag la bya ba dka' bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa des brjod brgya byin ni/_/yid byung rang gi gnas su song /_/sems ni yul la chags rnams la/_/dge la mngon dga' ga la yod/_/skabs der sdom brtson brtul zhugs can/_/rab bzang mi yi
[\[181b.3\]]rasta Te/_/u dum ba ra ba na tas+thau su b+ha drA khyo ya ti bri taH/_/byap+taM na bairmuku la kaiHsa dr-iSh+To dum+ba ra dru mAn/_/bisma yot+phul+la na ya naHsu tsi raM sa ma tsin+ta yata/_/dzi na dzan+ma ni dza yan+t+re tsakra bar+t+yur+b+ha pe bi
[\[181b.4\]]'jig rten gyi/_/ku sha'i grong khyer mtsho yi 'gram/_/u dum+bA ra'i nags na gnas/_/de yi u dum bA ra'i shing /_/me tog gsar pas khyab pa mthong /_/mig ni ya mtshan gyis rgyas pas/_/shin tu yang dag yun ring bsams/_/u dum bA ra'i nags tshal 'di/_/rgyal ba 'khrungs na me tog
[\[181b.5\]]bA/_/asman+nu dum+ba ra pa ne nA n+ya thA mu ku la b+hi yaH/_/ma mai ba pu N+yai ra tha bA saM dzA ta mi da yad+b+hu taM/_/su b+ha drash+tsin+ta yi twe ti ba b+hu bA nan+da nir+b+ha raH/_/a thA mar+t+ya pa tiM ga twa su pri yaM pu na ra bra bIta/_/
[\[181b.6\]]dpal/_/'byung zhing 'khor los sgyur ba dag_/'byung na yang ngo gzhan du min/_/yang na bdag gi bsod nams kyis/_/rmad byung 'di ni yang dag skyes/_/zhes pa bsams nas rab bzang ni/_/kun dga' rab tu rgyas par gyur/_/de nas slar yang 'chi med bdag_/song nas rab dga' dag la smras/_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]ni dza kAR+YA d+hi gong+Yo gAHpa ra kAR+Ye Shu sa d+ha baH/_/e hi su pri ya gats+tsha baHk+She tiM k+Shi tiM ta len+du nA/_/san+de sha nAM shu b+hir+b+ba shwa su ga te na pra kA shi taM/_/taM pu pri yo ba ded+da bi pI NA yAM gI ti sA re NA/_/
[\[182a.2\]]dam pa rang gi bya ba bas/_/gzhan gyi bya bar brtson pa lhag_/sa gzhi zla ba bde gshegs kyis/_/bstan pa 'od kyis thams cad ni/_/rab tu gsal ba'i sa gzhi la/_/rab dga' tshur shog 'u cag 'dong /_/de la rab dgas smras pa lha/_/rgyud mang la ni glu dbyangs rgyun/_/
[\[182a.3\]]yo dzi to yam+ma yA pa sh+tshat+su ka rA Na b+ha bi Sh+ye ti/_/i t+yA kar+N+N+yA ma ra pa tiR+Ya yau m+lA na ma no ra thaH/_/a yot+na pa na taM hI na pu N+yaHpi ban+ti nA mri taM/_/ut+phul+la ku su mA mo da saM pU ri ta di gan+ta raM/_/kA le no drum+ba
[\[182a.4\]]bdag gis rab tu sbyar ba 'di/_/phyi nas bya ba sla mi 'gyur/_/zhes thos 'chi med bdag po ni/_/yid la re ba nyams par gyur/_/'bad med bdud rtsi nyer gnas pa/_/bsod nams dman rnams 'thung ba min/_/dus kyis u dum bA ra'i nags/_/me tog rab rgyas dri bzang gis/_/phyogs mtshams kun
[\[182a.5\]]ra ba naM su b+ha dro pi bya lo ka ya ta/_/so tsin+ta yad+d+ha ba t+ye tad+bi kA si ku su maM da naM/_/d+har+m+ma pra bat+te na shA stu r+dz+dza ye nA tsakra bar+t+ti naH/_/mat+pu N+ya naM pra b+ha ba twA ni khi laM puSh+pi taM ba naM/_/i ti tsin+tA ya tasta
[\[182a.6\]]tu khengs gyur pa/_/rab bzang gis kyang mthong bar gyur/_/de yis bsams pa me tog gi_/tshal ni rnam par rgyas pa 'di/_/ston pa dam chos ston pa dang /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal la 'gyur/_/yang na bdag gi bsod nams mthus/_/ma lus tshal ni me tog rgyas/_/zhes pa sems pa de la ni/_/
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]s+ya dar+p+pa pI ti ra dzA ya ta/_/a tha bud+d+hA b+hi d+ho b+h+ye ta shra ma NA r+ha twA ma ga taH/_/r-id+d+h+yA tsakre pa rA dzi t+yaM taM pra pA da ma yo da yaM/_/dza gat+kAR+Ya ta taHkr-i twA kA le na b+ha ga bA ny+dzi naH/_/kalpa ya na pa ri nir+b+bA NaM pash+tsi me sha
[\[182b.2\]]dregs dang dga' ba rab tu skyes/_/de nas dge slong dgra bcom thob/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya mngon phyogs te/_/de ni rdzu 'phrul gyis btul nas/_/rab zhi rang bzhin rgyas par byas/_/de nas dus kyis bcom ldan 'das/_/rgyal bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas/_/yongs su myang 'das la rtog cing /_/tha ma'i gzims
[\[182b.3\]]ya nes+thi ta/_/pra da d+h+yau bi ne ye tA pAd+bi na yA bi be shi tAH/_/a ba shiSh+TaHsu b+ha dro me gan+d+har+b+ha sa tsa su pri yaH/_/a kle she na su b+ha drastu bi na yaM pra ti pa d+ya te/_/kr-i ts+tshA nu shA s+yo gan+d+har+b+ha stA ru N+ya bi b+ha bon+ma daH/_/i
[\[182b.4\]]mal dag la gnas/_/re zhig gdul bya 'dul ba la/_/rnam par bkod byed rab tu bsams/_/rab bzang dang ni dri za dag_/rab dga' de yang bdag gi lhag_/rab bzang tshegs ni chung ngu yis/_/'dul ba rab tu thob par 'gyur/_/dri za lang tsho 'byor pa yis/_/myos pa tshogs kyis 'dul bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa
[\[182b.5\]]ti saM tsiM t+ya gan+d+har+b+ha pu raM ga twA ta thA ga taH/_/gan+d+har+b+ha rA dza ma pa raM nir+m+mi me t+ya d+hi ka d+yu taM/_/sa ha sra taM n+t+ri bai DUR+ya daN+DAM bI NAM sa bA da yan/_/su bri ya s+ya ma dats+tshe da spar+d+ha ya kar+t+tu mud+Ya yau/_/kra me Na tan+t+rI ts+tshe
[\[182b.6\]]bsams nas de bzhin gshegs/_/dri za'i grong khyer dag tu byon/_/dri za'i rgyal po gzhan pa ni/_/mdzes pa lhag par mngon par sprul/_/bai DUR+ya yi dbyug pa can/_/rgyud mang rgyud stong sbreng byed cing /_/'gran pas rab dga'i rgyags pa ni/_/nyams par byed la brtson par gyur/_/rim gyis rgyud ni bcad
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]de pi tau sarba so ra mUts+tsha nAH/_/daR+sha yaM tau pra b+hA be na nir+b+bi she Shau ba b+hU ba tuH/_/ts+tshe de na sar+b+ba tan+t+rI NA ma pi gan+d+har+b+ha na ya kaH/_/a daR+sha yat+s+wa ra gra maM na sha shA ka tsa su pri yaH/_/saM t+yak+ta mA na dar+p+pa
[\[183a.2\]]gyur kyang /_/de dag sgra dbyangs kun rdzogs pa/_/ston par byed la mthu yis ni/_/khyad par med pa dag tu 'gyur/_/rgyud ni thams cad bcad gyur kyang /_/dri za'i 'dren pa dag gis ni/_/dbyangs kyi tshogs ni rab tu bstan/_/rab dga' yis ni nus ma gyur/_/de nas khengs dang dregs
[\[183a.3\]]s+ya ta s+yA tha b+ha ga bAny+dzi naH/_/pra t+yak+Sha bi grahash+tsa kre bud+d+ha sad+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/dz+nyA na badzre Na satwa kA ya dr-iSh+Ti shai la bi dA ri te/_/shro daHprAp+ti pha laM sak+ShAtsha tsa kA ra pra shAn+ti ye/_/kA le no dum+ba ra ba ne ra myaHku su mA saM
[\[183a.4\]]btang ba/_/de la bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/_/lus ni mngon byung dag pa yi/_/dam pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/_/'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni/_/ye shes rdo rjes rnam bcom ste/_/de yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu ni/_/rab tu zhi slad mngon du byas/_/dus kyis u dum bA ra yi/_/nags kyi rab dga' me
[\[183a.5\]]tsa yaH/_/saM b+ho ga i ba br-id+d+ha s+ya sha na kair+m+la ni mA ya yau/_/smA ni puSh+paM ta dA yo kya sub+ha draHsho ka mu dri taH/_/a tsin+ta ya da pu N+yA naM nu ta nod+b+ha ba mAt+ma naH/_/taM tsin+tA na la saM tap+ta mu dum+ba ba ra na
[\[183a.6\]]tog tshogs/_/rgan po dag gi longs spyod bzhin/_/dal bus rab tu nyams par gyur/_/me tog nyams pa de mthong nas/_/rab bzang mya ngan rgya yis thebs/_/nges pa nyid du bdag nyid kyis/_/bsod nams min las skyes par bsams/_/bsams pa'i me yis gdungs de la/_/u dum bA ra'i
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]shri ya/_/u bA tsa de ba tA b+h+ye t+ya bi ShA dam+mA pr-i thA kr-i thA/_/ne daM ta ba pra b+hA bA draiHpu N+yaiHku su mi taM pa naM/_/na tsa m+lA naM ta bA pu N+yaiHshru ya tA ma tra ka ra NaM/_/puSh+pA n+ye tA ni dza yan+te su ga ta s+yai ba dzan+ma
[\[183b.2\]]nags kyi dpal/_/lha rnams mngon phyogs rab smras pa/_/don med mya ngan yongs ma byed/_/mthu ldan khyod kyi bsod nams kyis/_/tshal ni me tog rgyas pa min/_/khyod kyi bsod nams ma yin pas/_/nyams min 'di yi rgyu dag nyon/_/bde gshegs nyid ni 'khrungs pa na/_/me tog 'di dag 'byung
[\[183b.3\]]ni/_/a nut+ta ra dz+nyA na lA b+he bi ka san+ti sa man+ta taH/_/A san+ne pa ri nir+b+bA Ne m+lA yan+ti ni ban+ti tsa/_/i ha te pa ri nir+b+bA NaM ku sha puR+YA ta thA ga taH/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya ba tsa naM su b+ha draHkA na na shri yaH/_/dIr+g+ha
[\[183b.4\]]'gyur te/_/bla med ye shes brnyes pa na/_/kun nas rab tu rnam par rgyas/_/mya ngan 'das la nye ba na/_/nyams pa dang ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/ku sha'i grong na de bzhin gshegs/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed/_/nags kyi dpal mo'i tshig 'di dag_/rab bzang gis ni thos gyur nas/_/ring zhing
[\[183b.5\]]muSh+NaM bi ni shwa s+ya su tsi ra sa ma tsin+ta ya ta/_/yA s+ya mi d+har+m+ma pi na ye shAstur+b+hA dza na tA ma haM/_/i t+ye hr-i da ye ni t+ya mA shA ban+d+ho ma mA b+ha bA ta/_/d+ha n+ya ste bi ra ta kle shAHsaM pUr+N+Na ku sha lot+sa bAH/_/d+har+m+ma pra ba tsa ne
[\[183b.6\]]dro ba'i shugs btang ste/_/shin tu yun ring yang dag bsams/_/ston pa'i chos ni 'dul ba la/_/bdag ni snod du 'gyur bar shog_/ces pa 'di ni bdag snying la/_/rtag tu re ba bcings par gyur/_/gang gis ston pa'i zhal gyi pad/_/mthong zhing chos kyi gsung rab la/_/dge ba'i dga' ston yongs
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]shAstu R+Ye dr-iSh+Ta ba dA naM pu dzaM/_/ka s+ye dA nI ba da na sha shi naHsaM pra br-it+tA pra br-id+d+ha dz+nyA nA lo ka pra sa ra ru tsi rAHpu N+ya pe yU Sha d+hA rAH/_/lo laHsho ka pra sha ma su hr-i dastI bra tr-iSh+NAr+t+ta ban+d+ho bA tsastap+te
[\[184a.2\]]rdzogs pa/_/nyon mongs bral ba de dag bsngags/_/da ni mya ngan rab zhi grogs po mi bzad sred pas gzir ba'i gnyen/_/su yi bzhin ras ri bong can las rab 'khrungs rab tu rgyas pa'i gsung /_/ye shes snang bas dkrigs shing rab mdzes bsod nams bdud rtsi dag gi rgyun/_/srid
[\[184a.3\]]b+ha ba ma ru ta Te pA s+ya ti shro ta pA teH/_/gats+tsha mya haM ku shi pu raM ya trA sti b+ha ga pAny+dzi naH/_/prAp+p+yA mi su la b+haM ta s+ya pash+tsa ma ya di daR+sha naM/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sot+sA haHson+ta r+hi ta ta nuHk+Sha NA ta/_/mal+la
[\[184a.4\]]pa'i mya ngam gdung bar 'jig rten nyan pa'i snod kyis 'thung bar 'gyur/_/gang na bcom ldan rgyal ba bzhugs/_/ku sha'i grong du bdag 'gro'o/_/tha mar de mthong bdag gis ni/_/gal te rnyed slar thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bsams spro ldan de yis ni/_/lus mi snang bar skad cig las/_/yid ltar
[\[184a.5\]]shra ya ku shi pu rI mA sa sA da ma no dza baH/_/ba ne ya ma ka shA la khye ku su mA rA ma shrA yi na/_/dzi na s+ya dwA raHs+tha mA nan+daM sa pra be sha ma ya tsa ta/_/A nan+da staM dza gA dA tha man+da man+da swa naHsha niH/_/ni bA ra
[\[184a.6\]]mgyogs pas gyad kyi gnas/_/ku sha'i grong khyer dag tu phyin/_/me tog dga' tshal sA la zung /_/zhes pa'i tshal na rab gzims pa/_/rgyal ba'i sgo gnas dga' bo la/_/de yis nang du 'jug pa zhus/_/de nas dal gyis kun dga' bos/_/sor mo gdangs shing g.yo ba yis/_/nang 'jug bsam
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]yan pra be shA shA mun tAM gu laM do la yA/_/su b+ha drA ba sa ro nA yaM prash+na byA ka ra Ne ta pa/_/bi shrA mya ti pa ri shrAn+taHkA ya shAn+t+yai ta thA ga taH/_/na tsin+ta ya da ba sha raM sar+b+ba the ba ya thA ta thA/_/pa ra byA thA na b+hi dz+nyo yaM swAr+thA mar+thA ya
[\[184b.2\]]pa zlog byed cing /_/chung chung sgra yis de la smras/_/khyod kyi dri dang lung ston la/_/rab bzang da lta gnas skabs med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i slad/_/sku ni yongs su bsnyel zhing bzhugs/_/skye bo 'di dag pha rol ni/_/gdung ba mi shes rang don gnyer/_/kun tu ji lta de lta yang /_/gnas skabs dag ni mi
[\[184b.3\]]te dza naH/_/de sha ka le ma bi dz+nyA ya yA ti yaHsa ha sAr+thi tAM/_/sa ma hi taM sa mut+s+r-i dz+ya ladz+dza mA dA ya gats+tsha ti/_/be gA bi hA ya bi na tAHsa ri ta pra yAn+ti ban+ti pra sa dz+ya tsa tu raM na ta thA sa mI rAH/_/e te pi ne ba ta nurga sa ma
[\[184b.4\]]sems so/_/gang zhig yul dus mi shis par/_/'phral la slong ba nyid gyur pa/_/de dag bzhed don rab btang nas/_/ngo tsha blangs te 'gro ba nyid/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni zhi ba'i tshe na ljon pa 'di dag kyang /_/yal 'dab 'khri shing rab tu nyal zhing nges pa mi g.yo la/_/chu klung dag ni rnam par dud cing mgyogs
[\[184b.5\]]ne dzi na s+ya saM sup+ta pal+la ba la tA ta ra tsash+tsa lan+ti/_/A nan+de ti yat+ne na bAR+Ya mA NaHpu naHpu naH/_/A shA b+haM ga sa mu drAM taHsu b+ha drastam+b+hA Sha ta/_/dzA nA byA ba sa ra nAr+t+taHpra sI da da yAr+thi naH/_/su la b+haM
[\[184b.6\]]pa btang nas bgrod/_/rlung yang 'phral la rab tu g.yo zhing bgrod ma yin/_/de ltar kun dga' bo yis ni/_/'bad pas yang dang yang du bzlog_/re ba nyams pas rab 'khrugs pa/_/rab bzang gis ni de la smras/_/gzir ba yis ni skabs mi shes/_/slong la dang zhing brtse bar mdzod/_/rgyal ba rnyed
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]daR+sha tha dzi nam+mA mai ba b+ha ba ni Sh+Tha raH/_/ts+tsha yA yA mu pa bi sh+ya shI ta la ta yA lab+d+ha pra mau dau tsha bai rA ru h+yA rta pha laiHsa dA na ba na baiHsaM pI Ni ta s+yA d+h+wa gaiH/_/dzA nA t+ya shri ta bat+sa la s+ya su lab+d+ha
[\[185a.2\]]sla rab tu ston/_/rtsub po 'di lta yongs ma mdzad/_/grib bsil dag la nye bar 'khod cing bsil bas rab dga'i dga' ston thob gyur pa/_/rtag tu gsar pa gsar pa'i lam 'gron 'dzegs shing 'bras bu 'dzin pas gzir ba'i shing /_/bstan pa dag la mnyes gshin slong ba kun
[\[185a.3\]]d+ha sar+b+bAr+thi nAM shA khA b+hA dza na mo Ta la pra sa ra Na kle shA ba lI ka sta roH/_/i ti yan+tA ta su b+ha dre Na yA tsi to pi pu naHpu naH/_/ni rA nan+da ma nan+daHpra ti She d+ha sha tai r+b+ya d+hA ta/_/b+ha ga bA na si sar+b+ba dz+nyaH
[\[185a.4\]]gyi gzhi ni rnyed slar gyur pa yi/_/lo ma dag ni bcom dang dkrugs dang rab tu drangs pa'i nyon mongs 'phreng ba su yis shes/_/de ltar 'bad pas rab bzang des/_/yang dang yang du zhus gyur kyang /_/dgag pa rgya yi kun dga' bos/_/de ni kun dga' med par bsgrubs/_/bcom ldan kun mkhyen gzims mal
[\[185a.5\]]shay+YA mi t+ya su rA la yA ta/_/uts+tsai rA nan+da ma ba dat+su b+ha draHpra bri sha ti hi/_/lab+d+ha pra be shaHsu ga taM dr-iSh+T+wA ni d+hi mi bA d+ha naH/_/dza gA da sA sru ba da naHsu b+ha draHpra Ni pa t+ya ta/_/b+ha ga ban+b+hu ba na s+ya
[\[185a.6\]]du/_/lha yi gnas las mngon phyogs te/_/rab bzang nang du thong zhig ces/_/kun dga' bo la gsung cher gsungs/_/'jug pa thob ste nor med kyis/_/gter bzhin bde gshegs mthong gyur nas/_/rab bzang gdong ni mchi ma dang /_/bcas pas phyag 'tshal der gsol pa/_/bcom ldan de ring 'jig rten
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]d+ya ke yaM b+hA ga da ri dra tA/_/saM t+yak+ta s+yA d+ya b+ha ba tA ni rA lo ka s+ya kA ga tiH/_/ko nA ma twAm+bi nA mi traM dz+nyA nA lo kiHka riSh+ya ti/_/mo ha ni drAp+ta mu drA s+ya dza ga ta pad+ma s+ya bo d+ha naM/_/kr-i twa sa map+ta dza ga tA mu la kA ra NaM/_/pra yA
[\[185b.2\]]ni/_/skal bas dbul ba nyid 'di ci/_/de ring khyod kyis btang gyur pa/_/snang med dag gi 'gro ba ni/_/bshes gnyen khyod dang bral ba na/_/su yi ye shes snang ba yis/_/'gro ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa yi/_/gnyid kyi rgya ldan rgyas byed 'gyur/_/mtha' dag 'gro la rgyu med du/_/phan pa dag ni rab mdzad nas/_/kun
[\[185b.3\]]si sar+b+ba dz+nya su la b+haHka thaM durla b+ha tAm+ma ma/_/i t+yuk+taHpra Na yAt+te na sa mun+nA mya su khAm+bu dzaM/_/pra san+na kAn+ti b+ha ga bA na sam+mi ta sta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/i mA m+bat+sa la bet+si twaM kin+nu ni t+ya ma ni t+ya tAM/_/k+Sha Ni kAH
[\[185b.4\]]mkhyen rnyed pa sla ba khyod/_/bdag la rnyed dka' ji ltar gyur/_/zhes pa de yis gus pas gsol/_/de la bcom ldan 'dzum ldan zhing /_/bzhin gyi chu skyes gzengs bstod de/_/rab dngas mdzes pas bka' stsal pa/_/mnyes gshin rtag tu mi rtag nyid/_/'di khyod rig pa min nam ci/_/'du byed thams
[\[185b.5\]]sar+b+ba saM skA rAHko yan+de ha gra hA gra haH/_/dU raM pra yAn+ti di na kr-it+b+h+ra ma ni rga tA ni yA ni k+Sha yA sha ba li tA ni sa dA di nA ni/_/e tA ni tA ni ni pa tit+p+r-i thu kA la tsakra saM sha ti tA ni ku shal+la ni nr-i dzI bi tA nAM/_/da laM t+ye te shai lA dza la d+hi ba la yaHshu
[\[185b.6\]]cad skad cig la/_/lus kyi gdon ni su zhig 'dzin/_/gang dag rtag tu nyin byed 'khor bas rab bzlas pa'i/_/mtshan mos bkra ba'i nyin par ring du rab 'gro ba/_/mi yi 'tsho ba rnams kyi dge ba 'di dag ni/_/rgya che dus kyi 'khor lo lhung bas gcod pa nyid/_/ri 'di snyil 'gyur chu gter 'jing ni mchog tu
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]Sh+ya ti sa raM sa hod+b+hU tair+b+hu te b+hu ba na sha ra Nai su s+ya ti ta rAM/_/a sa re saM sA re tsa ki ta ha ri NI lo tsa na tsa le s+thA sI nA yaM ba hu pa ri tsa yaHkA ya ni tsa yaH/_/a b+hi d+hA ye ti b+ha ga bAn su b+ha dra s+ya pra shAn+ta ye/_/pra sA dA nan+di
[\[186a.2\]]bskam/_/rab skyes 'byung po dang bcas srid pa'i lam rab 'jig_/ri dgas skrag mig ltar g.yo snying po med 'khor bar/_/mang du yongs 'dris lus kyi tshogs ni brtan gnas min/_/zhes pa gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis/_/rab tu zhi slad rab bzang la/_/bden pa'i lam ni
[\[186a.3\]]nIM tsakre byak+ta sa t+ya pa thAM ka thAM/_/tri daN+Da kuN+DI saM b+ha raM t+yak+t+wA b+hA ra bi bA d+h+wa gaH/_/pra bra dz+yAM shA sa ne shAstuHsu b+ha dro b+h+yA da de ta taH/_/ar+ha te pa da ma thA sA d+ya sar+b+bA kle sha saM k+Sha yA ta/_/a tsin+ta
[\[186a.4\]]gsal ba'i gtam/_/rab dang kun dga' ldan par mdzad/_/dbyig pa gsum dang ril ba'i tshogs/_/lam 'gron gyis ni khur bzhin btang /_/ston pa'i bka' las rab byung ni/_/de nas rab bzang dag gis blangs/_/de nas nyon mongs kun bcom pa/_/dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/bsams pa
[\[186a.5\]]ya da ho ne ya mu tsi tA shi Sh+ya tA ma ma/_/pa sh+yA mi pa ri nir+b+bA Na ma gre b+ha ga ba taHka thaM/_/tasmAt+pUr+b+ba ma haM de haM bi hA ya swA sa daM b+ha dze/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sa sha naiHpany+tsa d+hiSh+Tha na saM shra yaH/_/pha Ni nor+m+ma ka ka la yA pa ri
[\[186a.6\]]kye ma bdag gi ni/_/slob ma nyid 'di 'os pa min/_/bdag gi mdun du bcom ldan 'das/_/mya ngan 'da' ba ji ltar blta/_/de slad sngon du lus btang nas/_/bdag ni rang gi gnas dag bsten/_/zhes bsams byin brlabs lnga dag ni/_/bsten pa de yis dal bu yis/_/gdengs can shun pa dor ba ltar/_/yongs
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]nir+b+r-i ti mAp+ta bAn/_/ta s+yA tha de ha sat+kA re b+hi k+Shu NAM sa ha tIr+thi kaiH/_/ka s+ya saM brah+ma tsA rI bAn nA ma bi bA da saM dza taH/_/ta s+yA tha bi shi kAM boT+Ta ma sak+te Shu kri yA bi d+hau/_/tIr+thI ke Shu pra yA te Shu sar+b+ba b+hik+Shu ga No b+h+ya d+hA ta/_/
[\[186b.2\]]su mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/de nas de yi lus sbyong la/_/dge slong rnams dang mu stegs dag_/su yi tshangs spyod dang ldan zhes/_/rnam par rtsod pa yang dag skyes/_/de nas mu stegs byed rnams kyis/_/de yi sgrub byed cho ga la/_/khyogs khyer ma nus song ba'i tshe/_/dge slong tshogs kun dag gis bsgrubs/_/
[\[186b.3\]]sha rI ra ni tsa yastu saM kr-i twA ta s+yA tha b+hik+Sha baH/_/sa pra ts+tshaHsu ga taM pUr+b+ba pa ri nir+b+bA Na kA ra NaM/_/sa tA nu ba tsa bi pro pau bA rA Na s+yA ma b+hUt+pu ra/_/a sho kAHkA sh+ya bA khya s+ya shA stuHprA Na sa maHsu hr-i ta/_/tasma ta ta s+ya d+har+m+ma bi na yaM
[\[186b.4\]]de nas de yi gdung gi tshogs/_/mchod rten byas nas dge slong gi_/sngon las mya ngan 'da' ba yi/_/rgyu mtshan bde bar gshegs la dris/_/de dag la ni des gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sIr sngon bram ze/_/mya ngan med de ston pa ni/_/'od srungs srog mtshungs grogs su gyur/_/mtha' yi mal stan la gnas pa/_/de
[\[186b.5\]]paR+Yan+ta sha ya na s+thi teH/_/de ba tA pra pI tAM pra s+ya sh+lA g+h+ya mar+ha twa mAp+ta bAnra/_/sa b+hak+ti shI laHswa gu ru ra gre bi gra ha ma t+ya dza ta/_/taM dr-iSh+Ta de ba tA ta tra bra Ni d+hA na ma thA ka ro ta/_/ya thA yaM kA sh+ya pa s+yA gro su kri ti pa ri nir+b+r-i
[\[186b.6\]]las de yis 'dul ba'i chos/_/lha yis mthong bar byas thob nas/_/bsngags par 'os pa'i dgra bcom thob/_/gus pa'i ngang tshul de yi lus/_/rang gi bla ma'i mdun du btang /_/de nas der ni lha yis der/_/mthong nas smon lam rab tu btab/_/ji ltar legs byas ldan pa 'di/_/'od srungs sngon du yongs
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]taH/_/ta thA ha ma pi b+hU yA saM gu ro raM te gra gA ma nI/_/sa de ba su b+ha dro yaM ma mA gre t+yak+ta bi gra haH/_/te na shrad+d+hA bi shud+d+he na pra Ni d+hA ne sat+k+r-i taH/_/kra kuts+tshan+da s+ya shAstush+tsa pash+tsi me sha ya ne pu
[\[187a.2\]]'das pa/_/de bzhin bdag kyang bla ma'i mthar/_/sngon du 'gro ba por gyur cig_/lha de rab bzang 'di nyid de/_/rnam par dag pa'i smon lam dang /_/dad pa de yis legs byas pa/_/bdag gi mdun du lus dag btang /_/ston pa log par dad sel gyi/_/mtha' yi gzims mal dag
[\[187a.3\]]rA/_/prAp+tAr+hata pa da mA lokya mu nI nAM sha pany+tsaM ka/_/swa yaM de ba ta yA nI tAM b+hak+t+yA gre t+yak+ta bi gra haM/_/tad+bi d+ha pra Ni d+hA ne na se ba yA tA su b+ha dra tA/_/de ha swa b+hA ba dza ma tAM sa ra yan+to pa na tAM bya thAM/_/ma yA sa
[\[187a.4\]]la sngon/_/lha de rang gis khrid gyur pa'i/_/thub pa brgya phrag lnga dag ni/_/dgra bcom gnas thob gus pa yis/_/sngon du lus btang mthong gyur nas/_/rnam pa de lta'i smon lam gyis/_/de nyid rab bzang nyid du gyur/_/lus la rang bzhin gyis skyes pa/_/mthar thug nye ba'i gdung ba 'di/_/bzod par byed cing
[\[187a.5\]]sa mA ne na nir+p+ya thaM prA ti taHpa daM/_/brah+ma dat+to nr-i po so b+huta a ha ma shwash+tsa saM sha ye/_/saM ma bA sha tru bi b+haSh+Tash+tshin+nAn+t+re NA pi tA ri taH/_/ka n+yA kub+dza ba ne pUr+b+baM ma b+ha baM mr-i ga yu thA saH/_/a b+hUn+m+r-i ga su b+ha drash+tsa yU tha ma d+h+ye ma
[\[187a.6\]]bdag gis de/_/gdung ba med pa'i gnas su bkod/_/de ni mi bdag tshangs byin dang /_/bdag kyang rtar gyur the tshom la/_/bdag ni rgyu ma dral bas kyang /_/de ni dgra yis bcom pa bsgral/_/kan+yA kub dza'i nags su sngon/_/nga ni ri dgas khyu bdag gyur/_/rab bzang khyu yi nang nas ni/_/bdag gi rjes 'brang
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]mA nu gaH/_/mr-i ga yAp+te na saM rud+d+he ba ne kar+N+Ne na b+hU b+hu dzaM/_/trastA nAM tA Ta ni tI re mr-i gA NAM na b+ha ba hu b+hiH/_/a ba tIR+Ya sa rin+ma d+h+yaM nish+tsa le na ma yA ta taH/_/m-it+p+raSh+Tha n+yasta tsa ra NAsti b+hI tAstA ra tA mr-i gA/_/tat+khu
[\[187b.2\]]ri dgas gyur/_/nags su sa bdag kar+Na ni/_/rngon la 'ongs pas bkag gyur te/_/chu klung ngogs su ri dgas rnams/_/skrag cing dga' ba med par gyur/_/de nas chu klung nang du ni/_/g.yo med bdag gis rab tu babs/_/bdag gi rgyab tu rkang bkod pas/_/ri dgas 'jigs pa de dag bsgral/_/de dag
[\[187b.3\]]rA pA ta li te yA te ma yi mu mUR+Shu tAM/_/e ka sa e ba ha ri NaHsla baM ne baM ta dAp+ta ban/_/ta ma haM tra sa ta ra le bya thAM saM staM b+h+ya duHsa haM/_/tur+N+Na saM tAR+Ya kA ru N+yAta su li ne d+ha naM ga taM/_/sa e ba bya the nA
[\[187b.4\]]rmig pa bkod pas bdag_/nyams shing 'chi ba 'dod gyur tshe/_/ri dgas de nyid gcig pu ni/_/de tshe rkyal zhing 'ongs par gyur/_/skrag pas nyen pa de dag gis/_/gdung ba bzod dka' brnags byas te/_/myur bar snying rjes yang dag bsgral/_/'jug ngogs der ni shi bar gyur/_/de nyid rab bzang de ring yang /_/
[\[187b.5\]]d+yA pi su b+ha dras+t+rA ri to ma yA/_/i t+yuk+t+wa b+ha ga bAn+mau na mA la lam+ba sha mon+mu khaH/_/b+hik+Shu b+hiHku sha la bAp+tau su pri ya s+ya pi kA ra NaM/_/pr-iSh+Ta pro bA tsa sar+b+ba dz+nyaH sha naiHpra Na yi bat+sa laH/_/kA sh+ya pa s+ya su d+hIrnA
[\[187b.6\]]gdung ba dang bcas bdag gis bsgral/_/zhes gsungs bcom ldan zhi ba la/_/mngon phyogs mi gsung nyid la brten/_/dge slong rnams kyis rab dga' yang /_/dge ba thob pa'i rgyu mtshan dris/_/gus pas mnyes gshin kun mkhyen gyis/_/dal bu yis ni rab tu gsungs/_/ston pa 'od srungs dag gi
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]ma shAstu rA sI du pA sa kaH/_/tat+p+ra sA dAb+taR+Y+YAn+te shik+ShA pa da ni ShaN+Na d+hIH/_/sa dr-iSh+Ta gI ti ku sha laM gAr+d+har+b+hi ka ga Not+ta maM/_/pra Ni d+hA naM pra bi da d+he gan+d+har+b+hA d+hi pa tAM pra ti/_/sa te na pra Ni d+hA ne na su
[\[188a.2\]]ni/_/dge bsnyen blo bzang zhes bya ba/_/de yi drin gyis bslab gnas ni/_/yongs rdzogs thob cing blo gnas gyur/_/de yi dri za'i tshogs kyi mchog_/glu dbyangs mkhas pa mthong gyur nas/_/dri za'i bdag po nyid kyis ni/_/ched du smon lam rab tu bsgrubs/_/de ni smon lam de nyid kyis/_/
[\[188a.3\]]pri ya twa mu pA ga taH/_/saM prAp+ta d+harma bi na yaHshi k+ShA pa da pa ri grA hAta/_/su b+ha dra su pri yA be tau kr-i to ku sha li nau ma yA/_/pa rA b+hi ma ta kr-i t+ye Shu nir+b+b+ya thAH sar+b+ba thA ba yaM/_/pU dzi to tsa ta saM dz+nyo b+hUt+na ga re swarga
[\[188a.4\]]rab dga' nyid du nye bar gyur/_/bslab pa'i gnas ni yongs bzung nas/_/'dul ba'i chos ni yang dag thob/_/rab bzang rab dga' 'di dag ni/_/bdag gis dge ba ldan par byas/_/gzhan gyi mngon 'dod byas pa la/_/kun tu bdag ni gdung ba med/_/grong khyer mchod 'os zhes bya ba/_/mtho ris dag dang
[\[188a.5\]]san+ni b+he/_/sha ta kra tu ri ba shrI mAn bi dza yan+tA b+hi d+he nr-i paH/_/ta s+ya pu N+ya pra br-it+ta s+ya d+har+m+ma mArgA nu sA ri b+hiH/_/bra dzad+b+ha s+t+ri di baM pau reHpU dzi tA su ra b+hU ma yaH/_/rA dzA pu N+yA nu b+hA be na swarga mA pU ra taM na raiH/_/
[\[188a.6\]]mtshungs par ni/_/mi bdag dpal ldan brgya byin bzhin/_/rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa byung /_/bsod nams la ni rab zhugs de'i/_/chos lam rjes su 'brang ba yi/_/grong pa mtho ris bgrod rnams kyis/_/lha yi sa gzhi khengs par gyur/_/rgyal po de yi bsod nams mthus/_/mi yi mtho ris kun gang ba/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]dr-iSh+TA yuk+tiM tsa kA ra s+ya sa twaM dz+nyA tu su re shwa raH/_/tastasmin+nir+m+mi tAHku raHsa twAstaM pr-i thi bI pa tiM/_/mAM saM sha rI ra niHkr-it+taM ru d+hi ra tsa ya yA tsi re/_/nir+b+ba kA ra ma tiste b+h+yaHsa da twa b+hi ma ta nr-i paH/_/as+thi she ShaM
[\[188b.2\]]mthong nas lha yi dbang po yis/_/snying stobs shes 'dod sbyor ba byas/_/de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i/_/sems can gdug pas sa yi bdag_/de la lus ni bcad pa yi/_/sha dang khrag dag rab tu blangs/_/mi bdag blo gros rnam 'gyur med/_/de yi mngon 'dod rus pa'i lhag_/de dag rnams la
[\[188b.3\]]pra bi da d+he pra Ni d+hA naM ma hA ya shaH/_/sha rI ra dA na pu N+yA na tA ra NA ya sha rI ri NAM/_/e te nA nu t+ta raM samyak+saM bo d+hi ma hA mAsna yAM/_/u tse sha kra sta ma b+h+ye t+yA tha rA dzan+p+ra bya tha mi ta s+ya te/_/a si de ha pra dA ne
[\[188b.4\]]byin nas ni/_/bsam pa chen pos smon lam btab/_/lus kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams 'dis/_/lus can rnams ni bsgral ba'i slad/_/bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub chen po thob par shog_/de nas brgya byin der phyogs smras/_/rgyal po rab gdung khyed kyis ni/_/lus ni rab tu byin pa la/_/
[\[188b.5\]]b+hUd+bi kA raHsa t+ya mu ts+ye tAM/_/i ti pr-iSh+TaHsu ren+d+re Na na ren+d+rap+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/ar+thi saM su ra Nod+b+hU ta pra haR+Shot+phul+la lo tsa naH/_/bya thA yaM nirbi kA ro haM ya di sa t+ye na te na me/_/saM rU D+ha bra Na sats+tsha yaM swas+tha me bAstu gra
[\[188b.6\]]rnam 'gyur byung ngam bden par smros/_/zhes pa lha yi dbang pos dris/_/slong ba rdzogs pas rab bskyed pa/_/dga' bas mig ni rab rgyas pa'i/_/mi yi dbang po de la smras/_/gal te bdag ni gdung ba na/_/rnam 'gyur med na bden pa des/_/bdag gi lus 'di rma bsos shing /_/mdzes ldan rnal du gnas
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]haM/_/i t+yu dI ri ta mA tre Na kAn+ti swas+tha ma b+hU ba suH/_/ta s+ya me g+ha bi ni rmuk+taM bim+baM tA rA pa te ri ba/_/bi dza yan+to nr-i pa so haM pa ra kAR+Ye Shu nir+b+ya thaH/_/i t+yuk+t+wA b+ha ga bAn+d+h+yA na ni lI
[\[189a.2\]]gyur cig_/ces pa rab tu brjod tsam gyis/_/de lus rab mdzes rnal gnas gyur/_/sprin dang rnam par bral ba yi/_/rgyu skar bdag po'i gzugs bzhin no/_/mi bdag rnam rgyal de nyid nga /_/gzhan gyi don la gdung ba med/_/ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/_/bsam
[\[189a.3\]]na na ya no b+ha bta/_/a tsa la tsa la nair+m+man+thakleshats+cha TA ma mr-i tAM bu d+hiHsu ra ga Na kr-i te tAM tAM sA he prA sa h+ya ma hA sha yaH/_/bi ma la ma na sI kA yA pA yak+Sha Ne pya bi kA ri NAM pa ra hi ta bi b+hau san+nad+d+hA nAM bya
[\[189a.4\]]gtan la chags spyan ldan gyur/_/'phral la ri bo bskyod pas bsrubs pa'i nyon mongs gzer ma de dang de/_/lha tshogs ched du bdud rtsi'i chu gter bsam pa chen pos bzod par byed/_/dri med yid ldan lus ni gnod pa dang bcas tshe yang rnam 'gyur med/_/gzhan phan bsgrub par chas pa rnams la
[\[189a.5\]]thA pi su khA ya te/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM su b+ha drA ba dA na ma shI ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//k+She tre su kr-iSh+TAlpa ta raM ya dup+taM kr-i taM
[\[189a.6\]]gdung ba dag kyang bde bar spyod/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rab bzang gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu pa'o//_//legs rmos zhing la rab nyung gang btab dang /_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]kr-i ta dz+nyA s+ya hi tA yats+tsha/_/sa mar+pi ta yats+tsha gu Non+na tA ya shA khA sa ha praista du pe ti br-id+d+haM/_/shrA bas+t+yAM b+ha ga bAn b+ha bya pu rA dze ta ba ne dzi naH/_/ka thA pra ban+d+ho sa ga taM b+hi k+Shu saM g+ha ma b+hA Sha ta/_/bi pha laM sar+b+ba
[\[189b.2\]]byas shes dag la phan pa gang byas dang /_/yon tan dag gis mtho la gang byin pa/_/de ni lo ma stong phrag 'phel bar 'gyur/_/legs ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi/_/tshal du bcom ldan rgyal bas sngon/_/gtam gyi zhar la nyer 'dus pa'i/_/dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig rang gis
[\[189b.3\]]me ba ta swa b+ho gA ya ya dar+dz+ya te/_/ta de ba sa pha laM lo ke yat+sa mar+pi ta mar+ha te/_/dak+Shi NA dak+Shi Na ta yA sat+pA tra pra ti pA di tA/_/a saM khya gu Na tA me ti pat+saM ga ti ri bAk+Sha yA/_/su rA pA Ta li pu trA yAM ba Ni dzash+tsan+da
[\[189b.4\]]spyad 'os pa/_/de dag thams cad 'bras bu bral/_/'jig rten du ni dgra bcom la/_/gang phul de nyid 'bras bur ldan/_/dam pa'i snod la yon nyid kyis/_/yon ni rab tu phul ba dag_/dad pa'i grogs bzhin mi zad pas/_/yon tan grangs med ldan par gyur/_/grong khyer pA Ta li pu Ta'i/_/tshong pa tsan+dan don
[\[189b.5\]]nAr+thi naH/_/ma hA pra ba ha Na ru D+hAsh+tsan+danA dwi pA mA ya yuH/_/go shIR+Sha tsan+dan tsa yaM sa mA dA ya ta tasta taH/_/hr-iSh+TAHpra ti ni br-it+tAs+the prA pur+m+ma d+h+yam+ma ho da d+heH/_/bi pu lA kA la bA ta li tsa li tor+m+mi ba le ra b+huta/_/
[\[189b.6\]]gnyer sngon/_/gzings chen dag la zhon nas ni/_/tsan+dan gling du phyin par gyur/_/de nas tsan+dan sa mchog sogs/_/blangs nas dga' bas de dag rnams/_/de las phyir ni log gyur te/_/chu gter chen po'i dbus su phyin/_/rgya che dus min rlung 'tshub kyis/_/bskyod pa'i rba rlabs stobs kyis der/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]ta tra pra ba ha Ni kA la do la ke laM bi shriM kha laM/_/trA NAr+thi ba Ni tsakre tr-i da shasto tra kA ri Ni/_/a b+hi dz+ya tA pra ba ha NaM sa ha sAr+tha ma no ra thaiH/_/pu N+ya se nA b+hi d+hasta tra bi Sha me prA Na sa sha ye/_/
[\[190a.2\]]dus kyi rtse dga' g.yo ba yis/_/gzings ni bsdams pa med par gyur/_/skyob pa don gnyer tshong pa'i tshogs/_/lha la bstod pa byed pa'i tshe/_/don mthun yid la re ba dang /_/lhan cig gzings ni zhig par gyur/_/mi bzad srog la the tshom der/_/don mthun 'dren pa bsod nams sde/_/
[\[190a.3\]]a tsin+ta yat+pa ri tra Na sa kalpa sAr+thi nA ya kaH/_/asti mad+bish+tsa ni ka Te d+har+m+ma bo d+hi ru pA sa kaH/_/he tut+ta maM kle sha kA le sto ti shAstA ra ma pa saH/_/i ti saM tsit+t+ya ma na sA ta me ba sha ra Na ga taH/_/u tse sAr+tha pa
[\[190a.4\]]zhes pa 'dar ba dang bcas pas/_/yongs su bskyab pa rab tu bsams/_/bdag gi khyim dang nye ba na/_/dge bsnyen chos kyi byang chub yod/_/de ni nyon mongs dus dag tu/_/ston pa rgyu yi mchog nyid bstod/_/ces pa yid kyis rab bsams nas/_/de nyid la ni skyabs song ste/_/ded dpon mchi ma dang
[\[190a.5\]]tiHsra d+h+wa b+ha yA sa ga da ga daH/_/he tut+ta mA ya ma ha te si bud+d+hA yAr+ha te na maH/_/ka l+yA Na kalpa br-ik+ShA ya sa ka la kle sha shar+m+ma Ne/_/i t+yuk+te te na sa ha sA saM ma b+h+ye t+yAb+d+hi de ba tA/_/sAr+tha pra
[\[190a.6\]]bcas pas/_/'jigs shing ngal bas ldab ldib smras/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu yi mchog_/dge ba yi ni dpag bsam shing /_/nyon mongs can kun bde mdzad pa/_/dgra bcom che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes pa de yis brjod pa'i tshe/_/'phral la rgya mtsho'i lha 'ongs te/_/don mthun
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]t+yA ga ta prA NaM bi k+She pA dza la d+hesta Te/_/tasmAt+ma hA b+ha yAn+muk+taste swa de sha mu pA ga tAH/_/he tut+ta ma na maskA ra ni ra tAHsar+b+ba dA b+ha bAn/_/tasman+na ba sa re shAstuHkar+m+ma she She Na ke na tsita/_/gA tre he tut+ta ma s+yA b+hUt+tI bra
[\[190b.2\]]srog ni slar byung nyams/_/chu gter gyi ni ngogs su bsgral/_/'jigs chen de las grol gyur pa/_/de dag rang gi yul du phyin/_/rgyu yi mchog la phyag byed la/_/dus kun du ni chags par gyur/_/gnas skabs der ni ston pa dag_/rgyu yi mchog gi sku la ni/_/las kyi lhag ma 'ga' yi rims/_/drag
[\[190b.3\]]tA pa sI ti dz+wa raH/_/ye swas+tha tAM b+ha ba ma hA b+ha ya b+hai Sha dz+ye na kur+b+ban+ti sar+b+ba dza ga tA ma lo ka ne na/_/te pi pra sak+ta ni dza kar+m+ma la tA bi she ShA d+hi bA sa ka la nAM na ba ri t+ya dzin+ti/
[\[190b.4\]]po'i gdung ba gnas par gyur/_/gang dag gzigs pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa chen po'i sman gyis ni/_/'gro ba thams cad legs par bsos pa nyid ni bsgrubs mdzad pa/_/de dag gis kyang rang las 'khri shing khyad par rab chags pa'i/_/lhag ma lhag par gnas shing chags pa dag ni gtong mi 'gyur/_/
[\[190b.5\]]go shIR+Sha tsan+da naM ta s+ya tI bra saM tA ba shAn+ta ye/_/rA dzA tsan+d+ra ba lo kA khyAHsar+b+ba trAr+thestu mud+Ya yau/_/lak+Shaish+tsa tur+b+hir+b+hU be na sa sAr+tha pa ti rar+thi taH/_/go shIR+Sha tsan+da na pa laM na da dau b+hu be duR+Ya b+haM/_/b+hak+t+yA swa yaM sa ma
[\[190b.6\]]de yi drag por gdung ba ni/_/zhi slad tsan+dan sa mchog dag_/rgyal po zla ba snang zhes pas/_/thams cad du ni btsal bar brtsams/_/sa bdag gis ni 'bum phrag bzhis/_/ded dpon de la don du gnyer/_/tsan+dan sa mchog sa la ni/_/rnyed dka' srang gcig byin ma gyur/_/ded dpon rang nyid mngon
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]b+h+ye t+ye smr-i ti mA tro pa kA ri NaH/_/shAstuHsAr+tha pa tish+tsakre ba push+tsan+da na tsar+ts+tsi taM/_/te na hA ra tu ShA rau g+ha sha shi shai to pa hA si nA/_/swas+thaHswa kIr+t+tiM shu b+h+re Na tsan+da ne nA b+ha badz+dzi naH/_/tai na bu N+yA nu b+hA be na pu N+ya se
[\[191a.2\]]phyogs te/_/dran pa tsam gyis phan mdzad pa/_/ston pa'i sku la tsan+dan gyis/_/gus pa yis ni byugs pa byas/_/do shal dang ni kha ba'i tshogs/_/zla ba bsil ba dman byed pa/_/grags pa ltar dkar tsan+dan des/_/rgyal ba rnal du gnas par gyur/_/de yi bsod nams mthu yis ni/_/
[\[191a.3\]]naHsha shi pra b+haH/_/shrI mAn+ba b+hu ba sar+b+bAM ga prod+b+hu tAd+b+hu ta sau ra b+haH/_/ta s+yatsan+da na rat+na di ts+yu ta yAt+sA ga rA b+ha si/_/tat+sar+b+baM swa gr-i ho pAt+ta kU pa ma d+h+yAt+sa mung+ga taM/_/ni dzaM ni dzaM sa da twA tha ba Ni dza tsand nA di kaM/_/
[\[191a.4\]]dpal dang ldan pa bsod nams sde/_/zla ba'i 'od dang yan lag kun/_/rmad byung dri bzang ldan par gyur/_/de yi tsan+dan rin chen sogs/_/rgya mtsho'i chu la gang lhung ba/_/de dag thams cad rang khyim dang /_/nye bar khron pa'i nang nas byung /_/tshong pa rnams la tsan+dan sogs/_/rang rang dag la des byin nas/_/
[\[191a.5\]]b+ho dz+ya rat+nAm+ba rairge haM saM b+hi k+Shu saM g+ha pU dza yata/_/a tha sAr+tha pa te di bya pra b+hA bA b+ha ra NAM shri yaM/_/dr-ISh+T+wa pa s+tha ya ke nA gre pr-iSh+Ta tat+sa kr-i taM dzi naH/_/he tUt+ta mo tha b+ha ga bAn sa smi tasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/
[\[191a.6\]]zas dang rin chen gos rnams kyis/_/khyim du dge slong dge 'dun mchod/_/de nas ded dpon dag gis ni/_/mchog gi mthu yis brgyan pa'i dpal/_/mthong nas mngon du nyer gnas kyis/_/de yis legs byas rgyal la dris/_/de nas bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog_/'dzum dang bcas pas de la gsungs/_/
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]prAp+ta shrIHsar+thA ba he nA laM pa tA tsand ne na mAM/_/kr-i taM su kr-i taM shI le nA pu N+ya se ne na kar+m+ma tata/_/a mr-i ta twA ma bAb+ta s+ya ya s+yai trA le shA bi sru ShaH/_/pA ke ku sha la mU lA nA me Shadzan+ma ni pash+tsi me/_/pra bra dz+yA nut+ta rA sa myak+saM
[\[191b.2\]]ded dpon gyis ni tsan+dan gyis/_/sa la byugs pas dpal 'byor thob/_/bsod nams sdes ni legs byas kyi/_/ngang tshul dag gis las de byas/_/bdud rtsi nyid ni rab thob pa/_/gang gi 'di dag cha yi thigs/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa na/_/skye ba tha ma dag la 'di/_/rab byung bla med yang dag par/_/
[\[191b.3\]]bo d+hiM sa ma bAp+s+ya ti/_//tsan+da na shrI ri ti khyA taHpu N+ya tsan+da na shA khi nAH/_/e Sha mU le bi shA la s+ya bi Sh+ya ti ta thA ga taH/_/i ti he tUt+ta maHprA ha b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na lo tsa naH/_/i t+yuk+te shAkya mu ni nA b+hik+Sha bo
[\[191b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bsod nams dag gi tsan+dan shing /_/yangs pa yi ni rtsa bar 'di/_/tsan+dan dpal zhes grags pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de skad bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog_/ye shes spyan dang ldan pas gsungs/_/zhes pa shAkya thub pa yis/_/gsungs tshe dge
[\[191b.5\]]bisma yaM ya yuH/_/ar+hat+k+Shet+t+ra sa mar+p+pa NA pa ri Na tau bai rA gya lak+Sh+mI pha laHshrad+d+ha dA na ka NAM ku raHsu kr-i ti nA shA khA sha ter+b+bar+d+ha te/_/ya s+ya tAs+t+ri da shA d+hi pa t+ya bi Sha dats+tsha tro da yAHsam+pa daHpu N+yA gan+d+he ma da
[\[191b.6\]]slong ya mtshan gyur/_/legs byas can gyi dad pa'i sbyin pa'i cha yi myu gu lo 'dab brgya yis 'phel/_/dgra bcom zhing la yang dag btab pa yongs su smin tshe chags bral phun tshogs 'bras/_/gang la skabs gsum bdag po dri med gdugs can dar zhing bsod nams dri yis rgyags/_/rab dga'i
[\[192a\]]
