[\[192a.1\]]pra mo da su hr-i daHpra t+ya gra puSh+pod+d+ha baH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM hetUt+ta mA ba dA na me kA shA ta ta maHpal+la waH//_//
[\[192a.2\]]grogs po phun tshogs 'di dag me tog gsar pa nyid du rab tu rgyas/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rgyu'i mchog gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//
[\[192a.3\]]lo kaHkiM pa ra lo ka d+hIHpra ku ru te pu trA ya mi th+yA spr-i hAM tat+pu N+yaM kr-i ya te swa yaM ya du tsi taM nAn+yaiH kr-i taM b+hu dz+ya te/_/bu trastad+bi da d+hA ti kash+tsi da sa ma kru ra kr-i thA ko bi daHsA swad+Ye na ni sA ta b+hag+na ba da naHsA da t+ya she Sho
[\[192a.4\]]'jig rten pha rol blo ldan don med bu la chags pa ci slad sgrub/_/bsod nams gang rigs de ni rang gis byas te gzhan gyis byas pa spyod ma yin/_/gang gis sdig pa'i las rnams ma lus rigs ni rnam par lhung zhing bzhin dman nyams byed pa/_/de dag mtshungs med gdug pa'i bya ba la mkhas
[\[192a.5\]]n+wa yaH/_/pu ra b+ha bid+g+ra ha pa teHshrA bas+t+yAM shru ta bar+m+ma NaH/_/dzA yA yA dza ya se nA yAM b+ha ba bar+m+ma b+hi d+haHsu taH/_/tau dam+pa tI shi sho tasmin bar+d+ha mA ne sha naiHsha naiH/_/ba shod+kaR+Sha bi she ShA shA bi ni be shaM pra tsakra
[\[192a.6\]]bu ni 'ga' yi rnam pa bsgrubs/_/mnyan yod du sngon khyim gyi bdag_/thos pa'i go cha dag gis ni/_/chung ma rgyal ba'i sde la bu/_/srid pa'i go cha zhes pa byung /_/dal bu dal bus byis pa de/_/khyo shug de dag gis bskyed de/_/rigs brgyud khyad 'phags khyad par gyis/_/re ba rnam par 'god
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]tuH/_/kA le na kA la ba sha ge dza na ka b+ha ba bar+m+ma NaH/_/dza na nIsne ha mo hArtA sam+bar+d+han pa rA b+ha bAtra/_/prA ti bai sh+ya ba ya s+ya na sa ha lA la la bi shriM kha lAH/_/yau ba nas+thaHsa ba b+h+rA ma ni raM ku sha i ba dwi
[\[192b.2\]]pa byas/_/dus kyis pha ni dus dbang du/_/song tshe srid pa'i go cha ni/_/mdza' zhing rmongs pas gzir ba yi/_/ma yis bskyed bsrings bskyangs par gyur/_/khyim mtshes grogs po dag dang ni/_/lhan cig rtse zhing ma bsdams pa/_/lang tsho dag la gnas pa de/_/gnyis 'thung lcags kyu med bzhin
[\[192b.3\]]paH/_/bra dzan+taM rA dza mArge Na b+hu dzaM ga su b+ha TAM ga nA/_/da daR+sha pun+da rI nA ma taM harmya shi kha ras+thi tA/_/sa te na sA b+hi lA She Na sa bi lA sa bi lo ki tA/_/ut+sa sardzasme ra mu khI tan+mur+d+hi kU su ma bra dzaM/_/ta yoHsa
[\[192b.4\]]'khyam/_/lag 'gro brgya lam nas bgrod de/_/dpa' bo yi ni bud med dag_/mdzes pa zhes pa khang bzang gi_/rtse mo dag na gnas pa mthong /_/mngon par sred dang ldan pa des/_/'jo sgeg ldan la rnam par bltas/_/bzhin 'dzum ma des de yi ni/_/spyi bor me tog 'phreng ba 'phangs/_/khyim mtshes
[\[192b.5\]]bi b+h+ra mA ku taM sa dr-iSh+TA pra ti bish+mi kaH/_/saM b+ho ga su tsa kaM sar+b+baM sa saM ke ta ma ma n+ya ta/_/sa ga twA tsa ki taHprA ha dza na nIm+b+ha ba bar+m+ma Na/_/su hr-i daHsne ha saM sak+taHshaM ka mA naHpa ra b+ha baM/_/su
[\[192b.6\]]de yis de dag gis/_/bsam pa rnam 'phrul dang bcas pa/_/mthong nas longs spyod go byed pa'i/_/brda rnams thams cad rig par gyur/_/grogs la mdza' bas chags gyur cing /_/gnod pa 'byung bar dogs pa yis/_/'jigs pa de ni song gyur nas/_/srid pa'i go cha'i ma la smras/_/khyod
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]taste kr-i ta saM ke taHspaSh+T-i su b+ha Ta yo Shi tA/_/ra dza n+yA ma bi nI to d+ya spai ra tsa rI ga mi Sh+ya ti/_/tsa ran+taHsaM sA ra bya sa na ga he na smin+na ra mr-i ga b+h+r-i shaM b+ho ga bya grA ni khi la su kha sha Sh+ye pra
[\[193a.2\]]kyi bu dang dpa' bo yi/_/bud med gsal ba'i brda dag byas/_/mtshan mo rnam par ma dul ba/_/dman min rgyu zhing 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mi yi ri dgas 'khor ba sdug bsngal nags tshal 'dir ni rgyu byed cing /_/mchog tu longs spyod kyis 'khrugs ma lus bde ba'i rtsal
[\[193a.3\]]Na yi NaH/_/bi nA sha bya pA ri sma ra sha ba ra pA sha ni ba ti tA la b+han+tai paR+Yan+ta bi Sha ni shi ta shas+t+wair+b+bi sha sa naM/_/bA sa re rak+Shi tastA ba ta ma yA yaM tsa pa lA sha yaH/_/rak+Sha NI yas+t+wa yA rA trA pi t+yuk+t+wA ya yau
[\[193a.4\]]chags gyur rnams/_/'jig pa'i bya ba dang ldan rngon pa zhags pa dag tu ltung gyur te/_/mjug tu dug ldan rno ba'i mtshon rnams dag gis brlag pa thob par 'gyur/_/g.yo ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing /_/re zhig nyin par bdag gis bsrung /_/mtshan mo khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/_/zhes pa brjod nas
[\[193a.5\]]su hr-ita/_/a thAn+tar+g+r-i ha sup+ta s+ya pu tra s+ya dwA ra shA yi nI/_/mA tA ni shi pra bud+d+he ba saM rak+Sha Na pa rA b+ha bta/_/bA ri sho tsA pa de she na yA tsa mA na s+ya nirga ma/_/na nirgaM tuM da dau ta s+ya dza na nIsne ha mo hi tA/_/
[\[193a.6\]]grogs po song /_/de nas khyim nang du nyal bu/_/sgo ru nyal ba'i ma yis ni/_/mtshan mo rab tu sad bzhin du/_/kun tu bsrung ba la chags gyur/_/chu yi dag byed zol gyis ni/_/phyir 'byung zhu bar byed pa la/_/mdza' bas rmongs pa'i ma yis ni/_/phyir la 'than pa byin ma gyur/_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]so tsin+ta ya da ho ra mya rA mA rat+na sa mA ga ma/_/ke ne yaM bir+g+hA dza na nI dza na nI ma ma nir+m+mi tA/_/b+ha ger+m+ma dza na kastA bad+Yo ba naM ni d+ha naM ga taH/_/e yaM twa pu N+yaiHkaM kA lI kA la byA lI gr-i he s+thi tA/_/gats+tsha
[\[193b.2\]]des bsams kye ma dga' ba yi/_/bud med rin chen dang 'grogs la/_/gegs ni skyed par byed pa yi/_/bdag gi ma 'di ci yi sbrul/_/re zhig skal bas ma ni bdag_/lang tsho ldan zhing 'tsho bar gyur/_/bsod nams min pas sbrul nag ni/_/'jigs rung ma ni khyim na gnas/_/gnyid dang
[\[193b.3\]]mye tAM sa mul+laM g+h+ya ni trA bi ra hi tAM ya di/_/ta da s+yaHka la hA ma pairdza ni pi pra ti bu d+h+ya te/_/prA yaHk+Sha pA pa ri k+ShI NA dU re kAn+tA ka ro mi kiM/_/su la b+hA b+hA gya hI na s+ya ka thaM sA su b+ha ga ma ma/_/harmyot+sa ga ga tA bi
[\[193b.4\]]bral ma 'di la ni/_/gal te bdag gis 'goms phyin na/_/'di yi 'thab mo'i smra brjod kyis/_/skye bo rnams kyang rab sad gyur/_/mtshan mo phal cha yongs zad cing /_/mdzes ma ring la bdag ci byed/_/skal ba dman pa bdag la ni/_/skal bzang ma de ji ltar mod/_/khang bzang nang du son zhing
[\[193b.5\]]lo ka na ra san+na mrA na nau b+ho ru hA prasta s+ya shra ba Not+pa la s+yan ya nats+tshA yAM di shaM tI pa te/_/tA DaM ka d+yu ti b+hiHka po la yu ga le pa trA ba li bi b+h+ra tIM b+hA gyair+b+ho gya b+hu bi pra ya ti su b+ha gA b+ha bya s+ya sA sun+da rI/_/i ti
[\[193b.6\]]rnam par blta ba'i ro las bzhin gyi chu skyes dud/_/rna ba'i ut+pal lhung bar gyur pas mig gi mdzes pa rna ba dag la ster/_/rna rgyan 'od zer dag gis 'gram pa zung la pa tra'i 'phreng ba rnam par 'dzin/_/mdzes ma de ni legs ldan dag gis skal ba rnams kyis spyad bya'i sa ru 'gyur/_/de ltar
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]tsin+tA tu raM dwA raM yA tsa mA na pu naHpu naH/_/a trai ba kri ya tAM shau tsa mi ti mA tA ta ma bra bIta/_/a tha mA tuHshi rash+tsi twA khaD+ge na pa ya yau dza bAta/_/rA go pa diSh+Ta pA pA nAM ki ma kAR+YaM du rAt+ma nAM/_/rA trA
[\[194a.2\]]bsams pas gzir zhing sgo/_/yang dang yang du slong byed pa/_/de la ma yis 'di nyid du/_/gtsang ba mdzod ces rab tu smras/_/de nas ral gris ma yi mgo/_/bcad nas de ni mgyogs par song /_/chags pa nyer bstan sdig bdag nyid/_/ngan pa rnams la bya min ci/_/mtshan
[\[194a.3\]]ba ga NaM tA yA saHsa ga twA pun+da rI gr-i haM/_/ra haHsaM b+ho ga san+nar+d+hAM big+d+ha mA sa sA da tAM/_/te ta s+yai swa kr-i taM pA pa mA da rA ya ni be da yata/_/te nai ba mUr+khAHsh+la g+h+yan+te ye nai bA yan+ti ni d+ya tAM/_/ta s+ya mA tr-i ba d+ha krU
[\[194a.4\]]mo ngal dub ma rtsis par/_/mdzes ma'i khang par de song nas/_/mkhas shing longs spyod la chas ma/_/da ni dben par yang dag thob/_/de la rang gis byas pa'i sdig_/gus pa'i slad du de yis bshad/_/gang gis smad pa nyid 'gyur ba/_/de nyid kyis ni rmongs pa bsngags/_/ma bsad sdig pa drag po
[\[194a.5\]]ra pA pa shra ba Na kam+bi tA/_/sA pA ka s+ye ba saM spaR+she bi mu khA sA b+ha ba pa raM/_/harmyA d+hi ri ha Na byA dzA ta sA dza gA ma ta dan+ti kAta/_/sA b+hi lA Sho pi pA pA nAM da re Na bi ra dz+ya te/_/uts+tsa harmya sa mA rU D+hA kAn+tA pA pa
[\[194a.6\]]ni/_/thos nas 'dar bar gyur pa de/_/gtum po la bzhin de la ni/_/reg la shin tu phyir phyogs gyur/_/de yi gnas nas khang bzang la/_/'dzeg pa'i zol gyis de song ste/_/sdig pa rnams kyis gus pa yis/_/sred ldan dag kyang chags bral gyur/_/sdig pa las ni phyir phyogs ma/_/de yis bag ma
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]pa rAd+mu khI/_/tsau rash+tsau ro ya mi t+yuts+tsaish+tsu kro sha tsa ki te ba sA/_/pra d+hA bi te pa ri dza ne b+ha ya b+hag+na sa bi dru taH/_/ya yau yA bad+ni dza gr-i haM kr-i ta ka la ha laHshwa b+hiH/_/ha ta me dza na nI tsau rai ri ti tAn+p+ra lA pa bAn/_/
[\[194b.2\]]mthon por 'dzegs/_/'di ni chom rkun chom rkun zhes/_/'jigs pa bzhin du skad cher bsgrags/_/'khor gyi skye bos rgyugs pa'i tshe/_/'jigs pas nyen pa de rab bros/_/ji srid rang gi khyim du song /_/khyi rnams kyis ni ca co byas/_/bdag gi ma ni chom rkun gyis/_/bsad ces skad cher rab smra zhing /_/
[\[194b.3\]]pra b+hA te bi da d+he mA tuHsa sha rI rA di sat+k+ri yA/_/prats+tshan+na pA pa san+tA dag+d+ha mA naHpa tse ta yan/_/su tI bra na ra kA pA taM ba b+hA ma b+hu bi b+hu ta bta/_/prA yash+tsi taM dwi dzaste na pr-iSh+T+waHpA ta bA di nA/_/U tsu mA
[\[194b.4\]]snga dro de yis ma yi ni/_/lus la sogs pa sbyang ba byas/_/rab bsgribs sdig pa'i gdung ba yis/_/sreg cing shin tu mi bzad pa'i/_/dmyal bar lhung ba de bsams te/_/'byung po bzhin du sa la 'khyams/_/sdig pa smra byed de yis ni/_/phyir bcos dris la gnyis skyes kyis/_/smras pa ma
[\[194b.5\]]tr-i ba d+ha krU ra pA ta ke nAsti kr-i tiH/_/a tha dze ta ba naM ga twA ta tra b+hi k+Shu ga Na di taM/_/shu shrU ba d+har+m+mA d+h+ya ya naM sar+b+be pA pa pra shA man/_/d+hI mAn+p+ra bra dzi ta ta tra swa d+h+yA y+ya ni ra taHsa raM/_/ta tas+t+ri pi Ta kA d+h+yA yi sa
[\[194b.6\]]bsad drag po yi/_/sdig pa dag la bcos thabs med/_/de nas rgyal byed tshal song bas/_/der ni dge slong tshogs brjod pa'i/_/sdig pa thams cad nyams byed pa'i/_/chos kyi kha ton rab tu thos/_/der ni blo ldan rab byung ste/_/kha ton dag la mchog tu chags/_/de nas de ni sde snod gsum/_/brjod
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]d+har+m+ma ka thi ko b+ha bta/_/sarba dz+nyo s+ya t+ya b+ha ga bAn b+hik+Shu saM g+ha ma thA bra bIta/_/kiM b+ha bib+b+haHsa pA pA ya pra bra dz+yaisma sa mar+pi tA/_/te na mA tr-i ba d+ha krU kilbi She Na pra mA di naH/_/prat+yA san+nA s+ya paR+Yan+te
[\[195a.2\]]cing chos kyi gtam can gyur/_/de nas kun mkhyen bcom ldan 'das/_/mngon phyogs dge slong tshogs la gsungs/_/sdig can 'di la rab byung ni/_/khyod kyis ci slad yang dag byin/_/ma bsad drag por gyur pa yi/_/sdig pa de yis bag med 'di/_/mjug tu mnar med tshe
[\[195a.3\]]tap+tA bI tsau tsi ra s+thi tiH/_/u k+to b+ha ga ba te ne ti so byu pA d+h+yA tAM ga taH/_/kA le na kA la paR+Yan+te g+ho ra na ra ka mAp+ta bAn/_/ta trA bI tsi ba yo daM bat+tI bra ba h+ni shi khA sha taiH/_/pa ts+yA nash+tsi raM tsakra sa khe
[\[195a.4\]]bar ni/_/yun ring gnas la rab tu nye/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de gsungs tshe/_/de yang mkhan po nyid du gyur/_/dus kyis dus kyi mjug tu ni/_/'jigs su rung ba'i dmyal ba thob/_/der ni mnar med tshogs 'khrungs pa/_/mi bzad me lce brgya phrag gis/_/yun ring 'tshed par byed cing des/_/
[\[195a.5\]]daM na ra ko ka ra pAM/_/ko pAn+na ra ka pA le namud+ga rA g+hA ta tsUN+Na taH/_/sa tsi rAt+p+ra pa pA pAg+ni pa ri pa kwa ta nuHk+Sha yaM/_/tsA tur+m+ma hA rA dzi ke Shu so tha de be Sh+wa dzA yata/_/pra bra dz+yA yAHpra b+hA ba na di byA b+ha ra Na
[\[195a.6\]]dmyal ba'i gnas ni skyo bar byas/_/dmyal srung rab tu khros pa yis/_/tho bas brdungs shing phye mar btags/_/de yis ring nas sdig pa yi/_/me yis yongs smin lus zad thob/_/de nas de ni rab byung gi_/mthu yis rgyal po chen po dag_/bzhi pa yi ni lha rnams su/_/lha yi rgyan gyis
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]b+hU Shi taH/_/a tha sa bi ma la ma lA mau li ke yU ra ha ra pra pr-i ta ma Ni ma yU khol+li khya mA nAd+b+hu shrIH/_/a ga ma da ma ra ga myo ban+d+ra nA yen+du kAn+tiH su ga ta ma nu ga tA b+hir+b+hA dza mA naHpra b+hA b+hiH/_/tat+pA da pad+ma yu
[\[195b.2\]]brgyan par skyes/_/de nas dri med 'phreng ba cod pan dpung rgyan do shal las/_/rab 'phros nor bu'i 'od kyis rmad byung dpal ni 'dri byed cing /_/lha yis bsten bya rjes 'brang 'od kyis rab mdzes zla ba ltar/_/mdzes pa de ni bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal slad du song /_/de yi zhabs kyi pad+mo zung
[\[195b.3\]]ga mA da ra ban+di na nod+Ya dA nan+da pun+da ra bi bud+d+ha mu khA ra bin+daH/_/d+har+m+mo pa de sha ka tha yai ba ba b+hu ba shAstu tun+m+r-i ShA mA na sa i bA shu sa dr-iSh+Ta sat+yaH/_/dIr+g+ho pa b+ho ga ga li ta bya ba na s+ya kA le pA pa dra do Sha ti
[\[195b.4\]]la gus pas phyag 'tshal te/_/kun dga' 'phel zhing mdzes pa'i bzhin gyi pad+mo rnam par rgyas/_/ston pa'i chos kyi yang dag gtam gyis de ni myur nyid du/_/bden pa mthong zhing yid ni rab tu phyis pa bzhin du gyur/_/sdig pa mtshan mo'i rab rib nye bar zhi ba'i dus su ni/_/yun ring nye bar
[\[195b.5\]]mi ro Sha ti ro pha ra me dza na s+ya/_/i t+yA ta no ti bi ma lA su kr-ita pra b+hA ta be lA bi shA la ku sha lA ti sha ya pra kA sham/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM nA ra ka pUr+b+ba ba kA ba dA
[\[195b.6\]]spyad pas sdug bsngal nyams pa'i skye bo la/_/legs byas snga dro'i dus ni dri ma med cing yangs pa yi/_/dge ba phul byung snang ba de ltar kun tu rgyas par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dmyal ba
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]naM d+p+ya shI ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//gar+b+has+thi ta s+ya ni ta s+ya pr-i ta s+ya ta taHshash+tsa yU naHsha naiHs+tha bi ra tA ma tha sraM shri ta s+ya/_/nA sau tsa la t+ya tu la kA ga dzod+d+h+r-i ta s+ya
[\[196a.2\]]sngon ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//mngal du gnas dang skye dang de nas byis pa dag dang ni/_/dar bab de nas dal gyis rgan po nyid la brten gyur pa/_/skye bo mtshungs med dus kyi glang pos phyung ba dag
[\[196a.3\]]dzaM tor+m+r-iNA la ka la yA ki la kar+m+ma tan+tuH/_/shud+d+ho da ne na b+ha ga bAn b+hag+t+yA pUrbaM ni man+t+ri taH/_/b+hik+Shu b+hiHsa ha tash+tsakre ta sa b+ho dz+ya pra ti gra haM/_/b+huk+tot+ta ra ma thA pI naHpra yan+naHpr-i thi bI pa
[\[196a.4\]]gi ni/_/las skud 'di ni pad skud tshul gyis nges par g.yo mi 'gyur/_/zas gtsang gis ni gus pas sngon/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mgron du gnyer/_/dge slong rnams dang bcas pa yis/_/de yi zas ni rab bzhes mdzad/_/de nas gsol rjes rab dang des/_/bzhugs te sa yi bdag
[\[196a.5\]]teH/_/a nu gra he Na bi da d+he pa shud+d+hAn+d+hAr+m+ma de sha nAM/_/ta tra tad+k+Sha Na dr-iSh+To pi shi shu nA rA hu le na saH/_/b+hik+Shu ma d+h+ye pa ri dz+nyA ya mo da ke nA tsI taHsi tA/_/b+ha ga ban+taM k+Sha Ne tasme pra Na tAHsar+b+ba b+haM k+Sha baH/_/bA la
[\[196a.6\]]po la/_/rjes su bzung bas dag pa yi/_/chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/_/der ni de dus mthong ba la/_/byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis de/_/dge slong dbus su yongs shes nas/_/yab ni la du dag gis mchod/_/de yi dus na bcom ldan la/_/byis pa gus pa mthong gyur nas/_/rab dud
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]pra Na ya mA lokya pa prats+tshuHsa ku tA ha lAH/_/Shad+b+hir+b+baR+Shai ra yaM dzA taHshi shuHkuk+Shi ni pI Di taH/_/ke na kar+m+ma bi pA ke na pra ti bim+ba ba pusta ba/_/b+hu ya sA gar+b+hA re Na pa ri d+hU tA di pA ni shaM/_/pI DA tsi
[\[196b.2\]]dge slong thams cad ni/_/dge mtshan dag dang ldan pas dris/_/las kyi rnam smin ci zhig pa/_/khyod kyi gzugs can lus ldan pa'i/_/byis pa 'di ni lo drug dag_/dku ru nges par bsdams te skyes/_/ci slad lha mo grags 'dzin ma/_/nyin dang mtshan mor mngal gyi khur/_/shin tu che bas
[\[196b.3\]]ra ta ra se he kasmAd+de bI ya sho d+ha rA/_/sar+b+ba dz+nyo b+ha ga bAn+p+riSh+TaHpra Na yA di ti b+hik+Shu b+hiH/_/tA nu bA tsak+Sha Na d+h+yA twA shru ya tA ma tra kA ra NaM/_/mi thi lA yAm+ba de he Shu puSh+pa de ba s+ya b+hU pa teH/_/sUR+Ya tsan+d+ra
[\[196b.4\]]yongs mnan cing /_/shin tu yun ring gdung bas bsten/_/dge slong rnams kyis gus pas ni/_/bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen la dris/_/skad cig bsams nas de dag la/_/gsungs pa 'dir ni rgyu dag nyon/_/lus 'phags kyi ni mi thi lar/_/sa bdag me tog lha la ni/_/nyi ma zla ba
[\[196b.5\]]b+hi d+hau pu trau pu N+ya shI lau b+hU ba tuH/_/pi ta ri tri di baM yA ti tau ta po ba na sa spr-i hau/_/sA ma rA dz+ya b+hA ra gra ha No mi thash+tsakra tu nar+tha nAM/_/rA dz+ya sUR+Ye Na bai rAgyAt+sar+b+ba thai ba sa mudz+dz+yi taM/_/tsan+d+ra ka thaM tsidz+dza grA
[\[196b.6\]]zhes pa yi/_/bsod nams ngang tshul bu gnyis byung /_/yab ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe/_/de dag dka' thub nags 'dod ldan/_/rgyal srid chen po'i khur 'dzin la/_/phan tshun zhu ba rab tu byas/_/rnam pa kun tu chags bral bas/_/nyi mas btang ba'i rgyal srid ni/_/phu bo'i bka' yis bsdams
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]ha dz+yaSh+Tha shA sa na yan+t+ri taH/_/sUR+Yastu ga twA rA dzaR+ShaHsha ma sh+lA g+h+yaM ta po ba naM/_/saM to Sha rA dz+ya su khi tash+tsakre ci ra ta ra ta paH/_/sa ka dA tsit+pa ri shrAn+taHsan+tap+tastI bra tr-iSh+Na yA/_/ka maN+Da luM dza
[\[197a.2\]]pa yis/_/zla bas ji zhig ltar stes bzung /_/rgyal po'i drang srong nyi ma de/_/zhi dge dka' thub tshal song nas/_/chog shes rgyal srid bde ba yis/_/shin tu yun ring dka' thub byas/_/nam zhig yongs su ngal gyur cing /_/skom pa drag pos gdungs pa de/_/thub pa yi ni bum
[\[197a.3\]]laM mo hA da nuk+tai ba pa pau mu neH/_/sa sa dzA tasmr-i tir+b+bid+d+hA na dat+tA dA na bA ta kaM/_/ka la gan+m+lA na ba da naHpash+tsat+to pA da tsin+ta yata/_/kar+m+ma pA sha saM mA kaR+Sha bi ba shaiHsa ma bA Sh+ya te/_/a ni sh+tsa ye ba su kr-i taM
[\[197a.4\]]pa'i chu/_/rmongs las ma brjod nyid du 'thungs/_/dran pa skyes nas mkhas pa des/_/ma byin len ni sdig pa la/_/rtog cing bzhin ni log gyur pas/_/'gyod pa las ni rab tu bsams/_/las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs/_/dbang med lus can rnams kyis ni/_/mi 'dod bzhin du legs byas
[\[197a.5\]]duHkr-i taM ba sha rI ri b+hiH/_/dza naHshu b+h+re s+yasmin+su kr-i ta tsi ri te duHkr-i ta ka NaM ni d+hat+te ye na sau ma li na ba da naHsho tsa ti ta raM/_/spr-i hA ni k+Ship+tA nAM k+Sha Ni b+ha ba su khe duHkha ni tsa ye pra bi sh+yAn+taHsho ShaM di sha ti sha
[\[197a.6\]]sam/_/nyes byas dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/skye bo legs byas spyod cing dkar ba 'dir yang nyes byas dag gi cha/_/'dzin 'di gang gi bzhin ras dri ma can 'di mchog tu gdung bar byed/_/skad cig srid pa'i bde ba sdug bsngal tshogs la chags pas 'phangs rnams la/_/lo 'dab brgya ldan phra rgyas
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]ta shA kho h+ya nu sha yaH/_/gats+tsha mi nr-i pa te ra gre pA pa mA de ba yA mya haM/_/rA dza sha sA na shud+d+hA nA ma nr-i No d+har+m+ma pany+tsa yaH/_/shAs+t+raM d+harma pra br-it+tA nAM ro gAr+t+tA nAM tsikit+sa kaH/_/bar+N+Na shra ma gu
[\[197b.2\]]nang du zhugs te gdung ba ster bar byed/_/mi bdag sngon du bdag phyin la/_/sdig pa bdag gis brjod par bya/_/rgyal po'i bka' yis dag pa rnams/_/bu lon med pa'i chos kyi tshogs/_/nad kyis gzir rnams sman pas gso/_/chos la zhugs rnams bstan bcos kyis/_/sdig las can rnams
[\[197b.3\]]rurna tA nr-i pa tiHpA pa kar+m+ma NAM/_/sa bi tsin+t+yi ti san+tA pAta b+hU pa te b+h+rA tu ran+te kaM/_/ga twA n+ya be da yat+tur+N+NaM ma dat+tA dA na pA ta kaM/_/dz+yaSh+ThaM b+hA ta ra ma b+h+yar+ts+tsA taM b+hU mi pa ti ra bra bItra/_/A dzan+ma shud+d+ha b+hA ba s+ya na pA
[\[197b.4\]]mi bdag ni/_/rigs gnas lugs ldan bla ma yi/_/zhes bsams yongs su gdung ba yis/_/sa bdag spun zla'i drung du ni/_/phyin nas de yis myur bar ni/_/ma byin blangs pa'i sdig pa smras/_/spun zla thu bo mngon mchod de/_/de la sa bdag gis smras pa/_/skyes nas dag pa'i dngos gyur pa/_/khyod
[\[197b.5\]]paM bi d+ya te ta ba/_/su sU k+Sha ma pi yaHkr-i twA dai bIt+gaM tsi tA sAM prA taM/_/pash+tsat+tA paM ba ha t+yan+tA ta s+ya sai ba bi shud+d+ha ta/_/i ti k+Shi ti pa ter+b+bA d+yaM shru twA sUR+Yasta ma b+h+ya d+hAtra/_/ka laM ka le shaM na sa he sad+d+har+m+mA d+ha ba lAM ke/_/daN+Da
[\[197b.6\]]la sdig pa yod ma yin/_/rigs min shin tu phra ba yang /_/ji zhig ltar stes gang byas pa/_/nang du rjes su gdung ba 'dzin/_/de nyid de yi rnam dag nyid/_/ces pas bdag tshig thos nas/_/nyi mas de la rab smras pa/_/dam pa'i chos ni dkar ba yi/_/gos la dri ma'i cha mi bzod/_/rgyal po
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]me bAn+d+hA ye rA dzan pu bi tsAR+Ya bi d+hi ya tAM/_/pU ya te pA bA ke ne ba rA dza daN+De na kilbi ShI/_/i t+yA gra h+ye Na ba hu sho yA tsa mA naM swa shA sa naM/_/ta mu bA tsA nu dzo rA dzo prA taHkar+t+tAsmi yat+k+Sha maM/_/asmin
[\[198a.2\]]chad pa bdag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu dpyad nas bsgrub par mdzod/_/dag byed kyis bzhin rgyal po yi/_/chad pas sdig can gtsang bar 'gyur/_/zhes de 'bad pas lan mang du/_/rang gi chad pa don gnyer ba/_/de la nu bo rgyal pos smras/_/nang par bdag gis gang bzod bya/_/re zhig
[\[198a.3\]]pra tI k+Sha tA bad+b+ha bA nu d+yA nu kA na ne/_/i t+yuk+t+wA pau ra kAR+YA ya niR+Ya yau br-i thi bI pa tiH/_/ta tra pra tI k+Sha mA Ne tha mu nau ni ya mA nish+tsa le/_/rA dzA bismr-i ta tat+k+r-i t+yaHShaD+b+hi ra b+h+yA ya yau di naiH/_/kr-i shA kA ran+ni rA hA ra ma tha dr-iSh+TA gra
[\[198a.4\]]khyod ni skyed tshal gyi/_/nags 'di nyid du gnas par mdzod/_/ces brjod grong pa'i bya ba la/_/sa yi bdag po phyi rol song /_/de nas der ni thub pa dag_/nges par g.yo med gnas pa'i tshe/_/rgyal po de yi bya ba brjed/_/nyi ma drug nas mngon par 'ongs/_/de nas rgyal po phu bo ni/_/zas med rid pa'i rnam
[\[198a.5\]]dzaM nr-i paH/_/nin+dan+s+wa bud+d+hi sam+mo haM tsakra tas+ya pra pA da naM/_/brAh+ma NaiHsa hi ta kr-i swA sa tat+pA pa pra mAr+dz+dza naM/_/ShaD+Din kle sha dA ne na ya te tasmin+na ta s+ya taH/_/a haM sa sUR+Yo rA dzAR+Shish+tsan+d+ro rA dzA pya yaM shi bu/_/dzA taHsaM bat+sa raiHShaD+b+hiHShi Da
[\[198a.6\]]pa mthong /_/kun rmongs rang gi blo smod cing /_/de la rab tu dang bar bya/_/de ni bram ze dang bcas pas/_/de yi sdig pa dag byas nas/_/nyin drug nyon mongs byin pa yis/_/de song tshe na rab tu gdungs/_/nga nyid rgyal po'i drang srong nyi/_/byis pa 'di yang rgyal po zla/_/nyin drug thub pa nyon mongs par/_/byas
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]na kle sha kr-id+mu naH/_/A b+hI ra b+hAR+YA b+ha drA khyA ha ri N+ya su ta yA sa haH/_/na ga rA b+hi mu khI br-id+d+hA ta kraM bi kretu mA ya yau/_/tat+su tA ta ru NI b+hA ra ni dza gu ru ta raM b+ha Ta/_/da twA dza na n+yai br-id+d+hA yai la g+huM dza gra hi ta g+ha TaM/_/bA hi trAM yo dza
[\[198b.2\]]pas lo drug dag nas skyes/_/bzang mo zhes bya ba rdzi mo/_/rgan mo grong khyer la phyogs te/_/bu mo ri dgas mo dag dang /_/'grogs nas dar ba 'tshong du song /_/de yi bu mo dar bab mas/_/rang gi bum pa rab lci ba/_/ma rgan dag la byin nas ni/_/de yi bum pa yang ba bzung /_/ma ni rgan zhing nyam
[\[198b.3\]]naM sAr+d+haM dza na nI dza ra tI kr-i shA/_/sA du hi trA pu ro pan+te pa ri shran+ti ta rA b+ha bta/_/a b+hI ra ta ru NI se ShaM ma tuHkle shAt+Ya sho d+ha rA/_/ShaT+k+ro sha tu mya baR+She Na gar+b+ha b+hA re Na pI Di tA/_/di bi b+hu bi pha Ni lo ke shai
[\[198b.4\]]chung de/_/bu mos dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/_/btang bas grong khyer nye ba ni/_/shin tu yongs su ngal bar gyur/_/grags 'dzin ma ni ba rdzi yi/_/bu mo ma yi nyon mongs las/_/rgyang grags drug mtshungs lo dag ni/_/mngal gyi khur gyis gzir bar gyur/_/mtho ris sa dang gdengs can 'jig
[\[198b.5\]]sha pA yo ba ne bA dza ra si ni d+hi na kA le gar+b+ha shay+YA shra ye bA/_/sa ha gam na sa hiSh+ToHsar+b+ba thA de ha b+hA dzaM na hi b+ha ba ti bi nA shaHkar+m+ma NaHprAk+ta na s+ya/_/i ti rA hu la pUr+b+ba kar+m+ma yuk+tA ka thi tA tsi tra ka thA ta
[\[198b.6\]]rten byis dang lang tsho dang /_/rgan dang 'chi dus mngal gyi mal stan la brten dag la yang /_/lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi sngon gyi las ni lhan cig tu/_/'gro ba 'dod pa rnam pa kun tu brlag par 'ong mi 'gyur/_/de ltar sgra gcan 'dzin ni sngon gyi las ldan pa/_/ngo mtshar gtam ni de bzhin gshegs
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]thA ga te na/_/a ba d+hArma ba b+hU ba b+hik+Shu saM g+haHk+Shi ti pA laHsa dza nash+tsa bisma yA D+h+yaH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM rA hu la kar+m+ma p+lu t+ya ba dA naM t+r+ya
[\[199a.2\]]pas gsungs pa dag_/nges par bzung nas dge slong tshogs dang sa skyong dang /_/skye bo dang bcas ya mtshan rab tu rgyas par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sgra gcan 'dzin gyi rtogs pa
[\[199a.3\]]shI ti ma maHpal+la paH//_//au tsi t+yan+ti ka ro ti yaHsu mA nan sAr+d+raM ma naHkrU rA nA ma pi shIR+Ya te pa ra tsi taM ya s+yA nu b+hA bAt+ta maH/_/e kaHko pi sa dzA ya
[\[199a.4\]]brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//gang gis legs pa'i yid can rnams kyis yid ni kun dga' mnyan ldan rig par byed/_/gang gi mthu yis gdug rnams kyi yang yongs su 'dris pa'i mun pa zhi bar byed/_/gang gi bsod nams grangs med
[\[199a.5\]]tedzi ta dza gan+nA tha sa b+hA bod+b+ha baHpu N+yaM ya pya na yA ti mA na ka la nAM niHsaM khya pa deH/_/shrI man+pu ra su d+hI ra s+ya shrA bas+t+yAM gr-i ta me d+ha niH/_/dzA yA yA mis+si taHsU nuHsu ne trA yA ma dzA yata/_/dzA ta mA traHsa
[\[199a.6\]]grangs kyi tshig gi tshad kyi yul du mi 'gyur ba/_/'gro ba thul ba'i mgon po rab rgyas mthu ldan de nyid gcig pu 'byung ba yin/_/mnyan yod du sngon khyim na gnas/_/dpal ldan shin tu brtan pa yi/_/chung ma mig bzang ma dag la/_/'dod pa'i bu ni btsas par gyur/_/skyes pa tsam na rab
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]mud+b+hU te di bya rat+na bi b+hU Shi te/_/u pa biSh+TaHswa pu N+yAM ke bya rA dza ti/_/ta s+ya dzan+ma ni rat+na ni puSh+paiHsa ha sa yo d+ha rA/_/ma d+hu rasnig ni r+g+ho ShA ba br-iSh+Ter+m+ma d+hu biR+Shi NaH/_/pur+N+NaHku mA rAHkau be
[\[199b.2\]]'khrungs pa/_/lha yi rin chen gyis brgyan pa'i/_/khri stan rang gi bsod nams kyis/_/mtshan la gang zhig nyer 'khod mdzes/_/da skyes tshe na chu 'dzin ni/_/snyan zhing 'jam pa'i sgra dbyangs can/_/sbrang rtsi 'bebs pas me tog dang /_/bcas pa'i rin chen char pa phab/_/rdzogs pa'i gzhon nu lus ngan
[\[199b.3\]]raiHse ni d+h+yA shA tair+p+rA dak+ShiH/_/ma d+hu br-iSh+Ta pra pA ta nAta ma d+hu ra swa ra i t+ya b+h+yAta/_/te nAd ri dra tAM nI te b+hu ba ne rat+na baR+Shi NA/_/shwe taHkA ka i ba kwA pi nai bA dr-i sh+ya ta yA tsa kaH/_/sa ka dA tsid+g+r-i hA yA taM pra shAn+teR+YA
[\[199b.4\]]gyis/_gter ni brgya yis bskor ba de/_/sbrang rtsi'i char pa phab pa las/_/sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur/_/rin chen char 'bebs de yis ni/_/sa la dbul ba med nyid bsgrubs/_/gang du'ang bya rog dkar po bzhin/_/slong ba po ni mthong ma gyur/_/nam zhig dge slong kun dga' bo//rab zhi
[\[199b.5\]]pa tha s+thi taM/_/A nan+daM b+hik+Shu ma lo ka pa prats+tsha pi ta raM pu raH/_/tA ta bra ta bi she Sho s+ya kor+b+haM bi ma l+ya sha li naH/_/ya s+ya san+daR+sha ne nai ba ma naHpa d+yaHpra pA da ti/_/pu tra s+ye ti ba tsaHshru twA su d+hI rasta ma b+h+na Shata/_/
[\[199b.6\]]'phags pa'i lam gnas pa/_/khyim du byon pa de mthong nas/_/mdun du pha la rab dris pa/_/yab gcig dri med dge ba can/_/'di yi brtul zhugs 'di ni ci/_/gang zhig yang dag mthong nyid na/_/'phral la yid ni dang bar byed/_/ces pa bu yi tshig thos nas/_/shin tu brtan pas de la smras/_/
[\[199a.7\]]gter ni brgya yis bskor ba de zhes pa'i skad dod chad pa 'dar los bsgrigs pa slar rgya dpe rnyed na zhus dag byed/
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]pu tra sa twa pra kA sho yaM shAn+ti bra ta pa ri gra haH/_/yaHse tuHpa ra laHsa masta dza ga tAM saM sA ra g+ho rAr+N+Na be kro d+ha bya d+hi tsa kit+sa kaHsha ma su d+hA sA re Na tr-iSh+Na pa haH/_/do Shot+sik+ta ta mo bi
[\[200a.2\]]bu gcig snying stobs rab gsal 'di/_/zhi ba'i brtul zhugs yongs su 'dzin/_/gang zhig 'khor ba'i mtsho la mtha' dag 'gro ba'i zam stegs drang po dang /_/khro ba'i nad kyis gso byed dag dang zhi ba'i bdud rtsi'i snying pos sred 'phrog dang /_/skyon gyi tshogs kyi mun pa
[\[200a.3\]]rA ma ta ra Nirbud+d+haHpra bud+d+ha d+yu tista s+ya shrA ba ka e Sha shAn+ta ma nA sA mA nan+da nA mA gra NIH/_/a b+hi d+hA naM b+ha ga ba taHshru twai ba ma d+hu ra swa raH/_/ba b+hU bod+d+hu ta ro mAny+tsa prAg+dzan+mA ku sha lo da yAta/_/A nan+da ma tha sA nan+daH
[\[200a.4\]]zhi byed nyi ma sangs rgyas 'od zer rab rgyas pa/_/de yi nyan thos zhi ba'i yid can rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di ni kun dga' bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon brjod dag_/thos pa nyid ni sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs/_/sngar skye dge ba rgyas pa las/_/ba spu rab tu langs par gyur/_/de nas kun dga' dang bcas des/_/
[\[200a.5\]]pra Na mya pra Na yon+mu khaH/_/sa b+hik+Shu saM g+haiHsa hi taM sar+b+ba b+ho gai ra pU dza yata/_/aut+su kyAt+sa ha te nai ba ga twA dze ta ba nan+ta taH/_/da daR+sha twi ShAM rA shiM b+ha ga ban+taM ta thA ga ta/_/phul+la pad+ma pa lA
[\[200a.6\]]gus pas mngon phyogs phyag 'tshal te/_/dge slong tshogs bcas kun dga' bo/_/longs spyod kun gyis rab tu mchod/_/de nas 'dun pas de nyid dang /_/lhan cig rgyal byed tshal song nas/_/'od zer phung po bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong gyur te/_/pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa'i
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]shAM de byA lak+Sha Na lak+Shi taM/_/lA ba N+ya la li tA kA raM he ma tA la mi ban+na taM/_/lem+pan+ta ma mr-i ta ne ba taM dr-iSh+TA haR+Sha nir+b+ha raH/_/mA lA mi bA da de mU r+d+hI pa tat+pI da na kha d+yu tiM/_/pra Na yAr+tha na yA ta s+ya prI
[\[200b.2\]]spyan/_/mchog gi mtshan nyid dag gis mtshan/_/mdzes shing yid 'ong rnam pa can/_/gser gyi ta la bzhin du mtho/_/bdud rtsis byugs pa lta bu ste/_/mthong nas dga' ba rab rgyas pa/_/de yi spyi bor 'phreng ba bzhin/_/de yi zhabs sen 'od zer blangs/_/'bad pas gsol ba btab pa yis/_/
[\[200b.3\]]t+yai pra NA yi bat+sa laH/_/ga twA tsa kA ra b+ha ga bAn gr-i he b+ho ge pra ti gra haM/_/a b+h+yats+tsi te b+ha ga ba ti pra yA te dze ta kA na naM/_/dza na tAM rat+na saM pUr+NA tsa kA ra ma d+hu ra swa ra/_/ni dze pu N+yairna swA
[\[200b.4\]]gus la mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das/_/de slad de yi khang par byon/_/mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mngon mchod nas/_/rgyal byed tshal du gshegs pa'i tshe/_/skye bo'i tshogs ni rin chen gyis/_/sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis yongs rdzogs byas/_/dbul po rnams kyi
[\[200b.5\]]nA rat+na rA shir+g+r-i ho gr-i he/_/tad+bi tir+N+NaHk+Sha Ne nai ba dza gA mAM gA ra rA shi tAM/_/tad+b+r-it+tAM ta ma thA gar+N+N+ya duHkha to ma d+hu ra swa raH/_/tA nu ba tsa pu rA nai pa b+ha bad+b+hiHsu kr-i taM kr-i taM/_/a da twA da ya yA dA na
[\[200b.6\]]khyim khyim du/_/rang gi bsod nams ma yin pas/_/rin chen phung po des byin pa/_/skad cig nyid kyis sol phung gyur/_/de nas byung tshul de thos nas/_/sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs ni sdug bsngal zhing /_/de dag la smras khyod kyis sngon/_/legs byas dag ni yongs ma byas/_/brtse bas sbyin pa ma byin zhing /_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]ma kr-i twA saM g+ha pU dza naM/_/b+ha ga ban+ta ma na b+h+ya ts+ts+ya na la b+h+yan+te bi b+hu ta yaH/_/su ga ta pra mu khaH saM g+hastasmAd+YuSh+mA b+ha ra ts+ya tAM/_/sar+b+bo ba b+ho ga sA ma grI ma haM saM pA da yA mi baH/_/i
[\[201a.2\]]dge 'dun mchod pa ma byas la/_/bcom ldan mngon par ma mchod pas/_/'byor pa 'di dag thog ma yin/_/de slad khyod kyis bde gshegs la/_/sogs pa'i dge 'dun mngon par mchod/_/khyod la longs spyod dag gi tshogs/_/thams cad bdag gis phun tshogs bgyi/_/zhes pa
[\[201a.3\]]ti te pre ri tAste na saM b+hA rai ta du pA kr-i taiH/_/sa saM g+ha ma hA saHshAn+t+yai b+ha ga ban+ta ma pU dza yata/_/ta ta ste kr-i ta ka l+yA NAM stad+k+Sha Nak+ShI Na kat+sa ShAH/_/da dr-i shuHswa gr-i haM dI praiHsa pUr+N+NaM rat+na rA shi b+hiH/_/ta taHpra bud+d+ha bai rA
[\[201a.4\]]des bskul de dag gis/_/de yi nyer bsgrubs tshogs rnams kyis/_/bcom ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_/sdig pa zhi ba'i slad du mchod/_/de nas de tshe dge ba byas/_/sdig pa zad pa de dag gis/_/rang khyim rab 'bar rin chen gyi/_/phung pos kun tu gang ba mthong /_/de nas chags bral sad
[\[201a.5\]]gyaHpra shAn+t+yai ma d+hu ra swa raH/_/pra bra dz+yA mA da de d+hi mAn ga twA b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/_/sa shAstuHshA sA nAt+t+yak+t+wA shra bstIM ni ya ta bra taH/_/dza gA ma dza na paR+Yan+ta bi hA raM kAr+b+ba Ta shwa TA shra yaM/_/dat+ta shik+Sha pa
[\[201a.6\]]pa yi/_/blo dang ldan pa sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung song nas/_/rab tu zhi slad rab byung blangs/_/ston pa'i bka' yis dul ba yi/_/brtul zhugs can gyis mnyan yod btang /_/skye bo'i mtha' yi gtsug lag khang /_/ri brag dag la brten par song /_/der des bslab pa'i
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]daste na ta tra kAr+b+ba Ti ko dza naH/_/rat+na tra yaM kle sha bi Sha pra shAn+t+yai sha ra NaM ya yau/_/asmin+na ba sa re tsau raHkA na nAM taHni bA si naH/_/uk+taM durgo pa hA ya na ra map+deSh+Tu mu d+ya yuH/_/te taM bi hA ra mA sa
[\[201b.2\]]gnas byin pa/_/ri brag pa yi skye bo rnams/_/nyon mongs dug ni rab zhi'i slad/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song /_/gnas skabs der ni chom rkun pa/_/nags kyi mtha' na gnas pa rnams/_/dur ga'i ya stags khas blangs pa'i/_/mi ni tshol ba dag la zhugs/_/phra ma can gyis rab bstan
[\[201b.3\]]d+ya pi shu ne na pra daR+shi taM/_/ba ban+d+hur+b+hik+Shu saM g+hA taM gaN+DI shap+da sa mA ga taM/_/e ke e bo pa hA rA ya b+hik+Shu rasmA ka mip+si taH/_/i t+yuk+ta tsau ra tsakre Na dza ga dur+b+hik+Sha baHkra mAta/_/ma mA dA yo
[\[201b.4\]]pa'i/_/gtsug lag khang der de dag 'ongs/_/gaN+DI'i sgra la 'dus pa yi/_/dge slong dge 'dun tshogs rnams bcings/_/ya stags slad du dge slong ni/_/gcig nyid kho na bdag cag 'dod/_/chom rkun tshogs kyis 'di brjed tshe/_/dge slong rnams kyis rim pas smras/_/ya stags don du
[\[201b.5\]]ma hA rAr+thaM mu ts+ya tAM sar+b+ba b+hik+Sha baH/_/uk+te br-id+d+heHkra me Ne ti pro bA tsa ma d+hu ra swa raH/_/a ha me bo pa hA rar+haHsaM g+haHsar+b+ba bi mu ts+ya tAM/_/i t+ya kar+N+N+ya ba rA kA ba rAM te sa mA dA ma taM yaH/_/bad+d+haHma ma
[\[201b.6\]]bdag zung la/_/dge slong thams cad btang bar mdzod/_/ces pa rgan rim gyis brjod cing /_/sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab smras pa/_/nga nyid kho na ya stags don/_/dge 'dun thams cad rnam par thong /_/zhes pa thos nas de dag gis/_/rnam pa mchog ldan de bzung song /_/gsod par chas pa
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]ba d+ha san+nad+d+hai nI tastairnirbi kA ra d+hIH/_/durgA ya ta na ma t+yu gram da daR+sha ga ha no da re/_/ba li sak+tI kr-i teHs+thu la sha ka lairmA hi Shaish+tsa tata/_/kalpAn+ta me g+haiHsam+ba to pa hA rai ri ba pU dzi taM/_/byAp+taM
[\[202a.2\]]de dag gis/_/bcings khyer rnam 'gyur blo med des/_/durga'i gnas ni nags nang du/_/shin tu 'jigs su rung ba mthong /_/de yang dus mtha'i sprin gyis bzhin/_/gtor ma la ni bstar byas pa'i/_/ma he sre bo rags pa yi/_/rtag tu ya stags dag gis gang /_/dpa'
[\[202a.3\]]pA da shi lA sak+ta ru ru rak+tats+tsha TA sha taiH/_/sug+dA ma b+hir+b+ha Tit+p+raSh+Taban+d+hu dzI ba ma yai rib/_/g+haN+TA shol+lam+bi b+hir+b+bI ra shi ro b+hiHpa ri bA ri taM/_/kr-i ta dwA rAts+tsha ni phul+la ka ma lai ri ba mr-i t+yu nA/_/pra t+ya gra na ra
[\[202a.4\]]bos ban du dzi ba yi/_/rang bzhin me tog 'phreng spos bzhin/_/ru ru'i khrag gi zer ma brgya/_/zhabs kyi rdo la chags pas khyab/_/gshin rjes me tog rgyas pa yi/_/sgo la mchod pa byas pa bzhin/_/dril bu'i sngon du 'phyang ba yi/_/dpa' bo'i mgo yis yongs su bskor/_/ri khrod ma yi rkang
[\[202a.5\]]rak+tA rak+taiHso pA nai ra ru Na pra b+haM/_/sha ba rI tsa ra Na n+yA sa saM sak+tA lak+ta kai ri ba/_/a saM prAp+to pa hA rA b+hiHki rA tas+t+rI b+hi rA da rAta/_/swa shi shud+k+r-it+ta hr-it+pad+ma kIr+N+Na praM ga Na be di kaM/_/taM dr-iSh+T+wA prA Ni saM g+hA taM
[\[202a.6\]]bkod pas/_/sen rtsi rab tu chags pa bzhin/_/mi khrag gsar pas bsgos pa yi/_/bkas dag gis ni dmar ba'i 'od/_/ya stags ma thob rngon pa yi/_/bud med rnams kyis gus pa yis/_/rang gi bu bcad snying gi ni/_/pad+mas khyams kyi kha khyer bkang /_/de mthong srog chags rnams
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bai sha sA ya sa duHsa haM/_/ud+be ga sA raM saM sA ra pra da d+h+yau ma d+hu ra swa raH/_/ta taHsA k+Shat+k+r-i tAr+ha twaH sar+b+ba kle sha pa ri k+Sha yAta/_/trai d+hA tu ko bI ta rA gaH sau b+hUt+tu l+ya pri yA pri
[\[202b.2\]]kyi tshogs/_/sdug bsngal ngal dub bzod dka' zhing /_/'khor ba chags bral snying po can/_/sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bsams/_/de nas nyon mongs thams cad ni/_/yongs zad dgra bcom mngon du byas/_/khams gsum pa las chags bral de/_/dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs
[\[202b.3\]]yaH/_/so tsin+ta ya da ho shAstuHpra b+ha bo yaM b+ha bats+tshi daH/_/prAp+to haM yat+p+ra pa de na niHsa sA ra su khAM b+hu baM/_/mo hash+tsin+no ni ba Di ni ga taHkhaN+Di tA dr-iSh+Ta she lastIk+Sh+Na tr-iSh+NA bi Sha ma ta Ti nI prod+d+h+r-i tA dzan+ma br-ik+ShAH/_/
[\[202b.4\]]par gyur/_/de bsams gang gi drin gyis ni/_/'khor ba med pa bde ba'i sa/_/kye ma bdag gis thob pa 'di/_/ston pa srid pa gcod pa'i mthu/_/rmongs pa'i lcags sgrog brtan pa gcod cing lta ba'i ri mo nyams par byed/_/mi bzad sred pa'i chu bo sgrol zhing skye ba'i ljon pa rab tu 'byin/_/
[\[202b.5\]]prap+ta twA ma bya sa na sha ma naM tat+p+ra sA de na shAstuR+Yasmin+pASh+saM da d+ha ti na pu naHsho tsa nA lo tsa nA ni/_/i ti d+h+yA twA sa sa twAd+d+histas+thau shai la i bA tsa la/_/ni bad+d+ha ba d+ha mA lAM ka sh+tsau reHkro d+ho d+ya tA yu d+haiH/_/
[\[202b.6\]]gang du mya ngan mig la slar yang mchi ma dag ni mi 'dzin pa/_/ston pa'i drin gyis gdung bzhi bar gyur pa'i gnas der rab tu thob/_/ces bsams snying stobs rgya mtsho de/_/ri bzhin g.yo ba med par gnas/_/khro bas mtshon blangs chom rkun gyis/_/gsod rtags me tog 'phreng ba bcings/_/
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]te ta s+ya pa hr-i te bas+t+re gA trAt+kAny+tsa na bats+tsa saH/_/a n+ya da n+ya b+hud+bA sa taish+tsa rA shiHpu ro b+ha bta/_/a trAM ta re sa mud+b+hu tair+b+hU tA nAM pany+tsa b+hiH sha taiH/_/pA de bI nish+tsa laM tsakre tats+tsau raM sha ta pany+tsa kaM/_/ts+yu te
[\[203a.2\]]de lus gser gyi gzi ldan las/_/de dag rnams kyi gos dag shus/_/gos ni gzhan dang gzhan byung ba/_/de dag mdun du phung por gyur/_/skabs der lha mo de yis ni/_/rab bskyed 'byung po lnga brgya yis/_/chom rkun dag ni lnga brgya po/_/rab tu g.yo ba med par byas/_/de dag mtshon
[\[203a.3\]]ta dA yu d+ha tsa ye puSh+pa br-iSh+Tirna b+hasta lAta/_/ba pA ta rat+na ru tsi ra ma d+hu ra swa ra mUr+d+ha ni/_/gA ha mA na ma tha byo ma taM bi lo kyai ba da s+ya baH/_/spr-iSh+TAsta s+yA nu b+ha be na ta me ba sha ra NaM ya yuH/_/swa ba tIR+Ya ta taHk+ShAn+t+yai tsa ra Na
[\[203a.4\]]gyi tshogs lhung tshe/_/sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyi spyi bor ni/_/mkha' las me tog dag gi char/_/rin chen rab tu mdzes pa bab/_/de nas mkha' la 'gro ba de/_/chom rkun rnams kyis mthong gyur nas/_/de yi mthu yi reg pa yis/_/de nyid la ni skyabs su song /_/de nas bab ste bzod pa'i slad/_/rkang par
[\[203a.5\]]n+yasta masta kAn/_/d+har+m+me ra sa d+h+waM saM t+ya dz+ya duHkr-i tA nI t+yA bA tsa tAnra/_/a taste dzA ta bai rA gyAHpra bra dz+yAM br-i dzi nodz+dz+hi tAMH/_/A dA yAr+hat+pa daM prA yuHsaM pA rA shra ba shAn+ta ye/_/ta tastaiHsa hi to\u0f85r+har+b+b+hi staish+tsa kar+b+ba Ta pA si b+hiH/_/
[\[203a.6\]]mgo bkod de dag la/_/nyes byas thong la chos kyis ni/_/dga' bar mdzod cig de yis smras/_/de nas de dag chags bral skyes/_/sdig pa btang nas 'khor ba yi/_/'ching ba zhi slad rab byung ni/_/blangs nas dgra bcom gnas thob gyur/_/de nas dgra bcom de dag dang /_/ri brag na gnas de dag bcas/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ya yau dze ta ba naM draSh+TuM shAsta ra ma d+hu ra swa raH/_ta tra di bya dza nA nI tair+b+ho gesti da sha swa d+hi taiH/_/sa su d+hA ra sa saM skA rair+b+ha ga ban+ta ma pU dza yatra/_/shud+d+ha pra sA da dza na nIM b+ha ga bAn+d+har+m+ma da sha nA/_/hi tA ya
[\[203b.2\]]sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs ni rgyal byed kyi/_/tshal du ston pa blta ru song /_/lha yi skye bos 'ongs pa yi/_/longs spyod skabs gsum pas bsgrubs pa/_/bdud rtsi'i ro ldan 'du byed kyis/_/der ni de yis bcom ldan mchod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la/_/thar pa'i lam mchog gsal byed cing /_/dag pa'i
[\[203b.3\]]bi da d+he te ShAM mo k+Sha mArgA gra du ti kAM/_/su d+hI ro bya mr-i ta prAp+tau dz+nyA twA pu tra s+ya pA tra tAM/_/he mAb+dzaM su kr-i tot+ban+naM prA pya dze ta ba naM ya yau/_/sa te nA b+h+ya ts+ya su ga taM tsa ra NA lI na she kha raH/_/dri
[\[203b.4\]]dang ba bskyed pa yi/_/chos ni phan slad bstan par mdzad/_/bu ni bdud rtsi'i snod nyid thob/_/shes nas shin tu brtan pas kyang /_/legs byas las 'khrungs gser gyi pad/_/bzung nas rgyal byed tshal du song /_/de yis bde gshegs mngon mchod cing /_/zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/_/de yi
[\[203b.5\]]shA ta s+ya pra sA di n+ya sa mun+m+r-iSh+Ta i bA b+ha bta/_/ta tasta mu tse b+ha ga bAn san+na ku sha lo da yaM/_/pA da n+yA so da ti swar+N+Na ka ma las+t+raM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_/pad+mot+ta ra i ti khyA tAHsamyak+saM bud+d+ha tAM ga taH/_/sa twa san+tA ra Na
[\[203b.6\]]spyan ni rab dang bas/_/rab tu phyis pa bzhin du gyur/_/de nas nye bar dge ba dang /_/de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/_/rkang pa bkod pas gser gyi ni/_/pad+mo 'khrungs par khyod 'gyur ro/_/pad+mo'i mchog ces grags pa yi/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur te/_/sems can yang dag
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]kr-i twA pa ri nir+b+ba Na me Sh+ya si/_/sar+b+ba dz+nye ne d+ya b+hi hi te su d+hI raHpa t+ya daR+sha nA/_/dza gad+ka l+yA Na la nA ma no ra tha ma tha da de/_/b+hak+t+ya yai r+b+ha ba te di no b+ha ga ba taHpu N+ya pra NA
[\[204a.2\]]bsgral byas nas/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/kun mkhyen bden pa gzigs pa yis/_/de skad brjod tshe shin tu brtan/_/'gro ba'i dge legs brtags pa yi/_/yid la re ba bzung bar gyur/_/gus pas bsod nams phyag 'tshal dus su srid pa 'bigs
[\[204a.3\]]mak+Sha Ne shAstuHswa sti kr-i taM kr-i taM su kr-i ti b+hiHpA do pa d+hA naM shi raH/_/aM ke te dza na nI dza na s+ya na pu nas+t+rip+ti pra yuk+tAstanasta n+yot+ta ni ta dan+ta shUn+ya pa da nAHkur+b+ban+ti mU D+hasmi taM/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA
[\[204a.4\]]byed bcom ldan ston pa yi/_/zhabs ni legs byas ldan pa gang gi mgo la bde legs byas par bzung byas pa/_/de dag phyi nas skye bo ma yi phang du tshim sbyor nu ma'i 'o ma la/_/gan rkyal du nyal so yi stong ba'i bzhin ni blun po'i 'dzum du byed mi 'gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang
[\[204a.5\]]yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba da na kalba la tA yAM ma d+hu ra swarA ba dA naM tsa tu ra shI ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//ye rA ga ro gaM na ya nA nu ban+d+haM bi dwe Sha shu laM hr-i da la pra sak+taM/_/sar+b+bAm ga saM sar+pi
[\[204a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//gang gis mig la rjes 'brel chags pa'i nad/_/sdang ba'i zug rngu snying la rab chags dang /_/yan lag kun la
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]ta pA pa kuSh+ShaM ha ra n+t+r-i te b+h+yo stu na mo b+hi Shag+b+h+yaH/_/ta po ba nAn+ta bi shrAn+taM ka thAM ta tha ta ga thA ga taM/_/b+hik+Sha baHkautu kA k+Ship+tAHpa prats+tsharmA na saM dzi naM/_/b+ha ga bAn+b+ha ba taHsar+b+ba lo ka sho kA pa kA ri NaH/_/
[\[204b.2\]]khyab pa sdig pa'i mdze/_/'phrog byed sman pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gtam mthar de bzhin gshegs/_/dka' thub nags mthar bzhugs pa yi/_/dri med thugs la dge slong rnams/_/dge mtshan dag gis bskul bas dris/_/bcom ldan ji slad 'jig rten ni/_/kun gyi mya ngan sel byed pa/_/
[\[204b.3\]]b+ha bAr+t+ti b+hi Sha dzaHkasmAd+Ro gi no pya d+hi ka pri yAH/_/sa tA nu bA tsa pa t+yaM me ro gi no d+hi ka bal+la b+hAH/_/ka ya pi DA sa maHpuM sAM nAs+t+ya n+yaHsho ka pany+tsa yaH/_/dzan+mAn+ta re Sh+wa bi pa raM pra kri t+yA dai n+ya b+hU mi Shu/_/A
[\[204b.4\]]srid pa'i nad kyi sman pa khyod/_/nad pa rnams la lhag par byams/_/de dag la des gsungs pa bden/_/lhag par nad pa la bdag mdza'/_/skyes bu rnams la lus gzir dang /_/mtshungs pa'i mya ngan tshogs gzhan med/_/skye ba gzhan rnams dag la yang /_/rang bzhin gyis ni sman pa'i sa/_/nad
[\[204b.5\]]tu re Sh+wo ba pa ta taM pak+Sha pA to ma mA b+ha bta/_/na gaR+YAM shi bi g+ho ShA yAM shi birnA mA b+ha ban+n+r-i paH/_/pra biSh+TaHsar+b+ba tsin+tA su sad+bAn+d+hA ba i bAr+thi nAM/_/sar+b+ba sar+b+ba tra ro gAt+tA sh+tsi kit+s+yaHsar+b+ba thA ma yA/_/i t+ya
[\[204b.6\]]pa rnams la rtag tu bdag_/shin tu phyogs su lhung bar gyur/_/grong khyer shi ba'i dbyangs dag tu/_/slong ba rnams kyi gnyen mchog bzhin/_/bsam pa kun la rab zhugs pa/_/mi bdag shi bi zhes pa byung /_/kun tu nad pa thams cad ni/_/kun nas bdag gis gso bar bya/_/zhes pa
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]b+hU ta sa ta taM ta s+ya sa twa s+ya nish+tsi yaH/_/ka dA tsi dA tu raHbau rash+tsi ra ro ga ni pI Di taH/_/ta ya yA tse sa ma b+h+ye t+ya tsi kit+pA mAr+t+tA bat+sa laM/_/swAs+th+yA ya ta s+ya b+hi Sha dzaHpr-iSh+TAHsar+b+ba ma hI b+hu dzA/_/
[\[205a.2\]]bden pa'i snying stobs can/_/de yi nges pa dag tu 'gyur/_/nam zhig grong ba nad pa ni/_/yun ring nad kyis gzir gyur pa/_/sman la mnyes gshin de la ni/_/mngon du phyogs te gso bar zhus/_/de nas gso slad sa bdag gis/_/dris tshe sman pa thams cad kyis/_/
[\[205a.3\]]pra br-Id+d+ha s+yA d+hi bai d+huR+YaM bi tsaR+Ya tsi ra mU tsi re/_/durla b+haM b+hai Sha dzi rA dzan ro ga s+yA pya ga rI ya paH/_/A dzan+ma k+Sha mi NaHsuM paHsho Ni te nai Sha sha mya ti/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya nr-i pa tiHka ru NA kIr+N+Na mA na saH/_/a tsin+ta yat+ta dA
[\[205a.4\]]rab rgyas nad kyis gzir ba la/_/yun ring dpyad nas rab smras pa/_/shin tu lci ba'i nad 'di yi/_/rgyal po sman ni rnyed par dka'/_/skyes nas bzod ldan skyes bu yi/_/khrag gis de ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/de dag thos nas mi yi bdag_/yid ni snying rje rgyas pa yis/_/yun ring nad pa gso ba'i
[\[205a.5\]]diSh+TAM swAs+thA ya tsi ra ro gi Na/_/bA la s+yA pi na me ko paHka dA tsi da b+hUd+k+wa tsita/_/ma yi gar+b+has+thi te s+ya pIdz+dza na nI kro d+ha brdzi tA/_/tasmA da kro d+ha naHkash+tsi l+lo kasmin+nAsti mad+bi d+hiH/_/ma mai ba rap+ta pU re Ne byA d+hi ra s+ya pra shA
[\[205a.6\]]slad/_/de yis bstan pa yang dag bsams/_/byis pa'i tshe yang bdag la ni/_/nam yang gar yang khro ma byung /_/bdag ni mngal na gnas tshe yang /_/ma ni khro ba spangs par gyur/_/de slad khro med 'jig rten na/_/bdag lta bu yang yod ma yin/_/bdag gi khrag gi rgyun nyid kyis/_/'di yi nad ni zhi
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]mya tu/_/i t+yuR+Ya ta ma tiHr+b+bair+b+baR+YA mA No nu dzI bi b+hiH/_/sA dA rA dza shi rod+b+ha baM tasmai da dau swa sho taM/_/rak+te na swas+thA mA yA taHShad+b+hir+m+mA sai ra thA tu raH/_/dza gA ma pa ri pUr+N+NA shaHkr-i sha mA man+t+ya b+hu pa tiM/_/ta taHka
[\[205b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/de ltar sbyar ba'i blo gros kyis/_/rjes 'brang kun gyis bzlog gyur kyang /_/rgyal pos mgo las byung ba yi/_/rang khrag rtag tu de la byin/_/de nas zla ba drug gi ni/_/khrag gis nad pa bsos par gyur/_/sa bdag rid pa la zhus nas/_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te song /_/de nas nam
[\[205b.3\]]dA tsid+b+hU dA la sU nor+b+yA yA ma shI la nAta/_/pAr+sh+wa sho Sha k+Sha ya saM sI prA du rA sId+d+hi tai Shi NaH/_/bi pa rI ta swa b+hA bo yaM bi pA kaHpUr+b+ba kar+m+ma NAM/_/swas+thA nA ma sha naM nAsti shrI ma tAM ro ga saM ga tiH/_/u pa diSh+TaM
[\[205b.4\]]zhig sa skyong bu/_/phan pa tshol la ngal dub ni/_/bsten las nyams pa gsal byed pa/_/gzhogs skam nad ni byung bar gyur/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin las/_/rnam par bzlog pa'i rang bzhin 'di/_/nad med rnams la kha zas med/_/dpal ldan rnams ni nad dang 'grogs/_/de nas sman pa
[\[205b.5\]]ta tasta s+ya swas+thA ya b+hi Sha dzAm+ba raiH/_/sa ha sra pA kaM saM bid+d+haM sar+b+ba pA dA b+hi d+hi g+h+r-i taM/_/sar+b+ba tra byA ta sA re Na smin dzA+e baM dzi ba s+ya pak+Shi NaH/_/snA nAM m+bu ka tha yo ge na g+h+r-i taM yat+ne b+hU ya sA/_/sid+d+haM dwA da sha
[\[205b.6\]]mchog rnams kyis/_/sman pa stong gis legs bsgrubs pa/_/kun gyi snying po zhes pa'i mar/_/de ni bsos slad nye bar bsten/_/rdzas kun gyi ni snying po blangs/_/'dab chags shang shang dag gi ni/_/khrus kyi chu yi thang dang ldan/_/'bad pa chen pos zhun mar ni/_/bcu gnyis lo yis
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]b+hir+b+baR+ShaHku mA re pA tu muR+Ya/_/pra t+ye ka bud+d+haHsho kAr+t+tasta d+yA tsi tu ma thA ya yau/_/sar+b+bairna bAR+Ya mA No pi ku mA raHsa twa sA ga raH/_/b+hak+t+yA tasmai da dau tasmai sar+b+baM sA ra g+h+r-i taM hi taM/_/
[\[206a.2\]]legs par grub/_/gzhon nu 'thung bar brtson pa na/_/nad kyis gzir ba'i rang sangs rgyas/_/ci ste de la slong du 'ongs/_/kun gyis bzlog par gyur mod kyang /_/gzhon nu snying stobs rgya mtsho yis/_/kun gyi snying po phan pa'i mar/_/thams cad de la gus pas byin/_/
[\[206a.3\]]swas+thaHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ho\u0f85:\u0f85tha pra san+naHpra Ni d+hA na bA na/_/ku mA raM bi da d+he swas+tha ma mr-i taM pA d+hu se ba naM/_/hi tai ShI rA ja pu tro sA tsA ha me ta dA yur+b+ha baM/_/ro go nA mArtI sha ma naM swa b+hA be ne pa me pri yaM/_/i ta shru twA
[\[206a.4\]]de nas rang sangs rgyas bsos te/_/rab dang smon lam ldan pa yis/_/gzhon nu dag ni bsos par bsgrubs/_/dam pa bsten pa bdud rtsi yin/_/phan pa tshol ba rgyal po'i bu/_/der ni tshe ring nga nyid gyur/_/rang bzhin gyis bdag nad pa yi/_/gdung ba zhi bar byed la dga'/_/zhes pa thos nas
[\[206a.5\]]dzi naM sar+b+be pa prats+tshur+b+hik+Sha ba su naH/_/kar+m+ma NA ke na tau tU tu l+ya ro gau swa s+thA mu pA ga tau/_/i ti tair+b+ha ga bAn+d+r-i Sh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nyastA nA b+hA Sha ta/_/brah+ma dat+taHk+Shi ti pa tir+b+ba rA NA s+yA ma b+hUt+pu rA/_/nan+do pa sa nan+da nA mA nau ta
[\[206a.6\]]rgyal ba la/_/dge slong kun gyis slar dris pa/_/de dag las ni ci zhig gis/_/mtshungs par nad kyang bsos par gyur/_/zhes des bcom ldan 'das la dris/_/thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sI dag tu sngon/_/sa yi bdag po tshangs byin byung /_/de yi bu gnyis dga' bo dang /_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]s+ya pu trau ba b+hU ba tuH/_/dz+yeSh+ThaHkIr+t+ti bi she ShAr+thI rA dz+ya kA masta thA pa raH/_/u pa nan+dasta taHprA ha pu ro hi taM pu taM ra haH/_/A thar+b+ba yA ga ku sha laM ba yaM s+yaM ku hA kA b+hi d+haH/_/e Sha dz+yeSh+Tho ma ma b+hA tA dza na raM dzan tat+pa
[\[206b.2\]]nye dga' zhes pa dag tu gyur/_/thu bo grags pa'i khyad par gnyer/_/de bzhin gzhan ni rgyal srid 'dod/_/de nas nye dgas dben par ni/_/grogs po kha gsag can zhes pa/_/A tharba yi mchod sbyin mkhas/_/mdun na 'don gyi bu la smras/_/bdag gi spun zla thu bo 'di/_/skye bo dga' ba de dag
[\[206b.3\]]raH/_/ja nAt+kIr+t+ti pra bA de na rA dz+ya mA sA da yi Sh+ya ti/_/ni raM sho haM b+ha bi Sh+yA mi d+h+wastaM sar+b+ba dza nodz+dz+hi taH/_/bi dza ne ni d+ha naM sh+lA g+h+yaM nA ba d+hu ta s+ya dzI ba tiM/_/dz+yeSh+Tha s+yai ba ta b+h+rA tu pau ro hi t+yaM kra mA ga taM/_/a ra N+ya
[\[206b.4\]]skyong /_/grags pa brjod pas skye bo las/_/rgyal srid dag ni thob par gyur/_/bdag ni skye bo kun gyis spangs/_/nyams shing skal ba med par gyur/_/dben par shi ba bsngags par 'os/_/smad par gyur pas 'tsho ba min/_/khyod kyi spun zla phu bo nyid/_/mdun na 'don du rim par 'gyur/_/yu cag mtshungs
[\[206b.5\]]ga ma naM yuk+ta ma bA yoHsa ma duHkha yoH/_/shru twe ti rA dza pu tra s+ya bA tsaHsho ka pra la ba niH/_/hi taM ta ba ka ro mI ti pu ro hi ta pu to bra bIta/_/swo tha dra bya pra yo ge na byaM ga ta s+yA gra dzaM bya d+hAtra/_/ye nA sau rdzan ka s+yAn+te ka nI yAn rA dz+ya mAp+ta
[\[206b.6\]]pa'i sdug bsngal can/_/dgon pa dag tu 'gro bar 'os/_/zhes pa mya ngan smra ba po/_/rgyal po'i bu yi tshig thos nas/_/khyod la phan par bya'o zhes/_/mdun na 'don gyi bu yis smras/_/gang gis pha yi mjug tu ni/_/nu bo de yis rgyal srid 'thob/_/de yi rdzas sbyor dag gis de'i/_/thu bo yan lag ma tshang
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bA nA/_/prAp+ta rA dz+yaHsa kA le na dr-iSh+T+wA b+h+rA ta ra ma gra dzaM/_/byad+ga yiSh+TA kA rA lam+bi pash+tsAt+tA pa sa mA ya yau/_/pu ro hi ta su taM so tha pau rau hi t+ye ni be shi taM/_/u bA tsoSh+NaM bi ni shwa s+ya gU D+ha pA ta ka shAn+ti
[\[207a.2\]]bsgrubs/_/dus kyis de yis rgyal srid 'thob/_/yan lag ma tshang spun zla ni/_/thu bo lag 'khar la brten pa/_/mthong nas rjes su 'gyod par gyur/_/de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu/_/mdun na 'don du bkod pa la/_/sbas pa'i sdig pas 'jigs pa des/_/shugs rings tsha ba phyung
[\[207a.3\]]taH/_/a ho nu tra nu rA lub+d+hai na ma yA d+har+m+ma ma dzA na tA/_/dz+yeSh+Tho b+hA tA pi tr-i sa maHpA d+hi taHku da shA mi mAM/_/k+Sha Na k+Sha yi su khA k+Ship+tAHpA saM kr-i twA k+Sha ye k+Sha ho/_/k+Shi ban+ti duHkhe Sh+wAt+ma na sa mI hi ta tA ri NaH/_/i ti
[\[207a.4\]]nas smras/_/kye ma rgyal srid yang brkam zhing /_/chos mi shes pa bdag gis ni/_/pha mtshungs spun zla thu bo ni/_/gnas skabs ngan pa 'di la bkod/_/skad cig 'jig pa'i bde bas drangs/_/kye ma ma brtags byed rnams kyis/_/sdig pa byas nas bdag nyid ni/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal rnams su 'phen/_/zhes pa
[\[207a.5\]]ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA dzA ta tA paHpu ro hi taH/_/ta mu bA tsa ma mA s+ye Sha rA dzan+na nu sha yair+dz+wa raH/_/sa phu nar+d+ra bya yo ge na swas+thaM tsakre nr-i pAt+mA dzaM/_/swas+thA ya pra da dau tasmai ni dza rA dz+yAM pa tsA nu gaH/_/u pa nan+do tha kA le na pu ro hi ta su tash+tsa saH/_/kA
[\[207a.6\]]de yi tshig thos nas/_/mdun na 'don ni 'gyod skyes pas/_/de la smras pa bdag kyang 'dir/_/rgyal po 'gyod pa'i rims dang ldan/_/slar yang de yi rdzas sbyor gyis/_/mi bdag bu de bsos par byas/_/bsos pa de la rang gi ni/_/rgyal srid nu bo des kyang byin/_/de nas dus kyis nye dga' dang /_/mdun na 'don gyi bu des kyang /_/rang
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]rAM pra t+ye ka bud+d+hA ya kr-i twA de hAn+ta mA ya tuH/_/shi pir+b+hU mi pa teHpra pa rA dza pu taHsa pu tra tAM/_/pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha tAM le b+he pU ro hi ta pu trash+tsa saH/_/te na tau gU D+ha pA pe na tu l+ya ro gau ba b+hU ba tuH/_/byad+ga s+ya swas+th+ya ka ra NAta yu ga pat+s+was+th+ya mA
[\[207b.2\]]sangs rgyas la mchod byas nas/_/lus kyi mtha' ni rab tu thob/_/rgyal po'i bu de sa bdag ni/_/shi bi'i bu nyid thob gyur te/_/mdun na 'don gyi bu de yang /_/rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob/_/de dag sbas pa'i sdig pa des/_/mtshungs par nad kyis thebs gyur cing /_/yan lag nyams pa gso byed pas/_/de dag gsos
[\[207b.3\]]ga tau/_/i t+ya kar+N+N+ya tI ta dzan+mA nu bad+d+hA mA san+nAr+t+ti trA Na ban+d+hordzi na s+ya/_/ni t+yA sak+taM sa twa kA ru N+ya br-it+taM hr-iSh+TAHprA pur+n+ni br-it+taM b+hik+Sha bste/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM hi ta tai
[\[207b.4\]]pa nyid du gyur/_/rgyal ba phongs pas gzir ba skyob gnyen gyis/_/rtag tu sems can la chags snying rje'i spyod/_/'das pa'i skye bo dang 'brel de thos nas/_/mgu ba'i dge slong de dag bde ba thob/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las
[\[207b.5\]]Sh+ye ba dA na pany+tsA shI ti ta maHpal+la baH//_//ben+dan+te s+tha bi ra kra me Na ni ya taM ye d+har+m+ma shik+ShA bi daHpU dz+ya kartA ga NAHpra NA ma bi na yai stai prA nu bAM t+yaM na tiM/_/dar+p+pon+nad+d+ha ta yA bi shr-iM kha la
[\[207b.6\]]phan pa 'tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//chos kyi bslab pa'i rig pa gang gis mchod bya rnams la dul bar rgan rim gyis/_/mchod bya'i tshogs la rab 'dud dul bas phyag byed de dag mtho ba thob par 'gyur/_/dregs pas 'phyar las blo gros rnam par
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]d+he yaM mo hA da d+haHpA ti nAM dz+yeSh+ThA ti kra mi Na yaM sa tsa pa ro lo kaHsa sho kaHsa dA/_/dz+yeSh+ThA pU dz+ya pra saM ge na b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn+pu naH/_/ya thA br-id+d+ha bi d+hi pr-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nyaHpU na ra bra bIta/_/brah+ma
[\[208a.2\]]ma bsdams rmongs las 'og tu 'gre byed cing /_/rgan 'das rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol de yang rtag tu mya ngan bcas/_/rgan po mchod pa'i zhar la slar/_/dge slong rnams kyis dris pa dag_/rgan po cho ga ji bzhin slar/_/bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/_/bA rA
[\[208a.3\]]dat+tA b+hi d+haHpUr+b+baM bA rA Na s+yA ma b+hUn+n+r-i paH/_/ya s+ya pu N+yA nu b+hA be na d+har+m+ma rA ma ma b+hudz+dzu naH/_/ta s+ya kA le pu ro pAn+na ba ne prAk+pu N+ya lak+Sha NAtra/_/pra br-it+ta ma nu ShA lA pAsh+tsa twA raHprA Ni nod+b+ha bAn/_/ka piny+dza lo tha sha sha
[\[208a.4\]]Na sIr de dag sngon/_/mi bdag tshangs byin zhes pa byung /_/'gro ba gang gi bsod nams mthus/_/chos kyi kun dga' ra bar gyur/_/de dus grong mtha'i nags tshal du/_/sngon gyi bsod nams mtshan nyid las/_/mi yi smra brjod la zhugs pa/_/srog chags bzhi ni byung bar gyur/_/ba med dang ni ri bong dang /_/spre'u
[\[208a.5\]]ka ka pi kuM dza ba rasta thA/_/te ba b+hU buHsa dA tsA rAH snai ha bad+d+hAHpa raspa raM/_/ka dA tsit+pu kha lab+d+ha ste ka thAM te dza ga durmi thaH/_/dz+yeSh+Tha kra maM bi nA smA kaM ka tha pU dzA pra bar+t+ta tAM/_/ya thA br-ib+d+hi ka yA sad+b+hiH sat+kA ro hi pra bat+ti taMH/_/
[\[208a.6\]]de bzhin glang po'i mchog_/de dag dam pa'i spyod tshul can/_/phan tshun mdza' bas bcings par gyur/_/nam zhig bde thob ne dag gis/_/gtam gyi mjug tu phan tshun smras/_/yu skol rgan rim med pa la/_/mchod pa dag ni ji ltar sgrub/_/dam pas ji ltar rgan rim gyis/_/bkur sti dag ni rab bsgrub pa/_/
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]ka la yan+ki la ka l+yA naM ku sha lA ye ba ka n+ya te/_/dz+yeSh+ThaHka stA ba dasmA kaM yo ts+yaHs+tha bi ra gau ra bAta/_/i ti te ShAM bru ba NA naM dza gA da ga dza yU tha paH/_/yo yaM dzIr+N+Na ma hA shA khaHpu ro Nau dr-i Sh+ya te ba TaH/_/tu l+ya me naM swa kA ya s+ya sma rA
[\[208b.2\]]nges par dge legs skyed byed cing /_/dge ba nyid dang ldan par gyur/_/rgan po'i zhe sas mchod bya gang /_/yu las re zhig rgan pa su/_/zhas pa smra ba de dag las/_/glang chen khyu mchog gis smras pa/_/'dab ma che hrul n+ya gro d+ha/_/gang 'di rnying bar mthong gyur pa/_/'di yi yal 'dab gsar pa dang /_/rang gi
[\[208b.3\]]mi na ba pal+la baM/_/mar+k+ka To s+ya tha tAn+ba tse ba ne bi tsa ra tA ma yA/_/swa kA ya tu l+ya e bA ya dr-iSh+TaHswalpa ta ro ba TaH/_/sha sha ko s+ya ba dat+pur+b+bam+ma yA pa twa dwa yAM ki taH/_/a ba sh+yA ya la bAr+d+ro yaM lI D+ha pany+tsAM gu lo ba TaH/_/taiHkra
[\[208b.4\]]lus ni mtshungs pa dran/_/spre'u yis kyang der smras pa/_/bdag ni nags na rgyu ba yis/_/n+ya grod+ha 'di rang lus dang /_/mtshungs pa shin tu chung ba mthong /_/ri bong gis kyang smras pa sngon/_/n+ya gro d+ha 'di sor lnga pa/_/'dab ma gnyis kyis mtshan pa la/_/zil thigs kyis brlan bdag gis myang /_/de dag
[\[208b.5\]]me Ne ti ka thi te pash+tsA t+p+rA ha ka piny+dza liH/_/ma mai bA yaM sa kr-id+bI dzAdz+dzA taHprA dz+ya ta ro ba TaH/_/a tha dz+yeSh+Tha kra maM dz+nyA twA te sa dA go ra bo tsi tAM/_/sne ha nu br-it+ti ni ra tAHtsakruHpU dzAM pa raspa raM/_/prA NA pa ha ra NAts+tsauR+YA da ga myA ga ma
[\[208b.6\]]rim pas de brjod tshe/_/phyi nas ba men gyis smras pa/_/bdag gi lci ba'i sa bon las/_/shing chen n+ya gro d+ha 'di skyes/_/de nas rgan rim shes gyur nas/_/de dag phan tshun mdza' ba yis/_/rjes zhugs dga' bas mchod pa ni/_/rtag tu zhe sa la 'os byas/_/de nas srog gcod rku ba dang /_/de bzhin bgrod
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]nAt+ta thA/_/a sa t+yAn+ma d+ya tu l+yAm+la pha la saM b+ha k+Sha NAts+tsa te/_/bi ra tAHsu kr-i tA sak+tAHswa pa dA tsA ra shi k+Sha yA/_/tsakruHpu N+yA nu b+hA be na tu l+ya pr-i t+r+ya nau ka saH/_/a tha ta ShAM pra b+hA be
[\[209a.2\]]min 'gro ba dang /_/mi bden cha mtshungs 'bras bu ni/_/skyur po za ba dag las kyang /_/chags bral rang gnas kun spyod kyi/_/bslab pas legs byas la chags pa'i/_/bsod nams mthu yis nags tshal na/_/gnas rnams spyod tshul mtshungs par byas/_/de nas de dag rnams kyi
[\[209a.3\]]na ni t+ya puSh+pa pha la dru mAH/_/s+phI ta sa s+yA b+ha bad+b+hU miHkA la baR+ShI tsa bA ri daH/_/tad+d+r-iSh+Ta ma ha dAR+YaM b+hu baHsu kr-i ta lak+Sha NaM/_/me ne swa pu N+ya dzaM sar+b+ba brah+ma dat+to ma hI pa tiH/_/taM mi th+yA mA naiHsaM tuSh+TaM pany+tsA
[\[209a.4\]]mthus/_/rtag tu me tog 'bras ldan zhing /_/sprin ni dus su char 'bebs shing /_/sa la 'bru rnams rgyas par gyur/_/sa yi legs byas mtshan nyid ni/_/ngo mtshar che ba de mthong nas/_/thams cad sa bdag tshangs byin gyis/_/rang gi bsod nams las skyes bsams/_/log par khengs pas tshim de la/_/thub
[\[209a.5\]]b+hi dz+nyo mu ni nr-i paM/_/u bA tsa twAt+p+ra sA de na nA yaM puSh+pa pha lo da yaH/_/kA na ne ka pi nA pAr+d+haM sha sha ka piny+dza la dwI pAH/_/s+thi tAHsad+d+hAr+m+maM shI lA nAM te ShA me Sha gu No da yaH/_/te bra teHpany+tsa b+hiHshud+d+hA ya thA s+tha bi ra pU dza kAH/_/ka
[\[209a.6\]]pa mngon shes lnga pas smras/_/me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa 'di/_/mi bdag khyod kyi drin gyis min/_/nags na spre'u ri bong dang /_/gnyis 'thung ba men lhan cig gnas/_/yon tan rgyas 'di dam chos kyi/_/ngang tshul de dag rnams kyi yin/_/de dag brtul zhugs lnga yis dag_/ji ltar rgan pa mchod byed cing /_/ba
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]piny+dza la gi rA sar+b+be sad+d+har+m+ma sa ma yaM shri tAH/_/i ti shru twA mu ner+b+ba kyaM rA dzA dzA tA da raHpa raM/_/sa sau rAn+taHpu rA mA t+ya stad b+he dza bra ta pany+tsa kaM/_/ka piny+dza lo ha me bA sau shA ri pu traHsha sho b+ha bta/_/ka piny+tsa mud+ga lA pa t+ya A nan+do ga dza yU
[\[209b.2\]]men tshig gis thams cad ni/_/dam chos dam tshig dag la brten/_/zhes pa thub pa'i tshig thos nas/_/mchog tu gus skyes rgyal po ni/_/grong pa btsun mo blon bcas pas/_/brtul zhugs lnga po de dag bstan/_/ba men nga nyid ri bong ni/_/shA ri'i bu 'di nyid du gyur/_/spre'u mau gal gyi bu/_/glang chen khyu bdag kun
[\[209b.3\]]tha paH/_/te pra pur+d+har+m+ma bai ma l+yaM ya thA dz+yeSh+Tha kra mAts+tsha nA/_/tasmAt+p+ra NA ma pU dzA su draSh+Ta byaHs+tha bi ra kra mAH/_/shru twe ti shasturbi na yo pa de shaM dz+yeSh+ThAts+tsha naM prA pya ta po bi she ShaM/_/sa gau ra bAM baR+Sha di b+hi k+Sha bste pU dzA ya thA brid+d+hi ka
[\[209b.4\]]dga' bo/_/de dag ji ltar rgan pa'i rim/_/mchod las chos ni dri med thob/_/de slad phyag dang mchod pa la/_/rgan pa'i rim pa rab brtag bya/_/ston pa'i 'dul ba nyer bstan de thos nas/_/rgan po mchod pa'i dka' thub khyad par thob/_/ji ltar rgan bzhin dge slong de dag gis/_/zhe sar bcas pa'i mchod
[\[209b.5\]]yai ba tsa kruH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ka piny+dza lA ba dA naM Sha Da shI ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//yat+sA th+yaM pa ra sar+b+ba dar+b+bi bi Sha maM krU raM tsa yan+pA
[\[209b.6\]]pa mdun sar byas/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ba men gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//gang zhig g.yo dang yongs khyab dregs pa mi bzad gang yang gdug
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]ka raM ya ts+tsa t+yut+ka Ta kA la kU Ta bi ka TA D+ho pa s+thi raM s+thA ba ra/_/yA n+ya n+yA ni tsi tA ni duHsa ha bi ShA n+ye kI kri tA ni s+phu TaM bA g+pA ruSh+ya bi Sha s+ya taik+Sh+N+ya tu la yA nA yAn+ti le sho ba mAM/_/shrA
[\[210a.2\]]pa rnam par bcas/_/gang yang shin tu rab drag nag po brtsegs pa rtsom pa cher gnas brtan pa dang /_/gang dag gzhan yang bzod dka'i dug rnams gsal bar gcig tu byas pa de dag gis/_/tshig rtsub dug gi rno ba nyid la cha dang dper yang mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim
[\[210a.3\]]ba s+t+yan+mA na sA khya s+ya pad+ma gar+b+ha ni b+ha pra b+haH/_/a b+hUd+g+r-i ha pa teHsU nurgu Na bAn+pad+ma kA b+hi d+haH/_/su shI la s+ye ba ni ya maHsA d+ho pa ri gu NA da raH/_/sod+ha ta gr-i he ta s+ya bi be ka i ba d+hI ma taH/_/sa na be yau ba nA raM b+he rU
[\[210a.4\]]ba dag yid ces bya ba'i bu/_/yon tan ldan pa mnyan yod du/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i 'od mtshungs pa/_/pad+mo can zhes bya ba byung /_/tshul khrims can gyi dul ba dang /_/blo ldan rnams kyi dben pa dang /_/dam pa'i yon tan la gus bzhin/_/de yi mdun du de rab bskyed/_/gzugs ni 'dod pa rgyas ldan
[\[210a.5\]]pa kan+dar+p+pa hA si naM/_/b+ho gyod+Yo ga bi rA ge na bai rA gyA b+hi mu kho b+ha batra/_/u pa se nA b+hi d+hA na s+ya sa b+hi k+ShoHk+ShAn+ti tse ta saH/_/shA sa ne pra sha ma sh+lA b+h+yAM pra bradz+yaM sa mu pa da de/_/sa pA tra pA NiHsaM sak+ta tsI
[\[210a.6\]]zhing /_/lang tsho gsar pa rtsom tshe de/_/longs spyod rtsom la chags bral bas/_/chags bral nyid la mngon phyogs gyur/_/dge slong bzod pa'i sems ldan pa/_/nye sde zhes ni bya ba yi/_/bstan la rab zhi bsngags 'os pa/_/rab byung de yis yang dag blangs/_/'khor ba'i phyogs la chags bral bas/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]ba raHshu shu b+he pa ra/_/saM sA re pa k+Sha bai rA gyAd+bi rak+ta i bA tsan+d+ra mAH/_/ta taHka dA tsi de kA kI dza na tsA ri ka yA bra dzanra/_/bi hA rA rA ma ru tsi rAM ma thu rA ma sa sA da saH/_/sa tata piN+Da pA tAr+thi na
[\[210b.2\]]chags pa dang bral zla ba bzhin/_/lag na lhung bzed chos gos dang /_/yang dag ldan de mchog tu mdzes/_/de nas nam zhig gcig pu nyid/_/ljongs ni rgyu zhing 'gro ba de/_/gtsug lag khang dang dga' tshal gyis/_/mdzes pa'i bcom brlag dag tu phyin/_/der ni bsod nams don gnyer des/_/
[\[210b.3\]]ba twA da na b+hi dz+nya yA/_/be sh+yA yAHsha shi le khA yAHdra bi be sha gr-i hAM ga NaM/_/sA ta s+yA sa na sat+ka raM kr-i twA ku ba la yai k+Sha NA/_/taM dza gA dA da ra ba tI rU pA lo kan+bi smi tA/_/i yaM te ma li tA mUr+t+ti na ba yau
[\[210b.4\]]gsar bu nyid phyir ma shes nas/_/smad 'tshong zla ba'i ri mo yi/_/khang pa'i khyams kyi nang du zhugs/_/ut+pal mig can de yis ni/_/de la stan dang bkur sti byas/_/gzugs ni mthong bas ya mtshan zhing /_/gus dang ldan pas de la smras/_/lang tsho gsar pa dang ldan pa/_/khyod kyi gzugs
[\[210b.5\]]ba na shA li nI/_/ka ro t+ya mr-ita saM b+ho ga dIk+Sh+yAd+ka s+ya na tsak+Shu ShoH/_/a smin+pa ya bi rU pe smin ke na kA ma bi ro d+hi nA/_/kaSh+TaM sa mu pa diSh+TaM te bai rA gyaM s+tha bi ro tsi taM/_/la la nA ra sa not+kaR+Sha ku tsaspaR+sha su kho tsi te/_/
[\[210b.6\]]ni yid 'ong ldan/_/su yi mig la bdud rtsi yi/_/longs spyod ston par byed ma yin/_/na tshod 'di dang gzugs 'di la/_/'dod pa 'gal zla su zhig gis/_/rgan po la 'os chags bral gyis/_/sdug bsngal yang dag nye bar bstan/_/chags ldan bud med nu ma ni/_/rab rgyas rig pas bder 'os pa/_/
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]bA Nau saM b+ho ga pA tra s+ya pA traM ta ba na sho b+ha te/_/a haM ku tsa b+ha rA krAn+tA trAM tA ra N+ya ta raM ga taH/_/u tsi tai bA ba yoHprI tiHsaM prA ti k+Sha ma tAM bra taM/_/ut+s+ri dz+yA ya ta lo tsa nA d+ha ra da la swA
[\[211a.2\]]longs spyod snod gyur khyod kyi ni/_/lag na lhung bzed mdzes ma yin/_/nga ni nu ma'i khur gyis non/_/khyod ni lang tshos rnam par g.yo/_/yu cag gnyis ni mdza' bar 'os/_/da ni brtul zhugs bzod par mdzod/_/g.yo sgyus zhi dang dul ba goms pas longs spyod bdud rtsi
[\[211a.3\]]da pra mo dot+sa baM saM b+ho ga mr-i ta niHspr-i haHsha ma da mA b+h+yA se na shASh+h+yA di ba/_/yaHkAn+tA ku tsa kuM ku mAM ki ta ru tsid+hAr+t+te na rA gaM hr-i di kle sha klin+na pha lA si ne dza na ba ne dAn+tA ya tasmai na maH/_/ya di me prI ti
[\[211a.4\]]dag la chags med cing /_/mig yangs mchu yi yal 'dab rab myang rab dga'i dga' ston rab tu spangs pa bzhin/_/mdzes ma'i nu ma gur gum gyis mtshan mdzes pas snying la chags pa mi 'dzin gang /_/skye bo'i nags su nyon mongs dman pa'i 'bras bu za ba'i dul ba de la 'dud/_/gal te mdza' la
[\[211a.5\]]lub+d+hA yA ba tsa nA nu kA raM Sh+ya si/_/ta de tat+ta ba ba lA krAn+taM pa sh+yA mi ba da nAm+bu dzaM/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya saM trasta i ba kar+N+Nau pi d+hA ya saH/_/tAM ba tse no tsi tAM mA tar+m+ma ma shA sa na dU Sha NaM/_/ut+taM pa tA mu pa ga taM
[\[211a.6\]]brkam chags can/_/bdag gi tshig 'di mi byed na/_/khyod kyi bzhin ras pad+ma 'di/_/stobs kyis mnan te bdag gis btud/_/de thos kun tu skrag pa bzhin/_/rna ba bsgribs nas de la des/_/smras pa ma gcig bdag gis ni/_/bstan pa sun 'byin 'os pa min/_/bdag nyid kun gyis legs
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]su ga ta bra taM s+ya sa twa shri yaHshu tsi ta yA ti la kA ya mA naM/_/sar+b+bAt+ma nA su tsa ri tA b+ha ra Na s+ya puM saHshI lo pa maM na hi pi b+hU ShU Sha Na masti kiny+tsi ta/_/i t+yuk+t+wA saM ya taHshU n+ya pA tra e ba dza gA ma saH/_/a pA ya sha l+ya bi
[\[211b.2\]]spyad rgyan ldan skyes bu la/_/bde gshegs btul zhugs cod pan nyid du rab gyur cing /_/snying stobs dpal ni gtsang bas thig le nyid gyur pa/_/tshul khrims mtshungs pa'i rgyan ni cung zad yod ma yin/_/zhes pa brjod nas dul ldan de/_/gnod pa'i zug rngu mi bzad can/_/mchod pa rab btang myur
[\[211b.3\]]Sha mAM pU dzA mut+s+r-i dz+ya pa twa ra/_/a tha man+t+rA ba lAn+nA ma tsaN+DA lI bi sha kA li nI/_/ba sh+yA kaR+ShA di ni yan+t+ra man+t+ra tan+t+rA di tat+pa rAM/_/A hU ya bi ni be d+yA smi ni dzaM sma ra pa rA b+ha baM/_/ya yA te d+ha na saM tuSh+TiM rA
[\[211b.4\]]pa dang /_/bcas pa snod stong nyid du song /_/de nas sngags stobs zhes pa yi/_/smad 'tshong gtum mo 'dod ldan ma/_/dbang dgug sogs la 'khrul 'khor dang /_/sngags dang rgyud sogs de sbyor ma/_/bos nas de la rang nyid ni/_/chags pa'i zil gyis mnan pa bshad/_/nor gyis tshim byas chags pa yis/_/gzir mas
[\[211b.5\]]gArtA pri yAM saM ga maM/_/a tha man+t+ra ba lAd+k+r-iSh+Tasta yA sa ya di pad+ma kaH/_/bi ba shastAM sa ma th+ye t+ya kiM ka ro mI t+ya b+hA ShaT/_/sA ta mU tse sha shi mu khIM b+ha dza pra Na yi nI mi mAM/_/pu N+yai ru pa na tAM kAn+tAM dIp+ta bA bah+ni mA bi shata/_/pad+ma ko bya
[\[211b.6\]]dga' dang 'grogs pa zhus/_/de nas de yis 'phral la ni/_/sngags stobs kyis drangs pad+ma can/_/dbang med de la mngon phyogs te/_/bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras/_/de la des smras bsod nams kyis/_/nyer gnas mdzes ma zla bzhin ma/_/mdza' mo 'di ni rab tu bsten/_/yang na 'bar ba'i me la zhugs/_/pad+mo can
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ba da dr-iSh+Ta dz+wa li taM pA ba kaM pu raH/_/pA ta sadz+dzaHsa mud+s+ri dz+ya bas+t+raM sa twa si tAM shu kaH/_/bi shA mi sA ba kaM dIp+ta rA gAg+nin+na twa pA ba kaM/_/puM sAm+ma da na dag+d+hA nAM dA
[\[212a.2\]]gyi mdun du ni/_/me 'bar mthong nas gos bzhag ste/_/snying stobs dkar ba'i gos can gyis/_/mchong bar chas nas rab smras pa/_/gtsang byed 'bar bar bdag 'jug gi_/mi gtsang chags pa'i mer ma yin/_/chags pas bsregs pa'i skyes bu
[\[212a.3\]]ho dzan+ma sha tA nu gaH/_/i ti ta s+ya ba tsa shru twA tsaN+DA lI khaN+Di tA sha ya/_/a kAR+Ya ka ra Nod+big+nA pash+tsat+tA pi sa mA ya yau/_/sa ta yAd+k+ShAn+ti ni la yaHpra Na ye na pra sA di taH/_/be sh+ya yA tsa bai rA gya sha ma
[\[212a.4\]]rnams/_/skye ba brgya yi rjes 'brang sreg_/ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/gtum mo re ba nyams gyur cing /_/bya min byas pas yid byung ste/_/rjes su gdung ba dag tu gyur/_/de yi bzod pa'i gnas de la/_/gus pa yis ni dang bar byas/_/chags bral zhi zhing bsil ba yis/_/blo ldan
[\[212a.5\]]shI ta la yAd+hi yA/_/bi da d+he d+har+m+ma sa shud+d+hai ta yoHsad+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/te sar+b+ba kle sha sha ma nAd+Ya yAr+ha twa ma bA pa tuH/_/swa yaM tsAr+ha twa mA sA d+ya b+ha ga ban+taM thA ga taM/_/pad+ma kaHpra ya yau dra Sh+TuM shrA bstIM
[\[212a.6\]]smad 'tshong ma dag kyang /_/chos kyis kun tu dag pa'i slad/_/de dag la ni chos bstan mdzad/_/gang gis nyon mongs kun zhi nas/_/de dag gis ni dgra bcom thob/_/dge legs ldan pa pad+mo can/_/rang nyid dgra bcom nyid thob nas/_/mnyan yod grong du bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]swasti mA na su rIM/_/dzi naM dze ta ba nA sI naM ta tra dr-iSh+T+wA pra Na mya saH/_/kr-i ta kr-i t+yaHswa br-it+tAn+taM b+hik+Shu NA ma bra bIt+pu raH/_/b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn+p+r-iSh+Tastat+pu N+yo da ya bisma yAta/_/be sh+yA pad+ma ka tsaN+DA lI
[\[212b.2\]]gshegs pa lta ru song /_/der ni rgyal byed tshal bzhugs pa'i/_/rgyal ba des mthong phyag 'tshal nas/_/bya ba byas pa rang nyid kyi/_/spyod mtha' dge slong mdun du bshad/_/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong gis/_/de yi bsod nams ya mtshan dris/_/smad 'tshong ma dang pad+ma can/_/gtum
[\[212b.3\]]prAg+b+r-it+ta ma ba dadz+dzi naH/_/pU ra b+ha ga ba taHshAstuHkA sh+ya pA khya s+ya shA sa ne/_/mi tra nA ma gr-i ha pa tiHpra bra dz+yaM sa mu pa ga taH/_/ta s+ya nan+dA su nan+da tsa b+hAR+Ya pra bra dzi ta pu naH/_/b+har+t+ri tu l+yA nu b+hA be
[\[212b.4\]]mo'i sngon byung rgyal bas gsungs/_/sngon tshe ston pa bcom ldan 'das/_/'od srungs zhes pa'i bstan pa la/_/khyim bdag bshes gnyen zhes pa ni/_/rab tu byung ba nyid du gyur/_/de yi chung ma dga' mo dang /_/rab dga' mo yang rab byung ste/_/mthu ni bdag po dang mtshungs pa/_/
[\[212b.5\]]tu bi hA re tsakra tuHs+thi tiM/_/pAk+pA tu She Na ma ha tA ka la he b+hik+Shu kI ga NaH/_/tA b+h+yA mud+be dzi tasta tra swa b+hA baHki la dus+h+ya dzaH/_/tsaN+Da lI ba tsa ne nai kA bai sh+yA bA da na tsa pa rA/_/b+hik+Shu kI nA ma
[\[212b.6\]]gtsug lag khang du gnas par byas/_/der ni de dag rtsod pa yi/_/tshig rtsub chen pos dge slong ma'i/_/tshogs ni yid dag byung bar byas/_/rang bzhin nges par gtang bar dka'/_/gcig gis gtum mo'i tshig dang ni/_/gzhan gyis smad 'tshong mar brjod pas/_/dge slong ma rnams
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]d+hi k+She saM da twa pA ba ma bA pa tuH/_/bAg+do ShAt+sai ba tsaN+DA lI dzA tA bai sh+yA ta thA pa rA/_/pra bra dz+yA yAHbra b+hA be naHpu naHku sha la mA shri te/_/sa ta mi tro gr-i ha pa tiHpad+ma ko yaM ya ta bra
[\[213a.2\]]smad pa dag_/byas pa'i sdig pa thob par gyur/_/de nyid gtum mo ngag skyon las/_/de bzhin gzhan smad 'tshong mar skyes/_/rab tu byung ba'i mthu yis ni/_/slar yang dge ba dag la brten/_/khyim bdag bshes gnyen de yang ni/_/brtul zhugs kyis bsdams pad ldan
[\[213a.3\]]taH/_/bi b+hA t+ya rtat+pa dA bAp+s+yA shu tsi shI la bi b+hU Sha NaH/_/pauSh+pi kaHpuSh+pa se nA khyaHpad+ma ko pya n+ya dzan+ma ni/_/ba b+hU ba puSh+pa ni tsa yeHpU ri tAr+thi dza naHsa dA/_/pra t+ye ka pud+d+haM so b+h+ya ts+ya b+ho ge nats+tsha d+ya
[\[213a.4\]]'di/_/tshul khrims gtsang bas rnam brgyan cing /_/dgra bcom gnas ni thob pas mdzes/_/pad can skye ba gzhan la yang /_/me tog sde zhes me tog la/_/me tog tshogs kyis slong ba yi/_/skye bo rtag tu khengs byed gyur/_/de yis rang rgyal longs spyod kyis/_/mchod nas gos kyis
[\[213a.5\]]pA sa sA/_/ka ma lot+pa la kah+lA ra ku su meHsa ma bA ki ra taH/_/te na pu N+ye na dzA to yaM pad+ma gar+b+ha pra b+ha ni b+haH/_/pad+ma kaHshA sa nAr+ho me su kr-i to dA ra sau ra b+haH/_/rU paM shI la bi b+hU Sha NaM shu tsi ya shash+tsan+d+rA
[\[213a.6\]]g.yogs byas te/_/pad+ma ut+pal ka da ra/_/me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod/_/bsod nams sde yis pad+mo can/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i 'od mtshungs 'di/_/legs byas rgya che'i dri bzang can/_/bdag gi bstan pa la 'os gyur/_/gzugs ni tshul khrims kyis brgyan grags pa gtsang zhing
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]ba dA taM ku laM tse taHpA ka bi be ka nir+m+ma la ta re saM sA ra bA maHsha maH/_/e tat+pu N+ya ma ho da ya da ya s+ya kr-i ti nAM dr-iSh+Ti k+Sha maM lak+Sha NaM dzA tirnan+t+ya ta mA ma nash+tsa ma li naM duHkar+m+ma tsih+na
[\[213b.2\]]zla ba lta bur dkar ba'i rigs/_/sems dben pa ni yongs smin shin tu dri med 'khor ba'i g.yon phyogs zhi gyur pa/_/'di dag mkhas pa rnams kyi bsod nams cher dar mtshan nyid blta bar bzod pa yin/_/shin tu smad 'os rigs dang yid ni dri ma can yang mi rnams las
[\[213b.3\]]nr-i NAM/_/i ti sar+b+ba dz+nya ka thi taiHkar+m+ma pA kA ka thAd+b+hu taiH/_/ba b+hU ba haR+Sha saM spaR+shI b+hik+Shu NAM bisma yo da yaH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM pad+ma kA
[\[213b.4\]]ngan rtags/_/zhes pa kun mkhyen gyis bshad pa'i/_/rmad byung las smin gtam dag gis/_/dge slong rnams ni dga' ba yis/_/reg cing ya mtshan rgyas par gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing
[\[213b.5\]]ba dA naHsap+tA shI ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//dr-iSh+T+wA tI bra ta raM ha ran+hi ni ya maM nai bak+Sh+ya man+te she maM kar+m+ma k+Shi pra ma no ra maM hi ma sa maM baR+Yan+ta dA ha k+Sha maM/_/e tA bi
[\[213b.6\]]las pad+ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//shin tu drag po'i 'dul ba mthong nas 'phrog cing zhi ba nges par bzod mi byed/_/myur bar yid dga' kha ba dang mtshungs mjug tu sreg par bzod pa'i las dag byed/_/bya min
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]b+h+ra ti sar+b+ba me ba bi Sha ma Sha ma swap+no pa maM bi b+h+ra mi t+yak+t+yA kAR+Ya b+hi yaHpra bar+t+ta na d+hi maHsaM sA ra sa khyaHs+t+ri yaH/_/bim+bi sA ra s+ya nr-i pa tiHpu re rA dza gr-i he pu rA/_/tsi trA khyo hasti
[\[214a.2\]]dag la 'jigs btang blo gros rab 'jug 'khor ba'i grogs mo bud med kyi/_/rmi lam dag dang mtshungs pa'i rnam 'phrul mtshan nyid 'di dag thams cad nges par 'dzin/_/mi bdag gzugs can snying po yi/_/grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu sngon/_/nag pa zhes pa glang
[\[214a.3\]]sha y+yA ti pu tro b+hUd+ga dza se n+ya paH/_/sA rA dza tul+yaM bi b+ha bi gr-i haM tsa sa pa rits+tsha daM/_/t+yak+t+wa yu bai ba pra bra dz+yAM bai rA gyA b+hi mu kho gra hIta/_/pat+nI ta s+ya su ru pA khyA pra sU tra bi b+ha be gr-i he/_/b+har+t+r-i sa b+ho ga
[\[214a.4\]]sde'i bdag_/glang chen stan gyi bu ru gyur/_/rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang mtshungs khyim/_/yo byad bcas pa rab btang nas/_/chags bral la ni mngon phyogs des/_/gzhon nu nyid la rab byung bzung /_/de yi chung ma gzugs mdzes ma/_/'byor pa rgyas pa'i khyim du ni/_/bdag po'i longs spyod
[\[214a.5\]]ra hi tA tsi raM tsin+tA tu rA b+ha bta/_/a tha kA le na paR+Yan+ta tsA ri pa ri tsi tA da ra ta/_/sa tsi tra hasti shay+YA ti pu traHswa pu ra mA ya yau/_/a b+h+yA ga ta s+ya ta s+yo tha pA nu ga s+ya ni man+t+ra NaM/_/pU dzA su raH
[\[214a.6\]]dang bral bas/_/yun ring bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/_/de nas dus kyis yongs 'dris la/_/gus pas mtha' ni rgyu byed pa/_/nag pa glang chen stan gyi bu/_/de ni rang gi khyim du song /_/de nas mngon du 'ongs de la/_/chung ma mdza' gcugs ldan ma des/_/rjes su 'brangs nas
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]sa raM tsakre pat+nI pra Na ya shA li nI/_/sA tsin+ta yat+ta mA lo kya dU rA d+h+wa shra ma NiHsu khaM/_/a ho ba tA s+ya lA baN+DaM yau ba ne nai ba d+hAR+Ya te/_/asmin+pa ya si b+ho gAr+he pa ri t+ya dz+ya gr-i ha shri yaM/_/mi th+yai ba ki
[\[214b.2\]]mchod pa ni/_/sngon du 'gro bas mgron gnyer byas/_/lam ring gis dub bde med des/_/mthong nas de yis rab bsams pa/_/kye ma 'di yi mdzes sdug ni/_/lang tsho nyid kyis nges par bzung /_/na tshod longs spyod 'os 'di la/_/khyim gyi dpal ni yongs btang nas/_/rnam par ma dpyad
[\[214b.3\]]ma ne nAt+mA nir+b+bi tsA re Na pI Di taH/_/sne he she Sho s+ya nA d+yA pi dzAn shAn+tasta pa swi naH/_/ge haM sa pak+Sha pA te na tsak+Shu ShA yan+ni rIk+Sh+ya te/_/a tha bA d+haiR+Ya me ba dau pa ri k+Sh+yap+thair+ya kA ra NaM/_/a s+ya dzA nA mi bai
[\[214b.4\]]'di yis ni/_/rdzun gyis bdag nyid ci la gdung /_/gang zhig phyogs lhung bcas pa yi/_/mig gis khyim la lta byed pa/_/dka' thub can ni mdza' ba'i lhag_/da dung zhi ba min par nges/_/yang na dang por brtan pa nyid/_/yongs brtags brtan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/_/'di yi chags bral g.yo
[\[214b.5\]]rA gyaM tsa lam+bi shAn+ta me ba bA/_/gr-i he b+ho ga ga Nais+t+r-ip+taHsar+b+baHkA na na mI ha te/_/bi dza ne tu su kha b+haSh+Ta mAt+ma na ma nu sho tsa ti/_/i ti saM tsiM t+ya sA ta s+ya b+ho dza nA ba sa re pu raH/_/swa yaM ta
[\[214b.6\]]ba'am/_/brtan pa bdag gis shes par bya/_/khyim du longs spyod tshogs kyis tshim/_/thams cad nags tshal mngon par 'dod/_/dben par bde ba nyams pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid rjes su gdung ba byed/_/ces pa bsams te de yi ni/_/mdun du zas kyi gnas skabs su/_/sgra dang bcas
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]t+ya dza harmyA grA tra sa shap+daM tA mra b+hA dza naM/_/te na shap+de na saM trasta i bA lo kya di shaHk+Sha NaM/_/ki me ta di ti sa prats+tsha tsi trastAM saM b+h+ra mon+mu khaH/_/ta taHsmi ta mu khI kiM tsita pa ti taM tA mra b+hA dza naM/_/
[\[215a.2\]]par zangs kyi snod/_/ba gam rtse las rang gis dor/_/sgra des kun tu skrag pa bzhin/_/skad cig phyogs su rnam par bltas/_/'di ci zhes pa nag pa ni/_/'khrul pas mngon phyogs de la dris/_/de nas dar bab bzhin 'dzum ldan/_/de yis zangs snod cung zad ni/_/
[\[215a.3\]]pro D+ha ni be d+ya sA tasmai haR+ShAt+pu na ra tsin+ta yata/_/a yaM tA ba dA saM prAp+ta nir+b+bi kA ra pa das+thi tiH/_/shi thi la lI la yai ba s+ya tUr+N+Na mA kr-iSh+Sh+ya te ma naH/_/yaHpA tra shap+da mA tre Na saM trA sa ku la tAM ga taH/_/kiM kiM
[\[215a.4\]]lhung bar de la bshad byas nas/_/dga' bas slar yang rab bsams pa/_/re zhig rnam 'gyur med pa yi/_/gnas la gnas pa 'dis ma thob/_/'di yi yid ni lhod pa dag_/rtse dgas myur du khugs par 'gyur/_/gang zhig snod kyi sgra tsam gyis/_/kun tu skrag cing 'khrugs gyur pa/_/rnam dpyod
[\[215a.5\]]nakri ya te ta s+ya bi Sha yai ra bi maR+ShiNaH/_/sar+b+baHpra Na sh+ya ti pa yo d+ha ra shap+da mA tra saM trA sa lub+ta d+h+r-i ti ban+d+ha na e ba haM saH/_/te shan+ti ke pi ka ma lA sa na rA dza haM sA ye pUSh+ka rA gu ru pa gardzi ta niHprak+pam+pAH/_/i ti nish+tsi
[\[215a.6\]]bral ba de la ni/_/yul gyis ci dang ci mi byed/_/ngang pa thams cad chu 'dzin dag gi sgra tsam las/_/skrag cing brtan pa nyams pas bcings nas 'bros par byed/_/gang zhig sprin tshogs bcings par sgrogs la g.yo med pa/_/pad stan ngang pa'i rgyal po de ni kha cig yin/_/zhes pa yid kyis
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]t+ya ma na sA sA sha nair+m+r-i du bA di nI/_/ta mu bA tsa sa ma b+h+ye t+ya b+h+rU la tA la s+ya lI la yA/_/tr-i Na ban+mAM pa ri t+ya dz+ya twa yi dU ra ta ra ga te/_/sa pat+nI b+hi ri pA krAn+taM bi sad+d+hiHpa sh+ya me gr-i haM/_/asmin+na pe ma
[\[215b.2\]]nges byas nas/_/smin ma'i 'khri shing rol rtsed can/_/'jam pa smra ba de yis ni/_/de la mngon phyogs dal gyis smras/_/bdag ni rtswa bzhin rab spangs nas/_/khyod ni ring du song ba'i tshe/_/bdag gi khyim ni chun mas bzhin/_/rgud pas zil gyis mnan la ltos/_/rtsom chen 'byor pa
[\[215b.3\]]hA raM b+ha me saM b+ho ga bi brdzi tA/_/twad+daR+sha nA sha yai bA haM d+h+r-i tA sa khye ba niHsu khA/_/ya da s+ya nu tsi te bak+tuM duHkhAr+t+tA di da mu ts+ya te/_/ba dan+ti mau na kA me yaM dza ne dzi hwA pa ladz+dza te/_/nU naM gr-i hA
