[\[215b.4\]]'di la yang /_/longs spyod dag ni rab spangs pa/_/bde med bdag ni grogs kyis bzhin/_/khyod mthong re ba nyid kyis bzung /_/gang yang brjod par mi 'os pa/_/'di ni sdug bsngal dag gis brjod/_/mi smra 'dod kyang brjod pa 'di/_/lce yang rab tu ngo tshar shes/_/khyim bdag gis ni
[\[215b.5\]]d+hi pa ti nA pat+nAHshI la s+ya bi sla baH/_/dr-iSh+To s+ya dzA taM bai rA gyaM ma kA le ka tha ma n+ya thA/_/i ti bismi tamu khaHsar+b+baHpa raspa ra bi lo ka neH/_/ba dat+ya n+ya gu NaglA ni ga NA na ni su no dza naH/_/bi yo ga
[\[215b.6\]]chung ma yi/_/tshul khrims bslad mthong de la ni/_/chags bral skyes pa ma yin nam/_/gzhan du dus min ji ltar 'gyur/_/zhes pa gzhan gyi yon tan ni/_/nyams pa bgrang ba la mkhas pa'i/_/bzhin 'dzum skye bo thams cad ni/_/phan tshun rnam par lta zhing smra/_/'bral bas
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]tap+tAM mAM lo kaHswas+tha tsit+te ti ma n+ya te/_/kle she Sh+ya kliSh+Ta rU pA haM tA ru N+ya s+ya ka ro mi kiM/_/gr-i he pa ri dza nash+tsa ye ma mots+tsh+R-iMM kha la tAM ga taH/_/a swA mi kA nAM nA ri NA ma gre shwA pi pra gal+b+ha
[\[216a.2\]]gdungs pa bdag la ni/_/'jig rten sems sos zhes par 'dzin/_/dar ma nyon mongs dag la ni/_/ma nyams gzugs dag ci zhig bya/_/khyim du g.yog 'khor 'di dag kyang /_/bdag la shin tu ma bsdams gyur/_/bud med bdag po med rnams kyi/_/mdun du khyi yang rab tu
[\[216a.3\]]te/_/dA sa sU nur+m+ma me bA ya mud+s+r-iSh+Te na bi bar+t+ti taH/_/pa sh+yA dz+nyA dA na ko pAd+me ke shA kaR+Sha Na mI ha te/_/i t+yuk+t+wA kr-i ta saM ke tA ni dza dA sa pa rA b+ha baM/_/b+har+t+tush+tsit+ta bi kA rA ya prA pra t+ya k+Sha ma
[\[216a.4\]]dgod/_/bdag gi lhag ma nyid kyis ni/_/rab tu bsos pa 'bangs phrug 'di/_/bka' bsgos khros pas bdag gi ni/_/skra nas 'dren par 'dod la ltos/_/zhes pa brjod nas brda byas te/_/bdag po'i sems ni rnam 'gyur slad/_/rang gi 'bangs kyis zil gnon pa/_/de yis mngon
[\[216a.5\]]daR+sha yatra/_/spr-i hA ma kliSh+Ta rU pe ti bai kla byaM niHsu khe ti tsa/_/IR+Sh+yAM dzA tA pa bA de ti kru d+haM dA pArdi te t+ya pi/_/sa tAM bi lo ka yan+p+rA s+ya saM t+yak+ta bra ta yan+t+ra NaH/_/tu l+yaM saM sA ra do ShA
[\[216a.6\]]sum nyid du bstan/_/ma nyams gzugs zhes chags pa dang /_/bde ba med ces 'khrugs pa dang /_/smad par gyur ces phrag dog dang /_/'bangs kyis gzir zhes khro ba yang /_/thob nas de la lta byed cing /_/brtul zhugs kyis bsdams btang ba de/_/mtshungs par 'khor ba'i skyon
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]NAM sar+b+be ShAM ba sha mA ya yau/_/pA tra tsI ba ra mud+s+r-i dz+ya khaD+ga A kr-iSh+ya b+hI Sha NaM/_/pri yA ni kA ra krauR+Ye Na sa dA saM he tu mud+Ya yau/_/pra Na yAd+bA ri taHsat+n+yA pa dA sa ba d+ha bai ga sAta/_/lI
[\[216b.2\]]rnams ni/_/thams cad dag gi dbang du 'gyur/_/lhung bzed chos gos rab btang zhing /_/'jigs rung ral gri phyung nas ni/_/dga' ma'i gnod pa la khros pas/_/de yis 'bangs ni gsod par zhugs/_/'bangs ni gsod pa'i sdig pa las/_/chung mas 'bad nas zlog pa des/_/dgra
[\[216b.3\]]naM pu nar+g+r-i ha su khaM b+he dze dza na dzi gIR+Sha yA/_/so b+hUd+b+ha ga pa ri gra he Na la la nA saM b+ho ga sau b+hA gya b+hUrnA nA kA ra ni kA ra kA ra Na ka thA ti t+ye Shu ko pA ku laH/_/kA maHkaR+Sha ti saM ya
[\[216b.4\]]las rgyal 'dod khyim gyis ni/_/bde ba dman pa slar yang bsten/_/de ni longs spyod yongs su bzung bas bud med longs spyod skal bzang sa gzhir gyur/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gnod pa'i gtam gyi rgyu las g.yog 'khor rnams la khro bas 'khrugs/_/'dod pas dul ba nyams byed khro
[\[216b.5\]]maM k+Sha pa ya ti kro d+haHk+Sha Ne na k+Sha mAM no mi th+yA bra ta sho Shi te na ma na sA bai rA gya mA sA d+ya te/_/a tha hasti ma hA mA tra pa daM rA dz+nyAr+pi ta pu naH/_/A sA d+ya bi b+ha bo dA raHso b+hU ta b+h+ya d+hi kod+b+ha baH/_/a
[\[216b.6\]]bas skad cig nyid kyis bzod pa rlag par byed/_/rdzun gyi brtul zhugs dag gis gdung ba'i yid kyis chags bral nyid ni 'thob ma yin/_/de nas rgyal pos glang chen gyi/_/sna chen gnas ni slar yang byin/_/'byor pa rgya chen thob gyur nas/_/de nas lhag par rgyas par gyur/_/skabs
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]trAn+ta re piN+Da pA ta mA dA ya na ga rAM ta dA ta/_/b+ha ga ban+taM ba nA sI naM dzi na ma b+he t+ya b+hi k+Sha baH/_/bi ShaN+Na ba da nAstasmai pra Ni pa t+ya n+ya be da yan/_/tsi tra s+ya hasti shay+YA ti pu tra
[\[217a.2\]]der grong khyer nang dag las/_/dge slong rnams kyis bsod snyoms blangs/_/bcom ldan rgyal ba nags tshal na/_/gnas pa dag la mngon phyogs te/_/chags bral bzhin gyis de la ni/_/phyag 'tshal glang chen stan gyi bu/_/nag pa dag gi brtul zhugs ni/_/'os pa min
[\[217a.3\]]s+yA nu tsi taM bra taM/_/b+ha ga bAn tha sar+b+baHsa smi tastA na b+hA Sha ta/_/a sa kwa ku sha le nai ba kr-i taste na bra ta gra haH/_/ye niSh+pan+na bi be ka pA ka ka la nA niHsho Shi tA shA la twAste nA yAn+ti pu naHpu rA Na
[\[217a.4\]]pa rnam par bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen/_/'dzum dang ldan pas der gsungs pa/_/de yi dge ba ma smin pas/_/brtul zhugs dag ni blang bar byas/_/gang zhig dben pa smin zhing rdzogs pa'i brtag pas yid kyi 'khri shing bskams gyur pa/_/de dag phyi nas yul gyi
[\[217a.5\]]bi Sha yA swA da smr-i ter+b+ba sh+ya tAM/_/ye twar+tha pra ti Shid+d+ha gar+b+ba shi thi la t+yak+ta pra sak+ta da rAste ShA man+ta ra sIm+ni ka ma sha ma yordo lA ya mA naM ma naH/_/dzan+mA b+h+yA sa ni Shak+ta e Sha bi Sha ya
[\[217a.6\]]nyams myong rnying pa dran pa'i dbang du 'gyur ma yin/_/gang zhig don gyis bkag cing khengs pas lhod la rgyun du gus pa rab btang ba/_/de dag 'dod dang zhi ba'i bar mtshams dag la yid ni 'phyang mo yug par byed/_/gang gis g.yang sar lhung ba'i mkhas pa rnams kyang dul ba
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]yaspaR+shA b+hi lA ShaHpa raM bi dwAM so pi pa ri t+ya dzan+ti ni ya maM ye nA pa Te pA ti tA/_/rA go da gra bi ShA bi shan+ti bi Sha ma d+h+wAM tAM b+hu maM yo gi naHkA maHka s+ya ka ro ti kIr+N+Na bi shi khA sA re bi kA rek+Sha
[\[217b.2\]]dag ni yongs gtong zhing /_/chags pa'i dug rgyas rnal 'byor can rnams mi bzad smag rum sa la 'jug par byed/_/skye bar goms pas chags shing yul gyi reg pa mchog tu mngon par 'dod gyur pa/_/rnam 'gyur mda' yi char drag dkrigs cha 'dod pa 'di ni su la bzod par
[\[217b.3\]]mAM/_/i t+yug+t+wA b+ha ga bAn+ga twA tsi tra s+ya b+ha ba naM dzi naH/_/de ha pra b+ha b+his+t+ri mi raM bA h+ya mun+mU la yan+pu raH/_/a nu gra ha pra kA she na kr-i twA s+ya bi ma lam+ma naH/_/kr-i ta bra NA ma sat+kA raM taM ni nA ya dzi nA shra maM/_/pu
[\[217b.4\]]byed/_/ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/_/rgyal ba nag pa'i khyim byon nas/_/sku yi 'od kyis phyi rol gyi/_/rab rib rnam par 'joms shing slar/_/rjes su bzung ba'i snang ba yis/_/de yi yid ni dri med mdzad/_/phyag dang bsnyen bkur byas pa de/_/rang nyid kyi ni gnas su khrid/_/der
[\[217b.5\]]nasta trA s+ya nir+b+yA dza pra bra dz+yA brdza nA dzu ShaH/_/dzi naHpra bi da d+he sid+d+h+yai shud+d+ha sad+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/saM prAp+tAr+hat+pa de tasmin sa ka la kle sha saM k+Sha yAta/_/tat+pUr+b+be br-it+taM b+ha ga bAn kr-iSh+To b+hi k+Shu b+hi ra b+h+ya d+hA ta/_/dzan+mAn+ta
[\[217b.6\]]ni slar yang gus pa yis/_/zol med rab byung de yis bsten/_/grub slad rgyal bas dag pa yi/_/dam pa'i chos ni rab bstan mdzad/_/nyon mongs thams cad rab zad pas/_/de ni dgra bcom gnas thob tshe/_/de yi sngon byung dge slong gis/_/dris nas bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/_/sngon
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]re pu rA te na b+hak+t+yA+e sa ta ta ma tsi taH/_/pra t+ye ka bud+d+haish+tsai t+yaM tsa ta s+yAn+te bi hi tam+ma hata/_/tat+pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na d+ha n+yo yaM ma ma shA sa ne/_/pra bra dz+yAM sa mu sA dA ya tsi tror+har+tha da mA
[\[218a.2\]]gyi skye ba gzhan la des/_/rang sangs rgyas ni gus pa yis/_/rtag tu mchod cing de yis ni/_/mjug tu mchod rten chen po bsgrubs/_/de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/_/skal ldan nag pa 'di yis ni/_/bdag gi bstan la rab byung dag_/blangs nas dgra bcom
[\[218a.3\]]shri taH/_/kA ra NaM shrU ya tA ma s+ya pu naHkA ma pra bar+t+ta ne/_/e Sha pra tA ri taHpUr+b+bi pat+n+ya smin+na pi dzan+ma ni/_/ba b+hU brah+ma dat+ta s+ya bA rA Na s+yAm+ma hI pa teH/_/pa ri pUr+Na gu NaHshrI mAM ha ri dat+taHpu ro hi taH/_/niSh+pan+na
[\[218a.4\]]gnas la brten/_/'di ni slar yang 'dod pa la/_/rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu dag nyon/_/sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang /_/'di ni chung mas rab tu bslus/_/bA rA Na sI dag tu ni/_/sa yi bdag po tshangs byin gyi/_/yon tan yongs rdzogs mdun na 'don/_/dpal ldan 'phrog byed kyis byin byung /_/de
[\[218a.5\]]bi na yau bi d+yA pu trau ta s+ya ba b+hU ba tuH/_/ha ri drA ya Na i t+ye kasta thA ha ri shi kho\u0f85pa raH/_/tau bi be kAp+ta bai rA gya b+ha ba b+ho ga ba rAd+mu khau/_/ta po ba ne pa ri bra dz+ya pany+tsA b+hi dz+nyA twa mA pa tuH/_/
[\[218a.6\]]la rig dang 'dul ba dag_/rdzogs pa'i bu gnyis byung gyur te/_/gcig ni 'phrog byed bu zhes dang /_/de bzhin gzhan pa 'phrog byed rtse/_/de dag chags bral dben pa thob/_/srid pa'i longs spyod las phyir phyogs/_/dka' thub nags tshal yongs rgyu zhing /_/mngon shes lnga ni thob par gyur/_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ta byo ma tsA rI N+Nau rA dz+nyA pU dz+ya mA nau dza ne na tsa/_/prA ya tuHpra sha ma sh+lA g+h+yau mu nI nA ma pi mA n+ya tAM/_/ka dA tsid+b+hU pa b+ha ba nas+thi ti ha ri shi khe nr-i paH/_/ka n+yAM lA ba N+ya ba t+yA khyA mU tsi dig+bi dza yon+mu khaH/_/bet+si
[\[218b.2\]]rgyal dang skye bos mchod byed cing /_/rab zhi bsngags par 'os pa yis/_/mkha' la rgyu ba de dag ni/_/thub pa rnams kyi'ang mchod byar gyur/_/nam zhig sa bdag khang pa na/_/'phrog byed rtse gnas mi bdag ni/_/phyogs las rgyal ba mngon phyogs pas/_/bu mo mdzes ldan zhes la smras/_/mnyes
[\[218b.3\]]twa yA mu ne re s+ya gau ra be Na ga rI ya sA/_/pU dz+yA s+ya pU dza naM kAR+yaM sat+kArAr+ho h+ya yam+ma ma/_/su tA mi ti sa mA di sh+ya pra yA te pr-i thi bI pa tau/_/rA dza pu trI su de bA b+hUtra pU dzA pra Na yi nI mu neH/_/he mats+tshe dats+tsha bi pa ri tsi tAM kAn+ti
[\[218b.4\]]gshin khyod kyis gus pa ni/_/shin tu che bas thub pa dag_/mchod bya 'di la mchod pa bya/_/'di ni bdag gis bkur sti 'os/_/zhes pa bu mo la bstan nas/_/sa yi bdag po rab song tshe/_/rgyal po'i bu mo gus ldan mas/_/thub pa rtag tu mchod par gyur/_/gser bcad 'od ltar yongs su shes pa'i
[\[218b.5\]]maM ge da d+hA naM taM ba sh+yan+tI ka ma la na ya naM sA b+hi lA ShA b+ha bta sA/_/kA maHkA maM ru tsi ra bi Sha yA lam+ba naHsaM ga mA NaM pra t+yA sa t+yA ki ma pi hr-i da ye bad+d+ha mU lA ka ro ti/_/sI naHsha san+tisma
[\[218b.6\]]mdzes pa lus la 'dzin byed cing /_/pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan pa de mthong de ni mngon par sred ldan gyur/_/lhan cig 'khod pas nges par mdzes pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i 'dod pa yis/_/'grogs pa'i bsam pa snying la rtsa ba zug pa ci yang byed par 'gyur/_/rlung gzhon dag gis bskyod
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ra saM b+h+ra me Na bA lA ni le nA ka li tA ka te ba/_/aM ge ra saM ga s+ya mu nesh+tsa kA ra A nan+da mA li ga na mA na tAM gI/_/na ba hu ba mu kha lag+ne nAM ka rA ge Na ta s+yAM hr-i di ma da na nraM pA dz+nyA le
[\[219a.2\]]pa'i 'khri shing bzhin/_/'dod pa'i rnam 'phrul shugs 'byin lus dag ni/_/dud pas de yi lus kyi kun dga' dang /_/bcas pas grogs med thub la 'khyud pa byas/_/de yi nu ma gsar pa'i rtser chags lus kyi tshon gyis ni/_/'dod pa rgyal po'i bka' yig rgya ldan snying
[\[219a.3\]]khya mu drAM da d+hA naH/_/mu ni ra b+ha ba da kaN+De b+h+yaM ya mA lA ba b+haM gA da b+hi na ba ma da li not+saM kha lastaSh+k+Sha Ne na/_/br-i Sha bya yA yAn+mi thu na kr-i yA yAM sa mu d+ya taHkarka ta du rud+g+ra he Na/_/sA rA dza siM ha s+ya gra her+k+ka tu l+yasta
[\[219a.4\]]la 'dzin byed cing /_/de dus nyid na glo bur du ni dul ba'i gdags thag chad/_/thub pa 'dod pa'i rtse dga' gsar pa dag la 'byor par gyur/_/khyu mchog nyams las 'khrig pa'i bya ba la/_/rab tu sbyor zhing sdig pas bzung ba bzhin/_/rgyal po seng ge'i khyim du nyi mtshungs de/_/gdung slad bu
[\[219a.5\]]pA ya ka n+yA ga ma non+mu kho b+hUta/_/na man+t+rai rUt+sa R+YaM na tsa ru tsi ma yaiHshAs+t+ra ma Ni b+hir+n+na yo gair+n+nad+d+h+yA nair+n+na tsa sha ma bi she Shau Sha d+hi ra saiH/_/mu hur+m+mUts+tsha mo ha pra la ya ma ya mA lIM ga na bi d+hau b+hu dzaM gI nAM nU naM bi Sha maM
[\[219a.6\]]mo la ni 'gro 'dod gyur/_/'khyud pa'i sgrub byed dag la lag 'gro ma rnams dug ni mi bzad pa/_/yang yang rgyal rmongs 'jig byed rang bzhin lus la nges par zhugs pa dag_/sngags kyis zhi ba ma yin 'od kyi rang bzhin bstan bcos nor bus min/_/sbyor min bsam gtan gyis min zhi
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ge ni ba pa ti/_/ni pa ti ta prI ta ma yo mr-i gAk+Sh+yA sa tsauR+Ya saM b+ho ga ma ye ma madz+dza/_/ma nI Shi NA ma s+ya bi be ka dzan+mA d+haiR+YAn+ta kr-it+man+ma tha saM ni pA taH/_/rA gaHsaM ga pa rAt+mu kho hr-i di dza pA
[\[219b.2\]]ba'i khyad par sman gyi ro yis min/_/mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rkun po'i longs spyod tshur/_/ri dgas mig can gyis 'phangs de lhung ste/_/dben pa med las skyes pa'i yid srubs tshogs/_/mkhas rnams kyi yang brtan pa mthar byed yin/_/'grogs las phyir phyogs snying la chags dang bzlas
[\[219b.3\]]d+hA rA d+ha re tsum+ba naM d+h+yA nA laM bi ni lo tsa ne pra Ni yi nI lA ba N+ya bA not+sa baH/_/pA Nau pA tra ya tsi tri te ku tsa yu gaM puSh+pA yu d+hA rA d+ha ne ta s+yA saM ya ma dIk+Sh+ya ya ba na ba tAM sar+b+baM dza gA
[\[219b.4\]]pa'i gzhi ma mchu la 'o dang ni/_/bsam gtan dag la dmigs pa'i spyan la mdza' gcugs mdzes sdug btung ba'i dga' ston dang /_/lhung bzed kyis gtsang lag par nu ma bzung ste me tog mtshon ldan mnyes pa las/_/dul min bslab pa dag gis de yis brtul zhugs thams cad
[\[219b.5\]]ma bra taM/_/ta s+yA phUd+b+hU pa ti pu tA b+hu dza pany+dza ra bar+t+ti naH/_/dIp+ta iR+Sh+ye ba sa ha sA ta paHsid+d+hi pa rAd+mu khI/_/na taM bi dz+nyA ta br-it+to pi b+hI t+yAn+taHpu ri ko dza naH/_/ma hA t+ya bi na ye tasmin kash+tsit+p+ro bA tsi
[\[219b.6\]]gsar pa nyid du gyur/_/sa bdag bu mo'i lag pa yis/_/dra bar gnas pa de la ni/_/dka' thub grub 'bar 'phral nyid la/_/phrag dog can bzhin phyir phyogs gyur/_/de ni ma thul che ba'i tshe/_/pho brang 'khor gyi skye bo yis/_/spyod tshul shes kyang 'jigs gyur nas/_/sus kyang ci yang
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]kiM tsa na/_/tsi ra pra t+yA ga ta s+yA tha b+hU pa terbi dza yot+sa baH/_/ba b+hU bAd+b+hu ta saM b+hA ra pra b+hU ta bi b+ha bod+b+ha baH/_/sa pUr+b+baM b+hak+ti bi b+ha baHswa yaM hA ri shi khaM mu ni/_/b+hU pa tir+b+hU mi pA lAr+haiHsar+b+ba
[\[220a.2\]]der ma smras/_/de nas sa bdag yun ring na/_/phyir log rgyal ba'i dga' ston can/_/'byor pa rmad du byung ba'i tshogs/_/rab tu mang ba rgyas par gyur/_/sngon byung thub pa 'phrog byed rtse/_/sa bdag gus shing dul ldan de/_/rang gis sa skyong la 'os pa'i/_/longs spyod
[\[220a.3\]]b+ho gai ra pU dza yata/_/b+huny+dzA na s+yak+Shi ti pa tau pa Na yAt+pu ra taHs+thi te/_/mu nerlA ba N+ya ba t+ya gre pa ri tsaR+YA pa rA b+ha bta/_/ta ta staM he ma b+h+r-i gAM ra bya gra pA Ni yu gAM mu niH/_/e hI ti bi smr-i ta d+h+r-i tiHpra sAR+Ya b+hu
[\[220a.4\]]kun gyis rab tu mchod/_/thub pa gsol ba'i mdun du ni/_/sa bdag gus pas 'khod pa'i tshe/_/mdzes ldan ma yis sngon du ni/_/rim gro dag ni legs par byas/_/de nas gser gyi chu snod kyis/_/lag gnyis brel ba de la ni/_/thub pa brtan pa brjed pa yis/_/lag brkyangs tshur shog
[\[220a.5\]]dza ma bra bIta/_/ta s+ya sma ra bi kA raM taM dr-iSh+T+wai ba ku bi to nr-i paH/_/pA pa pra ti kri ya yo ge ni gra he bi da d+he ma tiM/_/krU ra ko paM pi tur+b+bak+t+raM dr-iSh+T+wA lA ba N+ya ba t+ya pi/_/kaN+The lam+bi mu ner+b+tak+Sh+ya mi t+yuk+t+wA s+ya
[\[220a.6\]]ces pa smras/_/de yi 'dod pa'i rnam 'gyur de/_/mthong nas mi bdag rab khros te/_/sdig pa'i phyir bcos sbyor ba la/_/chad pas bcad pa'i blo gros bsgrubs/_/drag po khros pa pha yi bzhin/_/mthong nas mdzes ldan ma yis kyang /_/thub pa'i mgrin par zas chags zhes/_/brjod
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]da dau pa yaH/_/pA pA bah+na ba bai tsi trAM pra t+yut+pan+na gi raHpa ra/_/mA yA ma yai pi ni ma ye br-i haspa ti d+hi yaHs+t+ri yaH/_/du hi tur+b+ba tsa pA te na sa ha sai ba pra san+na tAM/_/nr-i paHka ta ka tsUr+N+Ne na dza la sha ya i
[\[220b.2\]]nas de la chu dag byin/_/bud med phur bu'i blo gros can/_/skabs su nyer mkho'i tshig dag ni/_/phyir zlog sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis/_/sdig pa'i sgrib byed rnam par bkra/_/bu mo yi ni tshig de yis/_/'phral la nyid du mi yi bdag_/ka ta ka yi phye ma yi/_/chu yi gnas bzhin dang bar
[\[220b.3\]]bA ya yau/_/a trAn+ta re mu nesta s+ya dz+yeSh+Tho b+h+rA tA ba na s+thi tiH/_/bi naSh+TAM di byad+d+hir+dz+nyA twA lup+tad+d+herga ga na ga ti/_/duH khi taHswa ya ma b+h+ye t+ya taM nI twAHni dza mA shra ma/_/pany+tsa b+hi dz+nyaM pu nash+tsakre tsa tur+d+h+yA na pa rA ya
[\[220b.4\]]gyur/_/skabs der thub pa rdzu 'phrul bri/_/de yis mkha' la 'gro nyams pa/_/spun zla thu bo nags na gnas/_/lha yi spyan ldan gyis shes nas/_/sdug bsngal rang nyid mngon phyogs te/_/de ni rang gi gnas khrid nas/_/slar yang bsam gtan bzhi bskyangs te/_/mngon shes lnga dang ldan
[\[220b.5\]]NaM/_/na ra pa ti ra pi dz+nyA twA rA go da d+ho pa ti taM mu niM bi Sha ma bi Sha ya kle shA bar+t+tAt+pu nash+tsa bi nirga taM/_/ba hu ta ra ta paste dzo dag+d+ha sma ra smr-i ti pA ta kaM ru Sha mu pa tsi tAM t+yak+tA d+hI mAn+p+ra pA da mu pA ya yau/_/ha ri
[\[220b.6\]]par byas/_/thub pa chags pa'i chu gter du lhung mi bzad yul gyis ni/_/nyon mongs 'khor lo dag las phyir phyung rab mang dka' thub kyi/_/gzi yi 'dod pa dran pa'i sdig bsregs shes nas khro ba'i tshogs/_/btang nas mi bdag blo ldan dag kyang rab tu dang bar gyur/_/de yi tshe
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]drA ya Na saM dz+nyo sA bra ho me ba ta dA b+ha baM/_/tsi tro ha ri shi khash+tsad+b+hUt+tat+nI ba nr-i pAd+ma dzA/_/a bi ta thAM pra thi tAM swa ka thA mi mAM ka thaM ta bA ni ti ta tra ta thA ga taH/_/sa ka la do Sha ma ye na
[\[221a.2\]]na nga nyid ni/_/'phrog byed bu yi ming can de/_/nag pa dag kyang 'phrog byed rtse/_/chung ma rgyal po'i bu mor gyur/_/de skad der ni mi bden ma yin rab grags pa'i/_/rang gi gtam 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bshad gyur te/_/gang gi srid pa mtha' dag skyon gyi
[\[221a.3\]]b+ha bai ma tiHki ma pi b+hik+Shu ga Na s+ya ya yA b+ha bta/_/i ti k+She me n+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM tsi tra hasti sha y+YA tI pu trA ba dA na maSh+TA shI ti ta ma pal+la baH//_//
[\[221a.4\]]rang bzhin las/_/dge slong tshogs kyis blo gros ci yang zhugs ma gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nag pa glang po'i stan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[221a.5\]]ud+b+hUta b+hai ra ba g+ha nA ni la nir+m+ma tor+m+mi saM pU ri tA khi la di gan+ta ra g+ho ra g+ho ShaH/_/dur+b+bA ra bA ri bi kr-i tir+m+ma ka rA ka ro pi so Sh+yan+ta me ti su ga ta smra ra Ne na puM sAM/_/shrA bas+t+yA
[\[221a.6\]]'jigs rung stug po'i rlung gis rab bslangs rba rlabs rnam sprul pas/_/ma lus phyogs kun yongs 'gengs drag po'i sgra dang rab tu ldan/_/chu srin 'byung gnas bzlog dka' chu yi rnam 'gyur can de yang /_/bde gshegs dran pa'i mi rnams dag la mtha' ru gyur pa nyid/_/rgyal ba
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]swasti ye sar+b+ba dz+nya dza ga tAM sa to d+ya te/_/dzi na dze ta ba nA rA bi hA ra ni ra te pu rA/_/bi pu la dwI pa yA trA yA mut+sA he na kr-i ta k+Sha NaH/_/rat+nar+thI ba ni dzAM sAr+thastI ram+p+rA ba ma ho da d+heH/_/ta taHpra
[\[221b.2\]]'gro kun bde legs la/_/rtag tu sbyor zhing mnyan yod kyi/_/rgyal byed tshal gyi kun dga' ra/_/gtsug lag khang na sngon zhugs tshe/_/yangs pa'i gling du 'gro ba la/_/spro ba yis ni dus byas pa/_/rin chen don gnyer tshong pa yi/_/don mthun chu gter chu 'gram phyin/_/de nas gzings
[\[221b.3\]]ba ha NA rU D+he sAr+the gu ru ta raM b+ha raM/_/bi tsin+t+ya kar+N+Na d+hA rastA dU tse madz+dza na saM ki taH/_/ke yaM yuSh+mA ka maut+su kyA dA ro ha Na pa raM pa rA/_/twaM ga tu raM ga shr-iM go yaM na gr-i hAM ga Na maM bu d+hiH/_/sa h+yastA bat+p+ra ba ha Ne b+ha bad+b+hiH
[\[221b.4\]]la don mthun ni/_/rab tu zhon tshe lci ba'i khur/_/dpyad nas bying du dogs pa yi/_/rna ba 'dzin pas de la smras/_/khyed rnams rab tu sred pa yis/_/brgyud mar zhon pa 'di ni ci/_/chu gter rba rlabs rtse mo 'di/_/khyim gyi khyams ni yongs ma yin/_/re zhig khyod kyis gzings la ni/_/'tsham
[\[221b.5\]]kr-i ya tAM b+ha raH/_/rat+na rA shi na ka s+yeSh+TaHkiM twAb+d+hirba hu be sla baH/_/a n+ya tror+m+mi pra ban+d+haHkha ra ma ka ra ku ka bya ku lo n+ya tra be gaHkIr+N+Nau n+ya trAn+ta rA dris+thi ra shi kha ra g+ha nod+g+ha ta saM byA ha to g+haH/_/a n+ya
[\[221b.6\]]pa'i khur dag rab tu mdzod/_/rin chen phung po su mi 'dod/_/'on kyang chu gter 'tshe ba mang /_/chu gter na ni gzhan na rba rlabs rab 'khrug gzhan na drag po'i chu srin tshogs dkrigs shugs/_/gzhan na nang gi ri bo brtan pa'i rtse mo stug pas rab bsnun tshogs kyi rgyun bkag 'thor/_/gzhan na
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]tro d+yat+k+r-i taM ta shwa si ta ta ra ma rut+san+ni pA taM b+h+ra mo n+wesh+tsaN+Do n+ya trAs+t+ya kAN+Da k+Sha ya ni bi Da shi khA maN+Da lo bA Da bAg+niH/_/shru twe ti kar+N+Na d+hA re Na ka thi taM ru pa maM bud+heH/_/a ba ru
[\[222a.2\]]rlung ni mthar byed dag gi dbugs ltar drag pa langs pas kun tu bsnun cing 'khor/_/gzhan na glo bur nyams byed rta gdong me ni rab brtan me lce'i dkyil 'khor gtum pa yod/_/ces pa rna ba 'dzin pa yis/_/chu gter rang bzhin bshad thos nas/_/'ga' zhig
[\[222a.3\]]h+ya ya yuHke tsit+tas+thuHke tsit+ma hA sha yAH/_/rat+na dwI pa ma thA sA d+ya ya te sAr+tho kr-i tAr+thi tAM/_/a nu ku lA ni le kA le pra t+ya br-it+te sha naiHsha naiH/_/da dr-i shur+b+ba Ni dzaHsar+b+be pu raHsaM pU ti tAm+ba raM/_/bi sA ri tA s+ya ku
[\[222a.4\]]babs nas song bar gyur/_/bsam pa che ba 'ga' zhig 'khod/_/de nas rin chen gling phyin te/_/don mthun don byas nyid gyur cing /_/dal bu dal bus rjes mthun gyi/_/rlung gi rjes su log pa'i tshe/_/ri bo man da ra bslang bzhin/_/nam mkha' kun tu gang gyur cing /_/kha gdangs phub ltar gyur pa ni/_/
[\[222a.5\]]ha rA man+da rA dr-i ti pong+ga taM/_/sa kUr+m+ma mI na ma ka re sa li le sa ka lem+bu d+hiH/_/ta s+yai bA b+hi mu khaM be gAt+p+ras+thi te shwa b+h+ra pAta bta/_/kr-i tAn+ta bak+ta ku ha rA san+ne pra ba ha ne ta taH/_/sa prats+tshur+b+ba Ni dzaHkar+N+Na d+hA ra bi
[\[222a.6\]]tshong pa kun gyis mdun du mthong /_/rus sbal nya dang chu srin bcas/_/rgya mtsho'i chu ni ma lus pa/_/g.yang sar lhung bzhin de la ni/_/mngon phyogs mgyogs par song gyur cing /_/de nas gzings ni mthar byed kyi/_/kha yi phug dang nye ba'i tshe/_/tshong pa bslad pas 'khrugs rnams kyis/_/rna ba
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]sla ba bi hwa lAH/_/a b+hU ta pUr+b+ba mud+b+hU ta b+hu taM ki mi da mad+b+hu taM/_/u di ta mUr+d+h+ni tsaN+DAM shu yu ga laM ya s+ya dr-i sh+ya te/_/a s+yA b+hi mu ba me tat+kiM sa li laM pa ri sar+b+ba ti/_/kr-i Sh+ya mA naM pra ba ha NaM ya s+ya be ge na g+hUr+N+Na te/_/
[\[222b.2\]]'dzin pa dag la dris/_/sngon ma byung ba byung gyur pa/_/rmad byung 'byung po 'di ni ci/_/gang gi spyi bor tsha zer can/_/zung zhig shar ba lta bur mthong /_/'di ni mngon phyogs chu 'di dag_/ci slad yongs su rgyug par byed/_/gang gi shugs kyis gzings 'di ni/_/'dren par byed cing rnam par g.yo/_/
[\[222b.3\]]i t+ya kaN+Da k+Sha yAM raM b+ha b+ha ya saM b+h+ra ma kA ta reH/_/ba Nig+b+hiHsaM sha ye pr-iSh+TaHkar+N+Na d+hA raHsa ma b+h+ya d+hAtra/_/ti miM gi li gi lim+mat+s+yaHsatwa saM ha ra kr-it+ma hAn/_/saM mo ha i ba saM sA ra ni ba sat+ye Sha sA ga re/_/a s+ya
[\[222b.4\]]de lta glo bur brlag rtsom pa'i/_/'jigs pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis skrag pa/_/tshong pa rnams kyis the tshom dris/_/rna ba 'dzin pas rab smras pa/_/nya mid mid par byed pa'i nya/_/sems can 'joms byed chen po 'di/_/rgya mtsho dag na rnam par gnas/_/'khor ba na ni kun rmongs bzhin/_/nyi ma bcu
[\[222b.5\]]kalpan+ta g+ho ra s+ya ne tra yug+maM pra dr-i sh+ya te/_/dwA da sharko da ya ram+b+he sUR+Ya dwa ya mi bo di taM/_/a s+yA s+ya shwa b+h+ra paR+Yan+te shu b+h+ra pa ri bA ri tA/_/ma hA tri shr-iM ga mA le ba lak+Sh+ya te da sha nA ba lI/_/bra ba he Na pra
[\[222b.6\]]gnyis 'char rtsom tshe/_/nyi ma zung ni shar ba bzhin/_/dus mtha' 'jigs rung 'di yi ni/_/mig ni zung dag rab tu mthong /_/'di yi kha yi g.yang sa'i mthar/_/sprin dkar dag gis yongs bskor ba'i/_/ri rtse chen po'i 'phreng ba bzhin/_/so yi 'phreng ba rab tu mtshon/_/'di yi kha ru lhung ba yi/_/
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]ba ha NaM kr-iSh+Ta ma s+yA pya pAM ti nA/_/bi Sha yA b+hi mu khaM tsit+ta mi ba d+hartun+na shAkya te/_/smaR+Ya tAM dai ba taM kiM tsidz+dzan+mAn+ta ra shu b+ha pra daM/_/pra ti kri yAsmin+nA s+t+ye ba ni d+ha ne kar+m+ma nir+m+mi te/_/i t+yuk+taM kar+N+Na d+hA re Na shru
[\[223a.2\]]rgyun gyis gzings ni drangs pa dag_/yul la mngon par phyogs pa yi/_/sems bzhin gzung bar nus ma yin/_/'chi ba las kyis sprul gyur pa/_/'di la phyir bcos yod ma yin/_/skye ba gzhan la dge ster ba'i/_/lha ni cung zad dran par mdzod/_/ces pa rna 'dzin gyis brjod pa/_/tshong
[\[223a.3\]]twA sar+b+be ba Nig+ba rAH/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya bud+d+hA ye t+yU buHsA kran+da nA di naH/_/nA daM te ShAM b+ha yAr+t+tA naM b+ha ga bAn b+hU ta b+hA ba naH/_/di bya shro tre Na shrA ba dzi ni dze ta ba nas+thi teH/_/bud+d+hA b+hi d+hA nAM shru twe
[\[223a.4\]]pa'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes/_/cho nge'i sgra dang ldan pas smras/_/'jigs pas gzir ba de dag sgra/_/bcom ldan rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi/_/tshal bzhugs 'byung po la dgongs pas/_/lha yi rna ba dag gis thos/_/mun pa zhi byed sangs
[\[223a.5\]]ba ta maHpra sha ma naM ti tiH/_/sha nair+b+ya mI la yad+bak+t+raM satwo pa sla ba shan+ta ye/_/saM pr-it+tA s+ye sha naistasmin+p+ra te be shau g+ha bi sla bAta/_/kA la bak+t+rAt+p+ra ba ha NaM muk+taM ta Ta mA ya yau/_/ta taHku sha li naHsar+b+ba
[\[223a.6\]]rgyas kyi/_/mtshan thos nyid na sems can gyi/_/nyer 'tshe zhi slad nya mid kha/_/dal bu yis ni zum par gyur/_/dal gyis de ni kha bsgribs tshe/_/mi mthun phyogs 'gro rgyun nyams pas/_/dus kyi kha las grol ba yi/_/gzings ni rang gi ngos su phyin/_/de nas mi bzad 'jigs las
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]tir+N+NAstI bra ta rAd+b+hA yAta/_/shrA bstI rat+na saM pur+N+NA bi shud+d+hirbi shru ta shrI yaH/_/te ga twA b+hak+ta saM yuk+tA bya sa na trA Na kA ri NaM/_/dzi naM dze ta ba nA si naM b+ha ga bAn+taM ba ban+di tre/_/te ta s+ya daR+sha ne
[\[223b.2\]]thar/_/grags pa'i dpal ldan rin chen gyis/_/khengs shing dge ba ldan pa kun/_/mnyan yod du ni rnam par zhugs/_/gus ldan de dag song gyur nas/_/gdung ba skyob par mdzad pa po/_/rgyal ba bcom ldan rgyal byed kyi/_/tshal na bzhugs la phyag dag 'tshal/_/de dag de mthong
[\[223b.3\]]nai ba ts+tshin+na saM sA ra ban+d+ha nAH/_/sa d+yaHpra sA da mA sA d+ya pra bra dz+yAr+ha twA mA ya yuH/_/a b+ha bat+kA sh+ya pA khya s+ya shAstuHshA sa na bar+t+ti naH/_/e te dzan+ma ni pUr+b+basmin pro bA tsa b+ha ga bA ni ti/_/ti miM gi la gi li
[\[223b.4\]]nyid na ni/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba chad gyur cing /_/'phral la rab tu dang ba thob/_/rab tu byung nas dgra bcom gyur/_/'di dag sngon gyi skye ba la/_/ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi/_/bstan la zhugs par gyur to zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs/_/rgya mtshor nya mid mid pa
[\[223b.5\]]s+t+wab+d+hau bista raHsatwa saM hr-i te/_/prA pak+Sha Ne na tIk+Sh+NAg+niHk+Shur+k+Sha ta prA Na saM k+Sha yaM/_/klin+na ka le ba raM ta s+ya du rA mau dA sa histu b+hiH/_/sod+be ge rba li b+hirnA gaiHk+Ship+taM dza la ni d+hesta Ta/_/sa shuSh+kAs+the ma
[\[223b.6\]]yang /_/sems can 'joms las chags bral te/_/bkres pa'i me rnon gyis nyen cing /_/skad cig gis ni srog zad thob/_/dri dang mi bzod yid 'byung dang /_/bcas pa'i klu ni stobs ldan gyis/_/de yi ro ni mi gtsang ba/_/chu gter dag gi ngogs su 'phangs/_/dus kyis rus
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]yaHkA yaHkA le na k+Sha lo tem+bu b+hiH/_/tu ShA ra rA shi saM ts+tshan+naHshe la ku Ta i bA ba b+hau/_/shrA bas+t+yAM brAh+ma Na s+yA tha su man+toHpu tra tAM ga taH/_/mA tuHsa tsakre gar+b+ha s+tha stIM braM k+Shud+duHkha be da nAM/_/
[\[224a.2\]]pa skam po yi/_/rang bzhin lus de chus bkrus pa/_/ri bo brtsegs pa kha ba yi/_/phung pos bsgribs pa bzhin du mdzes/_/de nas mnyan yod bram ze ni/_/su man tu yi bu nyid gyur/_/ma la bkres pa'i sdug bsngal tshor/_/mi bzad mngal gnas de yis byas/_/
[\[224a.3\]]sa dzA tas+t+rI sha tasta n+yai s+t+r-ip+tiM nak+Shu d+hi to ya yau/_/sa sha nair+b+bar+d+ha mA nash+tsa saM b+hU tair+b+hU ri b+ho dza naiH/_/a tr-ip+t+yA pa ra mud+big+naHsa ga twA b+hik+Shu saM ga maM/_/pra bra dz+yaM sa mu pA dA ya tr-ip+tin+na pra pa piN+Da kaiH/_/ba
[\[224a.4\]]skyes tshe bkres pa bud med ni/_/brgya yi 'o mas tshim ma gyur/_/dal gyis skyed bsrings tshe na ni/_/zas tshogs shin tu mang bas kyang /_/ma tshim mchog tu yid byung ba/_/de ni dge slong tshogs song nas/_/rab tu byung ba nye bar blangs/_/bsod snyoms dag gis tshim ma gyur/_/de
[\[224a.5\]]hu b+hug+bi shru taHso tha bi pu la laiHsaM g+ha b+ho dza naiH/_/shrad+d+hA ni man+t+ra Naistar+b+hUr+n+na kwa tsit+t+r-ip+ta mA ya yau/_/a trAn+ta re gr-i ha pa tiHshrI mAn+dA na bra dA b+hi d+haH/_/ni man+t+ra NA ya b+hik+ShU NAM shrad+d+ha yA sa mu pa
[\[224a.6\]]nas cher bkres grags pa de/_/dad pas mgron gnyer dge 'dun gyi/_/rgya che mchod ston de dang des/_/gang du yang ni tshim ma gyur/_/skabs der khyim bdag dpal dang ldan/_/sbyin pa'i brtul zhugs zhes brjod pas/_/dad pa yi ni dge slong rnams/_/mgron du gnyer slad nye
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ya yau/_/saM g+he n+ya tra ga te b+hok+tuM ta me ba ba hu b+ho dza naM/_/e ka me ba sa saM prA pya b+ho dz+yaM tasmai n+ya be da yata/_/tasmin k+Sha Ne na byuny+dzA ne pra b+hU ta pu ru ShA sha naM/_/da dau kr-i ha pa ti stasmai sa map+ta saM g+ha b+ho dza naM/_/an+na s+ya
[\[224b.2\]]bar 'ongs/_/dge 'dun gzhan du gsol ba la/_/gshegs te mang za de nyid ni/_/gcig pu de yis yang dag thob/_/de la zas ni rab tu phul/_/skyes bu rab tu mang ba'i zas/_/skad cig gis ni de zos tshe/_/mtha' dag dge 'dun mchod ston ni/_/khyim gyi bdag pos de la byin/_/ya mtshan
[\[224b.3\]]sAM ka Te te na b+huk+taM bisma ya kA raM NA/_/b+hI t+yA gr-i ha pa tir+b+hU taHsaM kalpaHsa ma tsin+ta yata/_/a ho ma yA yaM saM prAp+taHsu ku mA rolpa kA sha naH/_/niHshe ShaM b+huk+ta me ke na ye na saM g+ha s+ya b+ho dza naM/_/pra saM ge na na
[\[224b.4\]]byed po de yis ni/_/bzan gyi phung po zos pa'i tshe/_/khyim gyi bdag po 'jigs pa yi/_/'byung por brtags te yang dag bsams/_/kye ma rab gzhon chung ngu yi/_/zas can 'di ni bdag gis thob/_/gang zhig gcig pus dge 'dun gyi/_/mchod ston dag ni ma lus zos/_/ji srid gnod sbyin
[\[224b.5\]]ya k+Sho yaM yA ban+mA ma pi khA da ti/_/da twA smai dak+Shi NaM tA badz+dza bA da pa pA rA mya haM/_/i ti saM tsin+t+ya sA shaM kaMsta smai da twA sa dak+Shi NAM/_/paSh+tsa dA ga ma na trA sAd+Ya yau bi tsa li tA na naH/_/ga twA b+ha ga ba te
[\[224b.6\]]'di yis ni/_/zhar la bdag kyang ma zos pas/_/de srid 'di la yon byin nas/_/bdag ni mgyogs par 'gro bar bya/_/zhes bsams dogs dang bcas pa de/_/de la yon ni rab phul nas/_/phyi nas 'ong ba la skrag pas/_/phyir mig rnam par blta zhing song /_/phyin nas de yi spyod tshul
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]sar+b+baM tat+p+rit+tAn+taM ni pa d+yasaH/_/ko sau ya k+Sho nu rak+Sho be d+ya pr-its+tshat+su ga taM pu raH/_/b+ha ga bA na bi ta prA ha na sau yak+Sho na rAk+Sha saH/_/e Sha d+har+m+ma ru tsi nA ma b+hik+Shu rar+ha twa me Sh+ya ti/_/
[\[225a.2\]]kun/_/de yis bcom ldan la bshad de/_/'di ni gnod sbyin srin po'am/_/ci zhes bde gshegs sngon du dris/_/bcom ldan gyis kyang der gsungs pa/_/gnod sbyin 'di min srin po min/_/dge slong chos sred ces bya ba/_/'di ni dgra bcom nyid du 'gyur/_/
[\[225a.3\]]a tha d+har+m+ma ru tsiM shAstA swa yaM ni twA bi hA ya sA/_/a daR+sha yan+ni dzaM ta s+ya bi ka rA laM ka le ba raM/_/ta s+ya paR+Yan+ta mA la kya saM sA ra mi ba b+hI Sha NaM/_/ki me ta di ti pa prats+tsha khe dA d+har+m+ma ru tsirdzi naM/_/ta ma bo tsa ta sar+b+ba dz+nyaHkiM tsit+s+mi ta
[\[225a.4\]]de nas ston pa rang nyid kyis/_/chos sred mkha' la khrid nas ni/_/de la 'jigs su rung ba yi/_/rang gi lus dag rab tu bstan/_/'khor ba bzhin du 'jigs rung ba/_/de yi mtha' ni mthong gyur nas/_/chos sred skyo nas rgyal ba la/_/'di ci zhes pa rab tu dris/_/cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhin ras can/_/thams
[\[225a.5\]]si tA na naH/_/a yaM b+ha yaM ka raHkA yaHshuSh+kas+thU lAs+thi pany+tsa raH/_/b+ha dza d+har+m+ma ru tsi shAn+tiM t+ya dza b+hA ba pa ri gra haM/_/s+tha bi ya sI ta bai be yaM br-iSh+Thas+thA lAs+thi shr-IM kha la/_/shru twai tat+su ga te nok+taM ka la
[\[225a.6\]]cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/_/'jigs su rung ba'i lus 'di ni/_/bskams shing rags pa rus pa'i gzeb/_/chos sred rab tu zhi ba bstan/_/dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa mthong /_/rgyab kyi tshigs rus lcags sgrog can/_/rags pa 'di ni khyod kyi'o/_/bde gshegs kyis gsungs de thos nas/_/rang
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]yan+s+wa yaM ka le ba raM/_/b+ha bab+h+ra me d+har+m+ma ru tsi pa ran+nirbe da mA ya yau/_/sau tsin+ta ya da ha mo ha mAr+g+ge saM sa ra tAM nr-i NAM/_/k+Sha Na pra ti shra ye kA ye san+thA nAM ni dza bA sa nA/_/bi sas+thAs+thi s+thU naHpra ka Ta da sha nA shre Ni bi ka TaH
[\[225b.2\]]gi lus la rtog byed cing /_/chos sred srid par 'khyam pa la/_/mchog tu skyo ba nyid du gyur/_/de bsams kye ma rmongs pa yis/_/lam la rab tu bgrod pa'i mgron/_/mi rnams skad cig bsten pa yi/_/lus la rang gi nyid du chags/_/lus ni rab nyams srin bu'i tshogs kyis rkang ni bug par byas gyur cing /_/
[\[225b.3\]]pra NaSh+TaHkA yo yaM kri mi ku la kr-it+tash+tshi dra na la kaH/_/i mAstAHsA pA yAHpra la ya ma ya mA yA pra Na yi nAM nr-i NAM to hat+s+ne hA sma ra sa bi Sha yA swA da na b+hu bAH/_/i ti saM dzA ta bai rA gya swa ka lai ba ra daR+sha nAtra/_/
[\[225b.4\]]dbyibs bral rus pa'i ka ba rab gsal so yi 'phreng ba 'jigs rung 'di/_/'jig pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma la chags mi rnams dag gi sred 'phel zhing /_/chags bcas yul gyi nyams myong sa gzhi gnod pa dang bcas de dag go/_/de ltar rang gi lus mthong bas/_/chags bral yang dag skyes pa de/_/
[\[225b.5\]]byom+nA dzi nasta mA dA yA ya yau dze ta ba naM pu naH/_/ha trA s+ya tsakre b+ha ga bAn+da ya yA de sha nAM ya yA/_/sro taHsakr-i dA gA mi na kra mA dar+ha twA mAp+ta bAnra/_/sar+b+ba kle sha bi nirmuk+taHsa pra Na mya ta thA ga taM/_/
[\[225b.6\]]rgyal bas blangs nas nam mkha' las/_/slar yang rgyal byed tshal du song /_/der ni de la bcom ldan gyi/_/brtse bas bstan mdzad gang gis ni/_/rgyun dang lan gcig phyir mi 'ong /_/rim pas dgra bcom nyid thob gyur/_/nyon mongs kun las rnam grol des/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal te/_/
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]prAg+dzan+ma ni tsa ya smr-i t+yA pra ya yau sa smi tA na naH/_/ta taHka dA tsi dA yA taM taM b+hik+Shu ga Na san+ni d+hau/_/dza gA da b+ha ga bAn+p+rI t+yA sar+b+ba dz+nyash+tsin+na ban+d+ha naM/_/tsi ra s+ye ki nad+d+har+m+ma ru tse ma ha tA su tsi re
[\[226a.2\]]sngon gyi skye ba'i tshogs dran nas/_/bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang bcas song /_/de nas nam zhig bcom ldan 'das/_/kun mkhyen dgyes pas dge slong gi/_/tshogs dang nye bar 'ongs pa yi/_/'ching ba bcad pa de la gsungs/_/chos sred nyon mongs lam dag ni/_/yangs pa'i dus la yun
[\[226a.3\]]Na tsa/_/kle shA d+h+wa bi pu le kA le tsi rAts+tsi ra ta re Na tsa/_/ts+tsi ra saM tsA ra saM tsi taiHna bi sogs rgya skad tshig rkang dgu chad pa 'dar los gsar du bcug pa slar dpyad/_na bi ye tad+d+har+m+ma ru tsi twaM/_/tai ra pA ra pa ri kle shain+na bi shrAm+to pi ni ran+ta raiH/_/i ti d+har+m+ma ru tsiHpr-iSh+TaHsarbA dz+nye na sa tAM pu raH/_/prAg+dzan+ma smr-i ti
[\[226a.4\]]ring gi_/shin tu ches kyang yun ring ba/_/yun ring las kyang yun ring bar/_/yun ring rgyu bas bsags pa yi/_/pha rol med pa'i kun nyon mongs/_/bar med de yis chos sred khyod/_/mi ngal lam ci cung zhig smros/_/thams cad mkhyen pas dam pa yi/_/mdun du chos sred la 'di dris/_/sngon skye dran pa ster
[\[226a.5\]]dA tA raM b+ha ga ban+taM ma b+hA Sha ta/_/tsi ra s+ya tA bad+b+ha ga ban+ma ha tA su tsi re Na tsa/_/kle sha d+h+wa bi pu le kA le tsi rAts+tsi ra ta re Na tsa/_/nA nA kA rairgu ru ta ra b+ha rairgar+b+ha shay+YA ma lAM kair+b+h+rAn+taHshrAn+tash+tsi ra ta ra d+h+ri taiH
[\[226a.6\]]ba yi/_/bcom ldan 'das la des gsol pa/_/bcom ldan re zhig nyon mongs lam/_/yangs pa'i dus la yun ring gi/_/shin tu ches kyang yun ring bar/_/yun ring las kyang yun ring ba/_/rnam pa sna tshogs rab lci'i khur bu mngal gyi mal stan dri mas mtshan/_/lus kyi sbyar ma'i tshogs ni shin tu yun
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]kA ya kAn+thA sa mU haiH/_/twAM lab+d+hA haM bya sa na ka ru NA bAn+d+ha ban+duHkhi tA nAM prAp+taHsar+b+bA ba ra Na ra hi tAM han+ta bi shrAn+ti me tAM/_/i ti d+har+m+me ru tsesta tra dzi na s+ya tsa ka thAn+ta re/_/kau tu kAd+b+hik+Shu b+hiH pr-iSh+Tastad+b+r-it+taM su ga
[\[226b.2\]]ring bzung nas ngal zhing 'khyam/_/sdug bsngal can rnams gdung la snying rje'i gnyen khyod rab tu thob gyur nas/_/sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i ngal gsos 'di ni kye ma bdag gis thob/_/de ltar der ni chos sred dang /_/rgyal ba'i gtam gyi mjug tu ni/_/mtshar nas tshul de dge slong gis/_/dris shing de
[\[226b.3\]]to b+h+ya d+hAta/_/pUr+b+basmin+b+ha ga bAn+kA le k+She ma nAm+ni ma hI pa tau/_/k+She ma kA ra khyaHsu ga taHk+She ma ba t+yA ma b+hUt+pu ti/_/ta s+ya kA le gr-i ha pa tir+d+har+m+ma shi lA b+hi d+ho b+ha batra/_/sa mu dra yA tA saM prAp+ta rat+nai rbai shra ma No pa
[\[226b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/sngon gyi bskal par grong khyer ni/_/dge ba can du sa yi bdag_/dge ba zhes la bcom ldan 'das/_/bde gshegs dge mdzad ces pa byung /_/de yi dus na khyim bdag ni/_/chos kyi ngang tshul zhes pa byung /_/rgya mtshor bgrod pa'i rin chen gyis/_/rnam thos sras dang mtshungs
[\[226b.5\]]maH/_/kr-i twA sar+b+ba dza gang+kAR+YaM tasmin+na tha ta thA ga te/_/nir+b+bA Na d+hA tu saM lI ne kA le nA mi ta te dza si/_/d+har+m+ma shI lo gr-i ha pa tistad+bi yo gAg+ni tA pi taH/_/b+hak+t+yA b+ha ga ba ta sta s+ya stU pi kar+t+tuM sa mut+Ya yau/_/ma Ni
[\[226b.6\]]pa thob/_/de nas dus kyis de bzhin gshegs/_/gzi brjid dpag tu med pa de/_/'gro ba kun gyi don mdzad nas/_/myang 'das dbyings su zhugs pa na/_/de dang bral ba'i mes gdungs pa'i/_/khyim bdag chos kyi ngang tshul ni/_/gus pas bcom ldan 'das de yi/_/mchod rten byed pa la brtson gyur/_/bdag
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]kAny+tsa na saM b+hA ra stu pA raM b+ha ma hAt+ma naH/_/dzi na shA sa na bid+be ShAd+bi prAp+ta s+ya n+ya pA ra yAn/_/bi prA NAM d+har+m+me big+h+nA nAM rA dz+nyo br-it+tiM ni bai d+ya saH/_/tad+dat+ta su b+ha Ti prA pa pra ti She d+ha ka bA ri NaM/_/nA m+nA
[\[227a.2\]]nyid chen po de yis ni/_/nor bu gser tshogs mchod rten rtsom/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa la sdang ba'i/_/bram ze yis ni rnam par bzlog_/bram ze chos kyi gegs rnams kyi/_/spyod tshul de yis rgyal la bshad/_/de yis byin pa'i dpa' bo ni/_/'gog byed zlog par byed pa thob/_/ming gi
[\[227a.3\]]sa ha sra yo gI ti sa rA dza su b+ha TaHkr-i tI/_/nir+b+har+t+s+ya bi de d+he bi prAn+daN+Da trA sa pa rAd+mu khAn/_/he mastU paM gr-i ha ba tirni tsi taM ma Ni mauk+ti kaiH/_/bI ta big+h+naM ta taHkr-i twA pra Ni d+hA naM sa mA da d+heH/_/satwa san+tA
[\[227a.4\]]stong thub ces bya ba/_/rgyal po'i dpa' bo mkhas pa des/_/bram ze rnams la rab bsdigs nas/_/chad pas skrag pas phyir phyogs byas/_/de nas gegs bral khyim bdag gis/_/gser gyi mchod rten nor bu dang /_/mu tig dag gis spras pa dag_/smon lam dag ni rab bsgrubs pa/_/bdag ni dge ba
[\[227a.5\]]ra NAM sak+tAM su d+hA sik+tA ma nut+ta rAM/_/e ne na ku sha le nA haM samyak+saM bo d+hi mAp+nu yAta/_/sa ha sra yo d+hi te nok+ta me tA dA kar+N+ya sA da raH/_/shrA ba ko haM ta bai ba s+yA mi t+yU tse pra Ni d+hA na bAn/_/d+har+m+ma shI lasta ma
[\[227a.6\]]'di dag gis/_/sems can yang dag sgrol la chags/_/bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub/_/bdud rtsi bran pa thob gyur cig_/de brjod de dag thos gyur nas/_/stong thub gus dang bcas pas bdag_/khyod kyi nyan thos nyid gyur cig_/ces pa smras te smon lam btab/_/chos kyi ngang tshul ye shes kyi/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ba dat+saM prA pya dz+nyA na lo tsa naM/_/pra b+hU ta pA paHkr-its+tsha Na shrA ba kAs+t+waM b+ha biSh+ya sa/_/ba hu kalpe ga te kA le bi shA la ku kr-i ta k+Sha yAta/_/bud+d+ha b+hi d+hA na mA kar+N+N+ya ku sha laM sa ma pAp+s+ya si/_/d+har+m+ma shI lo gr-i ha pa tiHso ha me ba da dA b+ha baM/_/
[\[227b.2\]]spyan ni thob pas de la smras/_/sdig pa rab tu mang ba khyod/_/tshegs chen dag gis nyan thos gyur/_/bskal pa mang po song ba'i tshe/_/yangs pa'i dus la sdig zad nas/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ni thos pa na/_/khyod kyis dge ba thob par 'gyur/_/khyim bdag chos kyi ngang tshul der/_/de yi tshe na nga nyid gyur/_/
[\[227b.3\]]sa ha sra yo d+hI yash+tsa b+hUt+so yaM d+har+m+ma ru tsish+tsi rAtra/_/dwi tI ya kalpe b+ha ga bAn+dI pA khye pr-i thi bI pa tai/_/dI pa ka rA b+hi d+haHshAstA dI pa t+yA ma b+hUt+pu ri/_/ta po ba na ru tsir+b+hak+t+yA ka dA tsit+te na b+hU b+hu dzA/_/ni dzaHpu ra
[\[227b.4\]]gang zhig stong thub tu gyur de/_/yun ring lon nas chos sred 'di/_/gnyis pa'i bskal par grong khyer ni/_/mar me can du sa yi bdag_/mar me zhes la bcom ldan 'das/_/ston pa mar me mdzad ces gyur/_/nam zhig dka' thub nags dgyes de/_/rang gi grong khyer 'jug pa'i slad/_/sa bdag de yi
[\[227b.5\]]pra be shA ya sa ga twA swa yaM mar+thi taH/_/pra Na ye nr-i pa tau tasmin bAt+sa l+ye na pra sA di nA/_/su ga te nA b+h+yu pa ga te saM b+hA raHsa ma baM ta tra/_/sa rA dza kA shi na ga rIM bA sha bA khya s+ya b+hU pa teH/_/su hr-i daHprA hi Nod+du taM b+ha ga bAn+d+r-i
[\[227b.6\]]gus pa yis/_/phyin nas rang gis rab tu zhus/_/mi bdag gus pas de la ni/_/mnyes gshin rab tu dang ba yi/_/bde bar gshegs pas khas blangs tshe/_/bkod pa'i tshogs ni rab tu bshams/_/kA shi'i grong khyer dag tu ni/_/sa bdag nor lha'i bu zhes pa'i/_/grogs la bcom ldan ltos shig ces/_/rgyal
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]sh+ya tA mi ti/_/a trAn+ta re bA sa be na rA dz+nyA drA da sha bAR+Shi ke/_/yadz+nyo sa mAp+te pi d+hi bat+kalpi tAHpany+tsa dak+Shi NAMH/_/tan+de ba tA ba dad+b+hU paM bi prau twA mA ga mi Sh+ya taH/_/su ma ti sh+tsa ma ti nA ma dA nAr+ha pra tha masta yoH/_/
[\[228a.2\]]po de yi pho nya springs/_/skabs der rgyal po nor lha'i bu/_/mchod sbyin lo ni bcu gnyis pa/_/cho ga bzhin du rdzogs pa na/_/yon lnga dag gis brtag pa byas/_/sa bdag de la lhas smras pa/_/khyod can bram ze gnyis 'ong 'gyur/_/blo gros bzang dang blo gros so/_/de las dang po la sbyin 'os/_/
[\[228a.3\]]a thA d+h+ya ya na paR+Yan+te gu ra be dak+Shi NAr+thi nau/_/yadz+nya k+She traM k+Shi ti pa te stau sa ma dzag+dz+ha tur+d+wi rdzau/_/bA sa bo pi ma hI pA lastan+nA ma shra ba NA da rA ta/_/da dau hr-iSh+TaHsu ma ta ye ya dz+nyAn+te pany+tsa dak+Shi NAH/_/tsa tU rat+na ma yAM shay+YAM hai
[\[228a.4\]]de nas kha ton mthar phyin te/_/bla ma'i yon ni don gnyer ba'i/_/bram ze de dag sa bdag gi/_/mchod sbyin zhing du yang dag 'ongs/_/sa skyong nor lha'i bu yis kyang /_/de yi ming thos gus pa yis/_/blo gros bzang la mchod sbyin ni/_/mjug tu yon lnga dga' bas phul/_/khri stan rin chen bzhi rang bzhin/_/gser
[\[228a.5\]]mau daN+Da ka maN+Da lU/_/su bar+N+Na rat+na pA trIny+tsaM hi ra N+ya sha ta pany+tsa kaM/_/a laM kr-i tA swa yaM su tAM nr-i pe dA tuM sa mud+Ya te/_/su ma tirnA gra hid+ka n+yA brah+ma tsaR+Ya mu dA ha ran/_/ka n+yA d+hi sun+da rI nA ma taM dr-iSh+T+wA ka na ka d+yu taM/_/sA b+hi lA ShA sa
[\[228a.6\]]gyi dbyig pa ril ba dang /_/rin chen gser gyi snod dang ni/_/gser ni brgya phrag lnga dag go/_/rang gi bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan/_/mi bdag ster bar brtson pa na/_/blo gros bzang gis tshangs spyod ni/_/brjod cing bu mo yongs ma blangs/_/mdzes ma zhes pa bu mo de/_/gser gyi 'od can de mthong nas/_/mngon 'dod ldan pas
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]mut+s+r-i s+ya ladz+dzA tsa kre ta dar+tha nAM/_/pra t+yA khyA tA ta ta ste na sA ka n+yA brah+ma tsA ri NA/_/bai rA gyAd+ban+d+hu bi mu khI ya yau dI pa btIM pu riM/_/ta tra laM kA ra rat+na nAM kur+b+baM NaM kra yaM sha naiH/_/sA mU l+ya krI ta ku su maiHsa dA tsa kre su rA ts+tsa nAM/_/
[\[228b.2\]]ngo tsha ni/_/rab tu btang nas zhu ba byas/_/de nas de yis phyir bzlog tshe/_/bu mo tshangs spyod ldan ma de/_/chags bral gnyen las phyir phyogs te/_/mar me can gyi grong khyer song /_/der ni rgyan gyi rin chen rnams/_/rim pa yis ni 'tshong byed cing /_/rin gyis nyos pa'i me tog gis/_/de yis rtag tu lha mchod byas/_/
[\[228b.3\]]su ma ti rgu ra be datwA dak+Shi NAp+taM sa mI hi taM/_/hi ra N+ya she ShaM tat+pat+nA ni rdiSh+TaM swa ya ma hI tra/_/ta s+yA me ba bi b+hA ba yAM swa pan+nan+da sha da daR+sha saH/_/pA naM su d+hA sa mu dra s+ya ga ma na ga ga ne na tsa/_/tsan+d+rAr+k+ka daR+sha rA dz+nyA mu nI nAM yo dza
[\[228b.4\]]blo gros bzang gis yon thob pa/_/bzhed pa bla ma la phul nas/_/de yi chung mas bstan pa yi/_/gser gyi lhag ma rang gis bzung /_/de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo la/_/de yi rmi lam bcu mthong ste/_/bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'thung ba dang /_/nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang /_/nyi zla mthong dang rgyal po dang /_/thub pa'i tshogs
[\[228b.5\]]na ra thaM/_/shwe te b+ha haM sa siM hA dri shi kha ra ro ha NaM ta thA/_/so tha pra bud+d+haHswap+nA naM pha laM shro tum+ma hA mu neH/_/dza gA ma pany+tsA b+hi dz+nya s+ya par+N+NA da s+ya ta po ba naM/_/sa te na pr-iSh+TaHpro bA tsa twat+s+wap+nA nAM pha lo da yaM/_/dzi no dzA nA ti b+ha ga bAn+dI
[\[228b.6\]]dang shing rta dang /_/glang chen dkar dang ngang pa dang /_/de bzhin seng ge'i ri la 'dzeg_/de nas de ni rab sad de/_/thub chen mngon shes lnga ldan pa/_/lo ma gsal ba'i tshal du ni/_/rmi lam 'bras bu nyan du song /_/de yis dris la des smras pa/_/khyod kyi rmi lam 'bras bu rgyas/_/mar me can gyi grong gnas pa/_/
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa ba t+yAM pu ri s+thi taH/_/tats+tshu twA su ma tostur+N+NaM swap+na byA ka ra Not+p+ru kaH/_/sa hai ba ma ti nA b+hA ya ya yau dI pa pa tI pu rI/_/tasmin+na ba sa re rA dz+nyA dI pe na bi pu lot+sa be/_/sA pra be sha b+ha ga ba
[\[229a.2\]]bcom ldan rgyal ba nyid kyis mkhyen/_/de thob myur bar blo gros bzang /_/rmi lam lung bstan 'dod pa yis/_/mched ni blo gros dang 'grogs te/_/grong khyer mar me can du song /_/skabs der rgyal po mar me yis/_/bcom ldan nang du byon pa yi/_/dga' ston che la grong khyer de/_/
[\[229a.3\]]taHpu rI rat+nAM ba dai r+b+r-i tA/_/tat+pu dzA puSh+pa saM b+hA rai saM br-i te ta tra b+hU b+hu dzA/_/kra ya bi kra ya bI thI Shu nai bA dr-i sh+ya ta puSh+pa kaM/_/ta taHsA pun+da ri kA n+yAM puSh+paM durla b+ha taM ga taM/_/pU dza pr-its+tshe da duH khArtAM mA lo kA ra ma ya tsa
[\[229a.4\]]rin chen dang ni gos kyis spras/_/de yi mchod pa'i me tog tshogs/_/der ni sa bdag gis bsgrubs tshe/_/nyo tshong dag gi gnas su ni/_/nges par me tog mthong ma gyur/_/de nas bu mo mdzes ma de/_/me tog rnyed dka' gyur pa'i tshe/_/mchod pa 'chad pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/gzir ba 'phreng ba mkhan
[\[229a.5\]]ta/_/ta taHsu ma ti pu N+ya nAM pra b+hA bA da s+ya paM ka dza/_/hra de ba b+hU ba kasmi sh+tsit+tat+kA la ka ma lod+b+ha baH/_/tA ni rA dza b+ha yAt+ta s+yai lub+d+haHprats+tshA d+yarmA li kaH/_/da dau sA pyam+bu kum+b+hAn+ta rni k+Shi s+ya twa ri tA ya
[\[229a.6\]]la zhus/_/de nas blo bzang bsod nams mthus/_/'dam skyes med pa'i rdzing bu ni/_/'ga' zhig tu yang de dus nas/_/pad+mo dag ni 'khrungs par gyur/_/de dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa yis/_/sbas nas sred pas 'phreng mkhan gyis/_/de la byin cing de yis kyang /_/bum chu'i nang bcug mgyogs
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]yau/_/su ma ti ni dza pU dzA yai ku su mAr+tha pa ri b+hA ma na/_/tAM phul+la pad+ma ba da nAM da daR+sha pa thi pun+da rI/_/pu N+yA nu b+hA bAt+ta s+yai ba kuM b+hA b+h+yan+ta ra saM br-i taiH/_/sa dzI baM te ri ba mu khaM daR+shi taM ka ma lesta
[\[229b.2\]]par song /_/blo gros bzang po rang mchod slad/_/me tog don gnyer yongs 'khyams pas/_/pad+mo rgyas pa'i bzhin ras can/_/mdzes ma dag ni lam du mthong /_/de nas de yi bsod nams mthus/_/srog dang bcas pa dag gis bzhin/_/bum pa'i nang na rab bsgribs pa'i/_/pad+mo rnams kyis bzhin dag
[\[229b.3\]]taH/_/ar+th+ya mA nA hi ra N+ye na sA te na ka ma lAr+thi nA/_/sA b+hi lA Sha pa ri dz+nyA ya sasmi tA ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/t+yak+tA haM b+ha ba tA pUr+b+ba ku su mA n+ya d+ya yA tsa se/_/ka n+yA saM d+hA Shi NaM sA d+ho na yuk+taM bra h+ma tsA ri NaH/_/ta ba puSh+pa pra dA
[\[229b.4\]]bstan/_/me tog don du gnyer ba des/_/gser gyis de la bslangs pa na/_/sred ldan ma yis yongs shes nas/_/'dzum bcas de la rab smras pa/_/khyod kyis bdag ni sngon btang nas/_/da lta me tog slong bar byed/_/dam pa tshangs spyod bu mo la/_/phebs par smra ba'i rigs ma yin/_/khyod la me tog rab byin
[\[229b.5\]]ne na b+hAR+YA m+mA ma n+ya dzan+ma su/_/i t+ye ba pra Ni d+hA ne na da dA mye tA ni nA n+ya thA/_/e ba mas+t+wi ti te no ke pany+tsa pad+mA ni sA da dau/_/tasmai swa yaM tsa pU dzA yai dza grA ha ka ma la dwa yaM/_/a tha dI pa k+Shi ti pa tiHbA pa bash+tsa ma hI pa tiH/_/b+ha ga
[\[229b.6\]]pas/_/skye ba gzhan du chung mar bdag_/gyur cig ces pa'i smon lam gyis/_/'di dag ster gyi gzhan du min/_/de ltar gyur ces des brjod tshe/_/pad+ma lnga ni de la byin/_/rang yang mchod phyir de yis ni/_/pad+mo gnyis dag rab tu bzung /_/de nas sa bdag mar me dang /_/sa bdag nor lha'i bu dag kyang /_/bcom ldan
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]ban+taM sa mA yan+taM b+hak+t+yA bra t+ya b+hi dzag+ma tuH/_/ta s+ya rat+na sha lAM kAM kaM dI pash+tsa tra ma thA gra hI ta/_/tsA ma raM tsan+d+ra d+ha ba laM bA sa bo ba su d+hA d+hi paH/_/su ra sid+d+haR+Shi gan+d+har+b+heHpU dz+ya mA na s+ya sar+b+ba taH/_/pu ra pra be she ta
[\[230a.2\]]legs par byon pa can/_/gus pas mngon du 'ongs par gyur/_/de nas mar mes de yi gdugs/_/rin chen thur mas mtshan pa bzung /_/nor 'dzin bdag po nor lha'i bus/_/zla ba ltar dkar rnga yab po/_/lha dang grub pa drang srong dang /_/dri za mchod dang grong khyer du/_/rab tu bzhugs tshe sems can
[\[230a.3\]]s+yA sI ta sar+b+ba satwa su khat+so baH/_/ni bi De dza na sam+pA te dzi na san+daR+sha not+su kaH/_/su ma tistad+p+ra b+hA be na ka thaM tsit+mArga mAp+ta bAn/_/k+Ship+t+wA tu shAstush+tsa ra Ne ka ma lA ni kr-i tAny+dza liH/_/sa taM ba ban+de sA nan+daHk+Shi tau kIr+N+Na dza
[\[230a.4\]]kun/_/kun tu bde ba'i dga' ston rgyas/_/skye bo'i tshogs ni stug po la/_/rgyal ba lta bar 'dod pa yis/_/blo gros bzang gi de mthu las/_/ji zhig ltar stes lam thob gyur/_/ston pa'i zhabs la pad+ma dag_/rab tu 'phangs nas thal sbyar te/_/kun dga' can des ral pa'i khur/_/sa la bkram nas
[\[230a.5\]]TA b+hA raH/_/ta s+ya pad+mA ni bai pu l+yaM su kr-i tA nI ba tat+k+Sha Na ta/_/a bA pa bak+t+rAsh+tsan+d+rAn+tA ma tsA sany+tsa ri Ni pu raH/_/sun+daR+YA sA da rot+s+raSh+TaM b+hak+t+yA b+ha ga ba te gra tAM/_/phul+lA ra ban+di yu ga lo ya yau kar+N+NA ba taM pa tAM/_/dza TA ka Ta praHsu
[\[230a.6\]]der phyag 'tshal/_/de yi mdun na yangs pa yi/_/legs byas bzhin du pad+mo rnams/_/de mdun zhal gyi zla ba'i mthar/_/mchod pa yang dag rgyu ba thob/_/bcom ldan mdun du dad pa yi/_/mdzes mas gus pas rab gtor ba'i/_/pad+mo rgyas pa zung dag ni/_/snyan gyi rgyan nyid dag tu gyur/_/blo bzang rab tu btud pa yi/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ma teHsu ga te na pra NA mi naH/_/bi shIR+Yata pa dA krAn+taHdu rA sIt+ta thA pa raH/_/lab+hA kA sha ga to tasminra pra yA te kr-i ta kr-i t+ya tAM/_/shr-i N+wa taHsar+b+ba lo ka s+ya ba b+hA She b+ha ga bAn+dzi naH/_/samyak+saM bo d+hi mA sA d+ya su ma
[\[230b.2\]]ral pa'i tshogs ni bde gshegs kyi/_/zhabs kyis mnan pas lhung gyur cing /_/de bzhin gzhan ni rab tu 'khrungs/_/de ni bya ba byas gyur cing /_/mkha' la 'gro ba thob pa ni/_/'jig rten thams cad nyan pa la/_/bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/_/bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub thob
[\[230b.3\]]te twa ma nut+ta raM/_/lo ke shAkya mu ni rnA ma b+ha bi Sh+ya si ta thA ga taH/_/u rI ri te dzi ne ne ti puSh+pa baR+She di bash+ts+yu te/_/dza TA stu pa pra tiSh+ThA yai dza gr-i huHsar+b+ba man+t+ri NaH/_/b+ha ga bats+tsa ra NA krAn+tA b+h+rA tur+d+d+r-i Sh+T+wa dza TAH
[\[230b.4\]]nas blo bzang khyod/_/'jig rten du ni de bzhin gshegs/_/shAkya thub ces bya bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa rgyal bas rab gsungs shing /_/mkha' la me tog char lhung tshe/_/mchod rten rab tu gnas pa'i slad/_/blon po kun gyis ral pa blangs/_/sa la mched kyi ral pa ni/_/bcom ldan zhabs kyis mnan
[\[230b.5\]]k+Shi tau/_/shro tri ya twA b+hi mA ne na ma tiHko pA ku lo b+ha ba ta/_/ni bAR+Ya su ma tista s+ya bi kA raM mo ha saM b+ha baM/_/te nai ba sa hi taHshAstuHpra bra dz+nyA ma gra hIt+pu raH/_/ta taHkA le na su ma tirde hAn+te tu Shi tA b+hi d+haM/_/a bA pa
[\[230b.6\]]mthong nas/_/nyan pa nyid du mngon khengs pas/_/blo gros khro bas 'khrugs par gyur/_/de yi rnam 'gyur rmongs pa las/_/skyes pa blo gros bzang pos bzlog_/de nyid dang ni lhan cig tu/_/ston pa'i mdun du rab byung blangs/_/de nas dus kyis lus kyi mthar/_/blo gros bzang gis lha yi gnas/_/dga' ldan zhes
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]de ba ni la yaM ma ti sh+tsa na ra kaM ya yau/_/so haM su ma ti re bA d+ya ma tistu ma ti bi sla bAta/_/a yaM d+har+m+ma ru tsiHkliSh+TaHsun+da rI sA ya sho d+ha rA/_/tr-i tI ye b+ha ga bAn+kalpe kra kuts+tshan+da sta thA ga taH/_/a nut+ta ra dz+nyA
[\[231a.2\]]pa thob gyur te/_/blo gros dag ni dmyal bar song /_/da lta blo bzang de nyid da/_/blo gros blo gros rnam bslad pas/_/nyams par gyur pa chos sred 'di/_/mdzes ma de ni grags 'dzin ma'o/_/gsum pa'i bskal par bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig_/bla na med pa'i ye
[\[231a.3\]]ni ni d+hirdzaM bU dwI pa pu rA b+ha bAta/_/ba b+hU ba sa ma ye tasmin+nudz+dza ya n+yAM ma hA d+ha naH/_/ba ni katsan+da na dat+tA khyaHpra khyA ta kra ya bi kra yaH/_/ta s+ya kA ma ba lA khyA yAM dzA yAM yAM ma da na d+yu tiH/_/a shwa dat+tA b+hi d+hA no b+hU ta pu traHkA
[\[231a.4\]]shes gter/_/'dzam bu'i gling du sngon byung gyur/_/de yi dus na 'phags rgyal du/_/tshong pa tsan+dan byin zhes pa/_/nor chen nyo tshong dag gis ni/_/rab tu grags pa byung bar gyur/_/de yi chung ma 'dod pa'i stobs/_/zhes la myos byed ltar mdzes bu/_/rtas byin zhes ni bya ba dag_/lus bzhin du ni dga'
[\[231a.5\]]ya i ba pri yaH/_/ar+thA r+thI sa dza gA mAb+d+hiM pat+nI n+ya sta gr-i ha s+thi ti/_/d+ha ne nAr+tha ni nAM tr-iSh+NA la ba ne nai ba bar+d+ha te/_/tat+pat+nI pro Shi te ba t+yau yau ba non+mA da mo hi tA/_/gr-i ha tsin+tAM pa ri t+ya dz+ya kA ma d+h+yA na pa rA b+ha bta/_/
[\[231a.6\]]ba byung /_/khyim lugs chung ma la bkod nas/_/nor don gnyer de rgya mtshor song /_/lan tshwa yis bzhin nor can rnams/_/nor dag gis ni sred pa 'phel/_/de yi chung ma khyo song tshe/_/lang tshos myos shing rmongs pa yis/_/khyim gyi bsam pa yongs btang nas/_/'dod pa'i bsam gtan la chags
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ku mA rA ma shwa dat+taM sA ni d+hA ya d+ha na kar+m+ma Ni/_/sa dA prA sA da ha rmya s+thA rA dza mA rgaM bya lo ka yata/_/swe rA ra kA sha ra hi tA ba hu br-i t+ya dza ne gr-i he/_/pr-id+d+hA d+hA trI sa ma b+h+ye t+ya dIr+g+hots+tsh+wA sA dza gA da sA/_/bi b+ha be
[\[231b.2\]]gyur/_/de yis nor gyi las la ni/_/gzhon nu rtas byin rnam bkod nas/_/rtag tu khang bzang ba gam du/_/gnas te rgyal po'i lam la bltas/_/g.yog 'khor mang po'i khyim du ni/_/rang dbang gnas skabs bral ba des/_/shugs rings phyung nas ma ma ni/_/rgan mo dag la mngon phyogs smras/_/khyim ni
[\[231b.3\]]ba hu b+ho ge smin+nA dz+nyA d+hI na dza no gr-i he/_/swai ra sany+tsA ra hI nA yA mA taHsa t+yaM na me ra ti/_/nA d+hi kA ra rnai sat+kA rairnA laM kA rairna b+ho dza naiH/_/bi nA pu rU Sha saM b+ho gaM b+ha dzan+te la Ta b+hAHsu khaM/_/tasmA d+g+r-i haM pa
[\[231b.4\]]'byor zhing longs spyod mang /_/skye bo bka' las nyan pa 'dir/_/rang dbang spyod pas dman pa yi/_/ma ma bdag la dga' ba med/_/skyes pa'i longs spyod med pa na/_/bud med dga' ba bsten pa ni/_/dbang gis ma yin bkur stis min/_/rgyan gyis ma yin zas kyis min/_/de slad khyim ni yongs
[\[231b.5\]]ri t+ya dz+ya gats+tshA mi ts+tshan+da tsA ri NI/_/bA l+ye dzA taHsu te s+ye Sha na sne hA ya ta nam+ma ma/_/ku la kU la twa yA bad+d+ha ban+d+hu ban+d+ha na yaM tra NAM/_/na sa han+te ta raM gi n+yo ra ti shI lA hi yo Shi taH/_/i ti bru bA
[\[231b.6\]]btang nas/_/bdag ni 'dun pas rgyu zhing 'gro/_/gzhon skyes bu ni 'di la yang /_/bdag ni chags pa'i dbang ma gyur/_/rigs kyi 'jug ngogs kyis bcings shing /_/gnyen gyi 'ching bas bsdams pa dag_/bud med dga' ba'i ngang tshul can/_/g.yo ldan dag gis bzod ma yin/_/zhes smra de la ma
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]NAM tA mU tse d+hA trI bAt+sa l+ya bi kla bAn/_/bat+se na ga ma na yuk+taM t+yak+t+wa su bi su lAM shri yaM/_/ba hu kr-i t+ye gr-i he twasmi nra gup+ta tsaR+YA na yu dz+ya te/_/k+Sha Ne na swai ra tsa ri taM rA dza mArge Shu d+ha bi ti/_/ka thaM rak+Sha si tsA ri traM
[\[232a.2\]]ma ni/_/shin tu mdza' bas 'khrugs pas smras/_/mnyes gshin shin tu yangs pa'i dpal/_/btang nas 'gro ba rigs ma yin/_/bya ba mang pos khyim 'dir ni/_/sbas pas spyod pa mi sbyar te/_/gsang ba'i spyod pa skad cig gis/_/rgyal po yi ni lam du rgyug_/lang tsho tsha bas rab gdungs pa/_/khyod
[\[232a.3\]]saM p+tA yo ba noSh+ma NA/_/ka tha gra ha ni d+hA niny+tsa pA de not+sAR+Ya gats+tsha si/_/i taHkA ma bi Sha be ShAHshwa b+h+ra pA taHka NA di taH/_/asmin+nu b+ha ya san+de he na dza ne kiM ka ri Sh+ya si/_/tA bat+p+rA Na pa Ne nA pi tsa pa laHsa ku rU
[\[232a.4\]]kyis spyod pa ji ltar bsrung /_/khyim gyi gter yang rkang pa yis/_/rab spangs khyod kyis ji ltar 'gro/_/'di nas 'dod pa'i dug 'bebs shing /_/'di nas skad cig g.yang la lhung /_/gnyis ka the tshom 'di la ni/_/khyod kyis ci bya yongs mi shes/_/g.yo zhing dge mtshan ldan pa rnams/_/ji srid gos ni ma dor
[\[232a.5\]]h+la lAH/_/pa ras+t+ri yaM prAr+tha yan+te na yA bat+bas+t+ra sudz+dz+ha ti/_/na na ne taM sa muk+tam+bi ra sa nAM shu ka kaR+Sha Ne/_/gats+tshA mi muny+tsa muny+tse ti kwa Nan+tI ka s+ya nep+si tA/_/dr-iSh+T+wA bi ba sa nAM br-it+ta kar+t+ta byaHsar+b+ba thA dza naH/_/b+hu dza pany+dza ra
[\[232a.6\]]bar/_/de srid srog gi zong gis kyang /_/gzhan gyi bud med don du gnyer/_/'og pag gos nas drangs pa na/_/ma ma ma zhes 'dar byed cing /_/bdag 'gro thongs shig thongs shig ces/_/sgra sgrogs de ni su zhig 'dod/_/rnam pa kun tu bya ba byas/_/skye bos gos med mthong nas ni/_/lag pa'i gzeb kyis
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]saM rud+d+heHshu ka br-i t+yA pa lA ya te/_/ti mi re ra ti tsau re Na k+Sha NAr+d+hAM su kha saM ga maH/_/pu naHpra bi rA tA lo ke pa ra lo ke sa mA ga maH/_/sA naSh+TA niSh+pa la kliSh+TA ladz+dzA kaSh+T+wA da d+ho mu khI/_/ku mArge hA
[\[232b.2\]]bsdams pa yis/_/ne tso tshul bzhin 'bros par byed/_/mun par dga' ba'i chom rkun dang /_/skad cig phyed ni bde bar 'grogs/_/phyin nas snang ba rab spangs pa'i/_/'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'grogs/_/bzhin smad ngo tsha'i sdug bsngal can/_/'bras med nyams shing dman pa de/_/tshul khrims rin
[\[232b.3\]]pi taM yan+tI shI la rat+nA mi bak+She te/_/sA rau di ti pra sr-i ta dush+tsa ri tA pa bA dA s+thU lA sru bin+du b+hi ra man+da bi ShA da kalpaiH/_/kA ma shra ma tru Ti nir+m+ma la shI la hA ra muk+tA pha lai ri ba d+ha raM pa ri pU ra yan+ti/_/
[\[232b.4\]]chen lam ngan du/_/stor bar gyur pa 'tshol ba bzhin/_/dri med tshul khrims do shal 'dod pa'i ngal dub kyis chad cing /_/mu tig 'bras bu sa gzhi yongs su khengs par byed pa bzhin/_/mi dman chags bral du brtags mchi ma'i thigs pa rags pa yis/_/nyes spyod smad pa rab tu spros pa de ni ngu bar byed/_/
[\[232b.5\]]bA la s+yA pi tu ShA ra rash+mi ru tsi raM saM tsiM ta yat+yAsmi taM m+lA yaM t+yAHsa ha sA ni mI li ta ta noHpad+mA na nA yAHpa raM/_/ge hAn+taHswa ka thaM mi thaHka tha ya tA mA kar+N+Na yaM t+yA ba hiHswai rA gyA s+t+r-i Na pal+la ba bi lu li te gats+tshan+ti
[\[232b.6\]]byis pa'i 'dzum bu bsil zer can ltar mdzes pa la yang rab tu sems byed cing /_/pad+ma'i stan ltar lus ni mchog tu zum zhing 'phral la rab tu nyams gyur te/_/khyim gyi nang du phan tshun gtam rnams phyir ni rang gi gtam du thos gyur pa/_/'phyon ma rnams kyi yid ni rtsa yi 'dab ma bskyod pa la yang dogs
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]shaM kAm+manaH/_/rU pa dar+p+pe Na niR+YAn+ti ta ru N+yaHsa ti bash+me naH/_/pash+tsA t+pa rI k+Sh+ya t+ya dz+yan+te pu N+yA s+thA ne pa rI k+Sha kaiH/_/tasmId+g+r-i has+thi tI yA ste ya thA pu ru Sha saM ga maH/_/lo ke b+ha ba t+ya bi dz+nyA ta sta thA
[\[233a.2\]]par gyur/_/gzugs kyi dregs pas gzhon nu mas/_/khyo yi khyim las phyi rol 'thon/_/yongs rtog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis/_/gnas la yongs brtags phyi nas dor/_/de slad khyim na gnas pa khyod/_/ji ltar skyes bu dang 'grogs shing /_/'jig rten dag gis mi shes pa/_/de ltar rigs
[\[233a.3\]]yuk+tiM ba dA mya haM/_/a shwa dat+ta ku mA rA sau kiM tsi dA san+na yo ba naH/_/dza na s+yA shaM ka nI ya twAta su kha b+ho gyaHpa raM ta ba/_/e bam+bi d+hash+tsa su mu khaHkAn+ti mA na prA pya te ku taH/_/ni ra sA yaHpra kA ro yaM ya di tA bat+p+ra bar+t+ta te/_/i ti
[\[233a.4\]]pa bdag gis brjod/_/khyod kyi gzhon nu rtas byin 'di/_/cung zad lang tsho dag la nye/_/skye bos dogs bya min pa'i slad/_/mchog tu bde ba longs spyod 'os/_/rnam pa 'di lta'i bzhin bzang dang /_/mdzes sdug can ni ga las rnyed/_/gal te re zhig rab bsgrubs na/_/'di ni gnod med rnam pa min/_/zhes pa ma
[\[233a.5\]]d+hA trI ba tsaHshru twa sA pi yug+ta ma ma n+ya ta/_/tI bra rA ga pra kA rAn+d+haHsA pa pA tan+na pa sh+ya ti/_/d+hI trI ta taHku mA ra s+ya s+t+rI b+ho ga su khaM bar+t+ta nAM/_/swai raM bi d+hA ya bi dat+te bi Sha yA b+hi mu khaM ma naH/_/ta ma
[\[233a.6\]]ma'i tshig thos nas/_/de yis kyang ni rigs par bsams/_/chags pa drag po'i rnam pa yis/_/long bas sdig ltung mthong ma yin/_/de nas ma mas dal bu yis/_/bud med longs spyod bde bsngags pa/_/bsgrubs shing bsgrubs nas gzhon nu'i yid/_/yul la mngon par phyogs par byas/_/rtag tu
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bo tse ta sA ni t+ya kr-i twA kA ma su tA ra NAM/_/a sti bat+sa twa du tsi tA kA tsit+p+ro Shi ta b+har+t+r-i k+Sha/_/shU n+ye besh+ma ne ni rdI pe rA trau mau nA ba lam+bi nI/_/ladz+dza ba tI sA su ta rAM twa yA saM ga ma mits+tsha ti/_/i ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshu twA sA
[\[233b.2\]]'dod pa rab spros nas/_/de la de yis rab smras pa/_/bu khyod la 'os 'ga' zhig ni/_/bdag po yul gzhan song ba yod/_/khang stong sgron ma med par ni/_/mtshan mo mi smra la brten te/_/shin tu ngo tsha ldan ma de/_/khyod dang yang dag 'grogs par 'dod/_/ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/_/mngon par 'dod
[\[233b.3\]]b+hi lA Sho ba N-i ka su taH/_/sa dA gup+ta gr-i he b+he dze dza na n+yA ra ti saM ga maM/_/sa ta taM se ba mA nA yAHprats+tshan+na b+ha ba ne ra tiM/_/bar+d+ha mA nAHsa ri ta s+yA rA gAg+niHpra sha ma ya yau/_/sA tsin+ta ya di mAM ni t+yaM prats+tshA da na ka dar+tha nAM/_/na se hai
[\[233b.4\]]ldan tshong pa'i bus/_/rtag tu sbas pa'i khyim du ni/_/ma dang dga' mgur 'grogs pa bsten/_/rtag tu rab bsgribs khyim du ni/_/dga' mgur spyod pa sten byed pa/_/de la chags pa'i ma dag ni/_/rab tu 'phel zhing zhi ma gyur/_/de yi bsams pa rtag tu ni/_/rab tu bsgribs pa'i sdug bsngal 'di/_mi bzod
[\[233b.5\]]rU pa b+ho ga s+ya pra k+Sha ShaHki la dzI bi taM/_/a n+yo n+ya ba da nAM b+ho bi lo ka na ra saM bi nA/_/na tsum+ba ne na su ra te kash+tsi da sti su khot+sa paH/_/tasmAt+p+rats+tshA da nA yA pa ku mA ra s+ya pa yat+na taH/_/b+haM k+t+wA pra sa b+ha sa
[\[233b.6\]]gzugs kyi longs spyod la/_/snang ba nyid ni 'tsho ba lo/_/phan tshun bzhin gyi chu skyes la/_/rnam par lta ba'i ro bral ba'i/_/'o yi dga' mgur spyod pa la/_/bde ba'i dga' ston 'ga' yod min/_/de bsgribs pa yi nyon mongs ni/_/rab tu 'bad pas bcom byas te/_/'phral la longs spyod gzhon
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]b+ho ge pra di shA mi pra gam+b+ha tAM/_/i ti saM tsi na sA rA trau pra b+hA te b+h+yak+ta bi gra ha/_/ya yau bas+t+ra pa rA br-it+ta yuk+t+ya ta s+ya pra kA sha tAM/_/sa ni dzaM dza na nIM dr-iSh+T+wA rits+tshan+na mU la i ba dru maH/_/pa pA ta pA ta ka bi
[\[234a.2\]]nu ma//_/gsal bar bdag gis bstan par bya/_/zhes pa mtshan mo rab bsams te/_/rab gsal lus des gos dag ni/_/yongs su rje ba'i rig pa yi/_/nang par de la rab gsal gyur/_/de yis rang gis ma mthong nas/_/rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin/_/sdig pa'i dug ni 'bebs pa yi/_/
[\[234a.3\]]ShA be she na bi ba shI kr-i taH/_/ta yA shI tAM bu nA sik+ta sa naiHsaM dz+nyA ma bA pa saH/_/bi ma lA pa pr-i thu shwa b+h+ra bi b+h+ra mA di ba duHkhi taH/_/ta mu bA tsa pa ri Sh+wa dz+ya b+hu dzA b+h+yAM kA ma mo hi tA/_/b+h+rU la tAM sA sa mun+nA mya na ra kA pA ta dU
[\[234a.4\]]dbang dang bral bar byas te lhung /_/de yis bsil ba'i chus bran te/_/dal gyis 'du shes thob pa des/_/rgya che g.yang sar 'khyam pa la/_/sdug bsngal gyur bzhin smre sngags phyung /_/dmyal bar lhung ba'i pho nya mo/_/'dod pas rmongs ma de yis ni/_/smin ma'i 'khri shing gzengs bstod cing /_/lag pas yongs
[\[234a.5\]]ti kAM/_/mi th+yA ki ma ya mas+thA ne bi ShA da sta ba duHsa ha/_/kin+na dzA nA si nA rI NA ma sa t+yan+d+har+m+ma yan+t+ra/_/natwa yot+pA di taM duHkhaM hr-i swA ka s+ya tsid+d+ha naM/_/sA d+hA ra su kha b+ho ge smin ke yan+te bA pa bA sa
[\[234a.6\]]'khyud de la smras/_/khyod kyi mya ngan bzod dka' 'di/_/gnas min rdzun pa dag la ci/_/bud med chos kyis bsdams pa rnams/_/mi bden khyod kyis mi shes sam/_/khyod kyi sdug bsngal yongs ma skyed/_/su yi yang ni nor ma phrogs/_/thun mong bde ba'i longs spyod 'dir/_/khyod la sdig pa'i bag chags
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]nA/_/sa rat+pA d+hA ra NA nAR+YAsta raM gi n+yAM ni rarga laM/_/ya s+yA me ba paM tAsnA tasta s+yaM kin+nA snA ti kiM su taH/_/ya thA ye na pi tA yAta ste na pu tro pi gats+tsha ti/_/sA mA n+ya ga ma no e ba bar+t+ta nI san+ni b+hAHs+t+ri yaH/_/e ka b+ho gye ba la la nA na pa
[\[234b.2\]]ci/_/g.yo ldan bsdams pa med pa yi/_/chu klung bud med thun mong nyid/_/gang la pha yis khrus byas te/_/bu ni khrus byed min nam ci/_/lam gang nas ni pha song ba/_/de nyid nas ni bu yang 'gro/_/bud med brgya lam dag dang mtshungs/_/thun mong ba yis bgrod bya nyid/_/bud med gcig gis spyod bya nyid/_/gzhan dang
[\[234b.3\]]rasba ra mar+ha ti/_/IR+Sh+ya lu b+hiHkr-i taM kaish+tsi de tat+sa ma ya mA tra kaM/_/nai ba kA tsa da ga myAsti ra t+yar+thaHpa ra mAr+tha taH/_/e ka pA tro pa b+ho gyA hi pi tuHpu tra s+ye bas+t+ri yaH/_/i ti yat+ne na sa ta yA saM b+ho gA d+hi mu khaHkr-i taH/_/sa
[\[234b.4\]]gzhan gyis 'os min pa/_/'di ni 'ga' zhig phrag dog dang /_/ldan pas dam tshig byas pa tsam/_/dam pa'i don du dga' mgu'i slad/_/bgrod par mi bya 'ga' yang med/_/pha dang bu yi snod gcig bzhin/_/bud med nye bar longs spyod bya/_/zhes te de yi 'bad pa yis/_/longs spyod la de mngon phyogs byas/_/'dod
[\[234b.5\]]dzA ta rA gaHsa ta taM shi She pi dza na nI pa shuH/_/ta taHkA le na pi ta raM pra t+yA yA taM ma ho da d+heH/_/sa gU D+haM pre ri to mA trA bi She na bi da d+he byastaM/_/ta taHsa rA ga br-id+d+h+yai ba ni rarga la su khai Shi NI/_/swai re ku mA raM pra Na yA
[\[234b.6\]]chags skyes pas rtag par yang /_/phyugs bzhin du ni ma nyid bsten/_/de nas dus kyis pha dag ni/_/chu gter che las slar 'ongs pa/_/ma yis bskul ba des gsang nas/_/dug gis srog dang bral bar byas/_/de nas chags pa 'phel ba yi/_/ma bsdams bde ba 'tshol ba des/_/mdza' bas rmongs pa'i gzhon nu la/_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]du bA tsasne ha mo hi taM/_/sA ra dra bi Na nA dA ya niR+Yan+t+ra Na su khAp+ta ye/_/e hi de shAn+ta ran+tA bta gats+tsha baHkaN+Ta kodz+dz+hi taM/_/i ti tat+pa tsa naM shru twA tsi ra kA la sa mI hi taM/_/sA ra dra bi Na mA dA ya ya yau sa hi
[\[235a.2\]]mdza' bas dal gyis rab smras pa/_/ma bsdams bde ba thob pa'i slad/_/snying po'i nor dag blangs byas la/_/tsher ma spangs pa'i yul gzhan du/_/'u cag re zhig 'gro bar bya/_/zhes pa de tshig yun ring gi_/dus su 'dod pa thob gyur nas/_/nor gyi snying po blangs byas te/_/de ni de dang 'grogs nas
[\[235a.3\]]tasta s+ya yA/_/de shAn+ta re kr-i ta pa dau pa raM prats+tshan+na pA ta kau/_/dzA yA pa ti twAM bi khyA s+ya tau nirbi taM ma bA pa tuH/_/ta taHka rA tsit+targe haM swa de sha prat+ya b+hi dz+nya yA/_/b+hik+ShuHpa ri tsi to b+h+ye t+ya bAt+sa l+yAt+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/kats+tsit+te ku sha
[\[235a.4\]]song /_/yul gzhan dag tu gnas byas te/_/sdig pas rab bsgribs de dag ni/_/chung ma khyo bo nyid du grags/_/mchog tu bde ba thob par gyur/_/de nas nam zhig khyim der ni/_/rang gi yul par mngon shes pas/_/yongs 'dris dge slong mngon phyogs te/_/mnyes gshin las ni de la smras/_/khyod kyi ma ni dge
[\[235a.5\]]lam+mA tuHkats+tsadz+dzan+ma ma hIM mu huH/_/t+yaMk+tAM ya sh+tsit+tAM ya tash+tsit+taM nA pA t+ya nu sha ya bya thAM/_/i ti b+hik+Shor+b+ba tsaHshru twA shi la ye ba sa tA Di taH/_/pra t+ya b+hi dz+nyA na tsa ki tAM staM tAM yuk+ta ma tsit+ta yatra/_/sa mA tra sa ha saM ma t+ya
[\[235a.6\]]ba'am ci/_/skye ba btang las yang yang du/_/bsam pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems/_/'gyod gdung med par gyur tam ci/_/zhes pa dge slong tshig thos nas/_/rdo ba yis ni bsnun pa bzhin/_/'dri shes bdag gis 'jigs pa des/_/rigs pa de de rab bsams pa/_/gros byed 'jigs pas 'khrugs pa des/_/
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]man+t+ra b+he da b+ha yA ku laH/_/b+hi k+Shu man+tan+niR+Yan+ta staM shas+t+ra Na gr-i he ba d+hI ta/_/ar+had+b+hik+Shu ba d+he pya s+ya nA kam+pat+ma nAt+ma naH/_/nr-i shaM sAHbA ta kaiR+YAn+te badzrA da d+hi ka Tho ra tAM/_/d+har+m+mA dri shraM gA gra pa ri ts+yu tA nA ma
[\[235b.2\]]ma dang lhan cig bgros byas nas/_/dge slong de ni mgron gnyer te/_/ma bsdams mtshon gyis khyim du bsad/_/dge slong dgra bcom bsad la yang /_/de yid lag kyang bdar ba yin/_/gtum po rnams ni sdig pa yis/_/rdo rje las lhag sra bar 'gyur/_/ngos med g.yang sar chos kyi ri rtse yi/_/steng nas
[\[235b.3\]]d+ho mu khA nA ma ta pa ba Te Shu/_/ba hu b+h+ra ma shwa b+h+ra shwa tA ha tA nAM b+ha ba t+ya laM pA ta pa raM pa rai ba/_/su te na ra ma mA nA pi sA saM b+ho ga pa rA ya NA/_/pun+da rA khyaM ba Ni ka pu traM dr-iSh+T+wA b+hU ta ta tra sa spr-i hA/_/ra ti pa ri tsi tair+b+ho gA b+h+yA
[\[235b.4\]]kha ni thur ltas lhung gyur cing /_/'khrul mang bya skyibs rgya yis bsnun pa rnams/_/nges par rgyun ma dag tu lhung bar 'gyur/_/bu dang rol par byed mod kyang /_/longs spyod dag la chags pa des/_/mdzes pa zhes bya tshong pa'i bu/_/mthong nas de la chags ldan gyur/_/dga' mgur spyad pa yongs 'dris
[\[235b.5\]]saiHsa ra pa ri bar+d+ha te ki ma pi b+ha dza te lo b+haHprau D+hi pra br-id+d+ha d+ha no da yaH/_/la ba Na sa li lA pA nai s+t+r-iSh+NA pra yA t+ya ti tI pra tAM dz+wa la ti bi pu la dz+wA lA lI D+hai rdza lairba Da bA na laiH/_/tAM gu D+ha saM ga tAM te na te na rA gi NIM
[\[235b.6\]]goms pas longs spyod dag ni mchog tu 'phel/_/nor ni rab 'phel dar bas chags pa stug po ci yang sten par byed/_/lan tshwa'i chu dag 'thungs pas shin tu mi zad sred pa skye bar 'gyur/_/chu ni rgya che me lces myangs pas rta gdong me ni rab tu 'bar/_/'dod ldan gsar pa de dang ni/_/chags ldan ma de
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]na ba kA mi nA/_/dr-iSh+T+wA shwo dat+taHkhaD+ge na dza g+hA na dza na nI kru d+hA/_/A nan+t+raR+Yai b+hiHpA pa b+hA raiHsa gu ra tAM ga taH/_/niSh+kA si taHpu rAta tUr+Na de ba tA pre ri tairdza naiH/_/sa dzA tA nu sha ya stI braM ga
[\[236a.2\]]gsang 'grogs pa/_/rtas byin gyis mthong khros pa yis/_/ral gri dag gis ma nyid bsad/_/mtshams med gsum gyi sdig khur gyis/_/de ni lci ba nyid du gyur/_/skye bo lha yis bskul rnams kyis/_/myur du grong khyer dag las byung /_/'gyod pa drag po skyes pa de/_/song
[\[236a.3\]]twA b+hik+Shu ga NAn+ba hU nra/_/duHkhAd+Ya yA tse pra bra dz+yAM pa ti tA ya da dau ya dA/_/ta dA da dA ha pa dwe ShA ta sup+taM b+hik+Shu ga NaM ni shi/_/e kastu bo d+hi satwAM shwa b+hik+Shu sta s+ya da yAr+t+ra d+hIH/_/ta bI di de sha pra pra dz+yAM shik+ShA pa
[\[236a.4\]]nas dge slong tshogs mang la/_/sdug bsngal las ni rab byung zhus/_/gang tshe sdig can la ma byin/_/de tshe de yi zhe sdang gis/_/dge slong tshogs nyal mtshan mo bsregs/_/de la brtse bas brlan pa'i blo/_/dge slong byang chub sems dpa' che/_/gcig gis de tshe bslab pa'i gnas/_/spangs
[\[236a.5\]]da bi brdzi tAM/_/shik+ShA pa dA ni nir+b+ban+tAR+YA tsa mA na pra yat+na taH/_/b+hik+Shusta mU tse nA r+ho si shik+ShA pa da pa ri gra he/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya bud+d+hA ye t+ye ta de ba sa dA ba da/_/dzi nA b+hi d+hA naM shru twai ba
[\[236a.6\]]pa'i rab tu byung ba byin/_/rab tu 'bad cing nan tan gyis/_/bslab pa'i gnas ni zhu byed pa/_/de la dge slong gis smras khyod/_/bslab gnas 'dzin pa yongs mi 'os/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes pa 'di nyid rtag tu brjod/_/rgyal ba'i mtshan ni thos nyid kyis/_/
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]kalpAn+te muk+ti me Sh+ya si/_/a thA shwa dat+ta de han+te g+ho ran+na ra ka mA bi shata/_/ya s+yA gre pra ba lot+ta la shI ta lAHpra la yA na laH/_/so yan+d+har+m+ma ru tsiHpr-iSh+Ta tsi ra s+ye ti tsi rAt+ma yA/_/a b+hi d+hA ye ti b+ha ga bAn+d+ra bi ra rA ma ta thA ga taH/_/
[\[236b.2\]]dus kyi mthar ni khyod grol 'gyur/_/de nas rtas byin lus kyi mthar/_/'jigs su rung ba'i dmyal bar zhugs/_/gang mdun rab tu nyam nga ba'i/_/grang ba 'jig pa'i me ldan pa/_/de nyid chos sred yun ring gi/_/yun ring las zhes bdag gis dris/_/zhes pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
[\[236b.3\]]bA tA lI dza na nI ta raM ga ta ra lA niHsaM ka mA liM gi tA prA pya prau D+hi ma daR+sha naM sa dza na kaste dzi ni d+hiH/_/ar+hat+sa twa pa da pra kA sha bi b+ha bstI bra kra me NA ha to d+hU me nA ti ma lI ma se na na pa raM kiM kiM kr-i ta duH kr-i ta maH/_/
[\[236b.4\]]bzhugs/_/rba rlabs ltar g.yo ma yi rlung 'tshub dag la dogs pa med par rab tu 'khyud/_/dar ba thob nas pha ni gzi byin gter de snang ba min pa dag tu bkod/_/dgra bcom sems can gnas ni rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pa mi zad rim pas bcom/_/du ba shin tu dri ma can gyis mchog tu nyes byas ci dang ci ma byas/_/zhes
[\[236b.5\]]i taM k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM d+har+m+ma ru ts+ya ba dA naM me kAn+na ba ti ta maHpal+la baH//_//ma naHshud+d+hi bi d+hA ne na dA ne nA ti lag+h+nI ya sA/_/b+ha baM t+ya laM g+h+yAHsaM kalpaH
[\[236b.6\]]pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las chos sred kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//yid ni dge ba'i sgrub byed can/_/sbyin pa shin tu chung ngu yis/_/snying stobs can la phun tshogs ni/_/brtag
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]saM pa da sa twa shA li nAM/_/bu rA br-i dzi Shu bai shA l+yA marka TA khyA dru mAn+ti ke/_/kU TA gA ra gr-i hA bA se dzi ne b+ha ga ba tis+thi te/_/ba b+hU ba d+ha ni ko nA ma shri yA gr-i ha pa tir+b+r-i taH/_/sa ma gra gu Na saM yo gAt+pu ru
[\[237a.2\]]pas bgom par bya mi 'gyur/_/br-i dzi'i yangs pa can du sngon/_/spre'u'i rdzing zhes bya ba'i 'gram/_/khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyim gnas na/_/bcom ldan rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i tshe/_/yon tan mtha' dag ldan pa las/_/skyes bu mchog nyid du gyur pa/_/khyim bdag dpal gyis bskor ba ni/_/nor can
[\[237a.3\]]Shot+ta ma tAM ga taH/_/pat+nI d+har+m+ma sa khI ta s+ya shI la bi t+ya b+hi d+hA b+ha bta/_/ba da n+yA khyash+tsa ta na yaHsnu ShA sa t+ya ba tI ta thA/_/saM g+ha tAHsa ma yaM ta tra tsa krurbai shA li kA dwi dzAH/_/ni man+t+ra nI yo b+ha ga bAn+sar+b+baiHsaM b+hU ya nA n+ya thA/_/e
[\[237a.4\]]zhes pa byung bar gyur/_/de yi chung ma chos kyi grogs/_/ngang tshul can zhes bya bar gyur/_/bu ni gtong phod can zhes dang /_/de bzhin mna' ma bden ldan ma'o/_/yangs pa can pa'i bram ze rnams/_/'tshogs nas der ni nges par byas/_/thams cad 'tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das/_/mgron du gnyer bya gzhan du min/_/nor
[\[237a.5\]]ka tsita ku ru te bit+ta ma dAdz+dzi na ni man+t+ra NaM/_/sar+b+bi rnirka sa nI yo yau ba re yAn+d+har+m+ma bi b+hA na kr-ita/_/te ShAM sa ma ya ma dz+nyA twA pu N+ya bAn+d+hA ni kAHswa yaM/_/di bya sam+pa da yu tash+tsa kre ga twA dzi na ni man+t+ra NaM/_/sa b+hak+ti mA na b+ha
[\[237a.6\]]gyis rgyags pas gcig gis ni/_/gal te rgyal ba mgron gnyer byed/_/gzhan gyis chos kyi bgegs byed pa/_/de ni kun gyis dbyung bar bya/_/de dag nges pa ma shes na/_/nor can mchog gi phun tshogs ldan/_/bsod nams ldan pa rang nyid kyis/_/song nas rgyal ba mgron gnyer byas/_/bcom ldan rang nyid dge
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]ga bAn+g+r-i hA b+hi ga ma ne swa yaM/_/sa saM g+he nA b+h+yu pa ga te hr-iSh+TaHswa b+ha ba naM ya yau/_/sa ta tra di bya bi b+ha baHsaM b+hA re s+t+ri di bo tsi taMH/_/rat+nA sa no pa ka ra NAM saM dz+nyA b+ho dz+ya b+hu baM bya b+hA tra/_/a trAn+ta re dwi dzAHsar+b+be ga twA
[\[237b.2\]]'dun dang /_/lhan cig khyim du gshegs par ni/_/zhal gyis bzhes tshe gus ldan de/_/dga' bas rang gi khyim du song /_/der ni de yis lha la 'os/_/mchog gi 'byor pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/rin chen stan dang yo byad dang /_/zas kyi sa gzhi bstar ba byas/_/skabs der gnyis skyes thams cad ni/_/'dus nas
[\[237b.3\]]b+ha ga ba twan+ti ga_/saM b+hU ya kr-i ta saM b+hA ra tsa krur+b+hak+t+yA ni man+t+ra NaM/_/tA nu bA tsA tha b+ha ga bAn+p+ra pA da bi sha dA sha yaH/_/pUr+b+ba me ba sa saM s+ho haM d+ha ni ke na ni man+t+ri taH/_/e ta dA kar+N+Na ya te Shu te Shu swa b+ha ba
[\[237b.4\]]yo byad tshogs bsgrubs pas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung song nas/_/gus pas mgron du gnyer ba byas/_/de nas de la bcom ldan 'das/_/rab dang dri med bsam pas gsungs/_/sngon du dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_/nor can gyis ni mgron du gnyer/_/de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das/_/mchod pa sngon gyi nyin
[\[237b.5\]]naM sha naiH/_/pu raM pra tIk+Sh+ya mA Ne Shu di naM b+ha ga ba tor+b+ba ne/_/d+ha ni kaHswa gr-i haM ga twA b+ha ga bAn+sa ha b+hik+Shu b+hiH/_/di byAd+b+hu tar+d+he saM b+hA raM tsakre b+ho dz+ya pra ti gra haM/_/e n+ye d+yu ra Shi tat+pa t+nI tat+tu l+ya bi pu lA shri yaH/_/di byo pa b+ho ga
[\[237b.6\]]bar la/_/rab tu rtog cing de dag rnams/_/rang gi khyim du song ba'i tshe/_/nor can khang par bcom ldan 'das/_/dge slong rnams dang bcas byon nas/_/lha yi rmad byung phun sum tshogs/_/mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad/_/de yi chung mas nyin gzhan yang /_/de mtshungs yangs pa'i dpal gyis ni/_/mchog gi longs spyod
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]saM b+ha rai r+b+ha ga ban+ta ma pU dza yatra/_/tat+pu tre Na tr-i tI yeh+ni tsa tur+the snu Sha yA dzi naH/_/Ash+tsaR+Ya bi b+ha bA b+ho gai ru pa b+hau gai rni man+t+ri taH/_/a lab+d+ha pU dzA ba sa raHshAstur+b+be shA li kau ga NaH/_/d+ha ni kA ya pra krud+d+hAsh+tsa
[\[238a.2\]]tshogs rnams kyis/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas/_/gsum pa'i nyin la de yi bus/_/bzhi par mna' mas rgyal ba ni/_/ngo mtshar 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyi/_/nyer spyad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer/_/yangs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/ston pa mchod pa'i skabs ma thob/_/nor can la ni rab khros te/_/gnas nas
[\[238a.3\]]tsakrurniSh+kA sa no d+ya maM/_/shA sa nAt+su ga ta s+yA tha d+ha ni ka na dri dzAsta taH/_/na ma yA dza ta i t+yuk+t+wA te d+ha ni ka pra sA di tAH/_/sa pat+nI ko tha d+ha ni kaHsa pu tash+tsasnu ShA n+wi taH/_/d+har+m+ma de sha na yA shAstuHsa t+ya daR+sha na mAp+ta bAn/_/tat+pur+b+ba pu N+ya br-it+tAn+taM
[\[238a.4\]]dbyung ba'i rtsom pa byas/_/de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas/_/gnyis skyes de dag rnams la ni/_/bdag gis ma shes zhes brjod nas/_/nor can gyis ni dang bar byas/_/de nas nor can chung mar bcas/_/bu dang bcas shing mna' mar bcas/_/ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis/_/bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur/_/de dag sngon byung bsod nams
[\[238a.5\]]ma hA bi b+ha bi bsta raiH/_/b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn+p+r-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nyas+t+wA na bo tsata/_/bA rA NA s+yA ma b+hUt+pUr+b+ba mA li kaHka ma lA b+hi d+haH/_/dur+b+hik+Sha k+Sha yi te kA le pa dAM durga ti mA ga taH/_/pat+nI pal+la bi kA nA ma pu traHku ba la yAb+hi d+haH/_/pA Ta lA khyAsnu ShA tse
[\[238a.6\]]ni/_/'byor pa chen po rgya che ba/_/dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das/_/thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sIr sngon byung ba/_/pad+ma zhes bya 'phreng rgyud mkhan/_/mu ges nyen pa'i dus su ni/_/mchog tu dbul ba nyid du gyur/_/chung ma yal 'dab can zhes dang /_/bu ni ut+pal zhes pa dang /_/mna' ma pa Ta la zhes pa/_/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]ti ba b+hU busta s+ya sam+ma tAH/_/ka dA tsit+ku su mA rA me di nAM te tad+g+r-i hAn+ti ke/_/pra t+ye ka bud+d+hAHsan+to Sha me kAn+te bi shrAn+te mAp+ta bAnra/_/te twe ka ba sa nAHsar+b+ba saR+YA ye Na nr-i pA la ye/_/puSh+pA ni da twA saM prAb+ta da dr-i shustaM pra b+hA ma yaM/_/te dzo ni
[\[238b.2\]]'di dag de yi tshogs par gyur/_/nam zhig de dag khyim dang nye/_/me tog dga' tshal rab mdzes shing /_/tshim pa dag tu nyin mo'i mthar/_/rang sangs rgyas ni bzhugs par gyur/_/de dag kun gyis mi bdag gi_/gnas su gos gnyis re mos kyis/_/me tog phul nas 'ongs pa yis/_/'od kyi rang bzhin de mthong gyur/_/gzi brjid
[\[238b.3\]]d+hin+ta ma mo kya prA b+ha tastat+pu dza not+su kAH/_/nir+d+ha nAste bya thAM prA push+tshin+na pak+ShA kha gA i ba/_/tsa tur+N+NAM bi d+ya tesmA ka me kaM sar+b+ba swa mam+ba raM/_/A ts+tshA da yA ma ste nai ba pU dz+yA s+ya ba rAm+ba raH/_/nA d+ya rA dza ku laM nag+nA gats+tsha maHkiM b+ha
[\[238b.4\]]gter de mthong gyur nas/_/snga dro de la mchod 'dod pas/_/gshog pa bcad pa'i bya bzhin du/_/de dag nor med gdung ba thob/_/bdag cag bzhi la bdog pa kun/_/gos ni gcig nyid kho na yod/_/mchod 'os 'di yi lus kyi mchog_/de nyid kyis ni g.yogs par byas/_/de ring gcer bur rgyal po yi/_/'khor du mi 'gro ci
[\[238b.5\]]bi Sh+ya ti/_/i ti te sa ma yaM kr-i twAM bas+t+re Na ta ma d+h+wa dzan/_/tat+pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na d+ha ni ko yaM sa mA mi kaH/_/dzA to di bya pra b+hA bAr+d+haHpat+nI pu trasnu ShA n+wi taH/_/sar+b+ba dz+nye ni ti ka thi taM shru twA saM sa di b+hik+Sha baH/_/me ni re tsit+ta bai
[\[238b.6\]]'byung 'gyur/_/zhes pa'i dam tshig de dag gis/_/byas nas gos kyis de la mchod/_/de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/_/'phreng rgyud mkhan 'di nor can 'di/_/chung ma bu dang mna' mar ldan/_/lha mthu phun sum tshogs par gyur/_/ces pa tshogs su kun mkhyen gyis/_/bshad pa thos nas dge slong rnams/_/sems ni dri med rtsa
[\[239a\]]
