[\[239a.1\]]ma l+ya mU lA dA na pha la shri yaM/_/ta ta ste brAh+ma NAHsar+b+be saM b+hU ya shu tsi b+ho dza naiH/_/b+ha ga pan+taM sa ma b+h+ya ts+ya ba b+hu buHku sha lo dz+wa lAH/_/he lAr+p+pa taM rat+na d+ha naM tr-i NA graM shrad+d+hA ba tAr+N+NaM tr-i Na ma pyanar+g+haM/_/a ne ka sho b+hA nu b+ha
[\[239a.2\]]ba dag_/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal du sems/_/de nas bram ze de dag rnams/_/kun 'tshogs gtsang ba'i zas dag gis/_/bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag mchod/_/dge ba rab tu 'bar bar gyur/_/dman byin rin chen nor ni rtswa yi rtse/_/dad pas byin pa'i rtswa yang rin thang med/_/mdzes pa du ma'i nyams myong nor
[\[239a.3\]]baM na bit+taM tsit+ta ni mit+taM shu b+haM saM b+ha bA nAM/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM d+ha ni kA ba dA nan+na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//su b+hA Shi taM sa t+ya pa thA pra kA sha naM ka ro t+ya nA lo ka pa de
[\[239a.4\]]yin te/_/dge ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni sems nyid do/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nor can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu pa'o//_//snang ba med pa'i gnas rnams dag tu sgron me bzhin/_/legs par bshad pa bden
[\[239a.5\]]Shu di pa bta/_/sa do pa kA rA da ta e ba bal+la taM bi be ka tsa tsA su ma hAt+ma nA ma pi/_/ku shi suR+YAM b+ha ga ba tA ya dA mal+la dza nA sba de/_/ar+g+hat+pa daM b+hik+Shu ga NaHprA pi taHku sha lai Shi shA/_/ta dA ka tha ya tA d+har+m+maM b+hik+Shu NAM ma d+hu
[\[239a.6\]]pa'i lam ni gsal bar byed/_/de nyid phyir ni rtag tu nye bar mkho ba las/_/bdag nyid che rnams dben pa spyod la yid du 'ong /_/gang tshe gyad kyi skye ba'i gnas/_/ku sha'i grong du bcom ldan 'das/_/dge ba 'tshol bas dge ba'i tshogs/_/dgra bcom gnas la bkod gyur pa/_/de tshe phan tshun snyan par chos/_/smra byed dge slong rnams
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]ram+mi thaH/_/swa yaM shu shrA ba su ga taHprI ti yuk+taHsu b+hA Shi taM/_/su b+hA Shi ta bya sa ni tAM tAM dr-iSh+T+wA ta s+ya b+hik+Sha baH/_/ta mU tsusta ba sarba dz+nya ka tha masmAd+ba tsaHpri yaM/_/i t+yuk+te b+hik+ShU saM g+he na b+ha ga bA na b+h+ya d+hadz+dzi naH/_/dzan+mAn+ta re
[\[239b.2\]]dag gis/_/legs bshad bde bar gshegs pa ni/_/dgyes pa dang ldan rang gis gsan/_/de yi legs bshad la gcags pa/_/de mthong dge slong rnams kyis ni/_/de la gsol ba kun mkhyen nyid/_/nged kyi tshig la ji ltar dgyes/_/dge slong tshogs kyis de brjod tshe/_/bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/_/bdag ni skye ba
[\[239b.3\]]Sh+wa pi pa ra bal+la b+ha me su b+hA Shi taM/_/shi ba ba t+yAM pu rA puR+YAM shi bir+n+nA ma na re shwa raH/_/ba b+hU ba sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAM da yA da yi ta bAn+d+ha baH/_/tat+pu N+ya shA sa nA sI naiHswar+g+gA mA pU ri taM dza naiH/_/dr-iSh+T+wA sha ta kra tu dz+nyA tuM swa twaM ta s+ya sa mA ya
[\[239b.4\]]gzhan du yang /_/legs bshad dag la mchog tu dga'/_/grong khyer zhi ldan dag tu sngon/_/mi dbang shi bi zhes bya ba/_/'byung po kun la brtse ba yi/_/yid 'ong gnyen du gyur pa byung /_/de yi bsod nams bkar gnas pa'i/_/mi yi mtho ris kun gang ba/_/mthong nas de yi snying stobs ni/_/rtag tu mchod sbyin brgya pa
[\[239b.5\]]yau/_/rat+nA prA sA da shi kha ra krAn+taM nr-i pa ti me b+h+ya saH/_/rak+Sho rU pAM bi d+hA yo graM ta da grA b+hi mu kho bra bItra/_/a ni t+yAHsaskAM rAsta ra la ta ra bi d+yud+d+yu ti ni b+haHsa mut+pan+not+pan+na pra la ya pa ri NA ma pra Na yi naH/_/
[\[239b.6\]]'ongs/_/de ni rin chen khang bzang rtser/_/'dzegs pa'i mi bdag can song nas/_/'jigs rung srin po'i gzugs bsgrubs te/_/de yi mdun du mngon phyogs smras/_/'du byed mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba'i glog rab mdzes pa dag dang mtshungs/_/rab tu skyes shing skyes shing 'jig pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba dag la chags/_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]su b+hA Shi tAr+d+ha mi t+yuk+t+wA tUSh+NI mA sit+sa rA k+Sha saH/_/taM pra Na myak+Shi ti pa tiHkr-i hAM dza li ra pra b+hA ShaT/_/sA d+ho su b+ha Shi ta s+yAr+d+haM she ShaM sa ma naHsu khaM/_/ba NI bo d+h+yad+ga b+hA tAM tAM shi k+Sho b+hU twA shr-i No mya haM/_/i ti bru ba NaM bi na yAta
[\[240a.2\]]zhes pa'i legs bshad phyed brjod nas/_/srin po de ni mi smra gyur/_/sa yi bdag pos thal sbyar nas/_/phyag 'tshal de la rab smras pa/_/dge ba legs par bshad pa'i phyed/_/yid bde lhag ma gsung bar mdzod/_/byang chub yan lag gyur skad de/_/slob mar gyur nas bdag nyan no/_/dul bas de smra mi bdag la/_/srin po
[\[240a.3\]]nr-i paM pro bA tsa rAk+Sha saH/_/twa yA shi Sh+ye Na rA dzen+d+ra niSh+pha le na ka ro mi kiM/_/pi pA sa pa ri b+hU to haM k+ShUN+Na ku k+Shirbu b+huk+Sha yA/_/ne tat+ma mep+si taM rA dzan+ke ba laM gu ru gau ra baM/_/k+Shut+tU Sh+NA byA ku la ta yA yat+kiM tsit+p+ra la bA mya haM/_/she ShaM bak+tuM na shak+no
[\[240a.4\]]yis ni rab smras pa/_/rgyal dbang slob ma 'bras bu med/_/khyod kyis bdag la ci zhig bya/_/skom pas bdag ni yongs nyen cing /_/bkres pas sku ni yongs su nyams/_/rgyal po bdag ni bla ma yi/_/zhes 'ba' zhig 'di mi 'dod/_/bkres skom dag gis gzir gyur pas/_/gang zhig cung zad bdag smra'o/_/lhag ma brjod par yongs mi
[\[240a.5\]]mi mA kr-i tA me ka bar+tha nAM/_/mA d+huR+Ya d+huR+YA Ni ra so tsi tA na sam+par+d+ha mA nA ni su b+hA Shi tA ni/_/nai baMk+Shu d+haM nak+Sha pa yan+ti tUSh+NA me tA ni tr-ip+ta s+ya su kha pra dA ni/_/shru taM gI taM kA byaM shra ma pa ri tsa yaHkau tu ka bi d+hi ma Nir+dz+nyA naM b+hU ta gra ha
[\[240a.6\]]nus/_/bdag la sdug bsngal ma mdzad cig_/snyan pa'i gdangs ldan ro ni 'os pa can/_/legs par bshad pa rab tu rgyas gyur pa/_/tshim la bde ba ster byed 'di dag ni/_/nges par bkres dang skom pa za byed min/_/thos dang glu dang snyan dngags ngal bas yongs 'dris dge mtshan sgrub byed dang /_/nor bu shes dang 'byung po
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]ga da bi Shon+mA da sha ma naM/_/nr-i NAM b+hU b+h+r-it+sa bA dza la d+he ta ra NaM he ma ka ra NaM ta de tat+Yan+te ga ni ta ma khi laM b+ho dza na pa laM/_/sa d+yaHkr-it+ta s+ya ru d+hi raM mAM sAM tsa ma ma tar+pa NaM/_/a hiM sA ban+d+ha naM ya mAt+t+wat+ta sta da ti durla
[\[240b.2\]]gdon nad dug dang skyo ba zhi byed dang /_/sa 'dzin bsten dang chu gter sgrol bar byed dang gser 'gyur dag dang rtsis/_/'di dag ma lus mthar thug 'bras bu mi rnams dag gi bza' ba yin/_/'phral la bcad pa'i sha dang ni/_/khrag dag bdag la tshim byed pa/_/'tshe med sdom pas bcings gyur pa/_/khyod las shin tu rnyed par
[\[240b.3\]]b+haM/_/gats+tshA mi yA tsi tuM kiM tsita twat+sa mI pe ka ro mi kiM/_/krI DAHka thAsh+tsa sho b+han+te tu l+yA hA ra bi hA ra yauH/_/i t+yuk+ta ste na nr-i pa tista ma b+hA Sha taM mA da raH/_/ni dza de ha sa mut+k+r-it+ti sA sr-ig+maM saM da dA mi te/_/twaM pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da pUr+b+ba dwA ra mu dA
[\[240b.4\]]dka'/_/khyod dang nye bar bdag ci byed/_/'ga' zhig la ni slong du 'gro/_/zas dang gnas ni mtshungs pa yi/_/rtsed mo dang ni gtum dag mdzes/_/zhes des brjod tshe mi bdag ni/_/gus dang bcas pas de la smras/_/rang gi lus ni rab bcad pa'i/_/khrag dang sha ni khyod la sbyin/_/rgya che blo gros ldan pa khyod/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung dang po'i
[\[240b.5\]]ha ra/_/nir+b+ba Na na ga ra s+yA g+r+yaHpan+thAsta ba su b+ha Shi taM/_/i t+yuk+te rA ja tsan+d+re Na ta mu bA tsa k+Sha pA tsa raH/_/shrU ya tAM su ma te tur+N+Na dAM ya tAM tsa pra ti shru taM/_/a ni t+yAHsaM skA rAsta ra la ta ra bi d+yud+d+yu ti ni b+haHsa mut+pan+not+pan+na pra la ya pa ri NA ma pra Na
[\[240b.6\]]sgo/_/khyod kyi legs bshad myang 'das kyi/_/grong khyer gyi ni lam gyi mchog_/rgyal po zla bas 'di brjod tshe/_/mtshan mo rgyu bas de la smras/_/blo gros bzang po myur du nyon/_/dam bcas pa dag sbyin par mdzod/_/'du byed mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba'i glog rab mdzes pa dag dang mtshungs/_/rab tu skyes shing skyes shing 'jig pa'i yongs su 'gyur ba dag la
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]yi naH/_/ta dud+the dzaM tu nAM b+h+ra ma Na pa ri bar+t+taHshra ma ba tAM ni ro d+hAd+bi shrin+taM di shi ti bi ba shA nA mu pa sha maH/_/e ta dA kAr+N+N+ya nr-i pa tiHpra haR+Shot+phul+la lo tsa naH/_/da dau swa de ha mut+k+r-i t+yaHtasmai mAM sa sa
[\[241a.2\]]chags/_/des bskyed 'khor zhing yongs su sgyur bas srog chags dag ni dbang bral zhing /_/ngal dub ldan pa rnams la nyer zhi 'gog pas ngal gso ster bar byed/_/de dag thos nas mi bdag ni/_/dga' mgu mig dag rab rgyas pas/_/rang gi lus ni bcad pa'i sha/_/khrag dang bcas
[\[241a.3\]]sro Ni taM/_/ut+k+r-i t+t+yot+k+r-it+t+ya da da taHswa mAM sA ni ma hI pa tiH/_/nir+b+bi ka re Na sa twe na bismi to b+hUn+ni shA tsa raH/_/sa da twA sar+b+ba gA tre b+h+yaHpi shi taM pi shaM tA shi ne/_/pra Ni d+hA naM bya d+hAt+sar+b+ba sa twa saM tA ra Ne nr-i paH/_/
[\[241a.4\]]pa de la byin/_/rang sha bcad cing bcad cing ni/_/ster bar byed pa sa bdag gi/_/snying stobs rnam 'gyur med pa yis/_/mtshan mo rgyu ba ya mtshan gyur/_/de yis lus ni thams cad las/_/sha za dag la sha byin nas/_/sems can thams cad sgrol ba la/_/smon lam mi yi bdag pos byas/_/
[\[241a.5\]]ta ta staM pra Na yA du tse ruM rak+Sho rU paHpu ran+da raH/_/a pi te mar+m+ma bits+tshe da bi ShA da dza na nI bya thA/_/pr-iSh+Ta s+t+ri da sha rA dze na rA dza rA dzasta ma bra bItra/_/na bi ShA do sti me de he pa ro pa ka ra NI kr-i te/_/
[\[241a.6\]]de nas de la gcugs pa las/_/'byer 'jig srin po'i gzugs gyis smras/_/khyod kyi gnad ni bcad pa la/_/gdung bas mi dga' bskyed dam ci/_/skabs gsum rgyal pos dris pa na/_/rgyal po'i rgyal pos der smras pa/_/lus kyis gzhan la phan pa dag_/byas la bdag ni mi dga' med/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bya thA yAM ni bi kA ro haM ya di sa t+ye na te na me/_/nir+b+ra NaM swas+tha me bAstu pUr+b+ba rU pa mi daM ba puH/_/i ti bru pA Na s+ya b+hu baHpa t+yuHsa t+yo pa yA tsa nAtra/_/sa ha sai ba ba puHpUr+b+ba rU paM ni r+b+ra Na tAM ya yau/_/
[\[241b.2\]]gal te gdung ba dag la bdag_/rnam 'gyur med na bden pa des/_/bdag gi lus 'di sngon gzugs bzhin/_/rma med bsos pa nyid gyur cig_/ces smras sa yi bdag po yis/_/bden pa'i tshig ni brjod pa las/_/'phral nyid lus ni sngon gyi gzugs/_/rma dang bral ba nyid du gyur/_/
[\[241b.3\]]taM puSh+pa baR+Shairbi pu laish+tshA d+ya mA naM na b+hash+tsa raiH/_/rak+Sho rU paM pa ri t+ya dz+ya pra sha shaM sa su re shwa raH/_/pra sa d+ya nr-i pa ti yA tA dr-iSh+Ta sa twe sha ta kra tau/_/a tsin+ta yat+su d+hA swa daM b+hU pa tistat+su b+hA Shi taM/_/
[\[241b.4\]]mkha' la rgyu bas me tog char/_/yangs pas de ni g.yogs byas shing /_/lha yi dbang pos srin po'i gzugs/_/yongs su btang nas rab tu bsngags/_/brgya byin snying stobs ldan pa yis/_/mi bdag la ni dang byas so/_/de yis legs bshad bdud rtsi yi/_/nyams myong sa
[\[241b.5\]]shi bi rna re shwa raHso ha ma b+ha baM pUr+b+ba dzan+ma ni/_/i ti pra Na ba ne nA b+hUd+bAl+la b+haM me su b+hA Shi taM/_/ta thA ga te ba ka thi tA dzan+man+ta ra ka thAM ni dzAM/_/A kar+N+N+ya b+hik+Sha baHsar+b+be pra shaM suHsa
[\[241b.6\]]yi bdag pos bsams/_/nga nyid sngon gyi skye ba la/_/mi dbang shi bi der gyur nas/_/de ltar srog gi zong gis bdag_/legs bshad la ni dga' bar gyur/_/rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dag_/thos nas ya mtshan ldan pa yi/_/dge slong kun
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bi sma yAH/_/dr-iSh+TA dr-iSh+Ta su khe su b+hA Shi ta ru tsir+m+mArgAHpra b+hA dI pa yata saM bA de na su b+hA Shi tA mr-i ta ra saHprI tiM pa raM baR+Sha ti/_/sar+b+ba dz+nyo pi su b+hA Shi tAr+tha bi Sha ye d+yar+tha nI yar+thi nAM
[\[242a.2\]]gyis rab tu bsngags/_/mthong dang ma mthong bde la lam ni legs bshad kyis gsal sgron ma lta bur spyod/_/legs bshad bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyams myong ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba'i char dag 'bebs/_/legs bshad don gnyer yul la gnyer bya kun mkhyen dag kyang
[\[242a.3\]]tasmAn+nA sti su b+hA Shi te na sa dr-i shaM kiM tsit+sa tAM bal+la b+ham/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM shi bi su b+hA Shi tA ba dA na me ka na ba ti ta maH
[\[242a.4\]]don gnyer nyid du 'gyur/_/de slad dam pa rnams la legs bshad dang mtshungs dga' ba ci yang yod ma yin/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shi pi'i legs bshad kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal
[\[242a.5\]]pal+la baH//_//gu rU Na ma s+ya gre gu ru ta ra pa de sai ba ma ha tI sa dA sad+b+hiHpU dz+yA tri da sha ta Ti nI pA ba na ta nuH/_/d+ha ri trI b+hUM tA nAM sa ka la ra sa sA ra pra sa tsi nA sha ri raM puSh+NA
[\[242a.6\]]'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//bla ma rnams kyi mdun dag tu yang shin tu bla ma'i gnas su che/_/'byung po rnams ni 'dzin byed mtha' dag ro yi snying po rab tu bskrun/_/lus ni mdza' gcugs bzhin du rgyas byed skabs gsum chu bo gtsang ba'i lus/_/ma de nyid ni rtag tu
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ti pra Na ya mi ba mA tA na ba su d+hA/_/shrA bas+t+yAM bista ran+d+har+m+ma dze ta ba ne ra me dzi naH/_/pra ti sA d+ya pu nar+b+hik+Shu saM g+g+haM saM k+Ship+ta ma bra bIta/_/pi ta rau pa ra maM prah+ma dzaM ga maHpu N+ya saM ga maH/_/ku
[\[242b.2\]]mkhas pas mchod bya yin gyi nor 'dzin min/_/mnyan yod dag gi rgyal byed tshal/_/dga' bar rgyal bas rgya che'i chos/_/rab tu bstan nas mdor bsdus pa/_/slar yang dge slong tshogs la gsungs/_/pha ma mchog tu tshangs pa ste/_/g.yo ba'i bsod nams dag gi grogs/_/gang
[\[242b.3\]]lA ni tA ni d+h+ya n+yA ni ye ShAn+d+har+m+ma sta dats+tsa ni/_/pa t+yo pa maM nAsti ta pas+t+ri lokyA na kwa pya hiM sA sa dr-i shosti d+har+m+maH/_/gu rurga rI yAn+na pi tuHpa rosti mA tuHpa raM dai ba tA ma sti nA n+yata/_/si bi taM pra ba b+ha
[\[242b.4\]]zhig de mchod chos ldan pa'i/_/rigs de bsngags par 'os pa yin/_/'jig rten gsum na bden mtshungs dka' thub med/_/'tshe med mtshungs pa'i chos ni gang na'ang med/_/bla ma lci ba pha las gzhan yod min/_/lha yi mchog ni ma las gzhan pa min/_/gang zhig lhag par gus pa
[\[242b.5\]]b+hak+tiM nir+b+ha raiHpA da puSh+ka raM yu ga gu ran+no yaiH/_/te pa raM dzaM la ru tsai ba ke ba laM sar+b+ba tIr+tha ga ma ne pi niSh+pha lAH/_/pai byaHsu khai ra bi mu khaHsa ta taM k+Sha mA b+h+r-it+tI bra bra tA di ni ya mai ra tsi tIr+N+Na sho ShaH/_/alpe
[\[242b.6\]]rab rgyas pas/_/bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma zung mi bsten/_/de dag mchog tu chur sred 'ba' zhig gis/_/'jug ngogs kun tu song yang 'bras bu med/_/bde bas bsten bya phyi rol mi phyogs rtag tu bzod pa 'dzin/_/drag po'i brtul zhugs la sogs nges pas gdung ba ster mi byed/_/gus
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pya na lpa pha la daHpra Na yo pa tsA re mA tuHpi tush+tsa na sa mo sti gu rus+t+r-i tI yaH/_/A tsAR+YaHsu kr-i tAr+tha de sha ka ta yA kairnA b+hi na d+yaHsa dA prA NA nAM dza na kaHka thaM na dza na kaHpU dz+ya gu ru NAM gu ruH/_/ta tA
[\[243a.2\]]pa'i rim gro chung ngu la yang mi chung 'bras bu ster/_/pha dang ma dang mnyam pa'i bla ma gsum pa yod ma yin/_/legs byas don ston byed pas slob dpon rtag tu su yis mngon par dga' mi bya/_/srog rnams skyed byed bla ma rnams kyi bla ma pha ni ji ltar mchod mi bya/_/de
[\[243a.3\]]bi k+Sha Na gar+b+ha d+hA ra Na b+ha ra kle sha s+ya mA tuHpa raM ke nA nr-i N+ya bi d+hA na pu N+ya ni tsa ye nA sAd+ya te nir+b+r-itiH/_/mA tur+n+ni kA ra ka la ma s+ya bi be ka pA ka saM prAp+ta sA taka ku laHki la yaHka ro ti/_/ta s+ya
[\[243a.4\]]bas kyang ni mchog tu skad cig mngal gyi khur bzung ma yi ngal dub la/_/bu lon dag par sgrub byed bsod nams tshogs ni ci yis dag pa thob par 'gyur/_/dben pa ma smin sdig pa'i tshogs ni yang dag thob gyur pa/_/gang gi ma la smod pa'i cha yang nges par sgrub byed pa/_/sdig
[\[243a.5\]]dz+wa ladz+dz+wa la na dzA la shi khA ka lA paHpA pa bra te b+ha ba ti mUr+d+hI dza TA ka Ta yuH/_/ni kA ra kA ri NA mA tur+m+ma yA s+ya ba ra dzan+ma ni/_/pA pa shA pa ma yan+ta paHprAp+taHbai sha paH/_/bA rA Na s+yaM gr-i ha pa
[\[243a.6\]]pa'i brtul zhugs de yi spyi bor ral pa'i tshogs dag ni/_/rab 'bar me yi dra ba'i rtse mo'i tshogs pa dag tu 'gyur/_/skye ba gzhan du ma la ni/_/smod par byed pa bdag gis kyang /_/sdig dmod rang bzhin mi 'dod pa/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i gdung ba thob/_/bA rA Na sI dag tu sngon/_/khyim
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ti rmau tro nA ma pu rA b+ha bta/_/ba sun+d+hA rA nA ma ta s+yA i ti b+hU da ti bal+la b+hA/_/dzA ta mA tre Shu pu tre Shu ta s+yAHprAp+te Shu pany+tsa tAM/_/pash+tsi me ba ya pi shrI mA ne ka pU nu ra dzA yatra/_/bi pa ti b+hI t+ya ta s+yA pi ka n+yA khyA ma ka rot+pi tA/_/
[\[243b.2\]]bdag mdza' bo zhes pa byung /_/de yi chung ma nor 'dzin ma/_/zhes pa shin tu yid 'ong gyur/_/de yi bu rnams skyes tsam na/_/lnga pa nyid ni thob pa'i tshe/_/na tshod mtha' ru bu dag ni/_/dpal dang ldan pa gcig btsas gyur/_/de yang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yis/_/pha yis bu mo zhes par btags/_/
[\[243b.3\]]mai tra ka n+ya kA nA ma sau te nA b+hUd+bi shru taHshi shuH/_/sa mu dra ga ma ne ta s+ya dza na ke ni d+ha naM ga te/_/e ka pu trai ba dza na nI ni d+hi tu l+yaM tsa rak+Sha tAM/_/ku la tra mA ga tA ta s+ya dwi pa yA trAM ni baR+Ye sa/_/A di de sha swa
[\[243b.4\]]de yi mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes/_/byis pa de ni grags par gyur/_/de yi pha ni rgya mtsho ru/_/song zhing shi bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/bu gcig pa nyid ma yis ni/_/gter dang mtshungs pa dag tu bsrungs/_/rigs kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yis/_/gling du 'gro ba bzlog nas des/_/de la 'tsho thabs
[\[243b.5\]]de sha r+haM swalpa bi kra ye dzI bi kAM/_/kAR+Sha pa Na tsa tuSh+Ta pUr+b+baM yaM bi kra yot+man+naM/_/ta to dwi gu Na ma n+yasmin n+di ne pya tha tsa turgu NaM/_/ta tash+tsASh+Ta gu NaM lA b+haM sar+b+baM m+mA tra n+ya be da yata/_/ku lo tsi tAM dwI pa yA trAM shru
[\[243b.6\]]rang yul du/_/'os pas chung ngu 'tshong ba bstan/_/dang por tshong las skyes pa ni/_/kaR+Sha pa Na bzhi dag dang /_/de nas nyi ma gzhan la ni/_/de las nyis 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang /_/de nas brgyad 'gyur dag kyang rnyed/_/thams cad de yis ma la phul/_/de nas gling bgrod rigs la ni/_/
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]twA b+hU da tha sot+su kaH/_/sa mu dra ga ma nA raM b+ha saM b+hA ra ra pa pA da raH/_/sa mA drA baR+Ya mA No pi nA ma n+ya ta ni bar+t+ta naM/_/ta taHpa pA da pa ti tAM dza na nIM sho ka bi hwa lAM/_/duSh+TaHshri ya mi bot+paR+Ya
[\[244a.2\]]'os pa thos nas 'dod ldan gyur/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba rtsom pa yi/_/tshogs la chags shing gus ldan de/_/ma yis bzlog par gyur mod kyang /_/bzlog pa nyid du khas ma blangs/_/de nas ma ni mya ngan gyis/_/'khrugs shing rkang pa la 'gyel bas/_/gdug pa de yi dpal
[\[244a.3\]]tsa ra Ne na bi niR+Ya yau/_/pe yU ShaMs+kha li tAr+d+ha bar+N+Na la li tA lA bai shi shur+b+baR+Sha ti prI ti s+phI ta ma no ra thot+sa ba sha tair+d+hat+te ba ni yasta taH/_/pash+tsat+pat+ka Ta yo ba noSh+ma bi ka TA Tang+kA ra bI dI pa Tu duHpu traHs+phu
[\[244a.4\]]bzhin du/_/rkang pas rab tu spangs nas song /_/dang por byis pa 'khrul zhing yi ge phyed brjod yid 'ong bdud rtsi'i char dag 'bebs/_/de nas dul ba'i yid la re ba'i dga' ston rgyas pa brgya yis dga' ba 'dzin/_/phyi nas mi bzad lang tsho'i tsha ba drag pos brlang po dag tu smra byed mkhas/_/
[\[244a.5\]]Ta kA la kU Ta ka Tu kaHkaSh+TA ka ro ti bya thAM/_/bi pu laM dza na nI sho ka mi ba prA pye sa sA ga raM/_/sa mA ru d+ya pra ba ha NaM ya yau rat+nArdza not+su kaH/_/ma ka ra spA ra na kha ra kru ra kra ka tsA dA ri tAM/_/
[\[244a.6\]]gsal bar nag po brtsegs pa ltar rtsub ngan pa'i bu yis sdug bsngal gdung bar byed/_/rin chen bsgrub par 'dod pa de/_/ma yi mya ngan yangs par bzhin/_/rgya mtsho'i drung du phyin nas ni/_/gzings la rab tu zhon te song /_/de nas de yi gzings chen ni/_/rab rno chu srin sen mo yi/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]ta taHta s+ya pra ba ha NaM kU le prA dz+ya ma b+ha dz+ya ta/_/ta s+yot+sik+ta ma termA tu rA shA b+haM ga gu rot+b+ha bta/_/b+hag+ne pra ba ha Ne tasmin+mo heHshA pa i bA b+ha bta/_/ta taHpha la ha kA bAp+t+yA sha naiHsaM dz+nyA ma bA s+ya saH/_/tI ra mA
[\[244b.2\]]sog le drag pos dral bar byas/_/'jug ngogs dag tu zhig par gyur/_/blo gros rab 'phyar de yis ni/_/ma yi bsam bcom khur lci bas/_/gzings ni zhig par gyur pa des/_/dmod pa bzhin du rmongs pa thob/_/de nas shing gi tshal pa thob/_/dal gyis 'du shes thob pa des/_/chu gter gyi
[\[244b.3\]]sA d+ya dza la d+hi rdza gA he ga ha NaM ma hata/_/e kA kI hA ri ta d+h+r-i tiHsa bra dzan+bi dza ne tsi rAta/_/ra myaM ra ma Na kaM nA ma na ga raM di bya mA b+ha bta/_/ap+pa ro b+hish+tsa ta sre b+hirba da nen+du twi ShAM tsa yaiH/_/dz+yot+s+na pu raM sr-i dzan+tI
[\[244b.4\]]ni ngogs phyin nas/_/nags tshal chen po'i nang du zhugs/_/gcig pu brtan nyams 'gro ba des/_/skye bo med par yun ring na/_/grong khyer rtse dga' can zhes pa/_/dga' ba mchog ni thob par gyur/_/bzhin ras zla zer tshogs rnams kyis/_/zla ba'i 'od ni spro byed pa/_/lha yi bu mo bzhi dag
[\[244b.5\]]b+hiHkr-i tA ti th+yaHsa sA da raM/_/he ma puSh+ka ri NI tI re ra mya rat+naM la tA ba ne/_/ma Ni man+di ra shay+YA su ta tra saM b+ho ga bAn b+hUta/_/bi pa daHsu kha paR+Yan+tA kle sha prI tAsh+tsa sam+ba daH/_/A bar+t+ti n+yo b+ha baM t+ye ba baR+YA ye
[\[244b.6\]]gis/_/gus bcas mgron ni byas pa de/_/gser gyi rdzing bu dag gi 'gram/_/rin chen 'khri shing dga' ba'i tshal/_/nor bu'i khang pa khri stan can/_/der ni longs spyod ldan par gyur/_/rgud pa dag ni bde ba'i mtha'/_/phun tshogs nyon mongs dag la mdza'/_/lus can rnams la re mos kyis/_/
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]Na sha rI ri NAM/_/ra ti b+ho ga pra NI yi NA taste na ha ri Nai k+Sha NAM/_/ra ma mA NAsh+tsi raM prA pUr+b+ho gya s+ya kr-i tAr+tha nAM/_/na ga re dak+Shi NaHpan+thA bar+dz+yaHsar+b+bat+ma nA twa yA/_/i t+yuk+taste b+hi ra d+hi kaM so
[\[245a.2\]]nges pa nyid du 'khor ba yin/_/dga' mgur spyod pa la chags pa'i/_/ri dgas mig can de dag rnams/_/de dang rol pas yun ring du/_/skal bzang don byas nyid dag thob/_/khyod kyis grong khyer lho yi lam/_/bdag nyid kun gyis spang bya zhes/_/de dag gis brjod tshe na de/_/lhag
[\[245a.3\]]b+hUt+tang+ga ma not+su kaH/_/kA maM ni ya ma bA ma s+ya swA d+hI nA na b+hi lA Shi NaH/_/prA ye Na bar+b+ha te dzen+ton+ni She d+ha nA d+hi ka da raH/_/ta taHkau tu kA kr-iSh+Ta ste na dak+Shi Na bar+t+ma nA/_/bra dzan+pA paHsa dA mat+taM nA
[\[245a.4\]]par de ni 'gro 'dod gyur/_/rang dbang mngon par mi 'dod cing /_/nges par bsdams pa'i mi mthun phyogs/_/srog chags rnams ni bkag pa la/_/phal cher gus pa lhag par 'phel/_/de nas dge mtshan gyis drangs de/_/lho yi phyogs kyi lam de nas/_/song bas rtag tu myos zhes pa/_/
[\[245a.5\]]ma de bya pu ra pa raM/_/aSh+Ta bap+sa ra pasta tra tad+bad+b+ho gya twa mA gra tA/_/ta s+yo ba tsA ra ra tsa nAM tsi raM tsakrusta s+yA d+hi kA/_/tA b+hiHkra me Na te Nai ba ni Shir+d+hi dak+Shi Ne d+h+wa ni/_/sa kau tu kAng+ga taHprA pa tr-i tI yaM nan+da naM pu
[\[245a.6\]]lha yi grong khyer gzhan pa thob/_/der ni de bzhin lha mo brgyad/_/spyad bya nyid du gyur rnams kyis/_/de la rim gro'i bkod pa dag_/de las lhag pa yun ring byas/_/de dag rnams kyis rim pa des/_/lho yi lam ni bkag pa na/_/de ni dge mtshan las song bas/_/grong khyer gsum pa dga' byed
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]raM/_/Sho Da shAp+pa ra sasta s+ya ra ti b+ho go pa b+ho gya tAM/_/ta tra kra me Na te nai ba ya yurlI lA bi lA pi naH/_/tA b+hir+n+ni Shid+d+he na pu nardak+Shi Ne na pa thA bra dzanra/_/bra h+mot+ta rA khya prA sA da mA sa pA da sa sA da raH/_/dwA triM sha da tha
[\[245b.2\]]thob/_/der ni rim pa de nyid kyis/_/rtse dgas rnam par rol de la/_/lha mo bcu drug dga' mgu yis/_/longs spyod spyad bya nyid du gyur/_/de dag gis kyang bkag pa yi/_/lho yi lam nas song gyur pa/_/gus bcas de yis khang bzang ni/_/tshangs pa'i mchog ces bya bar phyin/_/de nas der yang
[\[245b.3\]]saM prA pya ta trA pyap+pa ra saHpa rAH/_/saM b+ho ga su b+ha gastad+bang+ya yau dak+Shi Na bar+t+ma nA/_/sa dra dzan+na ga raM prA pa durga prA ya ma yo ma maM/_/pa ru ShaM kha la po hArda mi bA yA pa tsa yA shra yaM/_/ta s+ya ta tra pra
[\[245b.4\]]lha mo gzhan/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis longs spyod kyis/_/skal bzang gis ni yang dag thob/_/de bzhin lho yi lam nas song /_/de ni song bas mi bsrun pa'i/_/grogs bzhin nyon mongs tshogs kyi gnas/_/lcags kyi rang bzhin rtsub po yi/_/grong khyer ngan 'gro mang po thob/_/der de nang du zhugs pa
[\[245b.5\]]biSh+Ta s+ya kra mAd+d+wA ra Ni b+hU mi Shu/_/ke nA pi pi hi tA ni ba ya yurnI san+d+hi ban+d+ha nAM/_/ta dan+ta re ma hA kA yaM so pa sh+yat+pu ru ShaM s+thi taM/_/sa ka la kle sha do ShA NAM bistIr+N+Na mi ba b+hA dza na/_/dz+wA lA bi la yi taM tsakraM ta s+ya
[\[245b.6\]]na/_/rim pas sa la sgo rnams ni/_/su zhig dag gis bsgribs pa bzhin/_/mtshams med bsdams pa nyid du gyur/_/de yi nang na skyes bu ni/_/lus chen gnas pa de yis mthong /_/mtha' dag nyon mongs skyon rnams kyi/_/snod ni shin tu che ba bzhin/_/bcings shing rgyun du khrag rgyun 'bab/_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]mUr+d+h+ni pa ri b+h+ra mata/_/tIk+Sh+NaM da daR+sha bad+d+ha s+ya sak+taM rak+taM pra bA hi NaH/_/swa shi raHpra su tiHpU ya sho Ni tirbi hi tA sa nAM/_/taM dr-iSh+T+wA tI bra Nirbe dA da ba dan+mai tra ka n+ya kaH/_/kas+t+waM krU ra bya thA krAn+taH
[\[246a.2\]]de yi spyi bor 'khor lo ni/_/rnon po 'bar bas dkrigs pa dag_/yongs su 'khor ba mthong bar gyur/_/rang gi mgo las zags pa yi/_/rnag khrag gis ni zas bsgrubs pa/_/de mthong drag po'i yid byung nas/_/mdza' bo'i bu mos rab smras pa/_/gdung ba drag pos non
[\[246a.3\]]ka s+ye daM kar+m+ma NaHpha laM/_/pr-iSh+Taste ne ti ka ru N+yA ta pu ru Shasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/mA tuHkr-i tA pa kA ro haM ta s+ye daM kar+m+ma NaHpha laM/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya so bya bIt+pA pa sam+bA da shaM ki taH/_/sau tsin+ta yan+ma mA pyasti pA paM mA tuHkr-i
[\[246a.4\]]khyod su/_/'di ni las dag ci yi 'bras/_/zhes des snying rjes dris pa na/_/skyes bus de la rab smras pa/_/bdag ni ma la gnod byed do/_/'di ni las de nyid kyi 'bras/_/de dag thos nas de yang ni/_/sdig pa dran nas dogs par gyur/_/de yis bsams pa bdag la yang /_/ma la gnod
[\[246a.5\]]ta ga saH/_/a yaM pA pa sa hA d+h+yA yi dr-iSh+TaHsma ra Na kr-in+ma yA/_/nU naM te nai pa kr-iSh+To haM pA pe na su kha maN+Da lAta/_/sho ni ke sa na tsa ran kA ma ma dzaHsha s+ya ba nA di ba/_/i ti tsin+ta ku le tasmin bad+d+hA dwA ra pu
[\[246a.6\]]byas sdig pa yod/_/sdig pa rab tu brjod pa'i grogs/_/dran par byed 'di bdag gis mthong /_/khyi ra ba yi rtswa sngon gyi/_/nags nas ri dgas rgyu ba bzhin/_/sdig des bde ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/nga nyid drangs pa ma yin nam/_/zhes pa'i bsams pas de 'khrugs shing /_/sgo bsdams
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ras+thi te/_/uts+tsa tsA rAm+ba rAd+bA NI hr-i da yA kam+pa kA ri NI/_/tsi ra bad+d+hAHpra mu ts+yan+tAM ni ba d+h+yan+tAM na bA ga tAH/_/bar+d+ha muk+ti na bA ban+d+hi Sh+wa yaM prAp+to ba d+hi k+Sha NaH/_/i t+yu tIr+N+Ne di baHshap+de muk+taHsa pu ru ShaH
[\[246b.2\]]sngon na gnas pa'i tshe/_/snying ni kun tu 'dar byed pa'i/_/skad ni mkha' la rab grags pa/_/yun ring bcings pa nges par grol/_/gsar du 'ongs pa dam du chings/_/gsar pa chings la bcings pa grol/_/'di ni mtshams kyi dus la bab/_/ces sgra mkha' las grags pa'i tshe/_/skyes bu de
[\[246b.3\]]k+Sha NAta/_/dIp+taM tsa tsakra ma pa tan+mai tra ka n+ya s+ya masta ke/_/na ba bad+d+heHpaHtad+kA la mar+m+mats+tshe da bya thA tu raH/_/taM muk+ta ban+d+ha ma ba dat+puru ShaM mai tra ka n+ya kaH/_/t+yak+t+wA pa ri pu rA Ni man+di ra pun+da rA Ni tA n+yap+pa
[\[246b.4\]]grol skad cig las/_/mdza' bo'i bu mo'i mgo la ni/_/'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba lhung /_/de dus gnad gcod gdung bas gzir/_/gsar bcings mdza' bo'i bu mo des/_/bcings pa grol bar gyur pa yi/_/skyes bu de la rab smras pa/_/lha mo rjes su chags ldan longs spyod yid ni 'phrog pa can/_/
[\[246b.5\]]raHsa ra sa b+ho ga ma no ha rA Ni/_/kr-iSh+TaHpra kr-iSh+Ta ta ra pA ta ka kar+m+ma dAm+naM kA le na kalpi ta pha lA ki la kar+m+ma bal+lA/_/su nA mi ba k+Shi ti mi mAM pa shu rA ga tosmi kaR+Shi t+ya laM ba la tI b+ha bi Sh+ya ta
[\[246b.6\]]grong khyer nor bu'i khang khyim mdzes pa de dag yongs btang nas/_/sdig pa'i las kyi thag pa bzhin du rab tu gyur pas drangs/_/de yis bkug nas kyang ni dbang med mi rnams 'jug par byed/_/khyi rnams la bzhin sa 'di nyid du phyugs dag 'ongs par gyur/_/gang na 'di yi las kyi
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bya tai yA/_/kr-iSh+Tasta yai ba tsa bi sha t+ya ba sho ma nu Sh+yaHya tra s+ya tiSh+Tha ti pu raHpa ri sA ka b+ho gyA/_/kle sha b+ho gA ba d+ho kA laHki yAn+mA tuHkr-i tA ga pAM/_/a pyA ga mi Sh+ya ti
[\[247a.2\]]'khri shing cha yis yongs bsgrubs pa/_/dus kyis yongs smin spyad bya nyid du gyur pa mdun na gnas/_/nges par spyad bya stobs ldan 'di yis mchog tu 'gugs par byed/_/ma la gnod pa byas rnams kyis/_/nyon mongs spyod mtshams ji snyed dus/_/skye bo kha cig bdag
[\[247a.3\]]na baHkash+tsi dasmad+bi d+hi dza naH/_/i ti dz+wa la te tsakrA gra dIR+Ya mA na s+ya de hi naH/_/tas+yAr+t+ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA pu ru Sha sta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/ShaSh+ThirbaR+Sha sa ha srA Ni ShaSh+ThirbaR+Sha sha tA ni tsa/_/a s+ya kle sho pa b+ho gya s+ya na ya tiH
[\[247a.4\]]lta bu/_/gsar du 'ong ba 'gyur ram ci/_/zhes pa lus can 'khor lo ni/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i rtses bcom zhing /_/gzir ba de yi tshig thos nas/_/skyes bus de la rab smras pa/_/lo ni stong phrag drug cu dang /_/lo ni brgya phrag drug cu dag_/nyon mongs nye bar longs spyod 'di/_/sdig pa'i las can
[\[247a.5\]]pA pa kar+m+ma NAM/_/i hA pa rA Ni b+hi Sha Na paM ti s+thA nA na pA pi nAM/_/mA tuHkr-i tA ga sA ma n+ya ye sA me Sh+yan+ti tad+bi d+hAH/_/shru tai tad+duHsa ha ta raM te nok+taM mai tra ka n+ya kaH/_/su bya thA duHkha sa swA dAt+pa rAr+t+ti da ya yA ba
[\[247a.6\]]rnams la nges/_/ma la gnod pa byas pa yi/_/sdig can rnams la 'di na gnas/_/'jigs su rung ba gzhan dag yod/_/gzhan yang de ltar 'ong bar 'gyur/_/des brjod shin tu bzod dka' de/_/mdza' bo'i bu mos thos gyur nas/_/rab gdung sdug bsngal myong ba las/_/gzhan dag gzir
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]datra/_/a d+hu nA ye sa me Sh+yan+te na rAHpA ta ka kA ri NaH/_/te ShA mar+the ma mai be daM tsakraM tiSh+Tha tu masta ke/_/ka thaM me sa han+te tI bra dIr+g+ha me baM bi d+hAM bya thAM/_/e ka s+yai ba bya tha me tu sar+b+be ni r+b+r-i tu ni r+b+ya thAH/_/
[\[247b.2\]]la brtse bas smras/_/da ni sdig pa byed pa'i mi/_/gang zhig rab tu 'ong 'gyur ba/_/de dag don du 'khor lo 'di/_/bdag gi mgo la gnas gyur cig_/'di lta'i gdung ba drag cing ring /_/de dag rnams kyis ji ltar bzod/_/bdag nyid gcig pu gdung gyur la/_/thams cad gdung med gnas gyur
[\[247b.3\]]pa rAr+the d+hA ra yi Sh+yA mi tsakraM b+huk+t+wA+o pha laM ni dzaM/_/pa ra bya thAM bi dzA nA ti na dza naHswa bya thAM bi nA/_/i t+yuk+te ka ru NArte na te na sa twa hi tai Shi NA/_/sat+saM kalpa pra b+hA be na tats+tsa kra ma ga man+na b+hAH/_/
[\[247b.4\]]cig_/'khor lo rang gi 'bras bcad nas/_/gzhan gyi don du bdag gis bzung /_/skye bo rang nyid gdung med pas/_/gzhan gyi gdung ba yongs mi shes/_/sems can phan tshol snying rje yis/_/gzir ba de yis 'di brjod tshe/_/dam pa'i kun rtog mthu yis ni/_/de yi 'khor lo mkha' la
[\[247b.5\]]tA paM pal+la bi tA ni han+ti ta nu te shu b+h+raM ya shaHpuSh+pi tA sa d+yaHsau ra b+ha b+ha bya b+ho ga su b+ha gAM lak+Sh+mIm+bi d+hat+te pu naH/_/ka ru N+yA r+d+ra ta yA ya dai ba hr-i da ye sad+b+hiHsa mA ro pi tA sat+saM kalpa la tA sa
[\[247b.6\]]song /_/yal 'dab dag ni gdung ba 'phrog cing me tog grags snyan dkar po rgyas par byed/_/'phral la dri bzang legs ldan longs spyod skal bzang phun sum tshogs pa slar yang 'dzin/_/dam pa'i kun rtog 'khri shing snying rje'i brlan ldan dam pa rnams kyi snying la ni/_/gang tshe yang dag
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dai ba sa ra saM kiM kiM na su te pha laM/_/kA ru N+yAt+pu N+ya ma hAt+m+yAt+tat+k+Sha NAt+k+Sha ta kilbi ShaH/_/sa pa b+hu ba pa ri t+ya dz+ya de haM de baHsu ra la ye/_/so ha me bA b+ha baM pUr+b+baM mai t+r+yat+mA mai t+r+ya ka n+ya kaH/_/pA de not+pA
[\[248a.2\]]btab pa de tshe ro ldan 'bras bu ci dang ci mi skyed/_/snying rje'i bsod nams bdag nyid kyis/_/skad cig de la sdig zad de/_/lus ni yongs su btang nas de/_/lha yi gnas su lhar gyur to/_/nga nyid sngon tshe byams bdag nyid/_/mdza' bo'i bu mo nyid gyur te/_/ma ni rkang pas
[\[248a.3\]]ra Nat+mA tuHprAp+tastAM duHkha bar+t+ti nIM/_/kAR+ShA pa NAt+mA tuHpu dzA prAp+tash+tsAp+pa ra saM pa daM/_/i t+yU tse b+ha ga bAn mA tr-i shu shru ShaM d+har+m+ma mut+ta maM/_/mA tA maM ga la mA li kA gu Na ma ShI bA sai n+ya mau liHpi tA tau ye yAM shi
[\[248a.4\]]rab 'phangs pa'i/_/sdug bsngal gnas skabs de dag thob/_/kAR+Sha pa Nas ma la ni/_/mchod pas lha mo'i gnas kyang thob/_/de skad ma yi srid zhu ni/_/chos kyi mchog tu bcom ldan gsungs/_/ma ni bkra shis phreng ba yon tan dang ldan pa ni mnyes gshin cod pan te/_/de dag dgyes
[\[248a.5\]]ra si pri yA ya ku ru taHpA dAm+bu dzA ro pa Na/_/sarbA shA pa ri pU ra Not+Ya ta ya shaHsam+bat+p+ra kA sho da yA ste pu N+yA b+ha ra NAHpra yAn+ti dza ga tAM ni t+yot+pa baHpU dz+ya tA mra/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba
[\[248a.6\]]slad gang gi spyi bor zhabs kyi pad+mo rab tu 'god byed pa/_/phyogs kun yongs su 'gengs par brtson pa'i grags pa phun tshogs rab tu gsal ba rgyas/_/rtag tu dga' ston bsod nams rgyan ldan de dag 'gro ba'i mchod bya nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]dA na kalpa la tA yAM mai t+r+ya ka n+ya kA ba dA naM dwA na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_!_//sh+lA g+h+yA dza yan+ti dzi na b+hak+ti bi she Sha b+hA dzaM shrad+d+hA su d+hAM pra pa ra nir+dz+ha ra shI ka rA ste/_/
[\[248b.2\]]sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mdza' bo'i bu mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//gang gis mchod 'os mchod par bsgrub la me tog la sogs te/_/sems med rnams kyang 'os pa'i sems dang ldan pa nyid du
[\[248b.3\]]ni sh+tse ta no byu tsi ta tse ta na tA mra yai ti yaiHpU dz+ya pU dza na bi d+hau ku su mA di brgaH/_/shri bas+t+yAM bi dza nA mI ni dzi naM dze ta ba na pu rA/_/a nA tha piN+Da do b+he t+ya b+ha ga ban+ta ma b+ha Sha
[\[248b.4\]]'gyur/_/rgyal la gus pa'i khyad par bsten pa rnams la bsngags 'os shing /_/dad pa rab rgyas bdud rtsi'i rgyun thigs de dag rgyal gyur cig_/mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal du sngon/_/dben par bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das/_/rgyal ba de la mngon phyogs te/_/mgon med zas sbyin gyis
[\[248b.5\]]ta/_/twat+b+hak+ti ri ba sar+b+ba tra ma hAr+ha gu Na bi shru tA/_/b+ha ga ban+p+rau D+hi mA yA tA ka n+ya ma ma su mA ga d+hA/_/shri ma taHsAr+tha nA tha sa na ga re puN+DA bar+d+ha ne/_/sU nur+b+r-i Sha b+ha dat+tA khyastad+pA Ni gra ha mI ha te/_/ka
[\[248b.6\]]gsol pa/_/bcom ldan khyod kyi gus pa bzhin/_/kun tu khyer 'os yon tan grags/_/bdag gi bu mo ma ga d+ha/_/bzang mo dar la bab par gyur/_/grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel gyi/_/dpal ldan don mthun mgon po'i bu/_/khyu mchog byin zhes bya ba ni/_/de yi lag pa 'dzin par 'dod/_/bcom
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]n+yAM da dA mi tAM tasmai b+ha ga ban+Ya di ma n+ya pe/_/twa da d+hI na d+ha na prA Na s+t+wa dA dz+nyA nu sha ra No h+ya tAM/_/i t+yuk+te te na b+ha ga bAn bAt+sa l+ya bi ma lA sha yaH/_/ko do Sha sta na yA ta smai di ya tA mi t+ya b+hA Sha ta/_/shAstuH
[\[249a.2\]]ldan gal te bzod na bdag_/bu mo de ni de la ster/_/nor srog khyod kyi dbang gyur bdag_/khyod kyi bka' yi rjes su 'brang /_/de 'di gsol tshe bcom ldan 'das/_/dri med mnyes gshin bsam ldan pas/_/ci skyon bu mo de la ni/_/sbyin par mdzod ces bka' stsal pa/_/ston
[\[249a.3\]]shA sa na mA dA ya pA da ra pra Ni pa t+ya taM/_/a nA tha piN+Da daHshrI mAn pra ya yau ni dza mAn+da raM/_/ta taHsu mA ga d+he ka n+yAM bi b+ha ben ma hI ya pA/_/ar+hA ya sa da dau tasmai b+hu ri rat+nam+ba ra pra daH/_/dat+tA dU ra ta raM de sha
[\[249a.4\]]pa'i bka' ni rab bzung nas/_/de la gus par phyag 'tshal te/_/dpal ldan mgon med zas sbyin ni/_/rang gi khang par rab tu song /_/de nas 'byor pa che dang bcas/_/bu mo ma ga d+ha bzang mo/_/rin chen gos mang rab ster des/_/'os pa de la rab tu byin/_/de nas byin pa'i ma ga d+ha/_/bzang mo
[\[249a.5\]]ma tha yAn+t+rI su mA ga d+hA/_/b+ha ga bAny+dza ra Na smr-i t+yA sa bASh+pa na ya nA b+ha bta/_/tsi ri Na sA sa mA pA d+ya na ga raM puN+Da bar+d+ha naM/_/shu shrU ShA b+hi ra tA pak+ShaHpa dA b+ha r+t+r-i gr-i he b+ha bta/_/ka dA tsi da tha tAM shwa shrU b+ho dz+ya saM b+ha ra kA ra
[\[249a.6\]]thag ring yul bgrod cing /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dran nas/_/mig ni mchi ma dang bcas gyur/_/grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel du/_/yun ring zhig na des sleb nas/_/rtag tu khyo yi khyim du ni/_/bdag po'i bkur sti la chags gyur/_/de nas nam zhig sgyug mo ni/_/grangs las 'das pa
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]NI/_/u bA tsa d+ha na ba t+yA khyA saM khyA tI bya yo d+ya tA/_/pU dz+yo pa ka ra NaM sadz+dzaM ku ru sar+b+baM su mA ga d+he/_/gr-i haM naHprA ta rA gan+tA dza gat+bu dz+yAHgu No dza naH/_/gu ra bo gau ra ba pa daM pU dz+yAHsar+b+ba dza na s+ya
[\[249b.2\]]'god brtson zhing /_/zas kyi tshogs rnams ster byed pa/_/nor can zhes pas de la smras/_/ma ga d+ha bzang mchod pa yi/_/yo byad thams cad chas dag mdzod/_/'gro bas mchod bya yon tan can/_/skye bo nang par bdag khyim 'ong /_/bla ma skye bo thams cad kyis/_/zhe sa'i gnas su mchod bya
[\[249b.3\]]te/_/sa me Sh+yan+ti k+Sha pa Na kAHsam+mo ha k+Sha pa No d+ya tAH/_/i t+yuk+tA pA ta yA ta tra ba b+hu bA raM b+ha tat+pa rA/_/dz+nyA twA b+hik+Shu ga NA yai ba tAM pU dzAM pa ri kalpa tIM/_/a thA ba re h+ni bi bi shur+n+nag+nAHk+Sha pa Na kA gr-i haM/_/ulbaM
[\[249b.4\]]ba/_/kun rmongs zad sbyor zad byed pa/_/de dag rnams ni 'ong bar 'gyur/_/zhes des brjod pa der ni des/_/dge slong tshogs la mchod pa de/_/yongs su brtag par shes gyur nas/_/rtsom pa de la chags par gyur/_/de nas nyin gzhan khyim du ni/_/skra dang sma ra rab 'bar zhing /_/dka' thub
[\[249b.5\]]tsi ta ka tsa sh+ma shrU saM kle sha ni shi ta bra tAH/_/tA na ladz+dzA na ba pA nA na ba lo kya su mA gad+hA/_/mA Sha shay+YA sha nA b+h+yA sA pi ba rAn+ma hi ShA ni ba/_/ladz+dzi tA bA sa sAts+tsha d+ya ba da naM gu ru san+ni d+hau/_/khe da nir+b+be da pi
[\[249b.6\]]drag pos kun nyon mongs/_/gcer bu zad byed pa rnams zhugs/_/ma he sran ma rtswa yi zas/_/goms pas rags par gyur pa bzhin/_/gos med ngo tsha med de dag_/ma ga d+ha bzang gis mthong nas/_/bla ma'i drung du ngo tsha ste/_/bzhin ni gos kyis rab bsgribs nas/_/skyo dang chags bral
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]na tA shu shrU dza na ma b+hA Sha ta/_/a ho ba tA ya mA tsA raHsu tsi rA da ba lo ki taH/_/di gam+ba rA NA ma pya gre ya dI haste ba d+hU dza naH/_/e te b+ha bad+g+r-i he dAn+ta b+huny+dza te shr-iM ga brdzi tAH/_/a mA nu Sha twAn+nai
[\[250a.2\]]kyis dud pas/_/sgyug mo'i skye bo la smras pa/_/gang 'dir phyogs gos rnams kyi yang /_/mdun du bud med skye bo 'khod/_/kye ma kun tu spyod pa 'di/_/shin tu yun ring lon nas mthong /_/mi min rwa dang bral gyur pa/_/dul ba 'di dag khyod kyi ni/_/khyim na gsol byed 'di dag la/_/
[\[250a.3\]]tai ShAM ladz+dzan+te nU na maM ga nAH/_/a s+thA ne b+ha ba tA b+hAk+taHko ya mut+p+r-iM kha laHkra maH/_/na t+yak+ta ma sha ni ye na sa ka thaM bas+t+ra mudz+dz+ha ti/_/ke shon+mu la na karma Ne ba ni shi taM nor+g+ha N+ya mo be di taM kau pI nAM shu ka brdza ne na sa dza ne shI la
[\[250a.4\]]bud med ngo tsha med dam ci/_/gang gis kha zas ma btang ba/_/de yis gos ni ji ltar btong /_/ma bsdams rim pa 'di ni ci/_/khyed ni gnas min dag la gus/_/skra ni rab tu 'bal ba'i las dag nyid kyis brtse ba med pa drag po bstan/_/skye bor bcas la 'doms dkris gos dag spangs
[\[250a.5\]]s+ya bar+t+tai ba kA/_/daM b+hA raM b+ha b+ha yaM ka re tsa pa da ne kro d+haHswa yaM lam+ba te nag+nA nA ma sha nai Shi tA ni ya mi nA me ShAM pa shU nA mi ba/_/ya trai te pa sha baHpU dz+yA ta trot+paR+YA b+ha ban+ti ke/_/a tha
[\[250a.6\]]pas tshul khrims kyi ni gtam nyid ci/_/tshul 'chos rtsom pa dang ldan 'jigs byed bzhin la khro ba rang nyid rnam par bsten/_/dul ba dang ldan gcer bu 'di dag phyugs rnams bzhin du zas dag 'tshol bar byed/_/gang na phyugs 'di mchod byed pa/_/de na spang bar bya ba su/_/yang na
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pA de sho do Sho yaM ga tA nu ga ti kAs+thi taH/_/i ti bru bA NAM tAM shra shrurbi Shar+N+NAM pra t+ya b+hA Sha ta/_/pi tu ste b+ha ba ne b+ha tre pu dz+yAn+te ba de kA dr-i shAH/_/sA ba dat+mat+pi turde he pU dz+ya te b+ha ga bAny+dzi naH/_/kA ru N+yA t+sar+b+ba dza ga tAM
[\[250b.2\]]'di ni yul gyi skyon/_/song ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i lugs/_/zhes smra chags bral dang ldan ma/_/de la sgyug mos lan smras pa/_/bzang mo khyod kyi yab kyi ni/_/khang par ci 'dra mchod pa smros/_/des smras bdag gi pha khyim du/_/snying rjes 'gro ba thams cad ni/_/khyad 'phags dge ba la sbyor
[\[250b.3\]]ku sha lA ti sha yo d+ya taH/_/d+h+yA nA pI naHsti mi ta na ya naHpUr+NA lA ba N+ya sin+d+hur+n+nA sA baM shaM bi pu la sa ra laM pe tu b+hu taM da d+hA naH/_/b+hu ShA shU n+yA pra sr-i ta ru tsi mat+kar+N+Na pA shA b+hi rA maHkAn+t+yai ba
[\[250b.4\]]ba'i/_/bcom ldan rgyal ba mchod par byed/_/bsam gtan la chags g.yo med spyan ldan mdzes sdug rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho ste/_/shangs kyi rgyud ni yangs shing drang po zam stegs dag tu gyur pa yin/_/rab brkyang mdzes ldan rgyan gyis stong pa'i snyan gyi zhags pa mngon dga' ste/_/
[\[250b.5\]]sau ki ma pi pi duShAM shAn+ti man+tasta no ti/_/shi ra pi sa ha dza prA dz+yA lo ka pra se ka ma yaM ma NiM ka ri pa ti ka rA kA rau bA hu mr-i gAM ka ka ra d+yu tiH/_/ka ra ta la ga tAM le khAM shaM kha d+h+wa dzAM bu dza mA li kaM sha ma ma ya
[\[250b.6\]]mdzes pa nyid kyis mkhas rnams nang du zhi ba ci yang rgyas par byed/_/zla zer ltar mdzes de ni lag gnyis glang chen lag pa'i rnam pa dang /_/snang ba rab rgyas dbu la lhan skyes rab bkrus rang bzhin nor bu dang /_/lag mthil du son ri mo dung dang rgyal mtshan chu skyes 'phreng ba dang /_/zhi ba'i rang
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ma hA sA m+RA dz+yA r+haM bi b+har+t+ti sa lak+Sha NaM/_/ta s+yA b+hi lA Sha dza na ka s+ya ma hA mu nI nAM sar+b+bA b+hi lA Sha ka pa nA ra hi taHswa b+hA baH/_/naHshe Shi ta smr-i ti b+hu baHpra ma dA sha ya s+ya rA gar+dz+ha ta s+ya su
[\[251a.2\]]bzhin rgyal srid chen po la 'os mtshan nyid rnam par 'dzin/_/thub chen rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa skyed byed de yis ni/_/rang bzhin mngon par 'dod pa'i rtag pa kun dang bral ba nyid/_/dran pa'i sa gzhi bag med gnas ni lhag ma med par byas/_/chags pa rab
[\[251a.3\]]ta rA ma d+ha raHpa rA gaH/_/muk+tornir+b+ha ra saM ga ma pra Na yi nI mai trI ma naHshA yi nI k+ShAn+ti stan+ma ya kA ri NI hr-i di da yA gA D+haM sa mA sh+le Shi NI/_/sar+b+bA shA b+ha ra Na s+ya b+hu ri da yi tA sak+ta s+ya saM lak+Sh+ya
[\[251a.4\]]tu btang ba'i mchu ni rab tu dmar dang bcas/_/grol ba lhag par 'grogs pa'i mdza' gcugs dang ldan byams pa dag ni yid la nyal/_/bzod pa de yi rang bzhin byed cing brtse ba snying la dam du mnyam par sbyor/_/yid 'ong mang po la chags kun gyi bsam pa rgyas byed sngon
[\[251a.5\]]te ta s+yA pUr+b+ba mu ne ra na n+ya ma hi mA bai rA gya gar+b+haHsha maH/_/pU dz+yaHsa b+ha ba nasmA kaM ya s+ya pra bra dz+ya yA sa tAM/_/d+hat+te shi la du ku lA nAM ni rA ba ra Na tam+ma naH/_/bi shwa rak+Sham+ma neR+Ya s+ya smr-i t+yA bi b+ha ba
[\[251a.6\]]med thub pa ni/_/de yi zhi ba sngon med bdag nyid chags bral snying po can ni legs par mtshon/_/tshul khrims du ku la dang ldan/_/dam pa rnams yid sgrib bral nyid/_/gang gi rab tu byung bar 'dzin/_/de dag bdag cag khyim du mchod/_/thams cad bsrungs pa'i nor bu gang /_/dran
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]b+ho gi nA/_/rA ga dwe Sho gra daMSh+Te Na bA d+h+ya te na pu nardza naH/_/i ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshwa shrU shru twA shro tra ra sA ya naM/_/sa d+yaHpra sA da bi Sha dA tAM dza gA da pra mo di nI/_/a pi tad+daR+sha no pA yaHkash+tsi dasti ba rA
[\[251b.2\]]pa yis kyang srid pa'i sbrul/_/chags sdang drag po'i mche ldan pas/_/slar yang skye bo la gnod med/_/ces pa de tshig rna ba yi/_/bcud len thos nas sgyug mo ni/_/'phral la rab dang dri ma med/_/dga' mgu ldan pas de la smras/_/de ni blta ba'i thabs 'ga' zhig_/mchog gi bzhin
[\[251b.3\]]na ne/_/a pi twat+pu N+ya sam+ban+d+hAd+ba ya ma pya mr-i ta spa daM/_/i ti sA nu na yaM shwa shru ShA sa da ra d+hi yA n+wi tA/_/taM baHsan+daR+sha yA mI ti ba b+hA She b+hak+ti mA ni nI/_/ma hA pra tidz+nya saM b+hA ra b+ha ra nir+b+ha ha
[\[251b.4\]]ldan yod dam ci/_/khyod kyi bsod nams 'brel pa las/_/nged kyang bdud rtsi'i gnas thob bam/_/zhes pa sgyug mos gus ldan blo/_/tshul dang mthun par de la zhus/_/bdag gis khyed la de bstan zhes/_/gus dang bkur ba ldan mas smras/_/dam bca' chen po'i tshogs kyis ni/_/khur
[\[251b.5\]]nai Shi NI/_/sA pi sha ya tu lA rU D+hA k+Sha NaM d+h+yA na pa rA b+ha bta/_/ta taHprA pA da mA ru h+ya b+ha ga bat+pe ba tAM di shaM/_/pra Ni pa t+ya sr-i dzat+pu dz+yA pU dzAr+ha ku su mAny+dza li/_/puSh+pa d+hu po da kai rats+tsAM pA kr-i
[\[251b.6\]]dag khyer ba 'dod pa yi/_/srod la mal stan srang la 'dzegs/_/skad cig bsam gtan bskyangs par gyur/_/de nas khang bzang la 'dzegs te/_/bcom ldan bstan pa'i phyogs su ni/_/phyag 'tshal mchod bya mchod 'os pa'i/_/me tog snyim pa rab tu gtor/_/de yi gnas su mngon phyogs des/_/
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]twAt+ta sa don+mu khI/_/A nan+da bASh+pa paM rud+d+ha bistIr+N+Na na ya nA ba data/_/a nu kaM pai ba b+ha ga ban+Rat+na tra ya bi brdzi tAH/_/ta bA shra ma mr-i gI bA haM du ra de sha mi maM ga tA/_/twat+pA da
[\[252a.2\]]me tog bdug pa chus mchod nas/_/yangs pa'i mig ni kun dga' yi/_/mchi mas 'gags pas rab smras pa/_/bcom ldan thugs rje 'os pa bdag_/dkon mchog gsum po rnam spangs te/_/khyod kyi gnas kyi ri dgas bzhin/_/shin tu thag ring yul 'dir phyin/_/khyod kyi
[\[252a.3\]]pad+ma yu ga laM sha ra NaM pra pan+nAM du raM s+thi tA ma pi dr-i shA spr-i sha mAM da yA lo/_/bAt+sa l+ya pe sha la d+hi yAM ma hA taM pra bA dU rI kr-i ga te Shu ka ru NA na ta nu twa me ti/_/b+ha ga ban+da sa su ta yA twaM ma yA d+ya ni
[\[252a.4\]]zhabs kyi pad+ma zung gi skyabs ni thob pa bdag_/ring du gnas par gyur kyang spyan gyis reg mdzod brtse ba can/_/mnyes gshin mnyen pa'i blo ldan chen po rnams kyi thugs rje ni/_/yul gzhan ring por phyin pa rnams la chung ba nyid mi 'gyur/_/'bangs kyi bu mo dag gis deng /_/bcom ldan khyod
[\[252a.5\]]man+t+ri taH/_/prA ta rA ga ma ne nai ba mA nAM bi ta ra me bi b+ho/_/i t+yu dIR+Ya ta yot+s+r-iSh+TA bi tsi tra ku su mA ba lI/_/sa dzI bi te ba pra ya yau na b+ha sA b+hak+ti dU ti kA/_/sA shwe ta rak+ta ha ri tA si ta puSh+pa pA
[\[252a.6\]]ni mgron du gnyer/_/nang par byon pas bdag la ni/_/khyab bdag khengs pa gnang bar mdzod/_/ces pa brjod nas des 'phangs pa/_/rnam par bkra ba'i me tog 'phreng /_/gus pa'i pho nya srog bcas bzhin/_/nam mkha' las ni rab tu song /_/dkar dang dmar dang ser dang sngon po dag gi
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]lI khe d+hU pa d+hU ma sha ra lA sha na kaiHpra yAn+tI/_/bA lAm+bu da pra Na yi nI su tsi raM tsa kA she saM tsA ri tsA pa la ti ke ba sha tsA d+hi pa s+ya/_/a tha dze ta ba naM prA pya k+Sha Ne na ku su mA ba lI/_/sa b+hak+ti shA li nI
[\[252b.2\]]me tog 'phreng /_/bdug pa'i du bas bkra ba dal gyis mkha' la 'gro ba de/_/bde sogs bdag po'i gzhu yi 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba ni/_/chu 'dzin gzhon nu dag la rab tu chags shing yun ring mdzes/_/de nas rgyal byed tshal song nas/_/skad cig gis ni me tog 'phreng /_/gus pa dag dang ldan pa
[\[252b.3\]]shAstuHpa pA ta tsa ra NAb+dza yoH/_/b+ha ga bA na pi sar+b+ba dz+nyaHsar+b+ba dz+nyA twA pa mI hi taM/_/su mA ga d+hA yAHka ru N+yA dAn+da ma ba dat+pu raH/_/prA targan+ta bya masmA b+hirna ga ra puN+Da bar+d+ha naM/_/su mA gA d+hA prAr+tha ya te sa
[\[252b.4\]]de/_/ston pa'i zhabs pad dag la lhung /_/bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang /_/ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo yi/_/'dod pa kun mkhyen thugs rje yis/_/kun dga' bo la sngon du gsungs/_/grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel du/_/nang par bdag cag 'gro bar bya/_/ma ga d+ha bzang dge 'dun dang /_/
[\[252b.5\]]saM g+ha s+ya ma mAts+tsA naM/_/sha taM Sh+Sh+ya d+hi kaM tat+tu ye dza nA mi nA ma taHpu raM/_/e ke nA h+nA ba gan+ta byaM na bi lam+bo tra yu dz+ya te/_/byom+nA ma hAr+d+h+yA shak+no ti gan+tuM yo yaHpra b+hA ba bAn/_/ni man+t+ra Na sha lA kAs+t+waM tasmai
[\[252b.6\]]bcas pa'i bdag mchod don du gnyer/_/'di nas grong de dpag tshad ni/_/drug cu lhag pa'i brgya phrag ste/_/nyi ma gcig gis 'gro bar bya/_/'di la thogs 'khor rigs pa min/_/gang gang rdzu 'phrul tshon po yis/_/mkha' la 'gro nus mthu ldan pa/_/de dang de la khyod kyis ni/_/mgron du gnyer
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]tasmai sa mar+p+pa ya/_/pre ri taHsu ga te ne ti sa b+hik+Shu b+h+yo n+ya be da yata/_/e kA ha ga ma naM prA pyaM sha lA kA b+hir+n+ni man+t+ra naM/_/sha lA kA su gr-i hi tA su ta tra sar+b+bair+m+ma hAr+d+h+ya b+hiH/_/pUr+N+NaHkuM b+ho pa d+hA nI
[\[253a.2\]]ba'i tshul shing byin/_/zhes pa bde gshegs kyis bskul te/_/nyin gcig bgrod pas phyin pa dang /_/tshul shing gis ni mgron gnyer ba/_/dge slong rnams la rab tu bshad/_/rdzu 'phrul che ldan thams cad kyis/_/der ni tshul shing blangs pa'i tshe/_/gang po bum par sngas byas pa/_/rgan
[\[253a.3\]]yaHs+tha bi ro pya gra hI ta kra mAta/_/te nA prAp+ta pra b+hA be na sha lA kA yAM pra sA ri te/_/pA Nau prA ha ta mA nan+daHkiny+tsit+s+mi ta pi tA na naH/_/a nA tha piN+Da da gr-i haM na gan+ta byaM pa da dwa yaM/_/sa ShaSh+Thi yo dza na sha ta di nAr+d+he nai ba laM g+h+ya
[\[253a.4\]]po yis kyang rim pas blangs/_/mthu ni thob pa min pa des/_/tshul shing dag la lag brkyangs tshe/_/cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhin ras can/_/kun dga' bo yis de la smras/_/mgon med zas sbyin khyim du ni/_/rkang pa gnyis kyis 'gro bya min/_/dpag tshad drug cu dang bcas brgya/_/nyin phyed kyis ni 'da'
[\[253a.5\]]te/_/i t+yuk+taHs+tha bi raste na bai lak+Sh+ya bi na tA na naH/_/a tsin+ta yat+s+wa brgA gre n+yU na b+ha bo hi duHsa haH/_/a nA di kA lo pa tsi tAHkle sha dzan+ma dza rA da yaH/_/tan+tu pa yat+naiHshAkyan+te prAp+ta mr-id+d+hi pa da ki yata/_/i ti
[\[253a.6\]]bar bya/_/zhes pa de brjod rgan po ni/_/skyengs pas bzhin ras rnam par dud/_/bsams te rang gi sde mdun du/_/dman pa'i dngos po bzod par dka'/_/thog med dus su bsags pa yi/_/nyon mongs skye dang rga ba sogs/_/'bad pa can gyis gzhom nus na/_/rdzu 'phrul gnas ni thob la ci/_/chags
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya tI bra saM be ga yA d+hi yA/_/prA du rA sIt+k+Sha Ne nai ba ma hAr+d+hiHshud+d+ha tse ta saH/_/a tha rA t+yAM bya tI tA yAM pra b+hA te sar+b+ba b+hik+Sha baH/_/nA nA tri da sha be she na bi mA nairna b+ha pA ya yuH/_/a trAn+ta
[\[253b.2\]]bral drag po'i blo gros kyis/_/de ltar sems shing dag pa yis/_/sems ldan de la skad cig gis/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu skyes/_/de nas mtshan mo 'das gyur te/_/snga dro dge slong thams cad ni/_/sna tshogs lha yi chas ldan pa'i/_/gzhal yas khang nas mkha' la gshegs/_/skabs
[\[253b.3\]]re ma hA raM b+ha sa b+hA ra pa ri pU ra te/_/su mA ga d+hA b+har+t+r-i gr-i he b+ha ga bad+daR+sha not+su kA/_/sa ha prA pA da mA ru h+ya shwa shu ra b+har+t+r-i b+hiH/_/tas+thau ku su ma d+hU pa ts+tsA ra tsa naM saM gra hon+mu khI/_/b+hik+Shu
[\[253b.4\]]der rtsom pa chen po la/_/tshogs kyis yongs su gang gyur pa/_/bdag po'i khyim du bcom ldan 'das/_/lta 'dod ma ga d+ha bzang mo/_/me tog bdug pa'i mchod pa yi/_/bkod pa 'dzin la mngon phyogs shing /_/sgyug mo gyos po khyo rnams dang /_/lhan cig khang bzang la 'dzegs 'khod/_/de nas rta
[\[253b.5\]]rA dz+nyA ta kauN+Di n+yasta to shwa ra Tha ma s+thi taH/_/di byar+d+ha bi bi b+hAsh+tsaR+Ya pra tha ma pra t+ya dr-i sh+yata/_/taM dr-iSh+T+wA saM kA shaM bismi tAHshwa shu rA da yaH/_/u tsUHsu mA ga d+hA prI t+yA ki me Sha b+ha ga bA ni ti/_/sA ba dad+b+ha ga
[\[253b.6\]]yi shing rtar gnas/_/dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya/_/rnam mang ngo mtshar rdzu 'phrul ni/_/mchog ldan dang po rab tu mthong /_/nyi ma dang mtshungs de mthong nas/_/ya mtshan gyos sogs dga' ba yis/_/ma ga d+ha bzang la smras pa/_/bcom ldan zhes pa 'di 'am ci/_/des smras 'di ni bcom
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]bAn+nA yaM dr-i sh+ya te ta ra Ni pra b+haH/_/a ya mA dz+nyA ta kauN+Da n+yau b+hik+Shu rak+Shar+N+Na dI d+hi tiH/_/A ya tan+su kra me NA tha ra the Shu shwa shu rA da yaH/_/ki ma yaM ki ma yaM b+ha dre b+ha ga bA ni ti tAM dza guH/_/sA bra bIt+nai ba shAstA
[\[254a.2\]]ldan min/_/dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya/_/'od zer dman pa min pa 'di/_/nyi ma dag dang mtshungs par mthong /_/de nas rim gyis shing rta yis/_/byon pa'i tshe na gyos sogs kyis/_/bzang mo bcom ldan 'di 'am ci/_/'di 'am ci zhes rab tu smras/_/des smras 'di ni ston pa min/_/
[\[254a.3\]]ya me te tats+tshA sa no tsi tAH/_/b+hik+Sha baHpra sha ma sh+la g+h+yAsta po dIp+ta ta ra twi ShaH/_/yaHkAn+ta he ma dru ma ra mya shai la shr-iM gA bi dU D+haHpu ra to b+h+yu pai ti/_/Ash+tsaR+Ya kr-in+mUr+t+ta i ba pra b+hA baHshrI mAn+ma hA kA sh+yA pa e Sha b+hik+ShuH/_/pany+tsA na na
[\[254a.4\]]'di dag de yi bka' la 'os/_/dge slong rab zhi bsngags par 'os/_/dka' thub rab 'bar 'od zer can/_/gser ljon mdzes pas dga' ba ri yi ni/_/rtse mo la zhon sngon la byon pa gang /_/ngo mtshar byed pa mthu ni gzugs can bzhin/_/dpal ldan dge slong 'di ni 'od srungs che/_/chu ldan char
[\[254a.5\]]s+yan+da na mA s+thi to yaHpa to ya dzI mU ta gaM b+hI ra g+ho ShaH/_/byom+nA sa ma b+h+ye ti gu NaiHpra NI taHsa e Sha b+hik+Shu b+hu bi shA ri pu traH/_/A ru h+ya kai la sha mi bA ti shu b+h+raM dwi paM tsa turdan+ta ma nan+ta kAn+tiH/_/A yA ti yaHpu N+ya ba tAM dza gat+su
[\[254a.6\]]sprin zab mo'i 'brug sgra ldan/_/gdong lnga shing rta dag la gnas pa gang /_/mkha' la sngon du byon pa'i dge slong 'di/_/sa la yon tan gyis bsgrags shA ri'i bu/_/gnyis 'thung so bzhi kai la sha bzhin du/_/rab dkar la zhon mtha' yas mdzes pa gang /_/byon pa'i dge slong de ni 'gro rnams na/_/
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]maung+ga l+ya nA mA pa ra e Sha b+hik+ShuH/_/bai DUR+Ya nA laM ka na kA ra bin+da mA ru h+ya rat+nAM ku ra ke sha rAM kaM/_/u pe ti yaHsau ra b+hA pU ri tA shaHsa e Sha b+hik+ShuHpra thi to ni ru d+d+hAH/_/pan+thA ma rA graM ga ru DA d+hi ru D+haHpak+ShA ni lot+pa ri ta bA ri
[\[254b.2\]]bsod nams ldan mchog mau gal bu zhes bya/_/gser pad bai DUr+ya yi yu ba can/_/rin chen myu gu ge sar gyis mtshan zhon/_/phyogs ni dri bzang gis 'gengs byon pa gang /_/dge slong de nyid ma 'gags pa zhes grags/_/gang zhig mkha' lding la zhon gshog rlung gis/_/chu 'dzin rab tu gtor
[\[254b.3\]]bA haH/_/bi gA ha te s+phI ta dza ba na b+hik+Shu mai trA ya NI sU nu ra yi sa pUr+N+NaMH/_/a nan+ta mAs+thA ya ni b+han+ta shAn+ta miR+YA pa thaM satwa ma ho da d+hiR+YaH/_/pra b+hA mr-i te ba sar+p+pa ti tarbi tA shaHpra b+hA ba bA na shwa dzi de Sha b+hik+ShuH/_/bi lo
[\[254b.4\]]ba'i mchi med lam/_/mgyogs pa rgyas pa rnam par gcod byed pa/_/dge slong 'di ste byams ma'i bu gang bo/_/snying stobs chu gter che gang mchog gi lam/_/shin tu zhi ba mtha' med dag la gnas/_/'od kyi bdud rtsis phyogs tshim rab tu spro/_/mthu ldan dge slong 'di ni rta thul lo/_/gser
[\[254b.5\]]la bal+lI pa la yA b+hi rA mAM Shi shA la mA ru h+ya su bar+N+Na tA laM/_/yaHpu N+ya pUr+N+Na byu ti ra b+h+yu pai ti sa e Sha b+hik+Shur+m+ma ti mA nu pA lI/_/A ru h+ya bai DUR+Ya bi mA na shr-i gaM su bar+N+Na rat+no dz+wa la ba tre la khaM/_/lim+ban+naM bA gats+tshA
[\[254b.6\]]gyi tA la yangs pa'i 'khri shing ni/_/rnam par g.yo bas dkrigs pa mngon dga' zhon/_/bsod nams gsal rdzogs mngon par 'ongs pa gang /_/dge slong 'di ni blo ldan nye bar 'khor/_/gser dang rin chen rab 'bar pa tra ris/_/bai DUr+ya yi gzhal yas khang rtser zhon/_/'od kyis byugs
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ti yaHpra b+ha b+hiHkA t+ya ya no nA ma sa e Sha b+hik+ShuH/_/sha rI ri Na d+har+m+ma mi bA d+hi ru h+ya bi gA ha te khaM pr-i Sha bA ha no yaH/_/prASh+TaHpra tiSh+Tha pa ri niSh+Thi tA nAM ga riSh+Tha d+hiHkauSh+Thi la e Sha b+hik+ShuH/_/bi mA na haM sa d+yu b+hirmu
[\[255a.2\]]bzhin byon pa gang 'di ni/_/dge slong kA t+yA ya na zhes pa'o/_/gang zhig gzugs dang ldan pa'i chos la bzhin/_/khyu mchog la zhon mkha' la rnam par lding /_/rab gnas yongs su gnas pa rnams kyi mchog_/blo brling dge slong 'di ni kauSh+Thi la/_/yang yang dad pa gzhal yas
[\[255a.3\]]hur+t+tasmi tor+m+mi ra myaM mu hu ran+ta rI k+Sh+yaM/_/kur+b+ban+sa ma b+h+ye ti ta po ni d+hiR+YaHpi lin+da bat+sA hwa ya e Sha b+hik+ShuH/_/yo yaM sa mut+pu l+la la tA bi tA na ba nAn+ta rA lo bi ha ran+nu pai ti/_/sa shro Na ko Ti shru ta e Sha b+hik+Shu rak+Shur+N+Na
[\[255a.4\]]khang 'od kyis/_/yud tsam bar snang 'dzum rlabs dga' ldan par/_/byed cing dka' thub gter gang byon pa 'di/_/dge slong pi len da pad sA zhes brjod/_/me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing rgyas pa yi/_/gser tshal nang na bzhugs shing byon pa gang /_/mi dman khyim gyi dpal la ltos med pa'i/_/
[\[255a.5\]]lak+Sh+mI gr-i ha nir+b+ya pek+ShaH/_/yash+tsa kra bar+t+ti di bi b+hA ti so yaM shAstuHsu to rA hu la kA b+hi d+hA naH/_/he ma pra b+hA b+hu Shi ta dig+bi b+hA gaHsaM lak+Sh+ya te me ru ri bA n+ya rU paH/_/e te gi ri b+h+yo tha di gen+ta re b+h+yaHk+Sh+ma maN+Da
[\[255a.6\]]dge slong 'di ni rna ba bye bar grags/_/gser gyi 'od kyis phyogs cha rnam par brgyan/_/lhun po'i gdugs gzhan bzhin du legs par mtshon/_/'khor los sgyur gang mkha' la mdzes pa 'di/_/ston pa'i sras po sgra gcan 'dzin zhes brjod/_/de nas ri dang phyogs mtshams rnams dang ni/_/
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lAd+b+yo ma ta TAM ta rats+tsa/_/A yAM t+ya saM khyAd+b+hu ta b+hik+Shu saM g+hA bi tsi tra rat+nA sa na bA ha nas+thAH/_/ta yA kra me ne ti ni be d+ya mA naM te b+hik+Shu saM g+haM bi mu khaM bi lo kya/_/ya yuHpra haR+ShAd+b+hu ta saM b+h+ra mA NAM bi
[\[255b.2\]]sa yi dkyil 'khor mkha' ngos khong las kyang /_/rnam bkra rin chen khri dang bzhon par gnas/_/grangs med rmad byung dge slong tshogs 'di byon/_/de ltar de yis rim pas bshad gyur pa'i/_/dge slong dge 'dun khyad 'phags bzhin mthong nas/_/gzhan dag mtshon min de dag mtshungs
[\[255b.3\]]d+he ya tAM tu l+ya ma na n+ya lak+Sh+yAH/_/a tha dz+wa lang+kAny+tsa na tsUr+N+Na bas+t+ra dza gad+ba b+hu bAr+k+ka sha ta pra gA shaM/_/a she Sha saM tA ba bi she Sha shAM t+yA shI tAM shu mA lA sha ta shI ta lany+tsa/_/a tha d+ha na pa ti sha kra brah+ma mu khyai ra mA
[\[255b.4\]]par ni/_/dga' dang rmad byung gus pa'i dbang nyid gyur/_/de nas rang 'bar gser gyi phye ma'i gos/_/nyi ma brgya ltar gsal ba 'gro la byung /_/gdung ba'i khyad par ma lus zhi byed pas/_/bsil zer phreng ba brgya ltar bsil ba yang /_/de nas nor bdag brgya byin tshangs sogs blon po
[\[255b.5\]]t+yair+b+bi phu la ga ga na yA trA dat+ta se bA nu yAtaH/_/a ma ra pu ra pu ran+d+h+ri kIr+N+Na puSh+pa pra b+hA bAn+na ya na pa tha ma yA shIt+pu N+ya b+hA dzaM dzi nen+duH/_/aSh+TA da sha dwA ra pa tha pu ra tat+sa t+tu l+ya maSh+TA de sha mUr+t+ti bai
[\[255b.6\]]rnams kyi ni/_/rgya che nam mkha' bgrod pa bsten cing rjes su bgrod pa phul/_/'chi med grong gi bu mos me tog tshogs ni gtor ba las/_/rgyal ba'i zla ba bsod nams ldan pa rnams kyi mig lam gyur/_/grong khyer sgo lam bco brgyad ldan pa der/_/mtshungs pa'i sku ni bco brgyad dang
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]ba/_/pra bi sh+ya tsa kre sha shi kAn+ta rat+na shi la ma yaM besh+ma su ma ga d+hA yAH/_/a b+h+yats+tsi taM ta tra ba hu pra kA raiHpUr+N+No pa tsA raiHpra N-i pa t+ya sar+b+baiH/_/A pU dza yat+pau ra dzaHsa mAn+tA b+bi hi sh+tsa b+hit+ti pra ti bim+bi
[\[256a.2\]]bcas pas/_/rab zhugs ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo'i khyim/_/zla shel rin chen rdo yi rang bzhin byas/_/der ni yo byad rdzogs pa rnam mang gis/_/mngon par mchod cing kun gyis phyag 'tshal te/_/grong pa'i skye bo dag gis kun nas mchod/_/rtsig par gzugs brnyan snang de phyi
[\[256a.3\]]b+hAn+ta/_/su mA ga d+hA yA da ya yA da yA luHpU dzi gr-i hI twA b+ha ga bAn+sa saM g+haH/_/a nu gra hA lo ka na sam+bi b+hA gaiHsa bAn+d+ha bA yA bi da d+he pra sA daM/_/su mA ga d+hA sa shwa shu rA di bar+g+ga sa hA pa raiHbau ra dza na sh+tsa
[\[256a.4\]]nas kyang /_/bcom ldan brtse ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pas/_/brtse bas mchod pa blangs nas rjes bzung ni/_/gzigs pa'i cha yis ma ga d+ha bzang mo/_/gnyen dang bcas pa rnams la bka' drin bsgrubs/_/ma ga d+ha bzang gyos sogs sde dang bcas/_/grong pa'i skye bo kun dang bcas
[\[256a.5\]]sar+b+baH/_/shAstusta dA de sha na yA ba b+hU baHshud+d+hA sha yAMstat+k+Sha Na dr-iSh+Ta sat+yAH/_/su mA ga d+hA yAHku sha lA nu bad+d+haM pu N+ya pra b+hA baM bi pu laM bi lo kya/_/te b+hik+Shu bsta tra ku tU ha le na pa prats+tshu ra s+yA dzi na mA di br-it+taM/_/pr-iSh+TaHsa
[\[256a.6\]]pa yang /_/de tshe ston pa'i bstan pa dag gis ni/_/de dus bden mthong bsam pa dag par gyur/_/dge ba rjes 'brel ma ga d+ha bzang gi/_/bsod nams mthu ni yangs pa mthong gyur nas/_/dge slong de dag gis der dge mtshan las/_/de yi sngon byung rgyal ba dag la bris/_/ma ga d+ha bzang
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]taiHsaM sa di sar+b+ba daR+shi su mA ga d+hA yAHku sha la s+ya he tuM/_/dan+ta pra b+hA b+hiHka ku b+hA mu khe Shu di shan+p+ra kA sha b+ha ga bAn+ba b+hA She/_/bA rA Na s+yA ma b+hut+pUr+b+baM kri kriHkAn+ta s+ya b+hU ba teH/_/su tA kAny+tsa na mA lA khyA ka tsat+kaMny+tsa na mA
[\[256b.2\]]dge ba'i rgyu dag ni/_/tshogs su de dag gis dris bcom ldan 'das/_/kun gzigs de yi tshems kyi 'od rnams kyis/_/phyogs sgor snang ba byin cing rab gsungs pa/_/bA rA Na sI dag tu sngon/_/sa bdag mdzes pa kr-i kI yi/_/bu mo gser 'phreng can zhes pa/_/gser 'phreng skra dang
[\[256b.3\]]li kA/_/kA sh+ya pA khyA s+ya shastuHsa sa ta taM b+hak+ti shA li nI/_/pa ri tsaR+YA bya d+hAt+sAr+d+haM sa khI nAM pany+tsa b+hiHsha taiH/_/sa ka dA tsin+na ra pa tir+b+bi kr-i ta swab+na daR+sha nAta/_/b+ha ya saM sha ya saM b+hAn+taHpa prats+tsha pha la ko bi dwAn/_/
[\[256b.4\]]ldan pa byung /_/ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa la/_/rtag tu gus dang ldan pa des/_/grogs mo brgya phrag lnga dang ni/_/lhan cig dag tu rim gro bsgrubs/_/nam zhig sa yi bdag po des/_/rnam 'gyur rmi lam mthong ba las/_/'jigs pa'i the tshom kun 'khrul bas/_/'bras bu mkhas pa dag la
[\[256b.5\]]te taM rA dza su tA dwe ShAn+ni mit+ta dz+nyA ba b+hA She re/_/a ti pri ya s+ya hr-i da yaM tu twAg+nau la b+h+ya te shi baM/_/i ti She ShA ma nA dr-i d+ya pa tsa krU ra ta raM nr-i paH/_/b+ha ga ban+taM ya yau dr-iSh+TuM kA sh+ya paM du hi tu rgi rA/_/sa ta
[\[256b.6\]]dris/_/rgyal po'i bu mo la sdang bas/_/mtshan shes de dag gis der smras/_/shin tu mdza' ba dag gi snying /_/me la bsregs na zhi ba thob/_/ces pa de dag rnams kyi tshig_/rab gdug ma bzung mi bdag ni/_/bu mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das/_/'od srungs dag la blta ru song /_/de la
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]ma b+h+ye t+yA pa dat+s+wap+naHsa bi kA raHpa ram+ma yA/_/dr-iSh+To d+yaHsar+b+baM sar+b+ba dz+nya tat+phalaM bak+tu mar+ha si/_/bA tA ya ne nirgats+tshAn+tud+d+ha suts+tsau ma yA ga dzaH/_/tr-i Shi ta s+ya ta thA pash+tsata pU bo d+hA pan+bi lo
[\[257a.2\]]phyogs te des gsol ba/_/rmi lam mchog tu rnam 'gyur can/_/bdag gis ding mthong de 'bras kun/_/thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs bar 'os/_/glang chen rgya skar nas 'thon pa/_/rnga ma dag la thogs pa dang /_/de bzhin skom pa'i phyir rjes nas/_/khron pa rgyug pa
[\[257a.3\]]ki ta/_/dr-iSh+Tash+tsa sak+tu pras+the na mauk+ti ka pras+tha bi kra yaH/_/sa mI kr-i tA ni dr-iSh+TA ni ku dA ru Ni tsa tsan+da naiH/_/ka la b+he na mahA hasti sa mA hU tasta thA ha be/_/pA rA na shu tsi lip+tAM gaHpra lam+pa ti p+lu taHka
[\[257a.4\]]bdag gis mthong /_/phye ni bre gang dag la yang /_/mu tig bre gang 'tshong ba mthong /_/ngan pa'i shing dang tsan dan ni/_/mnyam pa dag tu byed pa mthong /_/de bzhin g.yul du glang phrug gis/_/glang po chen po yang dag 'bod/_/mi gtsang ba yis lus byugs pa'i/_/spre'u 'phar zhing
[\[257a.5\]]piH/_/s+phI ta rA dz+ya b+hi She kash+tsa ku tsa pa la ni d+heHka peH/_/pha ToSh+TA da sha b+hiHkr-iSh+TaHpu ru Shai ra s+ya saM k+Sha yaH/_/ra mya puSh+pa pa lA rA mash+tsau re ra pi bi luN+Thi taH/_/dwe Sho pa hA saM ka la hA sak+tash+tsa
[\[257a.6\]]gzhan la 'byung /_/spre'u ngan pa g.yo ba'i gter/_/rgyal srid rgyas la mngon dbang bskur/_/ras yug skyes bu bco brgyad kyis/_/drangs kyang kun tu nyams pa med/_/me tog 'bras bu'i dga' tshal ni/_/dga' ba chom rkun dag gis dkrugs/_/zhe sdang bzhad gad rtsod pa la/_/skye bo mang
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bi pu le dza naH/_/swasnAd+b+hu tA nA me te ShA m+ma n+ye g+ho ra ta ra pha laM/_/i ti pr-iSh+TaHk+Shi ti b+hu dzA b+ha ga bAn+kA sh+ya po pra bIta/_/sha tA yu Shi dza ne shAstA shAn+taHshAkya mu ni rdzi naH/_/b+ha bi Sh+ya t+ya mr-i tAM b+ho d+hiHsa dr-iSh+TaHkuny+dza ras+t+wa
[\[257b.2\]]po chags pa ste/_/rmad byung rmi lam 'di dag gi/_/'bras bu shin tu 'jigs rung snyam/_/zhes pa sa bdag gis dris la/_/bcom ldan 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa/_/skye bo'i tshe lo brgya pa'i tshe/_/ston pa zhi ba shAkya thub/_/rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chu gter 'byung /_/de ni khyod kyis glang por
[\[257b.3\]]yA/_/ta s+yA pi pash+tsi kA le shrA ba kAHka li saM shra yAta/_/t+yak+ta shI la gu NA tsA rA b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti sa bi p+la bAH/_/a pa kwAlpa bi pA kA nAM pa lAt+te gr-i ha bA si nAM/_/swa yaM se bA sa ma laM bya ka ri Sh+yaM t+ye ba de sha nAM/_/
[\[257b.4\]]mthong /_/de yi nyan thos tha ma yi/_/dus su rtsod pa la brten nas/_/tshul khrims yon tan kun spyod btang /_/bslang ba dang bcas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de dag stobs kyi khyim na gnas/_/dben pa ma smin chung rnams la/_/rang gis bstan pa la brten cing /_/bstan pa dag ni byed par
[\[257b.5\]]ar+tha nI yor+thi b+hA be na yasmAtshai bA su d+hA ba ti/_/tr-i Shi ta s+ya bra dzan+pash+tsat+kU pastasmAd+bi lo ki taH/_/te ka ri Sh+yan+ti lo b+hAn+d+hAHsa mo ho pa ha tAHpa raM/_/bo d+h+yaM ga muk+tA pras+tha s+ya sak+tu pras+the na bi kra yaM/_/
[\[257b.6\]]'gyur/_/gang phyir zhu bya zhu byed kyis/_/dngos pos bsten pa dag la rgyug_/de slad skom pa'i phyi nas ni/_/khron pa 'gro ba rnam par mthong /_/chags pas long zhing kun rmongs kyis/_/bcom pa de dag byang chub kyi/_/yan lag mu tig bre gang ni/_/phye bre gang la 'tshong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]tir+th+ya bA kya ku dA rU Ni bud+d+ha b+hA Shi ta tsan+da naiH/_/sA mA n+ya mA pA da yi Sh+yan+ti maur+kh+yA da bi she Shi NaH/_/kwa tsid+b+ha draM sa mA sA d+ya bi nI taM b+hik+Shu kuny+dza raM/_/duHshI la ka la b+ho b+hik+ShuHspar+d+ha yA d+hi ka
[\[258a.2\]]mu stegs tshig ni shing ngan dang /_/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs tsan dan dag_/rmongs las khyad par mi shes pa/_/de dag gis ni mtshungs byed 'gyur/_/dul ba'i dge slong glang po che/_/bzang po thob nas 'ga' zhig tu/_/dge slong khrims 'chal glang phrug gis/_/'gran zhing
[\[258a.3\]]ka ri Sh+ya ti/_/tsA pa lA shu tsi lip+tAM gaHsu shI lad+b+hik+Shu mar+k+ka TaH/_/a nu lim+pan swa do She Na ka ri Sh+ya t+yAt+me saM ni b+hAn/_/paN+Da ka s+yA b+hi She kash+tsa b+ha bi Sh+ya ti ka pe ri ba/_/saM bud+d+ha shA sa na pa TaM kr-i
[\[258a.4\]]smod par byed par 'gyur/_/g.yo ba'i mi gtsang gis phyugs lus/_/dge slong spre 'us khrims bzang rnams/_/rang gi skyon gyis sgo byed cing /_/bdag nyid mtshungs pa byed par 'gyur/_/spre'u bzhin du rigs 'khyal ba/_/mngon par dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bstan
[\[258a.5\]]Sh+ya mA naM na naM k+Sha ti/_/saM g+ha dra bya pha lA rA me Sh+wa pi yA s+yan+ti tsau ra tAM/_/mi thaHka la ha shI lash+tsa b+ha bi Sh+yat+t+ya pa bA dI naH/_/ta ba swap+na pi pA kAn+te pha lA n+ye tA ni b+hU ta le/_/i ti shAstur+b+ba tsaH
[\[258a.6\]]pa yi/_/ras yug drangs pas nyams mi 'gyur/_/dge 'dun rdzas dang 'bras bu yi/_/dga' tshal dag kyang rku bar 'gyur/_/phan tshun skyon nas brjod byed cing /_/'thab mo'i ngang tshul dag tu 'gyur/_/khyod kyi rmi lam rnam smin mthar/_/'bras bu 'di dag sa las byung /_/zhes pa ston pa'i tshig
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]shru twA bismi to b+hUn+ma hI pa tiH/_/sA nu ga s+yA tha nr-i pa teHsa shAstA d+harma de sha nAM/_/kr-i twA kAny+tsa na mA lA yAM di de sha ku sha lAr+ha tAM/_/dzan+mAn+ta re tsa kA rA ts+tsAMstu pe nA raM ga mA la yA/_/sA te na su kr-i te nai ba dzA ta
[\[258b.2\]]thos nas/_/sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur/_/de nas ston des mi bdag ni/_/rjes 'brang bcas la chos bstan pa/_/mdzad nas gser 'phreng can ma la/_/dge ba 'os pa nyid dag bstan/_/skye ba gzhan du mchod rten la/_/nA rang ga yi 'phreng bas mchod/_/legs byas de yis de nyid ni/_/
[\[258b.3\]]nye ma sra dzAM ki tA/_/se yaM su mA gad+hA pu N+ya pra b+hA be na ma hI ya sA/_/prAp+tA d+ya dza na kA ya s+ya saM myak+ku sha la s+ya tu tAM/_/a b+hi d+hA ya ti b+ha ga bAn+na b+ha sA b+hik+Shu b+hiHsa haH/_/ru tsA saM pu ra yan+na shA
[\[258b.4\]]gser 'phreng dag gis mtshan par skyes/_/ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo 'di/_/de nyid bsod nams mthu chen gyis/_/yang dag dge ba'i zam stegs nyid/_/de ring skye bo'i tshogs kyis thob/_/ces gsungs bcom ldan rgyal ba ni/_/dge slong rnams dang bcas pa dag_/mdzes pas phyogs rnams
[\[258b.5\]]ya yau dze ta ba naM dzi naH/_/puM sA sat+ku la b+hU ta ye ba la ba tI mi th+yai ba su tra spr-i hA sU nush+tse da bu Na sta de ba bi ka laM tat+kin+na sar+b+baM ku laM/_/sA ka n+yA ki la dzA ya te gu Na ba tI pu N+ya
[\[258b.6\]]yongs 'gengs shing /_/mkha' las rgyal byed tshal du gshegs/_/skyes bu rnams kyi rigs mchog 'phel slad stobs ldan bu la chags pas brdzun pa nyid/_/gal te bu la yon tan med na de tshe rigs kun nyams pa min nam ci/_/gang gi bsod nams mthu yis 'khor ba'i chu klung bdag
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pra b+hA bA d+ya yA saM sA ro ru pa rit+pa tau ku la yu gaM nA be pA san+tAR+Ya te/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM su ma ga d+hA ba dA naM tri na ba ti ta maHpal+la
[\[259a.2\]]po che la gru bzhin du/_/rigs zung yang dag sgrol byed yon tan ldan pa'i bu mo de dag nges par 'byung /_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab
[\[259a.3\]]waH//_//ta ra la ta ra ta raM god+b+hA ra gaM b+hI ra to ye da d+ha ti dza ga ti ke tsit+tap+ta tAM b+hag+na b+hA gyAH/_/kha ra ma ru pa ri tA pe ke tsi dut+sak+ta bu N+yaHsa ha dza sa li la sA raistI bra tr-iSh+NaM t+ya dzan+ti/_/shra
[\[259a.4\]]ste dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//skal ba nyams pa kha cig rab g.yo rba rlabs skyed pa yi/_/zab mo'i chu ldan 'gro ba dag tu gdung ba nyid 'dzin cing /_/bsod nams rgyas pa kha cig mya ngam drag pos yongs gdung la/_/lhan skyes chu yi tshogs kyi mi bzad sred pa gtong bar byed/_/mnyan
[\[259a.5\]]bas+t+yAM pu N+ya mi tra s+ya sU nur+g+r-i ha ba te ra b+hU tra/_/ya sho mi tra i ti khyA ta pra ti mA naM ya sha swi naM/_/ta s+ya dzan+ma k+Sha Ne pu N+yaiHbe yU Sha ki ra Na twi ShaH/_/a br-iSh+Ti pra b+ha bA bA b+hiHsha shA ma bi Sha mA bi bta/_/pra
[\[259a.6\]]yod du ni khyim gyi bdag_/bsod nams bshes gnyen dag gi bu/_/grags pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba/_/grags pa can gyi tshad gyur byung /_/bdud rtsi'i zer gyi 'od zer can/_/de skyes tshe na bsod nams kyi/_/chu yi char med las skyes pa/_/mi bzad rgud pa zhi bar gyur/_/gzhon nu nyid
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sa bai ba ba shI ga twA b+ha ba b+ho ga pa rAd+mu khaH/_/dzi naM dze na ba nA sI naM si She be ku sha lo d+ya taH/_/d+har+m+ma de sha na yA shastuHpra bra dz+yar+hat+pa daM shri taH/_/tu l+ya kAny+tsa na bA ShANaHso b+hUt+t+yak+ta pri yA bri yaH/_/daMSh+TA
[\[259b.2\]]la dbang gyur cing /_/srid pa'i longs spyod las phyir phyogs/_/dge la brtson pa de song nas/_/rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal bzhugs bsten/_/ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis/_/rab byung dgra bcom gnas la brten/_/de ni gser dang rdo mtshungs shing /_/dga' dang mi dga' btang bar gyur/_/de yi mche
[\[259b.3\]]b+h+yAM sa ra saM ta s+ya dru ta spa Ti ka nir+m+ma laM/_/shu shrA ba tsA ri ye nA sau bI tas+t+raSh+NaHsa dA b+ha bta/_/ka dA tsid+b+hik+Sha paHsar+b+ba ba ga ban+haM ku tU ha lAta/_/tr-iSh+Na byu pa ra me ta s+ya pa prats+tshuHpu N+ya kA ra NaM/_/so bra bIt+kA sh+ya pA khya s+ya shAstuHkA shi
[\[259b.4\]]bdag las chu/_/ro ldan dri med shel gyi ni/_/khu ba zags pa gang zhig gis/_/de ni rtag tu sred bral gyur/_/nam zhig dge slong thams cad kyis/_/dge mtshan las ni bcom ldan la/_/de yi sred pa bral ba yi/_/bsod nams rgyu ni rab tu dris/_/des gsungs kA shi'i grong du sngon/_/mdzes pa zhes
[\[259b.5\]]pu re pu rA/_/a b+hUt+p+ra dzi taHshreSh+Thi su taHsu na da ra kA b+hi d+haH/_/sa ka dA tsit+t+r-i ShA krAn+taHsan+tA pa klan+ta bi gra haH/_/ni dA g+he tsA ta ka i ba na kwa tsidz+dza la mAp+ta bAn/_/shU n+ya tAM to ya pA trA Ni kU pa ni rdza la ta ma pi/_/shro
[\[259b.6\]]bya tshong dpon bu/_/ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi/_/rab tu byung ba nyid du gyur/_/nam zhig skom pas gzir gyur cing /_/gdung bas nyen pas lus can des/_/so ga'i tsA ta ka bzhin du/_/'gar yang chu ni thob ma gyur/_/de yi bsod nams ma yin pas/_/chu snod stong pa nyid dang ni/_/khron pa
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]tAM si sa ha pA sho ShaM ta s+yA pu N+yaiHsa mA ya yuH/_/de ha t+yA go d+ya ta s+yA tha ta s+ya dr-iSh+NA pra lA pi naH/_/u pA d+h+yA ye na pa li laM dat+taM prA yA da dr-i sh+ya traM/_/shA sa nAt+kA sh+ya pa s+yA tha pa shAsturdza la b+hA dza naM/_/ak+Sha ya
[\[260a.2\]]yang ni chu med dang /_/'jug ngogs 'phral la bskams par gyur/_/de nas skom pas cho nge smras/_/lus ni gtong bar brtson de la/_/mkhan pos chu ni byin pa dag_/mthong ba min pa nyid du gyur/_/de nas de yis ston pa ni/_/'od srungs bka' yis chu yi snod/_/mi zad pa nyid bzhin
[\[260a.3\]]twa mi bA yA taM saM g+he tsi ra ma tsA ra yA taM/_/kA ru N+yat+ta s+ya b+ha ga bAnan+kA sh+ya paHshre ya san+ni d+hiH/_/pra san+na pA Ni pad+me na tsa kre bA ri pra ti gra haM/_/dr-iSh+T+wA sa bisma yasta tra dza na saM g+ha sa mA ga maH/_/to ya ma k+Sha ya tAM ya taM
[\[260a.4\]]gyur pa/_/dge 'dun dag la yun ring brims/_/de yi chu ni bcom ldan 'das/_/'od srungs dge legs dag gi gter/_/rab tu dang bas thugs rje nas/_/phyag gi pad+mos rab bzhes mdzad/_/der ni skye bo'i tshogs 'ongs pas/_/chu ni zad pa med gyur pa/_/mthong nas ya mtshan dag dang bcas/_/
[\[260a.5\]]sa t+ya daR+sha na mAp+ta bAn/_/tat+pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na so yaM ku sha la mU la bAn/_/ya sho mi traHshri taHshAn+ti daMSh+T+rad+b+hu ta pa yo b+ha raH/_/i ti dzan+mAn+ta ra dat+taM ya sho mi tra s+ya sA da rAH/_/dzi ne na ka thi taM shrutwA b+hik+Sha
[\[260a.6\]]bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur/_/de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/_/grags pa'i bshes gnyen dge rtsa ldan/_/zhi ba bsten 'di mche ba las/_/chu yi tshogs ni 'khrungs par gyur/_/de ltar grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis/_/skye ba gzhan la byin pa ni/_/rgyal bas gsung thos gus pa
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]bo bisma yaM ya yuH/_/saM sA ra ma ru pa ri b+h+ra ma tr-iSh+NA tA paM t+ya dzan+ti dzi na se baM/_/su kha bi ma la sa li la ka li laM sha ma hi ma kal+lo lin+di prA s+ya/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa
[\[260b.2\]]yis/_/dge slong rnams ni ya mtshan gyur/_/bde ba dri med chu gang zhi ba ni/_/kha ba'i rlabs ldan rgyal ba bsten pa dag_/thob nas 'khor ba mya ngam thang la ni/_/yangs 'khyam srid pa'i gdung ba gtong bar byed/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod
[\[260b.3\]]la tA yAM ya sho mi trA ba dA naM tsa tur+n+na ba ti ta maH pal+la waH//_//ut+sAR+Ya pA pa bi pU laM ti mi rA ba tA raM sa d+yaHpra kIr+N+Na ka ru NA ki ra Na pra kA shaH/_/do ShA pa hash+tsa pa ri tA pa ha
[\[260b.4\]]pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las grags pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//rgya che sdig pa'i mun par 'jug pa dag ni rab spangs nas/_/'phral la snying rje'i 'od zer snang ba rab tu rgyas pa yis/_/skyon sel ci yang yongs su gdung ba
[\[260b.5\]]rash+tsa ko pi san+margamA di sha ti bud+d+ha sa ha sra rash+miH/_/pu ri pu rA rA dza gr-i he b+ha ga bAn+be Nu kA na ne/_/ka lan+da ka ni bA sA khye bi dza hA ra ta thA ga taH/_/tasmin+pu re sAr+tha pa te rat+na dat+ta s+ya dA ra
[\[260b.6\]]dag kyang 'phrog byed pa/_/sangs rgyas 'od stong ldan pas dam pa'i lam ni ston par byed/_/grong khyer rgyal po'i khab na sngon/_/ka lan da ka'i gnas zhes pa/_/'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bzhugs/_/grong der ded dpon don byin gyi/_/chung ma rnon mo
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]kau/_/a b+hU tAM ni shi tA khyA yAM dzA yA yAM yu ga pad+Ya yau/_/tau shaM ku shan+d+hi dat+tA khyau yA te bi ta ri pany+tsa tAM/_/k+Shi Ne d+ha ne pa ri dza ne mA trA kr-its+tsh+re Na bar+d+ha tau/_/tau mA tur+b+ba tsa sA bA lau sha na kaiHpra ti besh+ma nAM/_/tsauR+Ya
[\[261a.2\]]zhes pa la/_/bu gnyis dag ni dus gcig tu/_/mtshe ma nyid du byung bar gyur/_/pha ni lnga pa nyid gyur cing /_/nor dang 'khor ni zad pa'i tshe/_/shang ku mtshams byin zhes bya ba/_/de dag ma yi tshegs kyis bskyed/_/ma yi tshig gis chom rkun la/_/rab zhugs byis pa de dag gis/_/khyim zla
[\[261a.3\]]pra br-it+tau swalpAr+tha b+hAN+Da nAM tsakra tuHk+Sha yaM/_/mA tuHpi tush+tsa ni ya me na b+ha ban+ti yo gyAHshwa b+h+re pa taM t+ya bi na ye ta du pe k+Sha yai ba/_/pUr+b+bo di ta swa dza na bA sa na yai ba bad+d+hA bA lAsti lA i ba pa ra pra kr-i tiM b+ha
[\[261a.4\]]dag gi nor chung dang /_/snod rnams dal gyis brlag par byas/_/ma dang pha yi dul ba yi ni rung ba nyid 'gyur zhing /_/de yi btang snyoms nyid kyis 'dul ba min pa'i g.yang la lhung /_/rang gi skye ba sngon bskyed bag chags dag dang 'brel ba las/_/byis pa rnams ni til bzhin gzhan gyi rang bzhin sten
[\[261a.5\]]dzan+te/_/kra me na bar+d+ha mA nau tau srau D+ha tsau ra twa mA ga tau/_/ul+lam+ba san+d+hi ts+tshe dA d+yaiHpau rA NAM dza hU tur+d+b+ha naM/_/a dzA ta sha trU NA rA dz+nyA tsA rair+b+bi dz+nyA ya tad+k+r-i yAM/_/bi sr-iSh+Tau ba d+h+ya ba su d+hA tau mA trA sa hi tau k+Sha NA tra/_/
[\[261a.6\]]par byed/_/rim gyis de dag cher skyes te/_/chom rkun dar bab nyid du gyur/_/'dzeg dang mtshams 'bigs la sogs kyis/_/grong khyer ba yi nor rnams blangs/_/de dag bya ba nyan rna yis/_/shes nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/_/de dag ma dang bcas pa ni/_/skad cig nyid kyis gsod par springs/_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]yad+b+hu dz+ya te pa ra d+ha ne na ni pI ya te yat+sau khyA sha yA bi Sha ya bar+t+ma bi gA h+ya te yata/_/ta s+yA bi tsA ra ra ma NI ya su khA da ra s+ya pra NA ba shA na pa Na dA ru Na e ba pA kAH/_/saM dzA ya te bi Sha ya pA na ma dA ku lA nAM
[\[261b.2\]]gzhan gyi nor gyis gang zhig za byed gang zhig 'thung bar byed/_/bde ba'i bsam pas yul gyi lam ni gang zhig nyams myong byed/_/ma dpyad dga' bar byed pa'i bde la gus pa de nyid ni/_/smin par gyur pa srog ni nyams byed mi zad zong dag yin/_/yul gyi btung bas rgyags shing 'khrugs pa rnams kyi
[\[261b.3\]]yash+tsauR+Ya dA ha ba d+ha lab+d+ha b+ha ne na rA gaH/_/niR+YA t+ya sau pa ri Na tAHka ra pA da b+he da shU lA d+hi ro ha Na pa ri shru ta rak+ta pU reH/_/ta tastau ba d+h+ya mA lAM kau nI la rak+tAm+pa ra br-i tau/_/
[\[261b.4\]]chags pa gang /_/rku dang sreg dang gsod pas thob pa'i nor gyis rab bskyed pa/_/de ni yongs smin rkang lag bcad dang gsal shing la zhon pas/_/yongs zags khrag gi rgyun gyis phyi rol dag tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas gsod pa'i 'phreng bas mtshan/_/sngon dmar gos kyis g.yogs de
[\[261b.5\]]pre k+Sha ga ta dza nA kIr+N+Nau ba d+h+ya s+thA na mu pA ga tau/_/dz+nyA twA da yA bAn+sar+b+ba dz+nyaHswa ya ma b+h+ye t+ya tAM b+hu baM/_/pra sA dA nu gra he Nai ba tsakre bi ga ta ban+d+ha no/_/sar+b+ba dz+nyA dz+nya yA rA dz+nyA tau t+yak+tau muk+ta pA pa
[\[261b.6\]]dag/_/lta ru 'ongs pa'i skye bos bskor/_/gsod pa'i gnas su nye bar song /_/brtse ldan kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas/_/rang nyid sa der mngon phyogs te/_/rjes su bzung ba'i bka' drin gyis/_/bcings pa dag dang bral bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen bka' yis de dag ni/_/rgyal pos btang zhing
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ta kau/_/pra bra dz+ya yA b+ha ga ba taHshA sa ner+ha twa mA pa tuH/_/dza na nA si hi tau dr-iSh+TA tau dz+nyA na bi b+ha bo dz+wa lau/_/tat+ka thAM kau tu kAt+p+r-iSh+Tau b+hik+Shu b+hiHsu ga tau b+h+ya d+hAta/_/ma ye be rak+Shi tA pa tau
[\[262a.2\]]sdig pa grol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la/_/rab tu byung nas dgra bcom thob/_/ye shes 'byor 'bar de dag ni/_/ma dang bcas pa mthong gyur nas/_/dge slong gis dris dge mtshan las/_/de gtam bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang /_/'di dag
[\[262a.3\]]pUr+b+ba smin+ni pi dzan+ma ni/_/e ta yordza na nI byA g+h+rI g+ho ra rU pA ta dA b+ha batra/_/tasmin+kA yo kr-i pA ban+d+hur+b+bo d+hi sa twa sha rI ri NAM/_/a haM ka ru Na re N+wA khyaHk+Shi ti pA la su to b+ha baM/_/ka dA tsi de tauk+Shut+k+Sha mA pau ta kau b+hok+tu mu
[\[262a.4\]]bdag gis rab tu bsrungs/_/de tshe 'di dag nyid kyi ma/_/stag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ldan gyur/_/de dus byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/brtse bas lus can rnams kyi gnyen/_/snying rje'i rdul zhes bya ba yi/_/sa skyong bur ni nga nyid gyur/_/nam zhig bkres pas nyen pa yis/_/phrug gu 'di dag za rtsom
[\[262a.5\]]d+ya tA/_/swa sha rI ram+ma yA da twA byA g+h+ri sA tu ni bA ri tA/_/a d+ya tA be ba tsau ra twaM kar+m+ma she ShA du sA ga tau/_/ma yA saM rak+Shi tau byA g+h+ri mA tA sai be ya me ta yoH/_/i t+yuk+t+wa ka ru NA sin+d+hur+b+ha ga bAn+d+hu ta b+hA ba naH/_/b+hik+Shu saM
[\[262a.6\]]pa'i/_/stag mo de ni rang gi lus/_/byin nas bdag gis rnam par bzlog_/las kyi lhag mas da lta yang /_/'di dag chom rkun nyid du gyur/_/stag mo de ni ma 'di ste/_/'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs/_/zhes gsungs bcom ldan thugs rje yi/_/rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs pa/_/dge slong
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]g+he na sa hi taHpra ya yau dze ta kA na naM/_/a mr-i ta ra sa br-iSh+Ta riSh+TA dr-iSh+Ta ra niSh+TA pa hA pa tA dza ye ti/_/pa ti tai ba pa te ta ma bi yA gu ru te pu N+yon+nA ta sh+lA g+h+ya mra/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo
[\[262b.2\]]tshogs dang bcas pa dag_/rgyal byed tshal du rab tu gshegs/_/bdud rtsi ro yi char bzhin mi 'dod sel/_/'dod pa dam pa'i gzigs pa gang lhung bas/_/lhung ba rnams kyang bsod nams kyis mtho ba'i/_/bsngags par 'os par mdzad pa rgyal gyur cig_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
[\[262b.3\]]d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM byA g+h+r+ya ba dA naM pany+tsa na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//h+lA daHsha shAd+ka s+ya ra beHpra kA shastA paHkr-i shA noHpa ba na s+ya be gaH/_/pa ro pa kA raHkA ru Na
