[\[262b.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las stag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//zla ba'i kun dga' nyi ma'i rab gsal dang /_/me yi tsha ba rlung gi mgyogs pa dang /_/snying rje la dga' skye bo che rnams kyis/_/gzhan la
[\[262b.5\]]ra tA nAM ma hA dza nA nAM sa ha dzaHswa b+hA baH/_/ud+yA ne ke li ra si kaHshrI mA nu da ya naHpu rA/_/a ban+tI bi dza yo rA dzA bi dza hA ra ba d+hU pa khaH/_/ta s+ya puSh+pots+tsa yA sak+tAHkAn+tAHku ba la ye k+Sha NAH/_/ya dr-ish+tsha yA ga ter+t+r-iSh+TA mu
[\[262b.6\]]phan pa lhan skyes rang bzhin yin/_/'phags rgyal skyed mos tshal du sngon/_/rgyal po dpal ldan 'char byed ni/_/rtse dga'i ro dang ldan pa dag_/btsun mor bcas pa rnam par gnas/_/de yi mdzes ma ut+pal mig_/me tog 'thu la chags pa rnams/_/thub pa brgya phrag lnga rnams ni/_/'dod
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]nI nAM pany+tsa b+hiHsha taiH/_/tAn+p+ri yA n+yastu na ya nA nIR+Sh+ya ma n+yu pa rA ya NaH/_/sa tsa kre pa Ni tsa ra Na ts+tshe dA sr-ik+paM ka shA yi naH/_/tA nAr+t+ta nA di nastI bra marma ts+tsha da bya thA tu rAn/_/da daR+shaM b+ha ga bAn+bud+d+haHka ru NA snig+d+ha
[\[263a.2\]]dgar 'ong ba dag gis mthong /_/phrag dog khro ba skyong ba des/_/dga' mar mig bkod de dag rnams/_/rkang lag bcad pa'i khrag gis ni/_/'dam la nyal ba dag tu byas/_/mi bzad gnad bcad cho nge yis/_/gzir cing cho nge ldan de dag_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan thugs rje yis/_/snum
[\[263a.3\]]lo tsa naH/_/tad+d+r-iSh+TA mr-i ta br-iSh+D+ya ba spr-iSh+TAste d+h+r-i ta dzI bi tAH/_/saM sh+lISh+Ta pA Ni tsa ra NAHsa mut+tas+thurga ta byA thAH/_/ta taste ShAM pra san+nA nAM b+ha ga bAn+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/bya d+hA d+ya yA shu te prA pu ra NA
[\[263a.4\]]pa'i spyan gyis rab tu gzigs/_/de yi gzigs pa bdud rtsi yi/_/char ltar reg pas de dag rnams/_/srog bzung rkang lag legs par 'byar/_/gdung ba dang bral yang dag langs/_/de nas rab rdzogs de dag la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan mdzad/_/gang gis myur du de dag rnams/_/
[\[263a.5\]]gA mi pha lo da yaM/_/tad+d+r-iSh+T+wA b+hik+Shu b+hiHpr-iSh+TaH sAsh+tsaR+Yer+b+ha ga bany+dzi naH/_/dza gA da pUr+b+ba ma s+ye te da ya yai ba ma yod+d+h+r-i tAH/_/bA rA Na s+yAM pu ru rA dza brah+ma dat+te na man+t+ri NAM/_/sha tA ni pany+tsa b+hin+nA nAM ni rastA ni
[\[263a.6\]]phyir mi 'ong 'bras dar ba thob/_/de mthong dge slong mtshar bcas pas/_/dris shing bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/_/gsungs pa sngon yang 'di dag rnams/_/bdag gis brtse ba nyid kyis bzung /_/bA rA Na sI dag tu sngon/_/rgyal po tshangs byin dag gis ni/_/'byed byed sdig pa byas pa yis/_/blon po lnga
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]kr-i tA ga sAM/_/te rA dza b+hi t+yA san+tap+tA ma ru mArge pra bA si naH/_/grISh+me ni ru da kats+tshA ya ne pe tu stI bra tr-iSh+Na yA/_/bi lo kya bo d+hi sa twa stA na b+ha dro nA ma ma hA dwi paH/_/tat+p+ra lA be Shu nir+b+hin+naHkA ru N+yAt+sa bya tho b+ha
[\[263b.2\]]brgya nges par bskrad/_/rgyal po'i 'jigs pas yang dag gdung /_/mya ngam lam du bgrod de dag_/so ga grib ma chu med par/_/mi bzad skom pas lhung bar gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'thung che/_/bzang po zhes pas de dag mthong /_/de dag cho nge'i mdas phug nas/_/snying rjes gdung ba dang bcas
[\[263b.3\]]bta/_/dU rAt+sa le la mA da ya sa haste na ma hI ya sA/_/tA na bI ta tr-iSh+NA na bi da d+he pa yo mU la pha la pra daH/_/te nai ba sa ta taM pri t+yA nirdaSh+Ta prA Na d+ha ra NAH/_/bi shrAn+tiM ta tra te prA puHpra shAn+ta bi pu la shra mAH/_/kA le na t+yak+ta de ha s+ya ta taste
[\[263b.4\]]gyur/_/chu dang rtsa ba 'bras ster des/_/ring po ring po dag nas chu/_/lag pa shin tu che bas blangs/_/de dag skom pa dang bral byas/_/de yis dga' ba rtag tu ni/_/srog gzungs dag nges par bsten/_/rgya che ngal ba rab zhi ba/_/de dag der ni ngal bsos thob/_/de nas dus kyis so ldan pa/_/lus ni btang
[\[263b.5\]]ta s+ya dan+ti naH/_/kr-i twA sha rI ra sat+kA raM pU dzA tsakruHsu ro tsi tAM/_/kuny+dza re Na ma yA ra N+ya ta e te man+t+ri NaHpu rA/_/kr-its+tsh+wAt+saM tA ri tAstasmAn+mu na yash+tsA bya bai sha sAta/_/i t+yuk+t+wA b+ha ga bAn+sar+b+ba satwa saM tA ra Na bra taH/_/
[\[263b.6\]]ba de nyid kyis/_/lus dag sbyangs nas de dag gis/_/lha la 'os pa'i mchod pa byas/_/dgon par bdag ni glang po yis/_/sdug bsngal de las blon po ni/_/sngon bsgral de dag da lta yang /_/thub pa de dag mi 'dod las/_/zhes pa gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das/_/sems can kun sgrol brtul
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pU dz+ya mA no mu ni ga Nai rdza gA ma swa ta po ba naM/_/a khaM la su kha ku sha la dU tI b+ha ba ma ru san+tA pats+tshA ya/_/dza ya ti dza na ni ba dza na nI kA ru NA mr-i ta bA hil+lI shAstuH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra
[\[264a.2\]]zhugs can/_/thub pa'i tshogs kyis mchod byed cing /_/rang gi dka' thub nags su gshegs/_/ston pa'i thugs rje bdud rtsi'i chu bo ni/_/ma lus bde dang dge ba'i pho nya ste/_/srid pa'i mya ngam gdung bsil grib ma dang /_/ma bzhin skyed par byed pa rgyal gyur cig_/ces pa dge ba'i
[\[264a.3\]]bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM has+t+ya ba dA naM ShaN+Na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//bi dwe Sha do Sha bi Sha dU Shi ta mA na sA nAM yaHsA d+hu bA d+ha na bi d+hau ni shi taHpra yat+naH/_/
[\[264a.4\]]dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las glang po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa drug pa'o//_//rnam sdang skyon gyi dug gis yid ni sun phyung gyur rnams kyis/_/dam pa dag la gnod pa bsgrub la 'bad pa rab rno gang /_/
[\[264a.5\]]s+yAts+tset+ta du dz+wa la gu NA nu kr-i tau sa e ba tat+ko b+ha bet+p+r-i thu pa rA b+ha ba bAn+b+ha besmi na/_/dzi ne rA dza gr-i ho pAn+ta be Nu kA na na tsA ri Ni/_/bi dwe ShAd+de ba dat+ta na pre ri tAstA pa sAHpu rAH/_/b+h+rU b+haM ga b+hI ma ba da nAstad+dat+ta
[\[264a.6\]]de nyid gal te de yi yon tan rab 'bar rjes byed par/_/gyur nas srid 'dir su zhig rgya cher gnod dang ldan par gyur/_/rgyal ba rgyal po'i khab dang nye/_/'od ma'i tshal na rgyu ba na/_/lhas sbyin gyis ni sdang bas sngon/_/rab tu bskul ba'i dka' thub pa/_/de yis byin pa'i mtshon cha can/_/smin 'khyog
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bi bi d+hA yu d+hAH/_/a b+h+yA dra ban+pu saM rab+d+hA kro d+ha bi Sh+wasta saM ya mAH/_/pany+tsa b+histA pa sa sha taiHte ShAM k+Ship+tastair+b+r-iSh+Ta yaH/_/ya yur+b+ha ga btaHkA ya kA ya ka ma lot+pa dzA la tAM/_/ni shi tA n+ya pi shas+t+rA Ni shra yan+ti sat+su mArda
[\[264b.2\]]'jigs su rung ba'i bzhin/_/khro bas dul ba nyams gyur pa'i/_/rtsom pa chen pos mngon par gtses/_/brgya phrag lnga yi dka' thub can/_/de dag gis 'phangs mtshon gyi char/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la ni/_/pad+ma ut+pal tshogs nyid gyur/_/dam pa rnams la rnon po yi/_/mtshon yang 'jam pa sten
[\[264b.3\]]baM/_/bi dwe Sha bi Sha dig+d+hA ni na tu tsit+tA ni pA pi nAM/_/prA du rA sIt+ma Ni ma yaM kU TA gA ra na b+haHpra b+haM/_/sha rI ra ts+tshA da naM shAsturna tu dr-iSh+Ta ni bA ra NaM/_/ta taste ta pa sA shrAn+tA ladz+dzA ba na mi tA na nAH/_/ni pe tuH
[\[264b.4\]]byed de/_/sdang ba'i dug gis byugs gyur pa/_/sdig pa can gyi sems ni min/_/ston pa'i sku ni sgrib byed pa/_/nor bu'i rang bzhin khang pa brtsegs/_/nam mkha'i 'di ni rab 'khrungs te/_/lta ba dag ni bzlog ma gyur/_/de nas dka' thub can de dag_/ngal zhing ngo tsha bzhin dud pas/_/bzod pa'i
[\[264b.5\]]bA da yoHshAstuHk+Sha mA sin+d+hoHpra sA di naH/_/b+ha ga bAn pi pu trA NA mi ba te ShAM pra sA di nI/_/ni kA re NA pi nir+m+ma n+yurbi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/a k+Sho b+ha bi b+h+ra ma su khaM sha ma mA shri tA ni pu N+ya k+Sha mA sa mi la nir+m+ma la
[\[264b.6\]]rgya mtsho rab dang bas/_/ston pa yi ni zhabs la gtugs/_/bcom ldan gyis kyang bu la bzhin/_/rab tu dang ldan de dag la/_/gnod byed la yang khro med pas/_/chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/_/chen po'i yid ni 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul med pa yis/_/bde dang zhi ba la brten bsod nams
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]shI ta lA ni/_/na mA na sA ni ma hA tA hi ta hi pra br-it+tan+ta t+p+ra s+ya ma n+yu ra dza pA ka lu ShI b+ha ban+ti/_/d+har+m+ma de sha na yA shAstAHpra bra dz+yon+mArdzi tA sha yAH/_/te sar+b+bA shra ba nirmuk+ta mar+ha twAM pra ti pe di
[\[265a.2\]]bzod pa dag gi chu/_/dri med bsil ba dag dang ldan pa phan min 'jug pa min/_/de thob khro ba'i rdul gyis rnyog pa dag tu yongs mi 'gyur/_/ston pas chos bstan rab byung gis/_/bsam pa rab phyis de dag gis/_/zag pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/_/dgra bcom nyid ni rab tu
[\[265a.3\]]raM/_/a trAn+ta re sa mA yA tair+b+hik+Shu b+hiH shru ta tat+ka thaiH/_/ki me ta di ti sAsh+tsaR+YaiHpriSh+TastA na ba dadz+dzi naH/_/kr-i twA pa kA rAHsu ta rAM pur+b+basmin+na pi dzan+ma ni/_/ma yai te nir+b+bi kA re Na pra sA dA da ba lo ki tA/_/i te sa
[\[265a.4\]]thob/_/skabs der 'ongs pa'i dge slong ni/_/gtam de thos shing ngo mtshar dang /_/bcas pas 'di ci zhes pa dris/_/rgyal bas de dag la gsungs pa/_/sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang /_/shin tu gnod byas 'di dag la/_/rnam 'gyur med pa bdag gis ni/_/rab tu dang bas nges par bltas/_/rgya mtsho
[\[265a.5\]]mu dra ya dra yAM ba Ni dzaHkA shi de sha dzAH/_/b+hag+ne pra ba ha Ne prA puHpu rA dzI bi ta saM da sha yaM/_/kats+tsha pe na ma yA ta tra pr-iSh+Tha mA ro s+ya tA ri tAH/_/pA ra mA sA d+ya bi shrAn+tiM b+he dzi re lab+d+ha dzI bi tAH/_/ut+tA ra Na pa ri shrAn+te ma
[\[265a.6\]]dag tu 'gro ba la/_/gzings ni chag par gyur tshe sngon/_/'di dag kA shi'i yul skyes pa'i/_/tshong pas srog la the tshom thob/_/de la bdag ni rus sbal gyi/_/rgyab tu bkod nas rab tu bsgral/_/'tsho ba thob cing pha rol tu/_/phyin nas ngal gso rnam par bsten/_/rab tu bsgral bas yongs ngal te/_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]yi ni drA br-i te k+Sha NaM/_/man+maM sAM hA ra kA mA ste sar+b+ba mAM han+tu mud+Ya yuH/_/ta dut+s+r-iSh+TAsh+ma br-iSh+T+ya bi ma ha t+yA piN+Di tA kr-i teH/_/kA ye dr-i D+ha ka bA Ta s+ya na me kA tsi da b+hUt+k+Sha tiH/_/ta tastAn+k+Shap+ta ri k+Sha mAn+t+r-iSh+T+wA haM ka
[\[265b.2\]]bdag ni skad cig gnyid log tshe/_/bdag sha za 'dod de dag rnams/_/thams cad bdag ni gsod par brtson/_/rdo yi char chen rab spros kyang /_/khog pa rab tu brtan ldan zhing /_/gong bu'i dbyibs can bdag gi ni/_/lus ni nam yang nyams ma gyur/_/de nas bkres pas yongs nyen de/_/
[\[265b.3\]]ru Na ku laH/_/swa yaM te b+h+yesta nuM da twA pra yA taHkr-i ta kr-i t+ya tAM/_/ta e te ba Ni dzaHpUr+b+ba ma d+ya tA ba satAM ga tAH/_/kr-i tA ga po pi kA ru N+yAt+p+rA pi taHku sha laM ma yA/_/te shAstuHshA sa ne pUr+b+baM kA sh+ya pa s+ya
[\[265b.4\]]mthong nas snying rjes bdag 'khrugs pas/_/rang gis de dag rnams la lus/_/byin nas bya ba byas nyid gyur/_/sngon gyi tshong pa de dag ding /_/dka' thub can ni 'di dag gyur/_/gnod pa byas kyang snying rje yis/_/bdag gis dge ba dag la bkod/_/de dag sngon tshe bdag nyid che/_/ston pa 'od srungs
[\[265b.5\]]ma hAt+ma naH/_/pra pra dz+yAM prA s+ya saM dzA tAstat+pha la s+yA d+ya b+hA gi naH/_/ta thA ga te na ka thi taM shru twe daM tad+b+hi k+Sha baHk+Sha mAM/_/pra sha shaM puHpa raM ta s+ya k+Sha mA mi b+ha rak+Sha mAM/_/ye ShAM nir+m+ma la shI la shI ta la dza lA satwA sha yA
[\[265b.6\]]bstan pa la/_/rab byung thob nas de yi 'bras/_/da lta skal ldan dag tu skyes/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa 'di/_/thos nas dge slong rnams kyis ni/_/de yi bzod pa sa gzhi bzhin/_/khur dag bzod pa rab tu bsngags/_/gang zhig tshul khrims dri med bsil ba'i chu ldan sems
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]shwA si nI ni t+yaM bai ra ra dzaHpra mArdza na na dI k+ShAn+tiHs+thi tA tse ta saM/_/dur+b+bA rA ri ni kA ra ko pa da ha na dz+wA lA ba lI bi bla ba p+lo Shod+b+hu ta pr-i thu bya thA pa raM tsi tAM nA yAn+ti te bi kri yAm/_/
[\[266a.2\]]can bsam pa dbugs 'byin byed/_/khon gyi rdul ni rab tu dag byed bzod pa'i chu bo sems la rtag gnas pa/_/de dag zlog dka' dgra yi gnod la khro ba'i me 'bar 'greng bas rnam bslad pas/_/bsreg par rab bskyed rgya cher gdung bas yongs 'dris rnam 'gyur dag tu 'gyur ma
[\[266a.3\]]i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM kats+tsha pa ba dA naM sap+ta na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_//at+yun+na te Shu shi kha re Shu ku lA tsa lA nAM nim+ne Shu tsA shu tsi tsa yA ba ka
[\[266a.4\]]yin/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rus sbal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//rigs kyi ri bo dag gi rtse mo shin tu mtho ba dang /_/dma' zhing mi gtsang tshogs dang phyag dar khrod
[\[266a.5\]]rot+ka re Shu/_/A lo ka e Sha ni pa ta t+ya bi she Sha br-i t+ya tu l+yo pa kA ra ma hi mA di na nA ya ka s+ya/_/dzi na bi Nu ba nA pI naM pu re rA dza gr-i he pu rA/_/dur+b+hi k+She k+Shut+pa ri k+ShA mA mal+lAHsha ra Na mA ya yuH/_/da twA
[\[266a.6\]]kyis gang bar yang /_/nyin mo 'dren pa'i snang ba mtshungs par phan byed bdag nyid can/_/'di ni bye brag med par 'jug par nges par bab pa nyid/_/grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu sngon/_/'od ma'i tshal bzhugs rgyal ba la/_/mu ge'i tshe na bkres pa yis/_/yongs nyin gyad rnams skyabs su song /_/snying
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]b+hi ma ta mA hA raM ka ru NA kalpa pA da paH/_/durda shA shAn+ta ye te ShAM bi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/_/a nu gra hAd+b+ha ga ba taHsaM prAp+ta ku sha lo da yAH/_/ar+hat+pa daM sa mA sA d+ya te dza gat+pU dz+ya tAM ya yuH/_/nI tsA
[\[266b.2\]]rje'i dpag bsam rkang 'thung gis/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i zas byin nas/_/gnas skabs ngan pa zhi ba'i slad/_/de dag rnams la chos bstan mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung gis/_/dge ba rgyas pa thob pa rnams/_/dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur nas/_/'gro bas mchod bya nyid du gyur/_/dman
[\[266b.3\]]na t+yun+na tiM pA tAn+d+r-iSh+T+wA tAn+pu ra bA si naH/_/ba b+hU bur+m+mat+sa raste ShAM ni t+ya dzA t+ya pa bA di naH/_/a ho b+ha ga ba tAm+lets+tsha mal+lA nAM shud+d+ha shA sa ne/_/ar+hat+pa da ma nar+hA NAM nirdiSh+TA mi ti te ba da na/_/alpa s+yA nalpa bi b+ha
[\[266b.4\]]pa shin tu mtho gyur pa/_/de mthong grong khyer gnas pa rnams/_/rtag tu de dag rigs la ni/_/smod cing phrag dog ldan par gyur/_/kye ma dag pa'i bstan pa la/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kla klo'i gyad/_/'os min rnams la dgra bcom gnas/_/nges par bstan ces de dag smra/_/chung ngu 'byor pa mi chung
[\[266b.5\]]be na bot+sA ho sa haHpa raM/_/ka ro ti ladz+dz+wa dza na naM dza no dzan+ma pra kA sha naM/_/dzi nA dz+nya yA ku ru dwI pe byom+nA kr-i ta ga tA ga tAn/_/bra b+hA bAn+n+r-i pa tir+m+mal+lAn+sa dza nastA na pU dza yata/_/ta taHpra sA di tAH sau rair+m+ma ni tAsh+tsa
[\[266b.6\]]la/_/gsar pa'i spro dga' mi bzod pa'i/_/skye bo ngo tsha skyed byed pa'i/_/skye ba mchog tu rab gsal byed/_/rgyal ba'i bka' yis sgra mi snyan/_/gling du mkha' las 'gro 'ong byas/_/mthu yis gyad ni de dag rnams/_/mi bdag skye bor bcas pas mchod/_/de dag grong pas phyag byas te/_/rab dang bkur
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pra Na mya te/_/swa gu Ne rgu Na pat+pU dz+yai b+hik+ShU NA ma gra tAM ya yuH/_/b+hik+Shu b+histat+p+ra b+hA be na bismi ter+b+ha ga bI sta taH/_/tat+pu N+ya kA ra Nai pr-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba dz+nyastA b+hA Sha ta/_/a b+ha baM kA shi de shAste
[\[267a.2\]]byas de dag rnams/_/rang yon yon tan mchod 'os pas/_/dge slong rnams kyi mchog nyid gyur/_/de nas de mthus ya mtshan pa'i/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la/_/de yi bsod nams rgyu mtshan dris/_/de la thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/_/sngon gyi skye bar kA shi yi/_/
[\[267a.3\]]pany+tsA b+hi dz+nyAsta po ba ne/_/a haM ku sha la shI lA khyaHpur+b+ba dzan+ma ni tA pa saH/_/ko Ta mal+lAsh+tsa ta trai te ba b+hU bur+m+mu na yaHpu rA/_/te ma yA diSh+Ta ka l+yA NAH pany+tsA b+hi dz+nyA twA mA ga tAH/_/tat+pu N+ya bA sa nA b+h+yA sa pr-I t+yAsmin+na
[\[267a.4\]]yul mtha'i dka' thub tshal du bdag_/mngon shes lnga ldan dka' thub can/_/dge ba'i ngang tshul zhes par gyur/_/der ni rdzong gi gyad 'di dag_/sngon tshe thub pa dag tu gyur/_/bdag gis dge bstan de dag rnams/_/mngon shes lnga pa nyid du gyur/_/skye ba 'dir yang bsod nams de'i/_/bag chags
[\[267a.5\]]bi dzan+ma ni/_/ta e ta saM sr-i te kle shAn+ma l+lAHsan+tA ri tA ma ya/_/e te bra dzi tAHshastuHkA sh+ya pa s+yAn+ti ke pu rA/_/ba b+hu buHka Ta kA lA yA yA tAste nA d+ya mal+la tAM/_/i ti prAg+dzan+ma br-it+tAn+taM mal+lA nAM sar+b+ba daR+shinA/_/
[\[267a.6\]]goms pa'i dga' ba yis/_/gyad 'di rnams ni 'khor ba yi/_/nyon mongs dag las bdag gis bsgral/_/'di dag rnams sngon ston pa ni/_/'od srungs drung du rab byung ste/_/rgyal po'i gnas su gnas par gyur/_/de yis da lta gyad nyid gyur/_/ces pa gyad rnams dag gi ni/_/skye ba sngar byung bcom ldan 'das/
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]shru two di taM b+ha ga ba tA b+hik+Sha po bisma yaM ya yuH/_/ti mi ra b+ha ra ni mI li tA nAM sa dza nA nAM bi bud+d+ha she Sha rAr+ha twaM/_/a pi b+ha ba ti saM ka dzA nA mA lo ka nu gra hAd+g+ra hA d+hi pa teH/_/i tik+She
[\[267b.2\]]thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa dag_/thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur/_/gza' yi bdag pos snang bas rjes bzung bas/_/mun pa'i tshogs kyis rnam par zum gyur pa'i/_/'dam skyes chu dang bcas pa rnams dag kyang /_/mkhas pa'i cod pan du 'os nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes pa
[\[267b.3\]]men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM tA pa pA ba dA na maSh+TA na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_!_//kA yi kaM ha ra ti mA na saM ta thA de hi nAM b+ha ba ma yaM ma hA
[\[267b.4\]]dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dka' thub pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//lus can lus dang de bzhin nyid kyis ni/_/srid ba'i rang bzhin nad chen 'phrog
[\[267b.5\]]ma yaM/_/bud+d+ha e ba b+ha ga bAn su d+hA ni d+hiHsar+b+ba lo ka pa ra lo ka bAn+d+ha baH/_/shrA bas+t+yaM b+ha ga bAn+pur+b+baM ro gA krAn+taM dza naM dzi naH/_/bi da d+hi b+hik+Shu saM g+haMny+tsa swa s+tha mA lo ka nA mr-i taiH/_/bAt+sa l+ya bismi taM
[\[267b.6\]]byed pa/_/'jig rten kun gyi 'jig rten pha rol gnyen/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i gter nyid do/_/mnyan yod du sngon bcom ldan 'das/_/rgyal ba'i gzigs pa bdud rtsi yis/_/skye bo nad kyis gzir rnams dang /_/dge slong tshogs kyang bsos par mdzad/_/mnyes gshin gyi
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]so tha b+hik+Shu saM g+ha ma b+hA Sha ta/_/ma yA yU yaM kr-i tAHswa s+thAHpur+b+basmin+na pi dzan+ma ni/_/a b+ha baM pad+ma kA khyo haM bA rA Na s+yo nre paHpu rA/_/sar+b+bar+t+ti ha ra NA sak+taHbra dzA nAM dza na ko sa maH/_/ka dA
[\[268a.2\]]ni ya mtshan pa'i/_/dge slong tshogs la des gsungs pa/_/sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang /_/bdag gis khyed rnams bsos par byas/_/bdag sngon bA rA Na sIr ni/_/mi bdag pad+ma can zhes pa/_/gzir ba thams cad sel la chags/_/skye rgu'i pha dang mtshungs par gyur/_/nam
[\[268a.3\]]tsid+de ba do She Na bai Sha myAd+de sha kA la yoH/_/duHsa haH sar+b+be pau rA NA ma b+hUd+b+yA d+hi sa mud+b+ha baH/_/b+hi Shag+b+hai Sha dz+ya saM b+hA rair+m+ma yA bi hi ta sam+pa daH/_/shAn+ti swasti ka yo gaish+tsa na te swAs+th+yaM sa mA ya yuH/_/rau hi tA khyo
[\[268a.4\]]zhig gnam gyi skyon gyis ni/_/yul dang dus ni mi bzad las/_/grong ba rnams la bzod dka' yi/_/nad ni rab tu rgyas par gyur/_/sman pa sman gyi tshogs dang ni/_/zhi dang shis pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bdag gis phun tshogs bsgrubs byas pa/_/de dag bsos pa nyid ma gyur/_/de dag nad ni zlog
[\[268a.5\]]ma hA mat+s+yaste ShAM ro gi ni br-it+ta ye/_/lak+Sh+ya dz+nya bai d+yai rA diSh+TaHprAp+taHkash+tsin+na d+hI ba raiH/_/a b+hA be ta s+ya mat+s+ya s+ya dza nA nAM prA Na saM sha ye/_/ma yA duHkhAr+t+ta kA ru N+yAt+tat+p+ra lA pA sa hiSh+Nu nA/_/rau hi taHs+ya ma mat+s+yaHpa th+yAr+haHsar+b+ba
[\[268a.6\]]ba la/_/nya chen ro hi ta zhes pa/_/mtshan nyid shes pa'i sman pas bstan/_/nya pas 'ga' yang thob ma gyur/_/nya de med pas skye bo rnams/_/srog la the tshom gyur tshe bdag_/de dag cho nge ma bzod pas/_/sdug bsngal gyis gzir snying rje las/_/nad pa kun la phan 'os pa/_/ro he ta yi nyar ni
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ro gi NAM/_/pra NI d+hA na bra te ne ti k+Ship+taM harmya ta TAt+pa puH/_/te nAr+t+ti pra Ni d+hA ne na bA rA yAHpa ri tom+b+ha si/_/k+Sha Ne Ne bA ha ma b+ha bam su ma hAnrau hi tasti miH/_/tan+mAM se no pa yug+te na sar+b+be te pu ra bA si naH/_/
[\[268b.2\]]bdag_/gyur ces smon lam brtul zhugs kyis/_/ba gom ngos nas lus dag 'phangs/_/gzir ba'i smon lam de yis ni/_/chu bo bA rA dag gi chur/_/skad cig gis bdag ro hi ta'i/_/nya ni shin tu chen por gyur/_/de yi sha ni nyer sbyar bas/_/grong khyer na gnas de dag kun/_/
[\[268b.3\]]sa ha sai ba ya yuHswAs+th+yaM ma mr-i te nai ba pU ra tAH/_/ta e ba b+hi k+Sha bo yU ya ma d+ya ro gAt+ma yod+d+h+r-i tAH/_/ro ga trA Ne na satwA nAM sa dai bA han+ni ra ma yaH/_/saM sa ra byA d+hi bai d+ye na su ga te ne ti b+hA Shi
[\[268b.4\]]bdud rtsi yis ni bkang ba bzhin/_/'phral la bsos pa nyid du gyur/_/de nyid dge slong khyed rnams te/_/de ring bdag gis nad las bsgral/_/sems can rnams kyi nad bskyabs pas/_/rtag tu bdag ni nad dang bral/_/bde gshegs 'khor ba'i nad kyis ni/_/sman pas de
[\[268b.5\]]taM/_/swas+thI ste b+hi k+Sha baHshru twA haR+Shot+pA haM pra pe di re/_/a bi ra ta pa ra hi ta ma na sAM ko pi sa twA bi kA shaH/_/ta nu ra bi ta nu ta ra tr-i Na tu la ya dat+tau ya tra bi lA saH/_/
[\[268b.6\]]skad gsung ba dag_/dge slong bsos pa de dag gis/_/thos nas dga' mgu rangs pa thob/_/shin tu chung ba'i rtswa dang mtshungs pa yis/_/lus dang sbyin pa gang la rtse dga' can/_/gzhan phan yid dang bral ba min rnams kyis/_/snying stobs bcas pa ci yang rnam par gsal/_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM pad+ma kA ba dA nAM na ba na ba ti ta maHpal+la waH//_!_//swa two da d+hiHko pi sa baM da nI yaHka ro ti pu N+yai ra mr-i
[\[269a.2\]]zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las pad+ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//gang gi bsam par bla med byang chub 'dod/_/bdud rtsi'i pho nya dang po
[\[269a.3\]]tA gra dU ti/_/ya s+yA sha ye nut+ta ra bo d+hi bAMts+tsha shI tAM shu le khe ba na bA ba tA raM/_/dzi naM dze ta ba nA sI na pa prats+tsha pra NA taHpu rA/_/kau tu ka pra Na yI shrI mAn ko sha len+d+raHpra se na dzita/_/b+ha ga
[\[269a.4\]]zla tshes bzhin/_/bsod nams kyis ni gsar du 'jug byed pa/_/snying stobs rgya mtsho su zhig der phyag 'os/_/rgyal byed tshal bzhugs rgyal ba la/_/dpal ldan ko sa la yi dbang /_/gsal rgyal dge mtshan la chags shing /_/rab tu btud pas sngon zhus pa/_/khyod kyi yang
[\[269a.5\]]bAn+ka th+ya tAM kasmin+p+ra tha maM te pr-i thu byu teH/_/pUrbe dzan+ma ni saM dzA tA samyak+saM bo d+hi bA sa nA/_/b+ha ga pA ni ti b+hU pe Na pr-iSh+TastaM prat+ya b+hA Sha ta/_/shu tsi mA na sa haM sA mA lIM daR+sha yan+da sha na d+yu tiM/_/
[\[269a.6\]]dag rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub bag chags dang po ni/_/sngon gyi skye ba gang las skyes/_/'od zer rgya che bcom ldan gsungs/_/sa bdag gis 'di dris de la/_/tshems kyi 'od zer yid kyi rdzing /_/gtsang ma'i ngang pa'i 'phreng ston cing /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]pu R+Ya pra b+hA ba t+yAM pra b+hA so b+hU b+hu dzaM ni d+hiH/_/ya dA ha ma b+ha baM samya k+saM bo d+hi d+hIr+m+me ta dA b+ha bta/_/ka ri NI pre ma pA she na sa mA kr-iSh+TaHsa kuny+dza raH/_/ya dA bi gA h+ya ga ha naM rA gI pu na ru pA
[\[269b.2\]]grong khyer 'od ldan dag tu sngon/_/rab gsal sa bdag gter du ni/_/gang tshe bdag gyur de tshe bdag_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo gros gyur/_/glang po chags ldan glang mo la/_/dga' ba'i zhags pas rab tu drangs/_/nags su 'khyam nas gang gi tshe/_/de tshe
[\[269b.3\]]ga taH/_/ta dA hasti ma hA mA traHsaM dzA tasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/pra t+yA yA taHk+Shi ti pa te kuny+dza raHshI k+Sha yA ma ma/_/e Sha rA ga sa mA kr-iSh+TaHkA yaM bismi ta saM ya mAH/_/dza gA ma bi kr-i yAM hastI bi shwa sta
[\[269b.4\]]nye bar 'ongs gyur pa/_/de tshe glang chen sna chen po/_/kun tu bgrod kyis de la smras/_/sa bdag bdag gi bslab pa yis/_/glang po dag ni rab tu 'ongs/_/'dod chags kyis ni yang dag drangs/_/dul ba brjed pa'i glang po 'di/_/yon tan dkyil 'khor yid brten pa/_/
[\[269b.5\]]gu Na maN+Da laH/_/a sUR+YAg+nI tA tA paHk+Sha taHd+h+r-i ti ra shA pash+tsa ni ra yasta mash+tsA na byak+tAn+d+haM bi Sha ma bi Sha ma dra bya b+hu dza gaM/_/a ma d+yak+Shi ba twaM ni pa ta na ma nim+naM ta nu b+h+r-i tA ma b+hU
[\[269b.6\]]nges par rnam 'gyur dag tu gyur/_/lus 'dzin 'dod chags dran pas rab bskyed dran 'phrog brtan pa 'joms pa ni/_/me dang nyi ma min pas gdung zhing dmod pa min pas dmyal bar byed/_/long dang mtshan mo min pa'i rab rib lag 'gro'i rdzas min mi bzad dug_/
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]tash+tson+mo daHsma ra dza ni ta rA gaHsmr-i ti ha raH/_/saM yA te ni ti ka thi te nr-i pa staM pra t+ya b+hA Sha ta/_/a s+yasti rA gaHsaM sA re kash+tsid+bi Sha ya ni pr-i haH/_/i ti pr-iSh+TaHk+Shi tI she na saM
[\[270a.2\]]chang min myos byed dma' min lhung byed 'byung po min pa'i smyo byed do/_/zhes pa kun bgrod kyis smras tshe/_/de la mi bdag gis smras pa/_/chags bral yul la chags med pa/_/'ga' zhig 'khor ba na yod dam/_/zhes pa sa yi bdag pos dris/_/kun tu
[\[270a.3\]]yA te sta ma bo tsata/_/niHsaM sA rA dza ga t+yasmin bI ta rA gAsta thA ga tAH/_/sat+pA trA NAM gu Na ba tAM sar+b+ba sa two pa kA ra NAM/_/rA dzan+bud+d+ha pra dI pA nAM ru tsA bi shwaM pra kA sha te/_/e ta dA
[\[270a.4\]]bgrod kyis de la smras/_/'gro ba 'di na de bzhin gshegs/_/'khor ba med pa 'dod chags bral/_/dam pa'i snod dang yon tan can/_/sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/_/rgyal po sangs rgyas sgron ma yi/_/'od kyis thams cad gsal bar mdzad/_/de dag
[\[270a.5\]]kar+N+N+ya b+hU b+har+t+tuHpa ri tsit+ta pra sA di naH/_/pra durba b+hU ba hr-i da ye sa d+yaHsam bo d+hi bA sa nA/_/pUr+b+ba pu N+ya pra b+hA be na saM prAp+ta ku sha lo da yaH/_/samyak+saM bo d+hi lA b+hA ya pra Ni d+hA naM tsa kA ra
[\[270a.6\]]thos nas sa yi bdag_/mchog tu rab dang sems ldan pa'i/_/snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/_/bag chags 'phral la rab tu 'khrungs/_/sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis ni/_/dge ba rgyas pa yang dag thob/_/de yis yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub thob slad smon lam
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]saH/_/so b+hUd+g+r-i ha pa tirna ma ku lA la pUr+b+ba dzan+ma ni/_/sne hairgu Do da naiste nak+She N+yaiHsaM pU dzi to dzi naH/_/tat+pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na ta s+yAp+ta s+ya pra b+hA sa tAM/_/bo d+hI raM ku ri tA tsit+te pha li te yam+ma yA d+hu nA/_/ka thi
[\[270b.2\]]byas/_/de ni sngon gyi skye ba la/_/rdza mkhan khyim bdag ces par gyur/_/de yi dbul tshe gus pa yis/_/bu ram gzan gyis rgyal ba mchod/_/de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/_/rab gsal nyid thob de yi ni/_/sems la byang chub myu gu bskrun/_/da lta bdag la 'bras 'di grub/_/
[\[270b.3\]]ta mi ti ta thA ga te na ta tra pra tha ma ta ro di ta shud+b+ha bo d+hi tsit+taH/_/a mr-i ta mi ba ni pI ya ko sha len+d+rAHshru ti tsu lu kaiHsa dza gA ma rA dza d+hA nImra/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA
[\[270b.4\]]dang por dag pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de ni der/_/bdud rtsi bzhin du thos pa'i khyor ba yis/_/ko sa la dbang des 'thungs rgyal sar song /_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi
[\[270b.5\]]yAM pu N+yaHpra b+hA sA ba dA na sha ta ta maHpal+la waH//_//kalpaHsarba dza na pri yaHsa sa ta tA sak+ta pra kA sho da yaHsh+lA g+h+yo bA pa ra e ba ya s+ya dza na nI pU dz+yA pra tA pa d+yu tiH/_/yash+tsa rai rdza na ka s+ya tsaN+Da
[\[270b.6\]]'khri shing las bsod nams rab gsal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya pa'o//_//gang zhig skyed byed tsha zer ldan pa rgyu ba'i zhabs ni nye bar bsten pa 'dzin/_/gang gi ma ni tho rangs snang ba mchod 'os rtag par rgyun du rab gsal 'char/_/skye bo thams cad dga' ba'i snga dro
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]ma ha saHpA do pa se bA d+h+r-i tirlo kesmin+na pa ra tra bA ta da nu gaHpr-iSh+Tasta mo b+haMHkwo tsi ta/_/yA te ya shaHshe Sha da shAM k+Shi tI she shud+d+ho da na shud+d+ha ba ra pra kA shaH/_/b+hak+t+yA tsa kA rA s+ya sha rI ra pU dzAM ta thA ga tastU
[\[271a.2\]]de nyid nyin mo dag la bsngags par 'os/_/de yi rjes 'brang 'jig rten 'di'am gzhan du 'gar yang mun pas reg mi 'gyur/_/sa dbang zas gtsang grags pa lhag ma yi/_/gnas skabs gyur tshe de yi lus la ni/_/de bzhin gshegs dag mchog tu gsal mdzad pa/_/gus
[\[271a.3\]]pa ma kA ra yats+tsha/_/a lo ka pA mA n+ya bi bik+t+ya br-it+taM ya dr-its+tsha yA lo ka pa t+ya pra br-it+taM/_/saM pU ri taHsaM sha yA bisma yA t+yAM pa prats+tsha taM b+hik+Shu ga Na sa me b+h+yaH/_/a nut+ta rA Na t+ya ya bo d+hid+hAm+naHspr-i
[\[271a.4\]]pas mchod mdzad mchod rten dag kyang mdzad/_/dben pa'i spyod tshul 'jig rten thun mong min/_/ji ltar bzhed par 'jig rten lam 'jug pa/_/de la the tshom ya mtshan gyis gang ba'i/_/dge slong tshogs kyis mngon du phyogs te dris/_/mi nyams bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas/_/chags
[\[271a.5\]]hA pra hA Nodz+dz+hi ta lo ka br-it+teH/_/dza gad+gu ro ste gu ru gau ra be Na ke yaM pra br-it+tA bya bA hA ra tsaR+YAM/_/tAn+d+har+m+ma daR+shI b+ha ga bAn+ba b+hA She pU dz+yau gu rU NA ma pi gau ra bAr+hau/_/kA ya s+ya ka l+yA Na ni ke ta na s+ya ni mit+ta b+hU tau pi ta ro
[\[271a.6\]]pa spangs pas 'jig rten spyod btang ba/_/'gro ba'i bla khyod bla ma la gus pas/_/tha snyad spyod la 'jug pa 'di ni ci/_/bcom ldan chos gzigs dag gis der gsungs pa/_/dge ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i lus dag gi/_/rgyur gyur pha ma dag ni mkhas rnams kyi/_/bla ma yis kyang mchod 'os
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]bu d+hA nAM/_/d+har+m+mo pya d+har+m+ma twa mu pai ti te ShAM dz+nyA na d+yu tir+d+h+yA na la tA pra yA ti/_/sa map+ta pu N+ya pra tha mA ba tA rau na pU dzi tau yaiHbi ta rau sa de ba/_/dzan+man+tA re ShA da ra gau ra be Na ta paHpra bit+tau pi ta ro ma yAn+d+hau/_/A rA d+hi tau t+yak+ta
[\[271b.2\]]zhe sar 'os/_/dang por mtha' dag bsod nams la 'jug pa'i/_/pha ma gang gis rtag tu mi mchod pa/_/de dag chos kyang chos min nyid 'gyur zhing /_/ye shes snang ba nag po nyid du gyur/_/skye ba gzhan la gus dang zhe sa yis/_/dka' thub la zhugs pha ma long ba dag_/khyim la chags btang bdag gis
[\[271b.3\]]gr-i ha spr-i he Na sa paR+Ya yA de bA tA bat+sa dai ba/_/dwi dzan+ma na kA shi pu re sa ban+d+hoHpat+n+yAM pu rA gau ta mi kA b+hi d+hA yAM/_/pu traHpa bi trI kr-i ta shud+d+hA baM shaHsh+ya mA ka nA ma ma ti man+ba b+hU ba/_/tau dam+pa tI br-id+d+hA ta yan+d+h+yA map+tau yA tau su ta
[\[271b.4\]]mchod pa yis/_/lha bzhin rtag pa nyid du mnyes par byas/_/kA shi'i grong du gnyis skyes gnyen bcas kyi/_/chung ma gau ta mi ka zhes la sngon/_/rigs ni dag cing gtsang bar byed pa'i bu/_/blo ldan sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba byung /_/khyo shug de dag rgas pas long ba thob/_/bu la khyim bkod nags
[\[271b.5\]]n+yasta gr-i hau ba nAn+ti/_/ma nI Shi NA mi ba dza rA ba tA re pa re bi bi kasta ru Na twa me ti/_/tad+bu nu rA tsA ra gu Ne na rA dz+nyA pu ro hi ta twa b+h+r-i sha mar+thi to pi/_/pi troHpa paR+Ya ra si kasta de ba ya yau yu bA pu N+ya ta po ba naM ta tra/_/tan pra yat+nAt+pa ri
[\[271b.6\]]mtha' dag tu song /_/mkhas pa rnams ni rga bas 'jug pa na/_/dben pa mchog tu dar ba nyid du gyur/_/de dag bu ni kun spyod yon tan gyis/_/rgyal pos mdun na 'don du rab zhus kyang /_/pha ma'i mchod pa la chags lang tsho can/_/bsod nams dka' thub nags der de tshe song /_/mkhas pa de yis 'bad pas
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]tsaR+Ya mA No ma nI Shi NA mU la pha laiHsa to yaiH/_/saM to Sha saM dzA ta ma naHpra sA dA ba bA pa tustat+pi ta rau pra mo daM/_/ta taHka dA tsin+m+r-i ga yA bi hA rI ta dA shra mo pAn+ta pa rit+ta TAn+te/_/ma hI ma hI nAM ma hi Sha dwi pen+d+rai stA brah+ma
[\[272a.2\]]rtsa ba dang /_/'bras bu chu dang bcas pas rim gro byas/_/chog shes yid ni rab tu dang ba skyes/_/de yi pha ma dag gis rab dga' thob/_/de nas nam zhig rngon la rtse ba yi/_/de dag bsti gnas dang nye chu klung 'gram/_/ma he gnyis 'thung dbang gis mi dman pa'i/_/sa
[\[272a.3\]]dat+to nr-i pa tirdza gA he/_/a trAn+t+ra re ta tra mr-i gA dzi nAM ka maM b+ho b+h+r-i taM kuM b+ha mu pA da dA naM/_/sh+yA mA ka mA kar+N+Na pr-i te na rA dz+nyad+YA na dU rA di Shu NA mr-i gAr+thin/_/a shar+m+ma kar+m+mo pa na te na te na shi te na bid+d+haH
[\[272a.4\]]der mi yi bdag po tshangs byin 'ongs/_/skabs der der ni ri dgas pags pas mtshan/_/chus gang bum pa len pa'i sngo bsangs can/_/ri dgas don gnyer rgyal pos ring po nas/_/rna ba'i bar du drangs pa'i mda' yis bsnun/_/mi bsrun tshig gis bzhin du mda' rnon ni/_/bde
[\[272a.5\]]kha la nar+m+ma Ne ba/_/mar+m+mA ba san+ne na sha re Na tI braM bi g+hUr+N+Na mA naHpa sha nairdza gA da/_/a ho ba tA nAR+Ya ta re Na ke na niHkA ra NaM niSh+ka rur+NA sha ye Na/_/a kAR+YaM saM gA da bi tsAR+Ya pA paM pra NA ba hA rI pra hi ta sha ro yaM/_/pi
[\[272a.6\]]med las kyis nye bar gnas pa de/_/gnad du zug pas rtag tu phug pa des/_/rnam par g.yo zhing dal gyis rab smras pa/_/kye ma shin tu 'phags pa min pa su/_/snying rje'i bsam pa med pas rgyu med du/_/sdig pa ma spyad bya min la chags nas/_/srog ni 'phrog par byed pa'i mda' 'di 'phangs/_/nags na pha
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]tror+b+ba ne de ha d+h+r-i to na biSh+Te dr-iSh+Ti pra lo pAt+ma yi yaSh+Ti b+hu te/_/kaSh+TaM ha te tau ni ha tau ni rA shau ka s+yA ya mu pas+t+ri ba d+he pra yat+naH/_/e ti bya thA bis+kha li ta pra lA paM bi praM na bash+ma shru ni lI na le khaM/_/nr-i paHsa br-iM ga na ba tsU
[\[272b.2\]]ma'i lus 'dzin du gnas pa/_/mig rab nyams pa'i dbyig par gyur pa bdag_/kyi hud bsad tshe re med de dag bsad/_/gsum gsod drag po'i bsad 'di su zhig gis/_/zhes pa gdung bas 'khrul smra bram ze de/_/sma ra'i ri mo gsar chags mi bdag gis/_/bung ba dang bcas tsU ta gsar pa
[\[272b.3\]]ta ma gra taM kASh+Thi kash+tsin+na mi bAn+d+ha lo ke/_/sha raM gu ru kle she bi she Sha tsin+tA san+tA sa dwIp+tAg+ni shi khA ya mA naM/_/pak+ShAM ki taM prA Na bi pak+Sha b+hU taM su bar+N+Na puM khaM hr-i da ye ba han+taM/_/bi tseSh+Ta mA na ta Ti nI ta
[\[272b.4\]]dag_/shing mkhan dag gis bcad bzhin mdun du mthong /_/bla ma'i nyon mongs khyad par bsams pas gdung /_/'bar ba'i me lce lta bur spyod pa'i mda'/_/sgros mtshan srog gi mi mthun phyogs gyur pas/_/gser gyi ltong can snying la 'dzin byed cing /_/chu klung ngogs na 'gre ldog byed
[\[272b.5\]]pan+te dr-iSh+T+wA ta mA kr-iSh+Ta d+h+r-i ti rna ren+d+raH/_/pra tA bo pa ga te na ta na swa sA pa ge ha ne ba pri thu bya tho b+hUta/_/sa taM ba b+hAShe na mu ni ma yA twaM mr-i gA dzi nAts+tshA di ta pUr+b+ba kA yaH/_/ha taHpra mo hA b+hi ga te na sA d+ho shA pAg+ni nA nAr+ha si ma nI
[\[272b.6\]]pa de//_/mthong nas mi dbang brtan pa rab tu nyams/_/gzi byin bral ba rang gi mda' de yis/_/bsnun pa bzhin du rgya cher gdung bar gyur/_/de la des smras thub pa ri dgas kyi/_/pags pas lus stod g.yogs pa khyod ni bdag_/rab tu rmongs pas bcom mo dam pa kye/_/bdag nyid dmod pa'i me yis
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]haM tuM/_/shru twe ti bA kyaM bya thi tas+ya rA dz+nya stI bra bya thAM satwa ni d+hirni ya mya/_/ta ma pra bId+kIr+N+Na dza TA ka lA paHswa b+hA ba nir+m+ma n+yu ma naHku mA raH/_/a laM ta pa shA paM b+ha ye na dA dza n+na haM bi ma n+yuHpi ta rau ma
[\[273a.2\]]gzhom mi 'os/_/zhes pa rgyal po gzir ba'i tshig thos nas/_/ral pa'i tshogs bkram gzhon nu rang bzhin gyis/_/khro med yid ldan snying stobs gter gyis ni/_/drag por gdung ba bzod byas de la smras/_/rgyal po dka' thub dmod pas 'jigs don med/_/khro bral bdag dang
[\[273a.3\]]mAn+d+hau/_/asmin+na pi pra Na ha rA pa kA re shA po pa paM ga na ka ri Sh+ya ta ste/_/su khA duHkhA ya gu No da yA yash+tsa do ShA ya shA pA ya ba d+hA ya kA le/_/kar+m+mA N+ya saM b+h+ran+ta pha la ni dzan+tau swa yaM kr-i tA n+ye ba b+ha be b+ha ban+ti/_/yan+mArge Na
[\[273a.4\]]bdag gi pha ma dag_/long ba srog 'phrog gnod pa 'di la yang /_/khyod la dmod pa dag ni 'dor mi 'gyur/_/srid par srog chags rang gis byas pa'i las/_/'khrul med 'bras bu can rnams dus su ni/_/bde dang sdug bsngal yon tan rgyas pa dang /_/skyon dang dmod pa gsod pa'i slad du 'gyur/_/gang zhig lam
[\[273a.5\]]sha nair+b+ra dzan+ni pa ti taHprAp+no ti b+ha gaM ta noR+YaHb+h+ra pa ri b+h+ra mot+pa tha ga ter+b+bid+h+wAn+bi sha t+yak+ta taH/_/yat+pI da t+ya sa kr-it+p+ra yat+na tsa tu raHshri saM shra yash+nA la sastad+bai tsi t+r+ya ma b+hit+ta tsi tra ra tsa naM sar+b+bAt+ma nAM kar+m+ma NAM/_/a yash+tsi
[\[273a.6\]]nas dal gyis 'gro ba lhung zhing lus ni rab tu nyams pa thob/_/gang zhig lam bral g.yang sar yongs su 'khyam zhing rgyug pa nyams pa med par 'jug_/gang zhig lan gcig ma yin mkhas pa nyams shing dpal bstan le lo can/_/las kyi ri mo rtsis ba med par bdag nyid kun gyis bkod de rnam par bkra/_/bdag
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]mas+t+we ShA ma mAM bu kuM b+has+t+r-iSh+NAr+t+ta yordzI bi ta me ba pi troH/_/sau dza n+ya mA lam+b+ya d+hi yA da yAr+d+ra ga twA twa yA tUr+N+Na ta ra pra de yaH/_/uk+t+we ti kaN+ThAn+ta ra bar+t+ti dzI baHshwA sa pra yA sa s+tha gi tAlpa bar+N+NaH/_/mau ni pa tsa kre shru Di tA na na s+ya bai lak+Shu
[\[273b.2\]]gi chu bum phyi ma med pa 'di/_/pha ma skom pas gzir la 'tshe bar ni/_/gzhung bzang la brten brtse bas brlan pa'i blos/_/myur bar song ste khyod kyis sbyin par bya/_/zhes pa mgrin pa'i bar du srog rgyu zhing /_/dbugs brtsegs ngal bas sgra bsgribs chung ngur brjod/_/bzhin ni phyi rol phyogs pa'i mda' dag la/_/thub pa
[\[273b.3\]]dIk+Sh+ya mi ba sA ya ka s+ya/_/kuM b+haM sa mA dA ya ta taHk+Shi tI shasta dA shra maM prA s+ya b+h+r-i shaM pra tap+ta/_/tA be ka pu traus+tha bi rau bi lo kya ta dan+ti ka nai ba sha shA ka gan+tuM/_/pu tre ti dUrAt+pa da shap+da dat+ta kar+N+Nau sa mut+kaN+Thi ta mA na pau tau/_/sne hAd+b+ru bA NA bu pa
[\[273b.4\]]des ni skyengs pa ston bzhin mdzad/_/de nas sa dbang mchog tu rab gdung bas/_/bum pa blangs nas de dag bsti gnas phyin/_/rgan rgon bu gcig ldan pa de dag mthong /_/de dag gam du 'gro ba yongs ma nus/_/ring nas rdog sgra dag la rna gtod cing /_/mdza' bas rab tu 'dod ldan bu zhes pa/_/smra ba de dag la ni nyer
[\[273b.5\]]sr-i t+ya ra dzA dza gA da shA sA k+Shi ba mI ha mAnaH/_/na pA ba b+ha gi yu ba yoHsu to haM sau dza n+ya bal+li ka thi naHku ThA raH/_/mA taM ga brit+t+yA mra ta ruM ni pa t+ya mat+te na yon+no thi taHku mA raH/_/mat+sA ya ka s+yu ta nus+sa she te yuSh+mat+su taH
[\[273b.6\]]btud de/_/dmod pas nyams pa mi 'dod rgyal pos smras/_/glang chen myos pa'i tshul gyis a mra'i shing /_/'joms bzhin gang gis gzhon nu rab bcom pa/_/skyes mchog 'khri shing dag gi sta gri rtsub/_/sdig pa'i skal ldan bdag ni khyed sras min/_/bdag gi mda' yis lus bcom khyod kyi sras/_/de ni
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]kr-its+tshA ga tasta pan+te/_/ni d+hI ya ti mur+d+h+rA+e ma mo gra shA paHsa shi ta loSh+mA pr-i thu pA pa tA pAta/_/e t+yuk+ta mA tre ba su d+hA d+hi pe na tau badzra b+hag+nA bi ba b+hag+na d+haiR+Yau/_/b+hI t+ye ba sho ka s+ya su duHsa ha s+ya ma hI yA siM mo ha
[\[274a.2\]]sdug bsngal gyur nas chu 'gram nyal/_/sdig pa'i gdung ba che las tsha grang dang /_/bcas pa'i dmod drag bdag gi spyi bor dor/_/nor 'dzin bdag pos de skad brjod tsam la/_/rdo rjes bcom bzhin brtan pa nyams de dag_/shin tu bzod dka'i mya ngan la 'jigs bzhin/_/rab tu che ba
[\[274a.3\]]gu hA pra biSh+Tau/_/sik+tau ta taHshI ta dza le na rA dz+nyA tau lab+d+ha saM dz+nyA ba ya bau ka thaM tsita/_/pu trAn+ti kaM b+hU pa na ya twa mA bA mi t+yu tsa tuSh+Tau ka ru Na pra lA pau/_/nI tau ta ta ste na pa rit+pa mI pa ma dwI pa dI pe bya ba ne ni mag+nau/_/haste na saM spr-i sh+ya su
[\[274a.4\]]rmongs pa'i phug nang zhugs/_/de nas rgyal pos chu grang gtor de dag_/ji zhig ltar stes 'du shes cha shas thob/_/sa bdag khyod kyis bdag cag bu drung du/_/khrid ces snying rje rab smra de dag smra/_/de nas de yis chu klung nye bar khrid/_/gling dang sgron me nye bar byid gyur pa/_/lag pas mda' bsnun bu la
[\[274a.5\]]taM sha rASh+TaM tad+bA Na bid+d+ha di pa bi ta tustau/_/kasmA da kasmAd+gu ru bat+sa lo bi br-id+d+hA ba nA thau bi ta rau twa man+d+hau/_/t+yak+t+wa di paM gats+tsha si pu tra ke ti gA D+haM sa raM Sh+wa dz+ya ta mU tsa tustau/_/A rA d+hi tau b+hak+ti sa paR+Ya yai ba ni r+b+yA dza mA baM gu ru
[\[274a.6\]]rig byas nas/_/de yi mda' yis phug bzhin de dag 'gyel/_/bu gcig bla ma dag la mnyes gshin yang /_/pha ma rgan long mgon med btang nas ni/_/ci slad glo bur mtho ris khyod 'gro zhes/_/de dag gis ni de la dam 'khyud smras/_/bu khyod me yi sbyin sreg la dga' zhing /_/bla ma'i lha dang
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]de ba te na/_/twa yAg+ni ho trA b+hi ra te pu tra sa t+ye na te nAstu b+ha bAn+bi sha l+yaH/_/i t+yuk+ta mA tre ka ru NArti sat+ya satwo pa san+ne ba tsa na gu ru b+h+yaM/_/sha kraHsa ma b+h+ye t+ya su d+hA pra se kai ra dzI ba yan+nirbi pa raM ku
[\[274b.2\]]ldan pas bdag cag ni/_/zol med gus pa'i mchod pas mnyes byas pa'i/_/bden pa des khyod zug rngu med gyur cig_/ces pa bla ma dag gi snying stobs rdzogs/_/snying rjes gzir ba'i bden tshig brjod tsam la/_/brgya byin mngon phyogs bdud rtsis bran pa yis/_/gzhon nu rma dang bral
[\[274b.3\]]mA raM/_/sh+yA mA ka nA mA sa mu neHku mA rasta dA b+ha baM tad+bi na ya bra to haM/_/tA be ba me shAkya ku lod+b+ha be pi pU dz+ya s+ya pU dz+yau pi ta rau pra yAt+nAta/_/i ti bi bi d+ha d+har+m+ma mU laM ga di taM su ga te na b+hi k+Sha baHshru
[\[274b.4\]]zhing bsos par byas/_/bdag ni de tshe der gus brtul zhugs can/_/thub pa'i gzhon nu sngo bsangs can der gyur/_/shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs mchod bya bdag gis kyang /_/'bad nas mchod bya pha ma de dag go/_/de ltar rnam mang chos kyi rtsa ba ni/_/bde gshegs kyis gsungs dge slong gis
[\[274b.5\]]twA/_/gu ru se bA bra ta sa dr-i shaM nA mya ma n+yan+ta sad+b+r-it+taM/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM sh+yA ma kA ba dA na me kA d+hi ka sha ta ta maHpal+la
[\[274b.6\]]thos nas/_/bla ma bstan pa'i brtul zhugs dang mtshungs pa/_/dam pa'i spyod pa gzhan dag med par sems/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sngo bsangs can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]baH//_//dA ne na dI na dza na tA bya sa naM ni han+ti shI le na to Sha ya ti sadz+dza na mA na pA ni/_/pradz+nyA ba le na tsa ha ra t+ya bi be ka mo haM bIR+Ye Na bA ra ya ti b+hI ru b+ha yA ni d+hI
[\[275a.2\]]gcig pa'o//_//dman pa'i sbyin pas skye bo dman pa rnams kyi gdung ba sel/_/tshul khrims kyis ni skye bo dam pa'i yid dag tshim par byed/_/shes rab stobs kyis kyang ni dben pa dang bral gti mug 'phrog_/brtson 'grus kyis ni 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs
[\[275a.3\]]raH/_/shrA bas+t+yAM satwa ku sha laM di shaM taM d+har+m+ma shA sa neH/_/dzi naM dze ta ba nA sI naM pa prats+tshur+b+hik+Sha paHpu rA/_/b+ha ga bAn b+ha ba tA sha kro bim+bi shA rash+tsa rash+tsa b+hU pa tiH/_/b+hik+Shush+tsA dz+nyA ta kauN+Di n+yaHpra pi tAHsa
[\[275a.4\]]pa zlog par byed/_/chos kyi bka' yis mnyan yod na/_/dge ba sems can la ston cing /_/rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal bzhugs la/_/dge slong rnams kyis sngon dris pa/_/bcom ldan khyod kyis brgya byin dang /_/sa bdag gzugs can snying po dang /_/dge slong kun shes kauN+Di n+ya/_/bden pa mthong
[\[275a.5\]]t+ya daR+sha naM/_/lak+Sh+ya dwA yaM de ba tA nAM ta thA yu ta tsa tuSh+Ta yaM/_/tat+p+ra saM ge na saM prAp+taM sat+ya daR+sha na bA tra tAM/_/swa b+hA baHsa ha dzo bA yaM gu NaHpu N+yA n+wa yo pi bA/_/dzan+mA b+h+yasta pra sA do bA ta ba bi shwo pa kA ri
[\[275a.6\]]bdag la bkod/_/de yi zhar la lha rnams ni/_/'bum phrag gnyis dang de bzhin du/_/khri phrag bzhi yis bden pa ni/_/mthong ba'i snod nyid rab tu thob/_/kun la phan mdzad khyod kyi 'di/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nam/_/yon tan bsod nams rjes 'gro'am/_/skya bar goms
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]NaH/_/i t+yuk+taM b+hik+Shu b+hiHshru twA b+ha ga bAn+p+ra t+ya b+ha Sha ta/_/sa hA dza ba ga mA b+h+yA sat+pa re pa kr-i ta me ma tiH/_/asmIn+dzan+ma ni kiM tsi traM ma ma satwa hi te ra tiH/_/a s+ya b+hU ta pa dA b+h+yA sat+siM
[\[275b.2\]]pa'i rab dang yin/_/dge slong rnams kyis 'di brjod gsan/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/_/bdag gi blo gros gzhan phan la/_/goms pas lhan cig skyes pa nyid/_/skye ba 'dir bdag sems can la/_/phan par dga' ba ci zhig mtshar/_/rtag tu goms pas seng ge dang /_/glang
[\[275b.3\]]ha has+t+yA di dzan+ma su/_/dak+Shi NA t+yAHpu rA sAr+tha bA hA gA D+ha gra hAsti yaH/_/dzag+murdza la ni d+histI raM sAr+tha lak+Sha dwa yA nu gAH/_/tasmin+kA le dza gad+g+rA sa bya graHkA la i bA sa raH/_/a b+hU ta dza ga rod+b+ha raHphaM phA khyaH
[\[275b.4\]]sogs skye ba 'di la gyur/_/sngon tshe ded dpon lho phyogs pa/_/drag por 'brangs pa'i bud med dang /_/don mthun 'bum phrag gnyis rjes 'brang /_/chu gter dag gi ngogs su phyin/_/de dus dus ni gzhan pa bzhin/_/'gro ba za ba la chags pa/_/'jigs rung lus rgyas sbrul chen ni/_/pham
[\[275b.5\]]s+phA ra bi gra haH/_/te taM sar+b+ba dza na yA saM paM trA sa mi ba duHsa haM/_/bi naSh+Ta d+heR+Ya dr-iSh+TA ba ba b+hU bur+g+ha Ti tA i pa/_/b+ho ge na b+ho gi nA te na sa man+tAd+beSh+Tai ta pa thi/_/niSh+tseSh+TaHkA la bak+t+ra gra bar+t+ti na ste pra
[\[275b.6\]]pa zhes pa byung bar gyur/_/skye bo kun gyi nyon mongs kyi/_/skrag pa bzhin du bzod dka' de/_/mthong nas brtan pa rnam par nyams/_/de dag dkrugs pa bzhin du gyur/_/gdengs can de yi lus kyis ni/_/lam dag kun nas bskor ba'i tshe/_/bsam bral dus kyi kha sgor gnas/_/de dag
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bra kru shruH/_/te ShAM ma she Sha tri da sha sta baiHsha ra Na rA bi NAM/_/A kran+daHsar+b+ba dig+b+yA pI proR+Ya yau ka ru Na swa naH/_/ya shaHke sha ra saM dz+nyo tha siM haH he la gu hA shra yaH/_/taM shap+daM man+da raHshru twAtad+ba
[\[276a.2\]]rnams kyis cho de bton/_/ma lus lha rnams bstod pa yis/_/skyabs pa'i sgra ldan de dag gis/_/cho nge phyogs kun khyab byed pa/_/snying rje'i sgra ni rgyas par gyur/_/de nas seng ge ri phug gnas/_/grags pa'i ral can zhes pa dang /_/de yi grogs po glang po che/_/man d+ha ra
[\[276a.3\]]ya bash+tsakuny+dza raH/_/A san+na trA Na san+nad+d+hau ka ru NA kr-iSh+Ta mA na sau/_/d+hI rA bA dzag+ma tuHsAr+tha saM rak+Sha Na kr-i tra k+Sha mo No/_/ta taHsiM haHsa mA tu h+ya ga dzen+d+raM gi ri bi ga haM/_/be gAn+ne pa t+yA dza ga raM tsa kA ra ga ta dzI bi
[\[276a.4\]]yis sgra de thos/_/rgud pa skyob pa la chas shing /_/yid ni snying rjes drangs gyur pa/_/don mthun skyob la dus byas pa'i/_/brtan pa de dag 'ongs par gyur/_/de nas glang chen ri bo yi/_/lus can dag la seng ges zhon/_/shugs kyis bsnun nas sbrul chen ni/_/srog dang bral ba dag tu
[\[276a.5\]]taM/_/prA Na pra bA sa sa ma yata s+ya ni shwA sa ma ru taH/_/tsa ka ra da ha no b+hA rI b+hAsma sAta siM ha kuny+dza ro/_/ta yoHsha rI ra pU dzA yai ta ta ste sAr+tha nA ya kAH/_/stU paM bi d+hA ya pra ya yurdi shastad+Ya sha pA pa ha/_/a ha me
[\[276a.6\]]byas/_/de yi srog ni 'gro dus su/_/dbugs kyi rlung ni sreg byed dag_/rab tu 'bar bas seng ge dang /_/glang po dag ni thal bar byas/_/de nas ded dpon de rnams kyis/_/de dag lus la mchod pa'i slad/_/mchod rten byas nas de dag gis/_/grags pa dang 'grogs phyogs su song /_/nga nyid de
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]ba ta dA siM haHsAr+tha prA Na pra do b+ha baM/_/ma hA hirde ba dat+to sau shA ri pu trash+tsa kuny+dzu raH/_/tat+ta s+ya sa twa sha shi naHsu kr-i ta pra kA shaM bi shwo ba kA ra tsa tu raM tsa ri taM ma hAr+haM/_/shu twA dzi ne na ka thi taM pra tha mA haR+Sha sta b+hik+Sha
[\[276b.2\]]tshe don mthun la/_/srog ster seng ge dag tu gyur/_/lhas byin dag ni sbrul chen te/_/shA ri'i bu ni glang po che/_/snying stobs zla ba de yi spyod pa legs byas rab tu gsal/_/kun la phan par byed mkhas grags shing chen po dag tu 'os/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos nas dga' ba thob gyur
[\[276b.3\]]baHpra ti pa daM pra sha shaM su re ba/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM siM hA ba dA naM d+b+ya d+hi ka sha ta ta maHpal+la baH//_//tA ra hA ra ba ra
[\[276b.4\]]pa'i/_/dge slong de dag rnams kyis tshig gis so sor rab tu bsngags/_/zhes pa dag pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//do shal rab gsal
[\[276b.5\]]bas+t+ra she kha ra ts+tshat+t+ra tsA ma ra pi ta smi tAHshri yaH/_/di bya b+ho ga su b+ha gAHsu khot+sa baiHsU tsa yan+ti su kr-i taM ma hAt+ma nAM/_/pra br-id+d+ha d+har+m+ma bi b+ha ba pra b+hA bod+b+ha ba daR+sha nAta/_/bismi taM b+hi k+ShusaM g+ha taM ba
[\[276b.6\]]gos mchog cod pan dang /_/gdugs dang rnga yab dkar pos 'dzum pa'i dpal/_/mchog gi longs spyod skal bzang dga' ston gyis/_/bdag nyid chen po'i legs byas gsal bar byed/_/chos kyi 'byor pa rab rgyas pa'i/_/mthu ni rgyas pa mthong ba las/_/ya mtshan dge slong tshogs la ni/_/
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]b+ha She b+ha ga bAn pu ra/_/a prAb+tA nut+ta ra dz+nyA na ma hA so s+ya n+ya dzan+ma ni/_/ba b+hU bur+m+ma ma sAsh+tsaR+YAHsu kr-i ta byaM dza nAHshri yaH/_/badzra ba t+ya b+hi d+hA nA yAM na gaR+YA mut+ta rA pa thi/_/badzra tsaN+Da b+hi d+ho rA
[\[277a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gsungs pa/_/skye ba gzhan la bla med kyi/_/ye shes gzi byin ma thob kyang /_/bdag la ngo mtshar bcas pa'i dpal/_/legs byas gsal bar byed pa byung /_/byang gi phyogs kyi grong khyer dag_/rdo rje can zhes bya bar ni/_/rgyal po phyag na rdo rje
[\[277a.3\]]dzA badzra pA Ni ri bA b+ha bta/_/gang+gA d+hi pa t+ye na ga re me ruM dzi twA ma hI pa tIM/_/tat+pu tAM rau hi nIM nA ma swa su d+hAM shu ri bAp+ta bAn/_/ta s+yA ma dzI dza nat+putraM sa mi tra sa dr-i shaMpra b+haM/_/tsi tra ya s+ya ma Nits+tsha traM sa ha dzA
[\[277a.4\]]bzhin/_/rdo rje gtum po zhes par gyur/_/grong khyer gang gA'i bdag po ni/_/sa bdag lhun po btul nas de'i/_/bu mo snar ma zhes bya ba/_/des thob bdud rtsi'i zer gyis bzhin/_/de yis de la bu dag ni/_/nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bskyed/_/gang la nor bu'i gdugs dag ni/_/bkra ba lhan
[\[277a.5\]]taM bya rA dzata/_/ta s+ya pu N+ya pra b+hA be na sa kalpo pa na taHsa dA/_/di byA b+ha ra Na b+ho gA nu b+ho ge b+hUt+pu ra bA si naM/_/b+ho ga piN+DaiHpri yaiste na yasmat+saM pU ri taM pu raM/_/tasmAt+p+ri ya piN+DA khyaHk+Sh+mA pa te
[\[277a.6\]]cig skyes pas mdzes/_/de yi bsod nams mthu yis ni/_/rtag tu bsams pas nyer gnas pa/_/lha yi rgyan dang longs spyod dag_/grong khyer ba yis nyams myong gyur/_/longs spyod dga' ba'i gong bu des/_/gang phyir grong khyer yongs btang ba/_/de phyir sa bdag sras de ni/_/dga'
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]rab+ha bat+pu taH/_/bi tu raMn+te sa saM prAp+ta rA dz+yAH prA dz+ya ya sha di shAM/_/di de sha sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAM swets+tshe yaM b+ho ga sam+ba daM/_/dur+m+ma ti dur+m+ma tI nA mA man+t+rI ta s+ya bi rak+Sha tAM/_/pra ya yau gu Ni bid+beShaHswa b+hA be hi
[\[277b.2\]]ba'i gong bu zhes par gyur/_/pha yi mjug tu rgyal srid thob/_/grags pa rgyas des phyogs rnams su/_/'byung po kun la rang 'dod kyi/_/longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa bstan/_/blon po blo ngan blo ngan zhes/_/bya ba de la chags bral gyur/_/yon tan can la sdang ba ni/_/bdag nyid ngan
[\[277b.3\]]du rAt+ma nAM/_/me ruM mA tA ma haM ta s+ya gU D+ha le khaiHsa b+hu pa ti/_/pUr+b+bA sa kA rasmi t+ye pa tsa kA ra rasma ron+mu khaM/_/sa dU taiHsa ha sod+b+huta ma n+yu pra dz+wa li taHsa raM/_/pan+di de sha ba lot+sa kAd+d+ho hi traM ni
[\[277b.4\]]pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/de yi ma mes sa bdag ni/_/lhun po'i spring yig rnams kyis des/_/sngon gyi gnod pa dran pa yis/_/g.yul la mngon par phyogs par byas/_/khro ba mchog tu rab 'bar ba/_/'phral la rgyas shing gsod brtson des/_/stobs rab rgyas pas pho nya springs/_/
[\[277b.5\]]d+han d+ya taH/_/dau hi traHsha tru pu tras+t+waM twata pi trA du rAt+ma nA/_/maN+Da laM khaN+Da tAM nI twA hr-i tA kIrti ri bAt+ma dza/_/Ats+tshin+nA mur+b+ba rA me tAM pa prats+tsha swets+tsha yA na tseta/_/swa ya ma b+h+ye t+ya ka ro mi pra t+yan+ta
[\[277b.6\]]bu mo'i bu la rab bstan pa/_/bu mo'i bu khyod dgra yi bu/_/bdag nyid ngan pa khyod kyi phas/_/dkyil 'khor nyams pa khyod byas nas/_/grags pa bzhin du bu mo phrogs/_/ma nyams sa 'di rang 'dod kyis/_/stsol cig gal te ma yin na/_/rang nyid 'ongs khyod mtha' 'khob tu/_/skyabs
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]sha ra NA ti thiM/_/mA tA ma he na pan+deSh+Ta me ta dA kar+N+N+ya b+hU pa ti/_/dza na saM k+Sha ya kA ru N+yAt+taM pra sA da yi tuM ya yau/_/san+d+hi pi gra ha san+nad+d+haHsa nau b+hirdU ra sai ni kaH/_/ma tA ma haM pu ra prA sa gaM gA bu
[\[278a.2\]]pa'i mgron du bdag gis bya/_/ma mes kyis ni rab bstan pa/_/de dag thos nas sa yi bdag_/skye bo rlag la snying rje bas/_/de la dang bar byed du song /_/dmag dpung ring zhing g.yul gyi ni/_/sdums la chas des gru dag gis/_/gang gA'i 'gram na gnas pa yi/_/ma mes
[\[278a.3\]]li na saM shra yaM/_/sA mA t+ya b+h+r-i t+ya brga s+ya ta s+ya saM kalpa lI la yA/_/ud+b+hU taM di byA mA hA raM dr-iSh+T+wA me ru ma hI pa tiH/_/de bo ya mi ti tA ma twA ta dan+tiM ka swa yaM ga twA/_/kaN+Tha gra ho ts+tshad+bASh+paHsar+b+ba rat+nai ra pU dza
[\[278a.4\]]grong khyer dag tu phyin/_/blon po g.yog sde dang bcas pa/_/de yi kun rtog rtse dga' yis/_/lha yi zas ni rab 'khrungs pa/_/sa bdag lhun pos mthong gyur nas/_/'di ni lha zhes nges byas te/_/rang nyid de yi drung song nas/_/mchi ma zag cing mgrin par bzung /_/rin chen kun gyis
[\[278a.5\]]yata/_/pra Na yAN+mA Ni taste na ga twA swa na ga rI ni dzAM/_/di bya b+ho god+b+ha po da graM dzaM bU dwI pa dza naM bya b+hAta/_/tats+tsa taM dzi na pr-iSh+To b+hik+Shu b+hiHsam+pa dam+p+ra ti/_/sar+b+ba dz+nyo pya ba dat+te Shu ta s+ya sam+pat+ti kA ra
[\[278a.6\]]rab tu mchod/_/de yi gus pas mchod pa des/_/rang gi grong khyer phyin nas ni/_/'dzam gling skye bo lha yi ni/_/longs spyod rab rgyas lhag par bsgrubs/_/de spyod phun tshogs la mtshon te/_/dge slong gis dris rgyal ba ni/_/kun mkhyen gyis kyang de dag la/_/de yi phun tshogs rgyu mtshan
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]NaM/_/bA rA Na s+yAM sa bi pro b+hUn+mU li kA khyau n+ya dzan+ma ni/_/te na pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha ro ga glA na s+ya b+hai Sha dza/_/swAs+thA ba d+hI kr-i taM ya tra ts+tshat+t+raM tsA d+h+r-i ta mA ta pe/_/tat+pu N+yAts+tshat+t+ra bAnra dza so b+hUd+d+hi byo pa b+ho ga
[\[278b.2\]]gsungs/_/bA rA Na sIr skye gzhan de/_/bram ze rtsa ba can zhes gyur/_/de yi nad kyis gzir ba yis/_/rang sangs rgyas la sman dag ni/_/bsos pa'i mtshams la thug par byas/_/gdung ba gang la gdugs kyang bzung /_/bsod nams des rgyal gdugs can de/_/lha yi longs spyod
[\[278b.3\]]b+hAka/_/pri ya pr-iN+Do ha me bA sau de ba dat+tash+tsa dur+m+ma tiH/_/shru twe t+yuk+taM b+ha ga ba tA b+hik+Sha bo bisma yaM ya yuH/_/yad+bisma yA ba ha ma ho bi b+ha ba pra b+hA ba di byo ba b+ho ga su b+ha gaM b+hu ba nA d+hi pa t+yaM/_/dIr+g+ha
[\[278b.4\]]snod du gyur/_/nga ni dga' ba'i gong bu de/_/blo ngan de yang lhas byin no/_/zhes pa bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/_/thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur/_/kye ma gang zhig yon tan 'dzin dang 'byor pa'i mthu dang ni/_/lha yi nye bar longs spyod skal bzang srid pa'i bdag po dang /_/yid du
[\[278b.5\]]sa mA bra ya g+ha na bya sa nA ba san+na sam+bA ha nod+d+ha ra Na pu N+ya bi dz-im+hi taM tata/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM pri ya piN+DA ba dA naM t+ya d+hi ka sha ta ta maH
[\[278b.6\]]gnas shing sdug par gyur pa'i gdung bar lhung ba dag_/skyob cing yongs su 'don pa de dag bsod nams rnam 'phrul yin/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dga' ba'i gong bu'i rtogs pa
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]pal+la baH//_//san+mArga saM b+h+r-i ta ma no ra tha sid+d+hi su taHsh+lA g+h+yaHsa taM su kr-i ta nir+m+ma la tIr+th+ya p+lu taH/_/saM sA ra g+ho ra ma ka rA ka rA se tu b+hU taHsata saM
[\[279a.2\]]brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gsum pa'o//_//legs pa'i lam la yid la re ba rab rgyas grub gyur cig_/dam pa'i legs byas dri med 'jug ngogs gtsang ma bsngags par 'os/_/'jigs rung 'khor ba'i chu srin 'byung gnas dag gi zam stegs
[\[279a.3\]]ga e ba shu b+ha sarga ni sarga dU taH/_/shrA bas+t+yAM ka ma lA khya s+ya pu traM gr-i ha pa teHpu rA/_/haM sA b+hi d+haM b+ha ga ba tA yat+ne nAr+ha ta pa de d+h+r-i taM/_/dr-iSh+T+wA pra pA da bi Sha daiHka ru NA lo ka nA mr-i taiH/_/a nu
[\[279a.4\]]gyur/_/dam pa'i grogs nyid dge ba spro ba'i rang bzhin pho nya yin/_/mnyan du yod pa dag tu sngon/_/khyim bdag pad+ma zhes pa'i bu/_/ngang pa zhes bya bcom ldan gyis/_/'bad pas dgra bcom gnas la ni/_/rab dang dri med snying rje yi/_/gzigs pa bdud rtsis bzung mthong nas/_/rjes 'dzin
[\[279a.5\]]gra hA gra ha bya graM ta ma b+hA Shan+ta b+hi k+Sha baH/_/b+ha ga bAn+ku la pu tro yaM pra bra dz+yA pi gr-i hon+mu khaH/_/ba b+hU ba bA sa nA she ShA da shAn+ta bi Sha ya smr-i tiH/_/sa pra yat+ne na b+ha ga ba tA bi ne ya bi na yo dzi taH/_/a
[\[279a.6\]]brtson pas brel 'di la/_/dge slong rnams kyis rab gsol pa/_/bcom ldan rigs kyi bu 'di ni/_/bag chags lhag ma dag gis yul/_/dran pa ma zhi rab byung yang /_/khyim la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur/_/de ni rab 'bad bcom ldan gyis/_/'dul ba dag la rnam par sbyar/_/kye ma
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]ho ma hA nu gra he Na sam+mo ha ra hi taHkr-i taH/_/uk+to haR+Sha mr-i ta sik+tair+b+bi smi te ri ti b+hik+Shu b+hiH/_/tA na b+hA Sha ta sar+b+ba dz+nyo b+ha ga bAn+b+hak+ta bat+sa laH/_/pUr+b+ba ma s+ye Sha ku sha la ma yA yat+nAn+ni bi shi
[\[279b.2\]]rjes bzung chen po yis/_/kun rmongs dag dang bral bar mdzad/_/de skad dge slong ya mtshan zhing /_/dga' ba'i bdud rtsis bran pas zhus/_/gus la mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das/_/thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/_/sngon yang bdag gis dge ba la/_/'di ni 'bad nas rnam
[\[279b.3\]]taH/_/ta po ba ne mu ne ra sau su bra tA khyaHpu rA b+ha bta/_/tasmin+kA le s+phu Ta lA paHsha sha ko haM ta dA shra me/_/tat+ka thA a tA ba shra b+haHprI ti mA na ba si sa dA/_/a thA dr-iSh+Ti ha te kA la shuSh+ka mU la pha lo da
[\[279b.4\]]par bkod/_/sngon 'di dka' thub nags su ni/_/thub pa brtul zhugs bzang zhes gyur/_/de dus de yi gnas su bdag_/ri bong gsal bar smra byed pa/_/de yi gtam la yid gcugs skyes/_/mdza' ba dang ldan rtag gnas gyur/_/de nas char med kyis bcom ste/_/rtsa ba 'bras bu chu bskams
[\[279b.5\]]ke/_/sa b+hUn+mu nir+b+ba nod+be gAd+g+rA mAn+ta ga ma not+su kaH/_/sa ma yA pra Na ye nok+taHsA d+ho ta ba bi pash+tsi taH/_/ta bo ba na pa ri t+yA gaHka thaM yuk+ta sta bo d+ha na/_/bi yo ga bi d+hod+be ga ni mag+na dza na shaM ku lAH/_/
[\[279b.6\]]tshe/_/nags su yid byung thub pa de/_/grong mthar 'gro bar 'dod par gyur/_/bdag gis gus pas de la smras/_/dam pa khyod ni rnam par mkhas/_/dka' thub nor can dka' thub kyi/_/nags ni yongs btang ji ltar rigs/_/rnam mang bral ba'i mya ngan du/_/bying ba'i skye bos gang ba'i khyim/_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]gra ha mo ha gr-i hA yA sa saM gra hA grA ma b+hU ma yaH/_/s+t+rI shr-iM kha lA mu kha ra duHsa ha pu tra pA sha b+h+r-i t+yA ku lA ni bi Di bAn+d+d+ha ba ban+d+hu pA laM/_/t+yak+taM pu naHsbr-i sha ti kaHkha la saM g+ha ro gaM d+hI mAn+g+r-i
[\[280a.2\]]rmongs pa'i gdon gyi nyon mongs kyis/_/bzung bar gyur pa grong gi sa/_/bud med lcags sgrog mu cor bzod dka' bu yi zhags pa dang /_/g.yog 'khor gyis dkrigs brtan pa'i gnyen gyi dra ba dang /_/mi bsrun tshogs pa'i nad dang blo ngan gyis bcings mun chen can/_/btang
[\[280a.3\]]haM ku ma ti ban+d+ha ma hAn+d+ha kA raM/_/bi da d+ha ti mu hur+m+mau haM nA nA bi yo ga g+ha nAHshu tso dra ba Na la ba NA hA rais+t+r-iSh+NA pa raM pa ri bar+d+ha te/_/bi Sha ma bi Sha ya sne hA b+h+yA sairja DI kr-i ta tse ta sAM pra dza ti ku sha
[\[280a.4\]]ba'i khyim la blo ldan su zhig slar yang reg par byed/_/sna tshogs 'bral ba'i mya ngan stug pos yang yang rmongs pa skyed par byed/_/nor ni lan tshwa'i zas rnams dag gis sred pa mchog tu yongs su spel/_/mi bzad yul la chags pa goms pas sems ni blun par byas gyur pa/_/nyon
[\[280a.5\]]laM kle sha k+She tra k+Sha yai ba sa tAM k+Sha yaM/_/na d+hIr+m+ma da bi g+hUr+N+Ni tA bi Sha ya b+ho ga rA gA sa bair+n+na bASh+pa ka li la dr-i shaHpr-i ya bi yo ga d+hU mod+ga mi/_/na dA ha ni ba ha bya thAHka la ha ko pa tA pod+b+ha bair+b+ha
[\[280a.6\]]mongs zhing gi khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi dge ba zad par 'gyur/_/skye bo med pa'i nags su zhi ba'i khyad par dag gis tshim pa rnams/_/yul gyi longs spyod la chags chang gis blo gros myos shing g.yo mi 'gyur/_/mdza' bo dang bral du ba rgyas pas mig ni mchi mas 'khrugs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]ban+ti bi dza ne ba na sha ma bi she Sha sa to Shi NAM/_/gA ma spr-i hA ba nod+beg grA mod+be gAd+ba na smr-i tiH/_/puM sAM pra sa ma bai mu khyAt+p+ra saM ge nai ba dzA ya te/_/grA me ni ya bA me twi mA kA ye ma tiM par+ya kr-i
[\[280b.2\]]gzir dang 'thab mo khro dang gdung ba'i tshogs rnams dag gis sreg mi 'gyur/_/nags las yid phyung grong la chags/_/grong las yid phyung nags tshal dran/_/skyes bu rnams ni rab zhi las/_/phyir phyogs zhar las 'byung ba yin/_/grong gi dul ba'i g.yon la khyod/_/dus min blo gros yongs ma
[\[280b.3\]]thAH/_/prA ge ba bi Sha yasni g+d+ha nad+h+nA ti grA ma saM ga ti/_/i hai ba ta ba kA le na pha la lA b+ho b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_/shud+d+haiHsaM pra ti man+mA saiHkri ya tAM prA NAb+hA ra NaM/_/i t+yuk+t+wA haM sa mA ban+ne bah+nau ni pa ti taHswa yaM/_/sa
[\[280b.4\]]byed/_/grong dang 'grogs pas yul la ni/_/chags rnams thog ma nyid du 'ching /_/dus kyis 'di nyid du ni khyod/_/'bras bu thob pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi sha ni dag pa yis/_/da ni srog gi zungs dag mdzod/_/ces pa brjod nas bdag gis ni/_/nye ba'i me la rang nyid mchongs/_/des
[\[280b.5\]]tsa tUr+N+NaM sa mut+k+Shi pya pa ri Sh+wa dz+ya dza gA da mAM/_/ki me tat+sa ha saM tI braM bi rud+d+haM b+ha ba tA kr-i taM/_/na gats+tshA mi ba nA dasmat+t+wAt+p+rI tirla b+h+ya te ku taH/_/pra Na yA di taM te nok+te byom+ni tsA lo ki te ma yA/_/
[\[280b.6\]]kyang myur du rab blangs nas/_/yongs su 'khyud de bdag la smras/_/gzu lums drag po'i 'gal ba 'di/_/khyod ni ci yi slad du byed/_/nags 'di las ni bdag mi 'gro/_/khyod mtshungs mdza' bo ga las rnyed/_/de yi gus pas de brjod cing /_/bdag gis mkha' la bltas pa'i tshe/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pa pA ta br-iSh+TiHsa ha sA sa pha lA b+hU ra b+hUd+Ya yA/_/pany+tsA b+hi dz+nyA twa mA sA d+yaHsa ta taHsA da ro mu niH/_/mA mu tse shud+d+ha sa twe na ki ma ne na twa ma hI ya se/_/pra Na yA di twa tai nA haM pr-iSh+Tasta tasta ma
[\[281a.2\]]'phral la char ni rab babs pa/_/gang gis sa gzhi 'bras bcas gyur/_/de nas gus bcas thub pa des/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas/_/bdag la smras pa dag pa yi/_/snying stobs 'di yis khyod ci bzhed/_/ces pa de yis gus pas dris/_/de nas bdag gis
[\[281a.3\]]ba da na/_/a ne na tsa ri te nA haM samyak+saM bo d+hi mar+tha ye/_/san+tA ra NA ya dza ga tAM dzi naHs+yA ma n+ya dzan+ma ni/_/ma ye t+yuk+taM sa ma mA ha b+ha bi Sh+ya si ta thA ga taH/_/ya dA tu samyak+saM bud+d+ha sar+b+ba dz+nya s+t+waM
[\[281a.4\]]de la smras/_/bdag ni spyod pa 'di dag gis/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_/skye ba gzhan la 'gro ba rnams/_/bsgral slad rgyal bar bdag gyur cig_/ces brjod de yis bdag la smras/_/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/_/gang tshe yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thams
[\[281a.5\]]b+ha bi Sh+ya si/_/ta dA ma mA n+ya de ha s+ya kar+t+ta byo nu gra has+t+wa yA/_/e tat+ta s+ya ba tsaM sA d+hoHsne ha daM gI kr-i tam+ma yA/_/saM prAp+taHsha sha kaHso ha masminy+dzan+ma ni bud+d+ha tAM/_/su bra tA khyo mu niHsA yaM haM so gr-i ha pa
[\[281a.6\]]cad mkhyen par khyod gyur pa/_/de tshe bdag gi lus gzhan ni/_/khyod kyis rjes su bzung bar bya/_/dam pa de yi tshig 'di ni/_/mdza' bas bdag gis kha yis blangs/_/ri bong de nga skye ba 'dir/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni yang dag thob/_/khyim bdag bu ni dad pa 'di/_/thub pa brtul zhugs bzang
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]tiHsu taH/_/pUr+b+basmr-i t+yai pra yat+ne na prA be taHku sha lam+ma yA/_/pra pan+na bat+sa le ne ti ka thi taM sar+b+ba daR+shi nAM/_/dzi ne na ni dza br-it+tAMn+taM shru twA te bisma yaM ya yuH/_/a bi ka la ku lA la pha la pra sa ba shu b+ha
[\[281b.2\]]zhes pa/_/de yin sngon gyi rab 'bad ni/_/dran nas bdag gis dge la bkod/_/de ltar gus la mnyes gshin pa/_/thams cad gzigs pa rgyal ba yis/_/rang gi sngon byung gsungs pa dag_/thos nas de dag ya mtshan gyur/_/rdza mkhan bzhin du ma tshang med pa'i 'bras/_/skyed byed dge ba'i spyod
[\[281b.3\]]tsa ri teHsa ha bA saH/_/di na pa ti pa ri tsa ya ni tsi ta ru tseHshrI ra sa mA hi ma b+ha saH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ratsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM sha sha kA ba dA naM tsa tu ra d+hi ka sha ta ta
[\[281b.4\]]pas 'di na gnas/_/nyin mo'i bdag dang yongs 'dris btang gyur pa/_/bsil zer mdzes pa'i dpal ni mtshungs med bzhin/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ri bong gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal
[\[281b.5\]]maHpal+la baH//_//krauR+Ye Na ya dwi ra sa nAHshu tsitseSh+Ta tA nAM mi th+yA pa ba da bi Sha maM bi Sha mut+s+r-i dzan+ti/_/te pA pa shA pa pa ri tA pa pa raM pa rAr+t+tAstI bra bya lI ka ti mi raM pi pa raM pi
[\[281b.6\]]'dab ste brgya rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//lce gnyis gang zhig khros pas kun spyod gtsang ma rnams la ni/_/rdzun gyi skyon brjod mi bzad dug ni rab tu spro byed pa/_/sdig dmod yongs su gdung ba rgyud mas gzir ba de dag ni/_/mi bzad 'dod bya min pa'i rab rib khung du
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]shan+ti/_/pu rA rai ba ti ko nA ma kash+mIrai Shu shu tsi bra taH/_/b+hik+ShuHshai la bi hA re b+hUt+sar+b+ba b+hU ta da yA shra yaH/_/ta ru twa tsaHka ShA ye Na sa ka dAts+tsi g+ha Tan+ta re/_/bi bik+ta kA na nod+de sha tsakre tsI ba ra
[\[282a.2\]]'jug par 'gyur/_/kha cher ri yi gnas su ni/_/rai ba ta ka zhes pa sngon/_/'byung po kun la brtse ba'i gnas/_/dge slong brtul zhugs gtsang ba byung /_/nam zhig de yi bum nang du/_/shing shun dur smrig dag gis ni/_/nags tshal dben pa'i phyogs su ni/_/chos gos
[\[282a.3\]]rany+dza naM/_/a trAn+ta re d+he nu bat+sa n+naSh+TA nam+baSh+Nu mA ya yau/_/brAh+ma NaHpi shu ne nA ma go b+hak+Sha dza na shaM ki taH/_/sa dU rAts+tsI ba rats+tshA tha pA ke bah+ni sa mud+ga taM/_/sar+b+ba te d+hU ma mA la kya bat+s+ya pa ka ma ma n+yata/_/ta taHshai
[\[282a.4\]]kha ni bsgyur ba byas/_/skabs der drus ma'i be'u nyams/_/bram ze phra ma can zhes pa/_/skye bo ba glang za bar ni/_/dogs pa dang ldan 'tshol du 'ongs/_/de yi ri las ring po nas/_/chos gos tshos khu 'tshed pa yi/_/me las skyes pa'i du ba dag_/mthong nas be'u btsos par bsams/_/de nas mtshon cha
[\[282a.5\]]laM sa mA ru h+ya sa hi taHshas+t+ra pA Ni b+hiH/_/a b+h+ye t+ya rai ba taM b+hik+ShuM pa prats+tsha bi na yA d+h+wi dzaH/_/ki me ta dAR+Ya kr-i ya te pr-iSh+Taste ne ti gau ra bAta/_/b+ha dra tsI ba ra rA go ya mi ti taM re ba to bra bIta/_/asmin+na ba sa
[\[282a.6\]]lag rnams dang /_/lhan cig gnyis skyes ri la 'dzegs/_/dge slong rai ba ta la ni/_/mngon phyogs dul bas rab dris pa/_/'phags pa 'di dag ci zhig mdzad/_/ces pa de yis gus pas dris/_/bzang po 'di ni gos 'tshed ces/_/rai ba ta yis de la smras/_/gnas skabs der ni sngo med
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]re ta s+yA pUr+b+ba kar+m+ma bi pA ka taH/_/go mAM saM rak+ta sa li la sa pA kaHsa ma pa d+ya taH/_/su kha duHkha twa mA yA ti shukla ma s+ye tikA la tAM/_/bi d+hau bi d+hu ra tAM yA te d+harmo pyA yA t+ya d+har+m+ma tAM/_/mi th+yA bA pa pra ka Ta naM dza na ko
[\[282b.2\]]kyi/_/de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis/_/'tshed pa de ni ba lang gi/_/sha khrag chu dang bcas par gyur/_/sgrub byed 'khrugs par gyur pa na/_/bde ba sdug bsngal nyid 'gyur zhing /_/dkar po dag kyang nag por 'gyur/_/chos kyang chos min nyid du 'gyur/_/rdzun gyi sdig pa gsal byed dang /_/skye bo
[\[282b.3\]]paHpa da ts+yu tiH/_/a pU N+ya pa ri pA kA nA me tat+p+ra t+ya k+Sha la k+Sha NaM/_/do ShaHsa mun+mi Sha ti yA ti gu NaHpra NAM shaM kAR+YaM pi paR+Ya ya mu bai ti bi shIR+Ya te d+hIH/_/puM sAM pU rA bi hi ta duHkr-i ta pA ka
[\[282b.4\]]khro dang gnas nas lhung /_/'di dag bsod nams ma yin pa/_/yongs smin mtshan nyid mngon sum yin/_/skyes bu rnams kyi nyes byas sngon bsgrubs smin pa'i dus su ni/_/skyon rnams rab tu rgyas shing yon tan dag ni nyams par 'gyur/_/bya ba phyin ci log 'gyur blo gros rnam par bslad
[\[282b.5\]]kA le ke ke na nA ma ni pa tan+ti ma hA b+hi g+hA tAH/_/be rud+d+hA mi Sha gan+d+he na ru d+he re Na tsa shaM ki taH/_/so pa sh+yed+b+rAh+ma NaHkum+b+he tsI ba raM mAM sa taM ga ta/_/pra t+yak+Sh+yaM do Sha mA lo kya sa kro d+ha bi kr-i tA kr-i
[\[282b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/mngon par 'joms pa chen pos nges par su dang su mi ltung /_/'gal ba'i sha yi dri dang ni/_/khrag gis kyang ni bsgos pa yi/_/bram ze de yi bum par ni/_/chos gos sha nyid gyur par bltas/_/skyon ni mngon sum mthong gyur nas/_/khro ba'i rnam 'gyur dbyibs
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]tiH/_/ta ma b+hA Sha ta nir+b+hat+s+ya tI bra bai sha sha kaM pi taH/_/a ho ba ta pA dA tsA raHs+thi to yaM bi dza ne ba ne/_/ya s+ye dr-i shA ni kar+m+ma Ni na kash+tsa di ha pa sh+ya ti/_/pra bra dz+yA raM dzi taHkA yaHkr-i yAm+lets+tsha dza no tsi tA/_/
[\[283a.2\]]ldan zhing /_/mi bzad sdig pas 'dar ba des/_/smod cing de la rab smras pa/_/kye ma dam pa'i kun spyod ldan/_/mi med nags su gnas pa 'di/_/gang gi las ni 'di 'dra ba/_/'dir ni su yang mthong ba med/_/rab tu byung bas lus bsgyur cing /_/bya ba kla klo'i skye bor 'os/_/
[\[283a.3\]]dzA nA tits+tshAn+na pA pA nAM kaHkU Ta bra ta shAn+ta taM/_/i t+yuk+to te na sA k+She pa rai ba taHsa ma tsin+ta yata/_/do She pra t+yak+Sha lak+Shesmin+ki bra bI mi ni rut+ta raH/_/ma ma dai bo pa g+hA to ya mi t+yuk+ta go nu ma n+ya
[\[283a.4\]]sdig pa bsgribs pa'i rdzun gyis ni/_/brtul zhugs zhi nyid su yis shes/_/zhes des smod bcas brjod pa'i tshe/_/rai ba ta yis rab bsams pa/_/skyon ni mngon sum mtshon 'di la/_/lan med bdag ni ci zhig smra/_/bdag gi 'di ni lhas bcom zhes/_/brjod kyang su zhig bden par
[\[283a.5\]]te/_/hA s+yA ya ta na tA me ti pra t+yak+ShA pah+na bI dza naH/_/u pas+thi taM sa he sar+b+boM mau na mA la bya ke ba laM/_/a yaM me niHpra tI kA raHsa li lA dag+ni rut+thi taH/_/ngo She gu NA ti sha ya mA shu gu Ne bi do ShaM be yU Sha d+hAm+ni
[\[283a.6\]]'dzin/_/mngon sum gsang ba'i skye bo ni/_/bzhad gad dag gi gnas su gyur/_/mi smra 'ba' zhig la brten te/_/nye bar gnas pa kun bzod bya/_/bdag la bcos su med pa 'di/_/chu las me ni rab tu 'khrungs/_/skyon la yon tan phul byung myur du yon tan dag la skyon/_/bdud rtsi'i
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bi Sha ma bya mr-i taM bi She ba/_/san+daR+sha ya t+ya ni sha mad+b+hu ta rU pa me ba kA len+d+ra dzA la ka ba d+hUr+b+ha bi ta bya teR+Ya/_/i ti tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya mau nAt+k+rud+d+he d+hi kaM dwi dzaH/_/mUr+d+h+ni pA pa mi bas+thU laM la gu DaM sa ma pA
[\[283b.2\]]gnas la dug dang dug la yang ni bdud rtsi ste/_/nges par myong bya dus ni mig 'phrul byed pa'i bud med 'di/_/rtag tu rmad byung rang bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston par byed/_/ces sems de ni mi smra bas/_/gnyis skyes lhag par khros gyur te/_/sdig pa bzhin du sbom pa yi/_/dbyug pa mgo la
[\[283b.3\]]ta yata/_/taM ban+d+h+wA sa b+hU pa ti sa b+hAn+ni twA rak+tA ma gra dzaH/_/tad+bat+sa mAM saM shan+daR+sh+ya tsakre kA rA gr-i hA ti thiM/_/nirdo Sha kle sha mash+nA ti dzr-im+b+ha te gup+ta pA ta kaH/_/kaHka s+ya shud+d+hiM dzA nA ti tsi trA kA re
[\[283b.4\]]yang dag bsnun/_/khrag gis bsgos te sngon skyes de/_/bcings nas sa bdag mdun sar khrid/_/de bzhin sha dang bcas pa bstan/_/btson khang dag gi mgron du byas/_/skyon med dag ni nyon mongs spyod/_/sdig pa sbas pa dar gyur pa/_/dbang med mtshar ba'i rnam pa la/_/su yi dag
[\[283b.5\]]Sh+wa sAk+Shi Shu/_/ni bad+d+he ban+d+ha nA gA re tasmin+kA le na bismr-i te/_/prA pya bat+sA dwi dzaHkiny+tsin+no be daur+dz+ya n+ya ladz+dza yA/_/a tha dwA da sha b+hir+b+baR+Shai byo ma bA NI bo b+hi taH/_/mu mo tsa ban+d+ha nAd+b+hik+ShuM tats+tshi Sh+ya smA ri tau nr-i
[\[283b.6\]]pa su yis shes/_/btson khang dag tu bcings pa de/_/dus kyis brjed par gyur pa na/_/be'u thob nas gnyis skyes ni/_/tshul ngan ngo tshas cang mi smra/_/de nas lo ni bcu gnyis na/_/nam mkha'i skad kyis rtogs byas shing /_/des slob kyis sbran mi bdag gis/_/dge slong bcings pa
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]paH/_/kA rA gA rAt+k+r-i shA kA raHkaM kA la i ba d+hU sa raH/_/Ur+d+h+wa ke sho bi ba sa naHsa pre ta i ba niR+Ya yau/_/a ho grA bA gra le khe na nish+tsa lA kar+m+ma saMn+ta tiH/_/prAp+tA b+hi dz+nyo pi yat+p+ra pa krU ra kle sha ka
[\[284a.2\]]dag las bkrol/_/btson ra dag la keng rus bzhin/_/rid pa'i rnam pa mdog mi sdug_/gos med skra ni gyen du langs/_/de ni yi dgas bzhin du 'thon/_/kye ma rdo steng ri mo bzhin/_/las kyi rgyun ni g.yo ba med/_/gang phyir mngon shes thob pas kyang /_/drag po'i nyon
[\[284a.3\]]dar+tha nAM/_/tI brA nu sha ya saM tap+ta staM dr-iSh+T+wA nan+da b+hU pa tiH/_/ni nan+di man+da pu N+ya twaM pra mA dod+b+hU ta mAt+ma naH/_/sa b+hik+ShuM pa dA pa ti taHpra sA d+yAts+tshA d+ya bA sa sA/_/u bA tsA dz+nyA na
[\[284a.4\]]mongs sdug bsngal thob/_/de mthong sa bdag dga' bo ni/_/drag por 'gyod pas rab gdungs pa/_/bag med las byung bdag nyid kyis/_/bsod nams dman pa nyid la smad/_/de yis dge slong zhabs la gtugs/_/dang byas gos kyis g.yogs nas smras/_/mi shes las
[\[284a.5\]]dzaM do ShaM ma mAR+Ya k+Shak+tu mAr+ha si/_/ta dai ba bat+sa kA sar+b+bai la b+hA te na dwi dzan+ma nA/_/twad+ban+d+ha naM tu pA pa s+ya mo he na ma ma bismr-i taM/_/pa ri dz+nyA taHsa b+hA yaM twa man+da b+hA gyairna ke na tsita/_/
[\[284a.6\]]skyes bdag gi skyon/_/'phags pa khyod kyis bzod par 'os/_/gnyis skyes de yis de tshe nyid/_/be'u dag ni thams cad thob/_/sdig can bdag ni gti mug gis/_/khyod nyid bcings pa brjed par gyur/_/mdun sar khyod ni su yis kyang /_/skal ba zhan pas yongs ma shes/_/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]daN+DaHpa ta ti shud+d+he Shu prAp+ta pA te ma hI pa tau/_/e t+yuk+te k+Shi ti nA the na k+ShAn+ta pra k+ShA li tA sha ya/_/taM rai ba to ba dan+manyurma ma rA dzan+na bi d+ya te/_/na twa pA pa kr-i taM kiny+tsid+pi pu la kle sha bA ti naH/_/tan+ma mo pa na taM
[\[284b.2\]]sa bdag lhung ba thob pa na/_/dag pa rnams la chad pa ltung /_/sa yi mgon pos 'di brjod tshe/_/bzod pas bsam pa rab bkrus pa/_/rai ba ta yis de la smras/_/rgyal po bdag la khro ba med/_/ci yang khyod kyis gnod ma byas/_/nyon mongs rgya cher ltung gyur pa/_/bdag la rang las
[\[284b.3\]]pA ke swA kar+m+ma sa dr-i shaM pha laM/_/yat+sot+kaN+Tha ta yai ba sar+b+ba bi pa daHkur+b+ban+ti kaN+The gra haM sar+b+bA ga pra sa b+ho ga b+ho ga su b+ha gAHkli sh+yan+ti yat+sam+pa daH/_/yat+s+wets+tshan+t+ya su khAspa daM bi ha ra NaM
[\[284b.4\]]mtshungs pa'i 'bras/_/smin pa de ni nye bar gnas/_/gang zhig 'dod ldan nyid kyis rgud pa kun gyi mgrin nas 'dzin par byed pa dang /_/gang zhig phun tshogs yan lag thams cad lhag pa'i longs spyod skal bzang nyams byed dang /_/gang zhig rang 'dod bde ba'i gnas su rnam
[\[284b.5\]]dIr+g+hany+tsa yad+ban+d+ha naM tat+puM sAM ni dza kar+m+ma pA ka sha ba laM saM sA ra bal+lI pha laM/_/i ti brU ba NaM nr-i pa tista ma pa bo tsat+kau tu kAta/_/ta bA pi su ma te ka s+ya pha la me tad+durkar+m+ma NaH/_/sau bra bI da
[\[284b.6\]]par rtse dang gang zhig ring du 'ching byed pa/_/de dag skyes bu rnams kyi rang las 'khor ba'i 'khri shing smin pa'i 'bras bu bkra/_/zhes smra de la mi bdag gis/_/dge mtshan dag la rab smras pa/_/blo bzang khyod kyis 'di yang ni/_/las ngan ci yi 'bras bu yin/_/des smras bA
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]b+ha baM pUr+b+ba bA rA Na s+yAM ku thA b+hi d+haH/_/gau tsau raHkrU ra tsa ri tastan+mAM sa bi hi tA sha naH/_/ka dA tsid+gau bi g+hAt+ta mAM saM mAM b+ha ya bi dru taM/_/gau ra k+ShiNaHsA nu tsa rAHko pAt+sa ma b+hi du dru ruH/_/ta ta
[\[285a.2\]]rA Na sIr sngon/_/ku tha zhes pa gdug spyod can/_/ba lang brku zhing de yi shas/_/zas ni bsgrubs pa dag tu gyur/_/nam zhig ba lang bsad pa yi/_/sha bzung 'jigs nas bros pa bdag_/ba lang bsrung ba 'khor bcas rnams/_/khros pa yis ni mngon par gtses/_/de nas
[\[285a.3\]]sa mI pe ni k+Shi s+ya pra t+ya gra pi shi tam+ma yA/_/pra t+ye ka bud+d+hesh+tsau ro ya mi ti te ShAM pra daR+shi taM/_/sa tairgau ba d+ha pA po gra kro d+haHpi shi ta daR+sha nAtra/_/b+ha d+h+yo ya mi ti yat+ne na ni bad+d+he ban+d+ha ne d+h+r-i taH/_/pash+tsAt+tA
[\[285a.4\]]bdag gis nye bar ni/_/gsar ba'i sha dag rab bkod nas/_/rang sangs rgyas ni chom rkun no/_/zhes pa de dag rnams la bstan/_/ba lang gsod sdig drag pos khros/_/de dag gis de sha mthong nas/_/'bad nas 'di ni gsad bya zhes/_/tshogs pa rnams kyis bcings te bzung /_/de nas 'gyod
[\[285a.5\]]pA da thA b+h+ye t+ya ma yA dwA da sha b+hirdi naiH/_/kr-i ta pA po ha mi t+yuk+t+wA kA rA gA rAt+sa mo tsi taH/_/tat+pA pa ba kaM na ra ke Sh+wa nu b+hU ya ma yA tsi raM/_/dzan+man+Yasmin+na pi prAp+tAHkle sho dwA da shA baR+Shi kaH/_/i t+yuk+t+wA nr-i pa mA
[\[285a.6\]]pas bdag gis ni/_/nyi ma bcu gnyis na song ste/_/bdag gis sdig byas zhes brjod nas/_/de ni btson ra dag nas btang /_/sdig pa de smin bdag gis ni/_/dmyal bar yun ring nyams myong nas/_/skye ba 'dir yang nyon mongs ni/_/lo ni bcu gnyis rab tu thob/_/ces brjod mi bdag la
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]san+t+r+ya pra NA mAp+ta su rA su rA/_/r-id+d+hi pra daR+sh+ya pra ya yau rai ba taHsa ha b+hik+Shu b+hiH/_/a sa t+ya do She Na bi Sha yuk+t+yA pra t+yak+ShA k+Sha ta lak+Sha Ne na/_/a laM ki taHsA d+hU dza naHkha le na kiM bak+ti bi krI ta i baM t+ya
[\[285b.2\]]gsol nas/_/lha dang lha min rab 'dud thob/_/rdzu 'phrul bstan nas rai ba ta/_/dge slong rnams dang lhan cig song /_/bden med skyon gyis bye brag rig pa ni/_/mngon sum du mtshon mi nyams mtshan nyid kyis/_/brlang pos zil mnan skye bo dam pa ni/_/yul gzhan dag tu btsongs bzhin
[\[285b.3\]]de sha/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM rai ba tA ba dA naM pany+tsot+ta ra sha ta ta maHpal+la baH//_//bi dzi gI Sha ba la i ba ta ra sA duHsa haHsaM sA ra sha truM ba
[\[285b.4\]]ci zhig brjod/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rai ba ta'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa lnga pa'o//_//rgyal bar 'dod rnams bzhin du stobs kyis ni/_/bzod dka' 'khor ba'i
[\[285b.5\]]laM ha twA/_/ri pu A sA da yan+ti d+hI rAHprA dz+yAM sad+d+har+m+ma sAm+RA dz+yaM/_/ya dA sU traM b+ha ga ba tA byA khyA taM na ga ro pa maM/_/ta dA sa kau tu kAt+p+r-iSh+To b+hik+Shu b+histA na b+ha Sha ta/_/a b+hU ta ka na
[\[285b.6\]]dgra yi stobs bcom nas/_/dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po ni/_/rgyas pa brtan pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur/_/gang tshe grong khyer lta bu'i mdo/_/bcom ldan gyis gsungs de yi tshe/_/dge slong rnams kyis dge mtshan las/_/dris pa de yis rab gsungs pa/_/grong khyer gser
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]ka ba t+yA khyA dza na swarga pra b+hA pu rI/_/ta s+yA mA sIn+na ra ba tir+D+yu ti mAn+ka na kAb+hi d+haH/_/ta s+ya pra bar+d+hA mA nA yAHprI te rA ya ta naM pa raM/_/pu traHka na ka bar+m+mA b+hUt+su tA ba ka na ka pra b+hA/_/kA le na yau ba nA rU D+hA stan
[\[286a.2\]]can zhes pa ni/_/skye bo mtho ris 'od ldan byung /_/der ni mi bdag 'od dang ldan/_/gser zhes bya ba byung bar gyur/_/de yi dga' ba mchog tu ni/_/rab tu rgyas pa dag gi gnas/_/bu ni gser gyi go cha dang /_/bu mo gser 'od dag tu gyur/_/dus kyis lang tsho la 'dzegs shing /_/
[\[286a.3\]]sta pa ka sho b+hi nI/_/la te ba sA ba b+hau kAn+ta ba san+ta la li tA kr-i tiH/_/bA la prI t+yA pa ri tsi ta stAM man+t+ri ta na yo yu bA/_/kA ma sA rA b+hi d+heHswai ra ma kA ma yata kA mu kaH/_/pra br-it+te puSh+pa sa
[\[286a.4\]]nu ma'i me tog phun bus mdzes/_/mdzes pa de mdzes dpyid kyi ni/_/yid 'ong dbyibs can 'khri shing bzhin/_/gzhon la mdza' bas yongs 'dris pa/_/blon po'i bu gzhon 'od ldan ni/_/'dod pa'i snying po zhes pa yis/_/de la dal gyis 'dod pa bsten/_/me tog dus su rab
[\[286a.5\]]ma ye d+haiR+Ya hA ri Ni yau ba ne/_/b+h+r-iM gaHpra saM ga pany+tsa rI many+dzaR+YA te/_/ta na yAM naSh+TA tsa ri taM dz+nyA twA mA nI ma hI pa tiH/_/tu l+yaM bi bai sha bi Sha ma sho ka kro d+hA na la dwa yaM/_/ka n+yA bi hI nA ni su
[\[286a.6\]]zhugs shing /_/lang tsho can gyi brtan 'phrog tshe/_/snye ma dang 'grogs bung ba ni/_/yang dag rgyu ba su yis zlogs/_/bu mo spyod tshul nyams pa dag_/shes nas sa bdag khengs ldan ni/_/mi bzang mya ngan khro ba yi/_/me gnyis dag la mtshungs par zhugs/_/khengs pa bsten pa rnams la
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]lA ni pu N+yair+b+ha ban+ti mA n+yA n+ya b+hi mA na b+hA dzAM/_/a yA ts+ya yats+tshai ba mu khaM k+Sha Ne na ku laM hi ga n+yA ma li nI ka ro ti/_/shA sa nA da tha b+hU b+har+t+tuHka n+yA man+t+ri su tash+tsa paH/_/A kr-i Sh+ya ba d+h+ya ba su d+hA nI tau shA sa na
[\[286b.2\]]bsod nams kyis/_/mchod 'os rigs ni bu mos dman par gyur/_/bslang bya min par slong ba'i gdong bzhin du/_/skad cig gis ni bu mos rigs nyams byed/_/de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkas/_/bu mo blon po'i bu de yang /_/bka' ni byed pa rnam dag gis/_/blangs nas gsod
[\[286b.3\]]kA ri b+hiH/_/ya tsa mA nau pa ri trA NaM ta tastau ka ru NA ku laH/_/rA dza pu traHswa na ga rAn+ni nA ya na ga raM pa ra/_/ta taHkru d+haHk+Shi ti ba tiHpu traM sha tru mi bot+ka TaM/_/neSh+ka s+ya niHkr-i pash+tsa kre pra t+yan+ta ma ha nA ti
[\[286b.4\]]pa'i gnas su khyer/_/de nas skyabs ni zhu byed pa/_/de dag snying rje rgyas pa yi/_/rgyal sras kyis ni rang grol las/_/grong khyer gzhan pa dag tu khrid/_/de nas sa bdag brtse med cing /_/khros pas dgra ni drag po bzhin/_/bu ni nges par rab bskrad de/_/mtha' 'khob nags kyi mgron du
[\[286b.5\]]thiM/_/pi trA ni ras+t+waHsatwA b+d+hir+b+hA twA tIr+tha ba nA ba nau/_/ra myod+YA nA b+dzi kAn+taM pu raM prA pa sa nirdza naM/_/da daR+shai kA ki nIM ta tra b+ha gi nI ka na ka pra b+hAM/_/khin+nAM dza na bi yo ge na na ga ra pa s+yai ba de ba tAM/_/
