[\[286b.6\]]byas/_/snying stobs chu gter phas bskrad de/_/'jug ngogs nags tshal sar 'khyams nas/_/dga' ba'i skyed tshal pad+ma can/_/mi med grong khyer mdzes pa thob/_/der ni sring mo gser gyi 'od/_/skye bo dang bral skyo ba ni/_/grong khyer dag gi lha mo bzhin/_/gcig pu nyid ni mthong bar gyur/_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]swa b+h+rA ta ri pa ri dz+nyA ya br-i t+yA bASh+pAmU paR+Shi NIM/_/shU n+ya ta kAr NAM te na br-iSh+TA taM pra t+ya b+hA Shata/_/b+h+rA tar+n+nirdza na tAM nI taM pu ra me tat+p+ra hA ri b+hiH/_/ShaSh+Thi sam khyair+m+ma hA g+naiR+Ya k+Shair+n+ya gro d+ha so shra
[\[287a.2\]]de yis stong pa'i rgyu dag dris/_/de yis ming por yongs shes nas/_/mdza' bas mchi ma'i char 'bebs shing /_/de la lan ni rab smras pa/_/ming po n+ya gro d+ha brten pa'i/_/gnod sbyin stobs chen snun byed pa/_/drug cu'i grangs kyi grong khyer 'di/_/skye bo med pa dag tu
[\[287a.3\]]yaiH/_/saM pra t+ya smin k+Sha ye she Sha ba haM man+t+ri shu tash+tsa saH/_/a d+hU nA twad+bA hu ba la pra b+hA bas+t+rA Na me banau/_/i ti swa sur+b+ba tsaHshru twA rA dza pu traHsa mA ga tAM/_/e ka yak+ShA ba she ShAM tsakre yak+Sha ba liM sha
[\[287a.4\]]byas/_/'di brlag lhag ma da lta ni/_/bdag dang blon po'i bu de ste/_/da ni khyod kyi dpung pa yi/_/stobs mthus bdag cag skyob pa nyid/_/ces pa sring mo'i tshig thos nas/_/rgyal po'i bu yis mda' rnams kyis/_/gnod sbyin 'phreng ba 'ongs pa dag_/gnod sbyin gcig gi lhag mar
[\[287a.5\]]raiH/_/sa yak+ShaHko Ta ro nA ma ta me ba sha ra NaM ga taMH/_/pra san+na dA sa b+hA bA s+ya bi da d+he dza ya g+ho Sha NAM/_/pu naHpau riHsa mA kIr+N+Ne pu re tasmin bi p+lu be/_/nr-i paM rA dza su tash+tsa kre man+t+ri sU nuM swa saHpa tiM/_/pu tra b+hA
[\[287a.6\]]byas/_/gnod sbyin ko Ta ra zhes pa/_/de nyid la ni skyabs song zhing /_/'bangs kyi dngos po thob pa des/_/de yi rgyal ba bsgrags pa byas/_/slar yang gang de grong khyer bas/_/khengs shing 'tshe ba med pa na/_/sring mo'i bdag po blon bo'i bu/_/rgyal sras kyis ni rgyal por byas/_/ngo mtshar dang
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]bAM sAsh+tsaR+YaM shru twA tsA rairni be di taM/_/ka na kaHk+Sh+mA pa tirle kha pra Na ye na ni nA yA taM/_/sa bad+d+ha mu ku TaHpi trAt+Yu ba rA dzaHpra tA pa bAn/_/ba she ba sh+yen+d+ra yash+tsakre tsa turdI pa ba tIm+ma hIM/_/shrI mAn+RA
[\[287b.2\]]bcas bu yi mthu/_/nyan rna dag gis bshad thos nas/_/sa yi bdag po gser gyis ni/_/spring yig dag gis 'bad pas bos/_/yab kyis cod pan bcings gyur cing /_/rgyal tshab gzi brjid ldan gyur pa/_/dbang po dbang gyur de yis sa/_/gling bzhi ldan pa dbang du byas/_/'khor ba
[\[287b.3\]]dza ku mA ro sA ba ha me ba ta dA b+ha baM/_/saM sA ra s+yai ba yash+tsakre sha tru bar+g+ga s+ya saM k+Sha yaM/_/ut+sA hA du pa bi sh+ya satwa ru tsi re sad+d+har+m+ma siM hA sa ne shI laSh+NI Sha ba tA bi pe ka sa li la prAp+tA b+hi She ka shri
[\[287b.4\]]bzhin du dgra yi sde/_/gang gis kun tu brlag byas pa/_/dpal ldan rgyal po'i gzhon nu der/_/nga nyid de yi dus na gyur/_/snying stobs mdzes ldan dam chos seng ge'i khri la spro ba yis ni nyer bzhugs shing /_/tshul khrims gtsug tor dang ldan dben pa'i chu yis mngon par dbang bskur
[\[287b.5\]]yA/_/ha twA sha tru pa raM pa rAM pr-i thu b+ha ba kle shA ba lI ma k+Sha yAM sA lab+d+ha pra sha me na bi shwa dza yi nA nir+b+bA Na b+hUr+b+hu dz+ya te/_/na ga ro pa ma ma ma la ta raM nir+b+bA Na yak+Sha san+ni b+hAn+k+le shAn/_/k+Sha pa
[\[287b.6\]]dpal thob pas/_/mi bzad rgya che srid pa'i nyon mongs 'phreng ba brgyud mar gyur ba'i dgra bcom nas/_/rab zhi thob cing kun las rgyal ba dag gis myang 'das sa de spyod par byed/_/gnod sbyin dang mtshungs nyon mongs brlag byas nas/_/shin tu dri med grong khyer lta bu yi/_/mya ngan
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]yi twAp+taM kaish+tsid+b+ha ga ba nug+t+we ti bi ra rA ma saH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ka na ka bar+m+mA ba dA na Sha Da d+hi ka sha ta ta maHpal+la
[\[288a.2\]]'da' ba 'ga' zhig dag gis thob/_/ces pa gsungs nas bcom ldan rnam par gnas/_/zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser gyi go cha'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa drug
[\[288a.3\]]baH//_//gu No spr-i hA na dra pi Ne ka dA tsid+Yo ge b+hi yo gaHpra sa b+haM na b+ho ge_/pu N+yo dz+wa lA naM bi sha dA sha yA nai ra dzo bi rA gA b+hi ra tirna kA me/_/pu N+ya pra b+hA baM b+ha ga bAn+pu N+ya shai lasta thA ga taH/_/
[\[288a.4\]]pa'o//_//bsod nams rab 'bar bsam pa dri med rnams/_/yon tan la chags nam yang nor la min/_/rnal 'byor la sbyor longs spyod dag la min/_/rdul gyi chags bral la dga' 'dod la min/_/bsod nams ri bo bcom ldan 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mthu/_/
[\[288a.5\]]ba b+hA She b+hIk+Shu b+hiHpr-iSh+Tastat+pu N+yA da ra bismi teH/_/bA rA Na s+yaM ma hIM rA dz+nyi brah+ma dat+te pra shA sa ti/_/shud+d+ho da ne gr-i ha pa tiMr+b+ba b+hU ba d+hA na do pa maH/_/ta s+yAr+thi kalpa pr-ik+Sha s+ya sa mu dra ga ma nArdzi
[\[288a.6\]]de yi bsod nams la gus pas/_/ya mtshan dge slong gis dris gsungs/_/bA rA Na sIr rgyal po ni/_/tshangs byin dag gis sa bsrungs tshe/_/khyim bdag zas ni gtsang ma dag_/nor sbyin dang ni mtshungs pa byung /_/rgya mtshor 'gro bas rab bsgrubs pa/_/nor bu mu tig tshogs
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]teH/_/ma Ni mok+ti ka saM b+hA raiHpa ri pUr+N+Na ma b+hUd+g+r-i haM/_/rat+na dwI pAn+ta rA yA taHsa ka dA tsin+ma hI pa tiM/_/draSh+TuM ya yau sa mA dA ya muk+tA hA ra mu pA la naM/_/pra t+yud+ga te na pra Na yAn+ma ni taHsa ma hI b+hu
[\[288b.2\]]rnams kyis/_/slong ba dag gi dpag bsam shing /_/de yi khyim ni yongs gang gyur/_/nam zhig rin chen gling gzhan nas/_/'ongs pa de ni sa bdag la/_/skyes su mu tig do shal dag_/khyer nas blta ru song bar gyur/_/sa bdag sngon du langs byas nas/_/gus pas mchod pa de yis
[\[288b.3\]]dzA/_/tA raM hA raM da dau tasmai lI lA hA sa mi ba shri yaH/_/sa ra smi sU tra saM sak+ta tA ra kA ni ka ro pa maH/_/b+hu mi b+har+t+turgu NI hA rash+tsa kA ra hr-i da ya gra haM/_/asmin+na ba sa re rA dz+nyaHsu ta bA la sa ra swatI/_/
[\[288b.4\]]ni/_/dpal gyi rtse dga' dgod pa bzhin/_/gsal ba'i do shal de la phul/_/'od ldan skud par yang dag chags/_/rgyu skar gyi ni tshogs lta bu/_/yon tan ldan pa'i do shal gyis/_/sa bdag snying ni bzung ba byas/_/gnas skabs der ni rgyal po yi/_/bu mo gzhon nu dbyangs can ma/_/
[\[288b.5\]]su b+hA Shi taM b+ha bya gaM rA har+m+mo saM ga tA dza gau/_/sUk+taM gr-i ha pa tiHshru twA shra ba NA mr-i ta mIp+si taM/_/pra la kAM ku ri tA kA rastasman+ma yaHswa gr-i haM ya yau/_/t+yak+ta hA ra bi hA ro tha su b+hA Shi ta hr-i tA sha
[\[288b.6\]]ba gam can gyi nang song bas/_/legs ldan tshig gis legs bshad blangs/_/rna ba'i bdud rtsi 'dod pa yi/_/legs bshad khyim bdag gis thos nas/_/spu long myu gu'i rnam pa can/_/de yi rang bzhin rang khyim song /_/de nas zas dang rtse dga' btang /_/legs bshad kyis
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]yaH/_/ni drA da ri draHswa gr-i he ba tsi raM ma tsin+ta yata/_/a ho nu rA dza pu t+yAt+ta gI taM sA d+hu su b+hA Shi taM/_/a paR+YA lo tsi te nA pi ye nA mr-i ta mi bAr+b+bi taM/_/ma yA dwA da sha b+hirbaR+Sho rbi
[\[289a.2\]]ni bsam pa phrogs/_/gnyid gyis dbul ba de yis ni/_/rang gi khyim du yun ring bsams/_/kye ma rgyal po'i bu mo des/_/legs pa'i legs bshad glur blangs pa/_/gang de yongs su ma spyad kyang /_/bdud rtsi dag ni byin pa bzhin/_/bdag gis lo ni bcu gnyis kyis/_/
[\[289a.3\]]pu lo rat+na sany+tsa yaH/_/saM prAp+taHsUk+ta rat+naM tu na ku tash+tsi du pArdzi taM/_/rat+naiHki mash+ma gu ru b+hiHpra yat+na gu ru sam tsi taiH/_/san+mArga lo ka ne rat+naM tad+bi d+han+tu su b+hA Shi taM/_/i ti saM tsi t+ya pu
[\[289a.4\]]rin chen tshogs ni yangs pa dag_/thob de legs bshad rin chen ni/_/'ga' zhig las kyang nyer ma bsgrubs/_/'bad pa brgya yis bsags pa yi/_/rdo lci rin chen rnams kyis ci/_/dam pa'i lam ni gsal byed pa'i/_/legs bshad de ltar rin chen yin/_/zhes pa bsams nas
[\[289a.5\]]ru ShaM bi sr-i dz+ya nr-i pa man+di raM/_/sa tsakre rA dza du hiHtu sUk+ta yats+nyA ma yA tsa kaH/_/sA ba b+hA Shesmi ta mu kha'i suk+taM mu le na la b+h+ya te/_/ta s+yAr+g+ha tu l+yaM dra bi NaM dI ya tAM ya di shAkya te/_/yA bad+d+wA
[\[289a.6\]]mi bdag gi/_/khang par skyes bu rab btang ste/_/legs bshad rgyal po'i bu mo las/_/slong ba po min de yis bslangs/_/'dzum pa'i bzhin ldan des smras pa/_/legs bshad rin gyis thob par 'gyur/_/de yi rin dang mtshungs pa'i nor/_/gal te nus na sbyin par mdzod/_/ji srid
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dasha b+hir+b+baR+Shoste na sad rat+na saMny+tsa yaH/_/ni hi taHsat+ya shI le na pa N+yAr+ho sau sa mar+b+bi tAM/_/e tad+b+hU pA la du hi tuHsan+de shaM dU ta b+hA Shi taM/_/shru twA gr-i ha pa tiHsar+b+ba rat+nA n+yA dA ya sA dA raH/_/swa yaM
[\[289b.2\]]lo ni bcu gnyis su/_/bden pa'i ngang tshul de yis ni/_/rin chen dam pa'i tshogs bsgrubs pa/_/rin du 'os pa de sbyin mdzod/_/sa skyong bu mo dag gi 'phrin/_/'di dag pho nyas bshad pa ni/_/thos pas khyim bdag gus bcas pas/_/rin chen thams cad blangs byas nas/_/rang
[\[289b.3\]]rA dza gr-i ha ga twA da twA sau tri Na lI la yA/_/sUk+ta rat+naM ta dA dA ya pa pA Thot+kaN+Tha to mu huH/_/yad+Yat+kiM tsit+su kha ma nu pa maM bA h+ya mA b+h+yan+ta raM bA yo yaHsatwa pra sa pa bi la sad+bisma yaHsid+d+hi yo gaH/_/ye ye
[\[289b.4\]]nyid rgyal po'i khyim song ste/_/de la rtswa yis rtse dga' byin/_/de tshe legs bshad rin chen thob/_/dga' bas yang dang yang du brjod/_/gang gang phyi 'am nang gi bde ba dpe med chung zad dag dang ni/_/gang gang snying stobs kyis bskrun ya mtshan rgyas pa grub pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/gang gang
[\[289b.5\]]tr-i Sh+NA pra sha ma bi ma lA san+ta tA nan+da lA b+hAHpA kot+sik+ta sa sa pha la b+ha raHpu N+ya kalpa dru ma s+ya/_/au dAR+Ya ni d+hi nA te na sar+b+ba rat+na su b+hA Shi taM/_/gr-i hI taM nr-i pa ti shru twA taM pa prats+tsha sa bisma yaH/_/rat+nA
[\[289b.6\]]sred pa rab zhi dri med rgyun du dga' ba thob pa dag_/de des bsod nams dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu smin cing rgyas pa'i khur/_/rgya cher gyur pa'i gter de yis/_/rin chen kun gyis legs bshad ni/_/blangs pa thos nas mi yi bdag_/ya mtshan bcas pas de la dris/_/ci slad
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]ni kasmA dut+s+r-i dz+ya sUk+ta mA tra mi daM twa yA/_/gr-i hI taM bA li kA bA kya sa ra laHpra t+ya yId+bAn/_/pUr+N+NA su b+hA Shi ter+b+hU mir+d+ha naM kr-its+tshe Na la b+h+ya te/_/na b+hak+ta bi ra he b+huk+taM sUk+te na ke na tsi ta/_/
[\[290a.2\]]rin chen rab btang nas/_/legs bshad tsam ni khyod kyis bzung /_/bu mo 'di yi tshig dag la/_/drang po khyod ni yid ches ldan/_/legs bshad kyi ni sa gzhi gang /_/nor ni tshigs chen dag gis 'thob/_/zas dang bral na su zhig gis/_/legs bshad dag ni bza' bar nus/_/
[\[290a.3\]]i ti shru twA gr-i ha pa tiHsne ha duk+tam+ma hI b+hu dzA/_/sUk+ta lA b+he na ma ha ta su tuSh+Tasta ma b+hA Sha ta/_/rA dzan+kiM kri ya te rat+naiR+Ya rak+ShA bi nA shi b+hiH/_/sar+p+pA NA mi ba yaiHpuM sAM rA ga dwe Sha bi Sho da yaH/_/
[\[290a.4\]]zhes pa sa bdag mdza' ba yis/_/brjod pa khyim bdag gis thos nas/_/legs bshad rnyed pa chen po yis/_/tshim pas de la rab smras pa/_/gang gis sprul bzhin skyes bu la/_/chags sdang dug ni skyed byed pa/_/rgyal po 'bad bsrungs nyams pa yi/_/rin chen dag gis ci zhig bya/_/
[\[290a.5\]]bai ma l+yo ba tsi tAM ru tsiM ra tsa ya taHsan+mArga dI po pa mAM b+ha byA naM hr-i da ye su b+hA Shi ta ma NergA d+he gu NA lam+bi naH/_/pA kot+tIr+N+Na su bar+N+Na sun+da ra pa da prAp+ta pra ban+b+has+thi tairmU l+yaM sA ga ra me kha lA ba su ma
[\[290a.6\]]legs bshad nor bu legs ldan rnams kyi snying gar brtan pa'i yon tan gyis brtags shing /_/dam pa'i lam gyi sgron ma dang mtshungs dri med rgyas pa'i 'od zer spro byed pa/_/'tshed pa las thar gser bzang mdzes pa'i gnas la rab sbyar gnas pa thob pa yi/_/rin de nor gyi blo gros rgya mtsho'i
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]tI pA dAM sha ko pya bya kaM/_/i ti shrI man+g+r-i ha pa tiHr+n+ni ga t+ya ku sha lo d+ya taH/_/su bar+N+Na pa tra li khi taM sUk+taM dik+Shu n+ya be sha yata/_/shud+d+ho da no gr-i ha pa tiHso ha me ba ta dA b+ha ba/_/sUk+teHpu N+yo pa
[\[290b.2\]]ske rags dang ldan rkang pa'i cha la'ang chung /_/zhes te dpal ldan khyim bdag ni/_/dge la brtson ldan phyir thos nas/_/gser gyi glegs bu la bris te/_/legs bshad phyogs rnams dag tu springs/_/de yi tshe na nga nyid ni/_/khyim bdag zas gtsang der gyur te/_/legs bshad bsod nams
[\[290b.3\]]de shAr+thi sar+b+ba ni nA bi pA da raH/_/shA ri pu tro pya yaM b+hik+ShuHsA b+hU pa ti su tA b+ha pata/_/i t+yu bA tsA khi la dza gad+ku sha lA ya ta thA ga taH/_/Ar+yaHkan+daHku sha la na li nI mU la ban+d+ha pra sU ternA nA sam+pan+na ban ba
[\[290b.4\]]nyer ston pa'i/_/don la bdog kun btang bas gus/_/dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di yang /_/sa bdag bu mo der gyur to/_/zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/'gro kun dge ba'i slad du gsungs/_/dge ba'i pad+mo can ni rtsa ba btsugs nas rab skyed dang po'i rgyu/_/sna tshogs phun tshogs gsar
[\[290b.5\]]la tA saM b+ha bo d+yA na b+hU miH/_/tr-iSh+NA tA pa pra sha ma na hi ma sme ra gaM gA pra bA haHsan+mArgA gra pra ka Ta na pa TuHpu N+ya me ba pra kA shaH/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA pa dA nakalpa la tA yAM
[\[290b.6\]]pa gsar pa'i 'khri shing rab skyed skyed tshal sa/_/sred pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi byed kha ba'i 'dzum ldan gang gA'i rgyun/_/dam pa'i lam mchog gsal bar byed mkhas snang ba dag ni bsod nams nyid/_/ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]shud+d+ho da nA ba dA naM sap+tot+ta ra sha ta ta maH pal+la baH//_//e ShA dzi nen+d+ra bi hi to ru bi hA ra tsa ye tsai t+yAM ga Ne ka na ka tsi tra gu hA gr-i he Shu/_/ne tra mr-i ta pra
[\[291a.2\]]bsam gyi 'khri shing las zas gtsang ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa bdun pa'o//_//rgyal ba'i dbang pos bsgrubs pa gtsug lag khang chen dag gi tshogs/_/mchod rten khyams su gser gyi ri mo'i phug gi khang par ni/_/sangs rgyas rtogs
[\[291a.3\]]tsi ta le pya ma yI ba b+hU ba bud+d+hA ba dA na bi bi d+hAd+b+hu ta kalpa bal+li/_/ai be yaM ku sha lA ya pUr+N+Na su kr-i te tsi tre bi hA re sa traM k+She men+d+re Na bi she Sha tsi tra ra tsa nA ra myA ba dA nA ba lI/_/
[\[291a.4\]]brjod rnam mang rmad byung dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di/_/mig gi bdud rtsi rab skyed yi ge'i rang bzhin dag tu 'khrungs/_/legs byas kyis gang bkra ba'i gtsug lag khang du dam pa rnams ni dge ba'i slad/_/khyad par gyis ni bkra bar bkod cing dga' ba'i rtogs brjod 'phreng ba gzugs can dag_/
[\[291a.5\]]A kalpaM pra ti mA sa ha sra bi ka sat+pu N+ya pra ban+b+ho dz+wa la mA b+hUt+tad+bi ra hA ku laM dza ga di ti byak+taM pra tiSh+ThA pi tA/_/sap+tot+ta ra sha ta me tat+te na kr-i taM bo d+hi satwa tsa ri tA nAM/_/mad+ga la sa
[\[291a.6\]]stong phrag rnam gsal bsod nams rab sbyar 'bar ba de nyid dge ba'i dbang po yis/_/bskal pa'i bar du 'gro ba de bral 'khrugs par ma gyur cig ces gsal bar bkod/_/de yis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/_/brgya rtsa bdun po 'di dag byas/_/bkra shis grangs
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]khyA pU ra Na me kaM kAR+YAM pra yat+ne na/_/so men+d+ra nA mA ta na yo tha ta s+ya ka bits+tshan+nak+kA ba rA nA ma d+he yaH/_/asmin+dzi no dA re ka thA pra ban+d+he saM pU ra yi Sh+ya t+ya ba dAn she ShaM/_/ban+d+haHke ra la kA mi nI ka tsa b+ha rA kA raHpa raM
[\[291b.2\]]ni rdzogs pa la/_/gcig ni rab tu 'bad pas bya/_/de nas bla dbang zhes pa de yi bu/_/ming gzhan nA ko zhes brjod snyan dngags mkhan/_/rgyal ba'i gtam rgyud rgya che sbyar ba 'dir/_/rtogs pa brjod pa lhag ma skong byed gyur/_/mtshams sbyor ke ra la yi bu mo'i skra tshogs rnam pa mchog tu yang
[\[291b.3\]]saM ha taHkAM rI kAn+ta ka po la ko ma la ta raHko pi pra sA do da yaH/_/kAr+N+NA TI na ya nats+tsha TA pa ri tsi tA kar+NAn+ta rA saM gi nI b+haM giR+Ya s+ya ta raM gi NI ra sa ni d+her+b+ban+d+yaHsa sUk+to da d+hiH/_/oM kA rat+ku Ti la twa me
[\[291b.4\]]dag 'brel/_/ci yang rab tu dang ba rgyas pa ke ri'i mdzes ma'i 'gram pa shin tu mnyen/_/ro yi gter gyur gang gis 'khyog tshig g.yo ldan kar+Na Ta ma'i mig gis zer/_/yongs 'dris rna ba'i bar du 'grogs ldan legs bshad chu gter de ni phyag byar 'os/_/gang gis oM yig dag las gya
[\[291b.5\]]ba pa ra maM yaiHshik+Shi taM nA pa raM ye ShAM swasti ba daM ka dA tsi da pi na spr-iSh+TaM mu khAn+nirga tAM/_/kro d+hA d+h+mA ta ta yA bi bar+N+Na ba da nA tI brA pa rA d+ho pa yaM te bi d+yA ni d+ha maHka thaM br-i thu ka thaM kA byaM k+Sha man+te kha lAH/_/
[\[291b.6\]]gyu kho na mchog tu bslabs kyis gzhan pa yin/_/gang gi kha nas swasti'i tshig ni gsal ba nam yang nges par mi 'byung zhing /_/khro ba 'bar bas bzhin ni mdog bral mi srun rig byed gter gyur de dag gis/_/drag po'i gnod pa bzhin du rgya che gtam gyi snyan dngags dag ni ji ltar bzod/_/
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]kr-i twe mA ma ba dA na kalpa la ti kAM k+She men+d+ra nA mA ka biHsad+d+har+m+ma pra Ni d+hA na me ta da d+hu nA d+hat+te d+hi yAd+d+hI d+ha naH/_/pu N+yaM yat+sa mu pArdzi taM dzi na gu NA khyA Na pra ban+d+hat+ma yA b+hU yat+te na sa map+ta
[\[292a.2\]]dge dbang zhes pa'i snyan dngags mkhan gyi rtogs brjod dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di byas nas/_/da ni dam pa'i chos kyi smon lam 'di dag blo gros nor ldan blo yis 'dzin/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan sgrogs byed bsdebs las bdag gis bsod nams gang zhig nyer bsgrubs pa/_/
[\[292a.3\]]satwa ku sha le ni t+yo d+ya to yaM dza naH/_/saM sA ro ru pa ri shra ma s+ya da d+ha taHkA mA pa ba k+ShI ba twaM mo hasmA ha ta mo ni mI li ta dr-i shaHsup+ta s+ya lup+ta smr-i teH/_/san+nad+d+haM dza ga taHpra bo d+ha na bi
[\[292a.4\]]de yis skye bo 'di ni sems can mtha' dag dge la rtag tu brtson gyur cig_/'khor bas che bar yongs su ngal zhing 'dod pa'i chang gis myos pa nyid 'dzin la/_/gti mug rgyas pa'i mun pa dag gis mig zum nyal zhing dran pa nyams pa yi/_/'gro ba rab tu rtogs par bsgrub la chas shing
[\[292a.5\]]d+hau niHshe Sha do ShA pa haM b+hA swan+taM b+ha ga ban+ta me ba sa ta taM bud+d+haM pra bud+d+han+na maH/_/A nan+da ban+d+hu ma sa kr-it+p+r-i thu mA na sA nAM sUk+taM shu b+hir+b+ba hi ta sar+b+be su kho pa de shaM/_/k+She men+d+ra mu dz+wa la ni dzA b+hi dza
[\[292a.6\]]skyon rnams ma lus 'joms byed pa/_/'od dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan sangs rgyas rab tu sad pa nyid la rtag tu bstod/_/kun dga'i gnyen gyur lan cig min par rgya che yid can la/_/legs bshad 'od kyi bde ba kun gyi nye bar bstan pa sgrub/_/dri med rang rig chu gter dag gi zla ba dge ba'i
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]nAb+d+hi tsan+d+raM kIr+t+tipra kA sha dza na kaM dza na kaM na mA mi/_/bAk+pA ka pA ba na ni d+hA na dzi nA ba dA na nir+m+mA Na pu N+ya ka la nA ku sha lA b+hi yo ge/_/asmrin+k+r-i taHsu kr-i ta nA di sha tA ni yo gaM saM pU ra NA ya gu ru NA ma
[\[292b.2\]]dbang /_/grags pa gsal ba skyed byed yab la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa dag byed tshig ni smin pa'i gter/_/sprul byed bsod nams rtag pa dge ba'i mngon par sbyor ba 'di/_/bla ma legs byas ldan pa bka' ni rab tu sbyin mdzad pas/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i
[\[292b.3\]]ma saM bi b+hA gaH/_/ye ShAM su bar+NA pra ti ma pra tA nA dzi nA ba dA nA n+ya b+ha ban+gu hA su/_/saM sak+ta ne trA mr-i ta tsi tra tsi trAHkA le na te te pi ga tA bi hA rAH/_/sa ra tI tU li ka yA bi tsi tra bar+N+Na kra mai
[\[292b.4\]]slad du bdag la skal ba'i cha shas mdzad/_/gang zhig phug tu rgyal ba'i rtogs brjod dang /_/gser gyi gzugs[(] brnyen[,]brnyan [)] rab tu rgyas par gyur/_/mig gi bdud rtsi bkra ba'i ri mo chags/_/de ni gtsug lag khang ni dus kyis 'da'/_/dbyangs can pir gyis rnam par bkra ba yi/_/rtogs pa brjod
[\[292b.5\]]rul+le khi tA ba dA naH/_/tA te na yo yaM bi hi to ma hAr+theHsan+nan+da na pu N+ya ma yo bi hA raH/_/na ta s+ya nA shosti yu ga k+Sha ye bi dza lA na lol+la si pa ri p+la be na/_/dik+Shu pra tiSh+ThA d+hi ta pusta kA lI s+thI ra pra
[\[292b.6\]]pa yi ge'i rim pas bris/_/gang 'di bsod nams rang bzhin gtsug lag khang /_/don chen dam pa dga' byed yab kyis bsgrubs/_/phyogs su po ti'i 'phreng ba rab bkod pa'i/_/gzugs brnyan tshogs ni brtan pa rab chags pa/_/de ni chu dang mes bskyed nyer 'tshe yi/_/dus bzhi 'jig
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]sak+ta pra ti mA ga Na s+ya/_/tasmin+ma yA s+ya k+Sha ya puN+ya lo b+hA de kA ba dA na pra ti mAr+p+pi te yaM/_/ma hAt+ma nAM pro D+ha pa dA nu sA rI swalpo pya yat+ne na ma ha twa me ti/_/mA d+huR+Ya d+huR+Ya ma mra ta shru ti
[\[293a.2\]]kyang nyams pa yod ma yin/_/de la rtogs brjod gcig gi gzugs brnyan 'di/_/mi zad bsod nams la chags bdag kyang 'god/_/bdag nyid chen po der gnas rjes 'brang ba/_/shin tu chung yang 'bad med chen por gyur/_/thos pa'i skyogs kyis btung bya'i bdud
[\[293a.3\]]shuk+ti pe ya mA mo da pad+ma mu kha pad+ma pa de d+h+wa nan+tI/_/b+h+r-ing+gAd+ga nA mi ba pi tuHpra Ni pa t+ya bA NIM saM pU ra yA mi pr-i thu kA bya bi shi Sha she Sha ma/_/kAn+tAM nU ta na saM ga mot+sa ba ba tIM di bya pra b+hA bi shri yaM tA
[\[293a.4\]]rtsi snyan pa dag gi rgyun/_/dri bzang khang pa bzhin gyi pad+mo'i gnas su sgrogs byed pa/_/bung ba'i na chung dang mtshungs yab kyi skad la btud nas ni/_/snyan ngag rgya che'i khyad par lhag ma bdag gis rdzogs par byas/_/mdzes ma gsar du 'grogs pa'i dga' ston can dang lha yi mthu ldan
[\[293a.5\]]ru N+yA b+ha ra No pa b+ho ga la ha riM t+yak+t+wa tr-i Na krI Da yA/_/prA NA trA Na bi d+ho pa ra s+ya kr-i pa yA kur+b+ban+ti yai sA da rA nir+b+yA dzA ni dza de ha dA na ma tsa lAstA ne ba ban+dA ma hai/_/ba b+hU ba kAny+tsa na pu re shrI
[\[293a.6\]]dpal dang ni/_/dar bab rgyan gyi nye bar longs spyod rba rlabs rtswa yi rtse dga' btang byas nas/_/gus bcas gang dag brtse bas gzhan gyi srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la rang gi lus/_/zol med sbyin par byed la g.yo ba med pa de la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan rig pa 'dzin pa'i
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]man+bi d+ya d+ha re shwa ra/_/dzI mU ta ke turdzI mU ta i ba tA pa ha ror+thi nAM/_/ya s+ya kalpa dru mod+b+hU tAHpa dA na ba na bAHshri yaH/_/tsa kA shi re ye shaHpuSh+pAHpuN+ya sau ra b+hA nir+b+ha rAH/_/dzI mU ta bA ha nasta
[\[293b.2\]]dbang /_/sprin gyi tog ni sprin bzhin du/_/slong ba'i gdung ba 'phrog pa dag_/grong khyer gser du byung bar gyur/_/gang gi dpag bsam shing las 'khrungs/_/rtag tu gsar pa gsar pa'i dpal/_/grags pa'i me tog bsod nams kyi/_/dri bzang rgyas pa rnam par mdzes/_/chu gter la ni zla ba bzhin/_/
[\[293b.3\]]s+ya pu trash+tsan+d+ra i bo da d+heH/_/a b+hU da t+yu gra pu N+yA nI pra t+ya gra i ba sany+tsa yaH/_/gu Na bAn+bi na ye ne ba t+yA ge ne ba bi b+hU ti mAn/_/sa ba b+hau te na pu tre Na su kr-i ta ne ya sadz+dza naH/_/kalpa dru maM sa sA ma rA dz+ya pu trA
[\[293b.4\]]sprin gyi bzhon pa de yi sras/_/shin tu lhag pa'i bsod nams rnams/_/gsar du tshogs pa bzhin du gyur/_/dam pa'i skye bo legs byas dang /_/yon tan ldan pa dul bas dang /_/'byor pa ldan pa gtong bas bzhin/_/de ni sras po de yis mdzes/_/de yis bu la dpag bsam shing /_/rgyal
[\[293b.5\]]ya pra ti pA d+ya saH/_/ta pa se shAn+ti ni la yaM bi pe kA ma la yaM ya yau/_/dzA yA sa khe shri yaM t+yak+t+wA yA te tA te ta po ba naM/_/dzI mU ta bA ha naHprAp+ta bi b+ha baHsa ma tsin ta yata/_/gu ru se bya bi yuk+ta s+ya ma
[\[293b.6\]]srid che dang bcas btang nas/_/dka' thub slad du zhi ba'i gnas/_/ma la yar ni dben pas song /_/yab ni btsun mo dang 'grogs te/_/dpal btang dka' thub nags song tshe/_/sprin gyi bzhon pa 'byor pa dag_/thob pa yis ni rab bsams pa/_/bla ma bstan pa dang bral ba/_/bdag la
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]ma niHsu kha tAM ga tA/_/i yaM shrIrne tra hI na s+ya tsi trag le ba niHpha lA/_/tA ta s+ya pA da pa ta ne na kha rash+ma mA lA bi b+h+ra dza mAn mu ku Ta s+ya ya thA pu rA b+hUta/_/tats+tshA sa na shra pa Na kuN+Da la maN+Di ta
[\[294a.2\]]dpal ni bde med gyur/_/mig gis dman pa dag la ni/_/ri mo'i gnas dag 'bras med bzhin/_/yab kyi zhabs la gtugs tshe sen mo'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba yis/_/rnam par mdzes pa'i cod pan dang ldan de yi bka' nyan pa'i/_/rna rgyan gyis brgyan dpal ni ji ltar bdag la
[\[294a.3\]]s+ya no tsakra bar+t+ti bi b+ha be d+ya ta thA ma ma shrIH/_/i t+ya saM tsi t+ya sa ni dzaM kr-i twA ka na ka baR+Shi NaM/_/sar+b+ba lo ko pa gA rA ya san+nad+d+haM kalpa pA da paM/_/prA dz+yaM sAm+RA dz+ya mut+p+r-i dz+ya pra ya yau pi tu rA shra
[\[294a.4\]]sngon gyur pa/_/da lta 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'byor pa dag la de lta med/_/ces bsams de yi 'jig rten ni/_/kun la phan slad rang nyid kyis/_/dpag bsam rkang 'thung gser gyi char/_/'bebs pa dag tu bstar byas nas/_/rgyal srid chen po rab btang ste/_/yab kyi bsti gnas dag tu
[\[294a.5\]]ma/_/trai lokya sA ra mai shwaR+Ya tr-i NaM bi pu la tse ta sAM/_/tasmin+sAm+RA dz+ya mut+p+r-i dz+ya pra yA te ma la yA tsa laM/_/hem+nA kalpa dru maHpr-i thIM pa ri pUR+Ya di baM ya yau/_/gi raM dzi mU ta bA ha naHprA s+ya shrI khaN+Da maN+Da
[\[294a.6\]]song /_/'jig rten gsum gyi snying po yi/_/dbang phyug sems yangs rnams la rtsa/_/rgyal srid chen po btang nas de/_/ma la ya yi rir song tshe/_/dpag bsam ljon pas sa gzhi ni/_/gser gyis yongs bkang mkha' la song /_/sprin gyi bzhon pas ri bo ni/_/dpal gyi dum bus brgyan
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]naM/_/bi yo ga tA pa ta tA dzi bi trauHbA dAb+dza se ba yA/_/a trAn+ta re tsan+da na bal+la rI NAM di de sha bA lA ni la lo la tI nAM/_/uts+tsh+wA bi ni nA ma b+hi lA Sha br-it+taM dzr-iM b+hA dzu ShaM kA ma su hr-id+ba san+taH/_/a dak+Shi
[\[294b.2\]]par phyin/_/pha ma'i zhabs pad bsten pa yis/_/'bral ba'i gdung ba rab tu btang /_/skabs der tsan+dan 'khri shing rlung gzhon gyis/_/bskyod cing shugs ring glal ba bsten rnams la/_/'dod pa'i grogs por gyur pa dpyid kyis ni/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i spyod tshul rab tu bstan/_/khyo bral
[\[294b.3\]]Na pro Shi ta kA mi nI nAM ba po mu hurdak+Shi Na mA ta ri shwAM/_/dza gadz+dza yA ye ba dz+ha Sha d+h+wa dze na bA ya bya mas+t+raM sa ha sA pra yuk+taM/_/a sU tra NaiHShaD+pa da maN+Da lA naM g+ha na pra sU nairgu ru tAM pra yA tAH/_/tsU ta dru mAsh+tsakru
[\[294b.4\]]'dod ldan ma yi mi mthun phyogs/_/lho phyogs rlung ni yang yang rab tu ldang /_/'gro la rgyal slad nya yi rgyal mtshan gyis/_/rlung gi mtshon ni 'phral la rab sbyar bzhin/_/rkang drug dkyil 'khor dag gis ma spras pa/_/stug pos rgyas pas lci ba nyid gyur pa'i/_/tsU ta'i shing gis mi phyed
[\[294b.5\]]ra b+hin+na mu drA ban+d+he na yU nA ma b+hi lA Sha dIk+Sh+yA/_/ba san+ta lak+Sh+mI shra ba NA ba taM pAsh+tsa kA shi rai la ta TI Sh+wa sho kAH/_/pA da pra hA rai ri ba nA ga rI NAM saM krAn+ta rA gA na ba pal+la be Shu/_/d+ha n+ya s+ya kAn+tA ba da nA ba be na ma
[\[294b.6\]]phyag rgya bcings/_/lang tsho can la mngon 'dod bslab pa byas/_/dpyid kyi dpal mo dag gi rna ba'i rgyan/_/ri bo'i ngos la mya ngan med pa mdzes/_/grong khyer ma yi rkang pas rab bsnun pas/_/yal 'dab gsar pa dag la tshon 'phos bzhin/_/mdzes ma'i kha yi chang gi dga' ldan pa/_/
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]ma ba ra myaHsma ra da ha de yaM/_/i tI ba dzA tA ba ku la dru ma s+ya haR+Shasmi ta shrIHku su ma hwa la na/_/mA naM sa mut+p+r-idz+ya bi hA ya mau naM pA da pra NA me na ma na swi nI b+hiH/_/pra sA d+ya mA nAn+da yi tAn+bi
[\[295a.2\]]'dod pa'i thabs ni skal ldan bdag nyid la/_/zhes te ba ku la shing me tog gi/_/zol gyis dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i dpal skyes bzhin/_/khengs ldan ma rnams khengs pa rab btang zhing /_/mi smra spangs nas rkang pa rab btud de/_/mdza' bo dag la dang bar byed mthong
[\[295a.3\]]lokya dza hA sa puSh+pai ri ba sin+du bA raH/_/ba san+ta siM ha s+ya pa lA sha pA lI ba b+haus+phu rat+ke sha ra b+hA ra b+hA dzaH/_/ma na swi nI mA na ga dzA b+hI g+hA ta rak+tA ba sik+tA na kha rA ba lI ba/_/kar+N+Ne kwa Nat+ko ki la kA mi nI b+hiH spaR+she shi rI Sho
[\[295a.4\]]nas/_/sin+du bA ra me tog gis dgod bzhin/_/ge sar rgyas pa'i khur bsten pa lA sha'i/_/'phreng ba mdzes pa dpyid kyi seng ge yis/_/khengs ldan ma yi khengs pa glang po la/_/bsnun pa'i khrag bsgos sder mo'i 'phreng ba bzhin/_/rna bar snyan sgrogs khu byug bu mo yis/_/reg las
[\[295a.5\]]dr-i shi kar+Ni kA raiH/_/g+h+ra Ne pa ra ta ke sha re Nu pU rairba baR+Sha haR+ShaM ku su mA ka ra shrIH/_/tasmin+ma d+hu k+ShI ba bi g+hUr+N+Na mA na b+h+r-ing+gAM ga na b+h+ra ma b+ho ga kA le/_/ut+phul+la bal+la Shu pa nas+tha le Shu tsa tsA ra bi d+yA d+ha ra
[\[295a.6\]]shi ri Shas mig kar+Ni kar/_/sna la ge sar rdul tshogs rgyas pa yi/_/me tog 'byung gnas dpal gyi dga' char phab/_/bung ba'i na chung rnam 'phrul longs spyod ldan/_/sbrang rtsis myos shing rnam par 'khyam dus der/_/me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing tshal gyi gzhir/_/rig 'dzin rgyal
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]rA dza sU nuH/_/sa ta tra he ma pra ti bad+d+ha d+hAm+ni sid+d+ha pra tiSh+ThA pa ti rat+na mUrtIM/_/a b+h+ya ts+ya gau rI mu pa bI Na yan+tI da daR+sha ka n+yAM ka li kA me ben+doH/_/gauR+YAHsa mA ra d+ha na sam+bi mA na bad+d+ha s+thi taM man+ma tha dzI ba nA
[\[295b.2\]]po'i sras ni rnam par rgyu/_/des der gser las bsgrubs pa'i khang par ni/_/grub pas rab tu gnas byas rin chen gzugs/_/gau rI mchod nas rgyud mang glu len pa'i/_/zla ba gsar pa lta bu'i bu mo mthong /_/yid srubs 'tsho slad gau ri mnyes pa yi/_/sgrub byed la ni rab tu gnas byas
[\[295b.3\]]ya/_/bi lo kya tAM kA ma ba d+hU mi bA n+yaM dzI mU ta bA haHpr-i thu bisma yo b+hUta/_/sha nai ra thAM kA da ba tAr+pa bI NAM gI tA ba sA ne ha ri NA ya tA k+Shi/_/ladz+dzA na tA t+yak+ta sa ra sma rA b+haM da daR+sha bi d+yA d+ha ra rA dza pu traM/_/
[\[295b.4\]]pa/_/'dod pa'i chung ma gzhan bzhin de mthong nas/_/sprin gyi bzhon pa ya mtshan rgya cher gyur/_/de nas ri dgas mig yangs ngo tsha yis/_/dud pas glu mthar rgyud mang phang pa nas/_/dal gyis phab pas rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu/_/mda' bzhag 'dod pa dag dang mtshungs pa mthong /_/
[\[295b.5\]]pa raspa rA lo ka na bi b+h+ra me Na ne trAM shu sho b+hA b+ha ra No b+hi lA ShaH/_/ga trA ga tA nI ba ta yosh+tsa kA ra ma d+h+ye ma naHsan+d+hi ni bad+d+ha du taH/_/sA kA ma pad+mA ka ra rA dza haM sI sa pak+Sha pA tA na ba daR+sha ne pi/_/dzan+mAn+ta
[\[295b.6\]]mig zer mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan mngon 'dod des/_/phan tshun lta bar byed pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis/_/yid ni nye bar mtshams sbyor pho nya bzhin/_/de dag bar du 'gro dang 'ong ba byas/_/gsar mthong la yang phyogs su lhung bcas pa/_/'dod pa pad mtsho'i ngang pa'i rgyal mo des/_/skye ba
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rA b+h+yA sa ra sA di bA s+ya swats+tsha ma han+mA na sa mA bi be sha/_/sha shAM ka rat+naM bi ma la sha shI ba ka n+yA ku laM lak+Sh+ma mi basma re ShuH/_/ta s+yAHsa rA gaM sa bi be sha tsit+ta min+din+di raHphul+la mi bA
[\[296a.2\]]gzhan du goms pa'i ro las bzhin/_/de yi yid mtsho che zhing dngas par zhugs/_/rin chen zla bas dri med ri bong dang /_/bu mo'i tshogs kyis 'ben la dran pa'i mda'/_/rab rgyas pad+mo dag tu bung ba bzhin/_/chags ldan de yi sems la'ang de
[\[296a.3\]]ra bin+daM/_/a b+h+ye t+ya tAM bA la sa khI dwi tI yAM ladz+dzA ni madz+dzan+na ba kA ma dzr-iM b+haM/_/bi d+yA d+ha ren+durbi dza ne dza gA da d+hI ro pi rU pAd+b+hu ta kr-iSh+ya mA NaH/_/saM b+hA Sha Nen kri ya te na kasmAt+su b+h+rU twa yA
[\[296a.4\]]zhugs gyur/_/grogs mo bu mo'i gnyis pa dang bcas der/_/'dod pa gsar skyes ngo tshas snun byed cing /_/brtan yang rmad byung gzugs kyis drangs gyur pa/_/rig 'dzin zla bas dben par mngon phyogs smras/_/smin legs ci slad sngon du 'ong ba la/_/phebs smras
[\[296a.5\]]b+h+yAg ta saM bi b+hA gaH/_/bi b+har+t+ti b+ha byA b+hi dza nA nu rU paM rU paM sa dA tsA ra gu Ne na sho b+hAM/_/i daM na pA laM ka ra NaM sma ra s+ya ta bA na ba d+yaM gi sha shaM ka kAn+taM/_/di byaM ba puHka s+ya sa mun+na ta s+ya baM
[\[296a.6\]]bkur ba'i cha ni khyod mi byed/_/dam pa'i kun spyod yon tan gyis mdzes gzugs/_/legs ldan rigs kyi rjes mthun rnam par 'dzin/_/kha na ma tho med lus khyod lus mchog_/dran pa'i rgyan ni gsar pa zla ba ltar/_/mdzes pa mu tig nor bu nyid 'di ni/_/rab tu
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]sha s+ya muk+tA ma Ni tA ma bAp+taM/_/ta bA tha bA sun+da ri daR+sha ne na ba yaM su d+hAr+d+re Na kr-i to pa tsA rAH/_/ka ro ti lA ba N+ya bi tIr+N+Na haR+ShA saM b+hA Sha NaM ka s+ya sha shAM ka le khA/_/i daM tu naHkau tu ka mA tra me ba bri t+yA be ne tuM
[\[296b.2\]]mtho ba'i rigs smin gang las thos/_/yang na mdzes ma khyod ni mthong gyur pa/_/bdud rtsis brlan pas nged la rim gro byas/_/mdzes sdug dga' ster ri bong gis mtshan pa'i/_/ri mo su la phebs par smra bar byed/_/'on kyang dga' bas nged kyi dge mtshan tsam/_/gsal ba'i
[\[296b.3\]]b+ha ba tI pra bIta/_/sat+pak+Sha pA tA b+hi mu khe na d+hA tra ka s+ya n+wa ya s+yA b+ha ra NI kr-i tA bi/_/shru twe ti bi d+yA d+ha ra she kha ra s+ya ba tsasta daut+su kya bi b+hA ba gar+b+haM/_/kri yA b+ha bAta mau na ba tI ya dA sau ta dA
[\[296b.4\]]slad du khyed kyis 'dir smros shig_/dam pa'i phyogs lhung mngon phyogs byed pa yi/_/su yi rigs ni khyod kyis brgyan par byas/_/zhes pa rig 'dzin cod pan dag gi tshig_/'dod dgongs snying po can de thos gyur nas/_/ngo tshas de ni mi smra ldan gyur gang /_/de tshe grogs
[\[296b.5\]]sa khi ma ta li kA dza gA da/_/ku mA ra bi d+yA d+ha ra rA dza baM sha su d+hAb+d+hi tsan+d+ra s+t+wa mi ha pra sid+d+haH/_/asmat+pu re sid+d+ha bi lA si nI b+hiR+Yang+gI ya se bi gra ha bA na naM gaH/_/pra khyA ta kalpa dru ma dA na li laM gu Na pra b+hA bA b+ha
[\[296b.6\]]mo ma ta li kas smras/_/gzhon nu rig 'dzin rgyal rigs bdud rtsi yi/_/chu gter gyi ni zla ba khyod 'dir grags/_/ded kyi grong na grub pa'i rtse dga' mas/_/lus med lus ldan khyod ni glu len byed/_/dpag bsam shing sbyin rtse dgas rab grags pa/_/khyod kyi
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]ra NaM ya sha ste/_/a s+yAsh+tsa mi trA ba su nA nu dze na kar+N+NA pa taM sAM ki ta min+du shu b+h+raM/_/sa twam+ma hA satwa ka thaM ka thAr+haHpro D+ho pa tsA ra kr-i ya yai ba sa khyAH/_/b+ha ban+ti madz+dza
[\[297a.2\]]grags pa yon tan mthu yis brgyan/_/zla ltar dkar ba 'di yi rna rgyan du/_/ming po nor gyi bshes gnyen dag gis byas/_/sems dpa' chen po de khyod grogs mos gtam/_/dar ma'i nyer spyod bya bas ji ltar 'os/_/khyad par tshe rnams
[\[297a.3\]]bi dzi ta swa b+hA bA bi she Sha to gre ma ha tAM hi ka n+ya kAH/_/sid+d+hA n+wa yAM b+ho d+hi su d+hA ka ra s+ya bi shwA ba soH sid+d+ha pa teHsu te yaM/_/ud+YA na ke li Shu ka ro ti ya s+yAHsa de ba kAn+tiHku mu dA ba bo d+haM/_/na ba ma la ya dza bal+la rI ba ta n+wI
[\[297a.4\]]mdun du bu mo ni/_/ngo tshas rnam par thul ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur/_/bu mo 'di ni grub rigs chu gter gyi/_/zla ba grub bdag sna tshogs nor gyi ste/_/gang gi mdzes pa skyed tshal du rtse tshe/_/rtag pa nyid du ku mud rgyas par byed/_/ma la yar skyes 'khri shing gsar bzhin
[\[297a.5\]]pra tha ma sa mud+ga ta pal+la bA tu NoSh+ThI/_/i ya ma mr-i ta ma yi su rA su rA NAM ma la ya ba tI sa ta tA b+hi lASha b+hU miH/_/i ti ta s+yAM shru bA NA yAM s+tha bi ro b+h+ye t+ya kaM pu kI/_/satwa rA ga ma nots+tsh+wA saHprA ha sid+d+hA d+hi
[\[297a.6\]]phra/_/dang por 'khrungs gyur yal 'dab ltar dmar mchu/_/bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin ma la ya can 'di/_/rtag tu lha dang lha min mngon 'dod pa/_/zhes des smras par gyur pa na/_/nyug ru ma rgan po mngon phyogs te/_/myur bar 'ong ba'i shugs bcas pas/_/grub
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]pAt+ma dzAM/_/ka l+yA Ni mi trA ba su nA sa hi ton+taHpu ras+thi taH/_/twad+bi bA ha ka thA sak+taHsi tA twAM draSh+Tu mits+tsha ti/_/i t+yuk+tA sa ha sA te na sa ha sa khyA lo tsA nA/_/dzI mU ta ba ha
[\[297b.2\]]bdag bu ma la smras pa/_/dge ma nor gyi bshes gnyen dang /_/lhan cig pho brang 'khor na 'khod/_/khyod kyi bag ma'i gtam la chags/_/yab ni khyod la lta bar 'tshal/_/zhes pa de yis brjod pa'i 'phral/_/grogs mo dang bcas mig bzang ma/_/yid ni sprin gyi
[\[297b.3\]]na n+yasta mA na sA sA shanaiR+Ya yau/_/ta s+yAM pash+tsa t+s+thI ta sa khI ka thA byA dzaiHpu naHpu naH/_/kAn+taM ni rIk+Sh+ya mA nA yAM bra dzaM t+yA ma la saiHpa dai/_/tat+pa the dat+ta na ya naHku mA raHsa ma tsin+ta
[\[297b.4\]]bzhon pa la/_/rnam par bkod nas dal gyis song /_/grogs mo phyi na 'khod de la/_/gtam gyi zol gyis yang dang yang /_/mdzes pa rnam par lta byed cing /_/le lo'i gom pas 'gro ba'i tshe/_/mngon 'dod gsar pa la brten cing /_/phrag dog gis bzhin brtan pa
[\[297b.5\]]yata/_/na bot+kaN+Tha shra yo d+h+r-i t+yA t+ya dz+ya mA na i beR+Sh+ya yA/_/a ho nu mr-i ga sha bak+Sh+yA bra dzaM t+yAHpi tu ran+ti kaM/_/sa rA gaM tad+b+ha ye ne ba ma yi n+yA si kr-i tam+ma naH/_/shwA sA yA sa ni ro d+ha
[\[297b.6\]]btang /_/lam der mig ni gtad pa yi/_/gzhon nu yis ni rab bsams pa/_/kye ma ri dgas phrug gu'i mig_/pha yi drung du 'gro byed ma/_/de yis 'jigs bzhin chags bcas kyi/_/yid ni bdag la gtams par byas/_/dbugs kyi ngal dub 'bad pas
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]yat+na ni ra tA niHshap+da sam+bA di nI sot+kam+bA bi dza ne ya daR+sha na b+ha yA da t+yaM ta shaM kA ku lA/_/ta n+wi man+ma tha mArga NA ti ba ta nai bai lak+Sh+ya lI na smri tirnA+o dzA ne ka ta me
[\[298a.2\]]'gog la chags shing sgra med dag tu rnam par gnas/_/mthong ba'i 'jigs las shin tu dogs pas 'khrugs shing dben pa ru yang rab 'dar bcas/_/yid srubs dag gi mda' yis rab tu bsnun tshe skyengs pa yi ni chags shing gnas/_/lus
[\[298a.3\]]na sA ma ma pa thA tso rI pra biSh+TA ma naH/_/tsi raM bi tsi t+ye ti shi lA ta las+thaHsa man+ma thA dz+nyA bi Sha yaM prA yA taH/_/saM kalpa bar+t+yA pu ra to b+hi li khya mu hu mr-i gA k+ShIM sti mi te k+Sha No b+hUta/_/a thA
[\[298a.4\]]phra chom rkun ma de bdag yid la zhugs lam gang nas ni yongs mi shes/_/zhes pa yun ring bsams nas rdo la 'khod/_/yid srubs bka' yi yul du gyur pa des/_/kun rtog pir gyis mdun du ri dgas mig_/yang yang mngon bris mig ni g.yo med gyur/_/de nas me
[\[298a.5\]]ya yau puSh+pa rA ga re Nu nA pUr+N+Ne ba ne pA da pa ro dza mu drAH/_/tsakra d+h+wa dzAM ka bi dza ne nu sr-i t+ya ta s+yAn+ti kaM nar+m+ma su hr-it+su ban+d+huH/_/sa taM bi lo kyA b+hi na bA b+hi lA Sha bi she Sha tsin+tA pra ti bad+d+ha
[\[298a.6\]]tog rdul dang rdul gyis gang /_/nags tshal dben par rkang pa'i mtsho skyes rgya/_/'khor lo rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rjes 'brangs nas/_/de yi drung du rtsed grogs gnyen bzang 'ongs/_/mngon 'dod gsar pa'i khyad par bsams pa yis/_/sems ni rab tu bkag de des
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]tsit+taM/_/bi krI ta d+haiR+YaM sma ra shA sa ne na pa prats+tsha sAsh+tsaR+Ya bi kA ra he tuM/_/ko yaM sa khyai d+haiR+Ya ni d+he sta bA pi ni tan+ti san+tA pa pa do ba deSh+Ta/_/tsin+ta shra yan+nish+tsa la lo tsa na s+ya bi b+hA byA te ko pya d+h+r-i
[\[298b.2\]]mthong nas/_/dran pa'i bka' yis brtan pa btsongs pa la/_/ngo mtshar bcas pa'i rnam 'gyur rgyu dag dris/_/grogs po brtan pa'i gter gyur khyod la yang /_/shin tu gdung ba'i gnas ni nyer bstan cing /_/bsam pa la brten mig ni g.yo med ba/_/brtan med rnam pa
[\[298b.3\]]ti pra kA raH/_/i ti pra yat+na pra Na ye na pr-iSh+To bi shraM b+ha d+hAm+nA su hr-i dA ku mA raH/_/ta ma bra pIn+ni shwA si tA nu me ya sa pak+Sha bA ta sma ra bA Na nA taH/_/sa khe sa khe da s+ya pu rA Na sarga brge
[\[298b.4\]]ci zhig nyams su myong /_/zhes pa yid gcugs gnas ni grogs po dag_/rab tu 'bad cing gus pas dris pa ni/_/shugs rings mthun phyogs rlung gis rjes dpag bya/_/dran pa'i mda' lhung gzhon nus de la smras/_/grogs po sngon spros sde la skyo ldan pa'i/_/byed po
[\[298b.5\]]bi d+hernU ta na rU pa re khA/_/dr-iSh+TA ma yA kAn+ti ma yI ba ka n+yA sid+d+h+wa n+wa yAM b+ho d+hi su d+hAM shu re khA/_/in+dostad+ba da nA ra bind bi la sal+lA pa n+ya lup+ta d+yu teH sA raM ga s+ya tsa tad+bi lo tsa na ru tsi pra t+yasta ne tra shri
[\[298b.6\]]yis ni gzugs gsar ri mo dag_/grub rigs rgya mtsho'i zla ba'i ri mo bzhin/_/mdzes pa'i rang bzhin bu mo bdag gis mthong /_/de yi bzhin gyi pad+mo mdzes sdug rgyas pas gzi byin nyams pa'i zla ba dang /_/de yi mig dag mdzes pas mig gi dpal ni rab tu nyams
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]yaH/_/ma n+ye haM sa ma duHkha yoHpra ti ni shaM bai la k+Sh+ya lI nAt+ma nosh+tsin+tA nish+tsa la e Sha shAn+ta ya sha soHsaM dr-i sh+ya te saM ga maH/_/kar+N+NA ba taM sI kr-i ta ne tra kAn+tirna be pi
[\[299a.2\]]pa'i ri dgas dag_/grags pa zhi zhing sdug bsngal mtshungs pas mtshan mo so sor skyengs te zhum pa yi/_/bdag nyid dag ni bsam pa g.yo med 'grogs pa 'di nyid mthong bar bdag rtog go/_/mthong ba'i rnam 'phrul gsar pa yin mod
[\[299a.3\]]san+daR+sha na bi b+h+ra me sA/_/bi b+hA bya mA nA b+hi na bA b+hi lA ShaM ma yi swa b+hA baM pra ka TI tsa kA ra/_/tasmin+kaM pa ta raM gi Ni bya ti ka re byA hA ri NI me kha lAM mU kI kr-i t+ya su sAn+ti tA mi ba b+ha yAd+bas+t+ra
[\[299a.4\]]kyang /_/mig gi mdzes pa rna ba'i rgyan byas des/_/mngon 'dod gsar pa nyams su myong byed pa'i/_/rang gi ngo bo bdag la gsal bar byas/_/der ni glo bur 'dar zhing g.yo ldan sgra dag sgrogs par byed pa'i 'og pag la/_/'jigs pas rab tu zhi bar byed bzhin yang
[\[299a.5\]]pra dA nairmu huH/_/ladz+dzA mau na ba tI bi na mra ba da nA sA srasta kar+N+Not+pa lo daM tsats+tsak+Shu ra tsaM tsa rI ka bi ru taish+tsakre ma ma swA ga taM/_/bak+t+re tsan+d+ra sha tA ni lo tsa na yu ge nI lot+pa lA nAM ba naM bA
[\[299a.6\]]yang gos dag byin nas lkugs par byas/_/ngo tshas mi smra dang ldan bzhin dud de yi rna ba'i ut+pal lhung ba la/_/'khor zhing rgyu ba'i bung ba rnams kyi sgra yis bdag la legs par 'ongs sam byas/_/bzhin la zla ba brgya phrag dang ni mig gnyis dag la ut+pal sngon po'i nags/_/
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]hwor+b+bA la mr-i NA li kAsh+tsa ra Na yo rut+pul+la pad+mA ka rAH/_/nir+m+mA Ne pa ra mA Nu taM pa ra ta noHkA me na tse ta prA tAstad+kiM bah+ni ma yI ba sA da ha ti me sne hA nu bid+d+ha ma naH/_/sA kA pi kA ma ku mu dA ka
[\[299b.2\]]lag pa dag la pad rtsa gzhon nu rkang par pad+mo'i 'byung gnas rab rgyas pa/_/lus mchog sprul la phra rab rdul dag gal te 'dod pas rab tu bkod pa na/_/me yi rang bzhin bzhin du de yis bdag yid mdza' bas phug pa ci slad sreg_/'dod pa'i ku mud tshal gyis zla
[\[299b.3\]]ra tsan+d+ra le khA dr-iSh+TA ma yA na ya na pad+ma pi kA sha he tuH/_/yat+kAn+ti bi b+h+ra ma su d+hA ta Ti nI ni pI tA mUts+tsAM bi ShoSh+ma pi shu NA ma ni shaM ta no ti/_/bi shwA ba sorbi ma la si d+d+ha ku lA
[\[299b.4\]]ba'i ri mo su zhig de/_/mig gi pad+mo rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyur ni bdag gis mthong /_/gang gis mdzes pa'i rnam 'phrul bdud rtsi'i chu bo 'thungs pa yis/_/tsha ba'i dug tu gsal byed rmongs pa rtag tu rgyas par 'gyur/_/ma la ya can zhes pa'i bu mo ri dgas mig
[\[299b.5\]]mr-i tAb+di tA rA d+hi pa s+ya ta na ye ti ma yA shru tA sA/_/bA lA pi lA sha dza na nI ku su mA yu d+ha s+ya lI la gu ror+m+ma la ya ba t+ya b+hi d+hA mr-i gA k+ShI/_/shru twe ti bi d+yA d+ha ra rA dza sU norbA kyaM na bod+b+hU ta ma
[\[299b.6\]]can de/_/rtse dga'i bla ma me tog mtshon gyi rol rtsed skyed byed ma/_/dri med grub rigs bdud rtsi'i chu gter dag gi rgyu skar bdag_/sna tshogs nor bdag gi ni bu mo yin zhes bdag gis thos/_/zhes pa rig 'dzin rgyal po dag gi bu/_/yid byung gsar pa rgyas
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]no b+ha ba s+ya/_/u bA tsa gan+d+har+b+ha ku mA ra kastaM bi shrAn+ta b+hU miHpra Na yI su ban+d+huH/_/diSh+T+yA sa khe tu l+ya gu NA nu b+hA bAtsh+tha ne ta bA yaM pra sr-i to b+hi lA ShaH/_/b+ha ba t+ya ba sh+ya su kr-i to
[\[300a.2\]]pa'i tshig thos nas/_/dri za'i gzhon nu yid gcugs dag gi sa/_/gus ldan gnyen bzang gis ni de la smras/_/grogs po dga' bas khyod kyi mngon 'dod 'di/_/yon tan mthu dag mtshungs pa'i gnas la spros/_/legs byas ldan pa rnams kyi
[\[300a.3\]]tsi tA naM ma no ra thaHsat+pha tha pAn+thA e ba/_/d+ha n+ye ba lo ka tra ya lak+Shata b+hU tA sA bai dza yan+tI ra ti bal+la b+ha s+ya/_/su rAM ga nA lo ka na nish+tsa la s+ya ya yA d+h+r-i tiste ta ra lI kr-i te ba/_/pa raM rA dza t+ye kA dza ga
[\[300a.4\]]re ba ni/_/nges par dam pa'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lha yi bu mo bltas pas mi g.yo ba/_/khyod kyi brtan pa gang gis g.yo bzhin byed/_/dga' ma'i bdag po dag gi ru mtshon de/_/skal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi mtshon bya nyid/_/'gro la nya yi mtshan mo rgyal ba dang
[\[300a.5\]]ti dza yi nI pUr+Na ra dza nI ba rA sh+yA mA brge ba ha ti bi b+ha baM sai ba su b+ha gA/_/ya yA hI naHk+ShI NaR+Yu ti ra mr-i ta rash+miHpra ti ni shaM sha nair+d+hat+te ta n+wI na ba na kha mu khol+le kha ta nu tAM/_/b+ha dza swa d+heR+Ya ta
[\[300a.6\]]ldan gcig pu mchog tu mdzes/_/sngo bsangs sde la mchog gi 'byor pa 'dzin pa de nyid skal ba bzang /_/gang dang bral bas mtshan mo so sor bdud rtsi'i zer ni gzi byin nyams/_/dal gyis sen mo'i kha ris gsar pa phra ba nyid 'dzin lus dang ldan/_/brtan pa sten cig
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]ba bany+tshi taM yat+ta da pra yat+no ba na taM ka ra gre/_/bi shwA ba poHsid+d+ha pa tes+t+wa dar+the ka n+yAr+thi tA twadz+dza na ke na sA hi/_/d+ha n+yosmi ya s+ya ta na yA tri dza gat+p+ri ye Na saM yu dz+ya te d+yu ti ma tA sha shi nA ni she
[\[300b.2\]]khyod kyi 'dod pa gang /_/de ni 'bad med lag pa'i rtse na gnas/_/grub bdag sna tshogs nor las bu mo de/_/khyod kyi yab kyis khyod kyi don du bslangs/_/'dod ldan zla bas mtshan mo la bzhin gang gi bu mo la/_/'gro gsum dga' bas yang dag sbyor ba bdag ni skal ba
[\[300b.3\]]ba/_/uk+t+we ti sid+d+ha pa ti rA da ra haR+sha pUr+N+Na ka n+yA bi bA ha ma ha tata pa ra tA ma bstaH/_/prA taHsa khe sa b+ha bi tA bi pu lot+pa bste kAn+tA sa mA ga ma su d+hA sa pha lo bi hA raH/_/yasmin
[\[300b.4\]]bzang /_/zhes pa brjod nas grub pa'i bdag po gus dang dga' bas gang /_/bu mo yis ni bag ma'i dga' ston de nyid skyong bar gyur/_/grogs po nang par khyod kyi rtse dga'i dga' ston yangs pa dag_/mdzes ma dang 'grogs bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ldan pa de byung ste/_/gang la
[\[300b.5\]]sa mA na gu Na saM ga ma daR+sha ne na d+hA tuHka ri Sh+ya ta dza naHsu tsi rAt+p+ra shaM saM/_/i ti su hr-id+ba tsa naM sa ha sai bots+tsha lad+bi pu la haR+Sha ma ya sa ni sha mya tata/_/ni dza pa daM pra ya yau ka la yan+d+hi
[\[300b.6\]]yon tan mtshungs pa 'grogs pa dag ni mthong bas na/_/skye bo shin tu yun ring byed po bsngags pa byed par 'gyur/_/zhes pa grogs po'i tshig de thos gyur nas/_/dga' ba'i rang bzhin yangs pa 'phral rgyas te/_/nyin mo'i lhag ma du ma'i dus mtshungs par/_/
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]yA di ba sha she Sha ma ne ka yu go pa maM/_/a tha saM d+h+yA ba d+hU saM gA di ba saM krAn+ta kuM ku maH/_/dza gA ma ga ga no d+yA ne tig+mAM shu rA Ta rA ga tAM/_/di nAn+te pad+mi nI kAn+ti bi shran+testa ta TAM ta
[\[301a.2\]]blo yis rtog cing rang gi gnas su song /_/de nas thun mtshams bu mo dang /_/'grogs pas gur gum 'phos pa bzhin/_/nam mkha' yi ni skyed tshal du/_/nyi ma chags rtag ldan par gyur/_/pad+ma can dga' nyin mo'i mthar/_/nub ri'i ngos la 'khod
[\[301a.3\]]ra/_/bA da saM bA ha nA sak+tA san+d+h+yA ta s+yAn+ti ke ba b+hau/_/ta tash+tsa pash+tsi mAM b+ho d+hiM pra biSh+Te bA sa re shwa re/_/kha ma pUr+Ya ta na k+Sha traista dut+thai ri ba shI ka reH/_/sha naisto ka ta maHSh+yA mA ni sha b+hu
[\[301a.4\]]pa na/_/de yi mjug tu thun mtshams ni/_/rkang pa bsten pa la chags mdzes/_/de nas nub phyogs chu gter du/_/nyin mo'i dbang phyug rab lhung tshe/_/de las 'thor bas thigs pas bzhin/_/skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' gang /_/dal gyis mun pa chung ngu gnag_/mtshan mos
[\[301a.5\]]ba na b+hA dza nAta/_/san+d+h+yA rA gA sa baM pI twA k+ShI re bA g+hUr+N+Ni te k+Sha NaM/_/ta taHpra tsI sha tsIkAn+ta bi lA si ba sa tiHka ku pa/_/A san+nen+dU da yA lo ka tsan+ta ne nAM ki tA ba b+hau/_/a thod+Ya yau su
[\[301a.6\]]srid pa'i snod dag las/_/thun mtshams dmar ba'i chang 'thungs nas/_/myos pa bzhin du skad cig 'khyams/_/de nas bde sogs mdzes pa yi/_/rtse dga' gnas pa shar gyi phyogs/_/zla 'char snang ba nye ba na/_/tsan+dan dag gis mtshan bzhin mdzes/_/de nas bdud rtsi skyed pa ni/_/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]d+hA sU tiM sh+yA mA mu kha bi she Sha kaH/_/b+ho gi nAM b+ho ga saM b+hA gya lI lA mu kha bi she Sha kaH/_/bi lA sa hA sA b+hi mu khI miM dorbIk+Sh+ya ku mud+ba tIM/_/ma n+yu lI ne ba na li nI ni mi mI la ga lad+d+Yu tiH/_/pra t+ya gra tsan+d+ra
[\[301b.2\]]longs spyod can gyi longs spyod kyi/_/skal bzang rtse dga' khyad par can/_/sngo bsangs gdong gi khyad can shar/_/zla ba'i rtse dgar mngon phyogs pa'i/_/ku mud ldan pa mthong gyur nas/_/khro bas zhum bzhin pad+ma can/_/gzi byin nyams shing zum par gyur/_/zla ba'i thig le gsar
[\[301b.3\]]ti la kA tA rA ni ka ra hA ri NI/_/kA maM dza gA ma sA sh+yA mA mu ni suM ya ma suM ya ma bA ma tAM/_/ta s+yA ni sha yaM sot+kaN+ThA harmye ma la ya ba t+ya tha/_/dzI mU ta bA ha na d+h+yA na nirni drA sa ma tsin+ta yata/_/i ya ma ma
[\[301b.4\]]pa dang /_/skar ma'i tshogs kyi do shal can/_/sngo bsangs ma de thub pa ni/_/dul ba'i mi mthun phyogs nyid gyur/_/de nas mtshan de khang bzang du/_/srid ldan ma la ya can ma/_/gnyid med sprin gyi bzhon pa yi/_/bsam gtan ldan pas rab bsams pa/_/bdag ni bag mar
[\[301b.5\]]sa mA pan+na bi bA hAn+ta ra bar+t+ti nI/_/na pa ri k+ShA ya te bA mA sha ta yA mi ba yA mi nI/_/a ho nu ga ga nod+YA nam sha shi saM ga ma nr-ir+b+r-i tA/_/tA ra kA ku su ma smai raM ra dza nI na bi muny+tsa taM/_/A yA mi
[\[301b.6\]]nye ba yi/_/bar na gnas pa'i mi mthun phyogs/_/mtshan mo 'di ni thun brgya dang /_/ldan pa bzhin du yongs mi 'dzad/_/kye ma nam mkha'i skyed mos tshal/_/rgyu skar me tog 'dzum ldan pa/_/ri bong can 'grogs dga' ba yi/_/mtshan mo yis ni gtong mi byed/_/shin tu ring
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]nI ya mi nI yaM yA tA me pra ya bi g+h+na tAM/_/swa yaM su kha rA sA sak+taHko dzA nA ti pa ra bya thAM/_/i ti tsin+tA nu ban+d+he na ta s+yAHsan+tA pa kA ri NA/_/sA nu ro d+he ba
[\[302a.2\]]ba'i mtshan mo 'di/_/bdag gi dga' ba'i gegs su gyur/_/rang nyid bde ba'i ror chags pa/_/su yis gzhan gyi gdung ba shes/_/zhes pa de yi bsam pa ni/_/gdung byed rjes su 'brel ba yi/_/dor bzhin du ni
[\[302a.3\]]ra dza nI dza gA mA daR+sha naM sha naiH/_/a thA ru NAM shu ka ba tI twa rA grasten+du dar+p+pa NA/_/A san+not+sa ba sadz+dze pa pra b+hA prA b+hA ti kI ba b+hau/_/u di te pad+mi nI kAn+te shAn+te ta ma si sAr+b+ba re/_/
[\[302a.4\]]mtshan mo de/_/dal gyis mthong ba min par gyur/_/de nas skya rengs gos dang ldan/_/brel bas zla ba'i me long zags/_/dga' ston nye ba la chas bzhin/_/snang ba ldan pa tho rengs mdzes/_/pad+mo can gyi dga' ba shar/_/mtshan mo mun pa zhi ba na/_/
[\[302a.5\]]ba b+hU ba sar+b+ba b+hU tA nA su khA ya na ya not+sa baH/_/ta taHpra br-it+te pad+mi n+yA di pA ka ra ka ra gr-i he/_/ud+Ya yur+b+h+r-iM ga la la nA saM ga maM ga ga gI ta yaH/_/ta taHsid+d+hA d+hi na tha s+ya b+ha ba ne b+hU ri saM
[\[302a.6\]]'byung po thams cad bde ba'i slad/_/mig gi dga' ston dag tu gyur/_/de nas pad+ma ldan pa yis/_/nyin byed zer 'dzin la zhugs tshe/_/bung ba'i na chung 'grogs pa yis/_/bkra shis glu dag rab tu bskrun/_/de nas grub pa'i bdag po ni/_/phun tshogs mang ba'i
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa daH/_/su tA pa ri Na yA raM b+ha saM b+hA raHsa ma bar+t+ta ta/_/a tha sid+d+ha pu ran+d+h+ri b+hirdi byAM shu ka bi b+hU Sha NaiH/_/dr-iSh+T+wA pra sA d+hi tAM ka n+yA mU tsu ra p+pa ra so mi thaH/_/hA ro s+yAHku tsa yor+b+ha raH
[\[302b.2\]]khyim dag tu/_/bu mo bag ma'i dga' ston dag_/rtsom pa'i chas ni rab tu bstar/_/ci ste grub pa'i na chung gis/_/lha yi gos dar rgyan rnams kyis/_/bu mo brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/_/lha mo rnams kyis phan tshun smras/_/'di ni nu ma rab mdzes pa/_/
[\[302b.3\]]pa ri hA rAHpa ra ru tsaH/_/lA ba N+ya bya ba d+hA ne na b+hU ya sA b+hU Sha Ne na kiM/_/ta twAM sh+yAHsa khi kiM kri ta sta na ta Te rat+nA ba lI b+hir+b+ha rash+tsi traM maN+Da na paN+Di tA si su dr-i shaHkiM bAny+dza ne nA
[\[302b.4\]]do shal khur gyis rab tu bsgribs/_/mdzes sdug sgrib par byed pa yi/_/shin tu mang ba'i rgyan gyis ci/_/grogs mo lus phra nu ma'i ngos la rin chen 'phreng ba'i khur gyis ci zhig byed/_/khyod ni bkra bar rgyan la mkhas te mig bzang dag
[\[302b.5\]]mu nA/_/ra myA rany+dza na dung+g+ra he Na bi hi tA bak+t+rin+du bim+be twa yA pa sh+ye yaM ku ru te ka laM ka ka la NAM kastU ri kA many+dza rI/_/sa khI b+hi ri ti saM kalpa dza we rA
[\[302b.6\]]la mig sman 'dis kyang ci/_/bzhin ras zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la khyod kyis 'bad nas dga' bar bsgrubs pa'i mtshon/_/gla rtsi dag gi dog pa rnams ni dri ma chags par byed pa 'di la ltos/_/de ltar kun rtog brjod pa yis/_/grogs
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]ka lpa bi b+h+ra maH/_/kalpi to maM ga lA yai ba swal+la pya s+yA bya rA dza ta/_/a thA ya yau bi mA ne na ma Ni mA lAM shu mA li nA/_/hA ra har+m+m+yA ya ma ni na byom+nA dzI mU
[\[303a.2\]]mos rgyan gyi rnam 'phrul ni/_/bkra shis slad du brtags gyur pa/_/shin tu chung ba dag kyang mdzes/_/de nas nam mkha' gzhal yas khang /_/nor la 'phreng ba'i zer 'phreng can/_/do shal ba gam can lta bus/_/sprin
[\[303a.3\]]ta bA ha naH/_/dza gat+t+ra yI pU dz+ya gu NA da re Na sid+d+hA d+hi nA the na su pU dz+ya mA naH/_/bi d+yA d+ha ra shre Ni sha tA nu yA taHsadz+dzI kr-i tAM maM ga la b+hU mi mA ya/_/a thA ya yau rat+na
[\[303a.4\]]gyi bzhon pa rab tu 'ongs/_/yon tan la gus 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/_/grub pa'i mgon pos mchod par gyur pa des/_/rig 'dzin 'phreng ba brgya phrag rjes 'brang zhing /_/bstar byas bkra shis sa gzhi dag tu phyin/_/de nas rin chen gzhal
[\[303a.5\]]bi mA na sak+tA ka n+yA ma no dzan+ma bi lA sa bal+lI/_/bi bA ha haR+Sha d+yu ti saM pi b+hA gar+b+bi b+hU Sha NA nI ba di shAM di shan+ti/_/sa khi ka rAn+do li ta tsa ma rA gra bi sra sta kar+N+No t+pa la pal+la ya na/_/ka po
[\[303a.6\]]yas khang gnas pa/_/yid skyes rtse dga'i 'khri shing bu mo ni/_/bag ma la dga' mdzes pa'i cha dag gis/_/phyogs la rgyan dag ster ba bzhin du 'ongs/_/grogs mo'i lag pas bskyod pa'i rnga yab rtses/_/rna ba'i ut+pal yal 'dab lhung gyur pa/_/'gram
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]la lag+ne na ba b+hauk+Sha NaM sA bya stAM ka tsan+d+rA b+ha ra NA ni she pa/_/ta taHpra pr-it+te bi d+hi bad+bi bA ha ma hot+pa be sid+d+ha nr-i pAd+ma dzA yAH/_/pA Ni gra ha spaR+sha na bA mr-i te na na nan+da bi d+yA d+ha ra rA dza
[\[303b.2\]]par reg pas skad cig de rab mdzes/_/rtags yon zla bas brgyan pa'i mtshan mo bzhin/_/de nas bag ma'i dga' ston chen po la/_/cho ga bzhin zhugs grub bdag bu mo yi/_/lag bzung reg pa gsar pa'i bdud rtsi yis/_/rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu
[\[303b.3\]]sU nuH/_/tau dam+pa tI hA ra ma hAr+ha rat+na saM krAn+ta de hau ba b+hA turbi bA he/_/prI t+ye ba lab+d+h+wA hr-i da ye pa kA shaM pa raspa raM swats+tsha ta yA pra biSh+Tau/_/nir+b+bar+t+ti tod+bA ha bi d+hi pra ban+d+hau gI ta nr-it+to tsi
[\[303b.4\]]ni dga' bar gyur/_/khyo shug de dag lus ni bag ma'i tshe/_/do shal che 'os rin chen la 'phos mdzes/_/mdza' bas snying la go skabs thob gyur nas/_/phan tshun rab tu dang bas zhugs pa bzhin/_/bag ma'i cho gas rab tu sbyar byas pa/_/mchod yon
[\[303b.5\]]ta nA ka kAn+taM/_/bi n+ya sta rat+nA sa na ma r+g+h+ya b+hA dzau rA dzAM ga NaM dzag+ma tu rutsha bAr+haM/_/a thot+sa bot+sA haM bi she sha nr-it+ta khin+ne ba pI twA ma d+hu sha ta pa traM/_/bi shrAn+ti mastA dri ta Te
[\[303b.6\]]bsten pa de dag rgyal po'i khyams/_/glu dang gar ldan mtho ris ltar mdzes pa/_/rin chen stan bkod dga' ston 'os par song /_/de nas dga' ston spro ba'i khyad par gyis/_/gar gyis ngal bzhin 'dab brgya'i sbrang rtsi 'thungs/_/tsha zer ldan pa'i zer 'phreng
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]ni ShaN+NA b+he dze sha nai raM shu ma toM shu mA lA/_/ta taHsa mA dA ya ka rA ba lag+nAM di na shri yaM rA ga ba tIM tsa san+d+h+yAM/_/ud+YA na lo b+hA di ba rasmi mA lI me ro rdza gA mA pa ra
[\[304a.2\]]nub ri yi/_/ngos la 'khod pas dal gyis ngal gso bsten/_/de nas 'od chags nyin mo'i dpal dang ni/_/chags ldan thun mtshams dag kyang khrid byas nas/_/'od zer 'phreng ba bskyed tshal la chags bzhin/_/lhun po'i pha rol ngos
[\[304a.3\]]pAr+sh+wa b+hu miM/_/nI lAm+ba rA dr-i sh+ya ta bA sa rAn+te bi lo lA tA rA ra dza nI mr-i gA k+ShI/_/bi lo kA yan+tI b+ha ya saM b+h+ra me Na mu hurdi gaM tA na b+hi pA ri ke ba/_/a tho da yA dreHshi kha ra
[\[304a.4\]]kyi sa gzhir song /_/rgyu skar g.yo ldan mtshan mo ri dgas mig_/nyin mo'i mjug tu gos sngon ldan pa mthong /_/'jigs shing 'khrul pas yang yang phyogs rnams su/_/rnam par blta zhing mngon par 'gro ba bzhin/_/de nas shar gyi ri rtser ri bong can/_/
[\[304a.5\]]sha shAM kaHka rA ba lI s+phA Ti ka dzA la pa TaM/_/ma hong+sa bi sid+d+ha pu ran+d+h+ri nr-it+taM dr-iSh+TuM ma hA harmya mi bA ru ro ha/_/pra kIr+N+Na tA rAk+Sha ta lA dza puSh+pe tasmin+naM shA tsan+d+ra ma sor+b+bi bA he/_/a b+hUn+ma d+huk+ShI ba
[\[304a.6\]]'od zer 'phreng ba shel gyi dra bas bsdams/_/ba gam cher 'dzegs dga' ston chen po la/_/grub pa'i bu mo'i gar la blta ba bzhin/_/rgyu skar rgyu dang 'bras yos me tog gtor/_/mtshan mo'i zla bas bag mar blangs pa der/_/sbrang rtsi'i brtul zhugs
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]ma d+hu pra tA nAM ko pi pra mo daHku mu dA ka rA NAM/_/ma hot+sa bot+sa ho ra pe tha ta smin+pi lo la phe no dz+wa la mA l+ya hA raH/_/nr-i t+yan ba b+hau sid+d+ha pu ran+d+h+ri lo ka sh+tsan+d+ro da yod+b+hU ta i bA mr-i tA b+d+hiH/_/
[\[304b.2\]]sbrang rtsi'i myos pa can/_/ku mud 'byung gnas ci yang rab dgar gyur/_/de nas nyams dga' dga' ston chen po der/_/'phreng ba do shal rab 'bar dbu ba g.yo/_/grub pa'i na chung 'jig rten rnam par mdzes/_/zla shar bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'phyur ba bzhin/_/
[\[304b.3\]]ta taHpra b+hA te pa ri bar+d+ha mA ne ma hot+pa be mi tra sa mA ga me na/_/bA lA ta paiHsid+d+ha pu re ba b+hU ba sin+dU ra pU rai ri ba po ra ke liH/_/sha neHpra yA te Shu ne Shu ShaT+su ma hot+sa ba s+yA d+b+hu ta haR+Shab+hU
[\[304b.4\]]de nas snga dro dga' ston chen po ni/_/yongs su rgyas tshe grogs dang phrad pa yis/_/nyi 'od gzhon nus li khri'i tshogs kyis bzhin/_/grub pa'i grong du grong ba'i rtse dga' byung /_/dga' ston chen po rmad byung dga' ba'i sa/_/nyi ma drug ni dal gyis rab
[\[304b.5\]]meH/_/gi resta Te sap+ta ma bA sa rA kre tsa tsA ra bid+yA d+ha ra rA dza sU nuH/_/da daR+sha ta tra s+phu Ta rash+mi dzA la pha NA ma Ni s+phI ta kr-i ta pra kA shaM/_/mA trA nu yA taM pa ri pUr+N+Na tsan+d+ra bim+bA na naM nA ga ku mA ra
[\[304b.6\]]'das te/_/nyi ma bdun gyi dang po ri ngos la/_/rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu ni rnam par rgyu/_/der ni gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od zer dag_/rab gsal dra ba'i snang ba rgyas byed pa/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs bzhin ras can/_/klu gzhon ma dang
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]ma gre/_/ta s+yAHpra sar+b+yad+g+ha na bASh+pa pin+du mA lA ba kIr+N+Na sta na maN+Da lA yAH/_/a b+h+yu gra sho kA ha ti kam+bi tA yAHshu shrA ba tA raM ka ru Na pra lA baM/_/hA bat+sa pA tA la ma Ni pra dI pa sa mI sa mAp+te si
[\[305a.2\]]bcas pa mdun du mthong /_/mchi ma stug por rab 'bab thigs pa yi/_/phreng bas nu ma'i dkyil 'khor dkrigs gyur cing /_/rab drag mya ngan gyis bcom 'dar ba de'i/_/snying rje'i cho nge rab tu gsang ba thos/_/kyi hud mnyes gshin sa 'og nor bu'i sgron/_/ji ltar khyod ni
[\[305a.3\]]ka thaM k+Sha ya s+ya/_/drak+Sh+ya mi kAn+taM kwa pu na sta be da mA nan+da san+do ha mi bA na nA b+dzaM/_/a smin+p+ri yA prI ti la tA ba san+te kiM yau ba ne man+ma tha san+d+hi dU te/_/hA bak+Sh+ya se bAn+d+ha ba dzI ba b+hU ta kA la dwi pA kran+ta i bA
[\[305a.4\]]brlag la nye ba thob/_/khyod gdong chu skyes kun dga'i tshogs bzhin mdzes/_/'di ni bdag gis phyi nas gang du mthong /_/kyi hud dga' ma'i dga' ba'i 'khri shing dpyid/_/yid srubs mtshams sbyor pho nya lang tsho 'dir/_/ji ga gnyen gyi srog gyur khyod za 'gyur/_/dus kyi gnyis 'thung gis
[\[305a.5\]]si tsU taH/_/shru twe ti ta s+yAHka ru Na pra lA pa man+taHsa mut+kIr+N+Na biShA da sha l+yaH/_/sa prats+tsha tAM duHsa ha duHkha ha tu ma b+h+ye t+ya bi d+yA d+ha ra rA dza pu tra/_/ka smat+ta bA maM d+ya na duHkha paM shI mA taHpra dzA taHpra sa b+haM pra lA paH/_/kiM tI pra ma
[\[305a.6\]]bcom tsU ta bzhin/_/zhes pa de yi snying rje'i sgra thos nas/_/mya ngan zug rngu nang du rab zug pa/_/rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu yi mngon phyogs te/_/de la bzod dka'i sdug bsngal rgyu dag dris/_/ma ma khyod kyi cho nge drag po 'di/_/sdug bsngal drag po'i gsal byed ci las skyes/_/dge ba'i
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]kam+ba ka ma s+ya sA d+hoHka l+yA Na mUr+t+te ra ti shaM ka se twaM/_/ba pUM Shi kA maM ku sha lo tsi tA ni sau dza n+ya sam+bA da su kha pra dA ni/_/a baM bi d+hA ni pra ti g+hA ti nI nAM nai ba s+ya da twaM bi pa dAM pra yA ti/_/saM krAn+ta tad+duHkha bi ShA ku le
[\[305b.2\]]gzugs can dam pa 'di la khyod/_/drag po kun tu 'dar byed ci zhig dgos/_/nges par dge ba dag la 'os pa'i lus/_/skye bo bzang po dang 'grogs bde ba ster/_/rnam pa 'di lta bu ni rab 'joms pa'i/_/rgud pa'i gnas nyid rab tu mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa de yis sdug bsngal dug 'phos
[\[305b.3\]]na pr-iSh+Te ti sA te na da yA ma ye na/_/tam bra bIt+kI li ta lo tsa ne ba bi yo ga b+hI t+yA ba da ne su ta s+ya/_/kiM ni spra tI kA ra sa nung+ga me na shru te na te\u0f85smad+b+ya sa nA na la na/_/a kA la pA tI ma ma duHsa ho yaM duHkar+m+ma
[\[305b.4\]]'khrugs/_/brtse ba'i rang bzhin de yis dris la des/_/'bral bas 'jigs nas bu yi bzhin la mig_/phur ba btsugs bzhin de la rab smras pa/_/bcos thabs med par gyur pa nged kyi ni/_/sdug bsngal med dag thos pas khyod la ni/_/las ngan smin pa nyer gnas bzod dka' yi/_/rnam pa
[\[305b.5\]]pA ko pa na taHpra kA raH/_/bi shA la kIr+t+t+yu dz+dz+wa la shaM kha pA la ku lAM ku re bat+sa ta re ma mAsmin/_/mU lA b+hi g+hA ti bi d+hu re Na d+hA trA sadz+dzi kr-i to ya ka thi naHkuThA raH/_/e kaHsa dA b+ha k+Sh+ya Na dIk+Shi tasma tAr+k+ShA s+ya sar+b+ba k+Sha ya rak+ShA NA ya/_/bA re
[\[305b.6\]]'di ni bdag la dus min lhung /_/rgya che grags 'bar dung skyong rigs nyid kyi/_/myu gu bdag gi bu gzhon 'di la ni/_/byed po gdug pas rtsa ba 'joms pa yi/_/sta gri rnon po 'di ni chas su byas/_/rtag tu za bar ston byed mkha' lding la/_/thams cad brlag pa bsrung slad re mos kyi/_/gdengs
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]Na nA gaHpha Ni nA ya ke na bi sr-i dz+ya te pA Ta la paT+Ta tsi h+naH/_/yo yaM tu ShA rA tsa la saM ni be shaHsaM dr-i sh+ya te rA shi ra dr-i sh+ya pa raH/_/sa e Sha b+huk+todz+dz+hi ta b+ho gi kA ya kaM kA la mA lA ka li tos+thi kU TaH/_/bA ra kra me NA d+ya ma
[\[306a.2\]]can 'dren pa dag gis klu de ni/_/gos dang rtags kyis mtshan pa spring bar byed/_/gang 'di kha ba'i ri ni bkod pa yi/_/phung po pha rol mthong min mthong gyur pa/_/'di ni gdengs can lus zos dor ba yi/_/keng rus phreng bas bsgrubs pa'i rus phung yin/_/mthar byed so yi drung du
[\[306a.3\]]mA s+ya sU noHkr-i tAn+ta dan+tAn+ti ka mA ga ta s+ya/_/prAp+to ya masmat+ku la mU la g+hA tI gr-i hI ta sho NAM shu ka shA sa na s+ya/_/i ti bru ba NA ta b+ha ye na tUr+N+NA mA shwA s+ya mA na ta na ye na te na/_/sA taM bi d+hA yAM shu ka pal+la be na tsu kro sha tA
[\[306a.4\]]song gyur zhing /_/gos dmar bka' ni rab tu bzung byas pa/_/bdag gi bu 'dis de ring rim gyis ni/_/nged rigs rtsa ba 'joms pa'i res 'di thob/_/ces pa 'jigs pas myur du smra byed cing /_/bu de yi ni dbugs dag 'byin byed ma/_/de yis de ni gos 'dab kyis bsgribs nas/_/snying rje'i
[\[306a.5\]]raM ka ru Na sU te na/_/hA shaM kha tsU Da twa ra se ki me baM gan+tu dza gan+maN+Da na ba d+h+ya b+hU miM/_/uk+t+we ti kaN+Tha gr-i hi twA du trA ta ta skan+d+ha bi n+ya sta mu khI sa mu mo ha/_/dr-iSh+T+wAp+ta saM dz+nyA sha na kaiHku mA rastAM k+Sha ta rAM d+he nu mi bai ka
[\[306a.6\]]nga ro gsang bor cho nge bton/_/kyi hud dung gi gtsug phud 'gro ba'i rgyan/_/gsar par 'gro la 'di ltar khyod ring ci/_/zhes brjod bu yi mgrin bzung de yi ni/_/phrag par bzhin bkod ma de rmongs par gyur/_/dal gyis 'du shes thob cing skrag ma de/_/be'u gcig ldan pa bzhin gzhon nus
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]bat+sAM/_/a tsin+ta yad+duHkha da bA na la s+yA ni ba ra No pA ya d+hi yA da yAr+d+raH/_/a ho ba tA yaM pa ta ge shwa ra s+ya kroR+YA nu ban+d+hI ma li naHpra yat+naH/_/puSh+NA ti ni t+yaM ka ru NA bi hI nAHpa ro pa g+hA te na sha rI ra kaM yaH/_/bi yu
[\[306b.2\]]mthong /_/de yi sdug bsngal nags me zlog pa'i thabs/_/brtse bas brlan pa'i blo yis rab bsams pa/_/snying rjes dman pa gang gis rtag tu ni/_/gzhan dag bcom nas lus ngan gso byed pa/_/kye ma 'dab chags dbang gis 'bad pa ni/_/gdug pas rjes su 'brel 'di rab tu dman/_/bu dang
[\[306b.3\]]dz+ya mA nA ta na ye na ne yaM dzI ba t+ya ba sh+yaM dzi na nI bi bat+sA/_/a yaM ku mA raHsu ku mA ramUr+t+tir+m+ma ye ba rak+Sh+yaHswa ta nu pra de na/_/k+Sha naM bi tsiM t+ye ti sa tA mu bA tsa mA tar+b+ra dza twaM sa su tA swa b+hU miM/_/gats+tshA mya haM san+na ga ba d+h+ya d+hA ma pra
[\[306b.4\]]bral bar gyur pa bu med kyi/_/ma 'di nges pa nyid du 'tsho ma yin/_/gzhon nu shin tu gzhon pa'i lus can 'di/_/rang gi lus byin bdag gis bsrung bar bya/_/skad cig 'di bsams de yis der smras pa/_/ma gcig khyod ni bu bcas rang sar song /_/klu dag gsod pa'i gnas su bdag mchi
[\[306b.5\]]yats+tsha sho NA shu ka tsih+na me tata/_/i t+yuk+ta mA tre pa da ye na te na sA kam+pa mA nAM ga la tA ta mU tse/_/na bA ts+ya me tad+b+ha ba tA bi ru d+haM twaM shaM kha tsu DA da d+hi kaHsu to me/_/a haM tu mo hor+m+mi ma gA d+ha sin+d+hu ma shar+m+ma kar+m+mo pa na
[\[306b.6\]]yis/_/gos dmar mtshan ma 'di ni bdag la stsol/_/zhes pa brtse ldan de yis brjod tsam la/_/yan lag 'khri shing 'dar des de la smras/_/'gal ba 'di ni khyod kyis brjod mi bya/_/khyod ni dung gtsug las lhag bdag gi bu/_/bde med las kyi nyer gnas gting med mtsho/_/rmongs pa'i rba rlabs
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]ta bi shA mi/_/a kA la yan+t+ro pa la duHsa hA ni duHkhA n+ya laM duHkr-i ti nA pa tan+ti/_/sA d+ho su d+hA san+ni d+hi rA shri tA nAM sa two da d+heHswasti mastI ta nu ste/_/b+hU yAdz+dza gal+lo tsa na dzI ba b+hU tA kalpa k+Sha ye s+ya k+Sha ya
[\[307a.2\]]ldan par bdag 'jug go/_/nyes pa byed pa rnams la sdug bsngal ni/_/dus min phyogs kyi rdo ba bzod dka' lhung /_/dam pa'i snying stobs chu gter khyod kyi lus/_/'gro ba'i mig dang srog gyur bskal pa ni/_/'jig kyang mi 'jig mngon sum rten byed kyi/_/bdud rtsi nye 'di
[\[307a.3\]]sA k+Shi NI yaM/_/i t+yu ts+ya mA naHsa ta yA pra yat+nAd+ba d+d+hA nu ban+d+haHswa ta nu pra dA ne/_/ya dA b+ha ban+nish+tsa la tsit+ta br-it+ti staM shaM khI tsU Do pa ta dA dza gA da/_/tAr+k+Sh+ya s+ya b+hak+Sh+yA ba ya mA di sarga sid+d+hAHki ma tra kri ya te bi d+hA tuH/_/mi
[\[307a.4\]]legs par ldan gyur cig_/ces pa de yis brjod cing 'bad pa des/_/rjes su bcings byas rang lus sbyin pa la/_/gang tshe sems spyod g.yo ba med gyur pa/_/de tshe dung gtsug gis kyang de la smras/_/mkha' lding zas su bdag spros dang por grub/_/'di la byed po la ni ci zhig bya/_/rgyu
[\[307a.5\]]th+yai ba niHkA ra Na bat+sa la twaM na kar+t+tu mar+ha s+ya pa de \u0f85tra tsin+tAM/_/i daM gu NA laM ka ra NaM ba su ste saM pUr+N+Na sau dza n+ya su d+hA ni d+hA naM/_/trai lo kya dzI bai ra pi rak+Sha NI yaM t+yA dz+yAM tr-i Na s+yai ba ka thaM ma mAr+the/_/b+ha ban+ti
[\[307a.6\]]med mnyes gshin dag las gnas min 'dir/_/khyod ni log pa'i bsam pa byar mi 'os/_/khyod kyi lus ni yon tan rgyan dang ldan/_/tshul bzang yongs su rdzogs pa bdud rtsi'i gter/_/srid gsum 'tsho ba yis kyang bsrung bya 'di/_/rtswa mtshungs bdag don ji ltar gtang bar 'os/_/srid pa'i
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]ni t+yaM b+ha ba kA na nesmin+tasmad+bi d+haHkA sha pa lA sha tu l+yAH/_/b+ha bad+bi d+ha s+yA mr-i ta so da ra s+ya na pA ri dzA ta s+ya pu naHpra sU tiH/_/pra sI da dzan+mAn+ta ra pu N+ya pa N+yai dr-iSh+To si sau dza n+ya su d+hA su d+hAM shuH/_/asmad+bi ShA de
[\[307b.2\]]nags tshal 'dir ni bdag lta bu/_/ka shi'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs rtag tu 'byung /_/bdud rtsi'i spun zlar gyur pa yongs 'du'i shing /_/khyod lta bu ni phyi nas 'khrungs ma yin/_/skye gzhan bsod nams zong gi tshul bzang khyod/_/bdud rtsi bdud rtsi'i zer mthong dang bar mdzod/_/bdag gi thugs
[\[307b.3\]]na ma naHpra yA saHsar+b+bAt+ma nA yaM b+ha ba tA na kAR+YaH/_/ga twAr+N+Na bA b+h+yar+N+Na ni biSh+Ta mUr+t+tiM gau kar+N+Na shar+b+baM pra Ni pa t+ya tUr+N+NaM/_/pA tA la ge haM dza ni nAM bi sr-i dz+ya gats+tshA ti tAM tar+k+Sh+ya shi la ma khin+naH/_/uk+t+we ti nA gaHpra Ni pa t+ya mUr+d+h+nA dzI
[\[307b.4\]]khral dag gis yid gdung 'di/_/bdag nyid kun gyis khyod ni yongs ma mdzad/_/rgya mtsho'i drung du lus bkod gau kar+Na/_/sha sbar myur du phyin nas phyag 'tshal te/_/ma ni sa 'og khang par rnam springs nas/_/mkha' lding rdo der skyo med bdag mchi'o/_/zhes brjod mgo yis sprin gyi bzhon pa la/_/
[\[307b.5\]]mU ta bA haM dza na nI sa hA yaH/_/dza gA ma gau kar+N+Na ta TaM ma hA bi ta raM ga hastAr+pi ta phe Na mA l+yAM/_/bid+yA d+hA rA d+hI sha su ta stu ta tra t+p+ra Ni saM rak+Sha Na nish+tsa ye na/_/pra dzan+da daR+shA ru Na pa Ta pA Ni mA yAn+ta man+taHpu ri kaM pu ra stAta/_/
[\[307b.6\]]rab tu btud nas klu ni ma dang bcas/_/rba rlabs chen po'i lag pas dbu ba'i phreng /_/rab bkod gau kar+NI ngos su song /_/rig 'dzin bdag po dag gi bu yang der/_/de yi srog ni rab bsrungs nges pa yi/_/'gro ba mdun du nyug rum pa dag ni/_/lag na gos dmar thogs nas 'ong ba mthong /_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]sa tsaR+Ya tsaR+YAHpra Ni pa t+ya tasmai ta trA tha tan+maM ga la paT+Ta yug+maM/_/A ga mya tA mut+sa ba sap+ta rA tra snA nA ya sadz+dzo bi d+hi ri t+yu bA tsa/_/b+ha dra twa ma gre bra dza nir+b+ba lam+ba ma bai hi mA mA ga ta mi ba pash+tsAta/_/tUr+N+Nan+ta
[\[308a.2\]]de nas nyug rum pa des phyag 'tshal nas/_/bkra shis gos zung de ni de la phul/_/dga' ston zhag bdun dag gi khrus kyi slad/_/cho ga bstar bas gyon par mdzod ces smras/_/bzang po sngon la khyed song rjes nas ni/_/thogs 'gor med par bdag 'ong shes par mdzod/_/ces
[\[308a.3\]]muk+t+we ti bi sr-i dz+ya haR+Sha da tsin+ta yat+sa twa d+hi yA ku mA raH/_/diSh+T+yA ma yA pan+na ga ba d+h+ya tsih+naM sa mI hi taM pA Ta la paT+Ta yug+maM/_/yat+nAd+bi nA bAp+ta mi daM pra dzA mi k+Shi praM shi la me ba b+hu dzaM ga sha troH/_/d+h+yA twe ti tsU DA ma Ni
[\[308a.4\]]brjod myur du de btang dga' ba yi/_/gzhon nu snying stobs blo yis rab bsams pa/_/klu dag gsod pa'i rtags gyur gos dmar zung /_/'dod pa 'di ni 'bad pa dang bral bar/_/a la bdag gis thob pas myur nyid du/_/lag 'gro dgra yi rdo can 'gro bar bya/_/zhes bsams gtsug gi nor
[\[308a.5\]]dIp+ta rasmi puM dzo pa maM mUr+d+d+h+ni ni d+hA ya paT+TaM/_/kr-i to t+ta rI ya pra Na yaHpa re Na sa tAr+k+Sh+ya pA tAM ka shi lAM dza gA mi/_/A sA d+ya tAM sh+yo Ni ta sho Na bAr+sh+wA mA sh+yA na lI nA hi ba shA ba She kAM/_/A ru h+ya tAr+k+Sh+yA ga ma
[\[308a.6\]]bu'i 'od zer ni/_/rab 'bar tshogs mtshungs gos ni spyi bor bkod/_/gzhan gyi bla gos dag tu chags byas te/_/mkha' lding babs rtags ldan pa'i rdo can song /_/brlan chags sbrul gyi zhag gi dran gyur zhing /_/ngos ni khrag gis dmar ba der phyin nas/_/'dzegs te mkha' lding 'ong ba
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]nA b+hi kAM k+ShI tas+thau sa sats+tsh+wa di ta pUr+b+ba kA yaH/_/a tha dra bat+kAny+tsa na tsI tso ro tsish+tsaN+Da sta Di ta puny+dza g+ha na pra kA shaH/_/sa mud ya yo ye na na b+ho ba b+hU ba sa bA Da bong+gA ra mi bAr+N+Na bAM b+haH/_/pak+ShIn+d+ro dr-i sh+ya tA rA
[\[308b.2\]]mngon 'dod pas/_/de ni lus kyi stod bsgribs rnam par gnas/_/de nas gser gyi khu ba'i rba rlabs ltar/_/mdzes pa'i glog drag tshogs kyi sprin dag ni/_/rab tu gsal bar gyur bzhin gang gis mkha'/_/rta gdong me 'bar rgya mtsho'i chu bzhin gyur/_/de nas gshog pa bskyod pas rab
[\[308b.3\]]da tha ta ra Ni ka rA krAn+ta he mA tsa lA b+haHpak+ShA k+She pa pra br-it+ta pra ta ta sa ri sa ran+mA ru ta k+Sho b+hi tA b+d+hiH/_/yat+saM pA tA ba he lA sha ka li ta sa ka lA lo ka ha b+h+raSh+Ta b+hU b+h+r-i ta prAk+tA ra s+phA ra g+ho Sha bya ti ka
[\[308b.4\]]bskyed rgyas par rab dkrigs rlung gi chu gter 'khrug byed cing /_/nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mnan gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs 'dab chags dbang po ring nas mthong /_/gang gis dman pa'i 'gros dag gis ni ljon pa mtha' dag grugs par gyur cing sa 'dzin gyi/_/rtse mo'i cha dag lhung ba'i sgra
[\[308b.5\]]ra tsa ki te bA ku lA b+hUr+b+ba b+hU ba/_/b+ho gIn+d+ra sha trUHs+thi ra bi gra ha s+ya ta s+yA tha badzro gra na khAM ku shA graH/_/g+ho rA sha ni s+phA Ta i bA tsa la s+ya pa pA br-iSh+Te ka Thi na pra hA raH/_/ku mA ra stA r+k+Sh+ya Na k+Sha ta da li ta gA tro
[\[308b.6\]]drag gnod pas 'jigs pa bzhin du sa gzhi 'khrugs par gyur/_/de nas ri la 'jigs rung rdo rje bzhin/_/brtan pa'i lus can de yi rgyab tu ni/_/rdo rje ltar drag sder mo lcags kyu'i rtse'i/_/drag por snun byed klu dbang dgra dag lhung /_/'phral la mkha' lding dag gis bsnun zhing lus ni gtubs
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]pi sa ha sA pa ra prA Na tra NA pra b+hu ta pu la kA laM kr-i ta ta nuH/_/pra da d+h+yau duHkhAr+t+ta bya pa Ni ga Na rak+Sho pa ka ra NaM sha rI ri ma b+hu yA t+sa ta ta mi da mi t+yA ya ta d+h+r-i tiH/_/nir+g+hA
[\[309a.2\]]par gyur mod kyang /_/gzhan srog bsrung la rab mang spu long gis brgyan lus can gzhon nu dag_/brtan pa yangs pas rtag tu bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i/_/gdung ba ldan pa'i tshogs rnams bsrung ba'i nyer 'khor gyur cig ces pa bsams/_/de nas
[\[309a.3\]]ta g+ho ra ta ra g+ho Sha mu khA b+hi g+hA ta nir+d+dA ri te pya tsa la satwa dr-i D+he the ta smin/_/ko yaM b+hu dzaM ga i ti ta tra bi haM ga rA dzaHsaM sak+ta bisma ya bi ni sh+tsa ya ni sh+tsa lo b+hU ta/_/a tha pu na ra b+hi ba t+yots+tsaN+Da
[\[309a.4\]]thug chom 'jigs rung sgra ldan kha yis mngon bcom zhing /_/nges par gtubs kyang de ni g.yo med nyid stobs brtan ldan tshe/_/lag 'gro 'di ni su zhes der ni 'dab chags rgyal po dag_/ya mtshan la chags rnam par nges slad g.yo ba med par gyur/_/de nas 'dab chags bdag po rab
[\[309a.5\]]mAr+t+taN+Da mA lA ka pi la bi pu la te dzaHpuny+dza siM gI kr-i tA maH/_/kha ga pa ti ra ru NAM shu byak+ta rak+ta pra bA ha pra ka Ta ma Ni ma hAR+ShIt+khaN+Da ma s+yA shu mUr+d+d+h+naH/_/asmin+na ba sa re bA la ha ri tsan+da na kA na ne/_/dzI
[\[309a.6\]]drag nyi ma'i phreng ba bzhin/_/gzi byin ser skya rgya chen tshogs kyis phyogs ni ser byed pas/_/slar yang mngon btab myur du de yi mgo yi dum bu dag_/nor bu 'od dmar rab 'bar khrag rgyun lta bur rab gsal blangs/_/gnas skabs der ni gzhon nu yis/_/ha ri tsan+dan nags tshal du/_/sprin
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]mU ta kai tu rA sI naHpat+n+yA sAr+d+d+ha snu ShA n+wi taH/_/pu tra daR+sha na sot+ka N+Dash+tsa n+d+rot+su ka i ba da d+hiH/_/shaM kA bi Sha N+Na hr-i da yash+tsin+tA krAn+ta i bA bra bIta/_/a ho ba ta ki ma d+yA bi bat+so dzI mU ta bA ha naH/_/na dr-i sh+ya gi ri ba
[\[309b.2\]]gyi tog ni btsun mo dang /_/lhan cig mna' ma dang ldan gnas/_/chu gter zla ba 'dod pa bzhin/_/bu ni blta bar 'dod gyur cing /_/snying la dogs pa gnas pa yis/_/bsam pas non pa bzhin smras pa/_/kye ma ci zhig da dung yang /_/bu ni sprin gyi bzhon pa dag_/ri mchog mtha' la blta
[\[309b.3\]]rA tsa ra srAn+tA lo ka na kau tu kI/_/dIp+tA ga ru Da be le yaM pra br-it+tA s+ya gi re sta Te/_/ya yA bi b+hA bya te byo ma dig+dA hong+gA ra dA ru NaM/_/b+ha ya b+hag+nA sha b+hu dzaM ga grA sa gr-i d+h+rAHpha Ni dwi ShaH/_/A bid+d+hA pA
[\[309b.4\]]ba yi/_/dge mtshan can de ma mthong ngo /_/ri 'di'i ngos la mkha' lding gis/_/dus 'di 'bar ba rab tu zhugs/_/gang gis nam mkha' mi bzad pa'i/_/phyogs sreg 'bar ba lta bur rtogs/_/'jigs pas lus nyams lag 'gro gang /_/za 'dod gdengs can dgra yis ni/_/kun tu 'bigs
[\[309b.5\]]ta ni r+g+hA ta g+ho ro yaM bar+t+ta te k+Sha NaH/_/i t+yun+me Shi Ni sA taM ka shaM kA shA yi ni shaM sa ye/_/ta s+yA gre n+ya pa ta drak+ta sik+ta sh+tsu Da ma Ni rdi baH/_/tan+ni rIk+Sh+ya pu raHkar+N+Na mAM sa ke sha ra sho Ni taM/_/dur+n+ni mit+ta mi
[\[309b.6\]]byed bsnun pa'i sgra/_/'jigs su rung ba dus 'dir 'jug_/de ltar the tshom rab rgyas shing /_/'jigs bcas dogs pa la gnas tshe/_/gtsug gi nor bu khrag gis bsgos/_/mkha' las de yi mdun du lhung /_/mi bzad pa yi ltas ngan bzhin/_/mdun du sha dang skra dang ni/_/khrag bcas kyis
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]bA pa h+yaM sa ha sai ba mu mo ha saH/_/tsU DA ma NIM ts+yu ta dr-iSh+T+wA pa t+yur+m+ma la ya ba t+ya pi/_/pa pA ta mo hA b+hi ha tA shwa shwA sa ha ma hI ta le/_/sha naiHsaM dz+nyAM sa mA sA d+ya dzA yA mA shwA s+ya sa snu ShaM/_/u
[\[310a.2\]]gang de mthong nas/_/'phral la de ni brgyal bar gyur/_/bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu dag_/lhung mthong ma la ya can yang /_/rmongs pas mngon bcom sgyug mo dang /_/lhan cig sa gzhi dag tu lhung /_/dal gyis 'du shes thob gyur nas/_/btsun mo mna' ma dbugs phyung ste/_/blo
[\[310a.3\]]bA tsa saM sha ye d+h+yA twa d+hI mAn+bi d+yA d+ha rA d+hi paH/_/pa sh+yA mya haM swa yaM ga twA bat+saM nardza na tsA ri NaM/_/g+ho rA ga ru Da be le yen+de ha san+de ha dA yi nI/_/tsU DA ma Ni sh+ts+yu tash+tsa yan+ni sh+tsa yA ya na kalpa te/_/e Sha saM b+hA bya
[\[310a.4\]]ldan rig 'dzin bdag po yis/_/the tshom bsams nas rab smras pa/_/bu ni sprin gyi bzhon pa dag_/rang nyid song ste bdag gis blta/_/mkha' lding dus ni 'jigs rung 'di/_/lus la the tshom ster byed yin/_/gtsug gi nor bu 'di lhung yang /_/nges pa nyid du mi brtag ste/_/'di ni gdengs can
[\[310a.5\]]te tAr+k+Sh+ya b+ha k+Sha mA Na s+ya b+ho gi naH/_/e baM bi d+hA pa taM t+ye ba ma na yaHpha Ni nAM sa dA/_/ut+pA ta bA ta nir+g+ha tasta ra lAstA ra kA i ba/_/i t+yuk+tA sa hi tastA b+h+yAM pA nu shaHk+Shi ti b+h+r-it+ta TIM/_/bi d+yA d+ha ren+d+raHpra ya
[\[310a.6\]]mkha' lding gis/_/za ba dag gi yin yang srid/_/'jigs pa'i rlung gis bsnun pa yi/_/rgyu skar rab tu g.yo ba bzhin/_/gdengs can rnams kyi nor bu ni/_/rtag tu 'di lta nges par lhung /_/zhes pa brjod nas rig 'dzin dbang /_/de gnyis dang 'grogs rjes 'brang bcas/_/gdengs can gsod
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]yau b+ho gi ba d+h+ya shi lA ba tIM/_/a trAn+tA re shaM khA tsU DaHsho Na ba d+h+ya pa TA n+wi taH/_/gau kar+N+Na mar+N+Na pa ta ne pra Na myA shu sa mA ya yau/_/sa dr-iSh+T+wA ga ru Do g+hA ta dir+N+NaM dzI mU ta bA ha naM/_/hA ha to pany+tsi
[\[310b.2\]]pa'i rdo ba can/_/sa 'dzin dag gi ngos su song /_/gnas skabs der ni dung gi gtsug_/gsod pa'i gos dmar dag dang ldan/_/chu gter ngogs su gau ka r+Nar/_/phyag 'tshal nas ni myur du song /_/sprin gyi bzhon pa mkha' lding gis/_/bsnun cing gtubs pa mthong gyur nas/_/kyi hud bcom
[\[310b.3\]]tosmI ti pa pA ta bi la sam+b+hu bi/_/sa tsu kro sha b+h+r-i shaM bASh+pa bi sha lang+gang+ga da swa raH/_/kur+b+ban+mu hurgi ri gu hAHsa pra lA bAHpra ti swa naiH/_/hA niHkA ra Na ban+d+ha bya sa ni nAM kA ru N+ya ba d+he ke yaM be sha la tA
[\[310b.4\]]mo bslus so zhes/_/rnam par smra zhing sa la 'gyel/_/yang yang ri phug sgra brnyan gyi/_/cho nge dag dang ldan byed cing /_/mchi ma rab zags de yis ni/_/ldab ldib sgra yis cho nge byas/_/kyi hud rgyu med gnyen gyur gdung ba can gyi snying rje bsod nams dag gi mtshams/_/gzhan gyi gdung ba
[\[310b.5\]]pa rAr+t+ti sha ma na prA na pra dA non+mu khI/_/hA sau dza n+ya ni d+he twa yA bi ra hi taM dzA tAn+d+ha kA raM dza gad+RA hu grasta su d+hA ma yU kha ga ga nas+thA yaM sa mA lam+pa te/_/prA Na trA Na bi d+hau pa re Shu kr-i pa yA
[\[310b.6\]]zhi byed srog rab sbyin la mngon phyogs mnyes gshin 'di ni ci/_/kyi hud tshul bzang gter dag khyod dang bral bas 'gro ba dag ni mun par gyur/_/bdud rtsi'i zer ni sgra gcan gyis zos nam mkha'i mdzes pa lta bu dag la brten/_/gzhan la brtse bas srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la kye ma srog
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]hA dzI bi ta t+yA gi naHsaM dzA tai ba ya sho ma yI ta ba ta nuHkalpAn+ta ras+thA yi nI/_/pA paHpA ta ka paM ka shaM ka la ta re g+ho rA pa bA do da re k+Ship+taHsaM k+Sha ya d+hAm+ni ni t+ya ni d+ha ne kiM shaM kha tsU Das+t+wa yA/_/
[\[311a.2\]]ni gtong byed pa/_/khyod kyi lus ni bskal pa'i bar gnas grags pa'i rang bzhin dag tu yang dag skyes/_/khyod kyi sdig can dung gi gtsug ni sdig pa'i 'dam rdzab dog cing nyam nga ba/_/rtag tu 'chi dang brlag pa'i gnas gyur 'jigs rung smad pa'i khongs su ci slad 'phangs/_/
[\[311a.3\]]i ti pra lA sa mu kha raHpra sar+b+ba na ru DA n+ti kaM/_/dzI mU ta ke tu mA yAn+taM ma pa sh+yat+sA nu gaM pha NI/_/ta smai ni bai d+ya br-it+tAn+taM nA gaHsho ka bi shr-iM kha laH/_/ba b+hA She b+hu dza muT+k+Shi s+ya pAk+She baHpa k+Sha pung+ga laM/_/
[\[311a.4\]]zhes pa mu cor rab smra zhing /_/mkha' lding drung du 'gro ba yi/_/gdengs can gyis ni sprin gyi tog_/rjes 'brang bcas pa 'ong ba mthong /_/de la byung ba'i mtha' bshad nas/_/klu ni mya ngan gyis 'khrugs pas/_/dpung pa blangs nas 'dab chags kyis/_/gang zag la ni smad bcas smras/_/
[\[311a.5\]]a la ma la ma bi tsA ra prAp+ta paR+YAp+ta pA pa bya sa na sa ra Ni b+hA dzA sA ha se nA mu na te/_/pha ni sa mu tsi ta tsih+naM kiM tsi de bA na be k+Sh+ya k+Sha ta ni ra ta ha taHkiM tAr+k+Sh+ya bi d+yA d+ha ro yaM/_/e ta dA kar+N+N+ya
[\[311a.6\]]gdengs can la 'os rtags ni cung zad nyid kyang ma brtags par/_/rig 'dzin 'di ni ci slad bcom zhing nges bsad nam mkha' lding /_/khyod kyis dang por ma dpyad steng du yongs rdzogs sdig pa yis/_/gdung ba'i lam bsten thub chod 'di yis mtshar byas mtshar ba byas/_/'di thos sprin gyi
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]dzI mU ta a gra ke tu dIr+N+Na ta nuH/_/dzI mU ta bA ha ni dr-iSh+T+wA mu mo ha ma hi ShI sa khaH/_/pri yaM pa taM ga rA dzo gra pra hA ra da li tA kr-i tiM/_/dr-iSh+T+wA ma la ya ba t+ya gre kaN+The prAp+tAr+d+d+ha dzI bi taM/_/s+thi tA pya d+haSh+ts+yu te
[\[311b.2\]]bzhon ba ni/_/mdun du lus nyams mthong gyur nas/_/sprin gyi tog ni btsun mo dang /_/bcas pa rab tu brgyal bar gyur/_/de nas ma la ya can gyis/_/mdun du mkha' lding dag gis khyo/_/drag bsnun gtubs pa'i dbyibs can dag_/mthong nas 'tsho ba phyed thob gyur/_/brtan yang ri shod
[\[311b.3\]]pA dre ra ha ta pyA haM te ba sA/_/sa dzI bi tA pya dzI bi ba sa mud+b+h+rAM tA pi ni sh+tsa la/_/rud+d+hA sar+b+bAM ga mA liM gya gA D+haM sa khye ba mur+ts+tsha yA/_/mu hUrtaM mo ha bi ba shA sA bi be da na kiM tsa na/_/sha na
[\[311b.4\]]lhung ba bzhin/_/ma bcom na yang de bcom bzhin/_/'tsho ba ldan yang 'tsho med bzhin/_/rab tu 'khyam yang g.yo med gyur/_/brtan pa'i grogs bzhin brgyal ba yis/_/yan lag kun la 'khyud cing bsdams/_/rmongs pas dbang dang bral ba de/_/yud tsam ci yang rig ma gyur/_/dal gyis
