[\[311b.5\]]kai rlab+d+ha saM dz+nye Shu sar+b+be ShA r+t+ta pra la pi Shu/_/bai rA ga lam+ba bai lak+Sh+ya bi ShA dI ga ru Do b+ha bta/_/gr-i hI ta b+haiR+Yo tat+kA la dzI bi tA t+yA ga nish+tsa yAta/_/yU pa turdza na kau prasta gA traM dzI mU ta bA ha naM/_/pa ra kA ru N+ya shI
[\[311b.6\]]'du shes thob gyur cing /_/thams cad gdung ba smra ba na/_/mkha' lding chags bral skyengs pa yis/_/mya ngan ldan pa dag tu gyur/_/de dus 'tsho ba gtong bar ni/_/nges byas brtan pa gzung ba yis/_/pha ma dag gis sprin gyi ni/_/bzhon pa lus zos la smras pa/_/bya min 'di la rab zhugs
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]la s+ya ke yaM pu tra ge ra tA/_/ta ba pr-i prat+tA kAR+Ya smin+nA ba yordzI ba hA rI NI/_/i ya mA san+na dza na tA rak+Sha rat+na ma rak+Sha tA/_/sha rI ra b+ha ba tA pu tra kiM nA ma su kr-i taM kr-i taM/_/i ti bru bA Nau pi ta rau shi raH
[\[312a.2\]]bu/_/nged kyi srog ni 'phrog byed pa/_/gzhan la snying rje'i ngang tshul can/_/khyod kyi rtsub po 'di ni ci/_/'gro ba'i tshogs ni rgud pa dag_/bsrung ba'i rin chen lus 'di ni/_/nges par ma bsrungs bu khyod kyis/_/legs byas dag ni ci zhig byas/_/zhes pa smra ba'i pha ma la/_/spyi bo
[\[312a.3\]]kam+pe na niHsa haH/_/sa pra Na myots+tsa lat+p+rA Na prA kir+N+NA k+Sha ra ma b+h+ya d+hAta/_/ta bA dz+nya yA bi nA tA ta ma me daM kur+b+ba taHswa yaM/_/a pash+tsi maHpra NA mo yaM twAt+p+ra sA da na lak+Sha NaH/_/k+Sha Na k+Sha yi Ni kA yasmin+na lak+Sh+ya pa
[\[312a.4\]]'dar bas phyag 'tshal nas/_/bzod dka' srog ni rab g.yo zhing /_/yi ge 'thor bar rab smras pa/_/yab gcig khyod kyi bka' mad par/_/rang gis 'di byas bdag gi ni/_/phyi ma med pa'i phyag 'di yis/_/khyod la rab tu dang ba mtshon/_/skad cig 'jig pa'i lus 'di ni/_/yongs su 'gyur
[\[312a.5\]]ri NA mi ni/_/pa ro pa kA ra sA rai ba dzam+ma yA trA sha rI NAM/_/dza ba na pa ba na lI lA bAl+la bal+lI da lot+Ya ta sa li la la ba bi lo laM de hi nA me ta dA yuH/_/s+thi ra pa da ma mr-i tA p+t+yA saM ta tAr+t+to pa kA rai kr-i ta pa
[\[312a.6\]]ba mi mtshon tshe/_/lus can rnams kyi skye ba yi/_/bgrod pa gzhan phan snying po nyid/_/lus can rnams kyi tshe 'di mgyogs pa'i rlung gi rtse dga' yis/_/bskyod pa'i 'khri shing 'dab ma la gnas chu thigs rnam par g.yo/_/rgyun du gzir ba la phan bsod nams gnas la yo byad ni/_/bsgrubs
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]ri ka ra ban+d+haM pu N+ya d+hAm+ni pra yA ti/_/i t+yuk+t+wa dza na kau sA srau pu raHprap+taM kha ge shwa raM/_/pash+tsat+tAM pe na ma ha tA ni m+dan+ta ni dza duHkr-i taM/_/bai rA gya gu ru NA satwa pra Na ye na pra mr-i h+ya saH/_/tsa kA ra s+thi ra saM
[\[312b.2\]]byas bdud rtsi thob pas brtan pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/pha ma mchi ma can la ni/_/brjod nas mdun du 'dab chags dbang /_/'gyod pa chen pos rang gis ni/_/nyes byas smod cing gnas pa dag_/de yi snying stobs 'bad pa ni/_/chags bral bla mas dag byas nas/_/klu ni za ba las zlog
[\[312b.3\]]kalpaM nA gA sha na ni br-it+ta ye/_/ta taHbaR+Yan+ta bi Sha ma shwA sa pras+kha li tA k+Sha raH/_/satwa pra kA sha she Sho b+hUt+sa ni mI li ta lo tsa naH/_/a tho tsi tAM su ra tsi tAM puSh+pAM shu ko tsi tAM tsi tAM/_/bra beSh+Tu tat+p+ri ya bah+ne ra gra me b+h+ya
[\[312b.4\]]la/_/kun tu rtog pa brtan po byas/_/de nas mi bzad mtha' yi dbugs/_/yi ge rab tu 'khrul pa can/_/mig ni rab tu zum pa de/_/snying stobs gsal ba'i lhag mar gyur/_/de nas sreg khang rab spras pa/_/'os shing me tog gos kyis spras/_/ma yi mdun du mngon phyogs te/_/'jug 'dod
[\[312b.5\]]sa ma b+h+ya d+hA ta/_/b+hak+t+yA ma yA b+ha ga ba tI to Shi tA b+ha ba bal+la b+hA/_/A di shan+ne ba raM sar+b+baM bi d+yA d+ha ra tsakra bar+t+ti naM/_/ta di daM pi ta thaM kasmAdz+dzA taM ma ma pa tI ba tsaH/_/ya da haM sap+ta rA tri Na bA la bai
[\[312b.6\]]de yi dga' mas smras/_/bdag gis gus pas mnyes byas pa/_/'byung po'i dga' ma bcom ldan mas/_/rig 'dzin kun gyi 'khor los sgyur/_/mchog ni bdag la rab tu byin/_/gang zhig zhag bdun nyid kyis bdag_/bu mo yugs sa'i skal ldan gyur/_/dag pa'i tshig 'di bdag la ni/_/ci slad
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]b+ha bya b+hA gi nI/_/dzan+mAn+ta re pi me b+hU yA da ya me bo tsi tAHpa tiH/_/uk+t+we ti sAg+nau bi k+She pa mAn+dA ra ku su mAny+dza liH/_/ta taHpe yU Sha ka la sha bya gra pA Ni sa ro ru hA/_/swa ya ma b+h+ye t+ya gi ri dzA prI t+yA dzI
[\[313a.2\]]bden pa min par gyur/_/bdag gi skye ba gzhan du yang /_/'os pa 'di nyid bdag gyur cig_/ces brjod de yis man+da ra'i/_/me tog snyim pa me la gtor/_/de nas bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis/_/lag pa'i mtsho skyes brel ba yis/_/ri skyes rang nyid mngon phyogs te/_/dga'
[\[313a.3\]]mU ta bA ha naM/_/a yaM dzI ba ti te pu tri pa ti ri t+ya b+hi d+hA yi nI/_/A dzI ba ya ta su d+hA sA raiHpU ri tA shA mu khAM shu b+haH/_/an+tar+hi tA yAM sar+b+ba t+yAM swa s+tho dzI mU ta bA ha naH/_/tAr+k+Sh+yaM ya yA tse nA gA nAM ha tA nAM dzI bi taM
[\[313a.4\]]bas bu mo khyod kyi bdag_/de ni 'tsho zhes rjod byed cing /_/bzhin gyi 'od kyis phyogs bkang ste/_/bdud rtsi'i char rgyun dag gis ni/_/sprin gyi bzhon pa rab tu bsos/_/ri sras mi snang gyur pa na/_/sprin gyi bzhon pa rab bsos nas/_/bsad pa'i klu rnams bsos pa ni/_/mkha' lding dag
[\[313a.5\]]pu naH/_/ta taHsar+b+ba sa mut+tas+thu stat+s+r-iSh+TA mr-i ta br-iSh+Ta b+hiH/_/sA lo kA pha Ni naHs+phI ta pha NA ma Ni ma rI tsi b+hiH/_/ta taHpra haR+Sha d+b+hu ta man+ma thA nAM tu l+yA b+hi yo gi na bi g+hUr+N+NA mA naH/_/sa mA ya yau sid+d+ha
[\[313a.6\]]la slar yang zhus/_/de nas de yis bdud rtsi'i char/_/spros pas gdengs can thams cad ni/_/gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od rgyas pa'i/_/snang ba dang ldan rab tu langs/_/de nas dga' dang rmad byung yid srubs rnams/_/mtshungs par mngon par sbyar bas 'dar byed cing /_/dpag bsam 'khri shing
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]su tA sa mI paM saM tsA ri NI kalpa la te ba pa t+yuH/_/yA te sa ma b+h+yar+ts+ya ta taHku mA raM kha ge shwa re pa k+Sha ba tI ba sa me ro/_/dzI mU ta bA hA b+hi mu kha s+ya dr-iSh+Ti rna shaM kha tsU Da s+ya dza gA ma tr-i p+ti/_/a tha su ra pa
[\[313b.2\]]yang dag rgyu ba bzhin/_/grub pa'i bu mo bdag po'i drung du song /_/de nas lhun po gshog pa ldan pa bzhin/_/'dab chags dbang pos gzhon nu mngon mchod song /_/sprin gyi bzhon pa dag la mngon phyogs pa'i/_/dung gi gtsug ni blta bas ngoms ma gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems
[\[313b.3\]]ti kAn+tA pA Ni pad+ma pra muk+tA bi ka tsa ku su ma pr-iSh+Ti r+b+bo d+hi satwa s+ya mUr+d+h+na/_/n+ya pa ta da ma ra mo dA sA ra saM pU ri tA shA kr-i ta gu Na nu ti shab+de bA ku lA ni swa ne na/_/ban+di twA pi ta rau ta daM g+h+ri ka ma
[\[313b.4\]]dpa'i spyi bor lha yi bdag po yis/_/mdzes pa'i lag pa'i pad+mas rab gtor me tog rgyas pa'i char/_/bung ba'i tshogs kyi sgra yis yon tan bstod byas sgra dbyangs bzhin/_/'chi med dga' ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs ni yongs su gang ba babs/_/pha ma dag la phyag 'tshal de dag zhabs kyi
[\[313b.5\]]la byA sak+ta tsU DA ma Ni haR+ShA sru sru ti b+hi sta yoHsu bi hi ta pre mA b+hi She ko t+sa baH/_/satwAb+d+hiHpa ri pUr+N+Na pu N+ye ni pa he dzI mU ta bA haHk+Sha NA drat+nA ni spu Ta tsa kra ba r+t+ti ka ma lA tsi h+nA ni saM prA p+ta
[\[313b.6\]]pad+mar gtsug gi nor bu chags/_/de dag dga' ba'i mchi ma zags pas dbang bskur dga' ston legs par bsgrubs/_/snying stobs chu gter bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs sprin gyi bzhon pas skad cig las/_/gsal bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal gyi mtshan ma rin chen rnams ni
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]bAn/_/a tha su ra pa ti nA sa me b+h+ya haR+Sh+yat+p+ra Na ya pa tA swa ya mA sa no b+hi Shik+taH/_/shri ya ma b+ha dza ta ban+d+ya mA na kir+t+ti s+t+ri da sha ga NaiHsa tsi rA yA tsa kra bar+t+ti/_/i ti swa dzan+mAn+ta ra
[\[314a.2\]]yang dag thob/_/de nas lha yi bdag po gus pa dang ldan pa/_/dga' bas mngon phyogs rang gi stan la mngon dbang bskur/_/skabs gsum tshogs kyis phyag byar 'os pa'i grags pa can/_/'khor los sgyur ba de yis yun ring dpal dag bsten/_/de ltar rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi
[\[314a.3\]]br-it+ta me tat+pu N+yo pa de she ka thi taM dzi ne na/_/kr-i twA ma yA g+r+yaM ku sha laM ya dAp+taM tat+sar+b+ba satwA b+h+yu da yA ya b+hU yAta/_/i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa
[\[314a.4\]]tshul 'di dag_/bsod nams nyer bstan dag la rgyal bas gsungs pa ni/_/bdag gis bsdebs las dge ba'i mchog ni gang thob des/_/sems can thams cad mngon par 'byung ba nyid gyur cig_/ces pa byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing dge ba'i dbang pos
[\[314a.5\]]la tA yAM ta dAt+ma dza so men+d+ra kr-i taM dzI mU ta bA ha nA ba dA na maSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ta mAHpal+la baH//_//na ren+d+ra nA maHsu ma teHshrI dza yA pI Da man+t+ri NeH/_/baM sha ba b+hU ba b+ho gIn+d+ro b+hau gIn+d+ra i ba b+ho ga
[\[314a.6\]]mdzad pa las/_de nyid kyi sras zla ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa'i sprin gyi bzhon pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//dpal ldan rgyal ba'i cod pan blon/_/blo bzang mi dbang zhes rigs la/_/gdengs can dbang bzhin longs spyod can/_/longs spyod ldan pa'i dbang
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]bAn/_/ta s+ya satwa ni d+heHshrI mAn gu Na rat+na gA Na shra yaH/_/sU nur+b+bA Ni su d+hA yu ti sin+d+huHsin+d+hu ri bA d+ha bta/_/ta s+ya pu traHpra kA shen+d+raHpra kA shen+d+ra ni b+ho b+hu gaM/_/ba b+hU ba dA na pu N+ye na po d+hi satwa gu No tsi
[\[314b.2\]]po byung /_/snying stobs gter gyur de yi bu/_/yon tan rin chen tshogs kyi gnas/_/dpal ldan tshig gi bdud rtsi bskyed/_/rgya mtsho dang mtshungs rgya mtsho byung /_/de yi bu ni rab gsal dbang /_/sbyin pa'i bsod nams dag gis ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'os/_/sa la rab gsal dbang mtshungs
[\[314b.3\]]taH/_/k+She men+d+ra stu ta yasta s+ya ka bIn+d+ra kir+t+ta tsan+d+ri kA/_/tsan+d+ra s+ye ba di tA ya s+yA mA na sol+la si nI sa tAM/_/ya s+ya rA ma ya shAHsarba pra ban+d+ha pre ra ko dwi dzaH/_/pra yA taHsadz+dza nA nan+daHpu N+ya pra tha ma dU ta tAM/_/taM
[\[314b.4\]]byung /_/de yi bu ni dge ba'i dbang /_/snyan ngag mkhan dbang zla shar bzhin/_/gang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od/_/dam pa'i yid ni rangs par byed/_/gnyis skyes dam pa'i skye bo dga'/_/rtsom pa thams cad skul byed pa/_/dga' ba'i grags pa gang gi ni/_/bsod nams dang po'i pho nyar gyur/_/nam
[\[314b.5\]]ka dA tsit+su khA sI naM su hr-ing+gu Na ba taM sa raH/_/sau ga taHkhyA ta su kr-i ta nak+ka nA ma sa ma b+h+ya d+hA ta/_/A tsaR+Ya go sa tat+tAR+Yai ra ba dA na kra modz+dz+hi tAH/_/uts+tsi t+yots+tsi t+yA ba hi tA ga d+ya ba d+ya bi shr-iM khA lAH/_/
[\[314b.6\]]zhig bde bar 'khod de la/_/grogs po yon tan ldan pa'i mchog_/legs byas grags ldan bde gshegs pa/_/na ka zhes pas rab smras pa/_/blon po sa 'tshos byin sogs kyis/_/rtogs brjod rim pa rab spangs te/_/btus shing btus pa rab bsdebs pa/_/tshigs bcad rkyang par bsdams pa dag_/
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]e ka mArgA nu sA ri N+yaHpa raM gAM b+hiR+Ya kar+k+wa shAH/_/bistIr+N+NA bar+N+Na naHsan+ti dzi na dzA ta ka mA li kAH/_/a ba dA na kra me Nai ba twaM tu saM k+She pa bista raiH/_/ra myai sta thA ga ka thAHko ma lA kartu mar+ha
[\[315a.2\]]lam gcig nyid kyi rjes 'brang ba/_/mchog tu zab cing rab tu dka'/_/rgya cher bsngags pa rgyal ba yi/_/skyes rabs dag gi phreng ba yod/_/khyod kyi rtogs pa brjod pa yi/_/rim pa mdor bsdus rab rgyas pa/_/dga' bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam/_/mnyen pa dag ni bya
[\[315a.3\]]si/_/i t+yuk+ta ste na bi na yAt+tAM ka thAM k+ta r+t+tu mut+Ya taH/_/a ba dA na tra yaM kr-i twA bi ra rA mA ti dair+g+h+ya taH/_/ta taHswasne b+ha ga ba tA dzi ne na pra ri taHswa yaM/_/sa gra hIt+pu na rud+Yo ga ma ba dA nAr+tha saM gra heH/_/
[\[315a.4\]]bar 'os/_/de yis dul bas 'di brjod tshe/_/gtam de bya bar rab tu brtsams/_/rtogs pa brjod pa gsum byas nas/_/shin tu ring bas dor bar gyur/_/de nas rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das/_/rang gi rmi lam du bskul te/_/rtogs pa brjod pa'i don bsdu ba'i/_/rtsom pa de yis slar yang blangs/_/
[\[315a.5\]]a thA b+h+ye ta swa yaM ta s+ya gr-i haM pradz+nyA pra kA sha bAn/_/A tsaR+Yo bIR+Ya b+ha drA khyAHpra khyA ta su kr-i to dz+wa laH/_/dzI na shA sa na shAs+t+re Sh+wa ba ri niSh+Tha ta mA na saH/_/gaM b+hi rA ga ma mArgesminya yau rat+na pra dI pa tAM/_/
[\[315a.6\]]de nas shes rab snang ba can/_/slob dpon brtson 'grus bzang zhes pa/_/legs byas rab tu 'bar bar grags/_/rgyal ba'i bka' yis bstan bcos la/_/yid ni yongs su rab gnas pa/_/rang nyid de khyim mngon phyogs te/_/zab mo'i lung gi lam 'dir ni/_/rin chen sgron me nyid du gyur/_/
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]asmad+bi trA ba dA nA nAM kr-i te sap+tot+ta ra sha te/_/so men+d+ra Na ma yA s+ye kaM kr-i taM mad+ga la saM pUr+NaM/_/ya s+ya hasta ga taM sar+b+baM shA s+t+ra mA yA shud+d+ha tAM/_/A tsAR+YaHso tra sUR+Ya shri lI kha n+yA sar+tha mar+thi taH/_/
[\[315b.2\]]bdag gi yab kyis rtogs pa brjod/_/brgya rtsa bdun ni byas pa las/_/zla ba'i dbang po bdag gis gcig_/bkra shis rdzogs pa'i slad du byas/_/gang gi lag son bstan bcos ni/_/thams cad dag pa nyid 'gyur ba/_/slob dpon nyi ma'i dpal de 'dir/_/yi ge 'god pa'i don du zhus/_/
[\[315b.3\]]sam+bat+sa re sap+ta biM she bai shA khya s+ya si to da ye/_/kr-i te yaM kalpa la ti kA dzi na dzan+mi ma hot+sa be/_/kIr+t+tastA rA b+h+r-i ku Ti ru di tA pA pa sha tru pra mA the dik+ShUt+sA haHki ma pi su ga to lo ka nA tha s+ya ya s+ya/_/tasmin
[\[315b.4\]]lo ni nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi/_/sa ga'i dkar phyogs shar ba na/_/rgyal ba skyes pa'i dga' ston tshe/_/dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di byas so/_/'jig rten mgon po gang gi sdig pa'i dgra bcom tshe na grags pa ni/_/sgrol ma khro gnyer can 'khrungs phyogs su spro ba ci yang legs par song /_/sa yi
[\[315b.5\]]k+Shau NI pa ti pa ri dr-i D+he shA sa nak+Sh+mA ma nan+ta saM to ShA ya pra sha ma su khi nAM ni r+m+mi to yaM pra ban+d+haH/_/a pA raM dur+b+bA raM pra sha ma pa ri hA raM ha ta d+hi yAM ma hA mo hA shA raM bya sa na ga Na b+hA raM pr-i thu ba the/_/ma da dwe ShA d+hA
[\[315b.6\]]bdag po yongs su bstan pa mtha' yas da ni sa skyong tshe/_/rab zhi bde ba can rnams tshim pa'i slad du gzhung 'di rnam sprul lo/_/khyed kyi 'khor ba mtha' med bzlog dka' blo nyams rnams kyi rab zhi 'phrog_/rmongs pa chen po'i khang pa rgya che lam du gdung ba'i tshogs kyi khur/_/rgyags dang sdang ba'i
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]ro bi Sha ya bi Sha sA raM dzi na ru tsir+b+bi kA raM saM sA raM ti mi ra pa ri bA raM ha ra tu paH/_/san+to Sha kA ri pa ra maM bi ma lA sha yA nAM kAn+taM pra sA da su b+ha gaM su kr-i ta pra yat+naM/_/b+hU yAt+p+ri yA ya

[\[316a.3\]]dza ga tAM ta di daM bi kA shi kA byaM ba sur+b+ha ga ba tash+tsa ta thA ga ta s+yaH//_!_//bo d+hi satwa da shA yaM yaHpra b+hA saHpr-i thi bI pa tiH/_/shAn+tiM li b+h+ya ga dzaM dr-iSh+TA sa baHpA yAt+ta thA ga taH/_/yaHshrI
[\[316a.4\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang snyan ngag dag_/rnam par rgyas pa 'di ni 'gro rnams dga' ba'i slad gyur cig/_!_//byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs su/_/gang zhig sa bdag rab gsal gyis/_/glang chen mthong nas zhi ba thob/_/de bzhin gshegs des khyod la bsrungs/_1_/gang zhig
[\[316a.5\]]She Nasta nuM prA dA ta ma Ni tsU Dash+tsa ta thA ma Ni mra/_/man+d+hA tA s+ya dza yal+lo kA na da dau tsan+d+ra pra b+haHshi raH/_/yash+tsa kre ba da ra dwI pa yA twAM su pri ya dzan+mA na/_/yash+tsi tA pra ti bim+be na muk+ti bA nu gra haM bya d+hA tra/_/sha shA sa
[\[316a.6\]]dpal sdes lus byin dang /_2_/de bzhin nor bu gtsug nor gyis/_3_/nga las nu yang 'jig rten rgyal/_4_/zla ba'i 'od kyis mgo bo byin/_5_/shin tu dga' yi skye bar gang /_/ba da ra yi gling bgrod byas/_6_/gang zhig ri mo'i gzugs brnyan gyis/_/mu tig can ni rjes bzung mdzad/_7_/gang zhig dpal
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]yash+tsa shrI gup+taM d+ha n+ya dz+yo tiSh+ka ma b+h+ya b+hA tra/_/nan+da sun+da rI rA gaM pra yat+ne na dza hA ra yaH/_/bi rU D+ha ka s+ya na ra kaM prA hA yaHshAkya saM k+Sha yAta/_/hA rI ti kA yA da ma nA yash+tsa kre yak+Sha yo Sha teH/_/
[\[316b.2\]]sbas la bstan dang /_8_/me skyes skal ldan du gsungs dang /_9_/mngal nas 'byung ba bstan pa dang /_10_/gang zhig dga' bo mdzes ma la/_/chags pa dag ni 'bad pas bsal/_11_/gang zhig shAkya brlag byas pas/_/'phags skyes po ni dmyal bar gsungs/_12_/gang zhig nor sbyin bud med ni/_/
[\[316b.3\]]a daR+sha yat+p+rA ti hAR+Ya de bA+e ba tA ra NaM tsa yaH/_/yaHshi mA ma k+Shi pad+b+yom+ni mai tre yaM byA ka ra Na tsaH/_/prA hA daR+sha mu kha s+yA g+r+yAM shA ri sU no sh+tsa yaHka thAM/_/yaHshro Na ko Ti kar+N+NA b+hU ta pu N+ya la k+Sha Na
[\[316b.4\]]'phrog ma dul bar mdzad pa dang /_13_/cho 'phrul rab tu bstan pa dang /_14_/gang zhig lha las babs pa dang /_15_/gang zhig mkha' la rdo ba 'phangs/_16_/byams pa dag ni lung bstan dang /_17_/gang zhig me long bzhin dang ni/_18_/shA ri'i bu yi gtam mchog gsungs/_19_/bsod nams mtshan nyid
[\[316b.5\]]kar+N+Ni kaH/_/yash+tsA mra pA lI tsa ri taM su kr-i to tsi ta ma b+h+ya d+d+hA ta/_/yash+tsA gr-i hAdz+dze ta ba naM tsa kro pi trA pa saM ga maM/_/pra da de pu tra dA rA di yo bi shwan+ta ra dzan+ma ni/_/a b+hi
[\[316b.6\]]rna rgyan can/_/gro bzhin bye rnar gang gyur dang /_20_/gang zhig a mra skyong ma'i spyod/_/legs byas la 'os gsungs pa dang /_21_/gang zhig rgyal byed tshal bzung dang /_22_/yab dang mjal ba mdzad pa dang /_23_/thams cad sgrol gyi skye bar gang /_/bu dang chung ma la sogs byin/_24_/shAkya'i
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]niSh+k+ra ma NaM yash+tsa dzA taHshAkya ku le b+h+ya d+hAta/_/mA ra bi drA ba NaM kr-i twA shA kyot+pa t+ti mu bA tsa yaH/_/yaHshro Na ko TI biM shA khyaHshrI mAny+dza n+mAn+ta re b+ha bta/_/d+ha na sA lA b+hi d+hA naM yaHsha shA sa
[\[317a.2\]]rigs su 'khrungs gyur pa/_/gang gis mngon par 'byung ba mdzad/_25_/bdud ni rnam par btul mdzad nas/_26_/shAkya 'byung bar gang gsungs dang /_27_/skye ba gzhan la dpal ldan gang /_/gro bzhin bye ba nyi shur gyur/_28_/gang zhig nor skyong zhes pa yi/_/glang chen dag ni myos pa
[\[317a.3\]]ma da kuny+dza ram/_/yaHkA shi pun+da raHshAn+t+yai k+ShAn+ti me ba bya tsin+ta yata/_/su bar+N+Na pAr+sh+wa nA mA si d+yaHsatwa hi ta kr-i ta mr-i gaH/_/ka l+yA Na kA ri yash+tsa b+hU da pa kA re bya bi kri yaH/_/yo bi shA khaHswa dzA yA yAHpA pA tsA
[\[317a.4\]]btul/_29_/gang zhig kA shi'i mjes pa yis/_/zhi slad bzod pa rnam par bsams/_30_/sems can phan byed ri dgas gang /_/gser gyi logs zhes bya bar gyur/_31_/gnod byed la yang rnam 'gyur med/_/dge byed dag tu gang gyur dang /_32_/rang gi chung ma'i sdig spyod las/_/khyad par lo ma
[\[317a.5\]]rAd+b+ya ra dz+yata/_/di de sha nA ga yoHshAn+tiM yash+tsa nan+do ba nan+da yoH/_/tsakra lU ha su dat+ta s+yaHyAHpra sA daM da yA ni d+hiH/_/yo b+ha bad+g+ho Shi laHshrI mAn pur+N+NaHpUr+N+Na gu Na sta thA/_/bai ra gyAta mU ka paM gu twaM
[\[317a.6\]]gang chags bral/_33_/dga' bo nyer dga'i klu dag la/_/gang gis zhi ba bstan pa dang /_34_/brtse ba'i gter ni gang zhig gis/_/khyim legs sbyin la rab dang mdzad/_35_/gang zhig dpal ldan gdengs can gyur/_36_/de bzhin gang po yon tan gang /_37_/chags bral dpal las phyir phyogs pas/_/
[\[317b\]]

[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]rna gong mdzes rgyan gsar pa'i spel legs su/_/skal bar thob 'di bstan la gces 'dzin pa/_/bshes gnyen rim byon bka' drin pha mtha' yas/_/khyad par lnga rig lang tsho na dar blos/_/drang srong phur bu'i khengs pa 'phrog nus can/_/sA la'i ljongs kyi lha dbang
[\[322b.2\]]smon 'gro ba/_/nges par thams cad mkhyen de'i rnam dpyod mthu/_/dge dbang zhal lung dpyid kyi bser bu yis/_/mkhas mang 'dod ldan pa spu nyer bslang nas/_/tshig don mchu sgros ches dmar ro bda' bar/_/yid kyi shing rta lan brgyar rgyug pa brel/_/de tsam sngon
[\[322b.3\]]byung gtam gyi skyor zlos las/_/da lta 'khri shing chu gter lta zhog gi_/mkhas dbang dpa' bo'i gsung rab pak+Shu yang /_/sgrol ba'i blo gros gru gzings nyin skar bzhin/_/kr-i kI'i mtshan ltas drang srong tshig gi mdas/_/chos brgyad lcags kyi gtun bu bdun skyes pa/_/
[\[322b.4\]]bstan 'dzin khyab 'jug gya gyu'i gar mkhan phal/_/drang po'i glegs bu gcan gzan mdun gyi rtswa/_/'on te rgyal bstan lnga phrag drug pa'i dus/_/gnam bskos sa spyod las shugs dar la drag_/skye rgu'i legs byas mtsho mjing zab rgya ches/_/sngon byon mkhas pa'i spun zla
[\[322b.5\]]'byung srid snyam/_/de phyir slob lam dus nas 'gro kun la/_/brtse bas bdag gzhan brje ba'i rnam thar dri/_/lo rgyus ma la ya rlung gis drangs pas/_/yid kyi tsha gdung sel ba'i mdza' gcugs ma/_/bla med byang chub ched du bya dka'i tshogs/_/grangs med bskal gsum
[\[322b.6\]]bsags pa'i bden dpang du/_/sa yi lha mo kun bzod las 'phags phyir/_/brdzun phreng gzhan 'drid gleng mo'i rjes 'gro min/_/gdul dka'i zhing 'dir pad mtshor ngang pa ltar/_/dgyes dgur 'jug pa'i lhag bsam snying stobs la/_/sras bcas
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pas/_/ches cher bsngags pa'i gtam snyan snying la sim/_/dpyad bzod rgyu mtshan shes nas dad pa'i zla/_/kun rtog 'bum phrag rdzing bur shar ba'i gzugs/_/gzhan rkyen rlung gis bskyod min rdo ba'i ngos/_/bris pa'i ri mo g.yo
[\[323a.2\]]med dngos po'i gshis/_/blo gsal rgya mtshor rtag 'bab glegs bam klung /_/'dzad med par gyi ma dros chu gter che/_/'phel 'grib med gang byed po gang+ga'i yab/_/rab dkar sems kyi rtse mo mkha' la bsnyeg_/dri bral 'byor pa'i 'o mtsho legs 'khyil bar/_/sgo
[\[323a.3\]]gsum brtson pa'i ljon pa bsgril ba las/_/snying po tshogs gnyis cher spungs rtsi bcud mar/_/byang chub mchog gi zungs su 'gyur bar shog_/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs de snyed lus can kun/_/bsod nams sa bon grangs med skye srid cing /_/btab smin g.yur du
[\[323a.4\]]za ba'i snye ma la/_/spyod pa'i rtse dga' khong nas dgod gyur cig_/ltar snang sna tshogs grub mtha'i mtshan mun klong /_/sgra tshad bzo gso nang rig rta bdun can/_/gung shar thos bsam sgom pa thub pa'i bstan/_/lung rtogs snang ba dam pa'i dpal 'bar shog_/'jam dpal
[\[323a.5\]]mi yi zlos gar btsong kha pa'i/_/ring lugs zhwa ser cod pan 'chang ba'i sde/_/'dzam gling skye dgu'i bsod nams mchod sdong du/_/nyi zlas mun sel de srid brtan gyur cig_/tshangs pas ka ba med pa gnam gyi sgo/_/phye nas mang pos bkur ba'i rgyal srid du/_/nyer bskos
[\[323a.6\]]sa yi brgya byin mchod yon zung /_/dbang thang dpal mgrin can dang skal mnyam shog_/spyi dang khyad par rgya hor gangs can 'dir/_/ring por 'cho ba'i nya lcibs khog yangs par/_/sdig 'bras dri bral bde skyid muk+ti ka_/cher spungs thar pa'i srad bur brgyu bar shog_/yongs
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]'du'i 'bras bzang gtong bar lag rkyong ba'i/_/byed por gtogs kun 'dir bstan rnam par thar/_/'dzin las ldog byed sdig dang rang gi rgyud/_/cung zad tsam yang lhan cig gnas min shog_/nye ring med par kun la rab 'jug rgyal ba'i thugs rje nyin byed dbang /_/
[\[323b.2\]]srid zhi'i rgud pa'i mun stug rab bcil phan bde'i pad dkar dga' tshal du/_/mchog gsum dam par bstod bsngags dar dir blo gros bung ba gzhon nu'i glus/_/dus mkhyen rgyal po'i bsod nams de snyed 'gro kun gyis thob bkra shis shog_/de ltar bdag cag gi ston
[\[323b.3\]]pa shAkya'i dbang po de nyid kyi zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi spyod yul yin la/_'on kyang gdul bya'i blo dang 'tsham par mdo dang lung las gsungs pa rnams tshad ma'i dpang por byas te 'phags pa'i yul gyi paN+Di ta chen po slob
[\[323b.4\]]dpon dpa' bos 'khrungs rabs so bzhi pa/_slob dpon seng ge zhabs 'bring pas skyes rabs sum cu rtsa lnga pa/_mkhas pa tsan+d+ra go mis 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gar/_dpal dga' ba'i lhas klu kun tu dga' ba'i zlos gar/_chos rgyal dge dbang yab sras
[\[323b.5\]]kyis rtogs brjod rin po che dpag bsam 'khri shing sogs mdor na mkhas pas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos kyi rigs gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir 'gyur ba ji snyed cig yod pa'i nang nas rtogs brjod rin po che dpag bsam 'khri shing 'di nyid brjod bya don dang 'brel pas rtogs sla/_rjod byed
[\[323b.6\]]rgyan dang 'brel pas rna bar snyan/_tshig rkang sdeb sbyor dang 'brel pas gcod mtshams phyed/_ming mngon brjod dang 'brel bas ngo mtshar ba ste khyad chos bzhi dang ldan pa yin pas phun sum tshogs la/_thams cad mkhyen pa bu'i chos 'byung du 'di nyid la slob dpon gsung ba ni
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]slob dpon dang rgyal po mi 'gal ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ste/_don du 'di nyid sa spyod chen po yin pa'i khungs ni/_dpal ldan rgyal ba'i cod pan blon/_/blo bzang mi dbang zhes rigs la/_/gdengs can dbang bzhin longs spyod can/_/longs spyod ldan pa'i dbang po byung /_/zhes dpal ldan
[\[324a.2\]]shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po'i mdun na 'don du gyur pa'i mi'i dbang po'i rigs brgyud las byung ba yin la/_de yang mes po rgyal po rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i sras sa spyod rab gsal du grags pa lugs gnyis kyi dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa de nyid kyi sras su bltams
[\[324a.3\]]pa'i chos rgyal dge ba'i dbang pos bstan bcos 'di mdzad pa'i rkyen yang /_gnyis skyes dam pa'i skye bo dga'/_/rtsom pa thams cad skul byed pa/_/zhes pa nas bzung ste/_de nas rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das/_/rang gi rmi lam du bskul te/_/zhes pa'i bar gyis
[\[324a.4\]]bstan pa ltar bstan bcos 'di rtsoms shig par dang por bram zes bskul ba/_bar du grogs kyis bskul ba/_tha mar bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyis bskul ba la brten nas rab gsal nas bzung /_zas gtsang ma'i rtogs brjod kyi bar brgya rtsa bdun po rnams
[\[324a.5\]]rgyal po rang nyid kyis mdzad nas/_sprin la zhon gyi rtogs brjod bkra shis kyi grangs tshang ba'i slad du dge ba'i dbang po nyid kyis rang gi sras zla ba'i dbang po la rtsoms shig par bskul bas na/_de yis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/_/brgya rtsa bdun po 'di dag byas/_/
[\[324a.6\]]bkra shis grangs ni rdzogs pa la/_/gcig ni rab tu 'bad pas bya/_/zhes gsal bar bstan pa'i yal 'dab brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di nyid snyan dngags kyi tshig sbyor la ldog pa shar ba'i lugs kyis tshig rna bar mi 'jebs shing don go dka' ba ma yin par dngos lho pa'i
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]lugs kyi tshig sbyor phun sum tshogs pa kho na'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/_tshigs bcad rkyang par bsdams pa dag_/lam gcig nyid kyi rjes 'brangs pa/_/mchog tu zab cing rab tu dka'/_/rgya cher bsngags pa rgyal ba yi/_/skyes rabs dag gi phreng ba yod/_/
[\[324b.2\]]ces gsungs pa'i lam gcig nyid kyi rjes 'brangs pa zhes pa'i tshig gcig pu 'dis lho phyogs pa'i lam kho na dang mthun par dngos su bstan to zhes mkhas pa'i dbang po grangs chen lo tsA ba 'jam dpal rdo rjes ngoms bshad du mdzad pa ni bla na med pa'i legs par bshad pa'o/_/
[\[324b.3\]]de yang bod 'dir rang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' 'dzin pa'i bla chen mang pos rtogs brjod 'di ni rgyal pos brtsams pas byin rlabs mi 'byung zhes smra ba ni au D+yan gyi rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti dang /_bod kyi chos rgyal mes dbon sogs dam pa mang po la'ang smod par 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las
[\[324b.4\]]ngan gsog par zad cing /_mkhas rlom la la dag dge dbang yab sras gzigs rgya chung bas bstan bcos 'dir sangs rgyas kyi rnam thar ma yin pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi rtogs brjod mang du yod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam thar kho na min no zhes smra ba ni smra ba po rang nyid
[\[324b.5\]]rtogs brjod 'di la blo gros kyi 'jug pa zhib mor ma byas shing /_mdo lung rnams dang ma 'dris pa'i rang gi nang cha phyir ston pa kho na ste/_dam pa'i grib bsil dang ldan brtan pa'i chos kyi rtsa bas bskor zhing bsod nams ra bar gnas/_/blo dang rig pa snying rje la sogs chu yis rnam
[\[324b.6\]]mdzes rnam par rgyas pa'i yal ga can/_/chog shes dri med yal 'dab grags snyan dkar ba'i me tog rtag tu dam pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/bsam kun yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dpal ldan sangs rgyas ljon pa rnam par rgyal gyur cig_/ces pa 'dis rtogs brjod rin po che'i tshig
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]don mdor bstan pa yin la/_bstan tshul khyad chos dang po ni/_mgon po klu sgrub kyis/_dang por byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed de/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing /_/bar du gcod pa'i bdud bzhi 'joms byed pa/_/bcom ldan seng ge de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[325a.2\]]zhes dang por byang chub tu thugs bskyed/_bar du tshogs bsags/_mthar bdud bzhi bcom nas sangs rgyas pa ni ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i rnam par thar pa'i rtsa ba yin pas/_dam pa'i grib bsil sogs kyi don tshul 'di dang mthun par 'chad tshul ji ltar zhe na/_dang por theg
[\[325a.3\]]pa chen por rigs nges pa'i dam bca' mi 'gyur bar brtan pa'i chos smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems bskyed kyi rtsa bas rab tu bskor zhing 'phel ba ni rgyas bshad yal 'dab dang po rab gsal gyi rtogs brjod dang /_brgya pa bsod nams rab gsal gyi rtogs brjod gnyis kyis
[\[325a.4\]]bstan/_bar du bsod nams dang ye shes kyi ra bar gnas pa la byang chub kyi blo dang rig pa shes rab dang brtse ba snying rje chen po gsum dngos su bstan la/_sogs khongs nas sbyin tshul bzod brtson bsam gtan lnga shugs kyis bstan pa'i sgo nas rgyal sras kyi spyod
[\[325a.5\]]pa'i chu yis rnam par mdzes par byas nas grangs med gsum du tshogs gnyis kyi sdong bu ches cher rgyas pa yin pas/_de'i don rtogs brjod 'dir rgyas par phye ba'i skabs yal 'dab gnyis pa dpal sde/_gsum pa gtsug nor/_bzhi pa nga las nu/_lnga pa zla 'od/_nyer bzhi pa thams
[\[325a.6\]]cad sgrol/_zhe gsum pa gser mdog_/nga gcig pa gser ldan/_nga gnyis pa bsod nams mi dman/_nga lnga pa thams cad ster/_nga brgyad pa bsod nams stobs/_re bzhi pa nor bzang /_don dgu pa dbang chen sde/_gya lnga pa phan pa tshol/_go lnga pa stag mo lus byin/_go drug pa
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]glang po/_go bdun pa rus sbal/_go dgu pa pad+ma can/_brgya dang gsum dga' ba'i gong bu/_brgya dang bzhi ri bong /_brgya dang brgyad sprin zhon rnams sbyin pa'i phar phyin la sbyar/_so gsum pa khyad par lo ma/_so brgyad pa lkugs pa 'phye bo/_gya drug pa ba men gsum tshul khrims la
[\[325b.2\]]sbyar/_sum cu pa kA shi mdzes dga'/_so gnyis pa dge byed/_so dgu pa bzod pa la dga' ba/_zhe drug pa byas shes/_go gnyis pa mdza' bo'i bu mo rnams bzod pa la sbyar/_drug pa ba dar bgrod/_zhe brgyad pa don grub/_brgya dang drug pa gser gyi go cha rnams brtson 'grus la sbyar/
[\[325b.3\]]nga bzhi pa sems can sman/_re lnga pa rwa gcig pa/_gya brgyad pa nag pa glang po bstan/_go brgyad pa dka' thub pa/_brgya dang gcig pa sngo bsangs can rnams bsam gtan la sbyar/_bco brgyad pa me long bzhin/_so gcig pa gser logs/_nga gsum pa legs bshad tshol/_re drug pa
[\[325b.4\]]snyan ngag mkhan/_go gcig pa shi bi legs bshad/_brgya dang gnyis pa seng ge/_brgya dang bdun pa zas gtsang ma rnams shes rab la sbyar/_mthar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshul rtag tu dam pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang rang gi re ba dang
[\[325b.5\]]mthun par bsam pa kun yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yin la/_de nyid rtogs brjod du rgyas par bye ba ni/_bdun pa mu tig 'khri shing /_brgyad pa dpal sbas/_dgu pa me skyes/_bcu pa mngal byung /_bcu gcig pa mdzes dga'/_bcu gnyis pa 'phags skyes po/_bcu gsum pa
[\[325b.6\]]'phrog ma/_bcu bzhi pa cho 'phrul bstan pa/_bco lnga pa lha babs/_bcu drug pa brag 'phangs pa/_bcu bdun pa byams pa lung bstan/_bcu dgu pa shA ri'i bu/_nyi shu pa gro bzhin bye ba rna/_nyer gcig pa a mra skyong /_nyer gnyis pa rgyal byed tshal yongs su bzung ba/_nyer gsum pa
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]yab sras mjal ba/_nyer lnga pa mngon par byung ba/_nyer drug pa bdud bcom pa/_nyer bdun pa shAkya 'byung ba/_nyer brgyad pa gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa/_nyer dgu pa nor skyong /_so bzhi pa dga' bo nyer dga' btul ba/_so lnga pa legs byin/_so drug pa gdangs can/_so bdun pa gang po/_bzhi
[\[326a.2\]]bcu pa ser skya/_zhe gcig pa u Ta ya/_zhe gnyis pa mkhas pa/_zhe bzhi pa gser lag_/zhe lnga pa ma skyes dgra/_zhe bdun pa sA la'i sdong bu/_zhe dgu pa glang po can/_lnga bcu pa las bcu spyad pa/_nga drug pa ba lang skyong btul ba/_nga bdun pa mchod rten/_nga dgu pa ku lA la/_drug
[\[326a.3\]]cu pa klu gzhon/_re gcig pa zhing pa/_re gnyis pa grags byin/_re gsum pa 'od srungs/_re bdun pa dge 'dun srungs/_re brgyad pa pad+ma ldan/_re dgu pa chos rgyal rab gnas/_bdun cu pa nyi ma gung pa/_don gcig pa sha na'i gos can/_don gnyis pa nyer sbas/_don gsum pa klu la
[\[326a.4\]]springs pa/_don bzhi pa sa gzhi phul ba/_don lnga pa rten 'brel bcu gnyis/_don drug pa bi du ra/_don bdun pa ke na ya ka_/don brgyad pa brgya byin lhung ba/_brgyad cu pa rab bzang /_gya gcig pa rgyu'i mchog_/gya gnyis pa dmyal ba mngon ldan/_gya gsum pa sgra gcan zin/_gya bzhi pa sbrang rtsi
[\[326a.5\]]dbyangs/_gya bdun pa pad can/_gya dgu pa chos sred/_dgu bcu pa nor can/_go gsum pa ma ga d+ha/_go bzhi pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen/_brgya dang lnga pa rai ba ti'i yal 'dab rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'bras bu'i mdzad pa la sbyar nas bshad ma thag pa'i mdzad pa de dag thams cad
[\[326a.6\]]khyad chos gnyis pa rjod byed kyi tshig rgyan nyams dang 'gyur ba stong gis ngo mtshar bas 'di las lhag pa gzhan du tshol mi dgos pa'i chog shes shing rgyan sbyor tshul log pa sogs rtsom pa'i skyon gyi dri ma cung zad tsam yang sbags pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i yal 'dab
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]brgya rtsa brgyad pa ngo mtshar ba'i rgyan gyis blo ldan rnams kyi yid rang dbang du 'phrog cing /_khyad chos gsum pa rnam par rgyas pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi yal ga mtha' klas pa can rin chen 'byung gnas sogs nas bshad pa'i lci yang 'khrul pa med pas gcod mtshams phyed/_khyad chos
[\[326b.2\]]bzhi pa phul du byung ba'i grags pa'i snyan pa ming gi mngon brjod mdzes pas dkar ba me tog gi lan+dzar g.yur du za ba la brten nas/[b ]dpal ldan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtogs brjod kyi ljon pa chen po skyes bu dam pa'i thugs rje'i grib bsil dang ldan pa la lus can kun
[\[326b.3\]]bde bar ngal gso ba 'di nyid phyogs dus kun tu rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig_/ces shis pa brjod pa'i mdor bstan rgyas bshad kyi legs bshad nyi ma chen po 'di nyid mngon sum du lta ba'i skal bar gyur na log rtog gi mun pa thams cad bsangs par 'gyur ro/_/de yang rje sa paN
[\[326b.4\]]gyi gsung chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa'i thugs la nye bar bzhag ste bla ma chos kyi rgyal po dang dpon chen shAkya bzang po gnyis kyi bdag rkyen la brten nas 'jig rten gyi mig gcig pu snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa shong ston lo tsA ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'phags yul gyi
[\[326b.5\]]snyan dngags mkhan chen po lak+Sh+mI ka ra la brten nas mang yul 'phags pa'i drung du bod kyi skad du legs par bsgyur/_de nas bzung ste zha lu lo tsA ba rin chen chos skyong bzang po dngos kyi slob mar bcas pa'i bar du gtsug lag 'di nyid la dpyis phyin par sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa nam
[\[326b.6\]]mkha'i skar tshogs lta bur gyur cing /_de nas dus kyi dbang gis legs par sbyangs pa'i dpyod ldan ches cher dkon na'ang rgyun cung zad ma nyams tsam gnas pa las rtogs brjod rin po che 'di'i dka' ba'i gnad rnams kyis zhib mor bshad pa'i brgyud pa ni/_shong ston nas rim pa
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]bzhin gcung lo chen blo gros brtan pa/_lo mchog pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa dbang lo chen po/_lo chen byang chub rtse mo/_lo chen nam mkha' bzang po/_lo chen shes rab dpal/_lo chen thugs rje dpal/_mtshungs med bud+d+ha'i mtshan can/_gnas brtan legs pa rgyal mtshan/_zha lu
[\[327a.2\]]lo chen chos skyong bzang po/_de'i dbon pad dkar chos skyong /_grangs chen lo tsA ba 'jam dpal rdo rje/_smon 'gro paN+Di ta rig gnas rgya mtsho'i phreng ba 'dzin pa tshe dbang don grub/_rigs chos kyi sras 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje'i drung du skad gnyis smra ba za hor gyi ban+de ngag dbang
[\[327a.3\]]blo bzang rgya mtshos thos so/_/lung rkyang gi brgyud pa ni/_chos rgyal dge ba'i dbang po/_sras zla ba'i dbang po/_paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mI ka ra/_shong lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan/_gcung blo gros brtan pa/_dbon chos skyong dpal/_dpang lo tsA ba blo gros brtan pa/_lo chen byang chub rtse mo/_lo tsA
[\[327a.4\]]ba grags pa rgyal mtshan/_bo dong phyogs las rnam rgyal/_stag lung pa ngag dbang grags pa/_kun spangs rnam rgyal grags pa/_'bum rab 'byams pa rin chen chos dbang /_rab 'byams pa tshul khrims dbang phyug_/dpal khang lo tsA ba dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde/
[\[327a.5\]]mdo khams pa yon tan rgya mtsho/_'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis/_rje tshe dbang kun mkhyen/_kun bzang rtse pa dbang phyug rgyal mtshan/_bla ma rdo rje rgyal mtshan/_dpal 'byor gling pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal/_rigs brgya'i khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan/
[\[327a.6\]]zur rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol/_yang na dpal khang lo tsA nas/_rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal/_'jam dbyangs kun mkhyen tshe dbang nas/_rje chos dbyings rang grol gyi bar gong bzhin te/_de las bdag gis nos shing /_bstan pa rin po che'i rgyun la bsams nas
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]thos bsam gyi ched du 'chad nyan sgo gsum 'bad pas bsgrubs pa las bzang rdzu 'ug pa sbos pa'i 'gying tshul lhur len pa rnams dang 'dra ba ni ma yin no/_/de yang srid pa mtha' dag me 'bar ba'i klong ltar sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can du shes nas 'khor ba las rnam par
[\[327b.2\]]grol ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i nges 'byung gi bsam pas zin pa'i gang zag ches dkon na'ang /_dus kyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sred pa ches cher 'phel kyang mang du thos pa'i tshul la blo sna bstungs te/_nges 'byung spu sud
[\[327b.3\]]kyi rnam pas gsol 'debs thang thung dang bzlas bsgom sems khrid sad sud kyi yig cha la sha rul la sbrang ma 'thibs pa ltar 'du zhing /_gzhung chen po rnams yal bar 'dor ba'i dbang gis gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir dus kyi 'khor lo'i yig cha la mkhas rlom gzhan gyi brtsam
[\[327b.4\]]chos gang gis kyang bsgrun du med pa grags pa don ldan gyi mkhas grub chen po nor bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sngon med kyi legs bshad dri med 'od rgyan par du 'khod na'ang don du gnyer ba ches dkon pas/_rtogs brjod rin po che 'di nyid kyang par du brkos pa par mkhan
[\[327b.5\]]rnams kyi yan lag ngal ba'i dka' thub lhur len pa tsam du zad mod/_'on te rgya gar gyi paN chen kha spu can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa gsar du brtsams pa dang /_skad gnyis smra ba'i lo tsA ba rnams kyis bsgyur zhing rjes 'jug gi bstan 'dzin
[\[327b.6\]]mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnams kyis dar rgyas su mdzad pa ni rang nyid mkhas par bsgrub pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang gya tshom gyis tshul der zhugs pa ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa med pa'i 'gro ba rnams dad pa gsar du spel ba dang /_dad pa dang ldan pa rnams gong
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur bas rang gzhan gyi bsod nams dpag tu med pa gsog pa'i phyir dkon mchog tA la las/_dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste/_/yon tan thams cad bsrung zhing 'phel bar byed/_/dogs pa sel zhing chu bo rnams las sgrol/_/dad pas bde
[\[328a.2\]]'gro'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin/_/zhes pa dang /_mkhas mchog dpa' bos/_grags pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa bzang po 'di rnams kyis/_/bde bar gshegs gyur lam rnams gang yin bstan par 'gyur/_/yid la dad pa med pa rnams kyang dad par 'gyur/_/chos dang ldan pa'i
[\[328a.3\]]gtam gyis dga' ba nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa'i don dang mthun zhing /_lo chen chos skyong bzang po'i bka' drin las sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje/_dbon pad dkar chos skyong /_skyogs ston smon grub lo tsA ba/_dpal khang lo tsA ba dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde sogs
[\[328a.4\]]skad gnyis smra ba'i lo chen mang du byon zhing /_de dag las brgyud pa'i yang slob dang nying slob rgya cher gyur pa'i nang tshan sgang rgan 'od zer rgyal mtshan dang grangs chen lo tsA ba'i drin las smon 'gro ba yab sras sogs tshad thub kyi mkhas pa kha yar byung yang deng song ni zur mkhar blo
[\[328a.5\]]gros rgyal po'i gsung las/_tshul de lta na yang pur rgyal 'dir/_/gzhan kun la phyogs med gtong ba dang /_/rang legs bshad tshol bar rlom na yang /_/don byin len gnyis ka gser las dkon/_/zhes gsungs pa ltar glegs bam 'di nyid la gzigs pa lhur len pa
[\[328a.6\]]dkon pa 'dra zhig 'dug kyang /_bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa lnga brgya phrag bcur gnas par bshad pa'i da lta lnga phrag drug pa'i nang du yod pas gzhung lugs 'di dag 'chad nyan gyis gtan la 'bebs pa'i mkhas pa 'ga' zhig 'ong srid snyam rang gis rang la blo bag nye bar
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]bsros te skad gnyis shan sbyar gyi ma dpe 'di bzhin rgya dpe dang bstun nas thams cad mkhyen pa lo chen chos skyong bzang pos zhus dag mdzad pa'i dpe rgyun yin pas 'khrul pa ga la srid kyang /_bu dpe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par yi ge nor ba'i skyon 'dra yod 'dug pa nas rin
[\[328b.2\]]spungs sa spyod dbang po'i phyag dpe khungs dag tu byed pa dang bstun 'dar lo ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis 'bru zhus dang /_dogs gnas kyi sar sgra'i dpyad pas gtan la 'bebs pa dang /_rgya bod kyi tshig rkang re gnyis chad pa snon pa dang bsgyur du bcug_/khyad par yal 'dab gnyis
[\[328b.3\]]pa'i/_bdag gis sgyu ma bsgrubs nas ni/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa gnyis pa'i skad dod rkang pa gzhan rnams ltar kha sgo yang ma'i sdeb sbyor/_yal 'dab gsum pa'i/_snying stobs ldan rnams nang na ni/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi phyed phyi ma'i rkang pa
[\[328b.4\]]dang por dga' ba'i char gyi skad dod 'bru gsum chad par pri ya ni zhes pa bcug_/yal 'dab drug pa'i/_phyis kyang lam ni de nyid nas/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa dang po'i skad dod chad pa rkang pa phyi ma gsum dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor/
[\[328b.5\]]yal 'dab brgyad par/_mi shes rmongs pa sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje bsod nams la brtson pas/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa gnyis pa nas 'bad pa'i skad dod yig 'bru gsum chad par a gong du mtshams sbyar/_ma srog med la a nu'i a bcug
[\[328b.6\]]pa'i dngos bstan pa sh+ya ma zhes pa bcug_/yal 'dab dgu pa'i/_nyi zla'i 'od zer nyams byed rin chen rnams dang sa srungs 'od ldan glang po dang /_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa dang por 'od zer gyi skad dod yig 'bru bzhi chad par b+ha na wA kaM zhes pa bcug_/yal
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]'dab bcu gnyis par/_de nas dus kyi sa bdag gi_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi phyed phyi ma'i rkang pa dang po'i zhes bya ba'i skad dod yig 'bru gsum chad par nA mI ya zhes pa bcug_/yal 'dab bcu bzhi pa'i/_zad byed rnams kyis mthong bar gyur/_/zhes pa'i mthong bar gyur gyi skad
[\[329a.2\]]dod chad pa daR+sha sogs yig 'bru drug bcug_/yal 'dab sum cu rtsa drug pa'i rgya skad tsa tu ra sogs rkang pa gcig bod skad du ma bsgyur 'dug pa/_yongs su spyod pa bzhi yi ni/_/zhes par bsgyur/_yal 'dab zhe gcig pa'i bud+d+ha sogs kyi bod skad rkang pa gcig chad pa/_'jigs pa
[\[329a.3\]]rtogs shing khong chud pas/_/zhes par bsgyur/_yal 'dab bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'i/_de dag dregs pas khengs pa dang /_/zhes pa'i skad dod chad pa rkang pa gzhan rnams dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor/_yal 'dab lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i/_chos min mang ba'i rgyal srid ces sogs
[\[329a.4\]]rkang pa gnyis kyi skad dod chad pa rkang pa gzhan gnyis dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor/_yal 'dab drug cu rtsa drug pa'i/_mkha' dang ral gri 'grogs pa yi/_/zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig chad pa rkang pa gzhan gsum dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor/_yal 'dab
[\[329a.5\]]bdun cu rtsa drug pa'i/_dben par rnam par gnas pa yi/_/zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig chad pa rkang pa gzhan gsum dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor/_yal 'dab bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'i/_rang gi gnas su sa bdag de/_/zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig dang /_yal 'dab
[\[329a.6\]]brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'i/_gter ni brgya yis bskor ba de/_/zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig chad pa rnams 'dar pa lo tsA ba'i rnam dpyod las legs par 'thon zhing /_yang yal 'dab gnyis pa'i/_kye ma sa spyod dpal gyi sdes/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi rgya skad/_yal 'dab drug
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]pa'i nang gi/_de nas gsum pa'i grong khyer bai DUr+ya rang bzhin/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gcig dang /_yal 'dab zhe brgyad pa'i nang gi/_de yis gsal bar 'di brjod tshe/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka gnyis/_yal 'dab re gnyis pa'i nang gi/_sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin/_/zhes sogs sh+lo ka
[\[329b.2\]]gnyis la skad shan sbyar yod pa'i glegs bam rnams sgo mthun par rgya skad mi 'dug pas/_yal 'dab gnyis pa'i sh+lo ka gcig pu sdeb sbyor dbang po rdo rje/_yal 'dab drug pa'i sh+lo ka gcig pu sdeb sbyor nye dbang rdo rje/_yal 'dab zhe brgyad pa'i sh+lo ka gnyis po sdeb sbyor kha sgo
[\[329b.3\]]ta yang ma/_yal 'dab re gnyis pa'i sh+lo ka gnyis po sdeb sbyor rkang bkra'i sgo nas nged rang gis rgya skad du bsgyur/_yal 'dab dgu pa'i nang gi/_me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/zhes pa'i rjes su rgya dper te ShAM sogs tshig rkang gcig gi rgya skad ma gtogs bod skad mi 'dug
[\[329b.4\]]par/_gsal bas de rnams bar khyab pas/_/zhes bod skad du bsgyur/_yal 'dab re drug pa'i nang gi/_de la dung gi kha zhes pa/_/khyi ni 'jigs su rung ba yod/_/ces pa 'di rdzogs mtshams su rgya dper ban+thAs+thi sogs tshig rkang gnyis kyi skad dod 'dug pa skad shan sbyar yod pa'i glegs
[\[329b.5\]]bam tshor bod skad du ma bsgyur bar sa stong bzhag 'dug cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha ba chen po'i phyag dpe skad shan sbyar med pa der yang tshig rkang gnyis po de mi 'dug pas/_lam gnas mtha' dag gang mthong ba/_/gdon mi za bar rnam 'joms pa/_/zhes pa'i tshig rkang gnyis
[\[329b.6\]]po 'di rgya dpe las bod skad du bsgyur yod pa slar yang rgya bod kyi yi ge khungs btsun pa'i rigs rnyed na mkhas pa rnams kyis le tshan 'di rnams la dag mi dag gi dpyad pa mdzad dgos yod cing /_rnam dpyod kyi rtsal dang ldan pa rnams la skad shan sbyar yod pa 'di blo
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]bskyed shin tu che ba 'ong 'dug pas/_par du brkos shing mchan bu rnams brkos tshe glegs bam rdzog por song dogs pas/_rdul khrod du g.yo 'gul med par 'jog pa rnams la mchan gyis dgos pa med cing /_blo gros dang brtson par ldan pa rnams kyis mchan bu rnams slar bris chog pa'i
[\[330a.2\]]dbang du byas te par gyi ma dpe'i sta gon byas pa bzhin/_sa skyong phyag mdzod phrin las rgya mtshos bkod pas khyab par byas nas zhus dag pa rab 'byams pa dge 'dun chos 'phel/_lo tsA ba kun dga' dbang ldan/_par yig pa byams gling pa legs ldan slob mar bcas pa bzhi dang /_par
[\[330a.3\]]mkhan mkhas pa yon bdag tshe ring sogs par mkhan rnams kyis lus ngag yid gsum 'bad pas bsgrims te/_khro mo zhes pa shing pho 'brug lo'i zla ba lnga pa'i tshes lnga res gza' phur bu dang skar ma rgyal gyi 'grub sbyor yod pa'i nyin dbu btsugs/_shing mo sbrul gyi lo'i tha skar
[\[330a.4\]]gyi zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la legs par grub pa'i dge bas lus can mtha' dag rnam 'dren bu ram shing pa slob pa lam gyi gnas skabs kyi mdzad pa dang mtshungs par bslabs te 'bras bu chos gzugs kyi sku mngon du byed pa'i dga' ston la spyod par gyur cig/_//'di'i legs sbyar skad la yi
[\[330a.5\]]ge pas bslad pa'i 'bru nor mang du mchis pa par du 'khod skabs kho bos dbu nas yig ldeb bzhi bcu skor tsam bcos zin mtshams/_sa skyong bstan pa tshe ring dpon blon dag snang ha cang 'byams ches pas/_po ta la'i phyi mo 'di mkhas pa mang pos zhus dag byas pa'i par yig yid ches yin pas ma
[\[330a.6\]]dag pa yod pa mi srid pas bzo bcos ma byed ces bka' lung lan gnyis kyang stsal bas 'chos dbang ma byung bar rang sor bzhag pa yin pas/_slan chad blo gros ldan pa dag gis zhu dag byed pa byung na bstan pa'i byi dor byas par 'gyur bas dgongs par 'jog mdzod/_ces pa'ang tshul rin gyis gleng ba'o//_//
